original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>You are blessed to walk the foundations of Pharloom.<br>Humble yourself before the shells of those who gave their lives to hold our kingdom’s weight.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>行走于纺络根基是你的殊荣。<br>在这些为王国献出生命者的躯壳前，应保持谦卑。
translated_text: about the pilgrims.<br>You're lucky to be on the pharo.<br>Be humble before the corpses of those who gave their lives to support the weight of our kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: sur les pèlerins.<br>Tu as de la chance d'être sur le pharo.<br>Soyez humble devant les cadavres de ceux qui ont donné leur vie pour soutenir le poids de notre royaume.

original_en_text: <hpage>You are wrong, Lady...<hpage>I knew the wish, and the price to achieve it. And now, across these many ages, I have only come to know it better...<hpage>Strength... in mind, in care, in claw. Strength enough that I may live to see a world better than our own, or to craft a world as I desire. <hpage>That was the wish, of my mother, of my mentor, and of you...<page>...Indeed, spider... So much pain you must have passed to speak our hope so simply...<page>For her you become... who knows clear our desire, and has seen full the darkness beneath our house, I would show you the gift...
original_zh_text: <hpage>您错了，夫人……<hpage>我知道您寄望于我，也知道达成这期愿的代价。历经岁月后，如今的我的看法愈发透彻……<hpage>心志、仁念、爪牙——皆需刚强。强大到能让我亲眼见证美好世界之降临，强大到能助我亲手创造一个理想世界。<hpage>此乃生母、恩师与您的共期之愿……<page>……诚然，小蜘蛛……你一定历经了不可估量之苦痛，才得此彻悟……<page>既然你已经成长……明晰我们的期愿，也见识过我们家园下深藏的黑暗……我这便将礼物赠予你……
translated_text: <hpage>You are wrong, Madam. "<hpage>I know that aspiration and the cost to achieve it. Now, many years after that, I have a deeper understanding of it.<hpage>The power is... in my heart, in my feet. Power enough to live to see a world better than your own, or to create the world you want.<hpage>This is my mother, my, your will.<page>... Really, Spider. In order to express our hope simply, you must have experienced a lot of pain.<page>For her sake. " You will be. He knows our wishes well, and he sees the darkness under our house, and I will show you a gift.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Vous avez tort, madame. "<hpage>Je connais cette aspiration et le coût de la réaliser. Maintenant, de nombreuses années après cela, j'ai une compréhension plus profonde de cela.<hpage>La puissance est... Dans mon cœur, dans mes pieds. La puissance suffisante pour vivre pour voir un monde meilleur que le vôtre ou pour créer le monde que vous voulez.<hpage>C'est ma mère, ma volonté, ta volonté.<page>... Vraiment, spider. Pour exprimer simplement notre espérance, vous devez avoir vécu beaucoup de douleur.<page>Pour son bien.« Tu le seras. Il connaît bien nos désirs, et il voit les ténèbres sous notre maison, et je vous montrerai un cadeau.

original_en_text: Coral sways,<br>Clear water flows,<br>Upon our river free of time.
original_zh_text: 珊瑚轻摇，<br>净水长流，<br>河流超脱时光之外。
translated_text: The coral shakes,<br>the flow of water,<br>The river has no time.
secondary_translated_text: Le corail tremble,<br>Le flux de l'eau,<br>La rivière n'a pas le temps.

translated_text: ... They arrived. And finally...
secondary_translated_text: ... Ils sont arrivés. Et enfin...

translated_text: ... Our silk.
secondary_translated_text: ... Notre soie.

original_en_text: Witness, the first light. The only means we possess to resist that void with which our family is forever linked.<page>Reach forth, child grown strong. Wrest it from this remembrance. Burn yourself free from our sad fate...
original_zh_text: 来吧，见证这道最初的光芒。这是我们抵御虚空的唯一手段。而那虚空，却与我们的族群永世相连。<page>伸出手来，我的孩子，你已通过历练变得强大。在这忆境中夺取那光芒，焚尽我们悲惨宿命的枷锁……
translated_text: Witness, the first light. It is the only means of resisting the emptiness that leads to family and eternity.<page>As you grow up, your child will be stronger. Erase it from memory. They are freed from their sad fate.
secondary_translated_text: Témoignage, la première lumière C'est le seul moyen de résister au vide qui mène à la famille et à l'éternité.<page>Comme vous grandissez, votre enfant sera plus fort. effacer de la mémoire. Ils sont libérés de leur destin tragique.

translated_text: ... Our power,
secondary_translated_text: ... notre pouvoir,

translated_text: ... Who are we?
secondary_translated_text: ... Qui sommes-nous ?

translated_text: ... I want you to wake up.
secondary_translated_text: ... Je veux que vous vous réveillez.

original_en_text: ...Ignore them, daughter... their whispers...<page>...Greater, grander... Weaver, guardian, queen... Those are their desires... not your own. Certainly not mine...<page>...Only if you resist them, you might see it, another hope... beyond...<page>...But to recall these words, in time so far... Will you even remember me, child? Could you?...<page>...A mother... before the mask... before I lay forever in duty...
original_zh_text: ……莫听，女儿……她们的絮语……<page>……伟大……崇高……织者、守护者、女王……皆为他们所欲……非你所求，更非我所愿……<page>……唯有抵抗，方可见……另一线希望……<page>……但时过境迁，这些话……你可会记得？你可会记得我？...<page>……作为母亲，在戴上面甲之前……在因责任而永眠之前……
translated_text: ... Ignore the daughters and their whisper.<page>... Bigger, bigger, bigger. Weaver, the Guardian, the Queen - these are their wishes. not my own, not mine.<page>... Only by rebelling against them can we see transcendence, another hope, and it is the only hope we have.<page>... But when I look back on those words, do you remember me until now, my son? " If you are...<page>... Before my mother wore a mask, before she was responsible forever.
secondary_translated_text: ... Ignorez les filles et leurs chuchotements.<page>... Plus grand, plus grand, plus grand. Weaver, le Gardien, la Reine, voilà leurs souhaits. Pas à moi, pas à moi.<page>... Ce n'est qu ' en nous rebellant contre eux que nous pouvons voir la transcendance, un autre espoir, et c'est le seul espoir que nous avons.<page>... Mais quand je regarde en arrière à ces paroles, te souviens-tu de moi jusqu'à maintenant, mon fils ?« Si vous êtes...<page>... Avant que ma mère ne porte un masque, avant qu ' elle ne soit responsable pour toujours.

original_en_text: ...Show us your craft, child...<page>...Show it splendid, as only we can teach...<page>...Prove yourself more Weaver than Wyrm...
original_zh_text: ……展现你的技艺，孩子……<page>……展现那唯有我等能传授的绝技……<page>……证明自己更像织者，而非沃姆……
translated_text: ... Please show me your skills.<page>... It's great because only we can teach it.<page>... Prove that he is more like Weaver than the Devil.
secondary_translated_text: ... Montrez-moi vos compétences.<page>... C'est génial parce que nous sommes les seuls à pouvoir l'enseigner.<page>... Prouvez qu ' il ressemble plus à Weaver que au Diable.

original_en_text: At water’s source,<br>And coral’s heart,<br>Our lord born last to rule.
original_zh_text: 水源尽头，<br>珊瑚心核，<br>末生之主将临。
translated_text: In water sources,<br>The heart of coral,<br>The Lord was born to reign.
secondary_translated_text: dans les sources d'eau,<br>Le coeur du corail,<br>Le Seigneur est né pour régner.

original_en_text: ...She called us daughters... Called us divine... She lied...
original_zh_text: ……她称我们为女儿……称我们为天选……皆是谎言……
translated_text: ... She calls us daughters - she calls us holy. i lied to you.
secondary_translated_text: ... Elle nous appelle des filles, elle nous appelle des saints. Je vous ai menti.

translated_text: ... The children... Weaver
secondary_translated_text: ... Les enfants ... Weaver

translated_text: ... wholeheartedly. Trade unions.
secondary_translated_text: ... sincèrement. syndicats.

translated_text: ... The children... The spider is...
secondary_translated_text: ... Les enfants ... L'araignée est...

original_en_text: ...Alas... spider’s child...<page>...For our ways you will think us harsh... You will think us uncaring, unrepentant...<page>...And so we must seem, for such is the cost of our wish...
original_zh_text: ……唉……蜘蛛之子……<page>……你必定认为我等冷酷……认为我等无情且固执……<page>……但我等必须如此，此为实现期愿之代价……
translated_text: ... ah... The child of the spider.<page>... I think it's tough on our approach. We will think that we are indifferent and unrepentant.<page>... So let's take a look. Because it is the price of our wishes.
secondary_translated_text: ... Ah, oui. L'enfant de l'araignée.<page>... Je pense que c'est dur dans notre approche. Nous pensons que nous sommes indifférents et impenitents.<page>... Alors jetons un coup d'œil. Parce que c'est le prix de nos désirs.

translated_text: ... Their memories.
secondary_translated_text: ... leurs souvenirs.

translated_text: ... Tie the shell.
secondary_translated_text: ... Tirez le shell.

translated_text: ... Their voices. Their song.
secondary_translated_text: ... Leurs voix. Leur chanson.

translated_text: ... Please cultivate it. stand up!
secondary_translated_text: ... Cultive-la, lève-toi !

translated_text: ... Eternal devotion.
secondary_translated_text: ... Dévotion éternelle.

translated_text: ... Binding the soul.
secondary_translated_text: ... Lier l'âme.

translated_text: ... I tie everyone up.
secondary_translated_text: ... J'attache tout le monde.

original_en_text: ...She called us daughters... She called us divine...
original_zh_text: ……她称我们为女儿……称我们为天选……
translated_text: ... She calls us daughters - she calls us sacred.
secondary_translated_text: ... Elle nous appelle des filles, elle nous appelle des saints.

original_en_text: ...We are life... We are growth... What world without us?...
original_zh_text: ……我等即生命……我等即生长……无我则世如荒土……
translated_text: ... We are the life. growing in a world without us?
secondary_translated_text: ... Nous sommes la vie. grandir dans un monde sans nous ?

translated_text: ... wake up, wake up.
secondary_translated_text: ... Réveille-toi, réveille-toi.

translated_text: ... Come, my children, witness our awakening.
secondary_translated_text: ... Venez, mes enfants, assister à notre réveil.

original_en_text: ...Good... Better...<page>...Yet still you will need to be faster...<page>...In time, they will come for you... Those who fear your nature, and those seeking to claim it...<page>...To survive our world, you must learn to sting... swift and sudden...
original_zh_text: ……尚可……精进……<page>……你仍需更快一些……<page>……终有一日，畏惧你本性者将至……欲夺你本性者将至……<page>……欲存于世，须学蛰刺……快如闪电……
translated_text: ... okay, okay. The better the...<page>... However, we need to do it faster.<page>... In time they will come to you. Those who fear your nature, and those who try to assert your nature.<page>... In order to survive in our world, we must learn to sting. Quick and suddenly.
secondary_translated_text: ... Très bien, très bien. Mieux vaut le...<page>... Cependant, nous devons le faire plus rapidement.<page>... Au temps, ils viendront à vous. Ceux qui craignent votre nature, et ceux qui essaient d'affirmer votre nature.<page>... Pour survivre dans notre monde, nous devons apprendre à piquer. Rapide et soudainement.

original_en_text: ...Our claws to crush... Our claws to rule... Our claws to save them all...
original_zh_text: ……以爪粉碎……以爪统治……以爪拯救众生……
translated_text: ... Our claws are destroying our current claws. Our claws saved them, and they were saved.
secondary_translated_text: ... Nos griffes détruisent nos griffes actuelles. Nos griffes les ont sauvés, et ils ont été sauvés.

original_en_text: ...To dance... And love... And end... Together...
translated_text: ... They dance. Love and end. together.
secondary_translated_text: ... Ils dansent. Amour et fin. ensemble.

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>May these fields of flame sear away all impurity.<br> That you be granted ascendance to the verdant lands above.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>愿这烈焰原野焚尽一切污秽。<br>赐你升入苍翠之地的权利。
translated_text: about the pilgrims.<br>May this fire burn the filthy things.<br>You have the right to land in the green space above.
secondary_translated_text: sur les pèlerins.<br>Que ce feu brûle les choses sales.<br>Vous avez le droit d'atterrir dans l'espace vert ci-dessus.

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun mad... than none...
original_zh_text: ……宁要癫狂之子……也好过膝下无子……
translated_text: ... It's better not to have a child than to be mad.
secondary_translated_text: ... Il vaut mieux ne pas avoir d'enfants que d'être fou.

translated_text: ... The Spider's Sister. The song goes on.
secondary_translated_text: ... La sœur de l'araignée. La chanson continue.

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun frail... than none...
original_zh_text: ……宁要脆弱之子……也好过膝下无子……
translated_text: ... It is better to be a weak child than nothing.
secondary_translated_text: ... Il vaut mieux être un enfant faible que rien.

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun pure... than them...
translated_text: ... A pure child is better. more than they are.
secondary_translated_text: ... Un enfant pur est mieux. plus qu ' ils ne le sont.

translated_text: ... Our own will be bound forever.
secondary_translated_text: ... Le nôtre sera lié pour toujours.

original_en_text: ...For her light... eternal... our song sustains...
translated_text: ... Forever for her light. The song continues.
secondary_translated_text: ... pour toujours, pour sa lumière. La chanson continue.

translated_text: ... I felt it.
secondary_translated_text: ... Je l'ai senti.

original_en_text: We speak the wish of the Master Herald,<br>he who signs an Age’s end.<br><page>Under chapel fallen to the monarch’s might,<br>Over camp collapsed to the black thread plight,<page>Scorched field on edge, shells black and burned,<br>Up towers spinning, near the surgeon spurned,<page>Cage of one who raged against the silken lie,<br>Fell heart of frost, who soars on high,<page>Past cradle’s peak, last test of fitness,<br>That the age may pass, this shroom its witness.
original_zh_text: 此乃使者大人祈愿，<br>宣告纪元终结到来。<page>圣堂倾颓君威下，<br>骸营覆灭黑丝劫。<page>焦土边际髓骨灼，<br>纺塔孤医灰沼别。<page>囚笼首罪逆丝客，<br>霜心振翼费岳阙。 <page>摇篮极顶终试炼，<br>菌主临鉴纪元歇。
translated_text: to express the wishes of the ancients,<br>The person who signs at the end of the era.<br><page>When the kingdom came into the hands of the Church,<br>The camp is covered with black lines,<page>The edge of the scorched earth, the shell burned black,<br>The tower turned around and a nearby surgeon was refused.<page>The man lying in the cage was angry with the silk.<br>Falling from the center of the frost and soaring high.<page>After the top of the crib and the final fitness test,<br>Time passes, and that is the proof.
secondary_translated_text: Pour exprimer les souhaits des anciens,<br>La personne qui signe à la fin de l'ère.<br><page>Quand le royaume est passé entre les mains de l'Église,<br>Le camp est couvert de lignes noires,<page>Le bord de la terre brûlée, la coquille brûlée noire,<br>La tour s'est retournée et un chirurgien voisin a été refusé.<page>L'homme couché dans la cage était en colère contre la soie.<br>Chute du centre du gel et s'élevant haut.<page>Après le sommet du berceau et le test final de condition physique,<br>Le temps passe, c'est la preuve.

original_en_text: ...How we hunted... How we sang... My children, I saw you glorious...
original_zh_text: ……昔日狩猎……昔日咏唱……我的孩子，我曾见你们辉煌……
translated_text: ... They hunt. How to sing? My children, it is a pleasure to meet you.
secondary_translated_text: ... Ils chassent. Comment chanter ? Mes enfants, c'est un plaisir de vous rencontrer.

original_en_text: ...From our Silk... A child born loyal...
translated_text: ... Our Silk. A faithful child born.
secondary_translated_text: ... notre soie. Un enfant fidèle est né.

original_en_text: <hpage>So, the Herald visits this land too...<hpage>If he is here, now, then great change or a savage end is inevitable. He would care to see nothing else...
original_zh_text: <hpage>使者竟也踏足此地……<hpage>若他在此现身，巨变或浩劫将无可避免。除此之外，他目空一切……
translated_text: <hpage>So, the Held Paper also visited the area.<hpage>If he's here now, big changes and a barbaric end are inevitable. He doesn't want to look at other things.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ainsi, le papier tenu a également visité la région.<hpage>S'il est ici maintenant, de grands changements et une fin barbare sont inévitables. Il ne veut pas regarder d'autres choses.

original_en_text: Ah... I understand, stranger. I presume too much of one who is not a flea.<page>I’ve heard the settlement below us is setting up a wishwall. Perhaps I’ll send Grishkin down to hang up our wish...<page>
original_zh_text: 唉……我明白。对外族提这种要求太过分了。<page>听说下面营地建了祈愿墙，我让格里什琴去挂上我们的愿望吧……
translated_text: ah... I see you, stranger. I have a lot of opinions on people who are not flea.<page>It is said that a wall of wishes is built in the village below. Perhaps I should have sent Gryshkin to hang up our wishes. "<page>
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. Je te vois, étranger. J'ai beaucoup d'opinions sur les gens qui ne sont pas des puces.<page>On dit qu ' un mur de vœux est construit dans le village ci-dessous. Peut - être aurais-je dû envoyer Gryshkine pour accrocher nos vœux. "<page>

original_en_text: Bug not flea, my learnings, all have been scratched to your maps. Can give no more.<page>Leave now! Seek and save lost fleas, for a caravan full and whole!
original_zh_text: 外族虫，位置都标在你图上了。没其他的了。<page>快去吧！找到那些迷途跳蚤，凑满旅团！
translated_text: Worms are not fleas, my lesson is drawn on your map. There is no more.<page>go now! Find and rescue the lost fleas and build a complete caravan!
secondary_translated_text: Les vers ne sont pas des puces, ma leçon est dessinée sur votre carte. Il n'y en a plus.<page>Allez-y ! Trouvez et sauvez les puces perdues et construisez une caravane complète !

original_en_text: Have you met her yet? Our burly new companion, Vog! Fresh returned from a long time spent tracking.<hpage>We have met, Fleamaster. It gladdens me that so strong a flea exists as her.<hpage>Yours was a caravan sorely lacking for protection, and I am too bound by my own tasks to provide it for you.<page>Why, we would never impose so! And now, no matter! Her scent may be strong, and her taste for brew bottomless, but her skill is sharp.<page>If predators draw close, her talents will provide much confidence to our caravan.
original_zh_text: 见过我们的新成员沃葛了吗？她的追踪术很是了得！<hpage>见过了。有这般强力的跳蚤存在，我也轻松一些。<hpage>毕竟你们旅团缺少护卫，而我又有要务在身。<page>怎么敢劳烦您！放心吧，虽然沃葛经常臭烘烘的，又嗜酒，但本事过硬。<page>如果有掠食者靠近，她的本领能安大伙的心。
translated_text: have you seen it? Our great new partner Vogue! He came back from a long chase.<hpage>I've seen it before, Freemaster. I'm glad I have a strong flea like her.<hpage>Your car is not protected. I cannot protect you because I am bound by my mission.<page>Why, we would never force such a thing! I'm okay now! Her smell is strong and the taste of beer is immeasurable, but her technique is sharp.<page>If Predator approaches, her talent will give the team a lot of confidence.
secondary_translated_text: L'avez-vous vu ? Notre nouveau partenaire, Vogue ! Il revenait d'une longue chasse.<hpage>Je l'ai déjà vu, Freemaster. Je suis content d'avoir une puce forte comme elle.<hpage>Votre voiture n'est pas protégée. Je ne peux pas vous protéger parce que je suis lié par ma mission.<page>Eh bien, nous ne forcerons jamais une telle chose ! Je vais bien maintenant ! Son odeur est forte et le goût de la bière est incommensurable, mais sa technique est pointue.<page>Si Predator s'approche, son talent donnera beaucoup de confiance à l'équipe.

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? Would you seek service of me, ehh? Mine is knowledge much, the places of the lost little ones, heard and smelt across the caves.<page>You could help find! And bring! For all to come together now that times turn dark...<page>But no map you hold! If learnings are wanted, a map must be owned. Until then, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？要我帮忙吗？我知道那些迷途小辈的踪迹，各处洞穴都有。<page>你来寻找！把它们带来！最好齐聚于此，全体跳蚤……趁黑暗未临......<page>但你没有地图！想要情报，先准备地图。在此之前无可奉告。
translated_text: If you stay, aren't the bugs fleas? you're asking for my services, aren't you? I've learned a lot about the places in the lost caves where I hear and smell little things.<page>We can help you find them! Bring it here Times have changed, and we are united.<page>But no map! If you want to learn, you need a map. Until then we can do nothing.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous restez, les insectes ne sont-ils pas des puces ? Vous demandez mes services, non ? J'ai beaucoup appris sur les endroits dans les grottes perdues où j'entends et sent les petites choses.<page>Nous pouvons vous aider à les retrouver ! Les temps ont changé, et nous sommes unis.<page>Mais pas de carte ! Si vous voulez apprendre, vous avez besoin d'une carte. Jusqu'à présent, nous ne pouvons rien faire.

original_en_text: Our travels have end, and now soon the world will also have end! At such bitter of times, brew with friends is most sweet.
original_zh_text: 旅途结束，世界也要完蛋了！这种苦涩的时候，跟朋友一起喝药酿最甜。
translated_text: Our journey is over, and the world is nearing its end! On this difficult day, brewing with friends is the sweetest thing.
secondary_translated_text: Notre voyage est terminé, et le monde approche de sa fin ! En ce jour difficile, brasser avec des amis est la chose la plus douce.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, sir flea. I see you were able to unite safely with this caravan.<page>Oh yes! All thanks to you! Dear, sweet you! Heh heh!<page>The Fleamaster, that old bore, tells me to call you Miss Hornet. But such a prickly name ill befits such a delicate beauty! Shall I call you something prettier, like ‘Nectarsweet’, my dear?<hpage>You shall not. Address me by my name or not at all.<page>Gradak! Of course. Of course! Heh heh. And now, I shall let you in on my little secret. My carriage doubles as a soothing spa, you see. It’s most ingenious.<page>The water inside is piping hot, and purer than a psalm! Heh heh! I’d gladly let you soak inside, for a modest fee!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，跳蚤先生。看来你顺利加入旅团了。<page>是啊！全托你的福！亲爱的小甜心！嘿嘿！<page>跳蚤首领那老古板让我称呼你为大黄蜂小姐。但这带刺的名字配不上娇花！叫你"蜜糖甜心"如何？<hpage>当然不行。要么称呼我的本名，要么闭嘴。<page>咳！是是是！嘿嘿，透露个小秘密——其实我的车厢兼作温泉疗愈所！<page>水温滚烫，而且比圣诗还纯净！付点小钱就能泡个痛快！
translated_text: <hpage>Again, Mr. Fly. You can join this escort safely.<page>oh! yes! Thank you for your comments. Darling, darling, you! what?!<page>The king of fleas, that dull old man, had me call Miss Bumble, but such a charming name is not fit for such a beautiful person! can we give you a nicer name?<hpage>Do you call them by a name you shouldn't, or don't call them at all?<page>Gradack, of course, of course! Now, let me tell you my little secret: my carriage doubles as a healing spa, which is the smartest.<page>The water in it is purer than poetry! what?! I'm happy to put you in, not expensive!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Encore une fois, monsieur Fly. Vous pourrez rejoindre cette escorte en toute sécurité.<page>Ooh ! Oui ! Merci pour vos commentaires. Chérie, chérie, toi ! Quoi ? !<page>Le roi des puces, ce vieil homme ennuyeux, m'a fait appeler Miss Bumble, mais un nom aussi charmant ne convient pas à une si belle personne ! On peut vous donner un nom plus beau ?<hpage>Les appeler par un nom que vous ne devriez pas ou ne les appeler pas du tout ?<page>Gradack, évidemment ! Maintenant, laissez-moi vous dire mon petit secret : ma voiture se double de spa de guérison, qui est le plus intelligent.<page>L'eau en elle est plus pure que la poésie ! Quoi ? ! Je suis heureux de vous mettre, pas cher !

original_en_text: Dear one, how shameful for the world to end while poor Kratt still has so much living left in him!<page>But how sweet of you to join me here! Will you play the Flea Bounce game, that I may appreciate the beauty of your agile form while I await my doom?<page>To play is simple. Leap up and keep bouncing on the fleas who fly past for as long as you are able!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，可惜末日来得太早，可怜的克拉特还没活够呢！<page>但有甜心你在就好！要玩这跳蚤蹦蹦的游戏吗？我想欣赏你美丽灵巧的身姿呢！<page>规则很简单，跳起来踩飞过的跳蚤，持续越久越好！
translated_text: My dear ones, how shameful the end of the world will be, when poor Crat has left so many lives!<page>But I'm glad I was able to attend! Do you want to bounce flea? Then you can admire your agility and wait for your fate?<page>Playing is easy. Jump up and jump on the flea as long as you can!
secondary_translated_text: Mes chers, combien honteuse sera la fin du monde, quand le pauvre Crat aura laissé tant de vies !<page>Mais je suis content d'avoir pu y assister ! Vous souhaitez bounce flea ? Alors pourrez-vous admirer votre agilité et attendre votre destin ?<page>Jouer est facile. Sautez et sautez sur la puce aussi longtemps que vous le pouvez !

original_en_text: Strange beasts prowl these grey lands. I hear them roar and shriek outside camp. Is best to stay inside and make quiet.
original_zh_text: 这片灰地时常能听见怪物吼叫，最好待在营地里别出声。
translated_text: A strange beast was roaming the gray land. I could hear their screams outside the camp. Please stay inside and be quiet.
secondary_translated_text: Une bête étrange parcourait la terre grise. Je pouvais entendre leurs cris à l'extérieur du camp. Restez à l'intérieur et restez silencieux.

translated_text: Who are the Flea Dodgers?
secondary_translated_text: Qui sont les Flea Dodgers

original_en_text: At longest last, have our flea roamings ended! Every sandy grain and stinky squelchy maggot was worth to endure, to claim such a home!<page>Is time for rest and celebrate, and none have earned such more than you, Miss Hornet! Raise your flask and drink most heartily with us!
original_zh_text: 终于不用流浪了！这一路上吃沙喝风忍蛆虫都值了！<page>是时候庆祝了！大黄蜂小姐，和我们一起举杯吧！
translated_text: Finally, our flea journey is over! All the gravel and all the stinking tick worms are worth enduring as well as such a house!<page>It's time to rest and celebrate. No one can make more money than you, Miss Hornet! Let's raise the bottle and drink it together!
secondary_translated_text: Enfin, notre voyage de puces est terminé ! Tout le gravier et tous les vers puants de tiques valent la peine d'endurer aussi bien qu ' une telle maison !<page>Il est temps de se reposer et de célébrer. Personne ne peut gagner plus d'argent que vous, mademoiselle Hornet ! Levons la bouteille et buvons-la ensemble !

original_en_text: We will camp here in these grey lands until more fleas find their way to the caravan. Please lend your aid to any of our fellows you find lost out on the roads!
original_zh_text: 我们会在这灰地扎营，直到更多同胞归队。请继续帮助寻找迷途的跳蚤！
translated_text: Until more fleas find the caravan, we will camp out in this gray land. Please help those who are lost in the way!
secondary_translated_text: Jusqu'à ce que d'autres puces trouvent la caravane, nous campons dans cette terre grise. Aidez ceux qui sont perdus en chemin !

original_en_text: <hpage>I am travelling these lands for my own reasons, Fleamaster. However, if I happen upon any fleas on my travels, I will aid them as best I can.<page>Oh, oh, I could ask for nothing more! They must all be hiding or stuck in dangerous places, but if you rouse them they are sure to find their way here to us.<page>May the kingdom bless your travels and keep you safe, stranger! You are welcome to rest here with us whenever the roads bring you back!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我的旅途有自己的目的，但若路遇跳蚤，会尽力相助。<page>那就足够了！他们肯定是困在各处险地，只要脱困就会自己寻路归来。<page>愿王国庇佑您旅途平安！也随时欢迎您回来歇息！
translated_text: <hpage>Flymaster, I have traveled this land for my own reasons. However, if you encounter fleas while traveling, do what you can.<page>"Oh, no more can be asked for!" They must all be hiding or locked up in dangerous places, but if you wake them up, they will surely find our way. "<page>May the kingdom bless your journey and keep you safe. Whenever the road returns, we welcome you to rest with us.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Flymaster, j'ai voyagé sur ce pays pour mes propres raisons. Cependant, si vous rencontrez des puces en voyageant, faites ce que vous pouvez.<page>« Oh, on ne peut pas demander plus !« Ils doivent tous être cachés ou enfermés dans des endroits dangereux, mais si vous les réveillez, ils trouveront sûrement notre chemin. "<page>Que le royaume bénisse votre voyage et vous garde en sécurité. Chaque fois que la route revient, nous vous invitons à vous reposer avec nous.

original_en_text: The journey here was long, but we didn’t lose a single flea! I’m told it’s good luck to bring a guest along when travelling, so we must have you to thank!<page>I trust the trip was agreeable for you. A pleasure perhaps? Nestled in with our dear little ones...<hpage>They certainly make for energetic travel companions. I’ve not often had opportunity to socialise with such spirited sorts.<page>Splendid! And now, you must go and see Grishkin, sitting there by the bubbling cauldron. After long travel, we drink to revive our spirits!
original_zh_text: 这趟旅途虽长，但没丢一只跳蚤！听说带贵客同行能带来好运，肯定是您的功劳！<page>旅途可还舒适？和小家伙们挤在一起挺开心吧？<hpage>他们确实精力旺盛，我很少和这么活泼的旅伴打交道。<page>那就好！现在去找格里什琴吧，她在冒泡的大锅旁。长途劳顿后该喝点提神！
translated_text: It was a long way to get here, but we didn't lose the flea! I've heard that taking guests on a trip brings you good luck, so thank you!<page>This trip will make you happy. With our precious children, which may be fun.<hpage>It is perfect for energetic travelers. I rarely have the opportunity to interact with such an active person.<page>That's awesome! I must go to see Grisikin, who is sitting by the boiling kettle. After a long trip, a drink!
secondary_translated_text: C'était un long chemin pour arriver ici, mais nous n'avons pas perdu la puce ! J'ai entendu dire que prendre des invités en voyage vous apporte de la chance, alors merci !<page>Ce voyage vous rendra heureux. Avec nos précieux enfants, ce qui peut être drôle.<hpage>Il est parfait pour les voyageurs énergiques. J'ai rarement l'occasion d'interagir avec une personne aussi active.<page>C'est génial ! Je dois aller voir Grisikin, qui est assis près de la bouilloire bouillante. Après un long trajet, un verre !

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, your bottle is full of Flea Brew. You know what such means! You must have drink! Har har!<page>When you have finish drinking, return and we will fill flask again! I’m is always brewing!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，你身上的药酿还满着呢，得先喝光！<page>喝完了就回来找我！我这儿药酿管够！
translated_text: Miss Hornet, your bottle is full of flea beer. You know what I mean! I have to drink it! ha ha ha!<page>When I finish drinking, I will replenish it! I've been planning it all along!
secondary_translated_text: Miss Hornet, votre bouteille est pleine de bière à puces. Tu sais ce que je veux dire ! Il faut que je le buve ! Ha ha ha !<page>Quand j'aurai fini de boire, je vais le refaire ! Je l'ai planifié tout le temps !

original_en_text: My fellows give much worry for the other fleas, but I’m not give at all. They will find their way to us, and if not, who keep count of them anyway? Har har!
original_zh_text: 大伙总爱担心那些迷途的同胞，我才不愁！该来的自会找来，没来谁又数得清？哈哈！
translated_text: My companion is worried about the other fleas, but I am not worried at all. They'll find our way, or else who remembers? ha ha ha!
secondary_translated_text: Mon compagnon est inquiet pour les autres puces, mais je ne suis pas inquiet du tout. Ils trouveront notre chemin, ou qui se souviendra ? Ha ha ha !

original_en_text: Ahh, and before the road steals you away from us again, allow me to offer you a humble gift!<page>One of the little ones found a pale artefact while digging about in the sands. A spiny, cold sort of thing.<page>I see no use in it for we fleas, so of course we are all too pleased, eager even, to bestow it upon our dear friend!
original_zh_text: 趁您还没走，请收下这份薄礼！<page>有个小家伙在沙地里挖到件苍白古物，冷冰冰带尖刺。<page>对我们没用，正好赠予挚友！
translated_text: Oh, before this road takes you away from us again, I will give you a humble gift.<page>One of the little men found a pale relic while digging in the sand. It's cold and cold.<page>I don't think it's useful to us fleas, so of course we're happy and even want to give it to a dear friend!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, avant que ce chemin ne vous éloigne de nous, je vous donnerai un humble cadeau.<page>L'un des petits hommes trouva une relique pâle en creusant dans le sable. Il est froid et froid.<page>Je ne pense pas que cela soit utile pour nous puces, donc bien sûr, nous sommes heureux et voulons même le donner à un ami cher !

original_en_text: For your hard efforts and eternal friendship, please accept these meagre rosaries as reward.<page>Think of we fleas when you find chance to trade them!
original_zh_text: 为了酬谢您的辛劳，请收下这些念珠。<page>旅途上别忘了我们跳蚤，朋友！
translated_text: Please accept this humble Rosary as a reward for your hard work and eternal friendship.<page>If you have the opportunity to trade fleas, consider our fleas!
secondary_translated_text: S'il vous plaît acceptez ce humble Rosaire comme récompense pour votre travail acharné et votre amitié éternelle.<page>Si vous avez l'occasion d'échanger des puces, pensez à nos puces !

original_en_text: Dear one, my lone light amongst the darkness! Will you bathe in Kratt’s spa-carriage and let the warm waters wash away your worries?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的！黑暗中的明灯！可愿光临克拉特的温泉车厢，让暖流洗去烦忧？
translated_text: My dear one, my lonely light in the darkness! Why don't you take a bath in a Clutter spa car and wash off your troubles with warm water?
secondary_translated_text: Ma chère, ma lumière solitaire dans les ténèbres ! Pourquoi ne pas prendre un bain dans une voiture spa Clutter et laver vos problèmes avec de l'eau chaude ?

original_en_text: Please, my dear, step inside! I will stand guard here while you bathe... Right on this very spot!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，请进吧！我就在这为你站岗……寸步不离！
translated_text: Honey, please come in! When you take a bath, I'm here to keep watch. Here I am!
secondary_translated_text: Chérie, entrez, s'il vous plaît ! Quand tu prends un bain, je suis là pour veiller. Me voilà !

original_en_text: Dodeshna. Want for shelter from the thick, grey air? Is heavy, and wet. I’m worry for the little flea’s health in this land.<page>And they make play in the filthy water. I say them stop, but they just laugh and splash on me. They are lack respect!<hpage>Most bugs instinctively obey those with strength and will. Speak with authority, or your commands may go unheeded.<page>Ugh... really, is Fleamaster’s job to teach the fleas such. I will just have rest here until is time to move on.
original_zh_text: 多德什纳。要来避一避吗？这的空气又闷又湿，小跳蚤们要生病了。<page>他们还玩脏水，说了也不听，反而溅我一身！没大没小！<hpage>虫类大多听从强者，你得用权威口吻。<page>唉……这本是首领该做的。我还是好好休息等旅团出发吧。
translated_text: Doddishner. Do you want to avoid the grey air? It's heavy and wet. I am concerned about the health of the little fleas in this area.<page>Playing in dirty water. I told them to stop, but they just laughed and threw water. Not enough respect!<hpage>Most insects instinctively follow those with strength and will. If you do not consult the authorities, your orders will be ignored.<page>um... In fact, Fleamaster's job is to teach fleas. I'm going to rest here until I move on.
secondary_translated_text: Doddishner. Vous souhaitez éviter l'air gris ? C'est lourd et mouillé. Je suis préoccupé par la santé des petites puces dans cette région.<page>Jouer dans de l'eau sale. Je leur ai dit d'arrêter, mais ils ont juste ri et jeté de l'eau. Pas assez de respect !<hpage>La plupart des insectes suivent instinctivement ceux qui ont la force et la volonté. Si vous ne consultez pas les autorités, vos ordres seront ignorés.<page>Umm... En fait, le travail du Fleamaster est d'enseigner aux puces. Je vais me reposer ici jusqu'à ce que je bouge.

original_en_text: Away then, bug. Await challenger, shall I.
original_zh_text: 那就走吧。我会等下一个挑战者。
translated_text: Get out, bug. Waiting for a challenger.
secondary_translated_text: Sortez, bug ! En attendant un challenger.

original_en_text: Vikna! Our little game has ended. But I trust, after a short rest, you will play with us again?
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束。不过你应该还没尽全力吧，休息会儿再战？
translated_text: vicarner! Our little game is over. But after a short break, I think we'll play with them again.
secondary_translated_text: Vicarner ! Notre petit jeu est terminé. Mais après une courte pause, je pense que nous jouerons à nouveau avec eux.

translated_text: juggling.
secondary_translated_text: juggler.

original_en_text: Ahh! Do I understand you rightly, stranger? You will help gather the lonely fleas to our caravan? Truly?
original_zh_text: 啊！我没听错吧？您愿意帮忙召集流落各处的跳蚤？当真？
translated_text: ah! ah! Stranger, do I understand what you mean? Will you help us collect the lonely fleas in our caravan? really?
secondary_translated_text: Ah ! Ah ! Stranger, est-ce que je comprends ce que tu veux dire ? Voulez-vous nous aider à recueillir les puces solitaires dans notre caravane ? Vraiment ?

original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！跳蚤的救星！我们等候您很久了！<page>看看这块宝地！远离外面的危险，跳蚤们肯定能在这茁壮成长！<page>这里就是我们旅团的终点站了，纺络再找不到比这更好的归宿了！<hpage>合你们的心意就好。能有这么多跳蚤幸存，我也感到高兴。其他虫类大多没那么幸运。<page>没错！未来充满希望，这全仰赖您的帮助。为纪念乔迁之喜，请收下这份纪念品。<page>我最近学了缝纫，小家伙们也帮我收集材料。想给你的工具袋加个口袋，让旅途轻松些。<page>区区薄礼不足挂齿，希望您别失望！
translated_text: miss hornet! Our Savior! " Please come and visit us.<page>look at it! Except for the darkness and death of the land nearby, this beautiful place you have given us is safe. A place where fleas become wise and strong.<page>We end our journey here, as there is no more settlement in the farm.<hpage>I am glad this place is right, Master Nami. It is peaceful to know that the fleas will survive. Most falcon insects seem to have a more tragic fate.<page>It really is! A future full of hope awaits us! Only for yourself and your efforts. In commemoration of our arrival, I am pleased to offer you a small service.<page>I was learning how to sew, and fleas collected the materials for me. I think you can add an extra pocket to your bag to make your travel easier.<page>It's a small job much less than you deserve, but I still want it to satisfy you!
secondary_translated_text: Madame Hornet ! Notre Sauveur !« S'il vous plaît venez nous rendre visite.<page>Regardez ça ! Sauf pour les ténèbres et la mort de la terre voisine, ce bel endroit que vous nous avez donné est sûr. Un lieu où les puces deviennent sages et fortes.<page>Nous terminons notre voyage ici, car il n'y a plus de colonisation dans la ferme.<hpage>Je suis content que ce soit le bon endroit, Maître Nami. Il est paisible de savoir que les puces survivraient. La plupart des insectes faucons semblent avoir un sort plus tragique.<page>C'est vraiment ! Un avenir plein d'espoir nous attend ! Juste pour vous et vos efforts. Pour commémorer notre arrivée, je suis heureux de vous offrir un petit service.<page>J'apprenais à coudre, et les puces ont recueilli les matériaux pour moi. Je pense que vous pouvez ajouter une poche supplémentaire à votre sac pour faciliter votre voyage.<page>C'est un petit travail beaucoup moins que vous ne le méritez, mais je veux quand même qu ' il vous satisfaise !

original_en_text: <hpage>I know not what you plan, Fleamaster, and at this time I cannot participate.<page>Ahhhh. Ahhhhhhh! Wretches, wretches, all of us! How can we begin without you, dear friend?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不知您作何打算，跳蚤首领，但此刻我无法参与庆典。<page>啊啊啊！可惜啊，这太令我们难过了！没有您这位挚友，庆典如何开始？
translated_text: <hpage>I don't know what your plans are, but I can't participate right now.<page>ah! ah! Poor thing, poor thing, all of us! Dear friends, how do we begin?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je ne sais pas quels sont vos projets, mais je ne peux pas participer pour le moment.<page>Ah ! Ah ! Pauvre chose, pauvre chose, nous tous ! Chers amis, comment commencer ?

original_en_text: Gathered here we are, to honour the grand champion of this very final of all festivals!<page>Now, Miss Hornet! Strike the great effigy with all your might!
original_zh_text: 我们相聚于此，为这末日庆典的总冠军加冕！<page>大黄蜂小姐，现在请全力击打巨像！
translated_text: We pay tribute to the last champion of all the festivals!<page>Come on, Miss Bumblebee! Do all you can to launch a big statue!
secondary_translated_text: Nous rendons hommage au dernier champion de tous les festivals !<page>Allez, Miss Bumblebee ! Faites tout ce que vous pouvez pour lancer une grande statue !

original_en_text: The little fleas like this place most of all. They are as much happy as I ever hear them!
original_zh_text: 小家伙们非常喜欢这地方！我从没听他们这么欢腾过！
translated_text: The little fleas like this place the best. I've never heard of you being so happy.
secondary_translated_text: Les petites puces comme cet endroit sont les meilleurs. Je n'ai jamais entendu dire que vous étiez si heureux.

original_en_text: Oh, dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at our marvellous troupe! Their numbers full. Their spirits bright. All thanks to your heroic efforts!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐快看，我们壮盛的队伍！跳蚤们无一遗漏，个个精神饱满，全仰赖您的英勇相助！
translated_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at our wonderful troupe! That number is already full. Their souls are bright. Thanks to all of you for your brave efforts!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ma chère amie, Miss Hornet, regardez notre merveilleuse troupe ! Ce nombre est déjà complet. Leurs âmes sont brilliantes. Merci à vous tous pour vos efforts courageux !

translated_text: the flea jump?
secondary_translated_text: Le Flea Jump ?

original_en_text: Another journey complete! And a new, high spot for our rest, upon the doorstep of that mighty Citadel, no less!<hpage>It is fortunate that all of your companions survived the trek, Fleamaster. The howling rise beside, and the tangled wood before it, have both claimed the lives of countless bugs.<page>Indeed! A perilous ascent! Maybe it was your company that brought us luck, Miss Hornet? It surely put us fleas at ease to have you and your weapon riding close.
original_zh_text: 又一趟旅程结束了！这次竟然停在了圣堡门廊这样的高处！<hpage>你们能平安抵达这里实属万幸。旁边的峭壁和前边的丛林都葬送过无数旅行者。<page>确实凶险！或许是您带来的好运？有您持械护卫，大伙安心不少。
translated_text: The journey is over again! This is the new highland where we rest, the entrance to its mighty castle!<hpage>Fortunately, all your companions survived the long journey, Flymaster. The barking of the neighbor and the tangled trees in front of him took the lives of countless insects.<page>It really is! Danger is rising! your company may have brought you some luck, miss hornet? Being near you and your weapons certainly reassures us. "
secondary_translated_text: Le voyage est de nouveau ! C'est le nouveau plateau où nous nous reposons, l'entrée de son puissant château !<hpage>Heureusement, tous vos compagnons ont survécu à ce long voyage, Flymaster. Les aboiements du voisin et les arbres enchevêtrés devant lui ont coûté la vie à d'innombrables insectes.<page>C'est vraiment ! Les dangers augmentent ! Votre compagnie vous a peut - être apporté un peu de chance, miss Hornet ?Être près de vous et de vos armes nous rassure certainement. "

original_en_text: Oh, and look, Miss Hornet, look at how many lost fleas have come! It seems even the last few stragglers are now with us.
original_zh_text: 噢对了，大黄蜂小姐快看！如此多的跳蚤同胞，连最后几个掉队的都回来了！
translated_text: Look, Miss Bumblebee, and see how many fleas there are! " The last few seem to be with us now.
secondary_translated_text: Regardez, Miss Bumblebee, et voyez combien de puces il y a !« Les derniers semblent être avec nous maintenant.

original_en_text: Ah! Aha! A native of these fiery lowlands approaches! Have no fear, my friend, we fleas are but humble travellers!<hpage>Well met, sir, though like you I am not of these lands. I am merely journeying through.<page>Oh. Oho! A kindred spirit! It’s good luck for wanderers to meet on an unfamiliar path.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！是这片灼热低地的原住民！别怕朋友，我们跳蚤都是卑微的旅者！<hpage>幸会，不过我和你一样只是途经此地。<page>噢！原来也是流浪旅者！听说路遇同道是好兆头呢！
translated_text: ah! ah! Oh, oh, oh! The locals from this hot lowland are approaching! Fear not, my friend, we fleas are but humble travelers.<hpage>I come from this country, just like you, but I am very happy. I was just travelling.<page>oh! oh! People with the same mindset! For a vagabond, it is a good fortune to meet him on an unfamiliar road.
secondary_translated_text: Ah ! Ah ! Oh, oh, oh ! Les habitants de cette chaude plaine s'approchent ! Ne craignez pas, mon ami, nous, les puces, ne sommes que des humbles voyageurs.<hpage>Je viens de ce pays, comme vous, mais je suis très heureux. Je ne voyais que.<page>Ooh ! Ooh ! Des gens avec la même mentalité ! Pour un vagabond, c'est une bonne chance de le rencontrer sur une route inconnue.

original_en_text: Dodeshna, dear one, dodeshna! Heh heh! Have you returned to use Kratt’s luxurious spa-carriage? I’ve kept it roastily warm for you...
original_zh_text: 多德什纳亲爱的！要来泡克拉特的豪华车厢温泉吗？泉水一直为你温着呢！
translated_text: Dodechner, darling, Dodechner! what?! i'm already burning hot for you. i'm already burning hot for you.
secondary_translated_text: Dodechner, chérie, Dodechner ! Quoi ? ! Je brûle chaud pour toi. Je brûle chaud pour toi.

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is now ended, and the Flea Juggle champion has set an even higher score! Tremble in awe, dear fleas, at the might of our dear Miss Hornet!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，耍耍记录刷新！颤抖吧跳蚤们，见证大黄蜂小姐的实力！
translated_text: vicarner! The contest is over, and the champion of the freeboard has created a higher score! My dear Flea, trembling in awe, our dear Miss Bumble Power!
secondary_translated_text: Vicarner ! Le concours est terminé, et le champion du freeboard a créé un score plus élevé ! Ma chère Puce, tremblante de crainte, notre chère Miss Bumble Power !

original_en_text: There are many lost and lonely fleas still scattered across this kingdom. If only some more of them joined us, the caravan could continue its journey.<page>You’ll find the little dears in all sorts of strange places, for they love to peek and pry and play, but if you rouse them they are sure to find their way here!
original_zh_text: 还有太多同胞流落四方。如果能多召集些，旅团就能继续前行。<page>那些小家伙总爱躲在古怪角落玩耍，但被发现就会自己寻路回来！
translated_text: The kingdom is still dotted with many lost lonely flea. If more people participate, the team moves forward.<page>They love to peek, peek and play, so they will find these little babies in various strange places, but once you wake them up, they will find their way here!
secondary_translated_text: Le royaume est toujours parsemé de nombreuses puces solitaires perdues. Si plus de personnes participent, l'équipe va de l'avant.<page>Ils aiment regarder, regarder et jouer, ils trouveront donc ces petits bébés dans divers endroits étranges, mais une fois que vous les réveillerez, ils trouveront leur chemin ici !

original_en_text: Those great rumbles from beneath, they have sound similar to giant beast. Such beast is much sorrowful though, I am think.<page>Fleas and monsters alike have their troubles...
original_zh_text: 下面传来的轰隆声，像巨兽哀嚎。或许长得越大，悲伤也就越大吧。<page>跳蚤和怪物各有各的苦……
translated_text: A huge roar, like a huge beast, could be heard from below. But I think such beasts are sad.<page>Fleas and monsters have a problem.
secondary_translated_text: Un énorme rugissement, comme une énorme bête, pouvait être entendu du bas. Mais je pense que ces bêtes sont tristes.<page>Les puces et les monstres ont des problèmes.

original_en_text: <hpage>The Fleamaster and his caravan sought for caves offering space and safety. This calm lake and shore may prove suitable.
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤旅团在寻找宽敞又安全的驻地，这片湖岸看着很合适。
translated_text: <hpage>Flexmaster and his caravan search for caves that offer space and safety. This serene lake and coast are suitable.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Flexmaster et sa caravane cherchent des grottes offrant de l'espace et de la sécurité. Ce lac serein et la côte sont convenables.

original_en_text: Oh, Miss Hornet! Wonder at how large our caravan has grown! So bold and boisterous! This gilded chamber can barely contain us all!<page>The many fleas are itching to journey once more, to find a space to stretch their wings. But from here, as their leader, I am hesitant to order us so swiftly away.<page>These heights hold too much danger to set forth without a safe goal held clear in mind.<page>What of you, Miss Hornet? Your tasks carry you throughout this kingdom. Have you ever encountered a place appropriate?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！看旅团现在多热闹！这金色大厅都快装不下了！<page>大伙急着再次启程找个宽敞的地方，但身为领袖，我不敢贸然行动。<page>高地危机四伏，没有明确目标不能冒险。<page>您有什么看法？您走遍了纺络，可曾遇见过合适的去处？
translated_text: Oh, Miss Hornet! I want to know how far the team has grown! Bold and Active! This golden room can't hold all of us!<page>Many fleas move again and look for space to spread their wings. But from here, as their leader, I hesitated, and ordered them to leave immediately.<page>Without a clear safety goal, these altitudes are too dangerous.<page>You are Miss Hornet and your mission is to travel the kingdom. Have you found the right place?
secondary_translated_text: Désolé Mademoiselle Hornet ! J'aimerais savoir jusqu'à quel point l'équipe a grandi ! Audacieux et actif ! Cette salle d'or ne peut pas nous accueillir tous !<page>Beaucoup de puces se déplacent à nouveau et cherchent de l'espace pour étendre leurs ailes. Mais de là, en tant que chef, j'hésitais et leur ordonnais de partir immédiatement.<page>Sans un objectif de sécurité clair, ces altitudes sont trop dangereuses.<page>Vous êtes Miss Hornet et votre mission est de parcourir le royaume. As-tu trouvé le bon endroit ?

original_en_text: We will camp here a time before moving onward. These moments of safety and calm must be treasured, rare as they are.
original_zh_text: 我们会在这里暂驻。安宁时光难得，要好好珍惜。
translated_text: We'll camp here for a while, then move on. These moments of safety and tranquility are rare, but we must cherish them.
secondary_translated_text: Nous campons ici pendant un moment, puis nous avancerons. Ces moments de sécurité et de tranquillité sont rares, mais nous devons les chérir.

original_en_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at how many of the lost fleas have come! It seems even the last few stragglers are now with us.
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐快看！如此多的跳蚤同胞，连最后几个掉队的都回来了！
translated_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at the number of fleas lost! The last few seem to be with us now.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ma chère amie, Miss Hornet, regardez le nombre de puces perdues ! Les derniers semblent être avec nous maintenant.

original_en_text: And now that we have met, know that I am Fleamaster Mooshka, leader of this caravan!<page>Our own journey has barely begun, but you are most welcome to tarry here a while, stranger. Where ways are dark and winding, good bugs must stay close together!
original_zh_text: 既然相遇，容我介绍——我是跳蚤首领穆什卡，旅团领袖！<page>我们刚启程不久，但欢迎您在此歇息。现在外面混乱得很，好虫子们应抱团取暖！
translated_text: Now we know that we are Fleamaster Mooshka, the captain of this team!<page>Our own journey is only just beginning, but please stay here for a while. In a dark, winding place, good insects need to embrace each other!
secondary_translated_text: Nous savons maintenant que nous sommes Fleamaster Mooshka, le capitaine de cette équipe !<page>Notre voyage ne fait que commencer, mais s'il vous plaît restez ici un moment. Dans un endroit sombre et sinueux, les bons insectes ont besoin de s'embrasser !

original_en_text: The bellowing sandy land was full of much danger. We was almost lost poor Varga to hungry worms as we travel up!<page>Sadly, he is finding way here after all. Har! Is only jest. Grishkin and Varga is great friends, just like all fleas is being.
original_zh_text: 这片沙地凶险得很！来的路上瓦尔加差点就进了蠕虫的肚子！<page>可惜最后他找到路回来了！哈哈开玩笑，格里什琴和瓦尔加关系好着呢！
translated_text: The sands are full of danger. As we went up, poor Varga almost became obsessed with the hungry worms.<page>Unfortunately, he finally found a way out. yeah! Just kidding. Griskin and Varga were as good friends as any other fleas.
secondary_translated_text: Les sables sont pleins de dangers. Comme nous montâmes, le pauvre Varga devint presque obsédé par les vers affamés.<page>Malheureusement, il a finalement trouvé un moyen de sortir. Ouais ! Juste plaisanter. Griskin et Varga étaient aussi bons amis que n'importe quelle autre puce.

translated_text: to replenish the beer?
secondary_translated_text: Pour refaire la bière ?

original_en_text: You have brought them all, bug not flea. My work is done! No more searching needed. Ours is a caravan full!<page>Now my duty must change. To watch. To protect. This new task I am looking much to liking.
original_zh_text: 你把他们全找齐了，外族虫。我也不用再四处搜寻了！旅团满员！<page>现在改当护卫，这新差事合我胃口。
translated_text: I brought them all. Insects are not fleas. The job is over! No more searching is needed. Our car is full!<page>My responsibility will change. Attention to protection. I seem to be enjoying this new mission.
secondary_translated_text: Je les ai tous apportés. Les insectes ne sont pas des puces. Le travail est terminé ! Plus de recherche n'est pas nécessaire. Ma voiture est pleine !<page>Ma responsabilité changera. Attention à la protection. J'ai l'impression d'apprécier cette nouvelle mission.

original_en_text: Is warm here, you agree? Is very... what is say, cosy?<page>The Fleamaster though, is always want to move on. We will be drag away somewhere much worse soon, I think.
original_zh_text: 这儿暖和，对吧？很……温馨？<page>但首领总想挪窝，我猜迟早会搬去更糟的地方。
translated_text: It's hot, right? Very... very... what do you think, conber?<page>But the Flakmaster always wanted to move forward. I think we'll be in a worse situation soon.
secondary_translated_text: C'est chaud, non ? Très... très... Qu 'en pensez-vous, Conner ?<page>Mais le Flakmaster a toujours voulu aller de l'avant. Je pense que nous serons bientôt dans une situation pire.

original_en_text: Oh... what a shame. Heh heh! I think you’d find the waters inside delectably soothing, if you’d only reconsider!
original_zh_text: 噢……真遗憾。这泉水能舒服到骨头里哦！要不再考虑考虑？
translated_text: ah... What a pity! what?! If you think about it again, you can see that the water in it is very comfortable!
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. Quel dommage ! Quoi ? ! Si vous y réfléchissez à nouveau, vous pouvez voir que l'eau est très confortable !

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I bring a delivery, supplies from the couriers of Bellhart to aid your settlement.<page>Such dedication you continue to show us, Miss Hornet!<page>While we may seem safe out here at range from danger, we cannot go far to forage, and the many fleas need much nurture!<page>Food and provisions, such as you bring, are crucial in these desperate times.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我从钟心镇带了补给来。<page>大黄蜂小姐，您总是这么关照我们！<page>这里看似安全，但难以远行觅食，这么多张嘴要喂呢！<page>你带来的食物和物资真是雪中送炭！
translated_text: <hpage>Flymaster, I have brought you a bundle of supplies from the messenger of Belheart to help you settle down.<page>You're committed to us, Miss Hornet! "<page>We seem to be out of danger, but we can't go far. " Many fleas need more nutrition!<page>In this desperate time, food and supplies (such as what you bring) are essential.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Flymaster, je vous ai apporté un paquet de fournitures du messager de Belheart pour vous aider à vous installer.<page>Vous êtes engagée pour nous, Miss Hornet ! "<page>Nous semblons être hors de danger, mais nous ne pouvons pas aller très loin.« Beaucoup de puces ont besoin de plus de nutrition !<page>Dans cette période désespérée, la nourriture et les fournitures (comme ce que vous apportez) sont essentielles.

original_en_text: This trial is Flea Dodge. Stay upon platforms, avoid attacks. Longer stay gives bigger score.
original_zh_text: 这试炼是跳蚤溜溜。站住平台，躲开攻击。坚持越久分越高。
translated_text: This test is to avoid fleas. Remain on the platform to avoid attack. The longer you stay, the higher your score.
secondary_translated_text: Ce test est pour éviter les puces. Restez sur la plate-forme pour éviter les attaques. Plus vous restez longtemps, plus votre score est élevé.

original_en_text: Dodeshna, dodeshna! I am saying, welcome to our caravan, stranger!<page>You are a very funny, very strange flea, isn’t it? No fur at all, and your wings fall off!<page>Har, har har har! Is just jest, of course. Us fleas famous for giving jokes!
original_zh_text: 多德什纳，多德什纳！我的意思是，欢迎来到旅团！<page>你真是个滑稽的跳蚤，没长毛还掉翅膀！哈哈！<page>开个玩笑啦！我们跳蚤最爱逗乐子！
translated_text: Doshner, Doshner! Welcome to our caravan, strangers!<page>You're a very funny, very strange flea, aren't you? Without fur, the wings will fall off!<page>ha ha ha! Of course, it's a joke. We are famous for our jokes!
secondary_translated_text: Désolé, Désolé ! Bienvenue dans notre caravane, étrangers !<page>Vous êtes une puce très drôle, très étrange, n'est-ce pas ? Sans la fourrure, les ailes tomberont !<page>Ha ha ha ! Bien sûr, c'est une blague. Nous sommes célèbres pour nos blagues.

original_en_text: Some beasts here, I see them eat through the bony ground. Is very smart! Bone is everywhere much abundant! If only I had such stomach, har har!
original_zh_text: 这有些野兽会啃地上的骨头，真聪明！这到处都是骨头，我要有这胃口多好！哈哈！
translated_text: There's a beast here, biting the bones, very clever! Bones are everywhere! I wish I had a stomach like this!
secondary_translated_text: Il y a une bête ici, mordant les os, très intelligente ! Les os sont partout ! J'aurais aimé avoir un estomac comme ça !

original_en_text: Drink to full, Miss Hornet! Why waste? Be merry with us fleas before it all ends!
original_zh_text: 喝个痛快，大黄蜂小姐！浪费？都要完蛋了，只管开心就好了！
translated_text: Miss Hornet, drink it all! Why waste it? " Be happy with our fleas until this is over!
secondary_translated_text: Mademoiselle Hornet, buvez-le ! Pourquoi le gaspiller ? Soyez heureux avec nos puces jusqu'à ce que tout cela soit fini !

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended, and you have bested your old score. Rishkiz, champion!
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。你超越了自己，里什基兹，祝贺你，冠军！
translated_text: Vickner. The trial is over, and you broke the original score. Adventurer, Champion!
secondary_translated_text: Vickner. Le procès est terminé, et vous avez cassé le score original. Aventurière, champion !

original_en_text: Normally I would never burden a visitor with the caravan’s worries. But! Isn’t it the custom of this kingdom to share your deepest wishes with strangers?<page>Well, my wish is for the poor lost fleas of these lands to find their way to our caravan! Stranger, could you not help us?
original_zh_text: 本不该让客人操心旅团的琐事，但据说倾诉愿望是纺络的风俗？<page>我的愿望就是迷途跳蚤能回归旅团！能请您帮助我吗？
translated_text: Usually I don't make tourists worry about caravan troubles. But! Is it not the custom of this kingdom to share the desires of the deepest heart with strangers?<page>Well, my wish is that the poor stray fleas of this land will find our caravan! Stranger, can you help me?
secondary_translated_text: Habituellement, je ne fais pas craindre les touristes des problèmes de caravane. Mais ! N'est-ce pas la coutume de ce royaume de partager les désirs du cœur le plus profond avec des étrangers ?<page>Eh bien, je souhaite que les pauvres puces errantes de cette terre trouvent notre caravane !Étranger, peux-tu m'aider ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, if your troupe is still prepared to travel, I have discovered a cave beyond the Citadel, at the edge of some ancient aqueducts. That place may well suit your needs for safety.<hpage>The trek would be long, but once reached, you will find a sandy shore, free of predators, beside a wide clear lake. It is as peaceful a place as I’ve seen throughout these fraught lands.<page>That’s it! It must be! Our destination has at last been set. Our journey can continue!<page>True friend of fleas you are, Miss Hornet. That place shall welcome us, no doubt. Will you be joining for this new journey?
original_zh_text: <hpage>要是旅团已经准备妥当，我发现圣堡外的古渠尽头有处洞穴或许适合你们。<hpage>路途虽远，但抵达后有沙滩湖泊，没有掠食者。是我在这里见过最安宁的地方。<page>就是那里了！终于找到目标了，旅团可以启程了！<page>真不愧是跳蚤挚友！那地方肯定很适合我们。愿意与我们一起同行吗？
translated_text: <hpage>Forrest, if your troupe is still planning a trip, I have found a cave outside the castle, at the end of an old canal. This place is perfect for your security needs.<hpage>The hike can take a long time, but once you arrive, there are sandy beaches beside a wide, clear lake that are free of predators. This is the most peaceful place I have ever seen in this terrible land.<page>that's right! That's right! At last, the destination was decided. The journey can go on!<page>Miss Bumblebee, you are a good friend of the fleas. We will undoubtedly be welcome in that place. Will you join this new journey?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Forrest, si votre troupe prévoit encore un voyage, j'ai trouvé une grotte à l'extérieur du château, au bout d'un vieux canal. Cet endroit est parfait pour vos besoins en matière de sécurité<hpage>La randonnée peut prendre beaucoup de temps, mais une fois que vous arrivez, il y a des plages de sable à côté d'un grand lac clair qui sont libres de prédateurs. C'est l'endroit le plus paisible que j'ai jamais vu dans ce terrible pays.<page>C'est juste ! C'est vrai ! Finalement, la destination était décidée. Le voyage peut aller de l'avant !<page>Miss Bumblebee, vous êtes une bonne amie des puces. Nous serons sans aucun doute les bienvenus à cet endroit. Voulez-vous participer à ce nouveau voyage ?

original_en_text: My treasured guest... what need have I of rosaries, now that all is ending? Please, use my spa-carriage, free of charge! Dear Kratt is only too happy to provide!
original_zh_text: 尊贵的客人……如今万物都将终结，我还要念珠何用？请随意使用温泉车厢吧，分文不取！亲爱的克拉特乐意为您效劳！
translated_text: Dear guest, now that it's over, what do I need? Please use the spa car for free! Dear Kratt is happy to serve!
secondary_translated_text: Cher invité, maintenant que c'est fini, qu 'est-ce que j'ai besoin ? Veuillez utiliser la voiture spa gratuitement ! Cher Kratt est heureux de servir !

original_en_text: So many lost fleas have made it here... Truly, I’d never dared to hope we could gather such a grand company!<page>But still there may be more out there in this wide world... What a wonder it would be if they too found their way to our fresh paradise!
original_zh_text: 这么多迷途同胞都回来了……真是做梦都不敢想！<page>但或许还有其他流落者……要是他们也能找到这新乐园该多好！
translated_text: Many lost fleas come here. I didn't expect such a big team to come together!<page>But there may be more to this wide world. How wonderful it would be if they found their way to our new paradise!
secondary_translated_text: Beaucoup de puces perdues viennent ici. Je ne m'attendais pas à ce qu ' une si grande équipe se réunisse !<page>Mais il peut y en avoir plus dans ce grand monde. Comme ce serait merveilleux s'ils trouvaient leur chemin vers notre nouveau paradis !

original_en_text: Auugghhh... the pain! Such fury, over a mistake! Poor little Kratt did not mean to steal a look!<page>This old carriage needs constant care. I was only doing repairs! I had no intent to intrude! And I barely saw a thing!<hpage>Lie no more to me, flea, and be grateful you still live. Know that if you peer again, you will die.<page>Of course! Kratt would never! Let’s consider the matter forgotten, and you shall forever be my treasured guest!
original_zh_text: 啊嗷！好痛！发这么大火干嘛！克拉特不是故意偷看的！<page>车厢需要养护，我只是在修补！这是无心之过，而且我基本什么也没看见！<hpage>不必编故事了，这次没死算你走运。下次再偷看，你必死无疑。<page>不敢不敢！这事就这么翻篇吧！您永远是贵宾！
translated_text: ah... it hurts! Angry at the wrong! Poor Crat wasn't going to peek!<page>This old car needs constant maintenance. They're just repairing it! I didn't mean to disturb you! I could barely see anything!<hpage>Don't lie, flea, thank you for keeping me alive. If I stare at you any longer, I'll die.<page>of course! Never clutter! You are always my guest!
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui.Ça fait mal ! colère contre le mal ! Pauvre Crat n'allait pas craquer !<page>Cette voiture nécessite un entretien constant. Ils ne font que le réparer ! Je ne voulais pas vous déranger ! Je voyais à peine quoi que ce soit !<hpage>Ne mens pas, puce, merci de m'avoir gardé en vie. Si je te regarde encore, je mourrai.<page>Bien sûr ! Jamais clutter ! Tu es toujours mon invité !

original_en_text: Dodeshna! Miss Hornet, is it? Welcome to our new camp! The travelling is done, and so we drink! <page>Is no better way to revive spirit than to drink the famous Flea Brew! I’m have just finished a batch, bubbling and warm!<page>You are friend, finder of lost, little fleas, hmm? Here, take bottle of Flea Brew with you! Will keep you warm while you travel.<page>I am always brewing here, so have no fear to drink plenty, and return whenever you are wanting more!
original_zh_text: 多德什纳！是大黄蜂小姐吗？欢迎来新营地！旅途结束，该喝点啦！<page>来点提神的跳蚤秘酿！我刚熬好一锅，热乎着呢！<page>是你帮忙找回流落在外的同胞对吧？那这瓶药酿送你！路上暖暖身子。<page>我整天都在熬制药酿，喝完了随时来取！
translated_text: Dodezner! You are Miss Hornet. Welcome to our new camp! The journey is over, let's drink!<page>There's no way to rejuvenate yourself than to drink the famous Nami beer! I just finished the batch, spicy and smelling!<page>You are a friend and a discoverer of the lost fleas. Please bring your beer! It can keep you warm while you travel.<page>I always brew here, so drink plenty and come when you want to come more!
secondary_translated_text: Dodezner ! Vous êtes Miss Hornet. Bienvenue à notre nouveau camp ! Le voyage est terminé, allons boire !<page>Il n'y a pas de moyen de se rajeunir que de boire la célèbre bière Nami ! Je viens de terminer le lot, épicé et parfumé !<page>Vous êtes un ami et un découvreur de puces perdues. Apportez votre bière, s'il vous plaît ! Il peut vous garder au chaud lorsque vous voyagez.<page>Je fais toujours de la brassure ici, alors buvez beaucoup et venez quand vous voulez venir plus !

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? If service is you here seeking, none is left for me to provide. All fleas are here, collected close.<page>Much better it is now for fleas to be together, ready to face whatever end will come.
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？如果是要找我帮忙，那我帮不了什么了，跳蚤们都回来了。<page>现在大家都聚在一起，只剩等待最后的终局了。
translated_text: If you stay, aren't the bugs fleas? If you have come to the service, there is nothing I can do. All the fleas are here, and are well collected.<page>Things have been a lot better now that the fleas have gathered and are ready to produce results.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous restez, les insectes ne sont-ils pas des puces ? Si vous êtes venu au service, il n'y a rien que je puisse faire. Toutes les puces sont ici, et sont bien collectées.<page>Les choses ont été beaucoup mieux maintenant que les puces se sont rassemblées et sont prêtes à produire des résultats.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Of your many companions, I had little worry you would survive to find this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Mine is to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together and grow them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the locations of other lost fleas, would you share them with me? I may be able to send them safe to the caravan.<page>The locations! For price they could be shared, but you hold no map to mark! If learnings are wanted, a map must be owned. Until then, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。就知道你能活着找到这里。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<hpage>若是探知迷途跳蚤下落，就告诉我，或许能送他们归队。<page>位置，拿念珠换！但你连地图都没有！想要交易，先弄张地图来！
translated_text: <hpage>Again, toast to the big fleas. Among your many companions, I do not worry that you will survive to find this caravan.<hpage>Tell me what tasks are needed to distance yourself from your comrades in such a terrifying way.<page>Mine is tracked by traces, smells, and keen senses. Find our flea friend, the youngest flea, and gather them together to make them stronger.<hpage>If you know where the flea is, would you share it with me? Maybe we can take them to the caravan safely.<page>The place! As for the price, they can share, but there is no map mark! If you want to learn, you need a map. Until then we can do nothing.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Encore une fois, un toast aux puces. Parmi tes nombreux compagnons, je ne crains pas que tu survivras pour trouver cette caravane.<hpage>Dites-moi quelles tâches sont nécessaires pour vous éloigner de vos camarades d'une manière si terrifiante.<page>Le mien est suivi par des traces, des odeurs et des sens aiguisés. Trouvez notre ami puce, la plus jeune puce, et rassemblez-les pour les rendre plus forts.<hpage>Si vous savez où se trouve la puce, partageriez-vous avec moi ? Peut - être que nous pouvons les emmener en toute sécurité à la caravane.<page>Le lieu ! Quant au prix, ils peuvent le partager, mais il n'y a pas de marque de carte ! Si vous voulez apprendre, vous avez besoin d'une carte. Jusqu'à présent, nous ne pouvons rien faire.

original_en_text: Bug. World is ending. Nothing left but to test ourselves.<page>This trial is Flea Dodge. Stay upon the platforms. Avoid attacks. Longer stay gives bigger score.<page>To score most is to become champion. This is only thing left to strive for.
original_zh_text: 虫子，世界就要毁灭，除了试炼也没别的事可做。<page>这试炼是跳蚤溜溜。站住平台，躲开攻击。坚持越久分越高。<page>分最高的就是冠军，而夺冠是最后的意义。
translated_text: The world is being destroyed. You have no choice but to test yourself.<page>This test is to avoid fleas. Remain on the platform. Avoid an attack. The longer you stay, the higher your score.<page>The most important thing is to be a champion. That's the only thing we should fight for.
secondary_translated_text: Le monde est détruit. Vous n'avez pas d'autre choix que de vous tester.<page>Ce test est pour éviter les puces. Restez sur la plate-forme.Évitez une attaque. Plus vous restez longtemps, plus votre score est élevé.<page>Le plus important, c'est d'être champion. C'est la seule chose pour laquelle nous devrions nous battre.

original_en_text: Bug, you are champion of Flea Dodge, but trial is still open to you. Can you defeat your own score?
original_zh_text: 虫子，跳蚤溜溜的冠军归你了。但挑战还将继续，你能突破自己的成绩吗？
translated_text: Bug, you are the champion of the Nomi Dodgers, but the trial is still open to you. Can you beat your own score?
secondary_translated_text: Bug, vous êtes le champion des Dodgers de Nomi, mais le procès est toujours ouvert à vous. Pouvez-vous battre votre propre score ?

original_en_text: So bug not flea, you return. World is ruined. Final end comes soon, says Fleamaster.<hpage>This land is gravely wounded, but death need not follow. It is now my task to free this kingdom from its dark fall.<page>Grrr... such words are just fancy. Nothing left now, except to protect what little we have.
original_zh_text: 外族虫，你回来了。首领说，世界要完蛋了。<hpage>纺络遭受重创，但未必没有转机。我会帮王国摆脱黑暗。<page>吼……漂亮话谁都会说，现在我们也只能死守这点家当了。
translated_text: The worms have returned, not fleas, and the world will be destroyed. Flemmer said the final result would come out soon.<hpage>The land was badly wounded, but death did not necessarily follow. Now my mission is to free this kingdom from the decline of darkness.<page>um... This is too flashy. " We have nothing but to protect the little things we have.
secondary_translated_text: Les vers sont de retour, pas les puces, et le monde sera détruit. Flemmer a déclaré que le résultat final serait bientôt publié.<hpage>La terre était gravement blessée, mais la mort n'a pas nécessairement suivi. Maintenant, ma mission est de libérer ce royaume du déclin des ténèbres.<page>Umm... C'est trop flashy.« Nous n'avons rien d'autre que de protéger les petites choses que nous avons.

original_en_text: Come, you revellers! Try the Flea Juggle game! Keep striking fleas upwards. Keep them airborne for as long as possible!
original_zh_text: 来啊狂欢者！玩跳蚤耍耍！把跳蚤打飞，滞空越久越好！
translated_text: Come on, your fans! Try a flea juggling game! Continue the fight against fleas. Stay in the air for as long as possible!
secondary_translated_text: Venez, vos fans ! Essayez un jeu de jonglerie de puces ! Continuez la lutte contre les puces. Restez dans l'air le plus longtemps possible !

original_en_text: <hpage>I have seen a place, Fleamaster, a cave beyond the Citadel, at the edge of some ancient ducts. That place may well suit your needs for safety.<hpage>The trek would be long, but once reached, you will find a sandy shore, free of predators, beside a wide clear lake. It is as peaceful a place as I’ve seen throughout these fraught lands.<page>That’s it! It must be! Our destination has been set. Our journey can continue!<page>True friend of fleas you are, Miss Hornet. That place shall welcome us, no doubt. Will you be joining the caravan on this journey?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我见过一处地方，在圣堡外的古渠尽头，或许符合你们的需求。<hpage>路途虽远，但抵达后有沙滩湖泊，没有掠食者。是我在这里见过最安宁的地方。<page>就是那里了！目标已定，旅团可以启程了！<page>真不愧是跳蚤挚友！那地方肯定很适合我们。愿意与我们一起同行吗？
translated_text: <hpage>I saw a place called Fleamaster, a cave behind the castle, at the end of an old pipe. This place is perfect for your security needs.<hpage>The hike can take a long time, but once you arrive, there are sandy beaches beside a wide, clear lake that are free of predators. This is the most peaceful place I have ever seen in this terrible land.<page>that's right! That's right! The destination has already been decided. The journey can go on!<page>Miss Bumblebee, you are a good friend of the fleas. We will undoubtedly be welcome in that place. Would you like to join this journey?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'ai vu un endroit appelé Fleamaster, une grotte derrière le château, au bout d'un vieux tuyau. Cet endroit est parfait pour vos besoins en matière de sécurité<hpage>La randonnée peut prendre beaucoup de temps, mais une fois que vous arrivez, il y a des plages de sable à côté d'un grand lac clair qui sont libres de prédateurs. C'est l'endroit le plus paisible que j'ai jamais vu dans ce terrible pays.<page>C'est juste ! C'est vrai ! La destination est déjà décidée. Le voyage peut aller de l'avant !<page>Miss Bumblebee, vous êtes une bonne amie des puces. Nous serons sans aucun doute les bienvenus à cet endroit. Vous souhaitez vous joindre à ce voyage ?

original_en_text: All are here now, bug not flea. For your seeking, ours is a caravan full.<page>Much better it is now for fleas to be together, ready to face whatever end will come.
original_zh_text: 跳蚤全齐了，外族虫。托你的福，旅团满员了。<page>世界就要完蛋了，抱团总比落单好。
translated_text: Everything is here The bugs are not fleas For your search, our fleet is full.<page>Things have been a lot better now that the fleas have gathered and are ready to produce results.
secondary_translated_text: Tout est ici Les bugs ne sont pas des puces Pour votre recherche, notre flotte est pleine.<page>Les choses ont été beaucoup mieux maintenant que les puces se sont rassemblées et sont prêtes à produire des résultats.

original_en_text: Ooh, heh heh heh! What a turn, for dear Kratt to be strung up in such a dank little cave!<hpage>Cursed threads stretch throughout this land, set to ensnare the unwary. You seem no worse for it now, at least.<hpage>That metal carriage... It is yours, I assume?<page>Ooh, yes, yes! I’m setting out to join the nearest flea caravan, aren’t I? Safety in numbers, yes? I’ve had more than enough of venturing alone.<page>And you... I trust I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly share with you when next we meet! Heh heh!
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿！没想到克拉特会在这阴暗的洞窟里翻船！<hpage>丝咒遍地，一不留神被缠住。你看起来倒是不担心？<hpage>那金属车厢……是你的吧？<page>对对！我正要投奔跳蚤旅团呢！独行太危险了！<page>你……也会去旅团吧？那我们旅团再见，车厢里有惊喜等着你哟！
translated_text: Oh, hey! Dear Cratter, it's great to play in such a damp little cave!<hpage>A curse thread spreads across the earth and is destined to lock up the careless. At least now it doesn't look bad.<hpage>That metal carriage, I think it's yours.<page>Oh, yeah, yeah! i'm going to join the fleet of fleas recently, right? security, right? I was tired of taking risks alone.<page>And then you... do you think we can meet there? There is a special secret hidden in my carriage. I'd like to share it with you the next time we see you. what?!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, hé ! Cher Cratère, c'est génial de jouer dans une grotte aussi humide !<hpage>Un fil de malédiction se répand à travers la terre et est destiné à enfermer les négligents. Du moins pour l'instant, ça n'a pas l'air mal.<hpage>Cette voiture métallique, je pense que c'est la vôtre.<page>Oh, oui, oui ! Je vais rejoindre la flotte de puces récemment, non ? sécurité, non ? J'en avais marre de prendre des risques seul.<page>Et puis vous... Pensez-vous que nous pourrons nous rencontrer là - bas ? Il y a un secret spécial caché dans ma voiture. Je voudrais le partager avec vous la prochaine fois que nous vous verrons. Quoi ? !

original_en_text: And now, with our caravan bursting, we’ve rested here long enough. We fleas must head higher!<page>Oh, but stranger, how remiss of me! First, please, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan prepares to depart toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 如今旅团拥挤不堪，我们也休整已久。跳蚤们必须向更高处进发！<page>哎呀，我真是失礼！还没请教您的姓名？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴见你和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<page>哈哈！能与同胞团聚，还结交了新朋友，真是太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: The fleet was now full, so he could rest well here. The fleas have to go higher! '<page>But I wonder how lazy I am! First of all, how do you call?<hpage>Call me Bumblebee, Master Frey. I'm glad to see your fellow fleas are safe in your fleet. Traveling alone is a dangerous land.<page>Wavenda! In other words, I cannot believe it! How beautiful it is! We are all together. "<page>My dear friends, Miss Bumblebee Our convoy will depart for a vast swamp at high elevation. Would you like to travel with us as a guest?
secondary_translated_text: La flotte était maintenant pleine, il pouvait donc bien se reposer ici. Les puces doivent aller plus haut ! '<page>Je me demande à quel point je suis paresseux ! Tout d'abord, comment vous appelez ?<hpage>Appelle-moi Bumblebee, Maître Frey. Je suis heureux de voir que vos amis puces sont en sécurité dans votre flotte. Voyager seul est un pays dangereux.<page>Wavenda ! En d'autres termes, je ne peux pas y croire ! Comme c'est beau ! Nous sommes tous ensemble. "<page>Mes chers amis, Miss Bumblebee, notre convoi partira pour un vaste marais à haute altitude. Vous souhaitez voyager avec nous en tant qu 'invité ?

original_en_text: I have marked your map, bug. See the learnings of fleas lost across the lands.<page>If you are as brave as told by fellow fleas, seek them. Save them. For a caravan whole.
original_zh_text: 外族虫，地图标好了。上面有流落同胞的位置。<page>如果你真如传言般勇敢，就去救他们吧。凑满我们的旅团。
translated_text: I've marked your map, bug. I know about fleas that have disappeared everywhere.<page>If you are as brave as your fellow fleas say, find them. Save them. " In the whole team.
secondary_translated_text: J'ai marqué ta carte, bug. Je connais des puces qui ont disparu partout.<page>Si vous êtes aussi courageux que vos compagnons puces le disent, trouvez-les. Sauvez-les.« Dans toute l'équipe.

original_en_text: You are welcome here always, Miss Hornet, true friend of fleas!<page>Stay as long as you care. Rest and restore. We many fleas do so enjoy your company.
original_zh_text: 随时欢迎您回来，跳蚤的挚友！<page>想留多久都可以。好好休息，我们都喜欢与您相伴。
translated_text: You are always welcome, Miss Bumblebee, a true friend of the fleas!<page>Stay for as long as you care. Rest and recovery. Many fleas that love your company.
secondary_translated_text: Vous êtes toujours la bienvenue, Miss Bumblebee, une véritable amie des puces !<page>Restez aussi longtemps que vous vous en souciez. repos et récupération. Beaucoup de puces qui aiment votre compagnie.

original_en_text: Dear friend of fleas, please! If ever you come upon a cave both wide and free, return with haste and tell us.<page>The fleas are oh so eager to journey, and I’m eager to see them to a destination safe!
original_zh_text: 跳蚤之友啊！如果发现宽敞安全的洞穴，请速来告知！<page>大伙迫不及待地要启程，我也盼着带他们去安全的归宿！
translated_text: Dear fleas, please! If you come across a vast and empty cave, come back and tell me.<page>Fleas are eager to travel and want to see you arrive safely at your destination!
