secondary_translated_text: Chers fleurs, s'il vous plaît ! Si vous rencontrez une grotte vaste et vide, revenez et me le dites.<page>Les puces sont impatients de voyager et veulent vous voir arriver en toute sécurité à votre destination !

original_en_text: <hpage>That is well, Fleamaster. My travels through this land have been far and deep, and yet at almost every reach I met the friendly, inquisitive presence of your kind.<hpage>You fleas have an uncommon desire for adventure which I find admirable, even if it is seldom matched by capability.<hpage>Though I am long accustomed to travelling alone, following your journey, and sharing some part in its progress has been a warm thing.<page>And so happy have you made we fleas! Even as the darkness comes to claim us, we would be honoured to bestow one final gift, a treasure from fleakind’s glorious past.<page>May it mark you in Pharloom’s final moment as a friend to us all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>那就好，我走遍纺络，处处都能遇见你们好奇的同胞。<hpage>你们对冒险的热忱令我钦佩，虽然常常力有不逮。<hpage>我素来喜好独行，但与你们相遇确是暖心之事。见你们团聚也很是欣慰。<page>哈哈！我们跳蚤也欢喜得很！因此在这黑暗将至的时刻，请让我为您送上最后的赠礼，这是跳蚤一族昔日的珍宝。<page>愿它永远守护在您身边，铭记您为我族挚友。
translated_text: <hpage>That's great, Freemaster. I have walked far and deep in this land, and wherever I go, I meet people who are as friendly and curious as you.<hpage>You fleas have an extraordinary appetite for adventure, and its capabilities are rarely matched, but it is admirable.<hpage>I've been used to traveling alone for a long time, but it's warm to follow your journey and share your progress.<page>I'm so glad you made me a flea! Even if darkness falls upon us, we are honored to give you a final gift, a treasure from the fleas' glorious past.<page>May this be our last moments as friends. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>C'est génial, Freemaster ! J'ai marché loin et profondément dans cette terre, et partout où je vais, je rencontre des gens qui sont aussi amicaux et curieux que vous.<hpage>Vous puces ont un appétit extraordinaire pour l'aventure, et ses capacités sont rarement égalées, mais il est admirable.<hpage>J'ai l'habitude de voyager seul depuis longtemps, mais c'est chaleureux de suivre votre parcours et de partager vos progrès.<page>Je suis tellement contente que tu m'ai fait une puce ! Même si les ténèbres tombent sur nous, nous sommes honorés de vous offrir un dernier cadeau, un trésor du glorieux passé des puces.<page>Que ce soit nos derniers moments en tant qu 'amis. "

original_en_text: You are have luck, Miss Hornet, to lack the fur of we fleas. All the blowy sand of that place is getting very stuck inside!
original_zh_text: 你真幸运，大黄蜂小姐。不像我们长着毛，这破地方的沙子全钻进了毛里！
translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, you're lucky you don't have any flea hairs. All the dust in that place is trapped!
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, vous avez de la chance de ne pas avoir de poils de puces. Toute la poussière de cet endroit est piégée !

original_en_text: The beasts here are... much frightful, hm? Scary?<page>But if give them space, they leave alone. You respect beast, beast respect you.
original_zh_text: 这里的野兽……挺吓人？<page>保持距离就没事。你对它们敬而远之，它们也一样。
translated_text: The beast is here. it's scary, isn't it? Terrible?<page>But if you give them space, they will leave on their own. You respect the beast, and the beast respects you.
secondary_translated_text: La Bête est là. C'est effrayant, n'est-ce pas ? Terribles ?<page>Si vous leur donnez de l'espace, ils vont partir seuls. Vous respectez la Bête et la Bête vous respecte.

original_en_text: Grand Champion... bug called Hornet. Will you once again challenge the Flea Dodge trial?
original_zh_text: 名为大黄蜂的虫……总冠军。你要再次挑战跳蚤溜溜吗？
translated_text: The tournament had an error called "hornet." will you challenge the flea road mystery trial again?
secondary_translated_text: Le tournoi a eu une erreur appelée "hornet".« Voulez-vous défier à nouveau le procès mystère de la route des puces ?

original_en_text: Fierce one, my dear Grand Champion! Will you dance and fly with us above the water?
original_zh_text: 小辣椒，亲爱的总冠军！和我们一起在水面上共舞吧！
translated_text: Warriors, dear champions! Would you like to dance with us or fly on the water?
secondary_translated_text: Chers champions, chers champions ! Aimeriez-vous danser avec nous ou voler sur l'eau ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I bring a delivery, supplies from the couriers of Bellhart to aid your settlement.<page>Ahh, such a kindly gesture adds much warmth to our celebration!<page>These poor little fleas will never grow to roam the world as we have, so let us give them what happiness we can before the end.
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我带来了钟心镇的支援物资。<page>啊，这份善意让庆典更添暖意！<page>这些可怜的小跳蚤注定无法像我们一样游历世界，就让我们在终结前尽力给予他们欢愉吧。
translated_text: <hpage>Flymaster, I have brought you a bundle of supplies from the messenger of Belheart to help you settle down.<page>Oh, such a friendly gesture adds a lot of warmth to our celebration!<page>Let's do all we can to make them happy before it's all over, because this poor fleas won't grow up and walk around the world like we do.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Flymaster, je vous ai apporté un paquet de fournitures du messager de Belheart pour vous aider à vous installer.<page>Oh, un tel geste amicaux ajoute beaucoup de chaleur à notre célébration !<page>Faisons tout ce que nous pouvons pour les rendre heureux avant que tout ne soit fini, parce que cette pauvre puce ne grandira pas et ne marchera pas dans le monde comme nous le faisons.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, sir flea. I see you were able to unite safely with this caravan.<page>Oh yes! Heh heh. All thanks to you! Dear, sweet you! Pray tell, what does one call such a delicate beauty? Surely yours is a name most sweet and soothing. Are you Fairgrace? Or Nectarsweet?<hpage>I am Hornet, sir. Address me by that name or not at all.<page>Gradak! Of course. Of course. My dear, Hornet! I shall let you in on my little secret. My carriage doubles as a soothing spa, you see. It’s most ingenious.<page>The water inside is piping hot, and purer than a psalm! Heh heh! I’d gladly let you soak inside, for a modest fee!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，跳蚤先生。看来你顺利加入旅团了。<page>是啊！嘿嘿，全托你的福！敢问美女芳名？定是甜美如"香露仙子"？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂，要么称我本名，要么闭嘴。<page>咳！是是是！亲爱的大黄蜂小姐！嘿嘿，透露个小秘密——其实我的车厢兼作温泉疗愈所！<page>水温滚烫，而且比圣诗还纯净！付点小钱就能泡个痛快！
translated_text: <hpage>Again, Mr. Fly. You can join this escort safely.<page>oh! yes! Oh, thank you, thank you! Darling, darling, you! Tell me, what's the name of such a beautiful woman? Your name is undoubtedly the sweetest and most comforting name. Are you a beautiful grace? nectalin?<hpage>I am a Hornet. Do you call them by name or not call them at all?<page>Gladak, of course, of course, my dear, Bumblebee! Let me tell you my little secret: My carriage doubles as a healing spa and this is the smartest.<page>The water in it is purer than poetry! what?! I'm happy to put you in, not expensive!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Encore une fois, monsieur Fly. Vous pourrez rejoindre cette escorte en toute sécurité.<page>Ooh ! Oui ! Oh, merci, merci ! Chérie, chérie, toi ! Dites-moi, quel est le nom d'une si belle femme ? Votre nom est sans aucun doute le nom le plus doux et le plus réconfortant.Êtes-vous une belle grâce ? Nectaline ?<hpage>Je suis un hornet. Les appeler par leur nom ou ne les appeler pas du tout ?<page>Gladak, bien sûr, bien sûr mon cher Bumblebee ! Permettez-moi de vous dire mon petit secret : ma voiture double comme un spa de guérison et c'est le plus intelligent.<page>L'eau en elle est plus pure que la poésie ! Quoi ? ! Je suis heureux de vous mettre, pas cher !

original_en_text: Mamashka. The trial begins. Flea Dodge!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡。跳蚤溜溜，试炼开始！
translated_text: Mamashka. The trial began. Nomi Dodge!
secondary_translated_text: Mamushka. Le procès a commencé. Nomi Dodge !

original_en_text: <hpage>I saw your plea posted at Bellhart, sir flea, and accept your request.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我在钟心镇看到了你的祈愿，跳蚤先生，我接受。
translated_text: <hpage>I saw your request at Berhardt and accepted it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'ai vu votre demande chez Berhardt et j'ai accepté.

original_en_text: The dirge I sing is for the end of our old lives...<page>Here at the end of times, our paradise crumbles beneath us. Flea and friend alike, all will soon be consumed...
original_zh_text: 我唱这首哀歌，祭奠旧日终结……<page>末日将至，乐园崩塌。跳蚤与挚友，终将湮灭……
translated_text: The elegy I sing is for the end of our old life<page>At the end of this world, our paradise will crumble at our feet. Flea is like a friend, and everything will quickly be consumed.
secondary_translated_text: L'élégie que je chante est pour la fin de notre vie ancienne<page>À la fin de ce monde, notre paradis s'effondrera à nos pieds. La puce est comme un ami et tout sera rapidement consommé.

original_en_text: Ahh, look! The poor fleas are starting to make their way to us! What a precious thing!<page>We have much to thank you for already! And I hope we will have even more to be thankful for very soon! Please, keep seeking out our lost fellows!
original_zh_text: 快看！迷途的同胞开始回归了！多么珍贵的情谊！<page>我们对您感激不尽！还请您继续帮忙寻找失散的同胞！
translated_text: ah! Look at me! Poor fleas are coming closer! What a precious thing!<page>We already have so much to be grateful for! I wish I could be grateful sooner! Please continue to search for your lost companions!
secondary_translated_text: Ah ! Regarde-moi ! Les pauvres puces se rapprochent ! Quelle chose précieuse !<page>Nous avons déjà tant de choses à être reconnaissants ! J'aimerais pouvoir être reconnaissante plus tôt ! Continuez à chercher vos compagnons perdus !

original_en_text: Grrr.. bug, not flea. Why you must bother me? This spot is mine, fair fought and earned.<hpage>I won’t stay long, madam. Nor would I contest your right to this cave. I only ask what task causes you to perch alone atop these dank ducts?<page>Task? Mine is a work most important, but not for talking of here, where danger waits close. Soon, I depart to seek fleas, my fellows, and join them.<page>Now... Grrr. You leave me! I go soon to seek other fleas. A flea alone is good, but fleas together is best! Till then, rest I need! Off, bug!
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，干嘛烦我？这地盘是我打下来的！<hpage>我无意久留，跳蚤，也不打算抢你山洞。就是好奇你独自在这做什么？<hpage>做什么？当然是重要的事，但没空多说，附近有危险。我马上就要离开，去找我的同胞。<page>唔……你走吧！跳蚤还是聚在一起更合适，我待会就去找他们！现在要先休息！
translated_text: Gollum. They are insects, not fleas. why are you interrupting me? This position is mine, fair play, winning.<hpage>I won't stay long, ma 'am. I doubt your right to this cave. I just want to ask, what's the mission of being alone in this wet pipe?<page>what's the mission? My job is one of the most important jobs, but instead of talking about it here, the danger is here. Immediately I began to look for my fellow fleas and joined them.<page>Currently, it is... ah ~! Leave him alone! I will look for another flea immediately. One flea is great, but together flea is the best! Until then, you need some rest! Stop it, bug!
secondary_translated_text: Gollum. Ce sont des insectes, pas des puces. Pourquoi m'interromprez-vous ? Cette position est la mienne, fair play, gagner.<hpage>- Je ne vais pas rester longtemps, madame. Je doute de votre droit à cette grotte. Je veux juste demander, quelle est la mission d'être seul dans ce tuyau mouillé ?<page>Qu 'est-ce que la mission ? Mon travail est l'un des emplois les plus importants, mais au lieu d'en parler ici, le danger est ici. Immédiatement, j'ai commencé à chercher mes compagnons de puces et je les ai rejoints.<page>Actuellement, c'est... Ah ~ ! Laissez-le seul ! Je vais chercher une autre fleur tout de suite. Une puce est génial, mais ensemble, les puces sont les meilleures ! D'ici là, vous avez besoin de vous reposer ! Arrêtez-vous bug !

original_en_text: Dear friend... Miss Hornet! Forgive us, but we beg one more favour from you. Will you accompany us in our final act...?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂女士！请原谅，但我们恳求您最后再帮一次忙。您可愿陪我们完成旅途的终幕……？
translated_text: My dear friends, miss hornet! Excuse me, but I'd like another one. will you please finish the last show?
secondary_translated_text: Mes chers amis, mademoiselle Hornet ! Excusez-moi, mais j'en voudrais un autre. Voulez-vous finir le dernier spectacle ?

original_en_text: It is time for the Festival of the Flea! One last, grand celebration before the black quakes pull us all down into the darkness!<page>Rouse yourself fleas, one last time! Let the games begin!
original_zh_text: 跳蚤庆典就要开始了！在黑暗将我们拖入深渊前，最后一场盛大狂欢！<page>跳蚤们，最后一次振作起来！游戏开始！
translated_text: Fray Day! The last massive celebration before the Great Earthquake has plunged us into darkness!<page>Finally, catch the fleas yourself! Let's start the game.
secondary_translated_text: Jour de Fray ! La dernière célébration massive avant le Grand Tremblement de terre nous a plongés dans les ténèbres !<page>Enfin, attrapez les puces vous-même ! Commençons le jeu.

original_en_text: Ahhh! Alas. Then we shall pray your own path remains safe.<page>And now, our new home is calling. We venture again!<hpage>Good travels, Fleamaster. May your journey ahead be safe and smooth.
original_zh_text: 啊哈哈，唉，那就祝您前路平安。<page>好了，新家在召唤，我们又要启程了！<hpage>一路顺风，跳蚤首领。
translated_text: ah! ah! Oh, yeah. I pray that your path is safe.<page>A new home is being called. Risk again!<hpage>Have a safe journey, Freemaster. May your future journey be safe and successful.
secondary_translated_text: Ah ! Ah ! - Oh, oui. Je prie pour que votre chemin soit sûr.<page>Une nouvelle maison est appelée. Risque encore !<hpage>Passez un voyage en sécurité, Freemaster. Puisse votre futur voyage être sûr et réussi.

original_en_text: But stranger! While you’re with us, you must hear of the miracle that has occurred!<page>See all these fleas gathered to our troupe? It seems so many! An impossible number, yet here they are, safely joined together. Our most cherished wishes answered!<hpage>If you were seeking fleas to join your caravan, I have found and freed many throughout my travels.<page>Oh! Can it be? Then you here are our saviour, our dear fleafriend! For all have made their way right, straight to us!<page>And now, with our caravan full to bursting, we’ve rested long enough. We fleas must head higher!<page>Oh, but saviour, how remiss of me! First, please tell, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan prepares to depart toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 这位朋友！既然与我们同行，您可要听听旅团发生的奇迹！<page>看见归队的跳蚤们了吗？数量超乎想象！原以为这不可能，但它们已然齐聚于此。我们的祈愿实现了！<hpage>如果你是在寻找跳蚤，我在旅途中解救了许多。<page>噢！难道是您？那您便是我们的救星了，亲爱的跳蚤挚友！所有伙伴都因您重聚于此！<page>如今商队拥挤不堪，休整也已足够久。跳蚤们必须向更高处进发！<page>噢，救星阁下，原谅我失礼了！请问该如何称呼您？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴你能和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<page>哈哈！能与同胞团聚，还结交了新朋友，真是太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: But the stranger! When you are with us, you can hear the miracles that have already happened!<page>Have you seen the fleas that are gathering in our theater? It seems like so many! This is an impossible number, but it is safely combined. My most important wish has been fulfilled!<hpage>If you are looking for fleas to join your fleet, I have found and released many fleas throughout my journey.<page>Oh, my God. are you okay? You are our Savior, our dear flea friend! Because they all came for me!<page>The team is already full and has plenty of rest. The fleas have to go higher! '<page>"Savior, how lazy am I! First of all, tell me. What should we call it? "<hpage>Call me Bumblebee, Master Frey. I'm glad to see your fellow fleas are safe in your fleet. Traveling alone is a dangerous land.<page>Wavenda! In other words, I cannot believe it! How beautiful it is! We are all together. "<page>My dear friends, Miss Bumblebee Our convoy will depart for a vast swamp at high elevation. Would you like to travel with us as a guest?
secondary_translated_text: Mais l'étranger ! Quand vous êtes avec nous, vous pouvez entendre les miracles qui se sont déjà produits !<page>Avez-vous vu les puces qui se rassemblent dans notre théâtre ? On dirait qu 'il y en a tellement ! C'est un nombre impossible, mais il est combiné en toute sécurité. Mon souhait le plus important a été accompli !<hpage>Si vous cherchez des puces pour rejoindre votre flotte, j'ai trouvé et libéré beaucoup de puces tout au long de mon voyage.<page>Oh mon Dieu ! Tu es OK ? Tu es notre Sauveur, notre cher ami des puces ! Parce qu ' ils sont tous venus pour moi !<page>L'équipe est déjà pleine et a beaucoup de repos. Les puces doivent aller plus haut ! '<page>« Sauveur, comme je suis paresseux ! Tout d'abord, dis-moi, comment devrions-nous l'appeler ? "<hpage>Appelle-moi Bumblebee, Maître Frey. Je suis heureux de voir que vos amis puces sont en sécurité dans votre flotte. Voyager seul est un pays dangereux.<page>Wavenda ! En d'autres termes, je ne peux pas y croire ! Comme c'est beau ! Nous sommes tous ensemble. "<page>Mes chers amis, Miss Bumblebee, notre convoi partira pour un vaste marais à haute altitude. Vous souhaitez voyager avec nous en tant qu 'invité ?

original_en_text: Welcome back, my fierce one. Dodeshna! Heh heh! I’m sure your travels have wearied you.<page>Oh no, I wouldn’t dare take rosaries from such a treasured guest! Please, use my spa-carriage, free of charge! Dear Kratt is only too happy to provide!
original_zh_text: 欢迎回来小辣椒！嘿嘿，旅途累了吧？<page>哦不，我哪敢收您钱！随便泡！克拉特乐意为您效劳！
translated_text: Welcome home, my brave man. Doshner! what?! Surely your journey will be boring.<page>Oh, I dare not take the Rosary from such a precious guest! Please use the spa car for free! Dear Kratt is happy to serve!
secondary_translated_text: Bienvenue à la maison, mon brave homme, Doshner ! Quoi ? ! Votre voyage sera vraiment ennuyeux.<page>Oh, je n'ose pas prendre le Rosaire à un si précieux invité ! Veuillez utiliser la voiture spa gratuitement ! Cher Kratt est heureux de servir !

original_en_text: Miss Hornet! You have proven yourself the champion at each of our flea games!<page>I am confident now that the grand champion of our festival has emerged. It is none other than yourself, of course!<page>And thusly, must our final ceremony begin. Fleas, prepare yourselves!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，您包揽了所有跳蚤游戏的冠军！<page>我宣布，您是当之无愧的庆典总冠军！<page>最终仪式现在开始！跳蚤们，做好准备！
translated_text: miss hornet! You've proven to be the champion of every flea contest we've won!<page>The overall winner of the music festival came out. Of course you do!<page>The final ceremony began. Flea, ready to go!
secondary_translated_text: Madame Hornet ! Vous avez prouvé être le champion de tous les concours de puces que nous avons gagné !<page>Le gagnant du festival de musique est sorti. Bien sûr que vous faites !<page>La cérémonie finale a commencé. Flea, prête à partir !

original_en_text: Good friend of fleas is you, Miss Hornet. Now must join and drink much. Be merry before all ends. Brew is made, enough for all!<page>No charge for you if needing more. Why waste when future is final?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，我们跳蚤的挚友，快来喝！末日临头该及时行乐！药酿管够！<page>尽管喝吧！都要完蛋了还留着干嘛？
translated_text: A flea's best friend is you, Miss Bumblebee. You should go in now and drink more wine. You will be happy until it all ends. Beer is for everyone to enjoy!<page>If you need more, you don't have to pay for it. Why waste the future when the future is fixed?
secondary_translated_text: La meilleure amie d'une puce, c'est vous, Miss Bumblebee. Vous devriez entrer maintenant et boire plus de vin. Vous serez heureux jusqu'à ce que tout se termine. La bière est pour tout le monde !<page>Si vous avez besoin de plus, vous n'avez pas à payer pour cela. Pourquoi gaspiller l'avenir quand l'avenir est fixé ?

original_en_text: A strange flea has joined our troupe. All are welcome, but something about this one sets my fur to raise.<page>His carriage offers a steaming service, but the charge in rosaries is stiff, especially for us fleas who carry few.<page>For the companionship we provide, and the safety of our numbers, surely some discount is deserved?
original_zh_text: 有个怪跳蚤入伙了。虽然我们来者不拒，但这家伙让我寒毛直竖。<page>他提供蒸疗服务，但要价高昂，我们跳蚤哪有这么多念珠？<page>看在我们提供庇护的份上，总该打个折吧？
translated_text: A strange fleas joined the troupe. You're welcome, but this will make my coat worse.<page>His carriage provided steam services, but the cost of the rosary was high, especially for us who carried little fleas.<page>For the friendship we offer and the security of our numbers, we should certainly discount. "
secondary_translated_text: Une étrange fleur rejoint la troupe. Vous êtes les bienvenus, mais cela va rendre mon manteau encore pire.<page>Sa voiture fournissait des services de vapeur, mais le coût du chapelet était élevé, surtout pour nous qui portions de petites puces.<page>Pour l'amitié que nous offrons et la sécurité de nos numéros, nous devrions certainement faire des rabais. "

original_en_text: Vikna! Dear one, you outdo yourself! To beat your previous high score is a marvel indeed!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！亲爱的，你又破了自己的记录！太神奇了！
translated_text: vicarner! You are beyond yourself! " Breaking the previous score is truly a miracle!
secondary_translated_text: Vicarner ! Tu es au-delà de toi-même !« Briser le score précédent est un véritable miracle !

original_en_text: You still here, bug not flea? Is rest I need before I leave for caravan. Not chat. You feel trouble-type. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I shall take my leave, madam. Stay strong on your own journey. May we meet again at the caravan, amongst your fellows.
original_zh_text: 你怎么还在？我休息够了就去找旅团。别啰嗦，感觉你身上麻烦事不少，让我甲壳发紧。<hpage>那就告辞了，女士。祝你路上顺利，我们旅团再见。
translated_text: you're still here? aren't bugs fleas? We need a break before going to the caravan. There is no chat. They think they're in trouble. It strains the shell.<hpage>I have to go now, miss. Be strong in the journey. I hope I can see you in the car again.
secondary_translated_text: Tu es toujours là ? Les bugs ne sont-ils pas des puces ? Il faut faire une pause avant d'aller à la caravane. Il n'y a pas de chat. Ils pensent qu ' ils sont en difficulté. Il défonce la coquille.<hpage>Je dois y aller maintenant, mademoiselle. Soyez fort dans le voyage. J'espère te revoir dans la voiture.

original_en_text: Ah, of course. Perhaps you will be trying one of the other games?
original_zh_text: 啊，好的，想玩其他游戏吗？
translated_text: Oh, sure. Why don't you try other games?
secondary_translated_text: Oh, sûr. Pourquoi ne pas essayer d'autres jeux ?

original_en_text: Grrr... bug not flea. Still wishing for knowings of my work? But you hold no map to mark! Until a map is owned, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，还惦记我的情报？但你连地图都没有！先弄到地图再来。
translated_text: um... Insects are not fleas. Do you want to know what I do? There is no map to mark! Before the map, there was little to do.
secondary_translated_text: Umm... Les insectes ne sont pas des puces. Tu veux savoir ce que je fais ? Il n'y a pas de carte à marquer ! Avant la carte, il y avait peu à faire.

original_en_text: Thank you. Thank you! I’ll treasure these sweet-smelling rosaries dearly! Now, don’t be shy. Step inside!
original_zh_text: 多谢惠顾！这些香香的念珠我会珍藏的！别害羞，快请进！
translated_text: Thank you very much! I really care about these scents! Do not be ashamed. go in.
secondary_translated_text: Merci beaucoup à vous ! Je m'intéresse vraiment à ces parfums ! N'ayez pas honte. Entrez dans.

original_en_text: Vikna! My dear one, my dancer, the game has ended and you have proven yourself the champion!<page>None can best your score. You have shamed us all with your fearsome grace! But you will keep playing for me, yes?<page>The end of the world need not be a lonely thing... eheh heh...
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，我的亲爱的舞王！你已加冕冠军！<page>无法超越的优雅身姿！但你还会继续玩吧？<page>末日狂欢可不该独自度过，嘿嘿……
translated_text: vicarner! My dear dancer, the contest is over and you have proven to be a champion!<page>No one is better than you. You have insulted us all with a terrible grace! " you're going to keep working for me, right?<page>The end of the world is not a lonely thing. Oh, yeah.
secondary_translated_text: Vicarner ! Ma chère danseuse, le concours est terminé et vous avez prouvé être un champion !<page>Personne n'est meilleur que vous. Vous nous avez tous insultés avec une terrible grâce !« Tu vas continuer à travailler pour moi, non ?<page>La fin du monde n'est pas une chose solitaire. - Oh, oui.

original_en_text: Excellent, excellent! Let us make preparations and be off without delay! Rouse yourself fleas, for the caravan roams once more!
original_zh_text: 太好了！即刻整装出发！跳蚤们动起来，旅团要再度启程啦！
translated_text: great! great! great! Get ready and let's go right away! Let's cheer up and get the car running again!
secondary_translated_text: Bravo ! Bravo ! Bravo ! Préparez-vous et partons tout de suite ! Réjouissons-nous et remettons la voiture en marche !

original_en_text: My dear, will you play Flea Bounce for me once more? Leap up and bounce on the fleas who fly past for as long as you are able!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，再玩一次蹦蹦游戏嘛！只需跳起来踩飞过的跳蚤，持续越久越好！
translated_text: honey, can you do a flea bounce again? Hop up as long as you can and jump on the flying fleas!
secondary_translated_text: Chérie, peux-tu faire un rebond de puce à nouveau ? Sautez aussi longtemps que vous pouvez et sautez sur les puces volantes !

original_en_text: Say you dodeshna to the new flea sitting there? Is quiet one, but is very good at games!<page>Have no worry for him, Grishkin will look after. Will fill him with brew and meet him to all the other fleas.
original_zh_text: 看见新来的安静跳蚤没？他玩游戏可厉害了！<page>别担心，格里什琴会照顾他的。先灌他药酿再介绍给大家！
translated_text: Do you assume you're right about the new flea dodeshna? This is a quiet game, but very good!<page>Don't worry, Glycine will take care of you. He filled it with beer and looked at all the other fleas.
secondary_translated_text: Supposez-vous que vous avez raison au sujet de la nouvelle puce dodeshna ? C'est un jeu calme mais très bon !<page>Ne vous inquiétez pas, Glycine s'occupera de vous. Il le remplit de bière et regarda toutes les autres puces.

original_en_text: Here we shall remain, for a time, Miss Hornet, and pray that more lost fleas find their way to us.<hpage>What others I encounter, I shall send your way, Fleamaster.
original_zh_text: 我们会暂驻此地，祈祷更多迷途同胞能够找来。<hpage>如果在路上遇到跳蚤，我会让他们来找你。
translated_text: Miss Hornet, we pray that we will be here for a while, and that more lost fleas will find their way.<hpage>When I see others, I will send them to you, Master Noomi. "
secondary_translated_text: Mademoiselle Hornet, nous prions que nous soyons ici pendant un certain temps, et que d'autres puces perdues retrouvent leur chemin.<hpage>Quand je verrai d'autres, je vous les enverrai, Maître Noomi. "

translated_text: you want a flea beer?
secondary_translated_text: Vous voulez une bière Flea ?

translated_text: Bounceback
secondary_translated_text: Bounceback

original_en_text: <hpage>That is well, Fleamaster. My travels through this land have been far and deep, and yet at almost every reach I met the friendly, inquisitive presence of your kind.<hpage>You fleas have an uncommon desire for adventure, which I find admirable, even if it is seldom matched by capability.<hpage>Though I am long accustomed to travelling alone, following your journey, and sharing some part in its progress has been a warm thing.<page>Ahh, and so happy too have you made we fleas!<page>I would be honoured to bestow one final gift unto you, Miss Hornet, a treasure from fleakind’s glorious past. May it mark you forever as a friend to us all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>那就好，我走遍纺络，处处都能遇见你们好奇的同胞。<hpage>你们对冒险的热忱令我钦佩，虽然常常力有不逮。<hpage>我向来独来独往，但与你们相遇也令我感到暖心。<page>哈哈！我们跳蚤也高兴得很！<page>请允许我献上最后的赠礼，这是跳蚤一族昔日的珍宝。愿它永远守护在您身边，铭记您为我族挚友。
translated_text: <hpage>Very good, folks. I have walked far and deep in this land, and wherever I go, I meet people who are as friendly and curious as you.<hpage>You fleas have an unusual desire for adventure, and even if that desire doesn't match it, it's admirable.<hpage>I've been used to traveling alone for a long time, but it's warm to follow your journey and share your progress.<page>Oh, glad you made us a flea!<page>Miss Hornet, it is my honour to give you my last present. A treasure from the fleas' glorious past. May you be a friend to us all forever.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Très bien, les gars. J'ai marché loin et profondément dans cette terre, et partout où je vais, je rencontre des gens qui sont aussi amicaux et curieux que vous.<hpage>Les puces ont un désir inhabituel d'aventure, et même si ce désir ne correspond pas, c'est admirable.<hpage>J'ai l'habitude de voyager seul depuis longtemps, mais c'est chaleureux de suivre votre parcours et de partager vos progrès.<page>Heureusement que tu nous aies fait une fleur !<page>« Mademoiselle Hornet, c'est mon honneur de vous faire mon dernier cadeau. Un trésor du passé glorieux des puces. Que tu sois un ami pour nous tous pour toujours.

original_en_text: The spa is yours, dear guest! And always open for one so considerate and kindly as yourself... eheh heh...
original_zh_text: 请享受温泉吧，亲爱的顾客！这里随时向您这样贴心又善良的客人开放，嘿嘿嘿……
translated_text: Guests, the Spa is yours! Always open your heart to a thoughtful and kind person like yourself. Oh, yeah.
secondary_translated_text: Mes clients, le spa est à vous ! Ouvrez toujours votre cœur à une personne réfléchie et gentille comme vous. - Oh, oui.

original_en_text: With luck, my dear, we will meet again when I have joined the flea caravan.<page>My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly to share with you when next we meet!
original_zh_text: 运气好的话，我们在旅团再见。<page>我的车厢里给你留了一份惊喜呢，下次见面再为你揭晓！
translated_text: If you're lucky, you'll see me again when I join the fleas' caravan.<page>There is a special secret hidden in my carriage. I'd like to share it with you the next time we see you.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous avez de la chance, vous me verrez à nouveau quand je rejoindrai la caravane des puces.<page>Il y a un secret spécial caché dans ma voiture. Je voudrais le partager avec vous la prochaine fois que nous vous verrons.

original_en_text: The pact is made then. Fellows! Steel yourself! It is time, it is time!
original_zh_text: 那么契约达成！伙计们！打起精神！时候到了，时候到了！
translated_text: The agreement was reached. you guys! Be strong! It's Time is Time Single
secondary_translated_text: L'accord a été conclu. Les gars ! Soyez fort ! C'est le temps Single

original_en_text: This long lake... Space is much more big here. Finally I have some quiet from the little fleas.
original_zh_text: 这片湖……真宽敞。终于能躲开小跳蚤们清净会儿了。
translated_text: This long lake. This is a much wider space. I could finally calm down.
secondary_translated_text: ce long lac. C'est un espace beaucoup plus large. Je pouvais enfin me calmer.

original_en_text: Ahh, that is a shame, but I understand. I’m sure our roads will cross each other soon enough.<page>And now, we must be off! Rouse yourself, fleas. The caravan roams once more!
original_zh_text: 唉，虽然遗憾，但能理解。相信我们很快会重逢的。<page>现在，我们该出发了！跳蚤们动起来，旅团要再度启程啦！
translated_text: I'm sorry, I know. Our paths will soon be crossed. "<page>I have to go now and get better, Flea. The caravan started running again!
secondary_translated_text: Je suis désolé, je sais. Nos chemins seront bientôt croisés. "<page>Il faut que j'y retourne et que je me remette, Flea. La caravane recommença à courir !

original_en_text: The grand ceremony has ended, but still we play! Will you honour us with a display of Flea Juggle, Miss Grand Champion Hornet?
original_zh_text: 庆典虽已落幕，但游戏不止！冠军大人愿意赏脸继续玩跳蚤耍耍吗？
translated_text: The event is over, but we're still playing! will you show me the flea juggler, the champion miss bumblebee?
secondary_translated_text: L'événement est terminé, mais nous jouons toujours ! Voulez-vous me montrer la jongleuse de puces, la championne Miss Bumblebee ?

original_en_text: Wonderful! Wonderful! The fleas will be overjoyed to share this next journey with our favoured companion! Let us away!
original_zh_text: 太好了！跳蚤们肯定会因为有贵客同行而欢欣雀跃！我们这就出发！
translated_text: That's awesome! That's awesome! We're excited to share our next trip with our favorite companions! let's go!
secondary_translated_text: C'est génial ! C'est génial ! Nous sommes impatients de partager notre prochain voyage avec nos compagnons préférés ! Allons-y !

original_en_text: Mamashka! Let our beautiful game begin! Flea Bounce!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡！蹦蹦游戏开始！
translated_text: Congratulations, Mom! Let's start a beautiful game! Flea bounce!
secondary_translated_text: Félicitations Maman ! Commençons un beau jeu ! Flea Bounce !

original_en_text: <hpage>Unfortunately not, Fleamaster. I have visited many of this kingdom’s caves, and none would offer the safety and space you require.<hpage>If ever I come upon such a place, I will let you know.
original_zh_text: <hpage>很遗憾，并没有。我去过的洞窟都不符合你们的需求。<hpage>但若将来遇到，肯定前来告诉你们。
translated_text: <hpage>Unfortunately, Flymaster. I have visited many caves in the kingdom, and none of them offer the safety and space you need.<hpage>If you come to a place like this, I'll tell you.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Désolé Flymaster ! J'ai visité de nombreuses grottes dans le royaume, et aucune d'entre elles n'offre la sécurité et l'espace dont vous avez besoin.<hpage>Si vous venez dans un endroit comme celui-ci, je vous le dirai.

translated_text: About fleas.
secondary_translated_text: sur les fleas.

original_en_text: How do you like our festival, Miss Hornet? While the world crumbles around us, we will laugh and dance and frolick!<page>Make merry with us, and play some of the games of old!<hpage>My time is slim, Fleamaster. If I am to join your games, know it will be only to hone my skills for the greater trial I must soon face below.<page>Of course! Of course! Joy or learnings! Any reason is fine by us, Miss Hornet!<page>And look here, we have Flea Juggle, where the challenge is to strike fleas upwards and keep them airborne for as long as possible.<page>To have our treasured guest challenge this humble game would be an honour for us, truly!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐觉得我们的庆典如何？就算外面世界崩塌，我们照样欢欣起舞！<page>开心点，来陪我们玩玩老游戏吧！<hpage>我时间紧迫。参加游戏只是为了磨练技艺，应对接下来的恶战。<page>都行都行！不管是玩乐或修行都可以！<page>看这里，这是跳蚤耍耍——把跳蚤打上天，滞空越久越好！<page>贵客肯赏脸挑战，我们荣幸之至！
translated_text: miss hornet, what do you think of our vacation? When the world around us collapses, we laugh, dance and play!<page>Have fun with us and play an old game!<hpage>My time is short, Freymaster. If I participate in your game, it is only to hone my skills to deal with the greater trials that I face.<page>of course! of course! Happiness is still learning! Whatever the reason, Miss Hornet! "<page>Look here, there's a flea juggling, and the challenge is to get it to fly in the air as long as possible per flea.<page>It is a great honor to welcome our valued guests to take on this humble contest.
secondary_translated_text: Mlle Hornet, qu 'en pensez-vous de nos vacances ? Quand le monde s'effondre autour de nous, nous rions, dansons et jouons !<page>Amusez-vous avec nous et jouez à un vieux jeu !<hpage>Mon temps est court, Freymaster ! Si je participe à votre jeu, c'est seulement pour affiner mes compétences pour faire face aux plus grandes épreuves que je fais face.<page>Bien sûr ! Bien sûr ! Le bonheur, c'est apprendre ! Quoi qu 'il en soit, mademoiselle Hornet ! "<page>Regardez ici, il y a une puce qui jongle, et le défi est de la faire voler dans les airs aussi longtemps que possible par puce.<page>C'est un grand honneur d'accueillir nos précieux invités pour participer à ce concours humble.

original_en_text: A mistake, treasured guest! Never again! Ohhh. Never again!
original_zh_text: 一场误会啊贵客！绝不再犯！我保证！
translated_text: That's a mistake, dear guest! not anymore! Not again!
secondary_translated_text: C'est une erreur, cher invité ! Plus pas ! Pas à nouveau !

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Amongst all of your troupe, I had little doubt you would survive to reach this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Bug not flea! Mine is to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together and grow them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the locations of other lost fleas, share them with me. I may be able to send them safe to the caravan.<page>My learnings? Not free for you, bug not flea. Rosaries! Give those and I shall say of what I have sensed. Work like mine... much long, and hard. For that, I deserve some riches held.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。你能平安到达这里倒是不令我意外。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<hpage>若是探知迷途跳蚤下落，就告诉我，或许能送他们归队。<page>我的发现？外族虫，不白给，拿念珠来！我这行当又苦又累，理应拿点报酬。
translated_text: <hpage>Again, toast to the big fleas. Within your team, there is no doubt that you will arrive at this team.<hpage>Tell me what tasks are needed to distance yourself from your comrades in such a terrifying way.<page>Gollum... Insects are not fleas! Mine is tracked by traces, smells, and sharp senses. Find our flea friend, the youngest flea, and gather them together to make them stronger.<hpage>If you find any other flea locations, please share with me. You may be able to safely transport them to the caravan.<page>my research? It's not free for you, and the bug is not a flea. Rosario! With that in mind, I will convey my feelings. Work like me. Long and hard. To do this, we need wealth.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Encore une fois, un toast aux puces. Au sein de votre équipe, il n'y a aucun doute que vous arriverez dans cette équipe.<hpage>Dites-moi quelles tâches sont nécessaires pour vous éloigner de vos camarades d'une manière si terrifiante.<page>Gollum... Les insectes ne sont pas des puces ! La mine est suivie par des traces, des odeurs et des sens aiguisés. Trouvez notre ami puce, la plus jeune puce, et rassemblez-les pour les rendre plus forts.<hpage>Si vous trouvez d'autres endroits de puces, s'il vous plaît partagez-les avec moi. Vous pourrez peut - être les transporter en toute sécurité à la caravane.<page>Ma recherche ? Ce n'est pas gratuit pour vous, et le bug n'est pas une puce. Rosario ! Dans cet esprit, je vais vous faire part de mes sentiments. Travailler comme moi, long et dur. Pour cela, nous avons besoin de richesse.

original_en_text: So many lost fleas have made it here... Truly, I’d never dared to hope we could gather such a grand company.<page>But, oh! The world has grown so dangerous, and there may be more lost fleas out there. I do so hope they can find their way to us!
original_zh_text: 这么多迷途同胞都回来了……真是做梦都不敢想！<page>如今外面更凶险了，可能还有其他流落的同胞。真希望他们能找到我们！
translated_text: Many lost fleas come here. I didn't expect such a big company to come together.<page>But, oh! The world could be dangerous and more fleas could disappear. We hope you find our way!
secondary_translated_text: Beaucoup de puces perdues viennent ici. Je ne m'attendais pas à ce qu ' une si grande compagnie se réunisse.<page>Mais, oh ! Le monde pourrait être dangereux et plus de puces pourraient disparaître. Nous espérons que vous trouverez notre chemin !

original_en_text: We fleas are all gathered, but now the world has loudly marked its ending! As great as our numbers grew, it seems our caravan will be the last.<page>There is only one thing left to do... but the preparations require time. If your travels wind their way back to us, dear friend, you yourself are welcome to participate...
original_zh_text: 跳蚤们虽已团聚，但世界即将毁灭！恐怕我们是最后的旅团了…….<page>只剩最后一事可做……但需时间准备。亲爱的朋友，如果再来，欢迎参与……
translated_text: We fleas have all gathered together, but now the world is loudly announcing its end. Our numbers continue to grow, but our team seems to be the last.<page>There 's only one thing left to do, but it takes time to prepare. Dear friends, when your trip returns to us, we welcome you to join in person.
secondary_translated_text: Nous, puces, nous nous sommes tous rassemblés, mais maintenant le monde annonce fortement sa fin. Notre nombre continue de croître, mais notre équipe semble être la dernière.<page>Il n'y a qu 'une chose à faire, mais il faut du temps pour se préparer. Chers amis, lorsque votre voyage reviendra chez nous, nous vous invitons à vous joindre en personne.

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, I must tell, we’ve seen evidence nearby of a hunter of our tribe, a flea that seeks fleas!<page>As pungent and gruff as their sort often are, they’re still useful to have around a caravan.<page>A flea of their rare skill, settled among us, could offer defence and more.<page>If you’re still to be helping grow our town, search them out, up atop the muck choked ducts.
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！附近有我们族群的猎手出没的迹象，那是位专逮跳蚤的跳蚤！<page>虽然那家伙臭烘烘的又粗鲁，但对旅团很有用。<page>这样的好手要是能入伙，既能当护卫又有大用。<page>如果您还愿意帮忙壮大我们的旅团，就去腐殖渠上面找找吧！
translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, I must tell you, we have seen evidence of hunters of our tribe in the neighborhood, looking for fleas, fleas!<page>They are usually spicy and rude, but they are still very useful around the caravan.<page>Fleas with rare skills will settle among us, providing defense and more.<page>Still, if you want to help our town develop, look in the pipes that are clogged with silt.
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, je dois vous dire que nous avons vu des preuves de chasseurs de notre tribu dans le quartier, à la recherche de puces, puces !<page>Ils sont généralement épicés et grossiers, mais ils sont toujours très utiles autour de la caravane.<page>Les puces avec des compétences rares s'installeront parmi nous, fournissant une défense et plus encore.<page>Pourtant, si vous voulez aider notre ville à se développer, regardez dans les tuyaux qui sont bouchés de boue.

original_en_text: A cauldron full of Flea Brew.
translated_text: Pot full of beer.
secondary_translated_text: Un pot plein de bière.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Of your many companions, I had little worry you would survive safe to find this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Mine was to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together so strong they could grow.<page>A task once important, mine! But not now. All fleas are here, safe. A rare many! Time for toasts, and brew to fill our bellies!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。就知道你能活着找到这里。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我以前负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<page>这差事曾经很重要，但不需要了！现在大伙都齐了！该喝酒庆祝！
translated_text: <hpage>Again, toast to the big fleas. Among your many companions, I do not worry that you will find this convoy safe.<hpage>Tell me what tasks are needed to distance yourself from your comrades in such a terrifying way.<page>My aim was to track it down with traces, smells, and sharp sensations. Let's find our flea friend, the youngest flea, and gather them together to grow stronger.<page>This has been my big job! But now it's not. All the fleas are here and safe. More unusual! It's time to lift your glass and fill your stomach with wine!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Encore une fois, un toast aux puces. Parmi vos nombreux compagnons, je ne crains pas que vous trouviez ce convoi en sécurité.<hpage>Dites-moi quelles tâches sont nécessaires pour vous éloigner de vos camarades d'une manière si terrifiante.<page>Mon but était de le traquer avec des traces, des odeurs et des sensations aiguës. Trouvons notre ami puce, la plus jeune puce, et rassemblons-les pour devenir plus forts.<page>C'est mon grand travail ! Mais maintenant ce n'est pas. Toutes les puces sont ici et en sécurité. Plus inhabituelle ! Il est temps de lever votre verre et de remplir votre estomac de vin !

original_en_text: Look here! All these lively fleas flocked to our caravan. Thanks to you and your hunting, our numbers grow grand. Mayhap, in time, we could grow to match even those caravans of our fabled past?<hpage>To see so many safe is a welcome sight, Fleamaster. Their playful cheer suggests you are a fine steward for the swelling troupe.<page>Such kind words, Miss Hornet! How lucky we are to have found a friend so fair!<page>But now, we must away! These moors have been our host long enough. It is time to climb and hoist towards drier caves!<page>Good friend to fleas, would you join us on this next journey?
original_zh_text: 看！这么多活蹦乱跳的同胞加入！多亏您帮忙，队伍越来越壮大。或许能重现当年先祖们的盛况？<hpage>看见这么多跳蚤平安无事，我也很欣慰。他们的欢声笑语也证明了你是个称职的领队。<page>大黄蜂小姐过奖了！能结交您这样的朋友才是旅团的幸运！<page>但现在该启程了！沼地虽好，但不应久留，该向更干燥的洞窟进发了！<page>跳蚤之友，愿意与我们一起出发吗？
translated_text: Look here! " All of these active fleas swarmed into our fleet. Thanks to you and your hunting, our number is increasing. " Over time, it may grow to be comparable to the caravans of the legendary past.<hpage>It's a welcome sight that many people look safe, Fleckmaster. Their playful cheers show that you are a great butler of a growing troupe.<page>You are so lovely, Miss Hornet! I am so lucky to have such a lovely friend!<page>But you have to go now! This land was our master for a long time. It's time to climb the dry caves!<page>Good friend of the flea, do you want to join us on our next journey?
secondary_translated_text: Regardez ici !« Toutes ces puces actives ont envahi notre flotte. Grâce à vous et à votre chasse, notre nombre augmente.« Avec le temps, il peut devenir comparable aux caravanes du passé légendaire.<hpage>C'est une vue bienvenue que beaucoup de gens semblent en sécurité, Fleckmaster. Leurs acclamations ludiques montrent que vous êtes un grand majordome d'une troupe en croissance.<page>Vous êtes si jolie, Miss Hornet ! J'ai tellement de chance d'avoir un ami aussi sympa !<page>Mais vous devez y aller maintenant ! Cette terre a été notre maître pendant longtemps. Il est temps de grimper les grottes sèches !<page>Bon ami de la puce, souhaitez-vous nous rejoindre dans notre prochain voyage ?

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended.<page>Bug not flea... impressive was your performance. Your score exceeds even my own.<page>To see skill so much, moments before everything ends, gives me unexpected joy.<page>Rishkiz... I congratulate you, champion.
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。<page>虫子，你超越了我，没想到外族也有这种身手。<page>末日临近还能见识这般技艺，着实是意料之外的惊喜。<page>里什基兹……祝贺你，冠军。
translated_text: Vickner. The trial is over.<page>Insects are not fleas. Your acting is impressive. " Your score is higher than mine. "<page>Watching so many techniques in the moments before it all ended gave me an unexpected joy.<page>Congratulations, champion.
secondary_translated_text: Vickner. Le procès est terminé.<page>Les insectes ne sont pas des puces. Votre action est impressionnante.« Votre score est plus élevé que le mien. "<page>Regarder tant de techniques dans les moments avant que tout ne se termine m'a donné une joie inattendue.<page>Félicitations, champion.

translated_text: dodge said
secondary_translated_text: Dodge dit

original_en_text: Ahh, Miss Hornet! Greetings, and well met, once again!<page>The journey here was long, but we didn’t lose a single flea! And now fate has brought us back together again... what a marvel!<hpage>It is good to see you safe, Fleamaster. The journey to this moor from the caverns below is long and dangerous.<page>Dangerous, certainly, but we fleas are born to roam!<page>And now, you must go and see Grishkin, sitting there by the bubbling cauldron. After long travel, we drink to revive our spirits!
original_zh_text: 啊！大黄蜂小姐！又见面真是太好了！<page>长途跋涉到这但没丢一只跳蚤！命运也让我们重逢……真是奇迹！<hpage>旅团平安就好，从下方洞窟到这沼地，路上肯定充满危险。<page>确实有不少危险，但跳蚤天生爱流浪！<page>现在，您去找格里什琴吧，她在冒泡的大锅旁。长途劳顿后该喝点提神！
translated_text: Oh, Miss Hornet! Hi, we met again!<page>It was a long way to get here, but we didn't lose the flea! A magical destiny that brought us back together!<hpage>It was good to see you safely, Master Flea, the journey from the cave below to the swamp was a long and dangerous journey.<page>Of course it's dangerous, but fleas were born to walk around.<page>I must go to see Grisikin, who is sitting by the boiling kettle. After a long trip, a drink!
secondary_translated_text: Désolé Mademoiselle Hornet ! Bonjour, nous nous sommes rencontrés à nouveau !<page>C'était un long chemin pour arriver ici, mais nous n'avons pas perdu la puce ! Un destin magique qui nous a réunis !<hpage>C'était bon de vous voir en sécurité, Maître Flea, le voyage de la grotte en bas au marécage a été un voyage long et dangereux.<page>Bien sûr, c'est dangereux, mais les puces sont nées pour se promener.<page>Je dois aller voir Grisikin, qui est assis près de la bouilloire bouillante. Après un long trajet, un verre !

original_en_text: Grrr.. bug not flea. Why you must bother me? This spot is mine, fair fought and earned.<hpage>I won’t stay long, madam. Nor would I contest your right to this cave.<hpage>I have encountered several of your fellow fleas, united in a caravan. Perhaps you would consider joining with them?<hpage>Yours seems a hardy hide, and I fear alone they lack the strength to survive long in this land.<page>Caravan? Grrr. Felt it in my fur... Time for change. If caravan is close, then my task, these lands, may near be complete.<page>Now... Grrr. Much talk I gave. You leave me! Meet again at caravan, amongst good fellows. There I share my learnings of fleas and Pharloom. Till then, rest I need! Off, bug!
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，干嘛烦我？这地盘是我打下来的！<hpage>我无意久留，跳蚤。也不打算抢你山洞。<hpage>我在一个旅团见过你的同胞。为何不加入他们？<hpage>你看着有些本事，他们也缺少护卫。<page>旅团？吼……感觉到了……是时候了。旅团出发，我在这的活也要结束了。<page>唔……不废话了。你走吧！在旅团再见，到时告诉你跳蚤位置的情报。现在我要休息！
translated_text: Gollum. Insects are not fleas. why are you interrupting me? This position is mine, fair play, winning.<hpage>I won't stay long, ma 'am. I doubt your right to this cave.<hpage>I met your fellow fleas who had gathered in the caravan. Are you considering joining?<hpage>Your fur looks sturdy, but it itself lacks the strength to survive long in this land.<page>Caravan? ah ~! I feel it in my fur. The time for change has come. If the caravan approaches, my mission, this land, may be almost complete.<page>Currently, it is... Gollum. we talked a lot. Leave him alone! We met again in a best friend's caravan. So I shared what I know about fleas and pharo, until then, you need to rest! Stop it, bug!
secondary_translated_text: Gollum. Les insectes ne sont pas des puces. Pourquoi m'interromprez-vous ? Cette position est la mienne, fair play, gagner.<hpage>- Je ne vais pas rester longtemps, madame. Je doute de votre droit à cette grotte.<hpage>J'ai rencontré vos compagnons de puces qui s'étaient rassemblés dans la caravane. Envisagez-vous de rejoindre ?<hpage>Votre fourrure semble robuste, mais elle-même manque de force pour survivre longtemps sur cette terre.<page>Caravan ? Ah ~ ! Je le sens dans ma fourrure. Le moment du changement est venu. Si la caravane s'approche, ma mission, cette terre, peut être presque complète.<page>Actuellement, c'est... Gollum. Nous avons beaucoup parlé. Laissez-le seul ! Nous nous sommes retrouvés dans la caravane d'un ami. J'ai donc partagé ce que je sais sur les puces et les pharo, jusqu'à ce moment, vous devez vous reposer ! Arrêtez-vous bug !

original_en_text: Ohhhh! What other choice do we poor wretches have?! Cruel fate leaves us with only one last task...<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet! Forgive us, but we beg one more favour from you. Will you accompany us in our final act...?
original_zh_text: 唉！我们这些可怜虫别无选择！残酷的命运只留下这一最后任务……<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂女士！请原谅，但我们恳求您最后再帮一次忙。您可愿陪我们完成旅途的终幕……？
translated_text: Oh, my God. What choices do the poor make? A cruel life leaves us only the last.<page>My dear friends, miss hornet! Excuse me, but I'd like another one. will you please finish the last show?
secondary_translated_text: Oh mon Dieu ! Quels sont les choix que font les pauvres ? Une vie cruelle ne nous laisse que la dernière.<page>Mes chers amis, mademoiselle Hornet ! Excusez-moi, mais j'en voudrais un autre. Voulez-vous finir le dernier spectacle ?

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is ended, and we have a new Flea Juggle champion! Incredible!<page>Miss Hornet, with your skill, I’m certain you could best all three of our games and become the grandest champion of them all!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束！新的耍耍冠军诞生了！太强了！<page>以大黄蜂小姐的本事绝对能包揽我们三种游戏的冠军！
translated_text: vicarner! The game is over, and a new voiler has appeared! This is unbelievable!<page>Miss Hornet, I am sure that with your skills, you will be the best in our three races and the best champion in all races!
secondary_translated_text: Vicarner ! Le jeu est terminé, et un nouveau voilier est apparu ! C'est incroyable !<page>Miss Hornet, je suis sûre qu ' avec vos talents, vous serez la meilleure de nos trois courses et la meilleure championne de toutes les courses !

original_en_text: My, what a sweet face now emerges from the darkness! Poor Kratt has been hiding here from those blackened beasts for too long, all alone!<hpage>The beasts and bugs ensnared by the black thread are dangerous indeed. You have done right to hide yourself from them, sir.<hpage>That metal carriage... It is yours, I assume?<page>Ooh, yes, yes! I’m setting out to join the nearest flea caravan, aren’t I? Safety in numbers, yes? I’ve had more than enough of venturing alone.<page>And you... I trust I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly share with you when next we meet! Heh heh!
original_zh_text: 哇，没想到黑暗中竟出现这样一张美丽的脸！可怜的克拉特独自在这躲避黑丝好久了。<hpage>受丝咒侵蚀的虫兽确实危险，你躲起来是对的。<hpage>那金属车厢……是你的吧？<page>对对！我正要投奔跳蚤旅团呢！独行太危险了！<page>你……也会去旅团吧？那我们旅团再见，车厢里有惊喜等着你哟！
translated_text: In the darkness, a beautiful face appeared! Poor Crat had been hiding here for a long time alone from the darkened beast!<hpage>Beasts and insects caught in the black line are really dangerous. It's right to hide from them.<hpage>That metal carriage, I think it's yours.<page>Oh, yeah, yeah! i'm going to join the fleet of fleas recently, right? security, right? I was tired of taking risks alone.<page>And then you... do you think we can meet there? There is a special secret hidden in my carriage. I'd like to share it with you the next time we see you. what?!
secondary_translated_text: Dans l'obscurité, un beau visage apparaît ! Le pauvre Crat se cachait ici depuis longtemps seul à l'abri de la bête noire !<hpage>Les animaux et les insectes pris dans la ligne noire sont vraiment dangereux. Il est juste de se cacher d'eux.<hpage>Cette voiture métallique, je pense que c'est la vôtre.<page>Oh, oui, oui ! Je vais rejoindre la flotte de puces récemment, non ? sécurité, non ? J'en avais marre de prendre des risques seul.<page>Et puis vous... Pensez-vous que nous pourrons nous rencontrer là - bas ? Il y a un secret spécial caché dans ma voiture. Je voudrais le partager avec vous la prochaine fois que nous vous verrons. Quoi ? !

original_en_text: There are still many fleas for us to be united with though, and we’ve rested long enough. The caravan must head higher!<page>Oh, but stranger, how remiss of me! I introduced myself earlier without ever asking for your own name. Forgive me! Please, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<hpage>I still have a long journey ahead of me. If I come across any more fleas, I will assist where I am able.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing for me to hear!<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan must be away now, toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 虽然还有许多同胞未归，但我们休整太久了。旅团该向高处进发了！<page>哎呀我真是失礼！之前只顾自报家门，还没请教您的姓名？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴见你和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<hpage>我的旅途尚未结束，如果再遇见跳蚤，会尽力帮助他们的。<page>哎呀！这可太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: However, there are still many fleas that we need to unite, and we are well rested. The team needs to be higher!<page>But I wonder how lazy I am! I introduced myself before, but I didn't ask her name. Please forgive me! come on, what should i call you?<hpage>Call me Bumblebee, Master Frey. I'm glad to see your fellow fleas are safe in your fleet. Traveling alone is a dangerous land.<hpage>I still have a long way to go and if I encounter more fleas, I will do my best.<page>Wavenda! In other words, I cannot believe it! Glad to hear this news! "<page>My dear friends, Miss Bumblebee, our caravan must now set out for the vast swamp of the Highlands. Would you like to travel with us as a guest?
secondary_translated_text: Cependant, il y a encore beaucoup de puces que nous devons unir, et nous sommes bien reposés. L'équipe doit être plus grande !<page>Je me demande à quel point je suis paresseux ! Je me suis présentée avant, mais je ne lui ai pas demandé son nom. Pardonnez-moi s'il vous plaît ! Allez, comment devrais-je t'appeler ?<hpage>Appelle-moi Bumblebee, Maître Frey. Je suis heureux de voir que vos amis puces sont en sécurité dans votre flotte. Voyager seul est un pays dangereux.<hpage>J'ai encore un long chemin à parcourir et si je rencontre plus de puces, je ferai de mon mieux.<page>Wavenda ! En d'autres termes, je ne peux pas y croire ! Heureux d'entendre cette nouvelle ! "<page>Mes chères amies, Miss Bumblebee, notre caravane doit maintenant partir pour le vaste marais des Highlands. Vous souhaitez voyager avec nous en tant qu 'invité ?

original_en_text: So many awful places have us fleas travelled. Many times I almost die. But here is seems safe enough.<page>You will have rest too? Is space enough for us all now... friend.
original_zh_text: 旅团闯过了多少险地，好几回我都差点死了。但这里似乎很安全。<page>你也留下休息吧，朋友？现在地方够大。
translated_text: The flea went to a terrifying place and almost died many times. But it's safe enough here.<page>Do you want to rest too? Is there enough space for all of us? we're friends.
secondary_translated_text: La puce est allée dans un endroit terrifiant et a failli mourir plusieurs fois. Mais c'est assez sûr ici.<page>Vous voulez vous reposer aussi ? Y a-t - il assez d'espace pour nous tous ? Nous sommes des amis.

original_en_text: Welcome again, Miss Hornet! See how high our caravan has climbed, resting right on the doorstep of that mighty Citadel!<hpage>It is fortunate that all of your companions survived the trek, Fleamaster. The howling rise beside, and the tangled wood before it, have both claimed the lives of countless bugs.<page>Indeed! A perilous ascent! We have seen the many husks in passing. A mighty luck must shine on us, to journey with such success.
original_zh_text: 欢迎您，大黄蜂小姐！看我们攀得多高啊，就在圣堡大门旁！<hpage>你们能平安抵达这里实属万幸。旁边的峭壁和前边的丛林都葬送过无数旅行者。<page>确实凶险！沿途见到了无数空壳。我们定是受命运庇佑。
translated_text: Welcome, Miss Hornet! See how high our caravan climbed and stopped at the gates of the mighty castle!<hpage>Fortunately, all your companions survived the long journey, Flymaster. The barking of the neighbor and the tangled trees in front of him took the lives of countless insects.<page>It really is! Danger is rising! I have seen many shells in the past. We are fortunate to have such a success.
secondary_translated_text: Bienvenue, mademoiselle Hornet ! Voyez à quelle hauteur notre caravane monta et s'arrêta aux portes du puissant château !<hpage>Heureusement, tous vos compagnons ont survécu à ce long voyage, Flymaster. Les aboiements du voisin et les arbres enchevêtrés devant lui ont coûté la vie à d'innombrables insectes.<page>C'est vraiment ! Les dangers augmentent ! J'ai vu beaucoup de coquilles dans le passé. Nous avons la chance d'avoir un tel succès.

original_en_text: Look, look! So many fleas have joined the caravan! What a miracle! We can not thank you enough for honouring our humble wish!
original_zh_text: 看呐！这么多跳蚤加入了旅团！真是奇迹！真不知该如何感激您实现愿望！
translated_text: Look at me! Look at me! We have a lot of people on the team! what a miracle! Thank you for fulfilling our little wishes!
secondary_translated_text: Regarde-moi ! Regarde-moi ! Nous avons beaucoup de gens dans l'équipe ! Quel miracle ! Merci d'avoir accompli nos petits souhaits !

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? Would you seek service of me, ehh? Mine is knowledge much, the places of the lost little ones, heard and smelt across the caves.<page>You help find! And bring! Best we come together, we fleas all... now that times turn dark...
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？要我帮忙吗？我知道那些迷途小辈的踪迹，各处洞穴都有。<page>你来寻找！把它们带来！最好齐聚于此，全体跳蚤……趁黑暗未临......
translated_text: If you stay, aren't the bugs fleas? you're asking for my services, aren't you? I've learned a lot about the places in the lost caves where I hear and smell little things.<page>Help me find them! i'd better bring it and kill everyone. now the times are getting darker.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous restez, les insectes ne sont-ils pas des puces ? Vous demandez mes services, non ? J'ai beaucoup appris sur les endroits dans les grottes perdues où j'entends et sent les petites choses.<page>Aidez-moi à les trouver ! Je ferais mieux de l'apporter et de tuer tout le monde. Maintenant, les temps deviennent plus sombres.

original_en_text: As you wish, sweet one. Shall we just rest here together on the shore of eternity instead?
original_zh_text: 如你所愿，甜心。要不就和我在这岸边静静地守望末日？
translated_text: Whatever you like, honey. Will we rest together on the shores of eternity?
secondary_translated_text: Comme tu veux, ma chérie. Serons-nous réunis sur les rives de l'éternité ?

translated_text: Access to the spa?
secondary_translated_text: L'accès au spa ?

original_en_text: Mamashka! I am saying, let the game begin! Flea Juggle!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡！我是说，游戏开始！跳蚤耍耍！
translated_text: Congratulations, Mom! In other words, let's start the game! Flea tricks!
secondary_translated_text: Félicitations Maman ! Autrement dit, commençons le jeu ! Tricks de puces !

original_en_text: What a beautiful spot you’ve gifted us, Miss Hornet! Safe apart from the dark and death of the lands beside. A place for fleas to grow smart and strong.<page>Here we shall see our travels end, for in Pharloom there could be no finer place to settle.<hpage>I am glad the location suits, Fleamaster. It is a calming thing to know these many fleas may survive. Most bugs of Pharloom seem destined for far bleaker fates.<page>Indeed! A hopeful future awaits! And only because of yourself and your efforts. To commemorate our arrival, it would be my pleasure to perform a small service for you.<page>I have been learning to sew, and the little fleas have been gathering materials for me. I thought I could add an extra pocket to your tool pouch, to make your travels just a little easier.<page>A trifling favour, much less than you deserve, but still I hope it meets to your satisfaction!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐选的地方太好了！远离外面的危险，跳蚤们肯定能在这茁壮成长！<page>这里就是我们旅团的终点站了，纺络再找不到比这更好的归宿了！<hpage>合你们的心意就好。能有这么多跳蚤幸存，我也感到高兴。其他虫类大多没那么幸运。<page>没错！未来充满希望，这全仰赖您的帮助。为纪念乔迁之喜，请收下这份纪念品。<page>我最近学了缝纫，小家伙们也帮我收集材料。想给你的工具袋加个口袋，让旅途轻松些。<page>区区薄礼不足挂齿，希望您别失望！
translated_text: Miss Hornet, you have given us a wonderful place! " A place where fleas become wise and stronger away from darkness and death.<page>We end our journey here, as there is no more settlement in the farm.<hpage>I am glad this place is right, Master Nami. It is peaceful to know that the fleas will survive. Most falcon insects seem to have a more tragic fate.<page>It really is! A future full of hope awaits us! Only for yourself and your efforts. In commemoration of our arrival, I am pleased to offer you a small service.<page>I was learning how to sew, and fleas collected the materials for me. I think you can add an extra pocket to your bag to make your travel easier.<page>It's a small job much less than you deserve, but I still want it to satisfy you!
secondary_translated_text: Mademoiselle Hornet, vous nous avez donné un endroit magnifique ! Un endroit où les puces deviennent sages et plus fortes loin de l'obscurité et de la mort.<page>Nous terminons notre voyage ici, car il n'y a plus de colonisation dans la ferme.<hpage>Je suis content que ce soit le bon endroit, Maître Nami. Il est paisible de savoir que les puces survivraient. La plupart des insectes faucons semblent avoir un sort plus tragique.<page>C'est vraiment ! Un avenir plein d'espoir nous attend ! Juste pour vous et vos efforts. Pour commémorer notre arrivée, je suis heureux de vous offrir un petit service.<page>J'apprenais à coudre, et les puces ont recueilli les matériaux pour moi. Je pense que vous pouvez ajouter une poche supplémentaire à votre sac pour faciliter votre voyage.<page>C'est un petit travail beaucoup moins que vous ne le méritez, mais je veux quand même qu ' il vous satisfaise !

original_en_text: My dear Flea Bounce champion, will you play with us again? Let us dance and fly above the waters until the world itself falls away!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的蹦蹦冠军，要再玩一次吗？在水面上飞舞直至世界崩塌吧！
translated_text: My dear bounce champion, will you still play with us? Let's dance and fly on the water until the world disappears.
secondary_translated_text: Mon cher champion de rebond, tu veux toujours jouer avec nous ? Dansons et volons sur l'eau jusqu'à ce que le monde disparaisse.

original_en_text: Sweet one! What a delight to see you emerge from the horrible darkness now enveloping the world!<page>Poor Kratt feared he would have only his mangy fellow fleas for company at the end of everything. How kind of you to spend your last moments here with me!
original_zh_text: 甜心！没想到世界末日还能和你见面，真高兴！<page>可怜的克拉特本以为最后只能和脏跳蚤们作伴，多谢你在这最后时刻陪着我！
translated_text: honey! Glad you came out of the terrible darkness that covers the world!<page>Poor Crat was afraid that in the end he would only be a companion of the dirty fleas. I was so glad we spent the last few moments together!
secondary_translated_text: Honey ! Heureux que tu es sorti de la terrible obscurité qui couvre le monde !<page>Le pauvre rat craignait qu 'en fin de compte il ne soit qu' un compagnon des puces sales. Je suis tellement content que nous ayons passé les derniers moments ensemble !

translated_text: WASP
secondary_translated_text: Le WASP

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I took your request from the wishwall in the pilgrim camp. You are seeking fleas to join your caravan? I have found and freed many throughout my travels.<page>Oh yes, indeed! And look here, they all have made their way to us! So many gathered, it seems a miracle. Our wishes granted before even your promise was known!
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我在朝圣营地祈愿墙接下你的委托。你在召集跳蚤加入旅团？我在旅途中已经解救了许多跳蚤。<page>没错！看啊，它们全都归队了！我们的祈愿尚未传达，就已然实现，真是个奇迹！
translated_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I have received your request from the wishwall of the Pilgrim Camp. Are you looking for fleas to join your fleet? I have found and released many people in my journey.<page>Oh, yeah, yeah! Look, they're all coming here! It's a miracle that so many people have gathered. Before your promise was known, our wish was fulfilled!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, j'ai reçu votre demande sur le mur des souhaits du Camp des pèlerins. Vous cherchez des puces pour rejoindre votre flotte ? J'ai trouvé et libéré beaucoup de gens dans mon voyage.<page>Oh, oui, oui ! Regardez, ils viennent tous ici ! C'est un miracle que tant de gens se soient rassemblés. Avant que ta promesse ne soit connue, notre souhait a été accompli !

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is now ended, but you can play again, as much you wish... until the end of the world comes for us all!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！我是说，游戏结束，但随时可以重玩……直到世界末日！
translated_text: vicarner! The game is over, but you can play it again if you wish. Until the world ends!
secondary_translated_text: Vicarner ! Le jeu est terminé, mais vous pouvez le refaire si vous le souhaitez. Jusqu'à la fin du monde !

original_en_text: Stranger, will you hear my worry? The time has come for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened through generations before.<page>The many fleas of this kingdom should be flocking to our caravan, but times have become dangerous. You feel it too, yes? Our poor cousins, out there, in hiding!<page>Would you, could you, help us find these poor, lost fleas? We daren’t continue our journey until some of the poor dears have found their way here to us!
original_zh_text: 旅者，愿意跟我聊聊么？我们跳蚤的祖辈曾相聚同行，现在我想是时候召集同胞了。<page>本该有无数同胞来投奔旅团，可如今危机四伏，您也感受到了吧？可怜的同胞们还在外躲藏！<page>您……愿意帮忙寻找迷途的跳蚤们吗？同胞没有到齐我们不敢上路啊！
translated_text: stranger, can you hear my worries? Now is the time for us fleas to look for each other and travel together, as happened to previous generations.<page>Many fleas in the kingdom should swarm on our caravans, but the times are becoming dangerous. You feel it too, don't you? Our poor cousin is hiding out! "<page>will you help me find the lost flea? They have no courage to continue their journey until they are found by poor relatives.
secondary_translated_text: Étrange, tu entends mes inquiétudes ? C'est maintenant le moment pour nous puces de nous rechercher les uns les autres et de voyager ensemble, comme cela s'est produit pour les générations précédentes.<page>Beaucoup de puces dans le royaume devraient swarmer sur nos caravanes, mais les temps deviennent dangereux. Tu le ressens aussi, n'est-ce pas ? Notre pauvre cousin est en train de se cacher ! "<page>Voulez-vous m'aider à retrouver la puce perdue ? Ils n'ont pas le courage de continuer leur voyage jusqu'à ce qu ' ils soient retrouvés par des parents pauvres.

translated_text: What is a Flea Caravan?
secondary_translated_text: Qu 'est-ce qu' une caravane de puces ?

original_en_text: Alas, Miss Hornet! Until our paths cross again, our dearest wishes go with you.<hpage>Safe travels to you and your troupe, Fleamaster.
original_zh_text: 那好吧，大黄蜂小姐！愿好运常伴您左右，下次再见！<hpage>也祝你们一路平安。
translated_text: Oh, Miss Hornet! I wish we were more with you than our hearts before our paths meet again.<hpage>Fleamaster, we wish you and your troupe a safe journey.
secondary_translated_text: Désolé Mademoiselle Hornet ! Je voudrais que nous soyons plus avec toi que nos cœurs avant que nos chemins ne se rencontrent à nouveau.<hpage>Fleamaster, nous vous souhaitons, à vous et à votre troupe, un voyage en sécurité.

original_en_text: And so the great ceremony has reached its climax and its grand champion has emerged!<page>Thank you for spending your last moments with us here, Miss Hornet.<page>Though the world will soon end, and our paradise will crumble, the memories of friendship we all shared shall surely echo through the oncoming void for all eternity!<hpage>Fleamaster, your sentiment is kind, but this world will not end.<page>Oh? How good of you to speak words of hope for our benefit, but we have accepted our fate. Come, let us forget the past and revel together!<hpage>It is not merely hope that I offer you, sir, but a promise. This kingdom’s suffering has a singular cause, and by my own claw will it be cleansed.<hpage>Perhaps not every flea will survive what is coming... but the world will not die, and your settlement may still see chance to prosper.<page>Ahh? You speak... with such conviction. But I cannot bring myself to hope such, I am sorry.<page>Come what may, we fleas will be here until the end. And the games will continue, of course! Celebrate with us for as long as you wish, dear friend.
original_zh_text: 加冕仪式结束，庆典高潮已过，总冠军诞生！<page>大黄蜂小姐，感谢您与我们共度最后的时光。<page>纵使世界即将毁灭，乐园即将倒塌，我们的友谊也会永存于虚空之间！<hpage>谢谢你，跳蚤首领。但世界不会终结的。<page>感谢您在这最后关头还给我们希望，但我们认命了。还是及时行乐吧！<hpage>我给的并非虚无缥缈的希望，而是承诺。纺络的苦难都有源头，而我一定会亲手将其终结。<hpage>或许不是所有跳蚤都能幸存……但只要世界不毁灭，旅团终将再次启程。<page>啊哈哈，您这话……信念坚定。但我已不敢奢望。<page>无论如何，跳蚤们会坚持到最后。游戏永不停止！您想在这里玩多久都行，朋友！
translated_text: The festival has reached its climax and the great champion has appeared!<page>Thank you for spending your last hour here, Miss Hornet.<page>Even if the world perishes and the heavens fall apart, the memory of our friendship will echo forever in the void to come.<hpage>Fleamaster, your relationship is great, but the world won't end.<page>what? huh? It is wonderful that you have spoken words full of hope for us, but we have accepted our fate. Come on, let's forget the past and have fun together!<hpage>I give you not only hope, but also promise. The suffering of this kingdom has a unique cause, and I will cleanse it with my claws.<hpage>Not all fleas can survive what comes to them. However, the world will not die, and your settlement may still have a chance to thrive.<page>what? what? Tell me, with this belief. I'm sorry I didn't have hope for myself.<page>No matter what happens, we'll be here to the end. Of course, the game will continue! Dear friends, if you wish, you can celebrate with us.
secondary_translated_text: Le festival a atteint son apogée et le grand champion est arrivé !<page>Merci d'avoir passé votre dernière heure ici, Miss Hornet.<page>Même si le monde périt et que les cieux s'effondraient, le souvenir de notre amitié résonnera pour toujours dans le vide à venir.<hpage>Fleamaster, votre relation est excellente, mais le monde ne se terminera pas.<page>Quoi ? Huh ? Il est merveilleux que vous nous ayez prononcé des paroles pleines d'espoir, mais nous avons accepté notre destin. Allez, oublions le passé et amusons-nous ensemble !<hpage>Je vous donne non seulement de l'espoir, mais aussi de la promesse. La souffrance de ce royaume a une cause unique, et je la nettoie avec mes griffes.<hpage>Toutes les puces ne peuvent pas survivre à ce qui leur vient. Cependant, le monde ne mourra pas, et votre colonie aura peut - être encore une chance de prospérer.<page>Quoi ? Quoi ? Dites-moi, avec cette croyance. Je suis désolé de ne pas avoir eu d'espoir pour moi-même.<page>Quoi qu ' il arrive, nous serons là jusqu'à la fin. Bien sûr, le jeu va continuer ! Chers amis, si vous le souhaitez, vous pouvez célébrer avec nous.

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is ended, and we have a new Flea Juggle champion! Incredible!<page>You have proven yourself the champion at each of our flea games!<page>I am confident now that the grand champion of our festival has emerged. It is none other than yourself, of course!<page>And thusly, must our final ceremony begin. Fleas, prepare yourselves!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，新的耍耍冠军诞生！太强了！<page>您已称霸所有跳蚤游戏！<page>是当之无愧的庆典总冠军！<page>最终仪式现在开始！跳蚤们，做好准备！
translated_text: vicarner! The game is over, and a new voiler has appeared! This is unbelievable!<page>You've proven to be the champion of every flea contest we've won!<page>The overall winner of the music festival came out. Of course you do!<page>The final ceremony began. Flea, ready to go!
secondary_translated_text: Vicarner ! Le jeu est terminé, et un nouveau voilier est apparu ! C'est incroyable !<page>Vous avez prouvé être le champion de tous les concours de puces que nous avons gagné !<page>Le gagnant du festival de musique est sorti. Bien sûr que vous faites !<page>La cérémonie finale a commencé. Flea, prête à partir !

original_en_text: You not want my learnings, bug not flea? Rare it is we share such things with ones outside our own.
original_zh_text: 不想要我情报？我们可很少愿意和外族分享这些。
translated_text: don't you want to know that bugs aren't fleas? We rarely share it with people outside.
secondary_translated_text: Ne voulez-vous pas savoir que les bugs ne sont pas des puces ? Nous le partageons rarement avec les gens de l'extérieur.

translated_text: a flea juggling contest?
secondary_translated_text: Un concours de juggling ?

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, you are the greatest of us all in the Flea Juggle! But will you challenge yourself to ever higher achievements?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐是耍耍之王！要挑战更高记录吗？
translated_text: Miss Hornet, you are the best of the fleas! Do you challenge yourself to achieve higher results?
secondary_translated_text: Miss Hornet, vous êtes la meilleure des puces ! Vous mettez-vous au défi d'atteindre des résultats plus élevés ?

original_en_text: Dodeshna, stranger. You are looking a little... tired, is it? Unhealthy?<page>You can rest with us here, if wish. Is nice and dark, and warmth from below brings good health.<page>Still, you should make care not to stay much long. You are not flea, after all.
original_zh_text: 多德什纳，旅者。你看着……有点累？<page>想休息可以留下。这儿又暗又暖，很适合休养。<page>但别待太久，毕竟你终究不是跳蚤。
translated_text: Doshner, the stranger. You look a little. are you tired? unhealthy?<page>If you wish, take a break here. The weather is bright and dark, and the warmth below brings health.<page>However, be careful not to stay too long. After all, you are not a flea.
secondary_translated_text: Doshner, l'étranger. Vous regardez un peu. Vous êtes fatigué ? Malsaine ?<page>Si vous voulez, faites une pause ici. Le temps est lumineux et sombre, et la chaleur en dessous apporte la santé.<page>Attention cependant à ne pas rester trop longtemps. Après tout, vous n'êtes pas une puce.

original_en_text: You still here, bug? Is rest I need before I travel. Not chat. You is trouble-type. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I shall take my leave, madam. Stay strong on your own journey. May we meet again in more hospitable surrounds.
original_zh_text: 你怎么还在？我休息够了就走。别啰嗦，感觉你身上麻烦事不少，让我甲壳发紧。<hpage>那就告辞了，女士。祝你路上顺利，我们下次再见。
translated_text: are you still here, bug? It is a necessary rest before traveling. There is no chat. You strain the shell that is in trouble.<hpage>I have to go now, miss. Be strong in the journey. See you again in a lovely environment.
secondary_translated_text: Tu es toujours là, bug ? C'est un repos nécessaire avant de voyager. Il n'y a pas de chat. Vous détournez la coquille qui est en difficulté.<hpage>Je dois y aller maintenant, mademoiselle. Soyez fort dans le voyage. Rendez-vous dans un bel environnement.

original_en_text: Look, Miss Hornet! See the many lively fleas that form our caravan. Thanks to you and your hunting, so many are here! And all are eager again to travel!<page>We had once wished to match the numbers of our fabled past, yet now, we may even have exceeded them!<hpage>It is a welcome sight, Fleamaster, and the playful cheer about the caravan suggests you are a fine steward to the troupe.<page>Such kind words, Miss Hornet! How lucky we are to have found a friend so fair!<page>But now, we must away! These moors have been our host long enough. It is time to climb and hoist towards drier caves!<page>Good friend to fleas, would you join us on this next journey?
original_zh_text: 请看，大黄蜂小姐！这么多活蹦乱跳的同胞加入！多亏您帮忙，队伍越来越壮大。大家都盼着再度启程！<page>我们曾奢望恢复传说中的旅团规模，而现在或许已经超越了传说！<hpage>看见这么多跳蚤平安无事，我也很欣慰。他们的欢声笑语也证明了你是个称职的领队。<page>大黄蜂小姐过奖了！能结交您这样的朋友才是旅团的幸运！<page>但现在该启程了！沼地虽好，但不应久留，该向更干燥的洞窟进发了！<page>跳蚤之友，愿意与我们一起出发吗？
translated_text: Look, Miss Hornet! Look at the many active fleas that make up our fleet. Thank you so many people! There are so many people! Everybody wants to travel again!<page>We hoped to catch up with the legendary figures of the past, but now we may surpass them.<hpage>Fleetmaster, it is a popular sight, and the playful cheers of the caravan show that you are an excellent butler of the troupe.<page>You are so lovely, Miss Hornet! I am so lucky to have such a lovely friend!<page>But you have to go now! This land was our master for a long time. It's time to climb the dry caves!<page>Good friend of the flea, do you want to join us on our next journey?
secondary_translated_text: Regardez, mademoiselle Hornet ! Regardez les nombreuses puces actives qui composent notre flotte. Merci beaucoup de gens ! Il y a tant de gens ! Tout le monde veut voyager à nouveau !<page>Nous espérions rattraper les personnages légendaires du passé, mais maintenant nous pouvons les surpasser.<hpage>Fleetmaster, c'est un spectacle populaire, et les acclamations ludiques de la caravane montrent que vous êtes un excellent majordome de la troupe.<page>Vous êtes si jolie, Miss Hornet !
