secondary_translated_text: Ah ~ ! Ouais ! La douleur est ... Mon cœur me blesse. Pourquoi ? Les baies, un fruit ennuyeux. Oh, ma vision !<page>C'est une promesse d'espoir. Tu m'as donné ce dont j'avais besoin et tu étais à mes côtés. Il a surmonté les difficultés. Je ne peux pas demander plus.

original_en_text: Ahhh! Ahhh-ohhhh! The smell is right! Like the others! But very young! Oh, voice of the woods! Oh, dance of the queen! Oh... oh! Beat harder, let us hear it! Oh! Ohhhhhhhh!
original_zh_text: 啊啊！啊——噢！气味对了！就像其他！但尚幼嫩！啊，林间之声！啊，女王之舞！啊……啊！搏动吧，让我聆听！啊！啊啊啊！
translated_text: ah! ah! ah! ah! It tastes good! Just like everyone else! But young! "Sound of the forest! The Queen's Dance! ah... oh! Push it so you can hear it! oh! Oh, ha ha.
secondary_translated_text: Ah ! Ah ! Ah ! Ah !Ça goûte bien ! Comme tout le monde ! Mais jeune !« Le bruit de la forêt ! La danse de la reine ! Ah, oui. Ooh ! Poussez-le pour que vous puissiez l'entendre ! Ooh ! Ah, ha ha.

original_en_text: Sing, brothers and sisters! Sing, and drown out this burdensome sorrow! Sing out the name of this poor pilgrim, whose journey had nary begun!
original_zh_text: 唱吧，兄弟姐妹！用歌声淹没这沉痛哀伤！为这未启程便陨落的朝圣者高歌！
translated_text: Sing it, brothers and sisters! Let us sing and drown in this sorrow! Sing the name of the poor pilgrim whose journey has not yet begun.
secondary_translated_text: Chantez-le, frères et sœurs ! Chantons et noyons-nous dans cette douleur ! Chantez le nom du pauvre pèlerin dont le voyage n'a pas encore commencé.

original_en_text: Have you heard the talk of what waits just beyond this camp?<page>Brittle caverns of bone, the very base of Pharloom, filled with all manner of deadly creatures and jagged dangers.<page>It’s said ancient bugs once made their homes amidst it.<page>Who could believe! In such a hostile, unstable place! In all my time, I’ve never met a bug so brave.
original_zh_text: 你可曾听闻营地外的传闻？<page>骸骨脆岩构成纺络的基底，布满凶兽利齿。<page>据说古虫曾在此安家。<page>谁信啊！这种险恶之地！我这辈子没见过这么勇敢的虫。
translated_text: have you heard what's waiting outside the camp?<page>The fragile bone holes at the bottom of the farm are full of deadly creatures and creeping dangers.<page>It is believed that ancient insects lived there.<page>Who will believe! " In such an unstable, unstable place! I have never met such a brave insect.
secondary_translated_text: Avez-vous entendu ce qui vous attend à l'extérieur du camp ?<page>Les fragiles trous osseux au fond de la ferme sont pleins de créatures mortelles et de dangers rampants.<page>On croit que d'anciens insectes y vivaient.<page>Qui croirait ?« Dans un endroit si instable, si instable ! Je n'ai jamais rencontré un insecte aussi courageux.

original_en_text: Sister, sister! What is that long, gleaming tooth you carry with you? Is it a weapon?<hpage>It is indeed, though you need not fear. I will not raise it against you. Its edge is meant for predators and other foes.<hpage>I strongly suggest you arm yourself similarly before your own journey begins.<page>Alas... for a pilgrim, that’s sin you speak of, sister.<page>We arm ourselves with prayer, garb ourselves in faith, and hope they prove enough to reach the Citadel’s glory. Such is our way...
original_zh_text: 姐妹！你带的闪亮长牙是武器吗？<hpage>正是，但无需惧怕。此刃只与掠食者与敌手相向。<hpage>强烈建议你启程前也备件武器。<page>唉……姐妹此言对朝圣者实属亵渎。我等以祷言为刃，以信仰为盾，唯此方能抵达圣堡。此乃吾辈之道……
translated_text: sister! sister! What are the shiny teeth you have? is that a weapon?<hpage>It's true, but you don't have to be afraid. I will not tell you that. It is advantageous to predators and other enemies.<hpage>I strongly recommend arming yourself in a similar way before you go on a trip.<page>ah... For the pilgrim, that is what you call sin.<page>We may be armed with prayer, clothed with faith, and sufficient for the glory of the castle. That's how we do it.
secondary_translated_text: Sœur ! soeur ! Quelles sont les dents brillantes que vous avez ? Est-ce une arme ?<hpage>C'est vrai, mais vous n'avez pas à avoir peur. Je ne vais pas vous dire cela. Il est avantageux pour les prédateurs et les autres ennemis.<hpage>Je recommande fortement de vous armer de la même manière avant de partir en voyage.<page>Ah, oui. Pour le pèlerin, c'est ce que vous appelez péché.<page>Nous pouvons être armés de la prière, revêtus de la foi, et suffisants pour la gloire du château. C'est comme ça que nous le faisons.

original_en_text: Oh! Back again? The wishwall is up! Ready for all the poor souls who’ve been left behind down here.<page>In Pharloom, wishes are granted to those truly devout, or so they say. And there ain’t no harm in us dregs having wishes too.<page>Why, I even went and added a little wish of my own to the wishwall! Fair’s fair. I did build the thing. Seems like the kingdom should be granting my wish before anyone else’s.
original_zh_text: 哦！回来啦？祈愿墙完工了！就等底下这些可怜虫来许愿了。<page>纺络的愿望只赐给真正虔诚的虫，都这么说。但咱这些底层渣滓许个愿总不犯法吧？<page>嘿，我还在墙上偷偷加了自己的小愿望！公平嘛，墙是我造的，圣堡该先实现我的愿望才对。
translated_text: oh! you're back? The wall of wishes has risen! Prepare for the poor people here.<page>In the Fal, wishes are given to those who are truly devout and what they say. Whether or not our shit wants it.<page>I've added my own little wish to the wish wall! Fairness is fair. I have done this. The kingdom seems to grant my wishes.
secondary_translated_text: Ooh ! Tu es de retour ? Le mur des vœux s'est élevé ! Préparez-vous pour les pauvres.<page>Dans le Fal, les souhaits sont donnés à ceux qui sont véritablement pieux et ce qu ' ils disent. Que notre merde le veuille ou pas.<page>J'ai ajouté mon petit souhait au mur des souhaits ! L'équité est juste. J'ai fait cela. Le royaume semble accorder mes souhaits.

original_en_text: <hpage>What’s this you’re building, sir? A sign of some kind?<page>Aye, aye. You’re a sharp bug! A wishwall. It’s past time this old camp had one. As the resident fixer, I’ve taken it upon myself to sort it out.<page>They’re a popular thing about Pharloom, wishwalls. Useful too. So many prayers left unanswered. Gives ‘em a place to go.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生这是在建造什么？某种标识？<page>啊，好眼力！这是祈愿墙。这老营地早该有一个。身为驻场维修师，自然该由我操办。<page>祈愿墙在纺络可流行了，很实用。那么多没回音的祈愿，总得有个归处。
translated_text: <hpage>what are you making? what are the signs?<page>Yes, you are a sharp insect! The wall of wishes. There's one in this old camp. As a resident repairman, I am responsible for solving this problem.<page>These are the hits from "Wishing Wall" by Pharloom. This is also convenient. Many prayers were not answered. Give them a place to go.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Qu 'est-ce que vous faites ? Quels sont les signes ?<page>Oui, vous êtes un insecte vif ! Le mur des souhaits. Il y en a un dans ce vieux camp. En tant que réparateur résident, je suis chargé de résoudre ce problème.<page>C'est la chanson de "Wishing Wall" de Pharloom. C'est aussi convenable. Beaucoup de prières n'ont pas été exaucées. Donnez-leur un endroit où aller.

original_en_text: I must listen carefully... and pray with uninterrupted devotion. Only then will my faith be strong enough... to carry me upward...
original_zh_text: 必须专注聆听……虔心祷告。唯有如此，方能坚定信念，支撑我攀登……
translated_text: You have to listen carefully. Pray that you will not be interrupted. Only then will my faith be strong enough. " take me.
secondary_translated_text: Vous devez écouter attentivement. Priez pour que vous ne soyez pas interrompu. Ce n'est qu ' alors que ma foi sera suffisamment forte.« Prenez-moi.

original_en_text: S’not a surprise it’s you rallying us to action, hunter. You had the sense about you, a bug bringing change’n all.<page>Course you’re more than just a bug, aint’cha! More than Weaver. Guess it’d take someone like you for my family to dare hope at success.<page>Go and prove our trust now, won’t you? We’ve spent our lifetimes wishing for another path. With a bit of luck, you might grant it.
original_zh_text: 果然是你来召集我们行动，猎手。我初见便知你是变革者。<page>当然，你并非寻常虫类，也不止是织者。看来只有你这般存在，才让我族敢奢望成功。<page>现在就去证明你值得我们托付吧？我们毕生渴求踏上另一条道路。如果运气眷顾，你或许能成全我们。
translated_text: No wonder you take action, Hunter. They have a sense of mistakes in themselves that brought about change.<page>Of course, you're not just a bug, are you? More than weaver. I think only people like you can wish my family any success, and I'm not sure if I can.<page>Let's prove our trust right now. All our lives, we want a different path. If you are lucky, you may be able to achieve it.
secondary_translated_text: Pas étonnant que tu fasses ça, Hunter. Ils ont un sentiment d'erreurs en eux-mêmes qui ont apporté des changements.<page>Bien sûr, vous n'êtes pas juste un bug, n'est-ce pas ? Plus que Weaver ! Je pense que seuls des gens comme vous peuvent souhaiter du succès à ma famille, et je ne suis pas sûr de le faire.<page>Faisons preuve de notre confiance dès maintenant. Toute notre vie, nous voulons un chemin différent. Si vous avez de la chance, vous pourrez peut - être y parvenir.

original_en_text: Well. Though this pilgrim’s name has been lost, still we sing.
original_zh_text: 罢了。虽名讳已失，歌声依旧。
translated_text: All right, all right. Even when the names of the pilgrims disappeared, we continued to sing.
secondary_translated_text: Tout va bien, tout va bien. Même lorsque les noms des pèlerins disparaissaient, nous continuions à chanter.

original_en_text: Been hearing awful whispers in camp, about pilgrims driven mad by the hardships of the climb, crying out and attacking their fellows.<page>You’ve been out there. Tell me, is it really so?<hpage>You’ve heard it true, sir. On the roads, both pilgrims and beasts alike are consumed, driven to violence by a haunted thread, the source of which I have yet to discover.<page>Ah... I’d feared it was so. I won’t be able to trust a single face out on the path, then.<page>The risk of death was daunting enough, but the loneliness of such a journey, that seems almost too much to bear... Ah well. Just another test of our devotion, I suppose.
original_zh_text: 营地里常听到些可怖的流言，说攀登艰辛逼疯朝圣者，使其癫狂嚎叫，袭击同伴。<page>你是从外面来的。告诉我，真有这种事？<hpage>传言非虚，先生。路上朝圣者与野兽皆遭丝咒侵蚀，陷入狂暴，其源未明。<page>唉……果然。看来路上谁都不能信了。<page>死亡已经足够可怕，但独行的寂寞……简直难以承受……也罢，这是我等信仰必经的试炼。
translated_text: A terrifying whisper could be heard from the camp that pilgrims had gone mad at the difficulty of climbing the mountain, and had wept and attacked their companions.<page>you were there, tell me, are you really?<hpage>You may have heard that this is true. Along the way, pilgrims and beasts were swallowed up by ghostly threads, forcing them to engage in violent acts, but the origin of which was not yet known.<page>ah... Maybe that's what happened. I can't believe any faces on this road.<page>The danger of death is frightening enough, but the loneliness of such a journey seems almost unbearable... Well, it's just another test of our loyalty.
secondary_translated_text: Un murmure terrifiant pouvait être entendu du camp que les pèlerins étaient devenus fous de la difficulté de monter la montagne, et avaient pleuré et attaqué leurs compagnons.<page>Tu étais là, dis-moi, tu es vraiment là ?<hpage>Vous avez peut - être entendu dire que c'est vrai. Le long du chemin, les pèlerins et les bêtes ont été englouties par des fils fantômes, les forçant à se livrer à des actes violents, dont l'origine n'était pas encore connue.<page>Ah, oui. Peut - être que c'est ce qui s'est passé. Je n'arrive pas à croire les visages sur cette route.<page>Le danger de la mort est assez effrayant, mais la solitude d'un tel voyage semble presque insupportable. C'est un autre test de notre loyauté.

original_en_text: We pilgrims arm ourselves with prayer, garb ourselves in faith, and hope they prove enough to reach the Citadel’s glory. Such is our way...
original_zh_text: 朝圣者以祷言为刃，披信仰为甲，唯此方能抵达圣堡。此乃吾辈之道……
translated_text: We pilgrims, armed with prayer, clothed with faith, may we be sufficient for the glory of the castle. That's how we do it.
secondary_translated_text: Nous pèlerins, armés de la prière, revêtus de la foi, que nous soyons suffisants pour la gloire du château. C'est comme ça que nous le faisons.

original_en_text: <hpage>What duty binds you to this old chapel, madam? The structure barely stands, and I see no signs of congregation.<page>Aye! Gone! The lot’o them, fled and hidden. But I’m not leaving till I’ve set this place right...<page>...It’s that Citadel above, you see. Even now, in Pharloom’s long decline, the simple bugs, they’re witless before it. Too grand. Too majestic. Too powerful.<page>This building’s state is a sad example of those who’d dare suggest another path...
original_zh_text: <hpage>女士，是何职责将你束缚在这破败教堂？此处梁柱倾颓，更无信众踪影。<page>唉！都散了！逃的逃藏的藏。但我要留下……直到把这儿整顿妥当……<page>……你瞧，都是上头圣堡造的孽。即便纺络衰败至此，愚昧虫众仍对其俯首。太宏伟，太威严，太强大。<page>这座建筑的惨状，正是胆敢另辟蹊径者的下场……
translated_text: <hpage>What is your duty to this old church? The buildings were barely standing, and there was no sign of a gathering.<page>yes! yes! we go! Many of them fled and hid. But I won't leave until I have this place repaired.<page>... Take a look at the castle above. In the course of pharam's long decline, even now, these simple mistakes were foolish before. This is amazingly grand. Too strong.<page>The state of the building is a sad example for those who dare to propose another path.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Quel est votre devoir envers cette vieille église ? Les bâtiments étaient à peine debout, et il n'y avait aucun signe de rassemblement.<page>Oui ! Oui ! Nous allons ! Beaucoup d'entre eux ont fui et se caché. Mais je ne pars pas tant que je n'ai pas réparé cet endroit.<page>... Jetez un coup d'œil au château ci-dessus. Au cours du long déclin de pharam, même maintenant, ces erreurs simples étaient stupides avant. C'est étonnamment grand. trop forte.<page>L'état du bâtiment est un triste exemple pour ceux qui osent proposer une autre voie.

original_en_text: Eh? What fortune is this? Our wish answered, even in a moment so dark!<page>You’ve proved quite the saviour, miss, and you’ve certainly earned the appreciation of this whole sorry lot.<hpage>You are welcome, sir. For you few, I hope these supplies may aid.
original_zh_text: 哎呀！这什么好运？这么黑暗危险的时刻祈愿居然实现了。<page>您真是救星啊小姐，我们这群可怜虫都打心眼里感激您。<hpage>能帮上忙就好。希望这点补给对你们有用。
translated_text: what? what? what is this wealth? Even in these dark times, our wishes have been fulfilled!<page>Miss, you have proved to be the Savior, and indeed you have earned the praise of the poor.<hpage>Welcome to you, Doctor. For many of you, I hope these materials are helpful.
secondary_translated_text: Quoi ? Quoi ? Qu ' est-ce que cette richesse ? Même dans ces temps sombres, nos souhaits ont été réalisés !<page>Mademoiselle, vous vous êtes révélée être le Sauveur, et vous avez vraiment mérité les louanges des pauvres.<hpage>Bienvenue, Docteur. Pour beaucoup d'entre vous, j'espère que ces matériaux seront utiles.

original_en_text: You, in the cloak... pray tread softly. I am meditating, gathering my faith... before my pilgrimage begins.<hpage>My steps are soft enough, madam. If I have disturbed you, it was not my intent.<page>Ahh... even your speech... far too loud. I can scarcely hear my thoughts. Please, be away...
original_zh_text: 穿披风那位……脚步放轻。我在冥想聚神……为朝圣做准备。<hpage>脚步够轻了，女士。若打扰了你实非本意。<page>唉……连说话声……都太吵。静不下心。请快离开……
translated_text: You wear a mantle and pray lightly. I am meditating and gathering faith. Before the pilgrimage begins.<hpage>My feet are so soft, woman. Even if I interrupt, that's not my intention.<page>ah... Your speech too. There is so much noise that I can hardly hear my own thoughts. get out of there.
secondary_translated_text: Vous portez un manteau et priez légèrement. Je médite et j'acquière la foi. Avant le début du pèlerinage.<hpage>Mes jambes sont si douces, femme. Même si j'interrompe, ce n'est pas mon intention.<page>Ah, oui. Ton discours aussi. Il y a tellement de bruit que je peux à peine entendre mes propres pensées. Sortez de là - bas.

original_en_text: I see you’ve gone and opened up the great bone gate back there. And without even asking my permission! Feeling curious, were you?<hpage>There is a vast grave beyond. I’d assumed most bugs died climbing the path, but it seems many fell before their trek had barely commenced.<page>Aye! Lost their lives to beasts, or to luck turned rotten. Others were simply formed too frail.<page>At least those poor souls can rest together. Death and death and death, the eternal promise of our eternal kingdom. Eventually, it claims us all.
original_zh_text: 看来你擅自开了后头的巨大骨门，甚至问都不问我！不怕好奇害死虫？<hpage>门后是片巨冢。本以为众虫多是殒命在攀登途中，但似是有许多死于起步？<page>唉！有的死于猛兽，有的运气不好，也有天生孱弱的。<page>但至少这些可怜虫可以共眠。无止尽的死亡，永恒国度的永恒承诺，终将吞噬众生。
translated_text: There I saw him open a huge bone door and go away. Don't ask for my consent! You're very curious, right?<hpage>There is a huge grave in the distance. I thought most of the bugs died while climbing this path, but it seems that many bugs fell before the hike began.<page>yes! yes! Their lives are either taken away by beasts or corrupted by fate. The form of others is very fragile.<page>At least the poor soul can sleep together. Death is the promise of our eternal kingdom. In the end, it will take all of our lives.
secondary_translated_text: Là, je l'ai vu ouvrir une grande porte osseuse et s'en aller. Ne demandez pas mon consentement ! Vous êtes très curieux, non ?<hpage>Il y a un énorme tombeau au loin. Je pensais que la plupart des insectes mouraient en montant sur ce sentier, mais il semble que beaucoup d'insectes sont tombés avant que la randonnée ne commence.<page>Oui ! Oui ! Leurs vies sont soit enlevées par des bêtes, soit corrompues par le destin. La forme des autres est très fragile.<page>Au moins les pauvres âmes peuvent dormir ensemble. La mort est la promesse de notre royaume éternel. En fin de compte, cela prendra toutes nos vies.

original_en_text: Hunter! I’m thinking it was you that cleared my basement?<hpage>On first arrival here, the nesting creatures didn’t take kindly to my passing.<page>Ohho. They’re cranky bugs, alright. And they made an awful mess down here with their hatching and breeding.<page>You’ve my many thanks for seeing them off!
original_zh_text: 猎手！地窖里的那些家伙是你清理的？<hpage>初到此地时，那些栖居者可不待见我路过。<page>哈哈，都是些坏脾气的虫子。他们孵卵繁衍把下面搞得一团糟。<page>多谢你赶走了它们！
translated_text: hunter! did you clean my basement?<hpage>When I first came here, the creatures that made the nest were not very impressed with my death.<page>Oh, ho. They are annoying bugs, OK. The hatching and breeding caused confusion.<page>Thank you for sending me off! "
secondary_translated_text: chasseur ! Tu as nettoyé mon sous-sol ?<hpage>Quand je suis arrivé ici pour la première fois, les créatures qui ont fait le nid n'étaient pas très impressionnées par ma mort.<page>Oh, ho. C'est des bugs, ok. L'éclosion et l'élevage ont provoqué la confusion.<page>Merci de m'avoir envoyé ! "

original_en_text: <hpage>The bugs of your land, I have watched them, climbing towards their absolution without the flicker of a thought to what it means.<page>Aye. But isn’t it always such for those snared to serve your higher caste?<page>Our mortal mob did once act some defiance, unawares maybe, but successful in part, goaded towards it by Weavers’ will’n all.<hpage>You speak of the Citadel? Its former function has failed, but I can still sense its purpose, some. It is church and cage both.<page>Aye. Devised by your ancestors that monstrosity, and their wicked, clever minds. A system, or a web they’d likely call it, a way to keep their mother sealed in slumber, and themselves free to lavish in their false rule.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我观察了这片土地的虫。他们一心爬向救赎，却不懂这意味着什么。<page>是啊，但被你们高等族群使唤的不都这样。<page>我们凡虫不是没反抗过。当年被织者忽悠着，居然还真成了点事。<hpage>你说圣堡？虽然荒废了，还是能感觉到它的用途：既是教堂又是牢笼。<page>是啊。你祖辈造的这怪物，用狡猾心思织成网，让母亲陷入沉眠，自己却在外面称王。
translated_text: <hpage>I've seen the worms of your land ask for forgiveness, but I don't know what that means.<page>but isn't that what all the people who serve your higher caste do?<page>Our thugs resisted, perhaps unconsciously, but, by the will of Weaver and all the stimulation, they succeeded in part.<hpage>you mean the castle? The previous function has failed, but you can still feel the purpose. It is a church, it is a cage.<page>So, your ancestors created these monsters and an evil and intelligent mind. They might call it a system or a network, a way of letting their mothers sleep and spending their free time in the wrong rules.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'ai vu les vers de votre terre demander pardon, mais je ne sais pas ce que cela signifie.<page>Mais n'est-ce pas ce que font tous les gens qui servent votre caste supérieure ?<page>Nos voyous résistaient, peut - être inconsciemment, mais, par la volonté de Weaver et toute la stimulation, ils réussirent en partie.<hpage>Tu veux dire le château ? La fonction précédente a échoué, mais vous pouvez encore sentir le but. C'est une église, c'est une cage.<page>Ainsi, vos ancêtres ont créé ces monstres et un esprit malveillant et intelligent. Ils pourraient l'appeler un système ou un réseau, une façon de laisser leurs mères dormir et de passer leur temps libre dans les mauvaises règles.

original_en_text: <hpage>Maker, I bring a delivery from Bellhart below, lacquer for your long work.<page>Ahh. Know you distort the order of things, Old One. It is a rare want of your caste to serve us mortal bugs.<hpage>I am not my kin, Maker. I have seen enough pain born of their dominion. As much as I may, I choose to stand apart.<page>If your blood allows it so... And my thanks still for the lacquer. Pharloom’s fresh faces will welcome its sheen.
original_zh_text: <hpage>匠师，我从钟心镇送来漆料，够你用很久。<page>啊呀，古老者，这怎么合适。侍奉我们凡虫可不是你们族群的作风。<hpage>我和同族不一样。看够了他们统治下的苦难，自然不会同流合污。<page>不知您的同族会怎么想……但还是多谢漆料。纺络的新面孔会喜欢的。
translated_text: <hpage>Manufacturer, I have shipped from Burhart below to provide paint for your long term work.<page>Oh, I know you're distorting the order of things, old man. Serving the worms of us humans is a rare aspiration of your caste.<hpage>I am neither a relative nor a creator. I have seen enough of the suffering caused by their rule. It may be, but I choose to leave.<page>As long as the blood allows. He likes to paint. The fresh face of Faro is in the light.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Fabricant, j'ai expédié de Burhart ci-dessous pour fournir la peinture pour votre travail à long terme.<page>Oh, je sais que vous déformez l'ordre des choses, vieil homme. Servir les vers de nous, les humains, est une aspiration rare de votre caste.<hpage>Je ne suis ni parent, ni créateur. J'ai assez vu la souffrance causée par leur régime. C'est peut - être le cas, mais je choisis de partir.<page>tant que le sang le permet. Il aime peindre. Le visage frais de Faro est dans la lumière.

original_en_text: Until cavern’s collapse, the masks must be made!
original_zh_text: 直到洞窟崩塌，雕刻都不能停！
translated_text: We have to make a mask before the cave collapses!
secondary_translated_text: Il faut faire un masque avant que la grotte ne s'effondre !

original_en_text: Enough talk, Old One. My contract remains. I’ll work till caverns’ collapse.<hpage>Very well, Maker. If it is within my power to do so, I shall see your lands saved.
original_zh_text: 聊够了吧，古老者。契约还在，我要继续刻面甲，直到大地崩塌。<hpage>好吧，匠师。要是有办法，我会保护好这片土地。
translated_text: Enough, old man. My contract is still in effect. I'll work until the cave collapses.<hpage>Well done, Maker. If I can do that, I can save your land. "
secondary_translated_text: Assez, vieil homme, mon contrat est toujours en vigueur. Je travaillerai jusqu'à ce que la grotte s'effondre.<hpage>Bravo, Maker ! Si je peux le faire, je peux sauver votre pays. "

original_en_text: Ahh. Old One. Your kind should know it’s rude to expose me such. Unmasked, the task becomes heavy. <hpage>I had the desire to hear you lucid, Maker, though you may protest.<page>Aye. Well its no great shock to have you visit. I’ve felt the stirrings of our monarch, even all the way out here, the tremors of her kin brought close.<page>You’re planning a confrontation with her then? The one atop? Our great, frayed god?<hpage>Our meeting seems inevitable, though first I seek the strength to ensure a favourable outcome.<page>Ha! As I’d have guessed! Your ancient kind aren’t told to abide one another peaceably.<page>Well, assuming you prevail, I’ll ask only that my labour may continue. No matter the state of these lands, you should well know the necessity of my service.
original_zh_text: 啊呀，古老者，你们这一族最清楚，不戴面甲交谈太失礼了。<hpage>我就是想和清醒的你聊聊，别见怪。<page>好吧。不过我倒是不奇怪你会来。连我这都能感觉到那位的躁动，想必就是因为你。<page>所以你打算要去她算账？找我们伟大却又衰败的女王？<hpage>迟早要见，但我得先积蓄力量。<page>哈！早猜到了！你们古族从来都是窝里斗。<page>要是你赢了，我只求能继续刻面甲。无论王国结局如何，我的活都不能停。
translated_text: Oh, old man, a man like you should know that it would be impolite to expose me. When the veil is torn off, the work becomes difficult.<hpage>You may protest, but I want to hear your clear voice, the maker.<page>It's no shock that you're here. I felt the excitement of our monarch even here, even when the trembling of her relatives was nearby.<page>you're going to fight her? up there? a great and tired God?<hpage>Although our meeting seemed inevitable, I first sought strength to secure a favourable outcome.<page>yeah! As I guessed! The ancient people were not told to live in peace.<page>If I win, all I ask for is that my labor continue, and I will not be able to do so. Whatever the state of this land, you should be well aware of the need for my services.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, vieil homme, un homme comme vous devrait savoir qu 'il serait impoli de m'exposer. Quand le voile est déchiré, le travail devient difficile.<hpage>Vous pouvez protester, mais je veux entendre votre voix claire, le Faiteur.<page>Ce n'est pas un choc que vous soyez ici. J'ai senti ici même l'excitation de notre monarque, même quand le tremblement de ses parents était proche.<page>Tu vas la combattre ? Là - haut ? Un Dieu grand et fatigué ?<hpage>Bien que notre rencontre paraisse inévitable, j'ai d'abord cherché la force pour obtenir un résultat favorable.<page>Ouais ! Comme je l'avais deviné ! On ne disait pas aux anciens de vivre en paix.<page>Si je gagne, tout ce que je demande, c'est que mon travail continue, et je ne le pourrai pas. Quel que soit l'état de cette terre, vous devriez bien être conscient de la nécessité de mes services.

original_en_text: Back again, Old One? The effects of your... altercation with the pale mother... those are plainly sensed. The fate for these caverns feels grim.<page>I’ll take it things have taken a turn more complicated? Or was this the aftermath anticipated all along?<hpage>In our meeting, a mortal blow was dealt, but the monarch’s desperate death throes now threaten to take this whole kingdom with her.<page>Ha! I’m not surprised! It’s always the way, aye? Your ancient kind, vying for dominion, and us mortal bugs squashed unseen underneath.<hpage>It was freedom I sought, Maker. Naive perhaps, but this is not the fate I wished to come.
original_zh_text: 又来了古老者？我感觉到了你和苍白女王争斗……不过看来情况不太妙。<page>我猜事情变得复杂了？还是说你早料到会这样？<hpage>我给了她致命一击，可她临死挣扎要让整个王国陪葬。<page>哈！一点都不意外！你们古族争权夺利，我们小虫子活该被碾碎。<hpage>我想要自由，匠师。既为了我也为了你们。或许是有些天真，但这不是我要的结局。
translated_text: Are you back, old man? " It is obvious that your influence is pale and you will argue with your mother. The fate of this cave is severe.<page>do you think things are getting more complicated? Or is it the expected result?<hpage>We were struck with a fatal blow at the meeting, but the monarch's desperate pain of death now threatens the whole kingdom.<page>yeah! I'm not surprised! it's always the case, right? While your ancient species are vying for supremacy, our human insects are being crushed beyond sight.<hpage>That is the freedom I seek, Creator. It may be naive, but it is not the fate I wanted.
secondary_translated_text: Es-tu de retour, vieil homme ?« Il est évident que votre influence est pâle et que vous vous disputerez avec votre mère. Le sort de cette grotte est sévère<page>Pensez-vous que les choses deviennent plus compliquées ? Ou bien est-ce le résultat attendu ?<hpage>Nous avons été frappés d'un coup mortel à la réunion, mais la douleur désespérée de la mort du monarque menace maintenant tout le royaume.<page>Ouais ! Je ne suis pas surpris ! C'est toujours le cas, non ? Alors que vos espèces anciennes rivalisent pour la suprématie, nos insectes humains sont écrasés hors de vue.<hpage>C'est la liberté que je recherche, Créateur. C'est peut - être naïf, mais ce n'est pas le sort que je voulais.

original_en_text: All deserve a face. A chance to be! Until I wither, for the faceless I shall provide.
original_zh_text: 所有生灵都该有张脸，有机会存在！只要我还没倒下，就会给无面者造脸。
translated_text: Everyone has a face. chance! I will feed the faceless until I die.
secondary_translated_text: Tout le monde a un visage. Chance ! Je nourris les sans visage jusqu'à la mort.

original_en_text: To exist, to die, a face is needed. It is the essential thing.
original_zh_text: 不论死活，都得有一张脸。这是根本。
translated_text: You need a face to live and die. That is the most important thing.
secondary_translated_text: Il faut un visage pour vivre et mourir. C'est la chose la plus importante.

original_en_text: <hpage>Maker, I bring a delivery from Bellhart below, lacquer for your long work. <page>Good! Good! To seal. To protect. May Pharloom’s fresh faces gleam bright.
original_zh_text: <hpage>匠师，我从钟心镇送来漆料，够你用很久。<page>好！好！用来封存，用来保护。让纺络的新面孔闪闪发亮。
translated_text: <hpage>Manufacturer, I have shipped from Burhart below to provide paint for your long term work.<page>okay! okay! Sealed for protection. May Farrow's new face is shining.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Fabricant, j'ai expédié de Burhart ci-dessous pour fournir la peinture pour votre travail à long terme.<page>OK ! OK ! scellé pour la protection. Le nouveau visage de May Farrow est en train de briller.

original_en_text: Take reward for service made, visitor! Gift for you, to spend or treasure!
original_zh_text: 收下报酬吧客人！要用掉还是收着都行！
translated_text: Tourists will be rewarded for the services provided! A gift to you is either worth using or worth it!
secondary_translated_text: Les touristes seront récompensés pour les services fournis ! Un cadeau pour vous vaut la peine d'être utilisé ou vaut la peine !

original_en_text: A visitor! Grand you are. But you have already a mask. Already a face. It is for those without that I must carve.
original_zh_text: 欢迎！尊贵的客人。可你已经有面甲了，已经有脸了。我的刻刀只为无面者服务。
translated_text: Visitors! You are great, but you are already wearing a mask. I already have a face. You must sculpt for those who do not have it.
secondary_translated_text: visiteurs ! Vous êtes super, mais vous portez un masque. J'ai déjà un visage. Il faut sculpter pour ceux qui ne l'ont pas.

original_en_text: To work! To work! The masks must be carved.
original_zh_text: 雕刻！雕刻！必须继续雕刻面甲。
translated_text: Get to work! Go to work! The mask is sculpted.
secondary_translated_text: Allez au travail ! Allez au travail ! Le masque est sculpté.

original_en_text: Did you treat with the creature upon the summit?<page>Your legged ancestors once found her company compelling, enough to build their chambers and their calling device at the height of this perilous peak.<hpage>I have paid my respects, and been granted her favour. Her down now fills my cloak, and does much to ward against the frost of these heights.<page>To pass something so precious... That’s a mighty gift you’ve been given. Seems she’s thrown her lot in with you.<page>I’d not have guessed her so opposed to our threaded monarch, but then she too must have sensed the wretched state of things, and the harsher change to come.
original_zh_text: 见过山顶上那位了吗？<page>你那些多足的先祖对她十分信服，甚至在这么险的山峰上修了屋子打造机器。<hpage>我去拜访过了，也受到了她的青睐，得了这身御寒的绒毛。<page>连这个都送你……真是下了血本。她把宝押在你身上了。<page>没想到她这么反对苍白之主，恐怕她也看出纺络情况不对，有大事要发生了。
translated_text: Have you ever interacted with a creature on a mountain?<page>Your foot ancestors found attraction in her company to build a room and telephone equipment on this dangerous hill.<hpage>I respected her and won her favour. Her feathers now filled my mantle, and helped me greatly to endure this high frost.<page>Delivering something so precious. It is a powerful gift that you will receive. She seems to have given you her destiny.<page>I didn't expect her to be so opposed to our goddamn monarch, but she must have felt the misery of the situation and the imminent more serious change, too.
secondary_translated_text: Avez-vous déjà interagi avec une créature dans une montagne ?<page>Vos ancêtres de pied ont trouvé l'attraction dans sa compagnie pour construire une salle et un équipement téléphonique sur cette colline dangereuse.<hpage>Je l'ai respectée et gagnée sa faveur. Ses plumes remplissaient maintenant mon manteau, et m'aident grandement à supporter ce gel élevé.<page>Offrir quelque chose de précieux. C'est un cadeau puissant que vous recevrez. Il semble qu ' elle lui ait donné son destin.<page>Je ne m'attendais pas à ce qu ' elle soit aussi opposée à notre putain de monarque, mais elle a dû ressentir la misère de la situation et le changement imminent plus sérieux, aussi.

original_en_text: Ahh. Old One. Your kind should know it’s rude to expose me such. Unmasked, the task becomes heavy. <hpage>I had the desire to hear you lucid, Maker, though you may protest.<page>Aye. Well its no great shock to have you visit. I’ve felt, and heard, the effects of your... altercation with the pale mother... The fate for these caverns seems grim.<page>I’ll take it things have taken a turn more complicated? Or was this the aftermath anticipated all along?<hpage>In our meeting, a mortal blow was dealt, but the monarch’s desperate death throes now threaten to take this whole kingdom with her.<page>Ha! I’m not surprised! It’s always the way, aye? Your ancient kind, vying for dominion, and us mortal bugs squashed unseen underneath.<hpage>It was freedom I sought, Maker, for myself and for you mortal few. Naive perhaps, but this is not the fate I wished to come.
original_zh_text: 啊呀，古老者，你们这一族最清楚，不戴面甲交谈太失礼了。<hpage>我就是想和清醒的你聊聊，别见怪。<page>好吧。不过我倒是不奇怪你会来。我感觉到、听到了你和苍白女王争斗……不过看来情况不太妙。<page>我猜事情变得复杂了？还是说你早料到会这样？<hpage>我给了她致命一击，可她临死挣扎要让整个王国陪葬。<page>哈！一点都不意外！你们古族争权夺利，我们小虫子活该被碾碎。<hpage>我想要自由，匠师。既为了我也为了你们。或许是有些天真，但这不是我要的结局。
translated_text: Oh, the old thing. A person like you should know that it would be impolite to expose me. When the veil is torn off, the work becomes difficult.<hpage>You may protest, but I want to hear your clear voice, the maker.<page>It's no shock that you're here. I feel and hear your influence. The struggle with the pale mother - - the fate of these caves seems to be severe.<page>do you think things are getting more complicated? Or is it the expected result?<hpage>We were struck with a fatal blow at the meeting, but the monarch's desperate pain of death now threatens the whole kingdom.<page>yeah! I'm not surprised! it's always the case, right? While your ancient species are vying for supremacy, our human insects are being crushed beyond sight.<hpage>Creator, I ask for freedom for you and for you. It may be naive, but it is not the fate I wanted.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, la vieille chose ! Une personne comme vous devrait savoir qu 'il serait impoli de m'exposer. Quand le voile est déchiré, le travail devient difficile.<hpage>Vous pouvez protester, mais je veux entendre votre voix claire, le Faiteur.<page>Ce n'est pas un choc que vous soyez ici. Je sens et j'entends votre influence. La lutte avec la mère pâle - le sort de ces grottes semble être sévère.<page>Pensez-vous que les choses deviennent plus compliquées ? Ou bien est-ce le résultat attendu ?<hpage>Nous avons été frappés d'un coup mortel à la réunion, mais la douleur désespérée de la mort du monarque menace maintenant tout le royaume.<page>Ouais ! Je ne suis pas surpris ! C'est toujours le cas, non ? Alors que vos espèces anciennes rivalisent pour la suprématie, nos insectes humains sont écrasés hors de vue.<hpage>Créateur, je demande la liberté pour vous et pour vous. C'est peut - être naïf, mais ce n'est pas le sort que je voulais.

original_en_text: Late! Late you are! And already a mask. Already a face. It is for those without that I must carve.
original_zh_text: 迟了！太迟了！你已经有面甲了，已经有脸了。我的刻刀只为无面者服务。
translated_text: we're late! i'm late! He already has a mask. I already have a face. You must sculpt for those who do not have it.
secondary_translated_text: Nous sommes en retard ! Je suis en retard ! Il a déjà un masque. J'ai déjà un visage. Il faut sculpter pour ceux qui ne l'ont pas.

original_en_text: Have some small reward for your troubles, Old One. It’s no small thing to deliver that sloshing stuff safe, ‘specially all the way up here.
original_zh_text: 古老者，请收下这点酬劳。抱着晃荡的漆罐爬这么高不容易。
translated_text: This is a small reward for the elderly. The safe transportation of a shaken thing is no small thing, especially here.
secondary_translated_text: C'est une petite récompense pour les personnes âgées. Le transport sûr d'une chose secouée n'est pas une petite chose, surtout ici.

original_en_text: A fine face, yours. Not of my work. Not of this kingdom’s craft. Not now at least.<page>But the deeper form. Distant relationship. Some form of Pharloom and our old, legged, stewards. <page>Now! To work. To work! The masks are needed.
original_zh_text: 你这张脸不错。不是我的手艺，也不是纺络的手艺。至少现在不是。<page>但更深处，有渊源。和古时候那些多足管事的一样。<page>好了！干活！干活！需要更多面甲！
translated_text: Your face is beautiful. it's not my job, it's not the art of the kingdom. At least for now.<page>In a deeper form. A distant relationship. A kind of long-legged housewife with our old Fal.<page>now! Time to work! You need a mask.
secondary_translated_text: Ton visage est beau. Ce n'est pas mon travail, ce n'est pas l'art du royaume. Du moins pour l'instant<page>sous une forme plus profonde. Une relation lointaine. Une sorte de femme au foyer à longues jambes avec notre vieux Fal.<page>Maintenant ! Temps de travailler ! Vous avez besoin d'un masque

original_en_text: <hpage>You have the sight, Maker. Tell me what you see in me?<page>Your mask... It reads clear enough, Old One. Watcher, hunter, monarch even, though you may reject that station.<page>A complex visage, perhaps, yet still to my sight it looks unresolved.<hpage>If you see a transitional state, it is one I have accepted. My mask has remained defined through lifetimes uncounted.<page>Aye. Rigid I’m sure, but your kind rarely develop evenly, and the lifetime of bugs are poor measure for one like you.<page>Could be there’s more growth awaiting you yet...
original_zh_text: <hpage>匠师好眼力。在我身上看到什么了？<page>你的面甲……上面清清楚楚。守望者，猎手，甚至君主——就算你不认最后这个。<page>挺复杂的一张脸，但在我看来还没定型。<hpage>如果是过渡状态，那我早已接受。这面甲已陪我度过了不知多少辈子的时间。<page>是啊。不过你们古族生长发育不合常理，我们虫子的几辈子可没法衡量你的年纪。<page>说不定你还能再长大呢……
translated_text: <hpage>I have a vision, Creator. what do you see in me?<page>You can see the mask clearly, old man. Even the watchman, the hunter, the king, you can refuse that place.<page>It may be a complicated face, but in my opinion it hasn't been solved yet.<hpage>If you look at the change, it's the change I've embraced. And my mask stays in shape for a lifetime.<page>It is hard indeed, but people like you are rarely evenly developed, and for people like you the life of a worm is the worst.<page>You may still be waiting for your growth.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'ai une vision, créateur. Qu 'est-ce que tu vois en moi ?<page>Vous voyez clairement le masque, vieil homme, même le sentinel, le chasseur, le roi, vous pouvez refuser cet endroit.<page>C'est peut - être un visage compliqué, mais à mon avis, il n'a pas encore été résolu.<hpage>Si vous regardez le changement, c'est le changement que j'ai embrassé. Et mon masque reste en forme pour toute une vie.<page>C'est dur, certes, mais les gens comme vous sont rarement uniformément développés, et pour les gens comme vous, la vie d'un ver est la pire.<page>Peut - être que vous attendez votre croissance.

original_en_text: Our world cries its end! But the masks must still be carved.
original_zh_text: 虽然世界在哀嚎！但面甲还得继续刻。
translated_text: The world is finished! " The mask needs to be sculpted.
secondary_translated_text: Le monde est terminé !« Le masque doit être sculpté.

original_en_text: Enough talk, Old One. Mine is a calling that scant allows rest.<hpage>Very well, Maker. I shall take my leave.
original_zh_text: 聊够了吧，古老者。我的使命可不让休息。<hpage>好吧，匠师。告辞了。
translated_text: Enough, old man. My career was almost uninterrupted.<hpage>Well done, Maker. I'm going.
secondary_translated_text: Assez, vieil homme, ma carrière a été presque ininterrompue.<hpage>Bravo, Maker ! Je vais aller.

original_en_text: To exist, a face is needed. It is the essential thing.
original_zh_text: 要存在，就得有张脸。这是根本。
translated_text: We need a face to survive, and that's the most important thing.
secondary_translated_text: Nous avons besoin d'un visage pour survivre, et c'est le plus important.

original_en_text: Clever Nuu must know them all!
translated_text: Smart New should know!
secondary_translated_text: Smart New devrait le savoir !

original_en_text: Wings that beat, legs that crawl...
original_zh_text: 振翅的飞者，爬行的走兽……
translated_text: Shining wings, crawling legs.
secondary_translated_text: Des ailes brillantes, des jambes rampantes.

original_en_text: In waters deep and caverns tall...
translated_text: Water depth, hole height
secondary_translated_text: Profondeur d'eau, hauteur du trou

translated_text: Let's shrink and catch the prey!
secondary_translated_text: Rétrécissons-nous et attraperons la proie !

translated_text: ... Climb the service.
secondary_translated_text: ... escalade le service.

translated_text: Call of the Guardian.
secondary_translated_text: L'appel du gardien.

translated_text: hatch! Hatch!
secondary_translated_text: Hatch ! Hatch !

translated_text: Look at my work.
secondary_translated_text: Regardez mon travail.

translated_text: Please listen to me. I'm always...
secondary_translated_text: S'il vous plaît écoutez-moi, je suis toujours...

translated_text: lay down.
secondary_translated_text: Lay Down.

translated_text: No one is going hungry.
secondary_translated_text: Personne n'a faim.

translated_text: Let's go on this path.
secondary_translated_text: Allons sur ce chemin.

translated_text: the blood of the world boiled.
secondary_translated_text: Le sang du monde bouillait.

original_en_text: Mark of circle, mark of death...
translated_text: The sign of the circle, the sign of death.
secondary_translated_text: Le signe du cercle, le signe de la mort.

original_en_text: The road behind us, all dangers passed...
translated_text: On the road behind us, all the dangers have passed.
secondary_translated_text: Sur la route derrière nous, tous les dangers sont passés.

original_en_text: Darn it. Stitch it. Make it whole...
translated_text: fuck you! Stitched together. Complete:
secondary_translated_text: Merde à toi ! Stitched ensemble. complète :

translated_text: ... Repair... Infinite.
secondary_translated_text: ... Réparation... infini.

translated_text: ... Sowing the seeds. to grow.
secondary_translated_text: ... semer les graines.à grandir.

translated_text: The Black Line.
secondary_translated_text: la ligne noire.

translated_text: She has broken us.
secondary_translated_text: Elle nous a cassés.

translated_text: why us?
secondary_translated_text: Pourquoi nous ?

translated_text: It will always be ours.
secondary_translated_text: Il sera toujours le nôtre.

translated_text: Slowly, he was disappearing.
secondary_translated_text: Lentement, il disparaissait.

translated_text: There is no nest and no home...
secondary_translated_text: Il n'y a pas de nid et pas de maison...

translated_text: why us?
secondary_translated_text: Pourquoi nous ?

translated_text: Our cave.
secondary_translated_text: Notre cave.

translated_text: Our darkness.
secondary_translated_text: Nos ténèbres.

original_en_text: To hide... To nest... To live...
translated_text: Hide and build a nest. A lifetime.
secondary_translated_text: Cacher et construire un nid. une vie.

translated_text: The touch of the nail. A warm whisper.
secondary_translated_text: Le toucher de l'ongle. Un murmure chaud.

translated_text: Shiny, short, no.
secondary_translated_text: Brillant, court, non.

translated_text: I praise your chains.
secondary_translated_text: Je loue tes chaînes.

translated_text: Always something different.
secondary_translated_text: Toujours quelque chose de différent.

translated_text: Let's shine together!
secondary_translated_text: Brillons ensemble !

original_en_text: None may die! None may die!
translated_text: No one dies! " No one will die!
secondary_translated_text: Personne ne meurt !« Personne ne mourra !

translated_text: Please burn them. They bite.
secondary_translated_text: Veuillez les brûler. Ils mordent.

translated_text: ... Climb up.
secondary_translated_text: ... Climb up.

translated_text: ... All the glory.
secondary_translated_text: ... Toute la gloire.

translated_text: Their hearts are connected.
secondary_translated_text: Leurs cœurs sont connectés.

translated_text: The smell of biting.
secondary_translated_text: L'odeur de mordre.

translated_text: I can smell it.
secondary_translated_text: Je peux sentir ça.

translated_text: ... Please help me.
secondary_translated_text: ... S'il vous plaît, aidez-moi.

translated_text: ... Everything's rotten.
secondary_translated_text: ... Tout est rot.

translated_text: ... Color is dark.
secondary_translated_text: ... La couleur est sombre.

original_en_text: Chase the prey fled in fear...
translated_text: They chase prey that fled from fear.
secondary_translated_text: Ils chassent des proies qui fuient de la peur.

translated_text: The pilgrims... All of them...
secondary_translated_text: Les pèlerins... Tous d'entre eux...

translated_text: ... Everyone's life.
secondary_translated_text: ... la vie de chacun.

translated_text: ... All of your will.
