translated_text: The Old Blade of the Farm, the Princess Medal badge.<br><br>Reduce needle charging time.
secondary_translated_text: La vieille lame de la ferme, l'insigne de la médaille de la princesse.<br><br>Réduire le temps de chargement de l'aiguille.

original_en_text: Radial sharpbone used by skilled hunters to take down dangerous prey.
original_zh_text: 高阶猎手使用的放射状锐骨武器，用于猎杀危险猎物。
translated_text: Skilled hunters prey on dangerous prey with their sharp radial bones.
secondary_translated_text: Les chasseurs habiles proies dangereuses avec leurs os radiaux tranchants.

translated_text: The Dead Worm Wallet
secondary_translated_text: Le portefeuille Dead Worm

translated_text: About Plasma Collection
secondary_translated_text: Collecte de plasma

translated_text: Flavor Lantern
secondary_translated_text: Flair Lanterne

translated_text: Sick Speed ankle
secondary_translated_text: Sick Speed Cheville

original_en_text: Equip Tools in the Crest menu<br>while resting at a bench.
original_zh_text: 在长椅休息时，于纹章界面装备工具。
translated_text: Rigging tools with Crest menu<br>Sitting on the bench and rest.
secondary_translated_text: Outils de rigage avec menu Crest<br>Asseyez-vous sur le banc et reposer.

translated_text: The witches.
secondary_translated_text: Les sorcières.

original_en_text: Arched sharpbone used by hunters to take down flying prey.
original_zh_text: 猎手使用的弧形锐骨武器，用于猎杀飞行目标。
translated_text: An arched, pointed bone used by hunters to shoot down flying prey.
secondary_translated_text: Un os arqué et pointu utilisé par les chasseurs pour abattre des proies volantes.

original_en_text: Reload Tools while resting at a bench.
original_zh_text: 在长椅休息时装填工具。
translated_text: Lying on the bench, he takes out his tools.
secondary_translated_text: Allongé sur le banc, il sort ses outils.

translated_text: Christy is not the same.
secondary_translated_text: Christy n'est pas la même chose.

original_en_text: Intricate tracking device, carved from shell.<br><br>When equipped, the bearer’s location will be marked on their map.
original_zh_text: 甲壳雕刻的精密追踪装置<br><br>装备后可在地图标记持有者位置。
translated_text: A complex tracking device carved out of a shell.<br><br>When the equipment is complete, the airline's location will be displayed on the map.
secondary_translated_text: Un dispositif de suivi complexe taillé dans une coquille.<br><br>Lorsque l'équipement est terminé, l'emplacement de la compagnie aérienne sera affiché sur la carte.

original_en_text: To change Crest, open the Crest screen of the Menu while resting at a bench.
original_zh_text: 要更换纹章，请在长椅休息时打开纹章界面。
translated_text: To change the crest, open the crest screen in the desktop menu.
secondary_translated_text: Pour modifier le crête, ouvrez l'écran du crête dans le menu du bureau.

translated_text: the skin of the needle
secondary_translated_text: La peau de l'aiguille

original_en_text: Artificial spine that clasps tight around the shell.<br><br>Enhances the wearer’s innate flexibility, allowing rapid retreat.
original_zh_text: 紧扣甲壳的金属脊柱。<br><br>增强持有者灵活性，实现快速撤离。
translated_text: An artificial spine firmly anchored to the shell.<br><br>Increases the wearer's unique flexibility, allowing for quick detachment.
secondary_translated_text: Une colonne vertébrale artificielle fermement ancrée à la coquille.<br><br>Augmente la flexibilité unique du porteur, permettant un détachement rapide.

translated_text: Mr. Trapper,
secondary_translated_text: Monsieur Trapper,

original_en_text: Convertible orbs containing electricity.<br><br>The vessels can be thrown as a bola for an explosive discharge or staked as a spear to release a column of energy.
original_zh_text: 可转换形态的带电球体。<br><br>作为流星锤投掷引爆，或作为标枪固定释放能量柱。
translated_text: The convertible sphere contains electricity.<br><br>These containers can be used as explosives for dropping bombs, or as spears for releasing energy columns.
secondary_translated_text: La sphère convertible contient de l'électricité.<br><br>Ces conteneurs peuvent être utilisés comme explosifs pour larguer des bombes, ou comme lances pour libérer des colonnes d'énergie.

translated_text: Machinery equipment tools
secondary_translated_text: Machines outils équipements

translated_text: A bad technique.
secondary_translated_text: Mauvaise technique.

original_en_text: Silk-storing tool of the Citadel, fashioned after an artefact of the Weavers.<br><br>Allows the storing of additional Silk beyond one’s natural abilities.
original_zh_text: 圣堡仿织者遗器制作的储丝装置。<br><br>可突破自然限制储存额外灵丝。
translated_text: The castle's silk storehouse is designed based on the handicrafts of the textile craftsmen.<br><br>It can store excess silk beyond the capacity of nature.
secondary_translated_text: L'entrepôt de soie du château est conçu sur la base de l'artisanat des artisans textiles.<br><br>Il peut stocker un excès de soie au-delà de la capacité de la nature.

original_en_text: Crude trinket worn by collectors and crafters.<br><br>Allows one to collect more shell shards from defeated creatures.
original_zh_text: 采集者与工匠佩戴的粗制饰品。<br><br>击败敌人时可获取更多甲壳碎片。
translated_text: A coarse little thing for collectors and knitters.<br><br>You can collect more shells from defeated creatures.
secondary_translated_text: Une petite chose grossière pour les collectionneurs et les tricoteurs.<br><br>Vous pouvez collecter plus de coquilles de créatures vaincues.

translated_text: Choice of Reporter
secondary_translated_text: Choix de journaliste

translated_text: Reserve single
secondary_translated_text: Réserve unique

original_en_text: Gilded piton that allows one to hold in place while on a wall.
original_zh_text: 镀金岩钉，允许在墙面上固定位置。
translated_text: The gold plated stone nail can be fixed to the wall.
secondary_translated_text: Le clou de pierre plaqué or peut être fixé au mur.

original_en_text: Tool designed to extract and store fluids.<br><br>To pierce its target, the Needle Phial must first be charged to full tension.
original_zh_text: 设计用于提取储存液体的工具。<br><br>需蓄满张力才能穿透目标。
translated_text: Tools for extracting and storing liquids.<br><br>To penetrate the target, the fial needle must first be filled with tension.
secondary_translated_text: Outils pour l'extraction et le stockage de liquides.<br><br>Pour pénétrer la cible, l'aiguille de fial doit d'abord être remplie de tension.

translated_text: Magnetite die
secondary_translated_text: Magnetite Die

translated_text: Magma Clock
secondary_translated_text: Horloge magmatique

translated_text: Flint slate
secondary_translated_text: Flint Slate

original_en_text: Icon of the mythical mother flea, passed down from caravans of old. A symbol of protection and kinship.<br><br>Decreases the cost of Silk Skills while health is full.
original_zh_text: 旅团传承的传说跳蚤之母圣像，象征庇护与亲缘。<br><br>生命值全满时降低灵丝技能消耗。
translated_text: The mythical idol of the mother of fleas has been inherited from the ancient caravans. Symbols of protection and emotion.<br><br>When your health points are full, you will reduce the cost of silk skills.
secondary_translated_text: L'idole mythique de la mère des puces a été héritée des caravanes anciennes. Symbole de protection et d'émotion.<br><br>Lorsque vos points de santé sont pleins, vous réduisez le coût des compétences en soie.

translated_text: Pimilo
secondary_translated_text: Pimoine

original_en_text: Gleaming apparatus of Weaver make. Its core emits a faint glow.<br><br>Increases the speed of Silk regeneration.
original_zh_text: 织者制造的发光装置，核心散发微光。<br><br>提升灵丝恢复速度。
translated_text: Weaver built a lighting device. The core emits a faint light.<br><br>Increase the recovery speed of silk.
secondary_translated_text: Weaver a construit un dispositif d'éclairage. Le noyau émet une faible lumière.<br><br>Augmenter la vitesse de récupération de la soie.

original_en_text: Powerful amulet of protection formed from many Mossberries.<br><br>As the bearer takes damage, the amulet weeps a green elixir that will form into Silk.
original_zh_text: 多重苔莓强化的护身符。<br><br>持有者受伤时，护符会渗出可转化为灵丝的绿液。
translated_text: A powerful protector made with lots of moss fruits.<br><br>When the owner is injured, the amulet falls from the green panacea and becomes silk.
secondary_translated_text: Un puissant protecteur fait avec beaucoup de fruits de mousse.<br><br>Lorsque le propriétaire est blessé, l'amulette tombe de la panacée verte et devient de la soie.

translated_text: Silk skills cannot be equipped.
secondary_translated_text: Les compétences en soie ne peuvent pas être équipées.

translated_text: Equipment skill set
secondary_translated_text: Équipement Skills Set

translated_text: Collected bile.
secondary_translated_text: collecte de bile.

translated_text: Barb Bracelet
secondary_translated_text: bracelet barb

original_en_text: Equip tools for aid in combat or exploration.
original_zh_text: 装备工具以辅助战斗或探索。
translated_text: In combat and adventure, equip yourself with tools.
secondary_translated_text: Dans le combat et l'aventure, équiper-vous avec des outils.

original_en_text: Heavy band favoured by those with an unsteady step.<br><br>The wearer will recoil less when striking foes and will not be flung as far when taking damage.
original_zh_text: 步履不稳者偏好的重环。<br><br>攻击和受击时不易后退。
translated_text: Heavy bands are popular with people with unstable paces.<br><br>It has less reaction when attacking an enemy, and can't be thrown far even after damage.
secondary_translated_text: Les bandes lourdes sont populaires auprès des personnes ayant un rythme instable.<br><br>Il a moins de réaction lorsqu 'il attaque un ennemi et ne peut pas être jeté loin même après avoir subi des dégâts.

original_en_text: Talisman fashioned from the talon of a large predator.<br><br>Increases the range of needle attacks.
original_zh_text: 大型掠食者利爪制成的护符。<br><br>增加织针攻击范围。
translated_text: A talisman made from the claws of a huge predator.<br><br>Broaden the scope of acupuncture.
secondary_translated_text: Un talisman fabriqué à partir des griffes d'un énorme prédateur.<br><br>Élargir la portée de l'acupuncture.

original_en_text: Shattered flask which once contained an invigorating beverage.<br><br>Acquire more Flea Brew to restore the tool.
original_zh_text: 曾装有活力饮品的破碎瓶。<br><br>需获取更多跳蚤秘酿补充。
translated_text: The broken flask once contained a soft drink.<br><br>Get more Flea Brew to restore the tool.
secondary_translated_text: La bouteille cassée contenait une boisson gazeuse.<br><br>Obtenez plus de Flea Brew pour restaurer l'outil.

translated_text: Throwing the ring.
secondary_translated_text: Jeter la bague.

original_en_text: Ancient weapon of the Weavers, repaired to its original form.<br><br>Uses shell canisters and the wielder’s own Silk to fire.
original_zh_text: 修复至原始形态的织者古兵器。<br><br>需消耗甲壳罐与使用者的灵丝发射。
translated_text: The old weapon returned to its original form.<br><br>Photograph taken using a shell can and the owner's own silk.
secondary_translated_text: L'ancienne arme est revenue à sa forme originale.<br><br>Photographie prise à l'aide d'une boîte de coquille et de la propre soie du propriétaire.

translated_text: Cylindrical Pin
secondary_translated_text: Pin cylindrique

original_en_text: Spin the needle as a screw, shredding foes. Spend Silk to rapidly craft new tools.
original_zh_text: 旋转织针撕裂敌人。消耗灵丝快速制作新工具。
translated_text: They turn the needle like a screw to crush the enemy. Flower Silk creates new tools quickly.
secondary_translated_text: Ils tournent l'aiguille comme une vis pour écraser l'ennemi. Flower Silk crée rapidement de nouveaux outils.

translated_text: The memory crystal.
secondary_translated_text: le cristal de mémoire.

original_en_text: Flat, layered weapon, crafted to be thrown in a set.
original_zh_text: 分层扁平武器，可成套投掷。
translated_text: A well-crafted flat, layered weapon can be placed in a set.
secondary_translated_text: Une arme plate et en couches bien conçue peut être placée dans un ensemble.

translated_text: Skylight
secondary_translated_text: skylight

original_en_text: The Citadel is calling us, sister! We stand so close. We need only the blessing of those bells to see the Grand Gate open.<hpage>I will awaken the bells, pilgrim. With luck, you will not be waiting long.
original_zh_text: 圣堡在召唤，姊妹！我们只有一步之遥了。只需群钟赐福，巨扉圣门定将开启。<hpage>我会敲响那些巨钟。幸运的话，你们无需久候。
translated_text: Sister, the castle is calling! We stood so close together. To see the door open, you need the blessing of the bell.<hpage>Pilgrim, I want to wake up the bell. If you're lucky, you don't have to wait long.
secondary_translated_text: Sœur, le château appelle ! Nous étions si proches ensemble. Pour voir la porte ouverte, il faut la bénédiction de la cloche.<hpage>Pilgrim, je veux réveiller la cloche. Si vous avez de la chance, vous n'avez pas à attendre longtemps.

original_en_text: Only the holy bells of the great path shall open the way!<page>We beg you, traveller, see the bells awoken, that we may cross this final threshold.
original_zh_text: 只有朝圣途中的圣钟可开启此门！<page>恳求您，旅行者。令众钟苏醒，我们方可越过这最终的门槛。
translated_text: Only the sacred bells of the thoroughfares can open the way!<page>Ring the bell, traveler, that we may pass this last threshold. "
secondary_translated_text: Seules les cloches sacrées des rues peuvent ouvrir la voie !<page>Sonne la cloche, voyageur, afin que nous puissions franchir ce dernier seuil. "

original_en_text: Ahhh... the gate! The bells have awoken! All along the path. Now we need only music to see them attuned! <hpage>I have recently learnt the art of producing song by strumming Silk, though I confess it is a skill deserving of more practice.<page>Oh! Ohh! Have no doubt, sister! Play sincerely. Any music is sweet enough! Play for us, and surely the bells will resound! Play, and we will sing!
original_zh_text: 啊……巨门！圣钟皆已苏醒！眼下我们只需奏响音乐，使其共鸣！<hpage>我最近习得以灵丝拨弦成曲的技艺，但仍有些生疏。<page>噢！无需顾虑，姊妹！至诚则灵，凡乐皆美！为我们奏响音乐，圣钟必将回应！演奏吧，我们将为你歌唱！
translated_text: ah... the gate! The bell has rung! In the process, you can now see their adjustments in just the music!<hpage>Recently, I learned to play silk and compose, but I think it's a skill worth practicing more.<page>oh! oh! Certainly, sister! I play honestly. Any kind of music is sweet! Play for us, and the bells ring! Let's play and sing!
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. la porte ! La cloche sonne ! Dans le processus, vous pouvez maintenant voir leurs ajustements dans la musique !<hpage>Récemment, j'ai appris à jouer de la soie et à composer, mais je pense que c'est une compétence qui vaut la peine de pratiquer davantage.<page>Ooh ! Ooh ! Bien sûr, soeur ! Je joue sincèrement. N'importe quelle musique est douce ! Jouez pour nous, et les cloches sonneront ! Jouons et chantons !

original_en_text: Ahhh... the Grand Gate! The bells have awoken! <page>We beg you, sister. Play or sing, and we shall follow. Call out to the bells of the path and see the gate open!
original_zh_text: 啊……巨扉圣门！圣钟皆已苏醒！<page>恳求您，姊妹。奏乐咏唱，我们定将跟随你。呼唤圣途钟声，开启此门！
translated_text: ah... the gate! The bell has rung!<page>Please, sister. Play and sing and follow along. I rang the road bell and saw the gate open!
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. la porte ! La cloche sonne !<page>S'il te plaît, soeur. Jouez, chantez et suivez. J'ai sonné la cloche de la route et j'ai vu la porte ouverte !

original_en_text: We beg you, sister. Delay no further! Play for us. Call out to the bells of the path and see the Grand Gate open!
original_zh_text: 恳求您，姊妹。勿再拖延！为我们奏乐，呼唤圣途钟声，开启巨扉圣门！
translated_text: Please, sister. Don't be late any more! Ring the doorbell for us and watch the door open! "
secondary_translated_text: S'il vous plaît, soeur. Ne soyez plus tard ! Sonnez à la porte pour nous et regardez la porte s'ouvrir ! "

original_en_text: The gate... the gate! O, the Grand Gate to the Citadel stands before us!<page>We are so close! O mighty ones beyond the gate, we beg you! Open the way and let we poor, insignificant little pilgrims crawl into the light...<hpage>I see no gatekeepers to heed your plea, pilgrim, though I too seek entry to the Citadel. Have you heard of a means to open this gateway?<page>Ahh... Weapons blunt it not. No holes for keys. ‘Tis the bells, they say! The holy bells upon the path that open the way!
original_zh_text: 巨门啊……巨门！通往圣堡的巨扉圣门近在眼前！<page>咫尺之遥！门后的尊者啊，求您垂怜！开启通路，容我等卑微朝圣者遁入圣光……<hpage>看来没有守门者回应答你的祈愿。我也想进入圣堡，你可知道开门的办法？<page>唉……兵刃伤不了分毫，也不见锁孔。只有朝圣途中的圣钟可开启此门！
translated_text: The gate, the gate! The gates of the castle are in front of us!<page>It's so close! People outside the door, please! Open up the path of light for us poor little pilgrims.<hpage>I too wanted to enter the castle, but I could not see the gatekeeper obeying the pilgrims' demands. do you know how to open this door?<page>ah... The weapons will not dull it. There are no key holes. "The bell is ringing!" The holy bell is on the way, opening the way for you!
secondary_translated_text: La Porte, la Porte ! Les portes du château sont devant nous !<page>C'est si proche ! Les gens à l'extérieur, s'il vous plaît ! Ouvre le chemin de la lumière pour nous, pauvres petits pèlerins.<hpage>Je voulais aussi entrer dans le château, mais je ne voyais pas le gardien obéir aux demandes des pèlerins. Savez-vous ouvrir cette porte ?<page>Ah, oui. Les armes ne l'ennouiront pas. Il n'y a pas de trous de clé. "La cloche sonne !« La sainte cloche est en route, ouvrant la voie pour vous !

original_en_text: <hpage>I have passed several such bells, pilgrim. I know how to see them woken. Tell me what you know of their locations, and I shall seek those that still remain silent.<page>Sister? This is a mighty service you willingly perform! What a marvellous gift you would grant to your fellows. <page>Eagerly, I shall tell you of the shrines and their locations, as we have heard them spoken...
original_zh_text: <hpage>朝圣者，我途中遇到过多座此类巨钟，也知晓唤醒方法。请告知余下的位置，我这就去寻找未鸣之钟。<page>姊妹？这是何等伟大的侍奉！您对同伴的馈赠真是慷慨！<page>我会悉数告知神殿方位，将我们听闻的消息原封不动地告诉你……
translated_text: <hpage>Pilgrim, I have passed by some of such bells. I can watch you wake up. Tell me what you know about their location. " I look for those who are silent.<page>your sister? This is a great service you can provide as a volunteer! What a lovely gift you give to your companion.<page>As we have heard, I will give a detailed account of the temple and its location.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pilgrim, j'ai déjà passé devant quelques-unes de ces cloches. Je peux te regarder te réveiller. Dites-moi ce que vous savez de leur emplacement.« Je cherche ceux qui sont silencieux.<page>Votre soeur ? C'est un excellent service que vous pouvez offrir en tant que bénévole ! Quel beau cadeau que vous faites à votre compagnon.<page>Comme nous l'avons entendu, je vais donner un compte rendu détaillé du temple et de son emplacement.

original_en_text: The gate... the gate! O, the Grand Gate to the Citadel stands before us!<page>We are so close! O mighty ones beyond the gate, we beg you! Open the way and let we poor, insignificant little pilgrims crawl into the light...<hpage>I see no gatekeepers to heed your plea, pilgrim, though I too would benefit from its opening. Have you heard of a means to pass through?<page>Ahh... Weapons blunt it not. No holes for keys. ‘Tis the bells, they say! The holy bells upon the path that open the way!
original_zh_text: 巨门啊……巨门！圣堡巨扉圣门近在眼前！<page>门后的尊者啊，求您垂怜！开启通路，容我等卑微朝圣者遁入圣光……<hpage>看来没有守门者回应你的祈愿。但开启这道门对我也有好处，你可知道开门的办法？<page>唉……兵刃伤不了分毫，也不见锁孔。只有朝圣途中的圣钟可开启此门！
translated_text: The gate, the gate! The gates of the castle are in front of us!<page>It's so close! People outside the door, please! Open up the path of light for us poor little pilgrims.<hpage>Pilgrim, I have not seen the gatekeeper listening to your request, but I too will benefit from its openness. Have you ever heard of how to access it?<page>ah... The weapons will not dull it. There are no key holes. "The bell is ringing!" The holy bell is on the way, opening the way for you!
secondary_translated_text: La Porte, la Porte ! Les portes du château sont devant nous !<page>C'est si proche ! Les gens à l'extérieur, s'il vous plaît ! Ouvre le chemin de la lumière pour nous, pauvres petits pèlerins.<hpage>pèlerin, je n'ai pas vu le gardien écouter votre demande, mais je profiterai moi aussi de son ouverture. Avez-vous déjà entendu parler de la façon d'y accéder ?<page>Ah, oui. Les armes ne l'ennouiront pas. Il n'y a pas de trous de clé. "La cloche sonne !« La sainte cloche est en route, ouvrant la voie pour vous !

original_en_text: <hpage>On my journey up, I passed many large bells housed in old shrines. Each I have struck awake, yet still this gate stays closed. What other task must be done to see us pass beyond?<page>The bells are rung? Then this sacred threshold may now be crossed, for the final task is simple! Only music, played fair and true. Music shall attune the bells, and see the gate descend.<page>It must be you to lead us, sister! You, who brought this blessing! Play or sing, and we shall follow.
original_zh_text: <hpage>上行途中，我已敲响诸多钟殿内的巨钟，但此门仍然紧闭。还需要怎样的仪式吗？<page>巨钟皆已鸣响？那这神圣门槛便可跨越！最终仪式简单，唯有真诚演奏的音乐，方能使钟声共鸣，引导大门降下。<page>必须由你来引领我们，姊妹！是你带来了这份恩典。演奏或歌唱吧，我们定将跟随你。
translated_text: <hpage>As we climbed the mountain, there were many sounds of ancient temple bells. I woke everyone up, but the door remained closed. What are the challenges that need to be accomplished in order to surpass that?<page>the bell rings? The final task is so simple that this sacred threshold is now crossed! Only the music is played fairly and truthfully. I saw the concert bell ring and the door fall.<page>Sister, you will guide us! " You who bring this blessing! Play and sing and follow along.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Comme nous montons la montagne, il y a eu beaucoup de sons de cloches de temples anciens. Je réveillais tout le monde, mais la porte restait fermée. Quels sont les défis à relever afin de les surmonter ?<page>Les cloches sonnent ? La tâche finale est si simple que ce seuil sacré est maintenant franchi ! Seule la musique est jouée de façon juste et honnête. J'ai vu la cloche du concert sonner et la porte tomber.<page>Sœur, tu nous guides !« Vous qui apportez cette bénédiction ! Jouez, chantez et suivez.

original_en_text: <hpage>Master, I have communed with the shrine above. Your learnings are unique, techniques born of cogwork hearts. Their mastery will require some commitment on my part.<page>Bug-Red, you are the first organic shell to fuse our memories. S-s-s-such behaviour, my line would have believed improbable-impossible. <page>Still, your broad arsenal did suggest strong affinity with the m-m-m-mechanical craft, enough to allow access to our thought-store.<hpage>Yours is an impressive skill, Master. I am grateful for the insight.
original_zh_text: <hpage>大师，我已拜访上方圣像。你们的知识独特，源自机枢之心。需要我专注投入才能掌握。<page>红姑娘是首个融合我等记忆的血肉之躯。这种行为，按我族逻辑本应不-不-不可行。<page>不过您精通各式武具，确实与机械造诣契-契-合，因此决定开放思维秘藏。<hpage>你们的技艺令我叹服。对这份知识，我感激不尽。
translated_text: <hpage>Master, I have already agreed to the above shrine. Your learning is unique and is a technique derived from cognitive thinking. And their domination requires my commitment to it.<page>Bagdad, you are the first organic shell to integrate our memories. My people think that such an act is impossible. "<page>Even so, your rich arsenal shows enough affinity for mechanical crafts to fit into our ideological warehouse.<hpage>Master, your skill is really impressive. Thank you for your insight.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Maître, j'ai déjà accepté le sanctuaire ci-dessus. Votre apprentissage est unique et est une technique dérivée de la pensée cognitive. Et leur domination requiert mon engagement.<page>Bagdad, vous êtes la première coquille organique à intégrer nos mémoires. Mon peuple pense qu ' un tel acte est impossible. "<page>Malgré tout, votre riche arsenal montre suffisamment d'affinité pour les mécaniques pour s'intégrer dans notre entrepôt idéologique.<hpage>Maître, ta compétence est vraiment impressionnante. Merci pour ton insight.

translated_text: I said... I confess.
secondary_translated_text: J'ai dit ... Je confesse.

original_en_text: A fine artefact you carry there, Bug-Red. That broken tool, it is Weaver-make? <hpage>I believe so, Master. A relic of their old workshop, lost in fetid caves beyond this Citadel.<hpage>The parts suggest a weapon of thread, one I would attempt to repair myself, had I endless time.<page>An Architect’s work owes much to the art of the f-f-first children. They set expert standard for the tools and talents of Pharloom eternal.<page>If you desire-demand, I can remake the tool, though my own mind-directives may produce u-u-u-nique result.
original_zh_text: 红姑娘，你身上有件特殊遗物。这残器，是织者造物？<hpage>应该是。织者的旧工坊遗物，在圣堡外的腐臭洞窟里发现的。<hpage>看这构造应该是丝刃兵器。若不是时间有限，我倒想尝试修复。<page>建筑师技艺大多继承自初代织者子嗣。他们为永恒圣堡的器-器-具设下典范。<page>如果您有要求，我可以将它重铸，但成品恐怕会带有我的独-独-独特烙印。
translated_text: The beautiful relic you brought there, the red worm. that bad tool is made of cloth?<hpage>I think so, master. It is a remnant of their old workshop that has vanished in the stench of the caves outside the castle.<hpage>These parts are like wire arms, and I'd like to repair them myself if I had time.<page>Much of the architect's work owes to the art of his first children. They set the expert standard for tools and talent that have outperformed the times of the Pharloom.<page>You can also re-create the tool if you want, but my own mind commands might produce u-u - nique results.
secondary_translated_text: La belle relique que vous y avez apportée, le ver rouge. Ce mauvais outil est fait de tissu ?<hpage>Je le pense, Maître. C'est un vestige de leur ancien atelier qui a disparu dans la puanteur des grottes à l'extérieur du château.<hpage>Ces pièces sont comme des bras de fil, et j'aimerais les réparer moi-même si j'avais le temps.<page>Une grande partie du travail de l'architecte doit à l'art de ses premiers enfants. Ils ont établi la norme d'expertise pour les outils et les talents qui ont surpassé les temps de Pharloom.<page>Vous pouvez également recréer l'outil si vous le souhaitez, mais mes propres commandes mentales pourraient produire des résultats u-u - nique.

original_en_text: An intricate implement of Pharloom’s first children. I can restore-repair the w-w-weapon, though it will bear some trace of my identity-idiom.
original_zh_text: 初代子嗣的精巧造物。我可修-修-复此武具，但会留下我的工造印记。
translated_text: The complex tools of Pharaoh's first children. I can fix this weapon, but there are traces of idioms of my identity.
secondary_translated_text: Les outils complexes des premiers enfants du Pharaon. Je peux réparer cette arme, mais il y a des traces d'idiomes de mon identité.

original_en_text: Bug-Red. Do you ask-need our service? We shall create, as is our d-d-directive. To serve, for Pharloom eternal.
original_zh_text: 红姑娘。需要服-服-服务？我将创造，如指-指-指令所示。为永恒圣堡。
translated_text: It's Bug-Red. Do you need a service? Create it in the same way as the d-d - directive. For Pharaoh, service is immortal.
secondary_translated_text: C'est un bug-red. Avez-vous besoin d'un service ? Créer de la même manière que la directive d-d. Pour Pharaon, le service est immortel.

original_en_text: Speak now. Thy confession will be heard.
original_zh_text: 说吧。你的忏悔将被聆听。
translated_text: Speak now, and your plea will be heard.
secondary_translated_text: Parlez maintenant, et votre plaidoyer sera entendu.

original_en_text: Hrrr. Hrrrrrrr. Them sounds you make. Of holy sort. When me hear such sounds, me remember of home. Me remember of be little.<page>It make it painful hard to work, such remembers. Me must keep working. Please, friend. Do not make them sounds no more.
original_zh_text: 唔。唔唔唔唔。你弄的响动。像圣歌。让咱想起老家。想起小时候。<page>这些回忆让干活揪心。咱得继续干。朋友，求你别弄这些声了。<page>求你了……别再……
translated_text: Uh.. The sound you make is holy. When I heard this sound, I remembered my home. I remember my youth.<page>That made the job painful. I have to keep working. Come on, my friend. Please don't make any noise.
secondary_translated_text: Uh, euh... Le son que tu fais est saint. Quand j'entends ce son, je me souviens de ma maison. Je me rappelle ma jeunesse.<page>Cela rendait le travail douloureux. Je dois continuer à travailler. Allez, mon ami. S'il vous plaît, ne faites pas de bruit.

original_en_text: My s-s-service to you, Bug-Red... As it concludes, I must speak-confess. Long now I have felt my rotors slow their s-s-spin. My limbs lift weak. An ending is felt, coming, sudden-certain...welcome.<hpage>Whatever fading you feel has not shown in your craft, Master. You have provided tools of immaculate make.<hpage>What will follow if you pass? Would another take your place? <page>One cannot. The skill to construct an Architect... That was taken by t-t-time. I am the last-final. The core remains to sustain the song, but no more Architects to tend-toil or build anew. <page>S-s-strange... ‘For Pharloom eternal,’ states the d-d-directive-cage. But how can eternity sustain without an Architect to serve? This seems e-e-error. An end? An error... welcome?
original_zh_text: 为红姑娘效-效-力的时光……临别前必须坦-坦-白。我的齿轮渐-渐缓，臂膀无力。终结将至，突然但确-确-定……真好。<hpage>即便如此，大师的技艺也并未退步。您造的器具堪称完美。<hpage>您逝去后会怎么样，有后继者接任？<page>没有。锻造建筑师的技艺……早已失-失-失传。我是最后一位。核心尚能使圣歌存续，但再无工匠维缮新建。<page>荒-荒-谬……”为永恒圣堡”的指-指-令仍在。但无工匠何谈永恒？错-错-误？终局？错谬……真好？
translated_text: I am for you, red bug. Lastly, I confess. For a long time, I felt the rotation speed of the propeller slowing down. He cannot lift his arms and legs. When the end is felt and approaching, suddenly check and carefully<hpage>Master, no matter how much fading you feel, it will not be reflected in your skill. It provides the perfect manufacturing tool.<hpage>what happens if you pass? Will someone else replace you?<page>One cannot do. The architect's skills were shot on time. I am the last one. " The core is still in the maintenance of the song, but we no longer need an architect to maintain it or rebuild it.<page>Strangely, "For the immortality of Pharaoh," said the two-way cage. But how can we keep it eternal without the services of the architect? That seems to be wrong. it's over? It's a mistake. welcome?
secondary_translated_text: Je suis pour toi, Red Bug ! Enfin, je vous confesse. Pendant longtemps, j'ai senti la vitesse de rotation de l'hélice ralentir. Il ne peut pas lever ses bras et ses jambes. Lorsque la fin est sentie et approche, vérifiez soudain et soigneusement<hpage>Maître, peu importe à quel point vous vous sentez décoloré, cela ne se reflétera pas dans votre compétence. Il fournit l'outil de fabrication parfait.<hpage>Que se passera-t - il si vous passez ? Quelqu ' un d'autre vous remplacera-t - il ?<page>Un ne peut pas le faire. Les compétences de l'architecte ont été tirées à temps. Je suis la dernière. Le noyau est toujours dans la maintenance de la chanson, mais nous n'avons plus besoin d'un architecte pour la maintenir ou la reconstruire.<page>Étrangement, « Pour l'immortalité du Pharaon », dit la cage à deux sens. Mais comment le garder éternel sans les services de l'architecte ? Cela semble être erroné. C'est fini ? C'est une erreur. Bienvenue ?

original_en_text: Hrr. Hrrrrr. Who is there? Me can not... can not clear see....<hpage>At ease, large one. I am no danger to you.<page>Hrrrrr? Hrrrr! Me see you now! So clean, so lively... Surely you did come from above! Me time has come at last! Me work is done. You come to bring me up! Up, up! Hrrr!<hpage>You mistake me. I am no resident of the Citadel. I am a stranger here, though no foe to you.<page>Hrrr. Hrrrrrrrrr. S-stranger? Me grave mistaken. Forgive me, thems above, for me unworthy hope! Of course, me work is not done! Harder, harder! Me must work harder!
original_zh_text: 唔。唔唔唔。谁？咱看不清……看不清……<hpage>别慌，大块头。我不是你的敌人。<page>唔唔？唔唔！看清你了！这么干净鲜活……肯定是从上层来的！咱终于等到！咱完工了！你是来接咱上去的！上去！唔唔！<hpage>你误会了，我不是圣堡居民，只是旅者。但也不是你的敌人。<page>唔。唔唔唔唔。旅……旅者？咱大错特错。宽恕咱吧，上边的大人们！咱痴心妄想！咱当然还没完工！加把劲！咱得加把劲！
translated_text: Ha. who's in there? I'm not... I can't see it.<hpage>Don't worry, Big. I am no danger to you.<page>what? what? yeah! i just saw it! Very clean and active. You must have come from above! " My time has finally come! My job is over You are here to help me grow! stand up! stand up! yeah!<hpage>They misunderstand me. Not the inhabitants of the castle. I am not your enemy, but I am a stranger here.<page>Oh, oh, oh, oh. a stranger? I have made a serious mistake. Forgive me, it gives me hope that is worthless! Of course, my job is not over yet! Keep going, keep going! I have to work harder!
secondary_translated_text: Ha. Qui est là - dedans ? Je ne suis pas... Je ne peux pas le voir.<hpage>Ne t'inquiète pas, grand. Je ne suis pas un danger pour vous.<page>Quoi ? Quoi ? Ouais ! Je viens de le voir ! Très propre et actif. Tu dois venir d'en haut !« Mon temps est enfin venu ! Mon travail est terminé, tu es là pour m'aider à grandir ! Levez-vous ! Levez-vous ! Ouais !<hpage>Ils m'ont mal compris, pas les habitants du château. Je ne suis pas ton ennemi, mais je suis un étranger ici.<page>Oh, oh, oh, oh. un étranger ? J'ai commis une grave erreur. Pardonnez-moi, cela me donne de l'espoir qui est inutile ! Bien sûr, mon travail n'est pas encore terminé ! Continuez, continuez ! Je dois travailler plus dur !

original_en_text: Bug-Red. Do you ask-need our services, even n-now? Our duty is l-l-long, but we shall create for you, if you require it...
original_zh_text: 红姑娘。此刻仍需要服-服-服务？职责已尽，但如果您需要，仍可制-制造……
translated_text: It's Bug-Red. Do you need a service now? Our responsibilities are long, but we will create if necessary.
secondary_translated_text: C'est un bug-red. Avez-vous besoin d'un service maintenant ? Nos responsabilités sont longues, mais nous créons si nécessaire.

original_en_text: If Bug-Red could prove their aptitude with our implements, and others like, I would offer my key, to grant access to the chapel-store above.
original_zh_text: 如果红姑娘能证-证-明精通我等器械，我将献上钥匙，用以开启上方圣堂库房。
translated_text: If Bug-Red can prove their abilities with our tools as well as the others, I will provide my keys and grant access to the shop of the above church.
secondary_translated_text: Si Bug-Red peut prouver ses capacités avec nos outils ainsi que les autres, je vous fournirai mes clés et vous accorderai l'accès au magasin de l'église ci-dessus.

original_en_text: <hpage>Master, I seek a melody held by your line, one part of a sequence and key to ascending above the Citadel. Can you teach it to me?<page>Our melody? I r-r-recall! Yes! There was melody, once, but its sound... that I possess no longer...<page>T-t-t-too long I have worked. From my mind-vault, the imprint has f-f-faded. With many things it is like this... remembrance, dimmed...<page>But you m-m-may hear it, still. At the height of our core, there is means-s-s-system, near complete... Constructs old-built to sound our song. They need only be set to functional form.
original_zh_text: <hpage>大师，我想要你这一族保管的旋律，那是登顶圣堡的钥匙。你可愿意传授？<page>我们的旋律？确-确-曾存在！但是声纹……已遗失……<page>长-长-久劳役使我记忆缺损。许多往事……都已模糊……<page>但您仍可-可-可以聆听。核心顶端有一奏鸣构造，几近完成……启动即可重现圣歌。
translated_text: <hpage>Master, I'm looking for a melody that your line carries, which is part of the sequence and the key to climbing the castle. can you teach me?<page>Our melody? i remember it! yes! yes! There was a melody, but there was a sound. I don't have it anymore.<page>Work is too long. From the bottom of my heart, this mark is disappearing. A lot of things like this memory, obscurity.<page>But you may hear that at the height of our core there is a system of almost complete means. Build an old building to sing our songs. Just set it up functionally.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Maître, je cherche une mélodie que votre ligne porte, qui fait partie de la séquence et la clé pour monter le château. Pouvez-vous m'enseigner ?<page>Notre mélodie ? Je me souviens ! Oui ! Oui ! Il y avait une mélodie, mais il y avait un son. Je n'ai plus.<page>travail est trop long. Du fond de mon cœur, cette marque disparaît. Beaucoup de choses comme cette mémoire, l'obscurité.<page>Mais vous entendrez peut - être qu ' au sommet de notre noyau, il existe un système de moyens presque complets. Construisez un vieux bâtiment pour chanter nos chansons. Il suffit de l'installer fonctionnellement.

original_en_text: Are you still to c-c-climb our grand core, Bug-Red? Within you may marvel at the work of Architects, my own, and all those passed b-b-before.<hpage>My path takes me in many directions, Master, but in due course, I will ascend the core and claim the melody atop it.
original_zh_text: 您仍要攀-攀-登伟大核心？路上可见历代建筑师的神工创造，包括我的拙作。<hpage>我有许多地方要去，但若是需要，我会登顶获取旋律。
translated_text: are you still climbing the big core, bagred? Inside, you might be surprised by the work of architects, my own architects, and all the architects who have passed in the past.<hpage>Master, my path takes me in many directions, but at the right time I reach the core and occupy the melody above the core.
secondary_translated_text: Tu es toujours en train d'escalader le grand noyau, bagred ?À l'intérieur, vous pourriez être surpris par le travail des architectes, mes propres architectes, et tous les architectes qui sont passés par le passé.<hpage>Maître, mon chemin me mène dans de nombreuses directions, mais au bon moment, j'atteins le noyau et j'occupe la mélodie au-dessus du noyau.

original_en_text: <hpage>May I ask what you know of the Citadel above you, sir? You go to much effort to reach it.<page>Hrrrrrrrr! The Citadel! Most miracle of a place, bright and holy! Fresh water for all, much as can drink! Air so clean, can see the great rooves above! <page>When me thinks of Citadel above, me works hardest of all! Hrrrrrrrrr!
original_zh_text: <hpage>请问你对头顶的圣堡了解多少？为了上去这么煞费苦心。<page>唔唔唔唔！圣堡！神迹之地！亮堂圣洁！清水管够！空气清新能望见穹顶！<page>想着圣堡，咱就干得最卖力！唔唔唔唔！
translated_text: <hpage>may i ask you how much you know about the castle above? You've put a lot of effort into achieving it.<page>ha ha ha! the castle! The most sacred place is bright and sacred! Drink as much fresh water as possible! The air is so fresh and you can see the big roof.<page>Considering the castle above, I work hard! ah! ah!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Puis-je vous demander combien vous connaissez le château ci-dessus ? Vous avez fait beaucoup d'efforts pour y parvenir.<page>Ha ha ha ! Le château ! Le lieu le plus sacré est lumineux et sacré ! Buvez autant d'eau fraîche que possible ! L'air est frais et on peut voir le grand toit.<page>En regardant le château ci-dessus, je travaille fort ! Ah ! Ah !

original_en_text: You have confessed a sin most grave and must by works cleanse yourself.<page>Return to your task and work off-cycle, neither eating nor supping until new-cycle begins.<page>By the grace of Pharloom eternal, may you never tire. Toil, and be forgiven.
original_zh_text: 你已供认重罪，须以苦役净化。<page>返回岗位持续劳作，禁食禁饮直至新周期始。<page>承永恒纺络之恩，愿你永不疲惫。劳作，方得救赎。
translated_text: You must confess your most serious sins and cleanse them by your deeds.<page>Don't go back to your tasks and non-cyclical work, and eat or eat until a new cycle begins.<page>May we be thankful for Pharaoh's everlasting grace and never tire. Work hard and be forgiven.
secondary_translated_text: Vous devez confesser vos péchés les plus graves et les purifier par vos actions.<page>Ne retournez pas à vos tâches et à votre travail non cyclique, et mangez ou mangez jusqu'à ce qu ' un nouveau cycle commence.<page>Que nous soyons reconnaissants pour la grâce éternelle de Pharaon et ne nous lassons jamais. Travailler dur et être pardonné.

original_en_text: Hrr. Hrrrrr! Good, me friend, good! When us works together, is more holy! Is more work done!<page>Together, lets us work raw hard ‘til thems above see how worthy us is!
original_zh_text: 唔。唔唔唔！好，朋友，好！咱一起干，更虔诚！活干得更快！<page>来！咱们一起拼命干，让上边看看咱多卖力！
translated_text: Oh, oh, oh! Oh, my friend, um! When we work together, we become more holy! I had more work!<page>Let's work together until the people above know what we value!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, oh, oh ! Mon ami, um ! Quand nous travaillons ensemble, nous devenons plus saints ! J'avais plus de travail !<page>Travaillons ensemble jusqu'à ce que les gens d'en haut sachent ce que nous valorisons !

original_en_text: <page>What’s this, Bug-Red? Even down here, I d-d-did detect its working... Have you climbed our c-c-core, and woken the voices of my l-l-line?<hpage>I have maker. Clearly it was a climb never intended for regular bugs, and fair fortune that the skills gifted within your lands allowed my ascent.<hpage>The melody, and the voices... both are fine things heard and witnessed. Even in this fading moment, their artistry shines through.<page>Impressive-industrious... eternal... You have seen a glimpse, Bug-Red, of us-s-s, how once we were. The minds of Architects inspired. What majesty we did create...
original_zh_text: <page>怎么回事，红姑娘？即便身处此地，我也感-感-感知到它的运转……莫非你已攀上我们的核-核-核心，唤醒了我族先辈的歌声？  <hpage>正是如此，大师。这段攀登本非寻常虫类所能企及，所幸这片土地赋予的技艺助我登上了顶端。  <hpage>那旋律与歌声……皆是值得聆听见证的瑰宝。即便在此衰微之际，其中匠心仍熠熠生辉。  <page>勤勉卓绝……永垂不朽……红姑娘，你已见证我族-族-族昔日的荣光。建筑师们迸发的智慧，我们曾创造的伟业何等壮丽……
translated_text: <page>what is this red bug? I'm working here as well. Did you climb our C-C - Core and wake up my L-L - Line voice?<hpage>There are manufacturers. It's not an ordinary insect climbing Fortunately, your land-specific skills allow me to climb.<hpage>Melody, the sound. Both sounds and looks beautiful. Even in this faded moment, their artistry is shining.<page>Impressive hard work. Forever and ever. You have seen us, red worm, what kind of people we are. Inspiration from architects The greatness we have created.
secondary_translated_text: <page>Qu ' est-ce que ce bug rouge ? Je travaille ici aussi. Avez-vous grimpé sur notre C-C - Core et réveillé ma voix L-L - Line ?<hpage>Il existe des fabricants. Ce n'est pas une escalade d'insectes ordinaires Heureusement, vos compétences spécifiques au terrain me permettent d'escalader.<hpage>Melodie, le son. Les deux sonnent et ont l'air magnifiques. Même en ce moment décadent, leur art brille.<page>Impressionnant travail dur. pour toujours et toujours. Vous nous avez vus, ver rouge, quel genre de gens nous sommes. Inspiration des architectes La grandeur que nous avons créée.

original_en_text: <hpage>Master, you seem the lone maker left in this ruined Citadel. Are you my enemy? The other constructs of this place did object aggressively to my presence. <page>Bug-Red? I am a m-m-maker. Yes. Enemy. No. I am an Architect. Only an Architect. To build-automate, it is our nature-directive-c-c-c-cage.<page>Why are you here, Bug-Red? The time is late. Do you seek-need service of an Architect? You are weave-type, yes, a first child. Rare-e-e-extinct? Or not it does so seem.<hpage>You see it true, Master. I bear the lineage of Weaver, along with other strands, equally strange.<page>Then on your r-r-request, Bug-Red, as directive demands, for Pharloom’s first children, a-a-a-and our kingdom-eternal, I shall c-c-craft.
original_zh_text: <hpage>阁下，你似乎是圣堡最后的工匠，但是要与我为敌么？这里的构造体对我很有敌意。<page>红衣虫？我是制-制-造者。敌人。不是。建筑师。只是建筑师。建造-自动化，并非选择。是本性-指-指-指令牢笼。<page>您为何在此，是寻-寻求建筑师协助？您有织者血脉，是，初代子嗣。稀-稀-稀有种？但又似乎不是。<hpage>你眼光很独到，我确实有织者血脉，但只有一半。<page>那依红姑娘要-要-要求，遵循指令，为纺络初代子嗣，为永恒圣堡，我将效劳。为您制-制-造。

Yes, enemy. No, no, no. I am an architect. I'm just an architect. In the case of automation, this is a natural sequence - c-c - c.<page>what are you doing here? Is it too late to ask for the help of a red bug architect? You're the knitting type, yes, the first child. Rare and extinct. Or it looks like it.<hpage>"Master, really look." I have a woman's blood woven in my body, and other blood, and something equally strange. "<page>Then, at your request, Red Worm, in accordance with the instructions, I will do C-C - C for the first child of Farnham, our eternal kingdom.

Les autres bâtiments de cet endroit s'opposent fortement à ma présence.<page>Les bugs rouges ? Je suis un m-m - maker. Oui, ennemi ! Je suis architecte, je suis architecte. "<page>Alors, à votre demande, ver rouge, selon les instructions, je ferai C-C - C pour le premier enfant de Farnham, notre royaume éternel.

translated_text: 12th generation architect
secondary_translated_text: Architecte de 12e génération

original_en_text: Hrrrrrrr. The harder me work, the sooner it come. Thems above, them watch us, always. Work hard, work hard, and us will go up. Hrrrr.<hpage>Sir, I fear you are long forgotten by your masters. Should you not rest? The burden this toil is placing on your shell is plain to see.<page>Hrrrrr? Hrrrrrr. You speaks strange. Me can not rest. Us works, and Citadel breathes, and thems above do sing, and all is right.<page>And when us works enough, thems see it... Hrrr... thems see it, and us gets us holy reward...
original_zh_text: 唔唔唔。越使劲干，就越早离开。上边的大人们看着咱呢。使劲干，使劲干，就能上去。唔唔。<hpage>先生，恐怕你早被主人遗忘了。为何不休息？这苦役正在摧残你的甲壳。<page>唔唔？唔唔唔。你说怪话。咱不能歇。咱干活，圣堡呼吸，上边唱歌，这才对劲。<page>等咱干够活，大人们会看见……唔唔……会看见，就给咱圣赐……
translated_text: The harder you work, the faster you work, the faster you come. They are focused on the topics mentioned above. Effort, effort, we rise. Uh.<hpage>I have been forgotten by my master. you're not resting? The burden of your shell is obvious.<page>what? what? He's talking a weird story. I can't rest. We were at work, the castle was breathing, the above themes were really singing, and everything went well.<page>If you work hard enough, they will see. hmm. If you see it, you will receive a divine reward.
secondary_translated_text: Plus vous travaillez dur, plus vous travaillez vite, plus vous viendrez vite. Ils sont axés sur les sujets mentionnés ci-dessus. Effort, effort, nous nous élevons. Uh-huh.<hpage>J'ai été oublié par mon maître. Tu ne te reposes pas ? Le fardeau de votre coquille est évident.<page>Quoi ? Quoi ? Il raconte une histoire étrange. Je ne peux pas me reposer. Nous étions au travail, le château respirait, les thèmes ci-dessus chantaient vraiment, et tout se passait bien.<page>Si vous travaillez assez dur, vous le verrez. hmm. Si vous la voyez, vous recevrez une récompense divine.

original_en_text: Tools of my craft. They could be used to improve your own. Make harder, sharper.
original_zh_text: 我的工具。可以用于改进您自己的。更硬，更利。
translated_text: My craft tools. It can be used for self-improvement. Make it stronger and sharper.
secondary_translated_text: Mes outils de craft. Il peut être utilisé pour l'auto-amélioration. Rendez-le plus fort et plus fort.

original_en_text: A flexible shell-prosthetic. It would enhance a weave-type’s flexibility, allowing evasive options.
original_zh_text: 柔性甲壳义肢。能提升织者机动性，便于闪避。
translated_text: Flexible shell artificial body. Increases the flexibility of the weaving type, allowing for avoidance options.
secondary_translated_text: Corps artificiel flexible. Augmente la flexibilité du type de tissage, permettant des options d'évitement.

original_en_text: You... ... sin... ... cleanse....<page>Return... ... work... ... begins....<page>... Pharloom... ... never... ... forgiven.
original_zh_text: 你……罪……净化....<page>返回……劳作……周期始....<page>...纺络……永不……救赎。
translated_text: You're... you're... Sin, and. clean,<page>i'm coming back... work... work... It starts.<page>... The pharaoh never... please forgive me.
secondary_translated_text: Vous êtes... Vous êtes... Sin, et. propre,<page>Je reviens... Travail... Travail... Il commence.<page>... Le pharaon n'a jamais... Pardonnez-moi s'il vous plaît.

original_en_text: You have affinity for such radial blades? I can b-b-build upon the idea-knowledge. Make them retract. Make them force-store.
original_zh_text: 您偏爱这类机轮刃？我可基-基-据此改良。加回收装置。强化储能。
translated_text: Are you interested in such radioactive materials? I'm based on my knowledge of this idea. Please take it back. Please put it in mandatory storage.
secondary_translated_text: Vous êtes intéressé par ces matières radioactives ? Je suis basé sur ma connaissance de cette idée. S'il vous plaît, reprenez-le. Veuillez le mettre en stockage obligatoire.

original_en_text: Acquire {0} more tools to prove aptitude.
original_zh_text: 再收集{0}件工具以证明资质。
translated_text: Acquire it.{0}Tools for proving competence.
secondary_translated_text: Acquérir cela.{0}outils pour prouver la compétence.

original_en_text: Hrrrrrr. Me can not say much more, friend. Thems is watching. Us must keep working.
original_zh_text: 唔唔唔唔。咱不能多说了，朋友。上边看着呢。咱得接着干。
translated_text: Ladies and gentlemen, I can't say more. The subject is under observation. You have to keep working.
secondary_translated_text: Mesdames et Messieurs, je ne peux pas en dire plus. Le sujet est en observation. Vous devez continuer à travailler.

original_en_text: A locked gate bearing the symbol of an Architect.
original_zh_text: 一扇锁住的门，刻有建筑师徽记。
translated_text: A locked door with the architect's signature.
secondary_translated_text: Une porte verrouillée avec la signature de l'architecte.

original_en_text: Raw materials, for creation. Carry them with you always, that y-y-you may be prepared.
original_zh_text: 原材料，随身携带。有-有备无患。
translated_text: Creative raw materials. Always bring them with you so you can be ready.
secondary_translated_text: Matières premières créatives. Prenez-les toujours avec vous pour être prêt.

original_en_text: Acquire 1 more tool to prove aptitude.
original_zh_text: 再收集1件工具以证明资质。
translated_text: Purchase another tool to prove your abilities.
secondary_translated_text: Achetez un autre outil pour prouver vos capacités.

original_en_text: Those pieces of a h-h-heart-core you carry upon you, how did you acquire-recover an artefact so rare?<hpage>They were scattered about the Citadel, each seemingly laid with purpose. Someone wished the thing dismantled, but showed respect enough to see it stored safe.<page>That heart is an inspired form, conceived by the first of my line for a knight of cog and blade.<page>In it, I see my predecessor’s talent, immense, now lost-forgotten. I could never create-copy a work s-s-so fine.<hpage>And the knight that once bore the heart? Tell me of them.<page>A gleaming order, cogwork sentinels, so impressive-majestic in function they were charged-b-b-bound to the highest holy duty.<page>Long before the c-c-creation of the core, the sentinels ventured, even beyond these walls, to see all bugs brought-forced safe to serve the Citadel.<page>If the h-h-h-heart were restored within the sentinel’s shell, would it give thanks for the awakening? Or would it grieve those lands now l-l-lost?<hpage>In time, maker, I may find out...
original_zh_text: 您携带的心-心-脏残片，您是怎么找到如此珍贵造物的？<hpage>它们散落在圣堡各处，似乎是被刻意安置。虽然被拆解，却有妥善保管。<page>这心脏构造精妙，出自我的先辈之手，为机枢骑士所铸造。<page>我能在其中看到先辈才华，如今却已失-失-传。我无法复刻这份神工。<hpage>那曾经承载这颗心的骑士？我想了解详情。<page>光辉教团，机枢戍卫。他们曾经威仪赫赫，掌管圣职。<page>远在核心铸-铸-造之前，戍卫就远征墙外，强掳众虫效忠圣堡。<page>如果将此心-心-脏重新装入戍卫甲中，它会为苏醒而感激？还是为圣堡衰颓哀伤？<hpage>假以时日，大师，或许我能知晓……
translated_text: How do you obtain and restore the core fragments you were carrying with you?<hpage>They were scattered around the castle, and it seemed that everyone was lying. Someone wanted to break it down, but showed enough respect to keep it safe.<page>"The Heart" was the inspiration for my first series of ideas, designed for Gear and Blade Knight.<page>There, I saw the talent of my predecessor, who was great and now forgotten. I cannot reproduce such a beautiful piece.<hpage>The knight who cared about you told me. "<page>The shining knighthood, the canine-toothed sentry, performed a very impressive and dignified function, and was endowed with the highest sacred duty.<page>Long before the core was built, the sentinels were in danger, and even outside these walls, all the bugs were forced to work safely for the castle.<page>When the heart recovers in the shell of the sentinel, will you be grateful for the awakening? Does this grieve the lost land?<hpage>As time goes on, we can find our Creator.
secondary_translated_text: Comment obtenez-vous et récupérez-vous les fragments de noyau que vous portiez avec vous ?<hpage>Ils étaient dispersés autour du château, et il semblait que tout le monde menteait. Quelqu ' un voulait le détruire, mais il a montré assez de respect pour le garder en sécurité.<page>"The Heart" a été l'inspiration pour ma première série d'idées, conçues pour Gear et Blade Knight.<page>Là, j'ai vu le talent de mon prédécesseur, qui était grand et maintenant oublié. Je ne peux pas reproduire une si belle pièce.<hpage>Le chevalier qui s'occupait de vous m'a dit. »<page>La chevalerie brillante, la sentinelle canine-dentée, remplissait une fonction très impressionnante et digne, et était dotée du plus haut devoir sacré.<page>Bien avant que le noyau ne soit construit, les sentinelles étaient en danger, et même en dehors de ces murs, tous les bugs étaient forcés de travailler en toute sécurité pour le château.<page>Quand le cœur se rétablira dans la coquille de la sentinelle, serez-vous reconnaissant de l'éveil ? Est-ce que cela rend la terre perdue ?<hpage>Au fil du temps, nous pouvons trouver notre Créateur.

original_en_text: This band of metal teeth, sharp and light-fine. It could be woven within your red outer layer? A hidden weapon.
original_zh_text: 金属齿环，轻便锐利。可编入您的红色披风？作为暗器。
translated_text: The metal braces are sharp and light. Is it woven on the outside of the red? Shadow
secondary_translated_text: Les braces métalliques sont tranchantes et légères. Est-ce qu ' il est tissé à l'extérieur du rouge ? Shadow

original_en_text: <page=S>You seem displeased, Old One. We only did as you asked, yes? The snare is sprung, the creature consumed.<hpage>You bound it to that void!<page=S>Don’t play daft. You should well know our family’s fixations. Surely you had a hunch?<page=B>How else could we hope to trap one of your pale kin? Or see her consumed with such insatiable efficiency?<hpage>Then you have miscalculated, gravely. The white knight, she fell with the mother...<page=M>Oh ho... The quakes, yes? We have felt their force, even here. So the mother resists the dark... to save the child?<hpage>That is my guess. I must descend to the void below, and see clear that truth for myself.<page=M>Ohhhh. How… unfortunate. All of Pharloom will fall to her flailing.<hpage>So it may, but I will not watch idle while it crumbles.
original_zh_text: <page=S>古老者，您似乎不太高兴？我们不过照您吩咐行事罢了。陷阱已发，猎物入彀。<hpage>你们把它和虚空捆在了一起！<page=S>别装傻了。您该清楚我们家族对力量百无禁忌，难道没料到这步？<page=B>不然怎困得住您那苍白同族？又怎教她贪婪吞噬得这般彻底？<hpage>那你们可大错特错了，那苍白骑士也随其母亲一同坠落了……<page=M>哦嚯嚯……是说那些震颤？即便在这里也能感知到。所以是母亲正抵抗黑暗……为了救孩子？<hpage>我是这么猜想的。但必须亲自下去深渊，看清真相。<page=M>哎呀呀……这可……不妙。整个纺络都要被她垂死挣扎掀翻。<hpage>或许吧，但我不会坐视王国崩塌。
translated_text: <page=S>You look unfortunate, old man. you just do what you're told, right? Traps pop out, and the creature is swallowed.<hpage>You have bound it to the void!<page=S>We should know more about how our families work. did you really have a hunch?<page=B>so how do we catch our pale relatives? Or are we going to be swallowed up by such greedy efficiency?<hpage>You have made a serious miscalculation. Knight in white, she fell with her mother.<page=M>Oh, ho. there was an earthquake, right? I can feel that power here too. So mothers resist the darkness to save their children.<hpage>This is my guess. I must dive into the sky below and see the truth.<page=M>oh, why not? Unfortunately, the entire pharaoh falls into her hands.<hpage>That may be true, but I'm not going to stand by.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Vous avez l'air malheureux, vieil homme, vous faites juste ce qu 'on vous dit, n'est-ce pas ? Des pièges sortent et la créature est avalé.<hpage>Vous l'avez porté au vide !<page=S>Nous devrions en savoir plus sur le fonctionnement de nos familles. Avez-vous réellement une intuition ?<page=B>Alors, comment attraper nos parents pâles ? Ou allons-nous être engloutés par une telle efficacité avide ?<hpage>Vous avez fait une grave erreur de calcul. Chevalier en blanc, elle est tombée avec sa mère.<page=M>Oh, ho. Il y a eu un tremblement de terre, non ? Je sens aussi cette puissance ici. Ainsi les mères résistent aux ténèbres pour sauver leurs enfants.<hpage>C'est ma supposition. Je dois plonger dans le ciel ci-dessous et voir la vérité.<page=M>Oh, pourquoi pas ? Malheureusement, tout le pharaon tombe entre ses mains.<hpage>C'est peut - être vrai, mais je ne vais pas rester à l'écart.

original_en_text: This lump here is well heavy, and shiny too, so it’s surely worth somethin’!
original_zh_text: 这块沉甸甸的，还闪着光，肯定值点钱儿！
translated_text: Here, this lump is heavy and shiny, so it's definitely worth it!
secondary_translated_text: Ici, ce morceau est lourd et brillant, donc il en vaut vraiment la peine !

original_en_text: Desperate times make for desperate customers, heh heh! So let’s get to tradin’, eh?
original_zh_text: 世道混乱，方便宰客！嘿嘿！赶紧的！
translated_text: A desperate moment makes a desperate customer Hey! do you want to start a deal?
secondary_translated_text: Un moment désespéré fait un client désespéré Hey ! Vous souhaitez commencer un accord ?

original_en_text: Again... Huu... Huu. Truly incredible!<page>Was it the course? Did I lose focus? Or are you simply the bug I have waited so long for? Her of such skill that my wish could, at last, be granted?<page>Another reward must be given for your speed, nimble bug. One deserved in full!
original_zh_text: 又输了……呼……真不可思议！<page>是我分心了？还是你太强？我的心愿终于有机会实现了吗？<page>我得再送你个奖励，你应得的！
translated_text: Once again... Calling. Calling. This is amazing!<page>is this the course? have you lost your concentration? or is it the bug i was waiting for? Her skills are so high, will my wish finally come true? "<page>You have to offer one more reward for your speed and agility mistakes1 man deserves it!
secondary_translated_text: Encore une fois... Appel. appelant. C'est étonnant !<page>Est-ce la course ? Vous avez perdu votre concentration ? Ou est-ce le bug que j'attendais ? Ses compétences sont si élevées, mon souhait se réalisera-t - il enfin ? "<page>Vous devez offrir une récompense de plus pour vos erreurs de vitesse et d'agilité1 homme le mérite !

original_en_text: Have you heard, miss grown-up? Beyond the moss, in the crumbled caverns filled with worms, much change is happening, different to the horrid, stretching dark outside.<page>What brings such bright and bold transformation? Is it a beast? Or a bug unseen? How wondrous it would be to discover them, hidden away in some deep corner!<page>You must go searching, miss grown-up! You and that sharp, sharp blade. Think of the strange and succulent shell waiting to be added to your journal?
original_zh_text: 大姐姐听说了吗？苔原深处满是蠕虫的崩塌洞窟里，正在发生剧变，与外界的恐怖黑灾截然不同。<page> 是什么带来这种鲜明蜕变？是巨兽？还是未知虫类？要是能知道它们是什么，藏在哪里，该多奇妙呀！<page> 你一定要去探索，大姐姐！带上你那锋利的针刃，给记录册里多添上几份奇异的甲壳记录！
translated_text: Do you hear me, Your Majesty? Beyond the moss, in a broken cave infested with insects, there are many changes taking place, unlike the terrifying darkness that spreads outside.<page>What is the cause of such a bold and bold change? Is it a beast? Is this an invisible mistake? How wonderful it would be if we could find it hiding in a deep corner.<page>Your Majesty, Madam, please take a look! You and your knife. Think of a strange, juicy shell waiting to be added to your diary.
secondary_translated_text: Vous m'entendez, Votre Majesté ? Au-delà de la mousse, dans une grotte brisée infestée d'insectes, de nombreux changements se produisent, contrairement à l'obscurité terrifiante qui se répand à l'extérieur.<page>Quelle est la cause d'un changement aussi audacieux et audacieux ? Est-ce une bête ? Est-ce une erreur invisible ? Comme ce serait merveilleux si nous pouvions le trouver caché dans un coin profond.<page>Votre Majesté, Madame, regardez ! Toi et ton couteau ! Pensez à une coquille étrange et juteuse qui attend d'être ajoutée à votre journal.

original_en_text: Now, isn’t this a wondrous place! Golden bells, for weary shells! Ha ha ha!<hpage>This settlement offers safety now, little pilgrim. Perhaps you should make a home here?<hpage>You’ve done well to make it this far, and the roads ahead will only be more dangerous.<page>Oh, dangerous they surely are! But I will gladly tread any path that holds wonders as magnificent as this, red maiden!
original_zh_text: 这地方太妙了！金钟给累瘫的虫子报时！哈哈哈！<hpage>小朝圣者，此处暂时安全，为何不在此安家？<hpage>走到这里实属不易，前方只会更加凶险。<page>凶险又如何！能见到这般奇景，刀山火海我也愿前往！
translated_text: Isn't this a wonderful place? Ringing bells on tired shells! ha ha ha!<hpage>This reconciliation provided security for the young pilgrims. should i settle here?<hpage>You did well. At this point, the road ahead will only be more dangerous.<page>They are really dangerous! " But I can go on the path of such a great miracle, Miss Red!
secondary_translated_text: N'est-ce pas un endroit merveilleux ? Sonner des cloches sur des coquilles fatiguées ! Ha ha ha !<hpage>Cette réconciliation assurait la sécurité des jeunes pèlerins. Dois-je m'installer ici ?<hpage>Tu as bien fait.À ce stade, la route à suivre ne fera que devenir plus dangereuse.<page>Ils sont vraiment dangereux !« Mais je peux aller sur le chemin d'un si grand miracle, Miss Rouge !

original_en_text: <hpage>You have keen sight for my skill, bug, but my childhood has long since passed. What has happened here? I see signs of battle all around.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的眼力不错，我确是一名战士，但早已称不上是孩子。这是怎么回事？到处是打斗痕迹。
translated_text: <hpage>you know my skills well, bug, but my childhood is over. what's going on? There were signs of fighting all around.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Vous connaissez bien mes compétences, bug, mais mon enfance est terminée. Qu 'est-ce qui se passe ? Il y avait des signes de combat partout.

translated_text: <hpage>...
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>...

original_en_text: <hpage>The time is close, Shakra. The cost was grave, and the challenge steep, but I have claimed a power that can put end to this disaster. <page>Gendaa... This is good, Hornet Wielding Needle, essential. My own strength has near reached its limit, and the dark husks continue their assault unceasing.<page>Take your final action, and let us all see the end of this.
original_zh_text: <hpage>时机到了。虽然代价惨重，但我找到了终结灾祸的方法。<page>哏嗒……太好了，小姑娘。我正好快撑不住了，黑虫的攻势永不停歇。<page>放手去干吧，让我们一起见证结局。
translated_text: <hpage>The time is near, Shakra. The costs are great, the challenges are great, but I have the power to end this disaster.<page>So far... then, Bumblebee is waving the needle. This is essential. His power reached its limit, and Darkshell continued to attack.<page>Let's take the last step and see the end of it all.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Le temps est proche, Shakra. Les coûts sont énormes, les défis sont grands, mais j'ai le pouvoir de mettre fin à ce désastre.<page>Jusqu'à présent... Alors Bumblebee agite l'aiguille. C'est essentiel. Son pouvoir atteint sa limite et Darkshell continue d'attaquer.<page>Faisons le dernier pas et voyons la fin de tout cela.

original_en_text: Your achievements in the games are inspiring! In time, I may have to challenge those impressive scores...
original_zh_text: 你创下的记录真令我激动！改天我要挑战看看！
translated_text: Your success in the game is encouraging! As time goes on, you will have to challenge this impressive result.
secondary_translated_text: Votre succès dans le jeu est encourageant ! Au fil du temps, vous devrez contester ce résultat impressionnant.

original_en_text: <hpage>Good luck on your quest Garmond. If you hope to claim justice for your fellows passed, I suspect you’ve some challenge yet ahead.<page>Aye! Zaza and I’ll fight to cavern’s end if it need be, for the bugs held in our hearts, and our honour as knights!
original_zh_text: <hpage>祝你们好运，要找圣堡讨公道可不容易。<page>为了心中的记忆，为了骑士的荣耀！就算要杀遍每处洞穴我们也在所不惜！
translated_text: <hpage>Good luck in your work. If you are seeking justice for your dead compatriots, I think you are still facing some challenges.<page>yes! yes! If necessary, Zaza and I will fight to the end of the cave, fighting for the worm of the heart, and for the honor of knighthood.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Bonne chance dans ton travail. Si vous cherchez à obtenir justice pour vos compatriotes morts, je pense que vous êtes encore confrontés à certains défis.<page>Oui ! Oui ! Si nécessaire, Zaza et moi nous battrons jusqu ' au bout de la grotte, luttant pour le ver du cœur et pour l'honneur de la chevalerie.

original_en_text: Ahh, can you feel it too? The thralls of the Citadel are gathered close, in overwhelming numbers!<page>Together though, the three of us would be more overwhelming still! Would you allow us to fight by your side, brave sister?
original_zh_text: 啊哈，感觉到了吗？圣堡的傀儡在集结，非常多！<page>咱们三个联手，肯定不可阻挡！要一起战斗吗，勇敢的姐妹？
translated_text: oh, do you feel it, too? The slaves of the castle are overwhelmingly assembled!<page>But when the three of us come together, it becomes even more overwhelming! brave sister, will you let me fight with you?
secondary_translated_text: Oh, tu le ressens aussi ? Les esclaves du château sont massivement rassemblés !<page>Mais quand nous nous réunissons tous les trois, cela devient encore plus accablant !« Brave soeur, tu me laisseras me battre avec toi ?

original_en_text: Well, well! See what happens to nasty bully-bugs when they come after poor old Grindle? That’s a well-deserved end, we reckon.<page>We heard this old Sitty-dell was nice and quiet and burstin’ with goodies. So what’s happened, eh? Why’s it crawlin’ with bullies and busybodies?<hpage>The creature that haunts this place is stirring, little thief. The Citadel’s caste now roam the halls. You would do well to leave soon, if you mean to survive.<page>What what? You bein’ mirthful? We’re stayin’ here ‘til we’re done pilfering! You should be the one leavin’ if you’re so afeared!
original_zh_text: 啧啧！瞧瞧那些欺负格林德尔恶霸虫是什么下场？真是活该！<page>都说圣堡既清净，宝贝又多，怎么全是打手？<hpage>掌控此地的怪物正在苏醒，圣堡的守卫四处游荡，想活命就快逃吧，小毛贼。<page>怕什么！起码得等偷够本再说！你要是害怕了，那就自己逃吧！
translated_text: yeah. yeah. What happens when this nasty bully catches up with poor Grindell? I think this is a fitting end.<page>I've heard that this old Citydale is beautiful, quiet, and full of beautiful things. what's going on? why is this place so full of bullies and noisy people?<hpage>The creatures that torment this place are excited, thieves. The castle caste is now wandering the hall. If you want to live, you better get out as soon as possible.<page>what's that? are you laughing? I'll be here until the theft is over! If you are so scared, get out!
secondary_translated_text: Oui, oui. Oui, oui. Que se passe-t - il lorsque ce méchant voyant rattrape le pauvre Grindell ? Je pense que c'est une fin appropriée.<page>J'ai entendu dire que cette vieille Citydale est belle, calme et pleine de belles choses. Qu 'est-ce qui se passe ? Pourquoi cet endroit est-il si rempli de harceleurs et de gens bruyants ?<hpage>Les créatures qui tourmentent cet endroit sont excitées, les voleurs. La caste du château erre maintenant dans le hall. Si vous voulez vivre, vous feriez mieux de sortir le plus tôt possible.<page>Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Tu rires ? Je serai là jusqu'à ce que le vol soit terminé ! Si tu as peur, sortez !

original_en_text: High up, above the caverns all of crust, Nuu has been told of a hole, filled with writhing things, all zipping and zapping.<page>But so sad! Nuu cannot herself see it. The lands quake and rattle. The savage threads stretch. The dangers are too much.<page>It must be you, miss grown-up, older, stiffer, a shell less precious. Seek the cave, and the things within. How else will the journal be complete?
original_zh_text: 努努听说，在布满硬壳的洞窟高处，有个满是扭动生物的洞穴，噼啪作响。<page> 但好可惜！努努不能去看。大地震动，凶暴丝线蔓延，太危险了。<page> 必须靠你了，大姐姐，你甲壳厚实，经验丰富。去探查那个洞穴吧！不然记录册怎么完整呢？
translated_text: There, Noah was told that over every cave in the crust, there was a hole filled with twisted things.<page>But it's sad! Noah himself is not seen. The earth shakes and shakes. The traces of barbarism continue. The danger is too great.<page>It's you, madame and madame. You are old, you work hard, and your shell is no longer valuable. Find the caves and what's in them. how does the journal end?
secondary_translated_text: Là, Noé a été informé que sur chaque grotte dans la croûte, il y avait un trou rempli de choses tordues.<page>Mais c'est triste ! Noé lui-même n'est pas vu. La terre tremble et tremble. Les traces de la barbarie continuent. Le danger est trop grand.<page>C'est vous, madame et madame. Vous êtes vieux, vous travaillez dur, et votre coquille n'a plus de valeur. Découvrez les grottes et ce qu 'elles contiennent. Comment se termine le journal ?

original_en_text: Ahh miss grown-up, Nuu hoped you would return here. For clever Nuu can track well where you have been, she sees your cut-marks and sniffs out your fragrant trail!<page>And look where the trail has led sweet Nuu! A thick wriggler lived in this nest, rumbling and crackling in the darkness.<page>Its sour juices still line these rocky insides, and patient Nuu will gather it all up!<hpage>There is much to learn in these crusted highlands Nuu, but much danger as well. Indulge your curiosity if you must, but keep your senses trained on the darkness.
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！努努跟着你的刀痕和体香找到这啦！<page>这个巢穴住着条乱扭的胖家伙，在黑暗里咔咔响！<page>岩壁上还粘着它的酸液，努努要全部收集！<hpage>这里虽然知识多，但也很危险，别只顾着好奇，也要小心黑暗中的动静。
translated_text: "Lord, please come back here." SmartNuu can keep track of where you are. She looks at your knife, smells you!<page>This road is where you led the beautiful Nu! Inside the nest lived a giant crocodile, which buzzed in the darkness.<page>The stones are still full of sour taste, and the Nui patient collects them!<hpage>In the hardcore plateau of Nu, there is a lot to learn, but there are also a lot of dangers. Fill your curiosity as needed, and train your senses in the dark.
secondary_translated_text: « Seigneur, s'il vous plaît, revenez ici.« SmartNuu peut garder une trace de l'endroit où vous vous trouvez. Elle regarde votre couteau, elle sent votre odeur !<page>C'est là que tu as conduit le beau Nu !À l'intérieur du nid vivait un crocodile géant, qui bourdonnait dans l'obscurité.<page>Les pierres sont encore pleines de goût aigre, et le patient Nui les recueille !<hpage>Dans le plateau hardcore de Nu, il y a beaucoup à apprendre, mais il y a aussi beaucoup de dangers. Remplissez votre curiosité au besoin et entraînez vos sens dans l'obscurité.

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! If strength remains, simply step again to the challenge. Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 别灰心！还有力气就再比一次！
translated_text: Don't be defeated by failure, agile bugs! If the power remains, we will challenge again. Let's fly together!
secondary_translated_text: Ne vous laissez pas vaincre par l'échec, bugs agiles ! Si le pouvoir reste, nous défierons à nouveau. Volaons ensemble !

original_en_text: Oh! Those horrible beasty-beasts are gone! Much and many thanks for you, mighty warrior!<hpage>It was a simple thing, small bug. I assume you are Tipp, the courier?<hpage>Frey, the Bellhart trader, seemed concerned for your safety... and for the cargo you carry.<page>She sent you?! Bah! She needs to learny-learn a little patience! I’m is barely been away! But still... is lucky-lucky for me you came.
original_zh_text: 哇！那些丑、丑八怪全被干掉了！多谢勇士！<hpage>举手之劳。你是蒂普？<hpage>钟心镇的芙蕾很担心你……还有你带的货。<page>她找的你？切！让她学、学着点耐心！我才离开一会儿！
translated_text: oh! The terrifying beast is gone! Thank you, great soldier!<hpage>It's an easy thing, Bug. You are a courier tip, right?<hpage>Frey, a merchant in Berhardt, seems to be concerned for your safety and the cargo you have.<page>did she send it to you? Wow! She needs to learn - learn to be patient! I hardly ever leave! However, even then... You are lucky to be here.
secondary_translated_text: Ooh ! La bête terrifiante est partie ! Merci, grand soldat !<hpage>C'est facile, bug. Vous êtes un courier, non ?<hpage>Frey, un marchand de Berhardt, semble s'inquiéter de votre sécurité et de la cargaison que vous avez.<page>Est-ce qu ' elle vous l'a envoyé ? Wow ! Elle a besoin d'apprendre - d'apprendre à être patient ! Je ne pars presque jamais ! Cependant, même alors... Vous avez de la chance d'être ici.

translated_text: Map of Karak Beach
secondary_translated_text: Carte de Karak Beach

original_en_text: Well, I’m is be off now. That old grubly-grub in the bell will come after me herself if she not get her goods!
original_zh_text: 好吧，我这就送货去。再不回去那个老、老财迷要亲自追来了！
translated_text: All right, I'm going from now on. If the stubborn old woman in the bell gets nothing, she'll come to me herself.
secondary_translated_text: Si la vieille obstinée de la cloche n'obtient rien, elle viendra elle-même à moi.

original_en_text: Now I must train, and strive, further and faster by your example. Your skill upon these tracks has roused my spirit, nimble bug. You shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 现在，我要以你为榜样加倍训练！你点燃了我的斗志！我会永远感谢你的！
translated_text: I need to train now, follow your example, and go further and faster. Your skills in these tracks have awakened my spirit, agile bug. Thank you always for your support.
secondary_translated_text: Je dois m'entraîner maintenant, suivre votre exemple, et aller plus loin et plus vite. Vos compétences sur ces pistes ont réveillé mon esprit, bug agile. Merci toujours de votre soutien.

original_en_text: A town built within the thick vein of bells that runs through Pharloom’s core. One wonders who would craft so many, and for what purpose?
original_zh_text: 建在钟脉上的小镇。谁造的这么多钟？图什么？
translated_text: A town surrounded by a vein of deep bells that runs through the heart of Faro. I want to know who made all this for what.
secondary_translated_text: Une ville entourée d'une veine de cloches profondes qui traverse le cœur de Faro. Je veux savoir qui a fait tout ça pour quoi.

original_en_text: Hornet Wielding Needle! With my master’s passing, I have resolved to improve my skills that, in time, I may match her prime.<page>Much work I must do to achieve that goal. I have found this wide bare stone fine ground on which to train.<page>Would you spar with me now? Raise that blade and test my rings! You may prove my greatest challenge yet.
original_zh_text: "使针的小姑娘！导师不在了，我决定要练到她巅峰水平。<page>这块裸岩地正适合特训。<page>来比划比划？亮兵器吧！你或许是我最大的挑战。"
translated_text: Bumblebee's swinging the needle! With Master's passing, I was determined to hone my skills and eventually catch up with Master's heyday.<page>A lot of work is needed to achieve this goal. I could find this wide, bare stone-like good place, and train there. "<page>Do you want to compete with me now? Raise your blade and test the ring! It may be the biggest challenge I've ever had.
secondary_translated_text: Bumblebee fait balancer l'aiguille ! Avec le décès du Maître, j'étais déterminé à affiner mes compétences et finalement à rattraper l'apogée du Maître.<page>Il faut beaucoup de travail pour atteindre cet objectif. Je pouvais trouver cet endroit large, comme une pierre nue, et m'y entraîner. "<page>Tu veux rivaliser avec moi maintenant ? Levez votre lame et testez l'anneau ! C'est peut - être le plus grand défi que j'ai jamais eu.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your charts and tools show fine skill, Shakra. I’ve met few who’d match your talent.<page>Cartography! Peh. Bakallo! It is a craft-skill common amongst my tribe. Most important to keep one’s mind sharp when on a journey.<page>The charting of caverns, the memory of travel, the knowing of one’s place within the kingdom, an engaging task for a warrior’s mind.<page>An unfortunate thing that my great mentor never learnt the skill. Her talent at getting lost... I should almost be impressed...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的图纸工具很专业，很少见过这般手艺。<page>测绘？呵！吧咔咯！这是我们部落必学的手艺，最重要的是能在旅途中保持专注。<page>记山洞、画路线、辨方位，最适合战士动脑子的活计。<page>可惜我得导师没这本事。她迷路的本事……反而令我佩服……
translated_text: <hpage>Shakla, your charts and tools show you some great skills. Few people can match your talents. "<page>Create a map! Peppercaro! This is a common skill of my tribe. It is most important to clear your head during the journey.<page>Mapping caves, traveling through memories, and knowing your place in the kingdom is a fascinating job for the warrior's mind.<page>Unfortunately, my great teacher did not learn this skill. The lost talent. I should almost be impressed.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakla, vos cartes et outils vous montrent de grandes compétences. Peu de gens peuvent égaler vos talents. "<page>Créez une carte ! Peppercaro. C'est une compétence commune de ma tribu. Il est très important de dégager la tête pendant le voyage.<page>Cartographier les grottes, voyager à travers les souvenirs et connaître sa place dans le royaume est un travail fascinant pour l'esprit du guerrier.<page>Malheureusement, mon grand professeur n'a pas appris cette compétence. Les talents perdus Je devrais être presque impressionné.

original_en_text: Lots of good stuff tucked away in this old prison... lovely place to bring a lucky little snitchbug like Grindle! What a favour those lugs did us! O-hoho!
original_zh_text: 这破监狱藏着不少好货呀……格林德尔就爱关在这种地方！哦嚯嚯！
translated_text: There's a lot of good in this old prison - a nice place to accept a lucky little informer like Grindell! How helpful this ear is! Oh, ho!
secondary_translated_text: Il y a beaucoup de choses bonnes dans cette vieille prison - un endroit agréable pour accepter un petit informateur chanceux comme Grindell ! Comme cette oreille est utile ! Oh, ho !

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<hpage>I am sorry, Nuu. Though I recognise the value in your wish, my own task is too pressing.
original_zh_text: 呜呜，天啊。大姐姐，你拒绝可怜的努努？好伤心！<hpage>抱歉，努努。我知道你这份祈愿的价值，但我的使命更为紧迫。
translated_text: Oh, Mama. Lord, will you deny poor Nu? Lots of acid!<hpage>I'm sorry, nu. I understand the value of your wishes, but my own mission is too urgent.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, maman. Seigneur, refuserez-vous le pauvre Nu ? Beaucoup d'acide !<hpage>Je suis désolé, nu. Je comprends la valeur de vos souhaits, mais ma propre mission est trop urgente.

original_en_text: Come to rest here, miss grown-up? Then let Nuu see our journal, for she is eager to see your cuts!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐来这休息？那快让努努看看记录册，等不及要看你的战果啦！
translated_text: Lord, do you not come here to rest? " She wants to see your video, so Nui, check out our diary!
secondary_translated_text: Seigneur, ne viens-tu pas ici pour te reposer ? Elle veut voir ta vidéo, alors Nui, regardez notre journal !

original_en_text: This great structure... It would have taken the lifetimes of so many bugs to build it. Now its wounds run deep, and I can hear the groaning of its final breaths.<page>Everything that grows must pass, I suppose. Still, to witness even its current state is a privilege I’ll not squander.<page>And what of you, friend Hornet? Where are your travels taking you?<hpage>They have taken me deep, and will take me yet deeper still. I have a responsibility to cut this land free of its dark fate.<hpage>That is no concern of yours though, sir. You should continue your own journey, albeit with a claw on your weapon at all times.
original_zh_text: 这宏伟建筑……不知耗费了多少代虫的心血。如今却只能发出垂死呻吟。<page>盛极必衰吧，大概。不过能见证这最后的余晖也是荣幸。<page>你呢？你的旅途通向哪里？<hpage>我要往更深处去，我有责任斩断这片土地的诅咒。<hpage>但这与你无关。继续你的旅程吧，但要记得握紧武器。
translated_text: This great structure. It takes a lifetime to make many mistakes. The wound grew deeper, and I could hear the moans of my last breath.<page>All growth has to pass through. But to be able to see it as it is is a privilege not to be wasted.<page>How about you, Bumblebee? " Where will your journey take you?<hpage>They fascinate me deeply and they make me deep. It is my duty to free this land from its dark fate.<hpage>But it has nothing to do with you. Even if there are always claws in the weapon, you should keep on the journey.
secondary_translated_text: cette grande structure. Il faut une vie pour faire beaucoup d'erreurs. La blessure s'enfonçait et je pouvais entendre les gémissements de mon dernier souffle.<page>Toute croissance doit passer par. Mais pouvoir le voir tel qu ' il est est un privilège à ne pas gaspiller.<page>Et toi, Bumblebee ? Où votre voyage vous mènera-t - il ?<hpage>Ils m'aiment profondément et ils m'aiment profondément.
