Il est de mon devoir de libérer cette terre de son sombre destin.<hpage>Mais cela n'a rien à voir avec vous. Même s'il y a toujours des griffes dans l'arme, vous devriez continuer le voyage.

original_en_text: To our safe haven? Our home... This is what’s left of it after the great breaking began.<page>There was that terrible noise from above. Everything shook and fell apart, and the black threads sprung up from beneath. Many a poor pilgrim has already been lost to the destruction.<page>You might have been too, if not for some fleeing pilgrims who found you fallen and carried you back to us.<hpage>The black threads... I may understand their source.<hpage>I must speak with the old Caretaker. Do you know what has become of him? I see he has left you his garb.<page>Oh, yes. He charged me with looking after those remaining here, said he had to confer with his family down below.<hpage>Down below... Then they have slunk away to hide in their ruined chapel.<hpage>I must pay them a visit. Thank you, Sherma. Stay safe, and take care of your fellow pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 这里原本是我们的避难所……大崩塌之后就变成这样了。<page>头顶传来可怕的巨响，天花板塌了，地下还冒出黑丝，好多同袍都被卷走了。<page>要不是几个逃难的同袍发现你昏倒在路边，恐怕你也……<hpage>那些黑丝……我大概知晓其源头。<hpage>我得去找老看守者。你可知道他去哪了？你穿着他的衣服。<page>他让我照顾留下的人，说要去下面和家人商量事情。<hpage>下面……肯定是躲到破教堂里了。<hpage>我得去找他们。你多保重，照顾好大家。
translated_text: our safe haven? Our home has remained after the collapse of the Pride.<page>There was a terrifying noise from above. Everything trembles and collapses, and a black line emerges from below. Many poor pilgrims perished in the destruction.<page>If there were no fugitives who found you down and brought us back, you might have been the same.<hpage>The Black Line. Perhaps we can see its origin.<hpage>I need to talk to the old security guard. you know what happened to him? He left your clothes. "<page>Oh, yes, I said that I must take care of those who remain here and consult with the family below.<hpage>Then he infiltrated the destroyed church.<hpage>You must visit them. Thank you, Shaman. Please stay safe and take care of your fellow pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: Notre havre sûr ? Notre maison est restée après l'effondrement de la Fierté.<page>Il y avait un bruit terrifiant venant d'en haut. Tout tremble et s'effondre, et une ligne noire émerge du bas. Beaucoup de pauvres pèlerins périrent dans cette destruction.<page>S'il n'y avait pas eu de fugitifs qui t'ont trouvé et nous ont ramenés, tu aurais pu être la même personne.<hpage>la ligne noire. Peut - être pouvons-nous voir son origine.<hpage>Je dois parler à l'ancien garde de sécurité. Tu sais ce qui lui est arrivé ? Il a laissé tes vêtements. "<page>Oh, oui, j'ai dit que je dois prendre soin de ceux qui restent ici et consulter la famille en bas.<hpage>Puis il a infiltré l'église détruite.<hpage>Vous devez les visiter. Merci à toi, Shaman. Restez en sécurité et prenez soin de vos compagnons de pèlerins.

original_en_text: Bakkana! A battle well won! The haunted bugs have been defeated and the way forward is yours. Let us meet again soon, away from this dreadful Citadel.
original_zh_text: 啵咔呐！赢得漂亮！迷途虫都被消灭了，你可以继续前行了。后会有期，离这鬼圣堡远点。
translated_text: A victorious battle in Bacana! The ghost worm has been defeated and the way forward is yours. Get away from this terrible castle and see you again soon.
secondary_translated_text: Bataille victorieuse à Bacana ! Le ver fantôme a été vaincu et la voie à suivre est la vôtre. S'éloignez de ce terrible château et vous verrez bientôt.

original_en_text: Huge caves ascending to Pharloom’s Citadel. The roads are slowly being devoured by sand and howling wind.
original_zh_text: 通向圣堡的巨洞，风沙正在逐渐吞噬这里的道路。
translated_text: A huge cave extending over the castle of Phalem. The road was swallowed up in sand and roaring.
secondary_translated_text: Une immense grotte s'étendant sur le château de Phalem. La route était engloutie dans le sable et rugissant.

original_en_text: <hpage>Farewell, tall bug, until we cross again.<page>Or until death calmly claims us both...
original_zh_text: <hpage>再会，下次碰面……<page>或许就是我们的死期……
translated_text: <hpage>Goodbye, until we pass by again.<page>until death takes us away peacefully,
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Au revoir, jusqu'à ce que nous repassons.<page>Jusqu'à ce que la mort nous emmène paisiblement,

original_en_text: Again and again you prove your mastery, nimble bug, yet still I never tire of the challenge!<page>As reward for such an impressive feat of endurance, I have only this small trophy, a memento given by my own speed teacher, now fairly passed to you.
original_zh_text: 你一次又一次证明了自己！但我永不厌倦挑战！<page>对这份惊人耐力的奖励，我只有这小奖杯了，是我师父给我的，现在传给你了！
translated_text: You have proven your ability, agility time and time again, but I still love the challenge!<page>As a reward for such an impressive feat of endurance, I have this little trophy. In a souvenir from my own speed teacher, I now give you fairly.
secondary_translated_text: Vous avez prouvé vos capacités, votre agilité maintes et maintes fois, mais j'aime toujours le défi !<page>En récompense pour un tel exploit d'endurance impressionnant, j'ai ce petit trophée. En souvenir de mon professeur de vitesse, je vous donne maintenant juste.

original_en_text: <page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: <page=M>把心带来，古老者。通过它们的搏动，见证这片虫族土地被遗忘的伟力，再焚尽这些记忆换取救赎。
translated_text: <page=S>Old man, give me a heart. He ultimately failed. Before you save these memories, take a first-hand look at the power of this forgotten bug country.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Vieil homme, donne-moi un cœur. Il échoua finalement. Avant de sauvegarder ces souvenirs, jetez un coup d'œil à la puissance de ce pays oublié des insectes.

original_en_text: Tch... Hahahaa. Marvelous! So the spider knows something of fathomless beings, and still it hopes to stand against one, a god... <page>Where do you hide this boundless strength you claim, spider? I’ve watched your struggle towards us. Yours was a painful, broken trek. One needs grace to stand before the divine.<hpage>Then best you keep watching, child. I’ve found those who claim themselves a god can rarely match the title.<hpage>And experience tells me, even gods can fall.
original_zh_text: 哈！有意思！明知对手是神还妄想反抗？<page>你的底气在哪？爬得又慢又狼狈，谒见神明要优雅！<hpage>那你就继续看好了。自封为神的存在往往名不副实。<hpage>何况经验告诉我，即使是神也会陨落。
translated_text: It's called HAHA. That's awesome! Spiders know something about unconscious creatures, but they still want to fight with God.<page>Spider, where is the infinite power? I saw the fight with us. Your journey is a painful and broken journey. A man needs grace to stand before God.<hpage>You'd better keep watching the children, I don't think anyone who claims to be God deserves that title.<hpage>Experience has taught us that even God can fall.
secondary_translated_text: Il s'appelle Haha. C'est génial ! Les araignées savent quelque chose sur les créatures inconscientes, mais elles veulent toujours se battre avec Dieu.<page>Spider, où est la puissance infinie ? J'ai vu le combat avec nous. Votre voyage est un voyage douloureux et brisé. Un homme a besoin de grâce pour se tenir devant Dieu.<hpage>Vous feriez mieux de continuer à regarder les enfants, je ne pense pas que quiconque prétend être Dieu mérite ce titre.<hpage>L'expérience nous a appris que même Dieu peut tomber.

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you look well at home in these wilds.<page>Poshanka! These scorched fields offer many paths and much combat. To leap from vantage upon the red-shells or to meet them face-front with rings ready? These are decisions to live for!<page>I am much surprised those soft pilgrims ever safely climbed this scorched and savage place.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，我看你在这荒野中自在的很。<page>啵尚咔！这片荒野多的是战斗机会。是从高处突袭红壳怪？还是正面对决？这才是战士的生活！<page>那些软脚的朝圣者能爬上这鬼地方，倒是让我吃惊。
translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, you look comfortable in this wilderness.<page>boshanka! These burnt fields provided many roads and many battles. Should I jump on the red shell, or should I wear a ring and greet him from the front? This is the decision that we live!<page>I was amazed that the soft pilgrims climbed safely to this scorched barbaric place.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, tu as l'air à l'aise dans ce désert.<page>boshanka ! Ces champs brûlés fournissaient de nombreuses routes et de nombreuses batailles. Dois-je sauter sur la coquille rouge, ou dois-je porter une bague et le saluer du front ? C'est la décision que nous vivons !<page>J'étais étonné que les pèlerins doux montraient en toute sécurité à cet endroit barbare brûlé.

original_en_text: Here, the proof of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 这是王权之证……神授之印……
translated_text: This is a testimony to our greatness. Symbol of sacred right.
secondary_translated_text: C'est un témoignage de notre grandeur. Symbole de droit sacré.

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>If you are seeking challengers, sir, you should choose a location less far afield. It is rare chance I, or any bug, would come upon this distant cavern.<page>True! Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！终于来个能跑的！<hpage>先生，若想找虫比试，不该待在如此偏远之地。<page>有道理，但最棒的赛道就在这！还远离纺络的破事。<page>这里能尽情展现速度与甲壳之美！来赛一场吧！<page>你也等不及了吧？快来满足我的愿望，一起测试极限！
translated_text: what?! A flexible opponent appeared. At last! Finally!<hpage>If you're looking for a challenger, you should choose a location that's not far away. There was very little chance for me or the insects to enter this remote cave.<page>Really!! But once you discover it, what is perfect? This huge, bone-broken corpse is far removed from the state of Farme.<page>Here you can freely test your speed and smooth case. You can compete here!<page>Challenger, do you want to accomplish it? Let my wish come true! Let's discover the limits together!
secondary_translated_text: Quoi ? ! Un adversaire flexible est apparu. Enfin ! Enfin !<hpage>Si vous cherchez un challenger, vous devriez choisir un emplacement qui n'est pas loin. Il y avait très peu de chance pour moi ou les insectes d'entrer dans cette grotte éloignée.<page>Vraiment ! ! ! Mais une fois qu ' on l'a découvert, qu ' est-ce qui est parfait ? Cet énorme cadavre osseux est très éloigné de l'état de Farme.<page>Ici, vous pouvez librement tester votre vitesse et votre étui lisse. Vous pourrez concourir ici !<page>Challenger, tu veux y arriver ? Que mon vœu se réalise ! Découvrons les limites ensemble !

original_en_text: Our capital, built grand... The seat of our sovereignty... slipped from my mind...<page>Why does it fade? Why can I not recall that sacred place?
original_zh_text: 我的宏伟的都城……我的王座……为什么记不清了……<page>为什么消失了……为什么想不起圣地模样……
translated_text: Our capital is great. Where is the sovereignty? It disappeared from my head.<page>why are they disappearing? Why don't we remember the holy place?
secondary_translated_text: Notre capital est excellent. Où est la souveraineté ? Elle a disparu de ma tête.<page>Pourquoi disparaissent-ils ? Pourquoi ne nous souvenons-nous pas du lieu saint ?

original_en_text: Zaza and I will tarry here a little longer... These pilgrims need watching over, and we are committed to the task.
original_zh_text: 我和扎扎会在这多待一会……这些朝圣者需要照看。
translated_text: Zaza and I will be here a little longer these pilgrims need to be cared for and we are dedicated to that mission.
secondary_translated_text: Zaza et moi serons ici un peu plus longtemps, ces pèlerins doivent être soignés et nous sommes dévoués à cette mission.

original_en_text: Delicious! I like you already!<page>But what a bore it would be to cut you down now, when you’re so achingly close to our grand Citadel...<page>Climb higher, little spider. I want to savour your struggle just a little longer!
original_zh_text: 有意思！我开始喜欢你了！<page>但现在杀你太无聊了，离圣堡就差一步……<page>继续爬吧小蜘蛛！让我想多看看你挣扎的样子！
translated_text: Delicious! I already like it!<page>But how boring it would be to chop you down now, when you are near our magnificent castle. "<page>Climb higher up, little spider. I want to enjoy fighting again!
secondary_translated_text: Délicieux ! Je l'aime déjà !<page>Mais qu ' il serait ennuyeux de vous hacher maintenant, quand vous êtes près de notre magnifique château. "<page>Montez plus haut, petite araignée. J'ai envie de me battre à nouveau !

original_en_text: But Nuu is sensible, she understands. Miss grown-up has purpose, she must be away.<page>The cleaning can wait for another time. Nuu is patient... always patient.
original_zh_text: 但努努很懂事，知道大姐姐有正事要忙。<page>清洁可以等下次，努努很耐心……最有耐心了……
translated_text: Danny is smart and understands. This woman has a purpose, and she has to leave.<page>I 'll wait until next time to clean up. Nu is very patient. Always be patient.
secondary_translated_text: Danny est intelligent et comprend. Cette femme a un but, et elle doit partir.<page>Je vais attendre la prochaine fois pour nettoyer. Elle est très patiente. Soyez toujours patient.

original_en_text: <hpage>You seem to have some familiarity with this prison and its guards. Do you know a path to escape?<page>Escape! A little jailbug like you ain’t ever escapin’ anything! Get out of here, will you? Stop bothering us! You got nothing to steal, so we got nothing to talk about!
original_zh_text: <hpage>你看起来对这里很熟，知道越狱路线吗？<page>想逃？就你？下辈子吧！别烦我们了，身上什么也没有，没资格跟爷说话！
translated_text: <hpage>You seem familiar with prisons and guards. do you know how to escape?<page>run! A little prisoner like you can never escape! " get out of here and don't bother me anymore! There's nothing to steal, so there's no talking!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Vous connaissez les prisons et les gardes. Savez-vous comment s'échapper ?<page>Courir ! Un petit prisonnier comme toi ne peut jamais s'échapper !« Sortez d'ici et ne me dérangez plus ! Il n'y a rien à voler, donc il n'y a pas de discussion !

original_en_text: Though the dust has not yet settled over our battle here, Zaza and I must soon be away. The memory of our village calls us ever onward. Farewell, brave sister!
original_zh_text: 虽然战斗激起的尘埃还没落定，但我们该走啦。村里的大伙催着我们前进呢，保重，姐妹！
translated_text: The battle here is not over yet, but Zaza and I must leave as soon as possible. The memory of the village moves us forward. Farewell, brave sister!
secondary_translated_text: La bataille ici n'est pas encore terminée, mais Zaza et moi devons partir le plus tôt possible. La mémoire du village nous fait avancer. Adieu, brave soeur !

original_en_text: <page>You would challenge again, nimble bug? You have proven yourself time and again.<hpage>Your course can still provide understanding, sir. Upon it, I see my own limits clearer and learn to push them further. <page>Of course! Of course! And I can learn much following behind your fair form.<page>I’d need only a moment, and the track would again be ready.
original_zh_text: <page>还要比？你已经证明实力了。<hpage>还需练习，你的赛道让我能看清自己的极限。<page>那当然好！跟在你这矫健身姿后面也能学到很多！<page>稍等，马上就能布置好新赛道！
translated_text: <page>Do you want to challenge Miss again? You've proven yourself many times.<hpage>Teacher, your course still provides understanding. Since then, I've learned to see my limitations more clearly and push them even further.<page>of course! of course! There is so much to learn from that beauty.<page>It will take a little time and the course will be ready again.
secondary_translated_text: <page>Vous voulez défier Miss à nouveau ? Vous vous avez prouvé à plusieurs reprises.<hpage>Enseignant, votre cours apporte encore la compréhension. Depuis, j'ai appris à voir mes limites plus clairement et à les pousser encore plus loin.<page>Bien sûr ! Bien sûr ! Il y a tant à apprendre de cette beauté.<page>Cela prendra un peu de temps et le parcours sera prêt à nouveau.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your threats are worthless, child. If you are my foe, stay your voice and raise your blade.
original_zh_text: <hpage>不必多费口舌，孩子，要打的话，就亮兵器吧。
translated_text: <hpage>Your threat is meaningless. If you are my enemy, raise your voice and raise your sword. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ta menace n'a aucun sens. Si tu es mon ennemi, lève ta voix et lève ta épée. "

original_en_text: I can save you, little spider. All the trouble you’d face above. All the suffering. It’s so simple.<page>I’ll just skewer you here and now, pluck that flickering life right out of you.
original_zh_text: 我能救你哦~小蜘蛛。只要现在刺穿你，把那点小火星掐灭……<page>所有的苦痛，所有的折磨，就都能解脱了。
translated_text: I can save you, Spider. All the issues you face there. All the suffering. It's so simple.<page>I now unite you and bring forth the life that shines within you.
secondary_translated_text: Je peux te sauver, Spider. tous les problèmes auxquels vous faites face. toute la souffrance. C'est si simple.<page>Je vous unis maintenant et fais ressortir la vie qui brille en vous.

original_en_text: How sad. A little spider has fallen from its cage. So lost. So weak. Poor little morsel.
original_zh_text: 可怜的小蜘蛛从笼中跌落。多迷茫，多脆弱，真是令人心疼。
translated_text: It is sad that a little spider has fallen out of the cage. That's why I lost. I was too weak. Poor little guy.
secondary_translated_text: C'est triste qu 'une petite araignée soit tombée de sa cage. C'est pour ça que j'ai perdu. J'étais trop faible. Pauvre petit garçon.

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, is well-begun. Many creatures have been recorded, but many many more still to be learned of!<page>Miss grown-up, you should rest quick and venture out to hunt again soon, thinks Nuu!
original_zh_text: 哇哇，开了个好头！记了好多生物，但还有更多等着发现！<page>大姐姐赶紧休息完再去打猎呀！
translated_text: Mom, this is a good start. Many organisms have been documented, but we need to know more about them.<page>Rest early and go hunting as soon as possible. think about it!
secondary_translated_text: Maman, c'est un bon début. De nombreux organismes ont été documentés, mais nous devons en savoir plus à leur sujet.<page>Retrouvez-vous tôt et partez à la chasse le plus tôt possible. Réfléchissez-y !

original_en_text: Well fought sister, well fought! Though terrible and tenacious, the beast was no match for us.<page>Be proud! The bugs of this land will sing of our victory to their offspring, and their offspring’s offspring, forever more!
original_zh_text: 打得漂亮！这畜生虽然强悍，但不是我们的对手！<page>等着听这儿的虫子们传唱咱们的战绩吧！
translated_text: Sister, well done! This beast is terrifying and stubborn, but it is not our enemy.<page>I'm proud! The worms of the earth will sing of our victory forever for their descendants.
secondary_translated_text: Sœur, bien fait ! Cette bête est terrifiante et têtue, mais elle n'est pas notre ennemi.<page>Je suis fière ! Les vers de la terre chanteront à jamais de notre victoire pour leurs descendants.

original_en_text: Hah... aha ha ha ha ha!<page>Congratulations, spider. Finally, I felt your sting, and you’ve bared the truth of my pathetic empty shell.<hpage>You always had the scent, child. You are no bug. Yours is a life born entirely from thread.<page>Life? You’re too generous! This weak, wasting existence. This was not life, just a husk shaped to act as a child.<hpage>Yours was life, pale one. Do not confuse your unique creation with its absence. I have seen others make the same mistake.<page>Platitudes, spider? From you? Don’t be gross.<page>Head on. Climb up, up and away. You’ve earned your audience with the divine.<page>Face the holy mother who would fashion so cruel and crude a daughter as me.
original_zh_text: 哈……哈哈哈哈！<page>恭喜啊小蜘蛛，你终于刺痛了我……也知道了我是具可悲的空壳。<hpage>我早察觉到了，孩子。你根本不是虫类，纯粹是丝线捏造的生命。<page>生命？你还真是心善！这种虚弱、日渐腐朽的身躯……这算什么生命，就是具空壳罢了。<hpage>你确实活着，苍白之子。我见过与你类似的存在……即便内里空无一物，你也是独一无二的生命。<page>少说漂亮话了，我只觉得恶心。<page>上去吧，你赢得觐见神明的资格了。<page>去面见那位造出我这般残次品的'圣母'吧……
translated_text: oh! oh!<page>Congratulations, spider. Finally, I felt your pain, and you exposed the truth of my grief shell.<hpage>You are always, child. You are not a worm, your life is born from the line.<page>what about life? You're too generous! This weak and useless existence. This is not life, but a body that functions as a child.<hpage>Your life, a white life. Do not confuse your unique creation with its absence. I see others making the same mistakes.<page>Old, spider? from you? don't get sick.<page>Stand up, stand up, and leave. You've gained a sacred audience.<page>If you confront the Virgin Mary, she will make a cruel and violent daughter like me.
secondary_translated_text: Ooh ! Ooh !<page>Félicitations, Spider ! Enfin, j'ai ressenti ta douleur, et tu as exposé la vérité de ma coquille de chagrin.<hpage>Tu l'es toujours, mon enfant. Vous n'êtes pas un ver, votre vie est née de la ligne.<page>Et pour la vie ? Vous êtes trop généreux ! Cette existence faible et inutile. Ce n'est pas la vie, mais un corps qui fonctionne comme un enfant.<hpage>Sa vie, une vie blanche. Ne confondrez pas votre création unique avec son absence. Je vois d'autres faire les mêmes erreurs.<page>Vieux, araignée ? De vous ? Ne soyez pas malade.<page>Levez-vous, levez-vous et partez. Vous avez gagné un public sacré.<page>Si vous affrontez la Vierge Marie, elle fera une fille cruelle et violente comme moi.

original_en_text: Conversing is a pleasure, but I must return to my observance. Try not to leave too much of a trail when you leave, please.
original_zh_text: 和你聊天很愉快，但我得继续去观察了。离开时注意别留太多痕迹。
translated_text: It's fun to talk about, but I have to get back to the ritual. Try not to leave any traces when you leave.
secondary_translated_text: C'est amusant de parler, mais je dois revenir au rituel. Essayez de ne pas laisser de traces lorsque vous partez.

original_en_text: <page=M>Enough chatting, Old One. Best you get heading below. Whatever action you’re planning, time is against you.
original_zh_text: <page=M>那么闲话少叙，古老者。赶紧下去吧，您的计划可拖不起。
translated_text: <page=M>Stop it, old man. Please drive me. No matter what action you take, time is fighting you.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Arrêtez-le, vieil homme, s'il vous plaît conduisez-moi, quelle que soit l'action que vous prenez, le temps vous combat.

original_en_text: For sharing this moment I shall have you accept a gift, one I had believed I would never pass. <page>You would take these rings, and the learnings to make more.<page>They are built of a clever method devised by my master and will crush hard this kingdom’s toughest shell. Use them, and she is remembered!<hpage>My thanks, Shakra. To gain a tool so defined by its owner, I am much grateful. They shall prove a great aid on my own journey.
original_zh_text: 谢谢你陪我度过这一时刻，这些东西我本想永远留着……你当作谢礼收下吧。<page>这些环刃和制法都传给你。<page>它们是按我导师的巧思打造的，能击碎最硬的壳。希望你用得上，以此纪念她！<hpage>感激不尽，沙克拉。能继承如此珍贵的武器，对我的旅程大有帮助。
translated_text: To share this moment, please accept the gift that I believe I will never give away.<page>Take these rings and learn the details.<page>It was built in an ingenious manner devised by my master to crush the hardest shells in the kingdom. It will be used and remembered!<hpage>Thank you very much. We appreciate the owner being able to use the tools defined. It will help me a lot on my own journey.
secondary_translated_text: Pour partager ce moment, acceptez le cadeau que je crois ne jamais donner.<page>Prenez ces bagues et apprenez les détails.<page>Il a été construit d'une manière ingénieuse conçue par mon maître pour écraser les coquilles les plus dures du royaume. Elle sera utilisée et mémorisée !<hpage>Merci beaucoup à vous. Nous apprécions que le propriétaire puisse utiliser les outils décrits. Cela m'aidera beaucoup dans mon voyage.

original_en_text: The warmth of these caverns keeps many smells alive! Is good for Nuu, who is always searching carefully for learnings!
original_zh_text: 洞窟里的余温保留着气味！正适合努努慢慢探索！
translated_text: The warmth of this cave leaves a lot of smell! This is good news for Noo, who is always looking for knowledge!
secondary_translated_text: La chaleur de cette grotte laisse beaucoup d'odeur ! C'est une bonne nouvelle pour Noo, qui est toujours en quête de connaissances !

original_en_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths provide some respite from the dangers without, but even so you should not let down your guard.<hpage>You must have seen now that the bugs of this Citadel are long fallen to the Haunting.<page>Ahh... some of my brothers and sisters have seemed... lost somehow, yes. But to be lost is to be sometime found, is it not sung?<page>Yes... The Citadel will provide for them. It is a holy place indeed, that holds wonders such as this lovely warm bath!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，别因为泡澡放松警惕。<hpage>你也看到了，此地的虫民多半被丝咒侵蚀。<page>有些同袍确实……看着不太对劲。但迷途终有归时，对吧？<page>圣堡自会庇佑他们。能有这么舒服的暖泉，肯定是圣地没错！
translated_text: <hpage>A small sink, these bathtubs will temporarily alleviate the dangers outside, but even then you can not relax your vigilance.<hpage>As you can see, the insects in this castle have already fallen into the hands of the ghosts.<page>ah... Like my brothers and sisters. Why did you lose, yeah? But you'll find what you've lost someday, right?<page>That's right, sir. The castle serves them. This is a truly sacred place, and there are wonders like this lovely hot tub!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Petit évier, ces baignoires atténueront temporairement les dangers extérieurs, mais même alors vous ne pourrez pas relâcher votre vigilance.<hpage>Comme vous pouvez le voir, les insectes de ce château sont déjà tombés entre les mains des fantômes.<page>Ah, oui. Comme mes frères et soeurs. Pourquoi avez-vous perdu, oui ? Mais vous retrouverez ce que vous avez perdu un jour, non ?<page>C'est juste, monsieur. Le château les sert. C'est un endroit vraiment sacré, et il y a des merveilles comme ce magnifique bain à remous !

original_en_text: Hoi! Let our mighty contest of shells commence again!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！再战一轮！<page>我马上布置新的赛道！
translated_text: Hey! Let's also start a powerful shell race!
secondary_translated_text: Hey ! Commençons aussi une puissante course de coquilles !

original_en_text: Hoy! We thought one of them buzzing bullies was sneakin’ up on us, but it’s just a mangy jailbug!<page>Why you in here, then? Caught thievin’ were you? Greedy, greedy!<hpage>I’ve stolen nothing. Rather, I suspect the wardens are servants of the Citadel. The cage used in my capture bore similar runes to the one that first brought me to this land.<hpage>Bound in that cage, I’d have proved a fine gift were they to deliver me to their masters.<page>Pah, there ain’t nothin’ fine about you, jailbug. We recognised a fellow thief soon as we saw you!<page>Now, don’t be lingerin’ around here. Those guards’ll be wanting to pop you back in your cage quick quick!<hpage>They’ll not get the chance. I will reclaim my belongings and leave this grim place with haste.
original_zh_text: 还当是狱卒呢，结果是只脏老鼠！<page>你是因为偷什么进来的？贪心鬼！<hpage>我没偷东西。这儿的狱卒应该侍奉于圣堡，抓我的笼子和最初那个有相同印记。<hpage>如此执着于我，看来它们真的认为我是一份献给主人的好礼物。<page>呸，你身上有什么好的！少装蒜，我一看你就一脸贼相！<page>快走快走！别在附近瞎晃悠，小心又被关回笼子！<hpage>他们没机会的，我取回自己的东西就走。
translated_text: hey! I thought the bully was approaching, but it was just a dirty escape!<page>why did you come here? did you catch the thief? Greed, greed!<hpage>I didn't steal anything. I suspect that the keeper is a servant of the castle. The cage in which I am imprisoned is carved with a runic letter similar to the cage that first brought me to this land.<hpage>If they handed me over to my masters and I was locked in a cage, I would be a wonderful gift.<page>You don't have a good one, Warden. The moment I saw it, I knew the thief! "<page>Please do not stay here. The guards want you back in the cage. hurry!<hpage>He had no chance. I want to get my things back and get out of this dark place as soon as possible.
secondary_translated_text: Hé ! Je croyais que l'intimidateur s'approchait, mais c'était juste une sale échappée !<page>Pourquoi es-tu venu ici ? Avez-vous attrapé le voleur ? Greed, greed !<hpage>Je n'ai rien volé. Je suppose que le gardien est un serviteur du château. La cage dans laquelle je suis emprisonné est sculptée avec une lettre runique similaire à la cage qui m'a amené à cette terre.<hpage>S'ils m'avaient livré à mes maîtres et que j'étais enfermé dans une cage, je serais un merveilleux cadeau.<page>Vous n'en avez pas un bon, monsieur le surveillant. Au moment où je l'ai vu, j'ai reconnu le voleur ! "<page>S'il vous plaît ne restez pas ici. Les gardes veulent vous remettre dans la cage. Dépêche-toi !<hpage>Il n'avait aucune chance. Je veux récupérer mes affaires et sortir de cet endroit sombre le plus tôt possible.

original_en_text: You recover quickly. Already, my ring-marks have faded from your shell. If you are prepared, let us duel again.
original_zh_text: 你恢复真快，我留下的环印都消了。准备好了我们就再战。
translated_text: Your recovery is fast, my ring imprint has vanished from your shell. If we are ready, we will fight again.
secondary_translated_text: Votre rétablissement est rapide, mon empreinte de bague a disparu de votre coquille. Si nous sommes prêts, nous nous battrons de nouveau.

original_en_text: ...Yes, communication is the heart of it. The grandest boasts and the tiniest murmurings all have their meanings...<page>...Your point is well made. Even the flowers have their stories to tell. Light can be cast anywhere...<hpage>I’ve no desire to interrupt your meditations, Herald, but I am eager to speak with you, if you would listen...<page>...Take note of it all, render it in line, you’ll be glad that you did. You can take the journey home with you...
original_zh_text: ……沟通至关重要。无论豪言壮语还是呢喃低语皆有深意……<page>……此言甚是。野花亦在诉说故事。光明无处不在...<hpage>使者大人，无意打扰冥思，但我急盼能与您交谈，您……<page>……记录所见所闻，他日必将受用。故乡之路存于心……
translated_text: ... Yes, communication is core. There's a reason for the biggest blowing and the smallest whistling.<page>... You have a meaning. Flowers also have a story. The light can be projected anywhere.<hpage>I don't want to interrupt your thoughts, Pioneer, but I'd like to talk to you, if you would listen.<page>... If you write it all down and present it in order, you'll be glad you did it. You can make the journey home.
secondary_translated_text: ... Oui, la communication est au cœur. Il y a une raison pour le plus grand soufflement et le plus petit sifflement.<page>... Vous avez un sens. Les fleurs aussi ont une histoire. La lumière peut être projetée n'importe où.<hpage>Je ne veux pas interrompre vos pensées, Pionnier, mais j'aimerais vous parler, si vous voulez écouter.<page>... Si vous écrivez tout et que vous le présentez dans l'ordre, vous serez heureux de l'avoir fait.

original_en_text: Oooh, but the scroll is so heavy with beautiful beasts! Could it be that the works is almost complete? Miss grown-up, you must keep your preyings up. No time for rest!
original_zh_text: 哎呀，记录册都快写满了！是不是快完成了？大姐姐不能偷懒哦！
translated_text: But there are plenty of beautiful beasts in the scroll! Is the project almost complete? Lord, miss, please continue to hunt. No time to rest!
secondary_translated_text: Mais il y a beaucoup de belles bêtes dans le rouleau ! Le projet est-il presque terminé ? Seigneur, madame, continuez à chasser. Pas le temps de se reposer !

original_en_text: The myth we made... by grace... by blade...<page>All bowed before we princes green...
original_zh_text: 我们缔造的传说……凭恩泽……凭利刃……<page>万虫皆向绿王臣服……
translated_text: The myths we have created. I thank you for your grace. Use the blade.<page>and all of you bow down to our green prince
secondary_translated_text: Les mythes que nous avons créés. Je vous remercie pour votre grâce. Utilisez la blade.<page>et vous tous vous prosternerez devant notre prince vert

original_en_text: So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 那些简单……快乐……自由的时光……
translated_text: Many moments are simple. Freedom and Joy.
secondary_translated_text: Beaucoup de moments sont simples. Liberté et joie.

original_en_text: Do you see? How crass and frail that Citadel’s machines! This one groans in pain at its very existence.<hpage>Its mechanism is likely jammed. If the gears were unstuck its clamorous complaints would soon cease, and it could become a useful place to rest.<page>A place to rest or no, I desire only for the noise to stop!
original_zh_text: 瞧见没？圣堡的破机器嘎吱乱叫，活着都费劲。<hpage>齿轮卡住了。修好应该能当个歇息的好地方，噪音也能停。<page>歇不歇息无所谓，我只想赶紧让这破响动停下来！
translated_text: did you see that? How simple and fragile are the machinery of the fortress! The man groaned, suffering at his presence.<hpage>The mechanism may get stuck. When you take off the gear, the noise immediately stops, making it a convenient place to rest.<page>Whether you have a break or not, you just want to stop the noise!
secondary_translated_text: Tu as vu ça ? Combien sont simples et fragiles les machines de la forteresse ! L'homme gémissait, souffrant à sa présence.<hpage>Le mécanisme peut être bloqué. Lorsque vous enlevez l'équipement, le bruit s'arrête immédiatement, ce qui en fait un endroit pratique pour se reposer.<page>Que vous ayez une pause ou non, vous voulez juste arrêter le bruit !

original_en_text: These root-woven roads show evidence of my master’s passage. A thrice-crushed bug, gouged wood, score-prints of sharp claws passing. Small signs that only I can read.<page>Though the trail is cold, it eases me to know she is still within this land.
original_zh_text: 这附近有导师踪迹：尖锐的爪痕、凿开的树木、压扁的虫尸……只有我看得懂。<page>虽然痕迹都挺久了，但知道她还在纺络我就安心了。
translated_text: The paths weave by these roots are a testimony that the Master has walked. One worm was crushed three times, the tree was torn apart, and the claws left sharp marks. It's a small sign that only I can read.<page>The road was cold, but he was relieved to know she was still on land.
secondary_translated_text: Les chemins tissés par ces racines sont un témoignage que le Maître a marché. Un ver a été écrasé trois fois, l'arbre a été déchiré, et les griffes ont laissé des marques tranchantes. C'est un petit signe que seul moi je peux lire.<page>La route était froide, mais il était soulagé de savoir qu ' elle était toujours sur terre.

original_en_text: <hpage>These are dangerous fields, young one, not for casual wandering. What task sees you brave them?<page>A treacherous quest! But a crucial one! Upon the last wish of my father, I’ve taken up the study of these wild caves.<page>These fields still display life and growth, even as the lands around erode to dust.<page>There is a hot harmony here that eludes the grey wastes above and the dry Marrow beside. With time and study, I shall uncover why.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小虫子，这片荒野很危险，你怎么有胆子进来闲逛？<page>虽然危险，但很重要！我是继承父亲遗志在研究这些洞穴！<page>即便到处都是腐蚀和灰烬，这片荒野却还显露着生机。<page>这里肯定有特殊热源维系，我要找出原因！
translated_text: <hpage>Young people, this is dangerous territory, and we can't just hang around. What courage do you have to face them?<page>It's a dangerous mission! However, this is essential! In my father's hopes, I began to study the wild caves.<page>Even when the surrounding land is eroded and turned to dust, the fields are still vibrant and growing.<page>There is a burning harmony avoiding the gray waste on top and the dried bone marrow next door. With time and research, you'll see why.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Jeunes gens, c'est un territoire dangereux, et nous ne pouvons pas simplement traîner. Quel courage avez-vous pour les affronter ?<page>C'est une mission dangereuse ! Cependant, c'est essentiel ! Dans l'espoir de mon père, j'ai commencé à étudier les grottes sauvages.<page>Même lorsque les terres environnantes sont érodées et transformées en poussière, les champs sont toujours dynamiques et en croissance.<page>Il y a une harmonie brûlante en évitant les déchets gris en haut et la moelle osseuse sèche à côté. Avec le temps et la recherche, vous verrez pourquoi.

original_en_text: Track your location throughout these winding lands with a bone compass. Each member of our tribe can craft them. I would pass you mine, for a small price.
original_zh_text: 这个骨制罗盘能让你分辨自己的位置。我们部落都会做，付点小钱就给你。
translated_text: Use a bone compass to track the location of the crooked land. Anyone in our tribe can make it I'll just give you my little money.
secondary_translated_text: Utilisez une boussole osseuse pour suivre l'emplacement de la terre tordu. N'importe qui de notre tribu peut y arriver, je vais juste vous donner mon petit argent.

original_en_text: Ooooh, ma ma! Even young Nuu never guessed that Pharloom held so many fascinating creatures! Soft ones, hard ones, small ones, big ones! Nuu is greedy to see what remains!
original_zh_text: 哇！连努努都没想到纺络有这么多神奇生物！软的硬的大的小的！好贪心，好想看剩下的！
translated_text: Oh, Mama! Even the young Nu never thought there were so many fascinating creatures on Faro Island. Soft, hard, small, big! Noo is greedy to see what's left!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Maman ! Même les jeunes Nu n'auraient jamais pensé qu ' il y avait autant de créatures fascinantes sur l'île Faro. Doux, dur, petit, gros ! Noo est gourmand pour voir ce qui reste !

original_en_text: You see this idol before us, red maiden? I have passed its like before. They mark our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a miraculous shrine will rise from the ground, and we will have a place to rest! Such a wonder!<hpage>It is not song that rouses this shrine, but payment in rosaries.<hpage>Without rosaries, the shrine remains hidden. I have encountered similar constructs on Pharloom’s paths. This kingdom does not grant rest lightly.
original_zh_text: 看见这圣像了吗？沿途都有标记。<page>对着它歌唱，圣椅就会升起供我们歇息！多神奇！<hpage>唤醒长椅的不是歌声，谢尔玛，而是念珠。<hpage>无念珠者不得休憩，纺络从不轻易施恩。
translated_text: Do you see the red girl in front of us? I have experienced it before. I remember our pilgrimage very well.<page>If you sing to it, a magical temple will rise up and become a place of rest. what a miracle!<hpage>It is not the song that wakes the temple, but the reward of the Rosary.<hpage>There is no Rosary, and the shrine remains hidden. I came across a similar building on my way to Faram. The Kingdom does not rest easily.
secondary_translated_text: Tu vois la femme rouge devant moi ? Je l'ai déjà vécu auparavant. Je me souviens très bien de ce pèlerinage.<page>Si vous le chantez, un temple magique s'élèvera et deviendra un lieu de repos. Quel miracle !<hpage>Ce n'est pas le chant qui réveille le temple, mais la récompense du Rosaire.<hpage>Il n'y a pas de chapelet, et le sanctuaire reste caché. Je suis tombé sur un bâtiment similaire sur mon chemin vers Faram. Le royaume ne se repose pas facilement.

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>These I have fashioned from the husks of old bells. A hard task to make, so the cost reflects the extra effort.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>用古钟的壳打磨成的，可费劲了。
translated_text: It can be used to mark important places and reminders on the map.<br><br>I made it with an old watch case. This is a difficult task, so the cost reflects the extra effort.
secondary_translated_text: Il peut être utilisé pour marquer des lieux importants et des rappels sur la carte.<br><br>Je l'ai fait avec un vieux étui de montre. C'est une tâche difficile, donc le coût reflète l'effort supplémentaire.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Here we meet, high atop this twisted steel structure. I can sense fierce enemies ahead.<page>It seems you too draw closer to your trail’s end. With my own task now resolved, my rings call for combat.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, shall we fight forward together?
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！你好啊，又见面了。我能感受到前面有强大的敌人在呢。<page>看来你的旅途也走了很远了。现在我的任务也完成了，正手痒呢。<page>使针的小姑娘，怎么说，我们一起上吧？
translated_text: boshanka! We meet here, right above this twisted steel structure, you can feel the fierce enemy in front of you.<page>You seem to be nearing the end of the road. Now that my mission is over, my ring needs to fight.<page>do hornets wave their needles and fight together?
secondary_translated_text: boshanka ! Nous nous rencontrons ici, juste au-dessus de cette structure en acier tordu, vous pouvez sentir l'ennemi féroce devant vous.<page>On dirait que vous approchez de la fin de la route. Maintenant que ma mission est terminée, mon anneau doit se battre.<page>Les guêpes agitent-elles leurs aiguilles et se battent ensemble ?

original_en_text: All of these marvellous healing supplies... Surely they, at least, are some proof of the Citadel’s holy nature?
original_zh_text: 这么多神奇药品……至少说明圣堡还是灵验的吧？
translated_text: All great treatments. At least, are they evidence of the sacred nature of the castle?
secondary_translated_text: Tous les bons traitements. Sont-ils au moins la preuve de la nature sacrée du château ?

original_en_text: H-hoy red m-maiden! Have no f-fear, ‘tis only I, Sherma!<page>I found healing supplies, b-but then the way back collapsed... and I heard moaning from the dark... oh, how thankful I am to see you!
original_zh_text: 红、红衣姑娘！是我是我！<page>我找到药，可是路塌了……又听见黑暗里有怪声……见到你太好了！
translated_text: Hey, red girl! Don't be afraid, it's me, Shaman!<page>How grateful I was to see you when I found the healing supplies, and when I heard groans in the darkness that was sinking on my way home!
secondary_translated_text: Hé, petite fille rouge ! N'ayez pas peur, c'est moi, chaman !<page>Comme j'étais reconnaissant de vous voir quand j'ai trouvé les fournitures de guérison, et quand j'ai entendu des gémissements dans l'obscurité qui s'enfonçait sur le chemin du retour !

translated_text: Map of Worms
secondary_translated_text: Carte des worms

translated_text: shall we fight together?
secondary_translated_text: Allons-nous lutter ensemble ?

original_en_text: The great Citadel is so close, I can hear the voices of our brother and sister pilgrims calling out to us!
original_zh_text: 圣堡近在咫尺！兄弟姐妹的呼唤已传到我耳中了！
translated_text: The great castle was nearby, and the call of the brothers and sisters of the pilgrims could be heard.
secondary_translated_text: Le grand château était à proximité, et on pouvait entendre l'appel des frères et sœurs des pèlerins.

original_en_text: What a battle, brave warrior! You’re the first I’ve seen who could match the red-shells and emerge victorious.<hpage>They are deadly foes indeed, and seemingly keen hunters. You did well to keep yourself hidden from them, young bug.<page>I did, didn’t I? Disguise and subterfuge are skills I’ve honed keenly, all in aid of my most important work!
original_zh_text: 打得太漂亮了！我还是头回见有虫能干掉红壳怪！<hpage>它们确实是狠角色，狩猎本能很强。你躲得挺好。<page>是吧？伪装潜行可是我的绝活，都是为了伟大研究！
translated_text: What a fight, brave soldiers! You're the first one who could compete with Red Shell and win.<hpage>They are truly deadly enemies, and they seem to be avid hunters. You're doing a good job of keeping yourself away from them, little bug.<page>you did, right? Costumes and tricks are skills that I have carefully honed to help me do the most important work!
secondary_translated_text: Quel combat, brave soldats ! Vous êtes le premier à rivaliser avec Red Shell et à gagner.<hpage>Ils sont vraiment des ennemis mortels, et ils semblent être des chasseurs avides. Tu fais du bon travail de te tenir à l'écart d'eux, petit bug.<page>Tu l'as fait, non ? Les costumes et les astuces sont des compétences que j'ai soigneusement affinées pour m'aider à faire le travail le plus important !

original_en_text: Mind yourself while you travel this grim land. A great winged beast has been stalking the heights, swooping without warning and tearing the life out of unwary travellers!<hpage>I believe I have seen the creature you speak of. It may have marked me as prey, and followed me down onto the lower roads of the moor.<page>What what! Gurrrooo! The beast has been spotted! Once Zaza has fully rested, we’ll set to tracking it down!
original_zh_text: 当心天上，有只长翅膀的畜生专抓路人！<hpage>我见过它，多半是盯上我了，还跟到了沼泽这边。<page>你说什么！嘎噜！那畜生就在附近！等扎扎歇够了就去宰了它！
translated_text: Be careful when traveling in this harsh land. A giant winged beast wanders the skies above, lurking without warning, and taking the lives of careless travelers!<hpage>I saw the creature you mentioned. It may mark me as prey, and follow the low path of the wilderness.<page>what's that? what are you doing? GORAM! The Beast has been found! Once Zaza is fully rested, we will start the pursuit!
secondary_translated_text: Soyez prudent lorsque vous voyagez dans ce pays dur. Une géante bête ailée erre dans le ciel, se cachant sans avertissement et prenant la vie de voyageurs imprudents !<hpage>J'ai vu la créature dont tu parles. Il peut me marquer comme une proie, et suivre le chemin bas du désert.<page>Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Qu 'est-ce que vous faites ? Goram ! La bête a été trouvée ! Une fois que Zaza sera complètement reposée, nous commencerons la poursuite !

original_en_text: Welcome back red maiden, and thank you again for coming to my aid.<page>I’m no healer, but with the supplies we found in the ward below even my unlearned claws can ease the suffering of our brothers and sisters.<page>That such darkness could creep into this most holy of places, even though we pilgrims kept our promise to ascend...<page>I confess, I wonder at the meaning of it all. But enlightenment does not come easily, or all at once... I should just continue my task in the meantime.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘回来啦！再次感谢你帮忙。<page>我本来不懂医术，不过从下面拿来了药，简单包扎也能止痛。<page>我们千辛万苦爬上来，黑暗还是钻进了圣地……<page>实在想不通！但悟道要慢慢来……先做好手头的事吧！
translated_text: Welcome home, red girl, thank you for your help.<page>I'm not a therapist, but with the supplies I found in the ward below, even the nails I haven't learned can ease the suffering of my brothers and sisters.<page>We pilgrims keep our promises to climb the mountain, but darkness creeps into this most sacred place.<page>I want to know what that means. But enlightenment is not easy, or it comes suddenly - - and at the same time, I must continue my mission.
secondary_translated_text: Bienvenue à la maison, fille rouge, merci de votre aide.<page>Je ne suis pas un thérapeute, mais avec les fournitures que j'ai trouvées dans la salle d'en bas, même les ongles que je n'ai pas appris peuvent soulager la souffrance de mes frères et sœurs.<page>Nous, pèlerins, tenons nos promesses d'escalader la montagne, mais les ténèbres se glissent dans ce lieu très sacré.<page>Je veux savoir ce que cela signifie. Mais l'illumination n'est pas facile, ou elle vient soudainement - et en même temps, je dois continuer ma mission.

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! I was hoping we would meet here, red maiden.<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of my brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. You have seen now the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 嗯？红衣姑娘！没想到在这儿碰上了！<page>能登上圣堡和这么多同袍团聚……真是恩赐……嗯，是恩赐。<hpage>你听起来有些犹豫？想必你已看清此地的破败真相，有什么感想？
translated_text: what? what? Oh, there it is! See you here, Red.<page>Eventually I climbed high in the castle and became a mediator for many brothers and sisters. This is truly a blessing. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice, little pilgrim, hides this fear of faith. Now, we have seen the reality of this broken place. what do you think about this?
secondary_translated_text: Quoi ? Quoi ? Oh, voilà, c'est ! Rendez-vous ici, Red.<page>Finalement, je grimpe haut dans le château et je suis devenu un médiateur pour beaucoup de frères et sœurs. C'est vraiment une bénédiction. Oui, une bénédiction.<hpage>Ta voix, petit pèlerin, cache cette peur de la foi. Maintenant, nous avons vu la réalité de ce lieu brisé. Que pensez-vous à ce sujet ?

original_en_text: Safely-saved is Pill! But who is this rare carer for the shell of another? Name yourself, good bug!<hpage>I am Hornet, Pill. Your brother wished for your return to Bellhart, where he waits now. I’m sure he will be eager to see you alive.<page>Young Tipp! How he worries always. Blessed I am for the care, him and you Miss Hornet! A lucky bug is me!
original_zh_text: 皮尔安、安全了！这位好心女士怎么称呼？<hpage>我叫大黄蜂。你的兄弟蒂普在钟心镇等你，快回去吧。<page>小蒂普！总是瞎操心。多谢你啦大黄蜂小姐！我运气真好！
translated_text: The pills are safe! But who is the unusual man to take care of the shells of other humans? Say your own name, good bug!<hpage>This is wasp, Pierre. Your brother says he wants you back to Berhardt alive and he'll want to see you waiting there. "<page>Young Chip! I was always worried about her. I'm lucky to be able to take care of him and you, Miss Hornet. I'm lucky!
secondary_translated_text: Les pilules sont sûres ! Mais qui est l'homme inhabituel pour prendre soin des coquilles d'autres humains ? Dites votre propre nom, bon bug !<hpage>C'est la guêpe, Pierre. Ton frère dit qu 'il veut que tu reviennes vivant à Berhardt et qu' il voudra te voir là - bas. "<page>Jeun Chip ! J'ai toujours été inquiet pour elle, j'ai la chance de pouvoir prendre soin de lui et de vous, Miss Hornet. Je suis chanceuse !

original_en_text: I pray my dice bring you luck on your final climb, sister. And I pray that by parting with them, my own ascent shall be made lighter.
original_zh_text: 愿骰子保佑你登顶，姐妹。送走它们，我身上的负担也轻了。
translated_text: Sister, I pray that my dice will bring you good luck on your final climb. I pray that by being away from them, my own ascension will be easier.
secondary_translated_text: Sœur, je prie que mes dés vous apporteront bonne chance dans votre dernière ascension. Je prie pour qu ' en étant loin d'eux, mon propre ascension soit plus facile.

original_en_text: See here, this old statue. I’ve been thinking long on it, what clues it might hold.<page>The claw-work seems beyond the other structures throughout these caves. Who was she I wonder, to deserve such refined remembrance?<hpage>Hers is the form of a dancer, and the craft is indeed exquisite. There must once have been more to these ants, before the Haunting snared their shells and minds.
original_zh_text: 看这尊古雕像！我盯着它看了好久。<page>工艺比周围建筑精细多了。她到底是谁呢，值得被这样铭记？<hpage>看样子是名舞者，造型确实精美。看来蚁族被丝咒控制前肯定辉煌过。
translated_text: Look at this old statue. For a long time, I wondered what that meant.<page>The claws appear to transcend the other structures of these caves. Who was she to deserve such a memory?<hpage>Her style is the shape of a dancer, and the craftmanship is really great. Before the ghosts can enclose their shells and their hearts, ants must have a lot more.
secondary_translated_text: Regardez cette vieille statue. Pendant longtemps, je me demandais ce que cela signifiait.<page>Les griffes semblent dépasser les autres structures de ces grottes. Qui était-elle pour mériter un tel souvenir ?<hpage>Son style est la forme d'une danseuse, et l'artisanat est vraiment génial. Avant que les fantômes puissent enfermer leurs coquilles et leurs cœurs, les fourmis doivent en avoir beaucoup plus.

translated_text: ah... The smell of prohibition.
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. L'odeur de la prohibition.

original_en_text: Holy water, nice and hot,<br>Makes a perfect swimming spot,<br>Heals your worries in a flash,<br>So jump on in... splash splash splash! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 圣水暖又清，<br>泡澡好舒心，<page>烦恼顷刻散，<br>扑通跳进来！哈哈哈！
translated_text: The holy water is warm.<br>The best place to swim,<br>Release your worries immediately,<br>So jump in. Splash! ha ha ha!
secondary_translated_text: L'eau sainte est chaude.<br>Le meilleur endroit pour nager,<br>Libérez immédiatement vos soucis,<br>Alors sautez dans. Splash ! Ha ha ha !

original_en_text: Very, very lucky little trinket we got ‘ere! Pulls ‘em little clickie-clackies right into yer waitin’ claws!
original_zh_text: 超级幸运的招财符！把叮当响都吸过来！
translated_text: There are some very lucky little things here! Pull them to your feet!
secondary_translated_text: Il y a quelques petites choses très chanceuses ici ! Tirez-les sur vos pieds !

original_en_text: Gurrroo! A fellow warrior braves this blighted place! Know you stand before the honoured knight Garmond, and brave companion Zaza.<page>Together, Zaza and I are wish bound to scale this Citadel, and vanquish the horrors at its heart!<hpage>Then good luck to you, sir bug. It is heartening to meet another of sound mind and fortitude enough to fight back against the many haunted husks.<page>Aye! Never-ending, these unnatural opponents! This Citadel seems its twisted source, and honour decrees we must fight on, until we rend the heart of its decay!
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！又来个勇士！我乃荣耀骑士加蒙德，这位是忠仆扎扎！<page>我们要杀上圣堡，端了诅咒的老巢！<hpage>那祝你好运。难得能遇见敢反抗丝咒傀儡的清醒者。<page>是啊，这些傀儡，杀都杀不完！圣堡似乎就藏着祸根，必须捣毁！
translated_text: GORAM! Comrades stand up bravely in this desolate place! You know that you are standing before the revered knight Gamond and his brave companion Zaza.<page>Zaza and I want to climb the castle together and dispel the terror!<hpage>Good luck then, Mr. Bug. It's exciting to see others be smart, strong-willed, and repel many of the ghost shells.<page>yes! yes! Forever, those unnatural enemies! This castle seems to be the root of that twist, and we must respect the Medal of Honor until we tear its rotten heart apart!
secondary_translated_text: Goram ! Les camarades se lèvent courageusement dans cet endroit désolé ! Vous savez que vous vous trouvez devant le vénéré chevalier Gamond et son courageux compagnon Zaza.<page>Zaza et moi voulons grimper le château ensemble et dissiper la terreur !<hpage>Bonne chance Monsieur Bug ! C'est excitant de voir les autres être intelligents, fortement déterminés et repousser beaucoup de coquilles fantômes.<page>Oui ! Oui ! Pour toujours, ces ennemis non-naturels ! Ce château semble être la racine de cette torsion, et nous devons respecter la Médaille d'honneur jusqu'à ce que nous déchirons son cœur pourri !

original_en_text: <hpage>I found the well in the hidden chambers beyond. The power that remained at its base I have taken for myself.<page=S>Bound yourself a new nature, aye? And from the shells of our ancestors, no less, all those many who’ve called these lands their own.<page=S>You make it seem so simple-like. All o’that learning, all o’that strength... sucked up in a whirl of Silk.<page=M>We’d call you a thief, Old One, and cruel for the taking, but its all coming down soon if you can’t stop it.<page=M>If there’s advantage in your act that might see these caves safe, then it’s better you make your claim.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我在密室深处找到了那口井。已将其底部的力量纳为己用。<page=S>给自己添了一种新本源，嗯？用的还是我们先祖的躯壳——那些曾以此地为家的无数先祖。<page=S>你说得轻巧。所有学识，所有力量……都被灵丝漩涡吸走了。<page=M>我们本该骂你是小偷，古老者，如此残忍夺取……但若你阻止不了黑暗，一切马上都要崩塌了。<page=M>若你真能保全这些洞窟，那还是由你取走为好。
translated_text: <hpage>I found a well in a hidden room in the distance. I took the rest of the power based on it.<page=S>Give yourself a new nature. Similarly, from the shells of our ancestors, all the people who claim these lands were born from the shells of our ancestors.<page=S>It looks so simple. All the learning, all the power, was swallowed up in the vortex of silk.<page=M>We will call you a thief. " Robbery is cruel, but if it can't be stopped, it happens quickly.<page=M>If your actions have an advantage in ensuring the safety of these caves, you'd better make your own claim.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'ai trouvé un puits dans une pièce cachée au loin. J'ai pris le reste du pouvoir sur la base de cela.<page=S>Donnez-vous une nouvelle nature. De même, de la coquille de nos ancêtres, tous les gens qui revendiquent ces terres sont nés de la coquille de nos ancêtres.<page=S>Cela semble si simple. Toute l'apprentissage, toute la puissance, furent engloutis dans le vortex de soie.<page=M>Nous vous appellerons un voleur.« Le vol est cruel, mais s'il n'est pas arrêté, il se produit rapidement.<page=M>Si vos actions ont un avantage pour assurer la sécurité de ces grottes, vous feriez mieux de faire votre propre réclamation.

original_en_text: Best keep your visits brief, Hornet Wielding Needle. Without swift action taken, our world’s ruin seems certain.<page>If you cannot calm Pharloom’s tortured throes, then certainly no other bug could face the task. <hpage>As you say, Shakra. I shall do what I must.
original_zh_text: 别逗留太久，小姑娘。不快点解决，世界就要完蛋了。<page>如果你都搞不定，更没虫能行。<hpage>我会尽力而为。
translated_text: The interview was short, and Bumblebee waved the needle. Without a swift response, the world is sure to be destroyed.<page>If you can't calm the pain of pharam, then other mistakes will undoubtedly not be able to undertake that job.<hpage>Like you said, shark. I do what I have to do.
secondary_translated_text: L'entretien fut court, et Bumblebee agita l'aiguille. Sans une réponse rapide, le monde est sûrement détruit.<page>Si vous ne pouvez pas calmer la douleur du pharam, alors d'autres erreurs ne pourront sans aucun doute entreprendre ce travail.<hpage>Comme tu l'as dit, Shark. Je fais ce que j'ai à faire

original_en_text: Near the edge of those lands swept by wind and sand, Nuu has seen it, a single bug, watching, waiting.<page> Too scared was Nuu to crawl close, for fear it would wake, and its big blade might mark this perfect shell.<page>For the journal’s sake, you should seek the bug, up on edge, through a tall tunnel hidden by crust.<page>A hard find, that one, but Nuu is not worried! She knows your adult cunning will see you there quick!
original_zh_text: 在风沙之地的边缘，努努曾看见一只虫子在守望等待。<page> 努努怕它醒来，怕它的巨刃划破我的漂亮甲壳，所以不敢靠近。<page> 但为了使记录册完整，大姐姐去找它吧——就在高处边缘，穿过一段硬壳掩藏的高耸隧道就到了。<page> 虽然难找，但努努不担心！以成年虫的机灵劲儿肯定能很快找到！
translated_text: At the edge of the wind and sand-covered land, Noo saw an insect waiting to watch it.<page>Noo is afraid and unable to approach, afraid to wake up, and his large blade marks the perfect shell.<page>In order to keep a diary, you need to go through a high tunnel hidden in the crust and look for bugs from the end.<page>It was a difficult discovery, but Noo didn't worry! She knows that your adult cunning will get there soon!
secondary_translated_text: Au bord du vent et de la terre couverte de sable, Noo a vu un insecte qui attendait de le surveiller.<page>Noo a peur et ne peut pas s'approcher, peur de se réveiller, et sa grande lame marque la coquille parfaite.<page>Pour tenir un journal, vous devez traverser un tunnel élevé caché dans la croûte et chercher des insectes de la fin.<page>C'était une découverte difficile, mais Noo ne s'inquiétait pas ! Elle sait que votre ruse adulte viendra bientôt là !

original_en_text: For my mapping stock, we have traded all the charts and tools I can provide. While this new threat remains, I shall not make more.<page>My cartography may be a simple sort, but I hope that my craft shared has made your travels easier.
original_zh_text: 我的存货都卖光了。危机不解除，我也没法做新的。<page>我绘制的图纸可能有些简略，但希望能帮上你的忙。
translated_text: In my map stock, I exchanged all the charts and tools I could offer. As long as this new threat exists, I will not create any more.<page>My drawings may be simple, but I hope the craftsmanship I share will make your journey easier.
secondary_translated_text: Dans mon stock de cartes, j'ai échangé tous les cartes et outils que je pouvais offrir. Tant que cette nouvelle menace subsistera, je n'en en créerai plus.<page>Mes dessins peuvent être simples, mais j'espère que l'artisanat que je partage vous facilitera votre voyage.

original_en_text: Lead on, sister! Zaza and I will be close behind!
original_zh_text: 带路吧姐妹！我和扎扎自会跟上！
translated_text: Sister, lead me! Tasa and I are watching it!
secondary_translated_text: Sœur, conduise-moi ! Tasa et moi nous regardons !

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, has opened the way forward for us!
original_zh_text: 瞧见没？骨门听到歌声，为我们让路了！
translated_text: Hey! did you see that? The red woman the great gate listened to my song, opened our way with infinite ancient mercy!
secondary_translated_text: Hey ! Tu as vu ça ? La femme rouge, la grande porte, écoutait mon chant, nous ouvrit la voie avec une infinie miséricorde antique !

original_en_text: <hpage>Must you not press on, sirs?<page>Oh, yes! We will be off at once. Very soon. I fear though, that Zaza must rest a little longer...
original_zh_text: <hpage>二位还不出发么？<page>马上！这就出发！我就是觉得，扎扎可能要多休息一会……
translated_text: <hpage>Guys, can we continue?<page>oh! yes! We set off immediately. Soon, but I'm worried that Zaza will rest for a while.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Les gars, pouvons-nous continuer ?<page>Ooh ! Oui ! Nous sommes partis immédiatement. Bientôt, mais j'ai peur que Zaza se reposera un moment.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keen!
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！握紧兵刃，保持警惕！
translated_text: boshanka! Sharp edges and a sharp feel!
secondary_translated_text: boshanka ! Bords tranchants et une sensation tranchante !

original_en_text: <page=M>Even knowing her motivation, it is a shock the monarch can resist so long. We’d thought none could survive that void.<hpage>She will have retreated within her protective form, that cocoon of thread. Even as the dark eats its outer, she will spin its Silk anew.<hpage>The effort would be immense and it will strain her soul thin, but what other choice remains?<hpage>This is the desperate act of a dying god. A defiance that, left unchallenged, will bring your kingdom’s ruin.
original_zh_text: <page=M>就算清楚她的动机，君主能撑这么久也是令我们惊讶。本以为生物不可能在虚空中存活。<hpage>她必是缩进了护体茧壳。这样即便外层被黑暗啃噬，也能重织新丝。<hpage>但这样耗力巨大，魂魄都将稀薄，但还有得选吗？<hpage>这是垂死神明的困兽之斗。若不阻止，必会让王国化为废墟。
translated_text: <page=M>It was a shock the monarch could endure for a long time, even if he knew her motives. I thought no one would survive in such an emptiness.<hpage>She will return to her form of protection - the kite. Even if the darkness swallows up its appearance, she spins the silk again.<hpage>The effort is immeasurable and consumes her soul, but what other options do she have?<hpage>It is an act of despair of God's dying. This resistance, if not challenged, will bring ruin to your kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>C'était un choc que le monarque pouvait supporter pendant longtemps, même s'il connaissait ses motivations. Je pensais que personne ne survivrait dans un tel vide.<hpage>Elle reviendra à sa forme de protection - le cerf-volant. Même si les ténèbres engloutissent son apparence, elle tourne à nouveau la soie.<hpage>L'effort est incommensurable et consomme son âme, mais quelles autres options a-t - elle ?<hpage>C'est un acte de désespoir de la mort de Dieu. Cette résistance, si elle n'est pas contestée, apportera la ruine à votre royaume.

original_en_text: <page=M>The quakes... This collapse will take Pharloom all.<hpage>If the void doesn’t claim it first. Surely you’ve seen them, the black threads that wrack your lands? The dark leeches up, possessed upon the fallen monarch’s Silk.<hpage>Pharloom’s roads were not safe before. Now they’ll prove impassable. Those pilgrims still alive in your lands best huddle and hope. <hpage>If there can be another end to this, it is up to us to discover it.
original_zh_text: <page=M>这震颤……纺络要全塌了。<hpage>怕不是会被虚空先吞了去。没见那些撕裂大地的黑丝么？黑暗正顺着坠落君王的灵丝涌上来。<hpage>纺络的道途本就不安稳，如今更是绝路，残存的朝圣者只能抱团等死。<hpage>但若还有转机，唯有靠我们能寻得。
translated_text: <page=M>The earthquake and collapse will take all of the fal.<hpage>If the space is not occupied first. Have you ever seen the black lines that destroyed your land? A dark vampire attached to the silk of a fallen monarch.<hpage>The roads of Faro were not safe. They prove to be insurmountable. The pilgrims who still live in your land had better gather together and have hope.<hpage>If this has another ending, it's up to us to find it.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Le tremblement de terre et l'effondrement prendront tout le fal.<hpage>Si l'espace n'est pas occupé en premier. Avez-vous déjà vu les lignes noires qui ont détruit votre pays ? Un vampire sombre attaché à la soie d'un monarque déchu.<hpage>Les routes de Faro n'étaient pas sûres. Ils s'avèrent insurmontables. Les pèlerins qui vivent encore dans votre pays feraient mieux de se réunir et d'avoir de l'espoir.<hpage>Si cela a une autre fin, c'est à nous de la trouver.

original_en_text: <hpage>Why do you sing, little one? This bony gate seems like a poor audience.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，为何对着骨门歌唱？这可不是什么知音。
translated_text: <hpage>little boy, why are you singing? The narrow door looked like a crowd of poor spectators.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Petit garçon, pourquoi chante-tu ? La porte étroite ressemblait à une foule de pauvres spectateurs.

original_en_text: <hpage>Can you safely make your way back to the settlement, little one? I could escort you if need be.<page>Oh no, I’ll lay no more of my troubles upon you, red maiden. With the way cleared I can return under my own guidance.<page>After all, what’s another pilgrimage, eh? Ha ha!<page>Oh! And I have something for you as well. I found it buried amongst the broken relics down here in the darkness, glowing with a pale light.<page>’Tis an odd-looking thing... not exactly holy-seeming... but I would be honoured if you accepted it all the same!
original_zh_text: <hpage>需要我护送你回去吗？<page>不能再给你添麻烦了！路通了我就自己走。<page>就当再朝圣一回呗！哈哈！<page>对了，这个送你。在黑乎乎的地方挖到的，会发光。<page>虽然看着不像圣物……但请你收下吧！
translated_text: <hpage>will we be able to return to the settlement safely? If you wish, we can show you.<page>Oh, I don't blame you anymore, red girl. When the way is clear, I can go back under my leadership. "<page>After all, what's another pilgrimage? ha ha ha!<page>oh! I also have something I want to give you. I saw it buried in the darkness, and gave off a pale light among the broken relics.<page>it's amazing... It doesn't seem completely sacred. I hope you still accept it!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Serons-nous en mesure de retourner en toute sécurité dans le village ? Si vous le souhaitez, nous pouvons vous le montrer.<page>Je ne te blâme plus, ma fille rouge. Quand la voie sera claire, je pourrai revenir sous ma direction. "<page>Après tout, qu ' est-ce qu ' un pèlerinage ? Ha ha ha !<page>Ooh ! J'ai aussi quelque chose que je veux vous donner. Je l'ai vu enterré dans les ténèbres, et il émettait une pâle lumière parmi les reliques brisées.<page>C'est incroyable... Il n'est pas tout à fait sacré. J'espère que vous l'accepterez encore !

original_en_text: The challenge! The course! It shall be improved. Yes! Yes! The truest test is still to come. We shall fly fast together once more!
original_zh_text: 赛道还要改良！没错，真正的考验在后头！
translated_text: challenge! of course! It will improve. yes! yes! yes! yes! The real test is yet to come. Let's fly together again!
secondary_translated_text: Défi ! Bien sûr ! Il va s'améliorer. Oui ! Oui ! Oui ! Oui ! Le vrai test est encore à venir. Volons à nouveau ensemble !

original_en_text: I’ve learnt too that travelling is not without its dangers... but I find myself wielding my weapon quite adeptly.<page>It’s curious, the way our instincts can guide us with such precision.
original_zh_text: 我现在知道旅途中总伴有危险……不过我武器用得倒挺顺手。<page>本能的指引竟如此精准，真奇妙。
translated_text: I also learned that traveling is risk-free. However, I was able to manipulate the weapon very skillfully.<page>It is a wonder that our intuition can lead us so accurately.
secondary_translated_text: J'ai aussi appris que voyager est sans risque. Mais j'ai pu manipuler l'arme très habilement.<page>C'est étonnant que notre intuition puisse nous guider avec autant de précision.

translated_text: Map of Berhardt
secondary_translated_text: Cartes de Berhardt

original_en_text: Un-Daak... well struck. To face the fury of your weapon in a true battle would be an experience indeed. I would gladly duel again, if you have the time for it.
original_zh_text: 唔-嗒克……打得好。跟你打一架真是受益匪浅，等你有空我们再练。
translated_text: Winduck played well. Anger in the face of weapons during combat is certainly an experience. If I have time, I will fight again.
secondary_translated_text: Winduck a bien joué. La colère face aux armes pendant le combat est certainement une expérience. Si j'ai le temps, je me battrais à nouveau.

original_en_text: Hoho sister, my whiskers are still quivering! That’s how you know you had a rousing battle!<page>You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
original_zh_text: 嚯嚯，真是一场酣畅淋漓的战斗！我的胡子都还在颤抖呢！<page>你先前进吧，我和扎扎在这守着一会，看看有没有漏网之虫。
translated_text: Hey, my beard is still smoking! This is how you know you are in an exciting battle!<page>Come on, Zaza and I will keep watch here and arrest whoever is behind.
secondary_translated_text: Ma barbe est encore fumée ! C'est ainsi que vous savez que vous êtes dans une bataille passionnante !<page>Allez, Zaza et moi allons garder la garde ici et arrêter quiconque est derrière.

original_en_text: Hoy, red maiden. ‘Tis a prayer answered to see you safely wake.<hpage>Little Sherma? What has happened here?
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘！圣堡庇佑，你醒了！<hpage>小谢尔玛，此处发生了什么？
translated_text: Hi, Red Girl. It is a prayer to pray that you will wake up safely.<hpage>little shaman? what's happening?
secondary_translated_text: Bonjour Red Girl ! C'est une prière pour prier que vous vous réveillez en toute sécurité.<hpage>Petit chaman ? Qu 'est-ce qui se passe ?

original_en_text: Poshanka! So you found my calling ring, Child Wielding Needle. I recognised the sound of your weapon’s foreign metal against it.<page>On the hunt for my master, I am often away, but I still use this place as camp. Use the ring to call me whenever you wish to make trade.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！发现我的传讯了？听到你武器发出的那异域的金属声就知道是你。<page>我把这当作据点，但常外出寻找导师。想找我交易就摇铃。
translated_text: boshanka! The child who found my ring is waving a needle and knows how foreign objects and metals can affect a weapon.<page>I often go out to look for owners, but I still use them as campgrounds. If you want to trade, please call me on the ringing tone of your mobile phone.
secondary_translated_text: boshanka ! L'enfant qui a trouvé ma bague agite une aiguille et sait comment les objets étrangers et les métaux peuvent affecter une arme.<page>Je sors souvent à la recherche de propriétaires, mais je les utilise toujours comme terrain de camping. Si vous souhaitez trader, veuillez m'appeler sur la sonnerie de votre téléphone portable.

translated_text: Map of remote areas
secondary_translated_text: Carte des régions éloignées

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly I will accept your aid Shakra. Let us cut closer to this Citadel’s haunted heart.<page>Garrok! Hornet Wielding Needle. Beside you, I will gladly raise my rings!
original_zh_text: <hpage>求之不得。一起杀进圣堡里去吧。<page>嘎咯克！使针的姑娘。能和你并肩作战，我的战环乐意至极！
translated_text: <hpage>I will gladly accept your help to get Shakra closer to the ghostly heart of this castle.<page>gallock! Bumblebee shook his needle. Next to you, I want to raise the ring!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'accepterai volontiers votre aide pour rapprocher Shakra du cœur fantôme de ce château.<page>Gallock ! Bumblebee secoua son aiguille.À côté de toi, je veux lever la bague !

original_en_text: I’d hoped to never step these hateful halls, yet here I stand, as all those hapless bugs before.<hpage>You’ve journeyed far from that damp cell, tall bug. If you would oppose the minions of this Citadel, you have my respect.<page>Hmph. Then we share a rare stance, warrior. Few others seem possessed of will enough to resist.<page>So many weak minds, drawn up and strung, in love with the great golden leech atop their lands.
original_zh_text: 我本不想踏入这憎恶之地，却还是步了前虫的后尘。<hpage>你既然从潮湿牢笼走到这里，若是想反抗圣堡，我愿助一臂之力。<page>哼，倒是难得。鲜少有虫能生出抵抗之心。<page>大多数都意志薄弱，沉溺受缚，被上头那黄金监牢所蛊惑。
translated_text: I didn't want to step foot in this hate-filled hall, but I stand here like an unhappy worm in front of me.<hpage>You have come out of a wet cell, tall worm. If you oppose this castle piece, I respect you. "<page>Oh, and then we shared an unusual place, soldier. Few people seem to have the will to resist.<page>Many weak and nervous people have fallen in love with the giant figs of their land.
secondary_translated_text: Je ne voulais pas mettre le pied dans cette salle remplie de haine, mais je me tiens ici comme un ver malheureux devant moi.<hpage>Tu es sorti d'une cellule mouillée, ver de taille. Si vous vous opposez à cette pièce de château, je vous respecte. "<page>Oh, et puis nous avons partagé un endroit inhabituel, soldat. Peu de gens ont la volonté de résister.<page>Beaucoup de gens faibles et nerveux sont tombés amoureux des figues géantes de leur terre.

original_en_text: Ho there, brave sister! What poetry has fate writ, that we should meet here at the peak of this ghastly Citadel!<page>Beasts and fiends, all here are lost to that horrid Haunting! And out from this golden corpse it seeps to plague the good bugs of the land below. Well, no more we say!<hpage>You should beware brave sirs, the creature that commands this curse is a foe far beyond bug. I would not see your lives given in vain.<page>Pah! We beware nothing! We would give our lives a hundred times over to finally cut away the evil that clutches our kingdom!
original_zh_text: 哟，勇敢的姐妹！真有缘，能在这鬼圣堡顶上见面！<page>那些被邪丝牵着走的虫兽，就是从这金色死城跑出去祸害纺络的，但到此为止了！<hpage>当心，萦绕于圣堡之上的存在远非虫类能敌，不要白白丢了性命。<page>呸！我们才不怕！只要能斩断缠住这破地方的丝线，死一百回都值！
translated_text: My sister, brave! What is the poetry of fate? See you at the top of this terrible castle!<page>Beasts and demons, all vanished into a terrible ghost! It had leaked out of this golden carcass, a good land insect under the plague. Come on, let's stop talking!<hpage>Beware, brave gentlemen, the creature that cast this curse is far beyond the worm's enemy. I don't see them sacrificing their lives in vain.<page>Wow! I wasn't careful about anything! To eradicate the evil that surrounds our kingdom, we will give our lives a hundred times.
secondary_translated_text: Ma soeur, courageuse ! Qu ' est-ce que la poésie du destin ? Rendez-vous au sommet de ce château terrible !<page>Des bêtes et des démons, tous disparus dans un terrible fantôme ! Il avait fuit de cette carcasse dorée, un bon insecte terrestre sous la peste. Allons, arrêtons de parler !<hpage>Méfiez-vous, braves messieurs, la créature qui a lancé cette malédiction est bien au-delà de l'ennemi du ver. Je ne les vois pas sacrifier leur vie en vain.<page>Wow ! Je n'étais prudent à rien ! Pour éradiquer le mal qui entoure notre royaume, nous donnerons cent fois notre vie.

original_en_text: Goodness! This is just too embarrassing! Detected even through my perfect cover! What tell? What error? Surely something gave me away!<hpage>It was no one thing, young bug. Your disguise is near faultless. I’ve merely spent a long life being watchful.<page>Gah! Then I’ll just have to hope the beasts about don’t share such keen sight. It’ll be so much harder to accomplish my work if I’m detected, or eaten!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！太丢脸了！完美伪装都被识破！哪里露馅了？<hpage>你没露出破绽，小虫子。只是我活得够久，眼神也比较好。<page>好吧！但愿怪物们没这么眼尖。万一被发现或被吃掉都会耽误我工作！
translated_text: oh, my god! This is embarrassing! Even the perfect cover! what did i say? what mistake? Something has exposed me!<hpage>It's nothing, little bug. Your costume is almost perfect. I've been alert for a long time.<page>ah! ah! I only wish the beasts around me didn't have such sharp eyes. If you get eaten or eaten, it will be hard to get the job done!
secondary_translated_text: Oh mon Dieu ! C'est embarrassant ! Même la couverture parfaite ! Qu 'est-ce que j'ai dit ? Quelle erreur ? Quelque chose m'a exposé !<hpage>- Rien, petit bug. Le costume est presque parfait. J'ai été alerte depuis longtemps.<page>Ah ! Ah ! J'aimerais que les bêtes autour de moi n'aient pas des yeux aussi aiguisés. Si vous êtes dévoré ou dévoré, il sera difficile de faire le travail !

original_en_text: <hpage>The battle ahead may indeed be arduous. I accept your offer of aid, sirs.<page>Gurrrro! Yes! No force in the kingdom can withstand our might! Lead on, sister! Zaza and I will be close behind!
original_zh_text: <hpage>前方战斗凶险，有劳二位了。<page>嘎噜！咱们联手肯定所向披靡！带路吧姐妹！我和扎扎自会跟上！
translated_text: <hpage>The battle from now on will be really tough. Gentlemen, I accept your offer of assistance.<page>GORAM! yes! yes! The kingdom has no power to resist our power! Sister, lead me! Tasa and I are watching it!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>La bataille à partir de maintenant sera très difficile. Mesdames et Messieurs, j'accepte votre offre d'assistance.<page>Goram ! Oui ! Oui ! Le royaume n'a pas le pouvoir de résister à notre pouvoir ! Sœur, conduise-moi ! Tasa et moi nous regardons !

original_en_text: Sister, sister, tired and glum,<br>We will sing, and you can hum,<br>Together we shall overcome!
original_zh_text: 姐妹同袍，圣途相聚，<br>齐声歌唱，忘却忧伤，<br>同心协力，共度难关！
translated_text: Sisters, sisters, tired and depressed.<br>We can sing you can humming<br>We failed together!
secondary_translated_text: Sœurs, sœurs, fatiguées et déprimées.<br>Nous pouvons chanter, tu peux hummer<br>Nous échouons ensemble !

original_en_text: <page=M>Oh ho! Back from the depths with nary a scratch! Is it as you feared?<hpage>It is, and worse. Your snare has sunk the monarch deep, deeper than I can safely descend.<hpage>To cut Pharloom free, I must plunge below the surface of that lake of liquid nothing.<page=B> No shell survives submersion in that void, Old One, not even yours.<hpage>Not without aid, certainly. Though aid may exist. The flower that resists the dark. Do you know of it?<page=M>The Everbloom?... We’ve heard the tale, but had thought it a myth. If ever it sprouted in our lands we would surely have known?<hpage>I would not seek it in these lands. I need its power full, and it is too fragile to sustain here long. I would seek it in my memory.<page=S> Oh ho ho! So you’d have us wrench open your soul, to retrieve the fabled bloom? Can such a thing be done?<hpage>For another bug, no, but I am Weaver enough to attempt it.<hpage>In the distant past, I knew the flower. My thread still holds its faint memory. If the Everbloom was grasped strongly enough within my Silk, it could be made to manifest.<page=M>Ah! So you’re asking another spell of us? To reveal the flower clear?... But to illuminate one of your kind’s old memories, so acutely... This is no easy thing, even for us...<page=M>Old One, you must give us a moment to confer...
original_zh_text: <page=M>哦嚯！毫发无损从深渊归来！情况果真如您所料？<hpage>比预料的更糟。你们的陷阱将君主沉得极深，深过我安全下潜的极限。<hpage>要斩断纺络的枷锁，须要直入虚无之湖深处。<page=B>古老者，没有躯壳能在虚空浸泡中幸存，您也不例外。<hpage>单凭自己当然不成，但若有助力……那朵抗暗之花，你们知道吗？<page=M>永绽花？……听说过，但只当是传说。如果曾在此地绽放过，我们怎会不知？<hpage>此地当然找不到，我需要完全盛放的花，此地养不活。得去我的记忆中找。<page=S>哦嚯嚯！是要我们撕开您魂魄，取出那朵神花？这真能成功？<hpage>其他虫不行，但我有织者血脉，可以一试。<hpage>在遥远过去，我记得此花，灵丝中尚存其残影。若能在记忆中紧紧抓住，或许能使其显形。<page=M>啊！所以又要我们施法？让花影清晰？……可要照彻您这一族的古老回忆……就算是我们也……<page=M>古老者，请让我们商议一下……
translated_text: <page=M>Oh, I screamed! From the bottom unharmed! like you're really worried?<hpage>Yes, it is even worse. Your snare has fallen deep into the king's hand, deeper than I have fallen safely.<hpage>To free Faro, I had to dive into a lake where there was nothing.<page=B>A shell cannot survive in that emptiness, old man, not even yours.<hpage>Of course, it's true, even without help. you know how to resist the flower of darkness that might help?<page=M>The eternal flower? I have heard this story before, but I think it is a myth. If they are growing on our land, we will know.<hpage>I don't look for it in this land. I need it, but I'm too weak to last here long. I look for it in my memories.<page=S>Oh, ho! Do you want to open up your soul and get back the flower of legend? Can you do that? "<hpage>As for another mistake, no, but I'm a weaver enough to try it.<hpage>Long ago, I knew this flower. My memory is still weak. If my silk is strong enough to grasp the eternal flower, it will appear.<page=M>ah! ah! do you want me to use my magic again? Should I make the flowers clear? However, it can clearly illuminate the old memories of your race. It's not an easy task for us either.<page=M>Grandpa, we need to take a moment to discuss it.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Oh, j'ai crié ! En bas, sans dommages ! Comme si vous étiez vraiment inquiet ?<hpage>Oui, c'est encore pire.
