Ton piège est tombé dans la main du roi, plus profond que je ne suis tombé en toute sécurité.<hpage>Pour libérer Faro, j'ai dû plonger dans un lac où il n'y avait rien.<page=B>Une coquille ne peut survivre dans ce vide, vieil homme, pas même la vôtre.<hpage>C'est vrai, même sans aide. Savez-vous résister à la fleur des ténèbres qui pourrait vous aider ?<page=M>La fleur éternelle ? J'ai déjà entendu cette histoire, mais je pense que c'est un mythe. S'ils poussent sur notre terre, nous le saurons.<hpage>Je ne le cherche pas sur cette terre. J'en ai besoin, mais je suis trop faible pour rester ici longtemps. Je le cherche dans mes souvenirs.<page=S>Oh, ho ! Vous voulez ouvrir votre âme et récupérer la fleur de la légende ? Pouvez-vous faire cela ? "<hpage>Quant à une autre erreur, non, mais je suis assez un tisserand pour l'essayer.<hpage>Il y a longtemps, je connaissais cette fleur. Ma mémoire est toujours faible. Si ma soie est assez forte pour saisir la fleur éternelle, elle apparaîtra.<page=M>Ah ! Ah ! Tu veux que j'utilise ma magie à nouveau ? Faut-il que les fleurs soient claires ? Cependant, il peut clairement éclairer les vieux souvenirs de votre race. Ce n'est pas une tâche facile pour nous non plus.<page=M>Grand-père, il faut prendre un moment pour en discuter.

translated_text: The Hunter's map.
secondary_translated_text: La carte du chasseur.

original_en_text: My wish is granted... and now everything I love is lost...
original_zh_text: 愿望实现了……可我珍视的一切都消失了……
translated_text: My wishes have been fulfilled... All that I loved was lost.
secondary_translated_text: Mes souhaits ont été réalisés... Tout ce que j'aimais était perdu.

original_en_text: Gara Takana! What has happened to you, Child Wielding Needle, to cause you such brutal weakening?<hpage>You are seeing the effects of a parasite, Shakra, a writhing entity implanted by force. It will not kill me, not quickly at least, but its presence wears greatly on my shell.<page>It is a horrid state you suffer. Fight yourself free, or find help with haste. I would not wish to see you defeated by such deceitful strength.
original_zh_text: 加拉塔卡纳！使针的小姑娘，你怎么了？竟变成这副惨状？<hpage>是寄生物的影响，沙克拉。它被强行植入了我的躯壳。虽不会立刻致命，但持续侵蚀着我。<page>这状态太可怕了。要么挣脱它，要么快去寻求援助。我可不愿见你败给如此诡诈的力量。
translated_text: High Ghana! What really made you so weak?<hpage>What you're looking at is the effects of the parasitic chakra, a forcibly embedded distorted entity that can't kill me, at least not immediately, but its presence causes a great abrasion on my shell.<page>It is a terrible condition that you are suffering. Ask for help as soon as possible. I don't want to see you lose to such a deceptive force.
secondary_translated_text: Haute France ! Qu ' est-ce qui vous a vraiment rendue si faible ?<hpage>Ce que vous regardez, ce sont les effets du chakra parasite, une entité déformée intégrée de force qui ne peut pas me tuer, du moins pas immédiatement, mais sa présence provoque une grande abrasion sur ma coquille.<page>C'est une terrible condition que vous souffrez. Demandez de l'aide le plus tôt possible. Je ne veux pas te voir perdre face à une force aussi trompeuse.

original_en_text: Hoi! Let our mighty contest of shells commence again!
translated_text: Hey! Let's also start a powerful shell race!
secondary_translated_text: Hey ! Commençons aussi une puissante course de coquilles !

original_en_text: You’re in the habit of craftin’ all kinds’a nasty tools’n traps, aint’cha? This kit’ll let you build ‘em even nastier, heh heh...
original_zh_text: 你这家伙成天捣鼓些工具跟陷阱，是吧？这匣子能帮你更进一步，嘿嘿……
translated_text: You have a habit of using all kinds of annoying tools and traps, right? Would this make them worse?
secondary_translated_text: Vous avez l'habitude d'utiliser toutes sortes d'outils et de pièges ennuyeux, n'est-ce pas ? Est-ce que cela les aggrave ?

original_en_text: Poshanka, Child Wielding Needle. This heart-home is cut free of its curse.<page>Tell me, was it your blade that brought its saving? My shock would be great if another here managed the feat.<hpage>I slew a tall creature above the town, a Weaver I suspect, though one twisted in purpose.<hpage>By voice and claw it aided, perhaps guided, the thread that strung the town. <page>Weaver? Those vicious old things! To our young we tell the tales, but had thought them long dead, only corpses bound in spires. <hpage>This one still lived, though if it was a Weaver, it was broken in a savage way.<hpage>Its own Silk was bound, pinned deep within its shell. A cruel punishment I’ve not before witnessed. <page>Even broken, my envy remains. A Weaver’s fabled skills... To meet one in combat means great challenge, and great pride in victory.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔，使针的小姑娘。这镇子的诅咒解除了？<page>是你干的？别的虫可没这本事。<hpage>我斩了镇子上头的高个怪物，像是个变异的织者。<page>是它用声音和利爪操控缠绕镇子的丝线。<page>织者？那群老毒物！还以为早死绝了，只剩塔里的干尸。<hpage>这只还活着，但被折磨得不成样。<hpage>灵丝被钉在壳里，残忍的刑罚。<page>就算残了我也羡慕。织者的本事……能交手是幸运，能得胜更是荣耀。
translated_text: The children of Bosanka are waving their needles around. This house of souls has been freed from the curse.<page>will your sword bring salvation? If other people accomplish this feat, I will be very shocked.<hpage>I killed a tall creature in the sky above the town, which I suspected was a loom, though it was twisted intentionally.<hpage>Help with sounds and claws, and perhaps help guide the electric wires that connect the town.<page>wiver? Old things are bad! We told the stories to the young men, but they had long since died, and we thought there were only corpses in the spire.<hpage>This one is still alive, but if it were a loom, it would have been badly damaged.<hpage>The silk of its own was tied and fixed deep in the shell. It was a cruel punishment I had never seen before.<page>Even if it is broken, my jealousy will remain. Weave a legendary skill. To challenge to battle is to be proud of winning.
secondary_translated_text: Les enfants de Bosanka agitent leurs aiguilles. Cette maison d'âmes a été libérée de la malédiction.<page>Votre épée apporte-t - elle le salut ? Si d'autres personnes accomplissent cet exploit, je serai très choqué.<hpage>J'ai tué une grande créature dans le ciel au-dessus de la ville, que je soupçonnais être un métier à tisser, bien qu ' il ait été tordu intentionnellement.<hpage>Aidez avec les sons et les griffes, et peut - être aider à guider les fils électriques qui relient la ville.<page>Weaver ? Les vieilles choses sont mauvaises ! Nous racontâmes les histoires aux jeunes hommes, mais ils étaient morts depuis longtemps, et nous pensions qu ' il n'y avait que des cadavres dans la flèche.<hpage>Celui-ci est toujours vivant, mais s'il s'agissait d'un métier à tisser, il aurait été gravement endommagé.<hpage>La soie de sa propre était liée et fixée profondément dans la coquille. C'était un châtiment cruel que je n'avais jamais vu.<page>Même s'il est brisé, ma jalousie restera. Tisser une compétence légendaire. Défier la bataille, c'est être fier de gagner.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings, Shakra. You are a welcome sight amidst the sodden gloom of these caverns. <page>Child Wielding Needle, your aspect is still sharp. My respect remains. Heed a warning, many fierce bugs roost nearby.<page>On the lake beyond this cave nest a ragged horde atop an old watermound. Their mastery of flight makes them dangerous. My shell will forever carry the score of their pins.<page>If you’re seeking a safer path, head back, towards this land’s core.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。能在这阴湿洞穴里见到你真好。<page>使针的小姑娘，身手还是那么利索。提醒你，附近猛虫可不少。<page>前面湖心住着群飞虫，我壳上被它们的针弄得全是伤。<page>想走安全点的路就就回头，往这地方的中心走。
translated_text: <hpage>Hi there, Shakra. In these wet caves, you are a welcome sight.<page>Your appearance is still sharp. The respect remains. If you pay attention to the warnings, there are many ferocious insects in the vicinity.<page>Behind the cave is a group of rundown tribes, located on the hills of ancient water in the lake. Their ability to fly puts them at risk. My shell always has the tip of the badge.<page>If you're looking for a safer route, head back towards the Land Center.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Bonjour, Shakra. Dans ces grottes humides, vous êtes une vue bienvenue.<page>Votre apparence est toujours très forte. Le respect demeure. Si vous faites attention aux avertissements, il y a beaucoup d'insectes féroces dans les environs.<page>Derrière la grotte se trouve un groupe de tribus démodées, situées sur les collines de l'eau ancienne dans le lac. Sa capacité à voler les met en danger. Ma coquille a toujours la pointe du badge.<page>Si vous cherchez un itinéraire plus sûr, retournez vers le Land Center.

original_en_text: Nuu is a long way from her safe lodging... perhaps she will stay in this nice, dark little squeezy place a little longer.
original_zh_text: 努努离家好远……暂时在这个黑暗小缝里窝会儿吧。
translated_text: It was a long way from her hiding place. Maybe she'll stay a little longer in this beautiful, dark, crowded little place.
secondary_translated_text: Il était loin de son cachette. Peut - être restera-t - elle un peu plus longtemps dans ce petit endroit magnifique, sombre et bondé.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sherma, I bring supplies from the town of bells below. Since you are now caretaker here, I entrust them to you.<page>Oh, what a blessing! This will surely raise the hopes of our poor brothers and sisters.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小谢尔玛，我从下面镇子带了补给。既然现在你是看守者，就交给你了。<page>真是雪中送炭！兄弟姐妹们肯定会振作起来的！
translated_text: <hpage>Shaman, you brought supplies from Beltown, and now you're the guardian of this place, so I leave it to you.<page>Oh, how lucky! It will give hope to our poor brothers and sisters.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Chaman, tu as apporté des fournitures de Beltown, et maintenant tu es le gardien de cet endroit, alors je te laisse tout.<page>Oh, quelle chance ! Cela donnera espoir à nos pauvres frères et sœurs.

original_en_text: Red maiden, you have some great task ahead of you, do you not? If so, then I fear the time of our final parting draws near.<hpage>You sense it true, Sherma. I shall soon descend to the darkness below the kingdom and quell the source of Pharloom’s rending.<hpage>If that task is achieved, my future may take me far from Pharloom, but know I have faith that you will hold these bugs together, and see them prosper.<page>Ah! In truth, I’m still only a fool, but I’ll hold dearly to your faith in me. That warmth will help me to endure whatever challenges lie ahead!<page>Now let me pray for you, dear friend, and may my hopes follow you into the deepest darkness and beyond!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，您身负重大使命，对吧？若是如此，恐怕我们分别的时刻临近了。<hpage>你的直觉得没错，谢尔玛。我即将深入王国底部的黑暗，平息撕裂纺络的源头。<hpage>若使命达成，我或许会远行。但我坚信你能团结这些虫子，带领他们重建繁荣。<page>哈！说得对，说得对！毕竟我虽然攀登至此，但终究只是个愚者，而看护这些虫民同胞的生涯才刚开始。<page>现在我要为您祈祷，亲爱的红衣姑娘，静待我们齐声歌颂您凯旋的时刻！
translated_text: red girl, there's still a lot of work to do, right? If so, I fear that the time for the final parting will come.<hpage>You are real, Shaman. I will soon infiltrate the darkness beneath the kingdom and quell the cause of the ruin of the Fall.<hpage>If this task is completed, my future may take me away from Farham, but I believe you can put these mistakes together and see me thrive. "<page>ah! ah! In fact, I am still a fool, but I deeply believe in your trust, and this warmth will help me to endure any difficulties in the future!<page>My dear friend, let me now pray that my hope will continue into the deep darkness and beyond.
secondary_translated_text: Red Girl, il y a encore beaucoup de travail à faire, non ? Si c'est le cas, je crains que le moment de la séparation finale arrive.<hpage>Vous êtes réel, chaman. Je vais bientôt infiltrer les ténèbres sous le royaume et réprimer la cause de la ruine de la Chute.<hpage>Si cette tâche est accomplie, mon avenir peut m'éloigner de Farham, mais je crois que vous pouvez mettre ces erreurs ensemble et me voir prospérer. "<page>Ah ! Ah ! En fait, je suis encore un imbécile, mais je crois profondément en votre confiance, et cette chaleur m'aidera à supporter toutes les difficultés à l'avenir !<page>Mon cher ami, permettez-moi maintenant de prier pour que mon espoir continue dans les ténèbres profondes et au-delà.

translated_text: Vendor Pin
secondary_translated_text: Vendeur PIN

original_en_text: The way forward is yours. Let us meet again soon.
translated_text: The way forward is yours. I'll see you again soon.
secondary_translated_text: La voie à suivre est la vôtre. Je te verrai bientôt.

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you pit yourself against the black-threaded bugs? They are dangerous foes, even for a hardened warrior.<page>I relish such danger, and have little choice besides. These creatures besiege the town within. They are relentless, and empowered. <hpage>...It is the void, stretched up into this world and its husks. I know it well, this force, its nature. If it senses soul within, it will drive voracious towards it.<page>As you say! Many bugs now huddle within the bells. Nowhere else is safe with this black threat rising.<page>Some luck, at least, that I chose to remain, and can offer my rings’ defence.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster, for in it I share much blame, but know, I shall need time to complete my task.<hpage>I ask you hold fast till then. This town and its bugs need a guardian, and I can think of none better.<page>Very well, Hornet Wielding Needle. A pact made strong. If you are working towards the venom’s end, I shall fight with faith renewed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在独自抵挡黑灾虫群？再强悍的战士面对它们也很危险。<page>我享受这份危险，但也没得选择。它们在围攻小镇，没完没了，还有邪力加持。<hpage>……是虚空，侵入现世操纵躯壳。我很了解这东西，它的力量，和本质。它只要嗅到灵魂就会想要吞噬。<page>话是这么说，现在虫民都躲钟里……但别处更危险。<page>我选择留下已经算他们走运，至少还能挡一阵。<hpage>沙克拉，我会想办法终结这场灾难，毕竟我也有责任。但我需要时间，请你坚守下去。<hpage>小镇需要守卫，没有虫比你更合适。<page>好吧，使针的小姑娘。我答应你，只要你能解决源头，我会死守到底。
translated_text: <hpage>Chakra, do you allow yourself to fight the mistakes of the black line? They are a dangerous enemy, even for powerful soldiers.<page>I like danger and I have no choice but to do it. These creatures surround the interior of the town. They are cold and powerful.<hpage>... It is emptiness to spread out into the world and its shell. I am well aware of its power, of its nature. If you feel the soul in it, you go greedyly towards it.<page>As you said! " The clock is full of bugs. As this black menace rises, all else is safe.<page>At least fortunately, I chose to stay and was able to offer a ring defense.<hpage>Shakra, I am trying to end this new disaster, because I have a great responsibility, but I know that it will take time to fulfill my mission.<hpage>Please work hard until then. This town and its bugs need a guardian, and I can't think of anything better.<page>The Hornet waved his needle. It is a strong agreement. If you are going to end this poison, I will fight with a new conviction. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Chakra, vous permettez-vous de lutter contre les erreurs de la ligne noire ? Ils sont un ennemi dangereux, même pour des soldats puissants.<page>J'aime le danger et je n'ai pas d'autre choix que de le faire. Ces créatures entourent l'intérieur de la ville. Ils sont froid et puissants.<hpage>... C'est le vide qui s'étend dans le monde et dans sa coquille. Je suis bien conscient de sa puissance, de sa nature. Si vous sentez l'âme en elle, vous allez avide vers elle.<page>Comme vous l'avez dit ! "L'horloge est pleine de bugs. Alors que cette menace noire augmente, tout le reste est en sécurité.<page>Au moins, heureusement, j'ai choisi de rester et j'ai pu offrir une défense sur l'anneau.<hpage>Shakra, j'essaie de mettre fin à cette nouvelle catastrophe, parce que j'ai une grande responsabilité, mais je sais qu ' il faudra du temps pour accomplir ma mission.<hpage>Veuillez travailler dur jusqu'à ce moment. Cette ville et ses insectes ont besoin d'un gardien, et je ne peux pas penser à rien de mieux.<page>Le Hornet agitait son aiguille. C'est un accord fort. Si vous voulez mettre fin à ce poison, je me battrai avec une nouvelle conviction. "

original_en_text: Let us charge on. My rings shall sing loud on the shells of our enemies.
original_zh_text: 冲吧！让我用战环在敌人的壳上奏响战歌！
translated_text: Let us run. My ring will sing loudly to the shell of the enemy.
secondary_translated_text: Laissons-nous courir. Mon anneau chantera fort à la coquille de l'ennemi.

original_en_text: And now, miss grown-up, the task is done! Nuu must be away.<page>But do not be sour! Just think! Pharloom is only one land. So many more must hide out there, filled full with beasts and scents and tastes, all waiting to be discovered.<page>For Nuu, her journey is only at its start. And for you, miss grown-up, Nuu wishes too your happy hunting, much and more!
original_zh_text: 任务完成了！那么大姐姐，努努要出发了。<page>别难过！纺络只是开始！外面还有无数大地等着探索呢！<page>努努的旅程刚开始，祝大姐姐也狩猎愉快！
translated_text: Your Majesty, Miss, the mission is complete, and the Sister must leave.<page>But stop the acid! think about it! Faro is just a land. There must have been something more hidden in there. The beast, the smell, all waiting to be discovered.<page>For Nu, the journey had just begun. Your Majesty, enjoy the Noo too!
secondary_translated_text: Votre Majesté, Mademoiselle, la mission est complète, et la Sœur doit partir.<page>Arrêtez l'acide ! Réfléchissez-y ! Faro n'est qu ' un pays. Il doit y avoir quelque chose de plus caché là - dedans. La bête, l'odeur, tout attend d'être découvert.<page>Pour Nu, le voyage venait tout juste de commencer. Votre Majesté, profitez aussi du Noo !

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, what has happened here? For these masses to huddle so amongst such destruction?<page>The dark-spun bugs, they besiege the town, relentless. I have defended against each wave anew, but they are empowered in foul ways, and I am much fatigued.<hpage>...It is the void, stretched up into this world and its husks. I know it well, that force, its nature. If it senses soul, it will drive voracious towards it.<page>As you say! All these bugs, gathered close within the bells... but nowhere else is safe with this black threat rising.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster, for in it I share much blame, but know, I shall need time to complete my task. I would ask you hold fast till then.<hpage>This town and its bugs needs a guardian, and I can think of none better.<page>Very well, Hornet Wielding Needle. A pact made strong. If you are working towards the venom’s end, I shall fight with faith renewed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，这是怎么回事？废墟里挤着这么多虫？<page>黑虫围攻小镇，击退一波又来一波。它们有邪力加持，我快顶不住了。<hpage>……是虚空，侵入现世操纵躯壳。我很了解这东西，它的力量，和本质。它只要嗅到灵魂就会想要吞噬。<page>话是这么说，现在虫民都躲钟里……但别处更危险。<hpage>沙克拉，我会想办法终结这场灾难，毕竟我也有责任。但我需要时间，请你坚守下去。<hpage>小镇需要守卫，没有虫比你更合适。<page>好吧，使针的小姑娘。我答应你，只要你能解决源头，我会死守到底。
translated_text: <hpage>what happened, shakura? Are we getting caught up in such a mess?<page>The dark insects mercilessly surrounded the town. I defended each of the waves, but they were powered in an evil way, and I was very tired.<hpage>... It is emptiness to spread out into the world and its shell. I know it well, its power, its nature. " When you feel the soul, you go greedyly toward the soul.<page>As you said! " All these bugs are gathered in the sound of the bells, but as this black menace rises, the other places were not safe.<hpage>Shakra, I am trying to end this new disaster, because I have a great responsibility, but I know that it will take time to fulfill my mission. Please work hard until then.<hpage>This town and its bugs need a guardian, and I can't think of anything better.<page>The Hornet waved his needle. It is a strong agreement. If you are going to end this poison, I will fight with a new conviction. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Qu ' est-ce qui s'est passé, Shakur ? Sommes-nous pris dans un tel gâchis ?<page>Les insectes sombres entouraient impitoyablement la ville. J'ai défendu chacune des vagues, mais elles étaient alimentées d'une mauvaise manière, et j'étais très fatigué.<hpage>... C'est le vide qui s'étend dans le monde et dans sa coquille. Je la connais bien, sa puissance, sa nature.« Quand vous sentez l'âme, vous allez avidement vers l'âme.<page>Comme vous l'avez dit ! Tous ces insectes se rassemblent au son des cloches, mais alors que cette menace noire augmente, les autres endroits ne sont pas en sécurité.<hpage>Shakra, j'essaie de mettre fin à cette nouvelle catastrophe, parce que j'ai une grande responsabilité, mais je sais qu ' il faudra du temps pour accomplir ma mission. Veuillez travailler dur jusqu'à ce moment.<hpage>Cette ville et ses insectes ont besoin d'un gardien, et je ne peux pas penser à rien de mieux.<page>Le Hornet agitait son aiguille. C'est un accord fort. Si vous voulez mettre fin à ce poison, je me battrai avec une nouvelle conviction. "

original_en_text: Eugh. Is it gettin’ hotter down here? Mustier? Grindle’s been down here too long. Reckon it’s time to climb back up soon, to where all the serious treasures is!
original_zh_text: 呃。这底下是不是越来越热了？格林德尔在这底下待太久了，该上去淘真宝贝了！
translated_text: it's getting hot in here? muschier? Grindel has been here so long, I thought it was time to come back and find all the important treasures as soon as possible!
secondary_translated_text: Il fait chaud ici ? muschier ? Grindel est ici depuis si longtemps, j'ai pensé qu ' il était temps de revenir et de trouver tous les trésors importants le plus tôt possible !

translated_text: The Dark Markets
secondary_translated_text: Les marchés sombres

original_en_text: So this is... defeat? Can it be? Huu... A shell so fast! Wonder of Pharloom! A bug whose pace could match my own.<page>Though I set a simple course, you have proven its match and more. Take this small reward, nimble bug, and remember well our grand contest!
original_zh_text: 居然……输了？怎么可能？呼……太快了！真是神奇！<page>虽然这条赛道不难，但你证明了自己！收下这个奖励，纪念我们的巅峰对决！
translated_text: that's all. failure? are you okay? Calling. The cannonball is fast! The Pharaoh's Miracle! It's a worm at the same speed as me.<page>I set up a simple route, but it proved to be compatible and so on. Receive this small reward, be alert to mistakes and remember the great game!
secondary_translated_text: C'est tout.Échec ? Tu es OK ? appelant. Le canon est rapide ! Le miracle du Pharaon ! C'est un ver à la même vitesse que moi.<page>J'ai mis en place un itinéraire simple, mais il s'est avéré être compatible et ainsi de suite. Recevez cette petite récompense, soyez alerte aux erreurs et souvenez-vous du grand jeu !

original_en_text: Oh, hoy there! Why, I must have dropped off to sleep as soon as I arrived!<page>Certainly, the pilgrim’s way is exhausting, but a good rest is a reward unto itself!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！刚到这地方就睡着了！<page>朝圣虽累，但一场美梦就是最好的犒赏！
translated_text: Oh, there it is! why? when i got dressed, i was asleep!<page>Of course, the pilgrimage is exhausting, but a good rest is a reward in itself!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, voilà, c'est ! Pourquoi ? Quand je me suis habillé, j'étais endormie !<page>Bien sûr, le pèlerinage est épuisant, mais un bon repos est une récompense en soi !

original_en_text: That was a battle well-fought, Child Wielding Needle. Your master would be proud of you.<hpage>The one who trained me long ago... I never called her master. Whether she would be proud of what has become of me, I cannot say.<page>Nu-Hakkata! Whether she is dead or alive, have faith! Nothing a pupil does escapes their master’s sight!
original_zh_text: 打得好！你的导师肯定很骄傲。<hpage>教导我的……我从没叫过她导师。她会不会以我为荣……我不知道。<page>努-哈咔嗒！不管她是死是活，你都要自信！徒弟干的事，师傅都看在眼里！
translated_text: It was a good fight, and the kids were waving their needles. Your hosts will be proud of you.<hpage>People who trained me a long time ago. I didn't call him Master. I don't know if she's proud of what happened to me.<page>The empty side! Whether you live or die, you need faith. What a student does cannot escape the teacher's attention.
secondary_translated_text: C'était un bon combat, et les enfants agitaient leurs aiguilles. Vos hôtes seront fiers de vous !<hpage>Les gens qui m'ont formé il y a longtemps. Je ne l'appelle pas Maître. Je ne sais pas si elle est fière de ce qui m'est arrivé.<page>Le côté vide ! Que vous viviez ou que vous mouriez, vous avez besoin de la foi. Ce qu ' un élève fait ne peut échapper à l'attention du professeur.

original_en_text: Wide, dim hollows, choked by rag and dust. The bugs who once tended these lands have clearly lost their way.
original_zh_text: 昏暗广袤的洞窟塞满破布灰尘，原本照料这里的虫早已迷失了方向。
translated_text: The vast, dark emptiness was clogged with mud and dust. The insects that once looked after this land have obviously lost their way.
secondary_translated_text: Le vaste et sombre vide était bouché de boue et de poussière. Les insectes qui s'occupaient autrefois de cette terre ont évidemment perdu leur chemin.

original_en_text: Red maiden! Dear sister! At last, our great pilgrimage is at its end!<page>Our faith never wavered, and now here awaits our glorious reward, the shining Citadel! Where all sing as one!<hpage>I will not tell you to turn back, for I know you will not, but I urge you at least to be cautious. Terrible things lurk within this Citadel, little pilgrim.<page>Oh, sister! There is no need for caution, and no need for fear. Let us step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘！好姐妹！我们终于到了！<page>守住信念不容易，现在终于看到圣堡了！大家齐声歌颂的地方！<hpage>我知道劝不动你回头，但千万小心。这里头藏着可怕的东西。<page>用不着小心！跟着信仰往前走就对了！
translated_text: The Red Girl! My dear sister! The great pilgrimage is finally over!<page>Our faith will not waver, and our glorious reward awaits us here and now. Sing it all!<hpage>I'm not going to tell you to go back, because I know you're not coming back, but at least be careful. little pilgrim, there's something terrible lurking in this castle.<page>sister! There is no need for alarm or fear. Let us walk the path of faith!
secondary_translated_text: La jeune fille rouge ! Ma chère soeur ! Le grand pèlerinage est finalement terminé !<page>Notre foi ne vaincra pas, et notre glorieuse récompense nous attend ici et maintenant. Chantez-le tout !<hpage>Je ne vais pas te dire de revenir, parce que je sais que tu ne reviens pas, mais au moins fais attention. Petit pèlerin, il y a quelque chose de terrible qui se cache dans ce château.<page>soeur ! Il n'y a pas besoin d'alarme ou de peur. Prenons le chemin de la foi !

original_en_text: This vein of gilded bells creates an effectively defended settlement. I can see it once gave a long time of peace to its bugs.<page>And yet, look at their numbers now. Stricken by cursed thread. Only a few have survived.<page>We must learn from them, Child Wielding Needle. Peace is a slow poison that would wither even the hardiest bug.
original_zh_text: 这金钟钟脉易守难攻，以前肯定十分安全。<page>看看现在，大半被丝咒侵蚀了，虫民也所剩寥寥。<page>要从这镇子上吸取教训，使针的小姑娘。安逸最腐蚀虫心。
translated_text: These golden bells constitute an effective defence solution. I can see that it has been giving that bug some calmness for a long time.<page>But look at the current numbers. Trapped in a cursed line. " Only a few survived.<page>We must learn from our children that peace is a slow poison that spreads even to the most stubborn insects.
secondary_translated_text: Ces cloches d'or constituent une solution de défense efficace. Je peux voir que cela a donné à ce bug un peu de calme depuis longtemps.<page>Regardez les chiffres actuels. Piégé dans une ligne maudit. "Seuls quelques-uns ont survécu.<page>Nous devons apprendre de nos enfants que la paix est un poison lent qui se propage même aux insectes les plus têtus.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your camp here looks comfortably set, Shakra. Are you planning to stay a time?<page>Perhaps, yes. This heart-home makes a fine base for now and later if needed.<page>Still! I must take care not to rest overlong. My shell would soften and my senses dull.<page>
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，我瞧你营地布置得不错，打算长住？<page>或许吧，这镇子看来能暂时当个据点。<page> 但不能久待，会钝了爪子和脑子。
translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, your camp looks comfortable. Are you planning to stay a while?<page>Probably, yes. If necessary, this heart house will still be a good base.<page>Still! You have to be careful not to rest too much. My shell becomes softer, and my senses become dull.<page>
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, votre camp semble confortable. Vous envisagez de rester un moment ?<page>Probablement, oui. Si nécessaire, cette maison du cœur sera toujours une bonne base.<page>Quiet ! Il faut faire attention à ne pas trop se reposer. Ma coquille devient plus douce, et mes sens s'ennouissent.<page>

original_en_text: Oh, hullo again! This time, I most certainly do recognise you! ‘Tis a pleasure to bump into you here, deep in this serene wood.<page>Do you have a name, like I do? Would you share it with me?<hpage>Certainly, sir. I am Hornet.<hpage>I notice you gazing at the buds above us... are they familiar to you, perhaps?<page>Hm? No, not at all. Very beautiful though! Perhaps I should gather some up before venturing on...
original_zh_text: 又见面了！这次绝对认得你！能在这林中深处偶遇也是缘分。<page>能告诉我你的名字吗？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂。<hpage>你在看那些苍白花苞……莫非曾经见过？<page>那倒没有，但它们很美！出发前或许该采些带着……
translated_text: Oh, here you come again! This time I absolutely admitted it! "It is an honor to meet you deep in this quiet forest."<page>Are you the same name as me? Would you like to share with me?<hpage>Of course I am, I am Bumblebee.<hpage>He noticed that he was staring at the bumps on his head. You may know that.<page>what? what? Not at all, but so beautiful! You might want to collect a few before you venture.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, voilà que tu reviens ! Cette fois, je l'admets absolument !« C'est un honneur de vous rencontrer au fond de cette forêt calme. "<page>Vous avez le même nom que moi ? Aimeriez-vous partager avec moi ?<hpage>Je suis, je suis Bumblebee.<hpage>Il remarqua qu ' il regardait les bosses sur sa tête. Vous le savez peut - être<page>Quoi ? Quoi ? Pas du tout, mais si beau ! Vous voudrez peut - être en rassembler quelques-uns avant de vous aventurer.

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>These markers I have modelled after the sheen of my own shell. Perhaps you will think of me when you use them.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>按我的壳抛光做的，用的时候会想起我吧？
translated_text: It can be used to mark important places and reminders on the map.<br><br>I made a marker by imitating the shinyness of my own shell. Please think of me when you use it.
secondary_translated_text: Il peut être utilisé pour marquer des lieux importants et des rappels sur la carte.<br><br>J'ai fait un marqueur en imitant la brillance de ma propre coquille. Pensez à moi quand vous l'utilisez.

original_en_text: There are signs that pilgrims once travelled even these crumbling paths, long ago. Now only the voracious worms nest here.
original_zh_text: 这破路早年也有朝圣者走，现在只剩贪吃蠕虫。
translated_text: There are signs that in the past pilgrims were walking these unstable paths. Now only the greedy insects are making their nests.
secondary_translated_text: Il y a des signes que dans le passé les pèlerins marchaient sur ces chemins instables. Maintenant, seuls les insectes gourmands font leurs nids.

original_en_text: Hoi! Nimble bug! Surely you have reconsidered? Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 嘿！改变主意没？来一起突破极限！
translated_text: Hey! That's a smart mistake! did you really reconsider? Let's discover the limits together!
secondary_translated_text: Hey ! C'est une erreur intelligente ! Avez-vous réellement reconsidéré ? Découvrons les limites ensemble !

original_en_text: You have purchased the last of my mapping stock, for now. Stay alive on your journey, and when our paths next cross we may trade again.
original_zh_text: 你把我的货买光啦，小姑娘。多保重，下次碰面再做交易。
translated_text: With this, I have purchased my last stock map. You may stay in good spirits while traveling and trade again the next time you see them.
secondary_translated_text: J'ai donc acheté ma dernière carte de stock. Vous pouvez rester de bonne humeur pendant que vous voyagez et commercer à nouveau la prochaine fois que vous les voyez.

original_en_text: Don’t be lingerin’ here too long! We got snitchin’ to do and we ain’t keen on company!
original_zh_text: 别在这儿磨蹭太久！我们还要干活呢，不欢迎围观！
translated_text: Don't be here too long! I would like to report it, but my colleagues are not interested.
secondary_translated_text: Ne restez pas trop longtemps ici ! Je voudrais le signaler, mais mes collègues ne sont pas intéressés.

original_en_text: If you venture further and higher into these caverns, beware. The sickly air only grows thicker.
original_zh_text: 如果你要往高处的话，走小心，那儿的瘴气更浓。
translated_text: Be careful if you enter the cave. It will only make the sick air thicker.
secondary_translated_text: Faites attention si vous entrez dans la grotte ! Cela ne fera que rendre l'air malade plus épais.

original_en_text: I’ll be off soon, once I’m good and rested. Beyond the wood lies the final climb, and then at last we shall reach the Citadel!<page>Which of us will reach the Grand Gate first? If it’s me, I shall wait for you so we can enter together!
original_zh_text: 歇够了我就出发，穿过甲木林就是最后攀登，圣堡就在眼前！<page>看我们谁先到巨门？要是我先到，肯定会等你一起进去！
translated_text: As soon as I felt better, I walked behind the trees and on the last climb, I finally reached the castle!<page>who's going to go to the stargate first? If it were me, I would wait and enter with you!
secondary_translated_text: Dès que je me sentais mieux, je me promenais derrière les arbres et lors de la dernière montée, j'arrivais finalement au château !<page>Qui va aller en premier à Stargate ? Si c'était moi, j'attendrais et entrerais avec vous !

original_en_text: If you would fight alone, I will say nothing more.
original_zh_text: 你要自己上的话，我也没意见。
translated_text: If you are willing to fight alone, I will say no more.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous êtes prêt à vous battre seul, je ne dirai plus.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair meeting again, sir knight. I see this bell has drawn you too towards its safety.<page>Who would have guessed, sister! A safe corner, hidden so high atop Pharloom’s cursed crown!<page>Our fair village may have fallen, but for these fellows... these scared few, our honour charges us to keep them safe. Our hornlance shall raise for them! After some rest, of course.<hpage>Hold fast to your new charge, Garmond. See these bugs survive, and know I aim, in time near, to cut down this curse at its core.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，骑士。看来这钟也把你吸引过来了。<page>谁能想到呢，圣堡顶上还有避难所！<page>村子没了，但这些吓坏了的……为了荣耀，我会拿起长枪保护好他们！不过得先歇会。<hpage>守好他们，加蒙德。我会斩断诅咒的核心，不会让你等太久的。
translated_text: <hpage>Another fair encounter, knight. This watch is also paid attention to its safety.<page>Who can guess? A safe corner hidden above the cursed crown of the pharo!<page>Our beautiful village may have fallen, but it is for them. Our honor demands that we ensure the safety of these terrible minorities. " Our horns will blow for them! After a short break, of course.<hpage>Hold on tight to your new assault, Gammon. As I watch these mistakes survive, my goal is to eradicate the curse in the near future.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Encore une bonne rencontre, chevalier. Cette montre est également portée attention à sa sécurité.<page>Qui peut deviner ? Un coin sûr caché au-dessus de la couronne maudit du pharo !<page>Notre beau village est peut - être tombé, mais c'est pour eux. Notre honneur exige que nous veillons à la sécurité de ces terribles minorités. Nos cornes souffleront pour eux ! Après une courte pause, évidemment.<hpage>Accroche-toi à ta nouvelle attaque, Gammon. Alors que je regarde ces erreurs survivre, mon objectif est d'éradiquer la malédiction dans un avenir proche.

translated_text: The Sinner's Road Map
secondary_translated_text: La carte de route du pécheur

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>Beneath here and further on, the burly bellheads have a big, hot, gleaming hive! Full of all sorts of tasty snitchables!<page>But there’s this big gate they got down in its belly... shut tight, locked up. If you could wriggle through, you’d get your claws on all kindsa goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>底下更深的地方，那些钟头怪物有个又大又亮的宝库！全是好东西！<page>但最底下有道大门被锁死了。要是能溜进去就发啦！
translated_text: Oh, ho! In Grindell's pocket! To the one who remembers our secrets.<page>Here and elsewhere, in this noisy hour, there are big, hot, shining beehives! Lots of delicious reporters!<page>But they put the door in its belly - tightly closed and locked. If you can get through it, your nails will grab it all!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ho ! Dans la poche de Grindell. Pour celui qui se souvient de nos secrets.<page>Ici et ailleurs, en cette heure bruyante, il y a des ruches grandes, chaudes et brillantes ! Beaucoup de jolies reporters !<page>Mais ils ont mis la porte dans son ventre - fermée et verrouillée. Si vous pouvez le traverser, vos ongles vont tout attraper !

original_en_text: You see this idol before us, red maiden? I have passed its like before, they mark our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a miraculous shrine will rise from the ground, and we will have a place to rest! Such a wonder!<hpage>I suspect it is not song that rouses this shrine, but payment in rosaries.<hpage>I have encountered similar constructs on Pharloom’s paths. It seems this kingdom does not grant rest lightly.
original_zh_text: 看见这圣像了吗？沿途都有标记。<page>对着它歌唱，圣椅就会升起供我们歇息！多神奇！<hpage>我认为唤醒长椅的不是歌声，谢尔玛，而是念珠。<hpage>我在路上曾遇到过此类长椅，看来纺络从不轻易施恩。
translated_text: Do you see the red girl in front of us? I experienced it as before, and they put a good mark on it for our pilgrimage.<page>If you sing to it, a magical temple will rise up and become a place of rest. what a miracle!<hpage>I don't think it was the song that woke up the temple, but the reward of the Rosary.<hpage>I came across a similar building on my way to Faram. The kingdom did not sleep peacefully.
secondary_translated_text: Tu vois la femme rouge devant moi ? Je l'ai vécu comme avant, et ils y ont mis une bonne marque pour notre pèlerinage.<page>Si vous le chantez, un temple magique s'élèvera et deviendra un lieu de repos. Quel miracle !<hpage>Je ne pense pas que ce soit le chant qui a réveillé le temple, mais la récompense du Rosaire.<hpage>Je suis tombé sur un bâtiment similaire sur mon chemin vers Faram. Le royaume ne dort pas paisiblement.

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>There’s lots of pickings round here, right? Well, it’s all nothing compared to what they got hidden up, up above us. The great big Sitty-del they calls it!<page>A golden place, groaning with goodies! Could never steal it all in a thousand snitch-bug lifetimes they reckon!<page>Oh yes, that’s where ol’ Grindle is headin’. Don’t you dare follow us, though! We want it all for us-selves!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>这附近好东西不少对吧？但跟上边的圣堡比，什么都不是！<page>听说那是金山银山，几辈子都掏不完！<page>格林德尔这就去捞个够！你可别跟来抢！
translated_text: Oh, ho! In Grindell's pocket! To the one who remembers our secrets.<page>There's a lot of pick-ups, right? It's nothing compared to what they're hiding over our heads. They call it the Great Citadel!<page>A golden place full of beautiful moans! They believe that whistleblowers can't steal everything in a thousand lives!<page>Yes, this is the destination of the "grindles." Please follow us! We make this all our own!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ho ! Dans la poche de Grindell. Pour celui qui se souvient de nos secrets.<page>Il y a beaucoup de pick-ups, non ? Ce n'est rien comparé à ce qu ' ils cachent au-dessus de nos têtes. On l'appelle la Grande Citadelle !<page>Un endroit d'or plein de beaux gémissements ! Ils croient que les lanceurs d'alerte ne peuvent pas tout voler dans mille vies !<page>Oui, c'est la destination des "grindles".« S'il vous plaît suivez-nous ! Nous faisons de tout cela le nôtre !

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>You know where all them dreary raggedies are camping? Back near the ol’ chapel? Well, beyond that chapel is a dirty great grave!<page>Not much in there but husks, right? But but! My sniffer tells me there’s something worth the trouble buried down at the bottom!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>你知道那处破破烂烂的朝圣者营地吧？那附近的破教堂后头有个大坟场！<page>那乍一看都是尸壳对吧？但是但是！我能嗅到底下埋着值钱货，我鼻子灵得很！
translated_text: Oh, ho! It was in Grindell's pocket. To someone who will remember our secrets.<page>do you know where the trash is? Back to the old church? Behind the church is an unclean grave.<page>There's nothing but a shell, right? But but, but! My sniff said there was something to worry about hiding at the bottom!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ho ! Il était dans la poche de Grindell. Pour quelqu 'un qui se souviendra de nos secrets.<page>Savez-vous où se trouve la poubelle ? Retour à l'ancienne église ? Derrière l'église se trouve une tombe impure.<page>Il n'y a rien d'autre qu ' une coquille, non ? Mais mais, mais ! Mon sniff me disait qu 'il y avait quelque chose à craindre de se cacher au fond !

original_en_text: <hpage>The groaning docks, beyond the caverns of bone. There I have seen a vessel able to pass below, a heavy bell built for descent.<hpage>I need only gain access, and an operator to assist. I will investigate the docks, and uncover the means.<page=M>You’d be the first in an age to dive so deep, Old One. That space below remains long unseen, even to our family. <hpage>For those depths, I am more prepared than most. I will reach the base of this land, and know the truth of the new disaster we, together have wrought.
original_zh_text: <hpage>穿越骸骨洞窟，那锈蚀的深坞中停着一口沉钟，专为下潜打造。<hpage>只需寻得入口与操钟人。我会探查深坞，找出通路。<page=M>古老者，您是数个纪元以来第一个敢下潜的。那片黑暗连我们家族都未曾窥见。<hpage>对于深渊，我早有准备。我会抵达此地根基，看清你我共酿的新灾祸。
translated_text: <hpage>Moaning dock out of the bone hole. There was a ship that could pass underneath, and a heavy watch made for the fall.<hpage>All you need is access rights and an operator. I'll investigate the harbour and find a way.<page=M>Old man, you will be the first to study deeply in this age. Even for our family, the space below it was always unknown.<hpage>I deal with this depth more than most people do. I will go to the bottom of this earth and know the truth of the new catastrophe we have caused together.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Gémissant dock hors du trou d'os. Il y avait un navire qui pouvait passer en dessous, et une lourde montre faite pour la chute.<hpage>Tout ce dont vous avez besoin, c'est des droits d'accès et un opérateur. Je vais enquêter sur le port et trouver un moyen.<page=M>Vieil homme, tu seras le premier à étudier profondément à cette époque. Même pour notre famille, l'espace en dessous était toujours inconnu.<hpage>Je traite plus de cette profondeur que la plupart des gens. Je vais aller au fond de la terre et connaître la vérité de la nouvelle catastrophe que nous avons causée ensemble.

original_en_text: Why does it fade? Why can I not recall that sacred place?
original_zh_text: 为什么消失了……为什么想不起圣地模样……
translated_text: why are they disappearing? Why don't we remember the holy place?
secondary_translated_text: Pourquoi disparaissent-ils ? Pourquoi ne nous souvenons-nous pas du lieu saint ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Here you lie, monarch. Sunk so deep, yet still you cling to life. <hpage>Would you let your lands be choked black... to protect just her?
original_zh_text: <hpage>苍白之主，沉沦至此也要苟活么？<hpage>你宁愿让纺络被黑暗吞噬……只为护着她？
translated_text: <hpage>Lord, here you lie. Even if you sink deeply, you are still alive.<hpage>Are you going to suffocate your land, just to protect it?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Seigneur, vous mentez. Même si vous couler profondément, vous êtes toujours en vie.<hpage>Vous allez étouffer votre terre, juste pour la protéger ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Take care, Garmond. Whatever dangers these lands present, I’m sure what waits in that Citadel will be worse.<page>Aye, sister! Until that Citadel is reached and justice is served, Zaza and I shall not fall.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，加蒙德。圣堡必然比外面更加危险。<page>你也保重，姐妹！不跟圣堡之主讨个公道，我和扎扎不会倒下的！
translated_text: <hpage>Be careful, gamon. Whatever dangers may be in these lands, I think what awaits in the castle is worse.<page>Yes, my sister! Zaza and I will not fall until we reach the fort and do justice.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Faites attention, gamin. Quels que soient les dangers dans ces terres, je pense que ce qui attend dans le château est pire.<page>Oui, ma sœur ! Zaza et moi ne tomberons pas tant que nous n'aurons pas atteint le fort et rendu justice.

original_en_text: Letting you live was my rebellion, spider. I’ve denied my mother your silken strength. I’ve won.<page>She can thrash, and waste, and know her pathetic, broken child caused the mortal wound.<page>Rejoice! And let it all come down.<hpage>I will not. I have already stood the sentinel for one dying land. That role... I will never play again.<hpage>While I live, and possess the strength to resist, this kingdom, and the bugs within it, shall not fall.
original_zh_text: 留着你的性命就是我的反叛。母亲得不到你的灵丝，是我赢了。<page>让她抓狂吧！知道是我这残次品带给她致命伤！<page>欢呼吧！一切都将崩塌！<hpage>恕难从命。我曾守望过一个将死的国度，同样的角色……我不想再扮第二次。<hpage>只要我还活着，还有力气反抗，这个王国与其子民就不会陨落。
translated_text: It's my resistance to keep you alive. I didn't give Spider Mother any power. i won.<page>She knows that the whip, can be wasted, grief, broken child was fatally wounded.<page>Be happy! Putting everything down.<hpage>I will not be the watchman of the place of death. This role. I will never play it again.<hpage>As long as I live and have the strength to resist, the kingdom and the insects in it will not fall.
secondary_translated_text: C'est ma résistance de te garder en vie. Je n'ai pas donné de pouvoirs à Spider-Mère. J'ai gagné.<page>Elle sait que le fouet, peut être gaspillé, le chagrin, l'enfant cassé a été mortellement blessé.<page>Soyez heureux ! Tout mettre en bas.<hpage>Je ne serai pas le gardien du lieu de mort. ce rôle. Je ne le jouerai plus jamais.<hpage>Tant que je vivrai et que j'aurai la force de résister, le royaume et les insectes qui y sont ne tomberont pas.

original_en_text: Hahahhaa! Spider. Spider. What a marvellous specimen you are! You fight and fight, heedless as the world crumbles around you.<page>Pharloom and her bugs will be crushed to dust, and still you’ll be vainly swinging your blade.<hpage>...There may still be a way to prevent that fate. I will claim the hidden power, the bloom that repels the dark.<hpage>Those snails share some fault in the snare, and their callous use of the void. They shall help me now to seek its counter.<hpage>I will return, child, when I bear the strength to dive below, and cut this land finally free of your mother’s grasp.
original_zh_text: 哈哈哈哈！顽固的小蜘蛛！即便你继续挣扎，这个世界一样会崩塌！<page>一切都将化为尘埃，继续挥舞那针刃还有什么用<hpage>……或许还有转机。我会取得驱散黑暗的永绽花。<hpage>蜗牛一族滥用虚空难辞其咎，现在它们得帮我找到破局之法。<hpage>等我取得力量，就来斩断你母亲的掌控。
translated_text: ha ha ha! ha ha ha! Spider, you are a good example! When the world around us collapses, we fight and fight without knowing it.<page>Fal and her worms are crushed to pieces, and you are still waving your blades in vain.<hpage>... There may still be ways to avert this fate. I have a hidden power and reject the flowers of darkness.<hpage>These snail traps also have drawbacks, and they relentlessly exploit the gaps. They will help me find my counter-attack.<hpage>My son, when I have dived into the sea and at last gained the strength to free this land from your mother, I will come back.
secondary_translated_text: Ha ha ha ! Ha ha ha ! Spider, vous en êtes un bon exemple ! Quand le monde autour de nous s'effondre, nous nous battons et nous battons sans le savoir.<page>Fal et ses vers sont écrasés en morceaux, et vous agitez toujours vos lames en vain.<hpage>... Il existe peut - être des moyens d'éviter ce sort. J'ai un pouvoir caché et je rejette les fleurs des ténèbres.<hpage>Ces pièges à escargots ont aussi des inconvénients, et ils exploitent sans relâche les lacunes. Ils m'aideront à trouver ma contre-attaque.<hpage>Mon fils, quand j'aurai plongé dans la mer et enfin gagné la force de libérer cette terre de ta mère, je reviendrai.

original_en_text: After some tasty goodies? We never say no to a fair trade, heh heh! Take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 想要宝贝？只接受公平交易！随便看看吧……
translated_text: after eating a good meal? I'm not saying no to fair trade. So let's see what we have.
secondary_translated_text: Après avoir mangé un bon repas ? Je ne dis pas NON au commerce équitable. Alors voyons ce que nous avons.

original_en_text: We could add a little pocket to yer tool pouch for you. You could pack even more goodies in there! All your shards’n sharp things!
original_zh_text: 给你工具包加个兜，能多装点好宝贝。
translated_text: You can put a small pocket in the tool box. I could put in something better! All of your pieces are sharp!
secondary_translated_text: Vous pouvez placer une petite poche dans la boîte à outils. J'aurais pu mettre quelque chose de mieux ! Toutes vos pièces sont tranchantes !

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, if I may, I’d ask a small task of your carving talents.<hpage>Within the halls of the Citadel, I encountered a means of travel new to me, a network of pipes traversed in vessels propelled by steam and air.<hpage>That Citadel is a labyrinth, and pins to mark each station would prove useful to me.<page>What you describe sounds as hideous and unnatural as anything in that place. Still, if it will aid you, I shall craft the pins.<page>Seek me at a moment not long from now. The pins will be carved, and we may trade.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，方便的话，借你的手艺办件小事。<hpage>圣堡里有种我没见过的蒸汽管道交通网。<hpage>但那跟一座迷宫一样，因此我需要标记站点的图钉。<page>圣堡里都是这种难看又不自然的玩意。但你要就给你做吧。<page>过阵子再来找我，图钉做好了才能交易。
translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, I'd like to let my sculptural talent do a little work, if you like.<hpage>In the great halls of the castle, I encountered a strange way of traveling: a network of pipes through which steam and air-powered ships pass.<hpage>The castle was like a maze, and the pins marked at each station were very helpful.<page>What you have described sounds as terrifying and unnatural as anything else in that place. But if it helps, I'll make a pin.<page>Find them as soon as possible. The pins are sculpted and can be replaced.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, j'aimerais laisser mon talent sculptural faire un peu de travail, si vous le souhaitez.<hpage>Dans les grandes salles du château, j'ai rencontré une étrange façon de voyager : un réseau de tuyaux à travers lesquels passent les navires à vapeur et à air.<hpage>Le château était comme un labyrinthe, et les épingles marquées à chaque station étaient très utiles.<page>Ce que vous avez décrit sonne aussi terrifiant et non naturel que toute autre chose à cet endroit. Mais si ça m'aide, je vais faire un pin.<page>Trouvez-les le plus tôt possible. Les broches sont sculptées et peuvent être remplacées.

original_en_text: These overgrown caves offer little challenge to a skilled warrior. A place for reflection, perhaps.
original_zh_text: 这长满苔藓的洞穴对高手没挑战性，适合发呆。
translated_text: These lush caves offer little challenge to a skilled soldier. It may be a place for reflection.
secondary_translated_text: Ces grottes luxuriantes ne présentent que peu de défi pour un soldat qualifié. Il peut être un lieu de réflexion.

original_en_text: Fear not, red maiden! This shrine will surely rise for us, we only need to patiently wish for it!
original_zh_text: 别担心！只要诚心祈愿，圣椅定会为我们显现！
translated_text: Don't be afraid, Red Girl! This holy place will surely stand up for us. We just have to pray patiently.
secondary_translated_text: N'aie pas peur, fille rouge ! Ce lieu saint nous restera certainement. Il nous suffit de prier patiemment.

original_en_text: <page=M>In the heights of the great wood, nestled deep in its roots, vines and branches, find the one who sowed the first seed.<page=S>They’re the very essence of the place, the nub of it all. Ain’t really a bug, to be told, but a powerful presence nonetheless.<page=M>We’d heard the Citadel once made grudging accord with that creature, sent their servants in reverence, even built a shrine up there somewhere. Maybe it’s worth you searching for it?
original_zh_text: <page=M>甲木林最深处，根枝藤蔓之间，埋着最初播种者。<page=S>那是纺络的精华所在，虽算不得虫子，但也十分强大。<page=M>听说圣堡曾与之立约，建造圣所供奉，还派遣仆从侍奉。或许值得一探？
translated_text: <page=M>High in the woods, deep in the roots and branches, find the one who sowed the first seed.<page=S>They are the essence of this place, and they are at the heart of everything. What I want to say is that it's not a real mistake, but it's still a powerful being.<page=M>I've heard that the castle once made an unwilling agreement with this creature, sent a servant for a mourning, and built a temple somewhere. is it worth looking for?
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Haut dans les bois, profondément dans les racines et les branches, trouvez celui qui a semé la première graine.<page=S>Ils sont l'essence de cet endroit et ils sont au cœur de tout. Ce que je veux dire, c'est que ce n'est pas une véritable erreur, mais c'est quand même un être puissant.<page=M>J'ai entendu dire que le château a fait un pacte contre sa volonté avec cette créature, a envoyé un serviteur pour un deuil, et a construit un temple quelque part. Vaut-il la peine de chercher ?

original_en_text: Old roads and passages overrun by roaches and their keepers. The ways are covered thick with filth.
original_zh_text: 被蟑螂及其饲主侵占的古道，路面上覆满污秽。
translated_text: Ancient roads and passageways are occupied by cockroaches and their keepers. The road is muddy.
secondary_translated_text: Les anciennes routes et les passages sont occupés par les cafards et leurs gardiens. La route est boueuse.

original_en_text: In this moment, I have no more items to trade. Perhaps, if we meet again on the roads ahead, I shall have crafted new goods to sell.
original_zh_text: 暂时没货了，小姑娘。下次碰面会准备好新玩意的，保重。
translated_text: At the moment, there are no products to trade. If we meet again on the road, we might create a new product and sell it.
secondary_translated_text: Pour le moment, il n'y a pas de produits à échanger. Si nous nous retrouvions sur la route, nous pourrions créer un nouveau produit et le vendre.

original_en_text: You like this gleaming spinner I snitched from the big Sitty-dell? There’s a way to make it sing to you, or so they says!
original_zh_text: 从圣堡顺来的转轮！据说用某种方法能让它唱歌呢！
translated_text: Do you like this shining spinner I reported on at Citydale Cathedral? There is a way to sing a song, at least they say so!
secondary_translated_text: Aimez-vous ce spinner brillant que j'ai rapporté à la cathédrale de Citydale ? Il y a une façon de chanter, du moins on le dit !

translated_text: Map of Bone Marrow
secondary_translated_text: Carte de la moelle osseuse

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>This dark-shell material is cold to the touch, and more resilient than it looks.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>黑壳材质冷冰冰的，比看着结实。
translated_text: It can be used to mark important places and reminders on the map.<br><br>The material of this deep shell feels cold and is more elastic than it looks.
secondary_translated_text: Il peut être utilisé pour marquer des lieux importants et des rappels sur la carte.<br><br>Le matériau de cette coquille profonde se sent froid et est plus élastique qu ' il n'y paraît.

original_en_text: Crumbling roads built upon the shells of ancient bugs. All of Pharloom rests upon these fragile foundations.
original_zh_text: 建在古虫壳上的破路，整个纺络都靠这些脆架子撑着。
translated_text: This precarious road was built on the shells of ancient insects. The whole Faro is built on this fragile foundation.
secondary_translated_text: Cette route précaire a été construite sur les coquilles d'insectes anciens. L'ensemble du Faro est construit sur cette base fragile.

original_en_text: Crusted heights above those howling steps. Signs suggest great warriors once ruled this winding place, though the sand has eroded much of their mark.
original_zh_text: 风蚀台阶上的矿脉高地。迹象表明曾有强族统治，现已被沙尘掩埋。
translated_text: The top of the roaring stairs is full of hard skin. There are signs that the great warriors once ruled this winding place, but the sand is eroding most of their traces.
secondary_translated_text: Le sommet de l'escalier rugissant est plein de peau dure. Il y a des signes que les grands guerriers ont autrefois régné sur cet endroit sinueux, mais le sable érodera la plupart de leurs traces.

original_en_text: <hpage>To search these lands so thoroughly, Shakra... I wonder, who is it you hope to find?<page>Okklu-Din... a perceptive question. I travel in search of my mentor, the greatest of my tribe. I have followed her trail throughout this kingdom, but have so far failed to catch her.<page>She will have travelled much farther by now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant, we shall reunite.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了。我看你把这片地区都找遍了……你到底在找谁？<page>唉……问得好。我在找导师，我们部落的最强者。我追着她的踪迹跑遍了王国，还是没找到。<page>她肯定走得更远了，但只要保持警惕总能重逢。
translated_text: <hpage>Please examine this land thoroughly, Shakura. do you want to know who you want to find?<page>Okudin's insightful question I have traveled to find my teacher, the greatest teacher in the tribe. I have pursued her in this kingdom, but I have not yet caught her.<page>She's going even further now, but if I go forward and stay alert, we can meet again.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>S'il vous plaît examinez cette terre à fond, Shakura. Tu veux savoir qui tu veux trouver ?<page>J'ai voyagé pour trouver mon professeur, le plus grand professeur de la tribu. Je l'ai poursuivie dans ce royaume, mais je ne l'ai pas encore attrapé.<page>Elle va encore plus loin maintenant, mais si je vais de l'avant et que je reste alerte, nous pourrons nous retrouver.

original_en_text: The stone structures of this place suggest clear waters once ran throughout.<page>What fantasy that now seems! Even this swamp’s inhabitants seem spawned of its noxious nature.
original_zh_text: 这里的石制结构说明以前有清水流过。<page>现在呢？连原本栖居在这里的虫都像是从毒瘴里孕育出来的。
translated_text: The stonework at this site indicates that water once flowed.<page>How fantastic it is now! Even the people of this swamp seem to be rising because of its toxicity.
secondary_translated_text: Les pierres de ce site indiquent que l'eau a coulé autrefois.<page>Comme c'est fantastique maintenant ! Même les habitants de ce marais semblent augmenter à cause de sa toxicité.

original_en_text: But look here! As soon as our sacred journey begins, we are tested. This huge gate stands between us and the way forward.<page>Only holy prayer and song will open the way! In this kingdom, even mighty bone is moved by music!
original_zh_text: 可你看看！朝圣之路刚启程就遇到考验，被这道巨大骨门拦住了去路。<page>唯有圣歌能够撼动它！在纺络，最顽固的骨头都会为旋律让道！
translated_text: But look at this! When the sacred journey begins, we are tested. A big door was blocking us and our path.<page>Only God's prayer and song will open the way! In this kingdom, even the strong bones can touch the music.
secondary_translated_text: Mais regardez cela ! Lorsque le voyage sacré commence, nous sommes éprouvés. Une grande porte nous bloquait et nous bloquait notre chemin.<page>Seule la prière et le chant de Dieu ouvriront la voie ! Dans ce royaume, même les os forts peuvent toucher la musique.

original_en_text: You win again! Never have I met a luckier pilgrim...<hpage>You mistake, sir. It was skill that won me this game. One must be careful not to rely merely on luck.<page>Hmph. Fairly said, sister.<page>I must confess something though. Truth is, I already lost the last of my rosaries. I can’t pay our last wager.<page>I do have something small for you, at least. These dice. They certainly seem to have taken a liking to you. Take them, in memory of our meeting.
original_zh_text: 你又赢了！没见过运气这么好的朝圣者……<hpage>错了，我是靠技术赢的，别光指望运气。<page>哼，倒也说得在理。<page>其实……我已经输光家底了。最后这把的赌注我给不起。<page>但我可以把这些小玩意送你。这对骰子跟你有缘，收下当纪念吧。
translated_text: We won again! I have never seen such a fortunate pilgrim.<hpage>You're wrong, my friend. Technology is what led me to this race Be careful not to rely on luck alone.<page>Well said, Sister.<page>But I have to admit, in fact, that I lost my last Rosary book. I couldn't make my last bet.<page>At least I have a little one for you. " They seem to really love you for these cards. To commemorate our meeting.
secondary_translated_text: Nous avons gagné à nouveau ! Je n'ai jamais vu un pèlerin aussi chanceux.<hpage>Vous avez tort mon ami. La technologie est ce qui m'a conduit à cette course Attention à ne pas compter uniquement sur la chance.<page>Très bien dit, soeur.<page>Mais je dois avouer, en fait, que j'ai perdu mon dernier livre de Rosaire. Je n'ai pas pu faire mon dernier pari.<page>Au moins j'en ai un petit pour toi.« Ils semblent vraiment vous aimer pour ces cartes. Pour commémorer notre rencontre.

original_en_text: <page>Who are you hoping you’ll find down there, spider? An ailing child and a Silk starved beast? <page>If so, I’m afraid we may sorely disappoint. What waits below is me no longer.
original_zh_text: <page>小蜘蛛，你指望能在下面见到谁？虚弱的傀儡还是饥渴的空壳？<page>要让你失望了，在下面等着的早已不是我。
translated_text: <page>spider, who are you looking for? A sick child and a hungry beast.<page>If so, we may be very disappointed. I'm not waiting there anymore.
secondary_translated_text: <page>Spider, qui cherchez-vous ? Un enfant malade et une bête affamée.<page>Si c'est le cas, nous pourrions être très déçus. Je n'attends plus là.

original_en_text: Hoy, you’re still hanging around then? Quiet in here. Good for hidin’ out.<page>You gots the li’l clicky-clackies on you then, eh? The rolly-roundies? What the shops like to swap for?
original_zh_text: 哟，还在附近晃悠呢？这很安静，适合躲藏。<page>带叮当响了没？就是商店爱换的那种小圆珠？
translated_text: hey, are you still hanging? It's quiet here. it's good for hiding<page>that's why there's a jungle, right? What would you like to change in the store?
secondary_translated_text: - Tu es toujours accroché ? Il est calme ici. C'est bon pour se cacher<page>C'est pour ça qu ' il y a une jungle, non ? Qu ' est-ce que vous aimeriez changer dans le magasin ?

translated_text: Mark of the Cup
secondary_translated_text: La marque de la coupe

original_en_text: You... So, it is done... My wish granted before ever I arrived...<hpage>The bronze pair that danced this chamber, it is clear, tall bug, how closely they mimicked your shell. Was it you who provided their inspiration?<page>Not I, warrior. For this place, my heart holds only loathing...<page>The dancers... they were the last free act of my partner... Always hopeful. Always naive.<page>His whole he gave, in desperate trade to see our own caves left safe. His shell and soul became the mould.<page>So long, I dared not visit... Even as our lands fell to thread and ruin... Instead I wasted, a coward caged, too weak to witness his grace bound in parody so cruel.<hpage>Take some solace, tall bug. His soul is now free from that shell of iron, and the fate that befell your lands, this Citadel too has been claimed full by it.<page>Aye... Slim consolation, warrior, now that everything I loved is lost...
original_zh_text: 你……这样啊……竟然在我抵达前就完成了……<hpage>厅里那对铜像，分明是照着你的模样铸的。是你给的灵感？<page>与我无关。对这地方……我只剩恶心……<page>舞者……是我伴侣最后的自由创作……他总是满怀天真与希望。<page>为保我们故土平安，他献出了全部。躯壳和灵魂都成了铸模。<page>这么久以来，我不敢来看……哪怕故土被丝咒吞噬……懦弱地困在牢里，不敢面对他的优雅被如此践踏……<hpage>宽心吧，至少现在他的灵魂挣脱铁壳了。你们故土遭受的厄运，圣堡也逃不过。<page>是啊……但这不过是无力的安慰……如今我爱的一切都化为乌有……
translated_text: You are a... That's what we decided. My wish was fulfilled before we arrived.<hpage>The bronze partner is dancing in the room, so clear, so tall, mimicking how close the shell is, do you inspire them?<page>It's not me, soldier. I hate this place.<page>The dancers. This is our partner's last free show. Always filled with hope. Always naïve.<page>He did everything in his power for the safety of our own cave. His body and soul became one form.<page>For a long time, I was afraid to watch. Even if our land is desolate and ruined... On the contrary, I have wasted it. The coward in the cage was too weak to see directly his grace by such a cruel imitation.<hpage>Comfort yourself, high insect. His soul is now freed from the iron shell, and its fate falls on your land, and the castle has been occupied by it.<page>Yes, a little consolation, soldier, all that I loved now was lost.
secondary_translated_text: Vous êtes un... C'est ce que nous avons décidé. Mon souhait a été réalisé avant notre arrivée.<hpage>Le partenaire en bronze danse dans la pièce, si clair, si grand, imitant à quel point la coquille est proche, les inspirez-vous ?<page>Ce n'est pas moi, soldat. Je déteste cet endroit.<page>les danseurs. C'est le dernier spectacle gratuit de notre partenaire. Toujours rempli d'espoir. toujours naïve.<page>Il a fait tout ce qui était en son pouvoir pour la sécurité de notre propre grotte. Son corps et son âme sont devenus une seule.<page>Pendant longtemps, j'avais peur de regarder. Même si notre terre est désolée et en ruines... Le lâche dans la cage était trop faible pour voir directement sa grâce par une imitation aussi cruelle.<hpage>Réconfortez-vous, haut insecte ! Son âme est maintenant libérée de la coquille de fer, et son destin tombe sur votre terre, et le château a été occupé par elle.<page>Oui, un peu de consolation, soldat, tout ce que j'aimais était perdu.

original_en_text: <page=M>What’s this? That’s an unexpected heart you’re holding, Old One...<page=M>We can guess to its source, though we’d believed it long gone from these lands. <hpage>The heart of a graceful lord. In its taking I was able to witness his caves and kingdom as once they flourished.<hpage>A stunning sight. Unique. All gone... Lost to the pale monarch... and the system to keep her caged.
original_zh_text: <page=M>咦？这颗心出乎意料啊，古老者……<hpage>一位优雅领主的心。取心时我见到了其洞窟王国昔日繁盛景象。<hpage>真是瑰丽无双。但都消逝了……毁于苍白君主……以及囚困她的体系。
translated_text: <page=M>what is this? Grandpa, you have an unexpected heart in your hand.<page=M>Its origins can be guessed, but it is believed that it has long left this land.<hpage>The heart of the Lord's mercy. In the course of filming, I witnessed the prosperity of his cave and kingdom.<hpage>Great views. Unique, everyone went to defeat the Pale Monarch - - and the system that locks her in a cage.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Grand-père, vous avez un cœur inattendu dans votre main.<page=M>On peut deviner ses origines, mais on pense qu ' il a quitté cette terre depuis longtemps.<hpage>Le cœur de la miséricorde du Seigneur. Au cours du tournage, j'ai été témoin de la prospérité de sa grotte et de son royaume.<hpage>Bonnes vues. Unique, tout le monde est allé vaincre le Pale Monarch - et le système qui l'enferme dans une cage.

original_en_text: A beat of rosaries is our wager. Once you find enough, I’d be happy to play.
original_zh_text: 赌注是一奏念珠。等你攒够了，我很乐意再陪你玩。
translated_text: Our bet is the rosary, and when we find enough, we'll be happy to play.
secondary_translated_text: Notre pari est le chapelet, et quand nous en trouverons assez, nous serons heureux de jouer.

original_en_text: Nimble bug, you return refreshed! And so perfectly timed, for I have a new challenge prepared.<page>The course shall remain the same as last, but length, the laps, will greatly extend.<hpage>You propose a test of endurance? I have undertaken many in my time.<page>Excellent! Excellent! Though know, for this race, I can only provide slight reward for victory.<page>What say you, nimble bug? Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 你看起来状态绝佳！正好我准备了新的挑战！<page>赛道和上次一样，但长度、圈数大幅增加！<hpage>要比耐力？我平时可没少锻炼。<page>那太好了！不过这次如果你赢了，奖励价值或许不高。<page>怎么说？一起冲刺吧！
translated_text: Smart insects, you're back in good health! The timing is just right as we are ready for a new challenge.<page>The race is the same as the previous one, but the length (lap count) is significantly extended.<hpage>Do you recommend endurance testing? I've done a lot in my life.<page>That's awesome! That's awesome! I know that in this game, you can only be rewarded with a small reward for winning.<page>What are you talking about, speed error? "Let's Go Go!
secondary_translated_text: Insectes intelligents, vous êtes de retour en bonne santé ! Le timing est juste, car nous sommes prêts pour un nouveau défi.<page>La course est la même que la précédente, mais la longueur (compte des tours) est considérablement prolongée.<hpage>Recommanderiez-vous les tests d'endurance ? J'ai fait beaucoup dans ma vie.<page>C'est génial ! C'est génial ! Je sais que dans ce jeu, vous ne pouvez être récompensé qu ' avec une petite récompense pour gagner.<page>De quoi parle-t - on, erreur de vitesse ?« Allons-y !

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time, Shakra. I am always eager to learn, but for now my tasks call me away. <page>Bakelo! Answer to your tasks, then. My rings shall await your return.
original_zh_text: <hpage>改天吧。虽然想锻炼技艺，但要事在身。<page>吧咔咯！那忙你的去吧！我的战环随时恭候。
translated_text: <hpage>Next time, Sakura. I've always wanted to learn, but now I have no obligation to do so.<page>BACKRO, do your job. Waiting for the ring to come back.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>La prochaine fois, Sakura. J'ai toujours voulu apprendre, mais maintenant je n'ai pas l'obligation de le faire.<page>BACKRO, faites votre travail. J'attends que l'anneau revienne.

original_en_text: Gurrroo! Fellow warrior, if you are wishing to lock blades, know you stand before the honoured knight Garmond, and brave companion Zaza. Together we will face bold to any challenge!<hpage>I have no wish to fight you, sir bug. It is heartening to meet another on these roads of sound mind, and with fortitude enough to fight back against the haunted husks.<page>Aye! Too many, these unnatural opponents! We did hope Pharloom’s vast expanse would still possess some place free of that tainted thread. <page>Alas, so far we’ve encountered only violence and decay. We greatly fear the Haunting afflicts this kingdom all.
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！想打架？先报上名来！我乃荣耀骑士加蒙德，这位是忠仆扎扎！<hpage>没兴趣比武。只是难得能遇见敢反抗丝咒傀儡的清醒者。<page>是啊！到处都是被操控的傀儡！还以为纺络如此广袤，说不定能有片净土……<page>唉，结果走到哪都是腐烂和杀戮！这诅咒怕是蔓延全境了！
translated_text: GORAM! Comrades, if you wish to lock your sword, know that you are standing before the noble knight Gamond and his valiant companion Zaza. Together we will face any challenge!<hpage>I don't want to fight you, Mr. Bug. It's exciting to meet another man on these wise paths who has enough patience to counter the shells of the ghosts.<page>yes! yes! Too many, too many, these unnatural enemies! I hope there's still an area in the vast landscape of Faram that has no contamination lines.<page>Unfortunately, so far, we have seen only violence and corruption. We are afraid that this obsession will afflict everyone in the kingdom. "
secondary_translated_text: Goram ! Camarades, si vous souhaitez verrouiller votre épée, sachez que vous vous trouvez devant le noble chevalier Gamond et son vaillant compagnon Zaza. Ensemble, nous affronterons tous les défis !<hpage>Je ne veux pas me battre avec vous, monsieur Bug. C'est excitant de rencontrer un autre homme sur ces sentiers sages qui a assez de patience pour contrer les coquilles des fantômes.<page>Oui ! Oui ! Trop, trop, trop, ces ennemis contre-naturels ! J'espère qu ' il y a encore une zone dans le vaste paysage de Faram qui n'a pas de lignes de contamination.<page>Malheureusement, jusqu'à présent, nous n'avons vu que de la violence et de la corruption. Nous craignons que cette obsession afflige tout le monde dans le royaume. "

original_en_text: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keen!<page>In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe, and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！握紧兵刃，保持警惕！<page>在我们部落，战士们都这么打招呼。虽然你看着像个刚破卵的娃娃，但架势、武器、动作都像个战士。<page>我是部落的测绘师，一直在画这里的地图。想要可以拿物资来换。
translated_text: boshanka! Sharp edges and a sharp feel!<page>The soldiers of my country greeted me like this. You are a newborn child, but you are also a soldier. Your position, your weapons, and your actions show it. "<page>I was a tribal pilot mapping this land, and if you want, you can exchange goods and merchandise.
secondary_translated_text: boshanka ! Bords tranchants et une sensation tranchante !<page>Les soldats de mon pays m'ont salué comme ça. Vous êtes un enfant nouveau-né, mais vous êtes aussi un soldat. Votre position, vos armes, vos actions le montrent. »<page>J'étais un pilote tribal cartographiant cette terre, et si vous voulez, vous pouvez échanger des marchandises et des marchandises.

original_en_text: Rest below while you can. In the lands beyond these bells, it is rare to see such safety.
translated_text: Rest there as much as you can. In the land outside these bells, such safety is rare.
secondary_translated_text: Reposez-vous là autant que vous pouvez. Dans la terre en dehors de ces cloches, une telle sécurité est rare.

translated_text: Map of Gremoir
secondary_translated_text: Carte du Gremoir

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, if your wish is to gain learning of this land’s creatures, why not hunt them yourself?<page>Ma? Nuu, herself to hunt? No, no! Is not Nuu’s nature to hunt, is hers to come later and learn. Such is the way of things!<page>But you... a predator! Know it from your smells can clever Nuu! So Nuu asks you to cut and record, so we both may learn!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小丫头，想了解生物怎么不自己去抓？<page>啊？努努自己去？不行不行！努努的天职是研究，这是规矩！<page>但你……是掠食者！努努闻得出来！所以拜托你砍怪记录，我们一起学习！
translated_text: <hpage>My child, if you want to know the creatures of this land, why don't you hunt for yourself?<page>mom? she wants to hunt herself? no! no! no! The nature of Nu was not to hunt, but to learn from later. That's the problem!<page>But you are - a predator! From your smell, you can tell it's going to be smart! So, please let Nuu edit it and record it, so that everyone can learn it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Mon enfant, si tu veux connaître les créatures de cette terre, pourquoi ne chasses-tu pas toi-même ?<page>Maman ? Elle veut se chasser elle-même ? Non ! ! Non ! ! Non ! ! La nature de Nu n'était pas de chasser, mais d'apprendre plus tard. C'est le problème !<page>Vous êtes un prédateur ! De votre odeur, vous pouvez dire que cela va être intelligent ! Alors, s'il vous plaît, laissez-le éditer et l'enregistrer, afin que tout le monde puisse l'apprendre.

original_en_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths provide some respite from the dangers without, but there is a still safer place high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>A settlement has formed around the old shrine there. The bell housed within seems to provide some sanctuary from the dangers of the Haunting.<hpage>Your brother and sister pilgrims who now huddle around it would be glad of your company, I am sure.<page>Oh, how wonderful! Yes, I will make my way over there with haste... after I have bathed a little longer. I want to arrive fresh and clean to such a holy place!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，温泉虽然舒服，但圣堡另一边更安全。<hpage>老钟殿旁边有个新聚落，那里的钟声能抵御丝咒。<page>逃到那边的同伴肯定欢迎你。<page>太好了！等我泡舒服了就过去……拜见圣地前得收拾体面！
translated_text: <hpage>As a small pilgrim, these baths offer an opportunity to mitigate the dangers outside, but on the other side of the castle there is a safer place.<hpage>A settlement was formed around the old shrine. The internal clock seemed to have escaped the danger of trouble.<hpage>The pilgrim brothers and sisters who are gathered among them now will be very happy to be with you.<page>Oh, that's great! Yes, I'll be right there. After the shower. I want to go to such a holy place!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>En tant que petit pèlerin, ces bains offrent l'occasion d'atténuer les dangers extérieurs, mais de l'autre côté du château, il y a un endroit plus sûr.<hpage>Une colonie s'est formée autour de l'ancien sanctuaire. L'horloge interne semblait avoir échappé au danger de troubles.<hpage>Les frères et sœurs pèlerins qui sont maintenant réunis parmi eux seront très heureux d'être avec vous.<page>Oh, c'est génial ! Oui, je serai là. Après la douche. Je veux aller dans un endroit aussi saint !

original_en_text: You hold many charts, Child Wielding Needle. You should consider trading for a quill.<page>With a quill in claw, your maps can be further extended from your own travels. Record enough and you may, in time, come to know this kingdom all.
original_zh_text: 你身上的图纸不少，使针的小姑娘，该买支笔了。<page>带着笔就能边走边画。画够多了，迟早能摸清纺络的全貌。
translated_text: There are a lot of charts that kids are waving needles on, and you should consider using a feather pen to trade.<page>With a feather pen attached to your feet, the map can expand further from your own journey. If you keep enough records, you will know the kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: Il y a beaucoup de graphiques sur lesquels les enfants agitent des aiguilles, et vous devriez envisager d'utiliser un stylo à plumes pour le commerce.<page>Avec un stylo à plumes attaché à vos pieds, la carte peut s'étendre plus loin de votre propre voyage. Si vous gardez suffisamment de dossiers, vous connaîtrez le royaume.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Child Wielding Needle. You too have discovered this haven of bells.<page>For a long time, I avoided this place for sense of something strange. Now arrived, I find it free, and its few remaining residents offering trade and welcome.<hpage>I slew a tall creature above the town, a Weaver I suspect, though one twisted in purpose.<hpage>It was her you may have sensed. A formidable force, even aged. By voice and claw she aided, perhaps guided, the haunted thread that grasps these lands. <page>Weaver? Those vicious things. To our young we tell the tales, but had thought them long dead, only corpses bound in spires. <hpage>This one still lived, though if it was a Weaver, it was broken in a savage way.<hpage>Its own Silk was bound, pinned deep within its shell. A cruel punishment I’ve not before witnessed. <page>Even broken, my envy remains. A Weaver’s fabled skills... To meet one in combat means great challenge, and great pride in victory.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！使针的小姑娘。你也找到这镇子了？<page>之前总能察觉到这儿的古怪，就一直避开。现在诅咒没了，剩下的住民还挺热情。<hpage>我斩了镇子上头的高个怪物，像是个变异的织者。<page>你此前察觉到的应该就是它。是它用声音和利爪操控缠绕镇子的丝线，很难对付。<page>织者？那群老毒物！还以为早死绝了，只剩塔里的干尸。<hpage>这只还活着，但被折磨得不成样。<hpage>灵丝被钉在壳里，残忍的刑罚。<page>就算残了我也羡慕。织者的本事……能交手是幸运，能得胜更是荣耀。
translated_text: boshanka! The children are waving their needles. There is also a safe haven for this bell.<page>For a long time I have avoided this place with a strange feeling. Now that I have arrived, I have discovered that this place is free, and that the few remaining inhabitants also offer trade and welcome.<hpage>I killed a tall creature in the sky above the town, which I suspected was a loom, though it was twisted intentionally.<hpage>You may already be feeling it, but you are not. Even in the elderly, they show great strength. With her voice and claws, she helped and perhaps guided them to grasp clues about the ghosts of these lands.<page>wiver? These evil ones. We told the stories to the young men, but they had long since died, and we thought there were only corpses in the spire.<hpage>This one is still alive, but if it were a loom, it would have been badly damaged.<hpage>The silk of its own was tied and fixed deep in the shell. It was a cruel punishment I had never seen before.<page>Even if it is broken, my jealousy will remain. Weave a legendary skill. To challenge to battle is to be proud of winning.
secondary_translated_text: boshanka ! Les enfants agitent leurs aiguilles. Il y a aussi un refuge sûr pour cette cloche.<page>J'ai évité cet endroit depuis longtemps avec un sentiment étrange.
