Maintenant que je suis arrivé, j'ai découvert que cet endroit est libre, et que les quelques habitants restants offrent aussi du commerce et de l'accueil.<hpage>J'ai tué une grande créature dans le ciel au-dessus de la ville, que je soupçonnais être un métier à tisser, bien qu ' il ait été tordu intentionnellement.<hpage>Vous le ressentez peut - être déjà, mais vous ne l'êtes pas. Même chez les personnes âgées, elles montrent une grande force. Avec sa voix et ses griffes, elle les a aidés et peut - être les guidé pour saisir des indices sur les fantômes de ces terres.<page>Weaver ? Ces méchants. Nous racontâmes les histoires aux jeunes hommes, mais ils étaient morts depuis longtemps, et nous pensions qu ' il n'y avait que des cadavres dans la flèche.<hpage>Celui-ci est toujours vivant, mais s'il s'agissait d'un métier à tisser, il aurait été gravement endommagé.<hpage>La soie de sa propre était liée et fixée profondément dans la coquille. C'était un châtiment cruel que je n'avais jamais vu.<page>Même s'il est brisé, ma jalousie restera. Tisser une compétence légendaire. Défier la bataille, c'est être fier de gagner.

original_en_text: This outpost that the shambling pilgrim-bugs have built for themselves... Dondakku!<page>Where are the armaments? The watch-poles? Never have I seen such a poorly defended encampment!<hpage>The pilgrims here seem to have no mind for war, Shakra. I suspect most depart for the Citadel soon after their arrival.<page>Hmph. If they persist in their carelessness, they will find only death in these harsh lands.
original_zh_text: 朝圣虫建的这破营地……东达库！<page>防御工事呢？瞭望塔呢？没见过这么不设防的营地！<hpage>朝圣者们不懂争斗，估计刚到就奔着圣堡去了。<page>哼！继续这么马虎，迟早死在纺络的险地里。
translated_text: This unstable outpost was built by pilgrims. the east side!<page>where are the weapons? what about paul? I've never seen such a weak camp!<hpage>The pilgrims here seem to have no concept of war. I think most people will go to the castle as soon as they arrive.<page>If they are careless, they will only die in this barren land.
secondary_translated_text: Cet avant-poste instable a été construit par des pèlerins. Le côté est !<page>où sont les armes ? Et pour Paul ? Je n'ai jamais vu un camp aussi faible !<hpage>Les pèlerins ici ne semblent pas avoir de concept de guerre. Je pense que la plupart des gens vont au château dès leur arrivée.<page>S'ils sont négligents, ils ne mourront que dans cette terre stérile.

original_en_text: What’s this? The little spider climbs so high, here to stand aquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Neither you nor your land have proven my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧？小蜘蛛抖抖索索爬到圣堡脚下了。<hpage>苍白之子，你只是来废话的么？纺络没有虫能阻挡我，圣堡也不例外。<page>亲爱的，你怎么还傻乐呢？上面那位吹口气就能灭了你那点希望。<hpage>傻孩子，真以为我现在还看不出你主子的真身吗？<hpage>这地方的辉煌、虫民的虔诚、还有他们的诅咒……线索太明显了。<hpage>这个王国被超脱虫类的存在掌控，属于更高阶的存在。<hpage>但无论它多想要我的灵丝和躯壳，我都不会给。
translated_text: what is this? This little spider climbs very high and stands in a magnificent castle.<hpage>the pale boy, did you come back to laugh? You and your land have not made me an enemy. This sleeping castle is no different.<page>The spider, honey. why do you want to be so hard and optimistic? I don't think there's any power there. She can quickly dispel that hope.<hpage>Stupid child. do you think i will not see your king? is it that far away?<hpage>The splendor of the earth, the loyalty of the insects, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is bound by creatures beyond the Worm, one of the higher castes.<hpage>No matter what longing I have for my silk and shells, I can see that I have a great attachment to both.
secondary_translated_text: Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Cette petite araignée monte très haut et se tient dans un magnifique château.<hpage>Le garçon pâle, est-ce que tu reviens rire ? Vous et votre pays ne m'avez pas fait ennemi. Ce château endormi n'est pas différent.<page>L'araignée, ma chérie ! Pourquoi voulez-vous être si dur et si optimiste ? Je ne pense pas qu ' il y ait de pouvoir là - bas. Elle peut vite dissiper cet espoir.<hpage>Stupid enfant. Tu crois que je ne verrai pas ton roi ? Est-ce que c'est si loin ?<hpage>La splendeur de la terre, la loyauté des insectes, et la malédiction qui les atteint. Les signes sont clairs,<hpage>Votre royaume est lié par des créatures au-delà du Ver, l'une des castes supérieures.<hpage>Peu importe le désir que j'ai pour ma soie et mes coquilles, je peux voir que j'ai un grand attachement à les deux.

original_en_text: Aren’t those solemn judge-bugs nice? They do not speak or sing, but I sense great wisdom behind their gleaming gazes!<hpage>Beware them, little one. Wise or not, their judgements are often followed by violence. Many of your fellow pilgrims have fallen to them on these great steps.<page>Oh...? But even the fallen will sometimes stand again, and all pilgrimages will be completed, yes? That’s how I’ve heard it!
original_zh_text: 看那些肃穆的判官虫多亲切！虽然他们不言语也不歌唱，但眼中却闪着智慧！<hpage>要小心，小家伙。他们的判决常伴暴力，不知多少朝圣者倒在这些石阶上。<page>可是……倒下者终会再起，朝圣终将完成，不是吗？
translated_text: Are serious judges' bugs great? They did not speak, they did not sing, but they felt a great wisdom hidden behind their shining eyes.<hpage>Be careful, little people. Whether wise or not, their judgments are accompanied by violence. Many pilgrims fall down on this huge staircase.<page>oh, huh...? But the fallen also sometimes get up and the pilgrimage is complete, right? i heard that.
secondary_translated_text: Les bugs des juges sérieux sont-ils bons ? Ils ne parlaient pas, ils ne chantaient pas, mais ils ressentaient une grande sagesse cachée derrière leurs yeux brillants.<hpage>Faites attention, petits gens. Sage ou non, leurs jugements sont accompagnés de violence. Beaucoup de pèlerins tombent sur cet immense escalier.<page>Ah, hein ? Mais les tombés aussi se lèvent parfois et le pèlerinage est complet, n'est-ce pas ? J'ai entendu cela.

original_en_text: These twisting tunnels hide many worthy opponents, but many traps as well. Watch your footing closely.
original_zh_text: 这些弯道里藏着不少好对手，但陷阱也多。走路看着点。
translated_text: These twisted tunnels not only hide many precious enemies, but also many traps. Take a good look at the steps.
secondary_translated_text: Ces tunnels tordus cachent non seulement de nombreux ennemis précieux, mais aussi de nombreux pièges. Regardez bien les étapes.

original_en_text: As you requested, these pins will mark the travel stations within that hideous structure of steel and steam.
original_zh_text: 按你要求的，这些图钉能标记那些铁皮蒸汽管的站点。
translated_text: Upon request, these pins mark the station within a formidable steel and steam structure.
secondary_translated_text: Sur demande, ces broches marquent la station au sein d'une formidable structure en acier et vapeur.

original_en_text: <hpage>Head fast for Bellhart, Pill. These lands are not for travelling without a sharp blade in claw.<page>Aye! Yes! To Bellhart, and my brother, I shall fly quickly-quick. If you pass that way again, stop and give greeting!
original_zh_text: <hpage>回钟心镇吧，这地方没武器别乱跑。<page>这就回！我飞得可、可快了！你要是经过钟心镇记得和我打招呼！
translated_text: <hpage>Fast access to Berhard and Peel. These lands are not suitable for travel without claws.<page>yes! yes! yes! yes! I will fly very fast for Berhardt and the brothers. If you cross the street again, please stop and say hello.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Accès rapide à Berhard et Peel. Ces terres ne conviennent pas aux voyages sans griffes.<page>Oui ! Oui ! Oui ! Oui ! Je vais voler très vite pour Berhardt et les frères. Si vous traversez à nouveau la rue, s'il vous plaît arrêtez-vous et dites bonjour.

original_en_text: <hpage>Who are you calling for, Shakra? Your voice echoes through the caverns.<page>I came deeper into Pharloom in search of my mentor, the greatest of my tribe. I could not keep pace though, and her trail grew cold.<page>She will have travelled much farther by now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant I will reunite with her.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在喊谁？整个山洞都是你回声。<page>我来纺络深处寻找导师，我们部落的最强者。可惜跟丢了。<page>她肯定走得更远了，但只要保持警惕总能重逢。
translated_text: <hpage>sakra, who are you calling? Your voice echoes through the caves.<page>I went into the Faro in search of my teacher, the greatest of my tribe. But I couldn't keep track, and her footsteps grew cold.<page>She's gone even further now, but if I go forward and be vigilant, I'll see her again.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>C'est - à - dire, qui appelle-t - il ? Sa voix résonne à travers les grottes.<page>Je suis allé dans le Faro à la recherche de mon professeur, le plus grand de ma tribu. Mais je n'arrivais pas à suivre, et ses pas se refroidissaient.<page>Elle est allée encore plus loin maintenant, mais si je vais de l'avant et que je suis vigilant, je la reverrai.

original_en_text: We must never let our shells soften, or Pharloom’s sharp teeth will sink in quick.<page>Would you duel with me, Hornet Wielding Needle? Together we shall sharpen one another’s skill.
original_zh_text: 战士不能养尊处优，纺络到处藏着危险。<page>来切磋吧？我们互相磨练技艺。
translated_text: Do not let the shell soften. Otherwise, the sharp teeth of the falcon will soon get in.<page>marcel needle, will you fight me? They work together to improve each other's skills.
secondary_translated_text: Ne laissez pas la coquille adoucir. Sinon, les dents pointues du faucon vont bientôt entrer.<page>Marcel Needle, tu veux me battre ? Ils travaillent ensemble pour améliorer les compétences de l'autre.

original_en_text: I’ll wish you success in your grand task, miss, but forgive me my sadness for knowing the cruel cost...
original_zh_text: 我希望你能成功，女士。但一想到代价这么沉重，还是很难过。
translated_text: Miss, I hope you will fulfill your great mission, but please forgive my sorrow. " Because I know the cruel price. "
secondary_translated_text: J'espère que vous accomplisserez votre grande mission, mais s'il vous plaît, pardonnez-moi ma douleur.« Parce que je connais le prix cruel. "

original_en_text: Hurry it up, let us out quickly then! We got places to go, bugs to see, trinkets to pilfer!
original_zh_text: 快点放人！我们还要去捞宝贝呢！
translated_text: Come on, get out! There are places to go, bugs to see, accessories to steal!
secondary_translated_text: Allez, sortez ! Il y a des endroits à visiter, des bugs à voir, des accessoires à voler !

original_en_text: Warrior... I heard your approach. Why do you come? Surely you’ve no desire to see these long collapsed caves?<hpage>The way was open, sir. I merely followed the path through. Am I correct to guess you were once a resident of these borderlands?<page>Aye... and glorious they were, in their time. Pharloom’s end approaches, but my caves, these caves, fell to fate long before. <page>Of that fair land, I am the last... Now to remain till the end, and remember the splendour that was...
original_zh_text: 战士……我听见你的脚步了。来这废墟做什么？<hpage>道路通畅，我只是顺路而来。你曾是边境之民？<page>曾是……昔日辉煌……不复存在。如今纺络快完了，但我的家园……早就覆灭了。<page>我是故土最后的遗民……要守到末日，铭记曾经的荣光……
translated_text: The soldiers. I could hear him approaching. why did you come here? you don't want to see this long hole, do you?<hpage>The road is open. I'm just going down this path. Were you a resident of the border area?<page>Certainly, they are great in their time. The end of the fal is approaching, but my caves, these caves have long fallen into the hands of fate.<page>In this beautiful land, I am the last one. We have to work hard to the end and forget the glory.
secondary_translated_text: Les soldats. Je pouvais l'entendre s'approcher. Pourquoi es-tu venu ici ? Vous ne voulez pas voir ce long trou, n'est-ce pas ?<hpage>Le chemin est ouvert. Je viens de descendre ce chemin. Êtes-vous un résident de la région frontalière ?<page>Certes, ils sont grands dans leur temps. La fin du fal approche, mais mes grottes, ces grottes sont tombées depuis longtemps entre les mains du destin.<page>Dans cette belle terre, je suis le dernier. Nous devons travailler dur jusqu'à la fin et oublier la gloire.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up, you have hunted long with little rest, thinks Nuu.<page>Perhaps you are covered in too many juices, weighed down by beastly filth? Let sweet Nuu clean you, make you fresh!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐，你一直狩猎，好久没休息了吧？<page>是不是浑身都沾满了黏液和血液？让努努帮你清洁吧！
translated_text: Your Excellency, Miss, you have been hunting for a long time, and you can hardly rest. think about it.<page>Are you a beast covered in too much juice and mud? Sweet Noo will clean you up and refresh you!
secondary_translated_text: Votre Excellence, mademoiselle, vous chassez depuis longtemps, et vous ne pouvez guère vous reposer. Pensez-y.<page>Êtes-vous une bête couverte de trop de jus et de boue ? Sweet Noo vous nettoiera et vous rafraîchira !

original_zh_text: 有意思！我开始喜欢你了！
translated_text: Delicious! I already like it!
secondary_translated_text: Délicieux ! Je l'aime déjà !

original_en_text: <page=M>We could do it. The spell can be cast, with enough power, enormous power, equal maybe to that monarch...<hpage>I cannot grant you mine, if it even were enough. My strength is still needed to face her below. Where else do you propose we seek a source?<page=M>From Pharloom! Ho ho ho! Remember, ours is a kingdom of wishes granted.<page=B>Pharloom was not born of that monarch, Old One. Power existed in these lands even before she bound them beneath her.<page=B>Grnk. Seek the old hearts of our kingdom and the last successors to bear their strength.<page=M>They’re still out there, hidden away, much faded by the pale one’s long dominion. You must make them stir.<page=M>We will teach you how, in the way befitting a Weaver, a sombre song to reach down into their memories and enliven them a final time.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们或许能够施咒，但要有足够力量，堪比那君主的力量。<hpage>我给不了这份力，即便有也要留着对付她。还能从哪里获取？<page=M>纺络！嚯嚯！别忘了，我们的王国最擅长实现愿望。<page=B>纺络并非君主创造，古老者。在她到来之前，这片土地就存在着力量。<page=B>您该去寻找古老的纺络之心，与其最后的传承者。<page=M>虽然几乎被苍白统治消磨殆尽，他们仍在某处苟存。必须唤醒他们。<page=M>我们会教你织者的方法。用挽歌深入他们的记忆，激醒他们的力量。
translated_text: <page=M>This spell we can do is workable and strong enough. is he equivalent to that monarch?<hpage>That alone, I will not give you mine. You need strength to face her. where else do you think we can find informants?<page=M>"Pharlooom! Oh, ho! Our kingdom is a kingdom where wishes come true.<page=B>The foul was not born of that monarch. The power had existed before she had tied these lands under her.<page=B>Granger. Find the elders and ultimate heirs of our kingdom and take over their power.<page=M>They were still there, hidden, and faded by the long rule of the pale ones. You have to stir it up.<page=M>We'll teach you how to get active at the end with a melancholy song that suits your weaver.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Ce sort que nous pouvons faire est faisable et assez fort. Est-ce qu ' il est équivalent à ce monarque ?<hpage>Pour cela seul, je ne vous donnerai pas la mienne. Vous avez besoin de force pour l'affronter, où d'autre pensez-vous que nous pourrons trouver des informateurs ?<page=M>« Pharlooom ! Oh, ho ! Notre royaume est un royaume où les vœux se réalisent.<page=B>La faute n'est pas née de ce monarque. Le pouvoir avait existé avant qu ' elle n'ait lié ces terres sous elle.<page=B>Granger ! Trouvez les anciens et les héritiers ultimes de notre royaume et prenez le pouvoir.<page=M>Ils étaient toujours là, cachés et fanés par le long règne des pâles. Vous devez le remuer.<page=M>Nous vous apprendrons à vous activer à la fin avec une chanson mélancolique qui convient à votre tisser.

original_en_text: Owoww, what a rotten turn! Keep your nasty junk to yourself, then!
original_zh_text: 哎哟！真倒霉！你就自个儿留着这些破烂货吧！
translated_text: Wow, what a horrible change! Leave your annoying junk to yourself!
secondary_translated_text: Wow, quel changement horrible ! Laissez vos ordures ennuyeuses pour vous-même !

original_en_text: O-hoho! Share some of your little clicky-clackies with us, help us fill our pockets. If you do, we’ll share a sneaky secret with you!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！分点叮当响给我们，就告诉你个秘密！
translated_text: Oh, ho! Share your songs to help you fill your pocket. If so, we'll share the secret with you!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ho ! Partagez vos chansons pour vous aider à remplir vos poches. Si c'est le cas, nous partagerons le secret avec vous !

original_en_text: Miss grown-up, for your continued huntings you should climb up, up above here, above the tallest spinning towers!<page>Hidden in the dark thickets are strange bugs who call up dancing flames. So pretty! So warm!<page>But when Nuu tried to crawl near, the flames became angry and swooped all around! Poor Nuu was half roasted!<page>Nuu leaves it to you, miss grown-up, to climb up there and cut those flames apart. For our journal, such must be done.
original_zh_text: 大姐姐，要继续狩猎的话，你得往上爬，越过最高的纺塔！<page> 暗蕨丛里藏着会召唤舞焰的怪虫。好漂亮！好暖和！<page> 可努努刚靠近，火焰就发怒冲了上来！差点把努努烤焦啦！<page> 这事就交给你啦，大姐姐，上去把那些火焰斩碎吧。为了填满记录册，必须这么做！
translated_text: Lord, to continue hunting, you should climb on top of the tallest revolving tower.<page>A strange insect lurks in the dark jungle, calling for a pulsating flame. It's so beautiful! It's so warm!<page>But when Noo tried to get closer, the flames were furious and leaped here and there. Nooooo<page>Miss Nu gave you the responsibility. Climbing to put out the fire. In our magazine, it is necessary.
secondary_translated_text: Seigneur, pour continuer à chasser, vous devriez monter au sommet de la plus haute tour tournante.<page>Un étrange insecte se cache dans la jungle sombre, appelant une flamme pulsante. C'est si beau ! C'est tellement chaud !<page>Mais quand Noo a essayé de s'approcher, les flammes étaient furieuses et ont sauté ici et là. Nooooooo<page>Mme Nu vous a confié la responsabilité. Monter pour éteindre le feu. Dans notre magazine, c'est nécessaire.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Child Wielding Needle, have you seen trace of my master nearby? I feel she was here only recently!<hpage>I cannot say for certain, Shakra, though if she travels seeking skilled opponents, these steps would serve her well. The warriors watching over them are formidable.<page>True! Impressive guardians they are, fighting defensively and loath to leave their stations. They swing their weapons with a cold brutality that should not be underestimated.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！见过我导师的踪迹吗？感觉她刚来过！<hpage>我不确定。但她若是想找高手过招，这台阶的守卫正合适。<page>没错！这些守卫死守岗位，出手狠辣，不能小瞧。
translated_text: boshanka! pinboy, do you see the master's footprints nearby? She seems to have recently arrived!<hpage>Shakra, I'm not sure, but if she's going to look for a skilled opponent, then these steps are good for her. The soldiers who guard them are strong.<page>Really!! They are impressive guardians, they fight defensively and do not want to leave the post. The ruthlessness and cruelty of their weapons cannot be underestimated.
secondary_translated_text: boshanka ! Pinboy, voyez-vous les empreintes de pas du maître à proximité ? On dirait qu ' elle est arrivée récemment !<hpage>Shakra, je ne suis pas sûr, mais si elle va chercher un adversaire habile, alors ces étapes sont bonnes pour elle.<page>Vraiment ! ! ! Ce sont des gardiens impressionnants, ils se battent défensivement et ne veulent pas quitter le poste. La cruauté et la cruauté de leurs armes ne peuvent être sous-estimées.

original_en_text: Poshanka, Hornet Wielding Needle. For that is your name, is it not? I have heard it spoken in this land with reverence.<page>I had hoped you would accept my summons. In these moments one is good, but two is best.<hpage>I would not deny the wish, Shakra. A sombre ceremony seemed likely at this trail’s end, and I am sadly proved correct. This then is your master?<page>The fiercest of my tribe, here she lies. I called her master, true, but she was mother just as much, more by far than the bug who bore me.<hpage>Among the many marvels of this kingdom, she found a fine place to meet her end.<page>Ended by age... My tribe would call that shame, but I see only strength unbeaten.<page>Even as her shell betrayed her, she walked this kingdom’s breadth. It was her trail followed that allowed me to share witness to its dignity.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, you too have journeyed these many paths, as my master before us. Join me now for her song-sending.<page>It is time for her soul to walk beyond her shell...
original_zh_text: 你来啦，使针的小姑娘！你叫大黄蜂，对吧？最近可名气不小呢。<page>希望你别推辞我的请求，现在的情况，需要你搭把手，我自己一个不够。<hpage>我不会推辞的，沙克拉。看这情景，要是我没猜错……这是你的导师吧？<page>这里躺着的是我们部落的最强者。我叫她导师，但她其实更像我母亲。<hpage>她挑了个好地方长眠呢……<page>她是老死的……部落会觉得这很丢脸吧，但我只看到不败的强者。<page>拖着老旧的甲壳丈量大地，是跟着她的足迹我才能见证许多。<page>使针的小姑娘，你也走过这些路。陪我给她唱首送魂曲吧。<page>该送她的灵魂离壳了……
translated_text: Pochanka, the hornet waved its needle. that's your name, isn't it? I heard it in this country and I said it with respect.<page>I hope you receive my subpoena. At this point, one is good, but two are best.<hpage>I will not refuse that wish, Shakala. There seemed to be a gloomy ceremony at the end of the road, but unfortunately I found out I was right. is this your master?<page>She is the most ferocious man in my tribe, and she lies here. I call her Master, but she's also a mother, and she's far better than my worm.<hpage>Among the many miracles of the Kingdom, she found a good place to end her life.<page>It ends with age. My tribe will call it shame, but I see only invincible power. "<page>Her body betrayed her, but she traveled the kingdom. Her footsteps made me testify to her dignity. "<page>Bumblebee waved the needle, and as the master before us, you have been here a lot. Send me this song right now.<page>The time has come for her soul to leave her body....
secondary_translated_text: Pochanka, la hornet agita son aiguille. C'est ton nom, n'est pas ? Je l'ai entendu dans ce pays et je l'ai dit avec respect.<page>J'espère que vous recevrez ma citation.À ce stade, un est bon, mais deux sont meilleurs.<hpage>Je ne refuserai pas ce vœu, Shakala. Il semblait y avoir une cérémonie sombre au bout de la route, mais malheureusement j'ai découvert que j'avais raison. Est-ce ton maître ?<page>Elle est l'homme le plus féroce de ma tribu, et elle est là. Je l'appelle Maître, mais elle est aussi une mère, et elle est bien meilleure que mon ver.<hpage>Parmi les nombreux miracles du Royaume, elle a trouvé un bon endroit pour mettre fin à sa vie.<page>Elle se termine par l'âge. Ma tribu l'appellera honte, mais je ne vois que la puissance invincible. "<page>Son corps la trahit, mais elle voyagea dans le royaume. Ses pas m'ont fait témoigner de sa dignité. "<page>Bumblebee agita l'aiguille, et en tant que maître avant nous, vous avez été ici beaucoup. Envoyez-moi cette chanson maintenant !<page>Le temps est venu pour son âme de quitter son corps.

original_en_text: From this safe vantage, I can keep watch for threats while I work. These lowlands are brittle and dangerous. Keep your weapon close.
original_zh_text: 这位置安全，能边干活边警戒。低处危险易碎，注意武器别离手。
translated_text: From a security perspective, you can recognize threats in the workplace. The lowlands are fragile and dangerous. Keep your weapons nearby.
secondary_translated_text: Du point de vue de la sécurité, vous pouvez reconnaître les menaces sur le lieu de travail. Les basses terres sont fragiles et dangereuses. Gardez vos armes à proximité !

original_en_text: Have you tried your claw at the games? Rollicking good fun, don’t you think?<page>I wonder if I could score a little higher if I tried again...
original_zh_text: 你玩过游戏没？超有意思！<page>不知道我再试几次能不能刷新记录……
translated_text: Did you try your fingernails during the game? don't you think that's funny?<page>If I try it again, I think my score will be higher.
secondary_translated_text: Avez-vous essayé vos ongles pendant le jeu ? Tu ne trouves pas que c'est drôle ?<page>Si je réessaye, je pense que mon score sera plus élevé.

original_en_text: After all... it’s you that she wants... is it not?
original_zh_text: 毕竟……她要的是你……不是吗？
translated_text: In the end,... She wants you. yeah, right?
secondary_translated_text: En fin de compte, ... Elle te veut. Oui, non ?

original_en_text: Hoi! Magnificent! May our mighty contest of shells commence.<page>But a final note, nimble bug! If ever you run off course or desire a quick convene, simply play what music you’re able and my companion shall whisk you back to our starting line.<page>Now! The track calls us. Allow me a moment to assemble a course worthy to test our skill.<page>
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！太棒了！史诗对决即将开始！<page>最后提醒一下，要是跑岔道了或想集合，就随便来点音乐，我的跟班会带你回起点。<page>好了，等我布置条配得上咱们实力的赛道就开始！
translated_text: Hey! Great stuff! May the great shell race begin.<page>And finally, the speed of mistakes! If you want to get off track or set up quickly, just play the music you can play and my buddies will get you back to the starting line.<page>now! The song is calling. Let us take some time to organize a worthwhile course that will test our skills.<page>
secondary_translated_text: Hey ! Excellent truc ! Que commence la grande course des coquillages.<page>Enfin, la vitesse des erreurs ! Si vous voulez vous déraciner ou vous installer rapidement, il suffit de jouer la musique que vous pouvez jouer et mes amis vous rameneront à la ligne de départ.<page>Maintenant ! La chanson appelle. Prenons un peu de temps pour organiser un cours utile qui mettra à l'épreuve nos compétences.<page>

original_en_text: <hpage>Hold your gratitude, little one. The dead are stirring.
translated_text: <hpage>Throw away gratitude, little man, the dead are boiling.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Jetez la gratitude, petit homme, les morts bouillonnent.

original_en_text: <hpage>It is time, shamans. I have the hearts, enough as requested. Enough to build your spell, yes?<page=B>Aye. We’re ready. Still, it’s a sad set you’re holding there, strength such as few shall ever know... and all about to burn for Pharloom’s saving.<page=S>I’ll warn ya, Old One, this first part might not be pleasant, but we’ll get you in there, deep as needed.<page=M>Now you’ve only to ready yourself for what comes after. Lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: <hpage>时候到了，萨满们。三颗心已集齐，够施咒了吧？<page=B>足够了。唉，这几颗残心曾经承载何等伟力……如今却要为了救世燃尽。<page=S>我得提醒你，古老者。这法咒一开始可能不太舒服，但一定能把您送进记忆深处。<page=M>接下来就看你造化了。做好准备，躺在祭坛上，就可以开始了。
translated_text: <hpage>It's time, Shaman. I have that intention, and I am sufficient upon request. That's enough to cast a spell, right?<page=B>Yes, we are ready, but what you have is a sad scene. It is a power that very few people know about. For the redemption of the foul, everything is about to burn out.<page=S>The first part may be uncomfortable, but please let them participate if necessary.<page=M>We need to be prepared for what happens next. I sat on stage and started.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Il est temps, chaman. J'ai cette intention, et je suis suffisant sur demande. Cela suffit pour lancer un sort, non ?<page=B>Oui, nous sommes prêts, mais ce que vous avez, c'est une scène triste. C'est un pouvoir que très peu de gens connaissent. Pour la rédemption de la faute, tout est sur le point de brûler.<page=S>La première partie peut être inconfortable, mais s'il vous plaît laissez-les participer si nécessaire.<page=M>Nous devons être préparés à ce qui se passe ensuite. Je me suis assis sur scène et j'ai commencé.

original_en_text: Charting the heights of this great mount would prove a mighty challenge. For now, I have seen only its base.<page>Once I have completed the search for my master, I would like to return and attempt the climb in full.
original_zh_text: 测绘这大山是个不小的挑战。现在我只探了山脚。<page>等找到导师，一定要回来爬个痛快。
translated_text: Mapping the height of a mountain is a big challenge. For now, I can only see the base.<page>When the search for owners is over, I want to come back and do a full-fledged climb.
secondary_translated_text: La cartographie de la hauteur d'une montagne est un défi. Pour l'instant, je ne peux voir que la base.<page>Quand la recherche de propriétaires est terminée, je veux revenir et faire une escalade à part entière.

original_en_text: Worm-ridden caverns, shaking and unstable. There remain faint signs that pilgrims once travelled these tight paths.
original_zh_text: 被蠕虫所蛀的摇晃洞穴。隐约能看出朝圣者曾走过这窄路。
translated_text: The insect-infested cave is shaking. There is a faint trace of pilgrims walking this narrow path.
secondary_translated_text: La grotte infestée d'insectes tremble. Il y a une faible trace de pèlerins marchant sur ce sentier étroit.

original_en_text: Hooof... let us stop the duel there.<page>I... hoof... I hope in my excitement I did not... hoof... bring down my lance too heavy upon you, sister.<hpage>It was combat honourably conducted, sirs. But now, we should all of us keep moving. It will not remain quiet here for long.<page>Y-yes, of course. Our good works are never done, and we must press ever on. There is no time to waste!
original_zh_text: 呼……点到为止。<page>我……呼……希望我没……呼……下手太重。<hpage>二位打得很好，但此地不宜久留，我们该上路了。<page>对、对，正事要紧，不能浪费时间，该走了！
translated_text: Calling. Let's stop the duel there.<page>I'm not... Feels. I don't want you to get excited. Feeling. Sister, it's too heavy to lift my spear over you.<hpage>Gentlemen, this is a battle of glory. But now we need to look ahead. This place is not long quiet.<page>Of course, our good deeds will never end, so we must continue to do so. No time to waste!
secondary_translated_text: appelant. Arrêtons le duel là.<page>Je ne suis pas... Feels. Je ne veux pas que vous soyez excité. Feeling. Sœur, c'est trop lourd pour lever ma lance sur toi.<hpage>Messieurs, c'est une bataille de gloire. Mais maintenant, nous devons regarder à l'avenir. Cet endroit n'est pas longtemps calme.<page>Bien sûr, nos bonnes actions ne s'arrêteront jamais, nous devons donc continuer à le faire. Pas de temps à perdre !

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! Simply step to the challenge. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 别灰心，输一次不算什么！振作起来再战！
translated_text: Don't be defeated by failure, agile bugs! Face the challenge. Let's fly together again!
secondary_translated_text: Ne vous laissez pas vaincre par l'échec, bugs agiles ! Face au défi. Volons à nouveau ensemble !

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause saw you first ascend to this Citadel, Garmond?<page>Mine is only the most sacred quest, sister! One shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We sought this Citadel, to stand before its rulers, and demand their answer! By force if necessary! All for our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk.... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你们最初来圣堡要做什么？<page>我和扎扎肩负着神圣使命！<page>我们要为了村子，向圣堡的君主讨个公道！<page>该死的丝咒毁了村子，就剩下我们俩……带着大伙的记忆。无论如何我们都要找到答案！
translated_text: <hpage>why did you climb this castle for the first time?<page>Sister, my pursuit is the most sacred pursuit! One of them I shared with my most trusted companion, my dear Zaza.<page>We look for the castle, we stand before its ruler, and we ask for answers. Use force if necessary! Everything is for our beloved village. We promise you a shell.<page>The terrible troubles of the yarn yarn, it has conquered our beautiful people - we want to leave behind the people, their memory, and see some justice done.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pourquoi avez-vous escaladé ce château pour la première fois ?<page>Sœur, ma quête est la quête la plus sacrée ! J'en ai partagé un avec ma compagne la plus fidèle, ma chère Zaza.<page>Nous cherchons le château, nous nous tenons devant son souverain, et nous demandons des réponses. Utilisez la force si nécessaire ! Tout pour notre village bien-aimé. Nous vous promettons un shell.<page>Les terribles troubles du fil de fil, il a conquis notre beau peuple - nous voulons laisser derrière nous le peuple, sa mémoire, et voir un peu de justice faite.

original_en_text: Ahh, a fellow pilgrim. I’ve been praying alone here too long, with only the wind’s voice to join mine.<page>We’re so close. Our pilgrimage is almost over. Just one final, brutal climb, hm?<hpage>The Citadel is near, pilgrim. You must have had some strength in you. Few of your fellows seem to reach these heights.<page>Aye, the roads become lonelier the longer they’re travelled and the higher we climb.<page>It takes a lot of luck and a lot of faith to make it this far, though I’m sure I don’t need to tell you that.
original_zh_text: 啊，又一个朝圣者。我在这独自祈祷太久了，只有风声作伴。<page>快到终点了。朝圣之旅即将结束，只剩最后这段险途了对吧？<hpage>圣堡就在眼前。你本事不错，能走到这的朝圣者没几个。<page>是啊，这路越走越长，越往上爬同伴越少。<page>走到这需要运气和信念，不过你肯定懂。
translated_text: "My fellow pilgrims, I prayed here alone for a long time, but only the sound of the wind joined my voice.<page>We're already very close. The pilgrimage journey is nearing its end. This is the last mountain climb, isn't it?<hpage>There are pilgrims nearby. There should be strength. It seems that few of your peers can reach this level.<page>Yes, the longer the road, the higher you climb, the more lonely the road becomes.<page>It takes a lot of luck and a lot of confidence to come here, but I don't think I need to say.
secondary_translated_text: « Mes compagnons pèlerins, j'ai prié ici seul pendant longtemps, mais seul le bruit du vent s'est joint à ma voix.<page>On est déjà très proches. Le pèlerinage approche de sa fin. C'est la dernière escalade, non ?<hpage>Il y a des pèlerins à proximité. Il faut qu 'il y ait de la force Il semble que peu de vos pairs puissent atteindre ce niveau.<page>Oui, plus la route est longue, plus vous grimpez plus haut, plus la route devient solitaire.<page>Il faut beaucoup de chance et beaucoup de confiance pour venir ici, mais je ne pense pas avoir besoin de le dire.

original_en_text: Huu... You have done it... Huu. Huu... Hoof.<page>Never would I have believed, a shell so fast in all of Pharloom! Wonder of wonders!<page>You have proven it, nimble bug, fulfilled my wish, seen my pace matched and beaten, my limits broken wide.
original_zh_text: 呼……你赢了……呼……呼……<page>难以置信！纺络还存在这般疾速！简直是奇迹！<page>你做到了！实现了我的夙愿，突破了我的极限！
translated_text: Calling. You did it. Calling. Calling. Feeling.<page>I never thought that a Fulham bullet could be so fast! A miracle of miracles!<page>You've proved it, shrewd bug, you've seen my wishes come true, my footprints match again, and my limits break.
secondary_translated_text: appelant. Vous l'avez fait, appelant. appelant. Feeling.<page>Je n'aurais jamais pensé qu ' une balle de Fulham pouvait être aussi rapide ! Un miracle de miracles !<page>Tu l'as prouvé, insecte astute, tu as vu mes souhaits se réaliser, mes empreintes correspondent à nouveau, et mes limites sont brisées.

original_en_text: Gurro! I have a notion for you, sister. What say we cross our weapons here before we move on? Engage in some rollicking combat together? Have no fear, I will not strike a mortal blow!
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！我有个提议，走之前要不要切磋切磋，来场友谊赛热热身？别担心，保证不打死你！
translated_text: GORAM! I have an idea for you, sister. why don't we join hands and move forward here? Shall we have a fun fight together? Fear not, I will not give you a fatal blow!
secondary_translated_text: Goram ! J'ai une idée pour toi, ma soeur. Pourquoi ne pas nous joindre les mains et aller de l'avant ? On va se battre ensemble ? Ne craignez pas, je ne vous donnerai pas un coup mortel !

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir knight, I am sorry... This was the only means to free you from the cursed threads.<page>Hohhhh... fret not.... little one...<page>Be proud... you’ve grown so strong!<page>Zaza... let us just rest a little... and then we’ll be away...
original_zh_text: <hpage>骑士先生，对不起……只有这样才能斩断你身上的黑丝诅咒……<hpage>咳……别难过……小姑娘……<page>你很强大……应该骄傲……<page>扎扎……可以休息了……
translated_text: <hpage>Lord Knight, I'm sorry, this is the only way to free you from the cursed thread.<page>ah... Don't worry about that little man.<page>Take pride. You have become so strong!<page>Zaza. Let's get some rest and go.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Lord Chevalier, je suis désolé, c'est le seul moyen de vous libérer du fil maudit.<page>Ah, oui. Ne vous inquiétez pas pour ce petit homme.<page>Prenez la fierté. Tu es devenue si forte !<page>Zaza. Faisons un peu de repos et partons.

original_en_text: Nuu’s wish, it is granted. But miss grown-up will continue cutting creatures and adding them to our journal, of course?<hpage>I will. Knowing a creature’s form and habits is an advantage that can decide the outcome of a battle. Recording these details is worth the effort.<page>Oh yes! Is very much worth it! Nuu hopes you will share your new learnings with her often!<page>And take a gift to help with your huntings, miss grown-up! Nuu will add a pocket to your tool pouch, for the bringing of many tools on your hunts!<page>
original_zh_text: 努努的愿望达成了，但大姐姐会继续砍怪记录对吧？<hpage>会的。了解生物习性对战斗有帮助，值得记录。<page>超值得！要经常和努努分享新发现哦！<page>送你个狩猎礼物！给你的工具包加个口袋，多装点装备！
translated_text: Noah's wish was granted. But will women keep cutting off creatures and adding them to their diaries?<hpage>We know that knowing the shapes and habits of living things is an advantage that determines the outcome of a battle. These details are worthy of the record.<page>Oh, yes! Very worth it! Share your new knowledge with her frequently!<page>We'll bring you a gift to help you hunt! The Neta adds pockets to your kit so you can carry many tools while hunting!<page>
secondary_translated_text: Le vœu de Noé fut exaucé. Mais les femmes continueront-elles à couper des créatures et à les ajouter à leurs journaux ?<hpage>Nous savons que connaître les formes et les habitudes des êtres vivants est un avantage qui détermine l'issue d'une bataille. Ces détails sont dignes du record.<page>Oh oui ! Très digne ! Partagez souvent vos nouvelles connaissances avec elle !<page>Nous vous apporterons un cadeau pour vous aider à la chasse ! Le Neta ajoute des poches à votre kit afin que vous puissiez transporter de nombreux outils pendant la chasse !<page>

original_en_text: Just a piece of a mask, innit? Don’t ask us where the other bits are... you’ll have to sniff ‘em out for yourself!
original_zh_text: 只是一块面甲碎片。不知道剩下的在哪……自己找去！
translated_text: It's just a mask, right? Don't ask anyone else where they are, sniff it out for yourself!
secondary_translated_text: C'est juste un masque, n'est pas ? Ne demandez pas à personne d'autre où ils sont, sentez-le vous-même !

translated_text: Map of Faye Mountain.
secondary_translated_text: Carte du mont Faye.

original_en_text: <hpage>Nuu, I have completed your request, recording many creatures of Pharloom in the journal.<page>Oooh, ooh! Ma ma ma! Look here at the marvelous beasts and bugs, all listed so beautifully!<page>Miss grown-up, so many creatures now you have cut and beat and smashed! Their essences linger on you, their scents mixing with your own!<page>Oooh, ma... Nuu simply must sample it for herself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>努努，你要的生态记录完成了。<page>哇！快看这些奇虫异兽，记录得好详细！<page>大姐姐砍了好多生物！它们的精华都沾在你身上，味道混在一起了！<page>啧啧……努努好想尝一口！
translated_text: <hpage>No, I have fulfilled your request and recorded many creatures in the fal in my diary.<page>oh! oh! Mommy! Mommy! Look at these monsters and insects!<page>Adults and women alike, you have now cut down many creatures and killed many. Their essence haunts you, and their scent mixes with your own!<page>Oh, Mama. Nooo, you should try it yourself!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Non, j'ai répondu à votre demande et j'ai enregistré de nombreuses créatures dans le fal dans mon journal.<page>Ooh ! Ooh ! Maman ! maman ! Regardez ces monstres et les insectes !<page>Adultes et femmes, vous avez maintenant abattu de nombreuses créatures et tué beaucoup. Leur essence vous hante, et leur odeur se mélange avec la vôtre !<page>Oh, maman. Nooooo, tu devrais essayer toi-même !

original_en_text: You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
original_zh_text: 你先前进吧，我和扎扎在这守着一会，看看有没有漏网之虫。
translated_text: Come on, Zaza and I will keep watch here and arrest whoever is behind.
secondary_translated_text: Allez, Zaza et moi allons garder la garde ici et arrêter quiconque est derrière.

original_en_text: Nuu understands, ma. To sup on such a fierce predator’s juices would be divine... but is not right to do. Such behaviour is unfriendly.<page>Nuu’s wish to see many fine beasts, though... miss grown-up, you have surely granted it! All of Nuu’s thanks goes to you!
original_zh_text: 对不起嘛……虽然掠食者的汁液很诱人……但这样不礼貌。<page>不过见识了这么多神奇生物……太感谢大姐姐了！
translated_text: I don't know, Mom. It's best to enjoy the juice of such a fierce predator. But it is wrong. " This behavior is not friendly.<page>I'd like to see a lot of good beasts, but Master, Miss, you'll agree! Thanks for what Nu did for me!
secondary_translated_text: Je ne sais pas, Maman. Il vaut mieux profiter du jus d'un prédateur aussi féroce. Mais c'est faux.« Ce comportement n'est pas amical.<page>J'aimerais voir beaucoup de belles bêtes, mais Maître, Mademoiselle, vous serez d'accord ! Merci pour ce que Nu a fait pour moi !

original_en_text: I will soon leave these crumbling roads, but if you stop by the settlement below we may meet again. I pass there often to trade with the pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 我马上要离开这段破路了，但我常去下面的聚落交易，或许还会碰面。
translated_text: I will leave these unstable roads at once, but if you stop at the settlement below, we may meet again. I went through well with the dealings with the pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: Je vais quitter ces routes instables tout de suite, mais si vous vous arrêtez à la colonie ci-dessous, nous pouvons nous rencontrer à nouveau. J'ai bien travaillé avec les pèlerins.

original_en_text: Here, the trail of the stag touched pale... We hunted her, felled her, as none before were able...<page>Proof it became, of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 这里留有苍白苜鹿的痕迹……我们猎杀了无虫能及的传说……<page>这是王权之证……神授之印……
translated_text: Here, the traces of the deer have turned pale. We will chase her and cut her down. Because no one has ever been able to do so.<page>That is our dignity. " Symbol of sacred right.
secondary_translated_text: Ici, les traces du cerf sont devenues pâles. Nous allons la chasser et la couper. Parce que personne n'a jamais été capable de le faire.<page>C'est notre dignité.« Symbole du droit sacré.

original_en_text: Beautiful this, a glowy little piece of somethin’. Stinks of them horrid crawling whisperers a bit, so might be dangerous. You should take it! Give us your rosaries and lighten my claws of it!
original_zh_text: 亮晶晶的，漂亮的很！就是带着点难闻的织者味儿。危险货，快买走！
translated_text: It's so beautiful, it's a shining little thing. They smell a creeping whisper a little terrifying, so they are dangerous. You should accept it! Give us your rosary and light my nails! "
secondary_translated_text: C'est si beau, c'est une petite chose brillante. Ils sentent un murmure rampant un peu terrifiant, donc ils sont dangereux. Vous devriez l'accepter ! Donnez-nous votre chapelet et allumez mes ongles ! "

original_en_text: Ho, sister! A grand victory achieved, again. The haunted might of this place cannot stand against our pure hearts!
original_zh_text: 哈！又赢一场！圣堡的空壳子挡不住我们的正义之心！
translated_text: Oh, my sister! Another big victory. The ghost power of this place cannot stop our pure hearts!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ma sœur ! Une autre grande victoire. Le pouvoir fantôme de cet endroit ne peut pas arrêter nos cœurs purs !

original_en_text: <page=M>This task before you... This is mortal power you would claim, the hearts of bugs. It will cost their last strength to save this land.<page=M>Even we have some hesitation in this. Despite our desire to touch their power, we’d never wished to see it expended so utterly.<hpage>Better to leave your land weak in wonder, if it means your shells, and those of your fellows, stay intact.
original_zh_text: <page=M>您需要明白……这方法需要夺取凡虫之心，也会耗尽它们最后一丝力气。<page=M>即便是我们也心有不忍。虽然渴望见识这份力量，但并不希望看到它燃尽。<hpage>让这片土地虚弱而存，总好过让虫族壳裂身死。
translated_text: <page=M>The task before you. This is what is called human power, the mind of the insect. It takes one last force to save the land.<page=M>Even if you hesitate. We want to touch their power, but we don't want to see it completely depleted, "he said.<hpage>It's better to make your land vulnerable because it means you and your companion's shells are intact.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>La tâche devant vous. C'est ce qu ' on appelle la puissance humaine, l'esprit de l'insecte. Il faut une dernière force pour sauver le pays.<page=M>Même si tu hésites. Nous voulons toucher à leur pouvoir, mais nous ne voulons pas la voir complètement épuisée », a-t - il déclaré.<hpage>Il est préférable de rendre votre terre vulnérable parce que cela signifie que vous et les coquilles de votre compagnon sont intacts.

original_en_text: Gurrrooooo! Gallantly answered, sister! Prepare your weapon!
translated_text: GORAM! Answer bravely, sister! Prepare your weapons!
secondary_translated_text: Goram ! Répondez courageusement, ma soeur ! Préparez vos armes !

original_en_text: Uaahhhhh! Miss grown-up... your journal is bursting with every sort of creature! Overflowing! Surely, we can call this complete!<page>To think, that such a task could even be done! So clever is Nuu, to have set such a fierce predator onto the work!<hpage>These vast lands hold so much life, and to catalogue it all has taught me greatly. It is an effort worth continuing even after I leave this kingdom.<page>Ooh ma, such a hunger is worthy indeed! You and I are of accord, miss grown-up, hunters both. Our methods are different but our appetites have become very similar!<page>Nuu has for you this token, a symbol of all your efforts, and a marker of your true nature. It carries with it her sweet, sweet smell!
original_zh_text: 啊啊啊！记录册要满出来了！绝对算完成了吧！<page>没想到真能做完！努努真聪明，找对帮手了！<hpage>这片大地生机勃勃，记录它们让我受益匪浅。以后我会保留这个习惯。<page>哇！这才是真正的饥渴！大姐姐和我都是合格的猎手！方法不同但胃口一样大！<page>送你一个象征努力的标记，沾着努努的体香哦！
translated_text: ah! ah! Your Excellency, your diary is full of biological leaks! You can call it complete!<page>If you think about it, I can do this job! Nu's smart enough to work such a ferocious predator!<hpage>This vast land was inhabited by a lot of life, and it was very beneficial to catalog them. Even if you leave the kingdom, it is worth continuing on.<page>Hungry is worth it! You and I are the same adult women, and we are both hunters. The method is different, but the appetite is very similar.<page>"We have prepared this token to symbolize your efforts and your nature. It's her sweet!
secondary_translated_text: Ah ! Ah ! Votre Excellence, votre journal est plein de fuites biologiques ! On peut l'appeler complète !<page>Si vous y réfléchissez, je peux faire ce travail ! Nous sommes assez intelligents pour travailler avec un prédateur aussi féroce !<hpage>Cette vaste terre était habitée par beaucoup de vie, et il était très bénéfique de les cataloguer. Même si vous quittez le royaume, il vaut la peine de continuer.<page>La faim en vaut la peine ! Vous et moi sommes les mêmes femmes adultes, et nous sommes tous les deux des chasseurs. La méthode est différente, mais l'appétit est très similaire.<page>« Nous avons préparé ce symbole pour symboliser vos efforts et votre nature. C'est sa douceur !

original_en_text: All bowed before we princes green...
translated_text: and all of you bow down to our green prince
secondary_translated_text: et vous tous vous prosternerez devant notre prince vert

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause sees you travelling these blighted lands, Garmond? Do you also seek the Citadel above?<page>Aye! But do not mistake a valorous adventurer for a mere pilgrim. Mine is a sacred quest, shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We seek that Citadel not for its gifts. Nay, sister! We seek its rulers, to demand their answer! By force if necessary! For our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你们因何来到这里，莫非也是要去圣堡？<page>对，但我们可不是来朝圣的！我和扎扎肩负着神圣使命！<page>我们去那圣堡，是想为村子讨个公道！<page>该死的丝咒毁了村子，就剩下我们俩……带着大伙的记忆。无论如何我们都要找到答案！
translated_text: <hpage>"Gamond, why have you come to this desolate land? Are you looking for the castle above?<page>yes! yes! But don't mistake the brave adventurer for a pure pilgrim. My mission is a sacred mission, and it will be carried out by my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>Searching for a castle is not a gift. No, sister! We seek out its rulers and seek answers! " Use force if necessary! For the sake of our beloved village, we promise the shell.<page>The terrible troubles of the yarn yarn, it has conquered our beautiful people - we want to leave behind the people, their memory, and see some justice done.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"Gamond, pourquoi es-tu venu dans ce pays désolé ? Vous cherchez le château ci-dessus ?<page>Oui ! Oui ! Mais ne confondons pas le courageux aventurier pour un pur pèlerin. Ma mission est une mission sacrée, et elle sera menée par ma compagne la plus fidèle, la chère Zaza.<page>La recherche d'un château n'est pas un cadeau. Non, ma soeur ! Nous cherchons ses dirigeants et cherchons des réponses !« Utilisez la force si nécessaire ! Pour le bien de notre village bien-aimé, nous promettons la coquille.<page>Les terribles troubles du fil de fil, il a conquis notre beau peuple - nous voulons laisser derrière nous le peuple, sa mémoire, et voir un peu de justice faite.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. It was a welcome surprise to hear your call echo through these crumbling tunnels. How goes the search for your master?<page>Poshanka! It is a difficult task to track anything in these caverns while the worms ceaselessly churn the rock.<page>Still, I can see that my master has travelled here. Her path within this land winds strangely... I wonder at her intent.<page>It is no matter though. She can enlighten me when again we meet. Until then, I will continue in her shadow.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。听到你喊声从塌方隧道传来很是惊喜。寻找导师有进展吗？<page>啵尚咔！虫子拱得这附近摇来晃去，追踪太难。<page>但她肯定来过这里，行踪诡异……猜不透意图。<page>无所谓。跟她重逢时自然就明白了。在此之前，先继续追。
translated_text: <hpage>Hi there, Shakra. It's amazing to hear your voice echoing through the swaying tunnels. How is the search for the owner?<page>boshanka! As the worms continue to stir the rocks, tracking anything in these caves can be a daunting task.<page>You can see the master coming here. She went through the paths of this land. I want to know her intentions.<page>But it's okay. Maybe when we see you again, you'll be encouraged. Until then, I'm hiding in her shadow.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Bonjour, Shakra. C'est incroyable d'entendre votre voix faire écho à travers les tunnels oscillants. Comment se déroule la recherche du propriétaire ?<page>boshanka ! Alors que les vers continuent de remuer les roches, suivre quoi que ce soit dans ces grottes peut être une tâche difficile.<page>Vous pouvez voir le Maître venir ici. Elle a parcouru les sentiers de cette terre. Je veux connaître ses intentions.<page>Mais c'est OK. Peut - être que quand nous vous verrons à nouveau, vous serez encouragés. Jusqu'à présent, je me cache dans son ombre.

original_en_text: Lockin’ us up in a place like this... what a shameful act!
original_zh_text: 把我们关在这种地方……太缺德了！
translated_text: it's a shame to keep us in this place!
secondary_translated_text: C'est une honte de nous garder dans cet endroit !

original_en_text: Come now beast, let us hear your voice! Sing with me, sing with me, sing sing sing! Make caverns echo and great roads ring!
original_zh_text: 来吧大块头，亮开嗓子，与我同唱！让洞窟共鸣，让圣道震颤！
translated_text: Come, beast, let your voice be heard. " Sing together, sing together! Let's make the caves reverberate and make them go around the avenue!
secondary_translated_text: Venez, bête, que votre voix soit entendue.« Chantez ensemble, chantez ensemble ! Faisons résonner les grottes et faisons-les tourner l'avenue !

original_en_text: Very well, sister. Perhaps it is better that we all just rest here a little longer.
original_zh_text: 好吧，姐妹。就在这歇会儿也行。
translated_text: Well done, sister. Maybe you'd better rest a little longer here.
secondary_translated_text: Bien fait, soeur. Peut - être ferais-tu mieux de te reposer un peu plus longtemps ici.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You forfeited the race? It is true that sometimes a reset is needed, for the health of mind and shell.<page>But what say you now? Surely you are eager to return to the track. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 怎么中途退赛了？确实，有时为了身心健康，重头再来是必要的。<page>现在怎么说？你肯定渴望重返赛道，那就让我们再次一同飞驰吧！
translated_text: That's a smart mistake! did you lose the game? In fact, a reset is sometimes necessary for the health of the heart and shell.<page>but what are you saying now? I would love to get back on course. Let's fly together again!
secondary_translated_text: C'est une erreur intelligente ! Avez-vous perdu le match ? En fait, une réinitialisation est parfois nécessaire pour la santé du cœur et de la coquille.<page>Mais qu 'est-ce que vous dites maintenant ? J'aimerais bien revenir sur la course. Volons à nouveau ensemble !

original_en_text: These black threads... they reach upwards with such a powerful longing. No wonder they can force themselves through even mighty stone!
original_zh_text: 这些黑色丝线……向上的渴求如此强烈，难怪能穿透坚岩！
translated_text: This black line. With such a strong desire, I extended my hand. No wonder you can get through the rocks!
secondary_translated_text: Cette ligne noire. Avec un tel désir, j'ai tendu la main. Pas étonnant que vous puissiez traverser les roches !

original_en_text: Us snitchbugs can wriggle into any place we want, but with this key even a big oafy bug like you can get through a locked door!
original_zh_text: 我们虽然能钻进任何地方，但有了这把钥匙，像你这样的大块头也能开锁！
translated_text: We whistleblowers can climb anywhere, but with this key, even a big idiot like you can get through a locked door!
secondary_translated_text: Nous, les dénonciateurs, pouvons grimper n'importe où, mais avec cette clé, même un gros idiot comme vous peut passer par une porte verrouillée !

original_en_text: <page=M>Through their march, at the far border of these lowlands, seek the last queen of the ant hunters. We can sense her still... just.<page=B>In youth, her voice united the wild tribes. Gave them the strength to resist the pale monarch’s will... longer than most at least.
original_zh_text: <page=M>穿越低地边境，寻找蚂蚁猎群最后的蚁后。虽然气息微弱，但我们仍能感知到……<page=B>年轻时她一声令下，野外部落群起反抗苍白君主……虽终究不敌。
translated_text: <page=M>They cross the edges of these lowlands in search of the last ant-hunting queen. I can still feel her, though. Just, uh...<page=B>When she was young, her voice united a wild tribe. Longer than most at least give them the power to resist the will of the pale monarch.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Ils traversent les bords de ces basses terres à la recherche de la dernière reine de la chasse aux fourmis. Mais je peux toujours la sentir. Juste, euh...<page=B>Quand elle était jeune, sa voix a uni une tribu sauvage. Plus longtemps que la plupart, au moins leur donner le pouvoir de résister à la volonté du monarque pâle.

original_en_text: Let us head on, sister! Together we shall step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 走吧姐妹！咱们一起跟着信仰进圣城！
translated_text: Sisters, let's go on! We will be led by faith!
secondary_translated_text: Mes sœurs, allons-y ! Nous serons guidés par la foi.

original_en_text: Needle Child. Hakk! I encountered a settlement near here, at the core of a vein of old bells. The bugs there were snared silent on a web of Silk.<page>It seemed the pernicious trap of some unseen predator. I left quickly, making sure to avoid the glimmering threads.<hpage>I passed the town myself. The thread sickness, I’ve seen its like upon the roads, but there it does not discriminate.<hpage>The curse that strikes the town, it is driven, focused. A cold use of Silk at a concerning scale.<hpage>If the path permits, I will investigate its source.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘！哈克！附近钟心镇被邪丝罩着，居民全中招了。<page>像是某种没见过的掠食者设的陷阱，我躲着丝溜走了。<hpage>我也路过了那里。路上丝咒多是个例，但那镇子上的邪丝却不挑目标。<hpage>这等规模和冷血手段，显然受到操纵。<hpage>我会顺路追查其源头。
translated_text: It's a needle, boy. hack it! I have found a settlement near here in the heart of an ancient bell ring. The insects are quietly trapped in their nets.<page>This is like a deadly trap of an invisible predator I hurried to avoid the twinkling thread.<hpage>I walked through this little town. I've seen it on the street, but there's no discrimination.<hpage>The curse that attacks the town is driven and concentrated. Silk of this size is used for colds.<hpage>If the route allows, I'll check the source.
secondary_translated_text: C'est une aiguille, mon fils. Hack-le ! J'ai trouvé un établissement près d'ici, au cœur d'un ancien clocher. Les insectes sont piégés dans leurs filets.<page>C'est comme un piège mortel d'un prédateur invisible, je me suis précipité pour éviter le fil scintillant.<hpage>Je me promenais à travers cette petite ville. Je l'ai vu dans la rue, mais il n'y a aucune discrimination.<hpage>La malédiction qui attaque la ville est poussée et concentrée. La soie de cette taille est utilisée pour le rhume.<hpage>Si la route le permet, je vais vérifier la source.

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? Though no reward remains to give, I would delight to soar together with you again!
original_zh_text: 意下如何？虽然没有奖励可以赠予，但能再次与您一同疾驰，我仍乐意至极！
translated_text: What are you talking about, speed error? There's no reward, but I'm happy to be flying with you again!
secondary_translated_text: De quoi parle-t - on, erreur de vitesse ? Il n'y a pas de récompense, mais je suis heureux de voler à nouveau avec vous !

original_en_text: Snnnrk... Zaza... Snnnrnrrk... Look sharp my lad...
original_zh_text: 呼噜噜……扎扎……呼噜噜……盯紧点……
translated_text: Mr. SNRK, Zaza. Snnnrnrrrk. It looks so beautiful, my son.
secondary_translated_text: M. SNRK, Zaza. Snnnrnrrrk.Ça a l'air tellement beau, mon fils.

original_en_text: You haven’t enough rosaries for trading? The mad pilgrims in the overgrown village near here always carry some with them.<page>Will you take what you need from them? Leaving them to wander their path endlessly is a false mercy.
original_zh_text: 带的念珠不够？附近那些疯癫朝圣者身上多的是。<page>去抢点？让他们继续这么晃悠才是真残忍。
translated_text: don't we have enough rosaries to trade with? The enthusiastic pilgrims of the nearby lush village always have something to offer.<page>Will you take away from them what you need? It is false goodwill that keeps them wandering endlessly.
secondary_translated_text: N'avons-nous pas assez de chapelets pour échanger ? Les pèlerins enthousiastes du village luxuriant voisin ont toujours quelque chose à offrir.<page>Voulez-vous leur enlever ce dont vous avez besoin ? C'est la fausse bonne volonté qui les maintient errer sans fin.

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay out in defence of their lands!<page>Impressive that you managed to survive such a brutal blow. Your shell must be mighty thick!<hpage>Thick enough, though I’d rather have avoided the trap altogether.<hpage>I’ll let it be a reminder to remain wary, even when no foes are nearby.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪的陷阱真是防不胜防！<page>你真厉害，挨了这么重的一击还能活，壳一定很厚！<hpage>厚归厚，但还是别中招为好。<hpage>吃一堑长一智，以后没敌人也得保持警惕。
translated_text: Oh, what an ingenious trap the red shells have set up to defend their land!<page>It's impressive to survive such a brutal battle. Your shell should be thick!<hpage>I want to avoid the trap completely, but thick enough.<hpage>Even if there are no enemies nearby, be alert.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, quel piège ingénieux les coquilles rouges ont dressé pour défendre leur terre !<page>C'est impressionnant de survivre à une bataille aussi brutale. Votre coquille devrait être épaisse !<hpage>Je veux éviter complètement le piège, mais assez épais.<hpage>Même s'il n'y a pas d'ennemis à proximité, soyez vigilant.

translated_text: ... sorry.
secondary_translated_text: ... Excusez-moi.

original_en_text: Well, what a pleasure. The road has carried you back to me.<page>Care for a few games of dice, while we’re here? For the same wager, a beat of rosaries? Just sit here beside me and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: 真是有缘，又见面了。<page>既然如此，再玩几局骰子？还是老规矩，一奏念珠？想玩的话就坐我旁边吧。
translated_text: Oh, what an honor. The road has brought you back to me.<page>do you want to play a dice game here? beat rosario on the same bet? Sit next to me and let's get started.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, quel honneur. La route vous a ramené à moi.<page>Vous voulez jouer à un jeu de dés ici ? battre Rosario sur le même pari ? Asseyez-vous à côté de moi et commençons.

original_en_text: These docks, I thought them small when first I passed. Now I feel the structure’s true bulk hides below the molten lake.
original_zh_text: 原以为码头很小，结果熔岩湖下还藏着大家伙。
translated_text: When I first visited this port, I thought it was small. I felt the real volume of the structure hidden beneath the lava lake.
secondary_translated_text: Quand j'ai visité ce port, je pensais que c'était petit. J'ai senti le volume réel de la structure cachée sous le lac de lave.

original_en_text: The bellways, gilded veins that run throughout the lands. Supposedly, they were once used for travel?<br><br>These pins will mark stations on your map.
original_zh_text: 遍布各地的鎏金钟道，据说以前是交通线路？<br><br>这些图钉能够标记钟脉站点。
translated_text: The clock tower, the golden vein on earth. have you ever used it for travel?<br><br>These pins mark the station on the map.
secondary_translated_text: La tour de l'horloge, la veine d'or de la terre. L'avez-vous déjà utilisé pour voyager ?<br><br>Ces épingles marquent la station sur la carte.

original_en_text: Again... to see... this land abandoned... betrayed...<page>...And a throne I could not sit alone...<hpage>You were mortal bugs, caught beneath a being pale... Devotion or destruction... these are the only fates my kind allow.
original_zh_text: 再次见证……故土荒废……王座空悬……独坐无味……<hpage>你们只是凡虫，屈身于苍白存在脚下……臣服或毁灭……是我的族群唯二的“恩赐”。
translated_text: Once again... Please listen to me. The land has been abandoned. He was betrayed.<page>... A throne that cannot be seated alone<hpage>You are palely locked up. Give or destroy, this is the only fate that our people can endure.
secondary_translated_text: Encore une fois... S'il vous plaît, écoutez-moi, la terre est abandonnée. Il a été trahi.<page>... Un trône qui ne peut être assis seul<hpage>Vous êtes palpablement enfermé. Donner ou détruire, c'est le seul destin que notre peuple peut supporter.

original_en_text: The world has grown much dangerous, but still we must learn! Cut through the black threads, miss grown-up, and hunt down every beast of Pharloom!
original_zh_text: 世界变危险了，但研究不能停！大姐姐快斩断黑灾诅咒，把纺络的野兽全砍遍！
translated_text: The world is getting more and more dangerous, but we need to learn! Cut the black line, worship the gods, and chase all the beasts of Pharaoh!
secondary_translated_text: Le monde est de plus en plus dangereux, mais il faut apprendre ! Coupez la ligne noire, adorez les dieux et chassez toutes les bêtes du Pharaon !

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you too brave these bogs? The heights of Pharloom offer harsh welcome.<page>So winds my master’s path, and so I follow. Yet true you speak! This is no place for me.<page>That Citadel’s shadow falls heavy here. I can sense its horrid bulk besides.<page>It is no surprise to see it choke these caverns dank and stagnant. That monstrosity of metal and stone cares not for the lands it consumes.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉也来闯沼泽？圣堡脚下可没好地方。<page>导师走过这，我只能跟上。但你说得对，这破地真不适合我。<page>圣堡的阴影笼罩着这里，走在路上都能感觉到它的存在。<page>把洞穴都憋得发霉了，但那堆又大又丑的石头可不会管脚下这片土地。
translated_text: <hpage>Shakura, are you too brave in this swamp? The Farms Highlands received a stern welcome.<page>My master's way is crooked, so I follow it. You really spoke! This is not my place.<page>I can see the castle shadow. And you can feel its size.<page>It's not surprising to suffocate a damp, stagnant cave. The monster's metal or stone doesn't care about the land it consumes.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakura, es-tu trop courageux dans ce marécage ? Les Farms Highlands ont reçu un accueil chaleureux.<page>La voie de mon maître est tortueuse, alors je la suive. Ce n'est pas ma place.<page>Je peux voir l'ombre du château. Vous pouvez sentir sa taille.<page>Il n'est pas surprenant de suffoquer une grotte humide et stagnante. Le métal ou la pierre du monstre ne se soucie pas de la terre qu 'il consomme.

translated_text: Quill said
secondary_translated_text: Quill a déclaré

original_en_text: My master would have found her way to these wilds, I am sure. Her warrior’s sense has no equal. Surely, I must be drawing closer to her!
original_zh_text: 导师肯定来过这片荒野。她战斗直觉无虫能及，我快追上她了！
translated_text: My master will find his way to this wilderness. Her warrior consciousness is unparalleled. Surely you should have come closer to her!
secondary_translated_text: Mon Maître trouvera son chemin vers ce désert. Sa conscience guerrière est sans égal. Vous auriez dû vous rapprocher d'elle !

original_en_text: Leave us to our noble hunt, sister! The Citadel’s twisted bugs still infest these gilded halls. Many are their numbers, but we shall see their life’s thread severed.
original_zh_text: 姐妹不必管我们！即便圣堡余孽众多，但来多少我们也能杀多少！
translated_text: Sister, let's continue the noble hunt! The castle's twisted insects still live in the golden hall. There are many of them, but we will see the thread of their lives being cut.
secondary_translated_text: Sœur, continuons la noble chasse ! Les insectes tordus du château vivent toujours dans la salle d'or. Il y en a beaucoup, mais nous verrons le fil de leur vie être coupé.

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>The shell of the red-hunters makes for a vivid marker indeed.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>用红猎手的壳做的标记，足够醒目。
translated_text: It can be used to mark important places and reminders on the map.<br><br>The shell of a red hunter is a vivid symbol.
secondary_translated_text: Il peut être utilisé pour marquer des lieux importants et des rappels sur la carte.<br><br>La coquille d'un chasseur rouge est un symbole vif.

original_en_text: How dank and fetid are these ancient roads, sister! My delicate whiskers are nearly overcome by the stench of evil in the air.<page>Woe betide those with delicate senses, such as poor Zaza here. The shadow of that ghastly Citadel falls heavily upon this place!<hpage>I’ve seen many mighty structures fall to decay in my time. Such places often become home to predators. Keep your sights trained on what lurks in the fog, sirs.
original_zh_text: 这破路又暗又臭！我的漂亮胡子都沾上味了！<page>像扎扎这样鼻子灵的，都快被熏坏了！<hpage>我见过不少腐朽崩塌的宏伟建筑，常沦为掠食者巢穴。当心雾里藏着的东西。
translated_text: Sister, how wet and how stinky these old roads are! My delicate beard was almost scratched out by the evil stench in the air.<page>Unfortunately, people sensitive to the senses, like poor Zaza here. The shadow of that terrible castle fell here!<hpage>In my time, I have seen the decline of many magnificent buildings. These locations are often home to predators. Everyone, pay attention to what lurks in the mist.
secondary_translated_text: Sœur, combien mouillées et puantes sont ces vieilles routes ! Ma barbe délicate était presque rayée par la mauvaise odeur dans l'air.<page>Malheureusement, des gens sensibles aux sens, comme la pauvre Zaza ici. L'ombre de ce terrible château est tombée ici !<hpage>À mon époque, j'ai vu le déclin de nombreux bâtiments magnifiques. Ces endroits abritent souvent des prédateurs. Tout le monde, faites attention à ce qui se cache dans le brouillard.

original_en_text: Hoy, you been creepin’ around this dusty old place for while then, eh? You must be carryin’ a lot of goodies with you! Let a poor old snitchfly ‘ave a quick look!
original_zh_text: 哟，你在这附近转悠了半天，捞到不少好东西吧？让我瞧瞧！
translated_text: Hey, have you been climbing this old, dusty place for a long time? You should have a lot of good stuff! Let's take a quick look at the poor informants!
secondary_translated_text: Hey, vous escaladez ce vieux endroit poussiéreux depuis longtemps ? Tu devrais avoir beaucoup de bonnes choses ! Jetons un coup d'œil aux pauvres informateurs !

original_en_text: I’m Sherma, by the way. Just another humble pilgrim like yourself. If you ever need assistance on the road ahead, sing out my name and I’ll be sure to find you. Me and my lucky chime are at your service!
original_zh_text: 我叫谢尔玛，和你一样是朝圣者。路上需要帮忙就喊我！我和幸运铃铛随叫随到！
translated_text: By the way, I'm a shaman. A humble pilgrim like you. If you need help on your way, sing my name. Me and my lucky bell work for you!
secondary_translated_text: D'ailleurs, je suis un chaman. Un pèlerin humble comme toi. Si vous avez besoin d'aide sur votre chemin, chantez mon nom. Moi et ma cloche heureuse travaillons pour vous !

original_en_text: We ain’t leavin’ ‘til we’re done pilfering! You be off, if you’re so scared!
original_zh_text: 我才不走，还没偷够呢！怕死就自己跑！
translated_text: Steal or run! " If you are so scared, run away!
secondary_translated_text: Voler ou fuir !« Si tu as peur, fuis !

original_en_text: Please take some rosaries in exchange, red maiden!<page>Though in these dark times their promise of holy reward may never be met, still they carry with them our fondest well-wishes.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，请收下这些念珠吧！<page>虽然现在形势不好，但这些念珠装着我们最真诚的祝福！
translated_text: Mr. Hong, please exchange the Rosary!<page>Their promises of divine rewards may never be fulfilled in this dark age, but they carry our best wishes.
secondary_translated_text: Monsieur Hong, s'il vous plaît échangez le Rosaire !<page>Leurs promesses de récompenses divines ne seront peut - être jamais accomplies dans cet âge sombre, mais elles portent nos meilleurs vœux.

original_en_text: Gate, gate, gate! Nicest gate I’ve met!<br>Gate, gate, gate! Greatest miracle yet! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 骨门骨门最贴心！<br>骨门骨门真神迹！哈哈哈！
translated_text: Door! door! door! The best door I've ever seen!<br>door! door! door! The greatest miracle ever! ha ha ha!
secondary_translated_text: porte ! porte ! Porte ! La meilleure porte que j'ai jamais vue !<br>Porte ! Porte ! Porte ! Le plus grand miracle jamais ! Ha ha ha !

original_en_text: <page=M>Those docks, atop the lake of flame, they still possess the means to pass below, though you’d be the first in an age to dare the descent.<hpage>Then my path is clear. Remain in your sanctuary and await my return. If this land can be saved, you may have a part to play yet.
original_zh_text: <page=M>熔岩湖上的深坞仍保有通往下层的手段，但长久以来无虫敢试。<hpage>前路已明，你们就守着圣所等我归来吧。若此地尚存生机，或许还用得上各位。
translated_text: <page=M>These piers are at the top of Lake Flem, and below them there are still facilities to pass through, but you will be the first challenger of this era.<hpage>My way is clear. Be in your refuge and wait until I return. If we can save this land, we can still use some of it.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Ces quais sont au sommet du lac Flem, et en dessous d'eux il y a encore des installations à traverser, mais vous serez le premier challenger de cette époque.<hpage>Mon chemin est clair. Restez dans votre refuge et attendez que je reviens. Si nous pouvons sauver cette terre, nous pouvons encore en utiliser une partie.

original_zh_text: 要挑战飞毛腿斯威夫特吗？
translated_text: Sprint master Swift?
secondary_translated_text: Master de Sprint Swift ?

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay in defence of their lands!<page>I’ve narrowly avoided a few nasty ends myself. It certainly adds a thrill to my investigations...
original_zh_text: 呀！红壳怪的陷阱真阴险！<page>我好几次都差点中招。调查工作有点刺激过头了……
translated_text: Oh, what an ingenious trap the red shells have set up to defend their land!<page>I was almost dead and this gave me excitement in my research.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, quel piège ingénieux les coquilles rouges ont dressé pour défendre leur terre !<page>J'étais presque mort et cela m'a donné de l'excitation dans mes recherches.

original_en_text: Well now! How brilliant! In all these fine games you have matched my scores and more!<page>What wonder to be here, and able to witness a display of such profound talent.<hpage>Besting your scores proved an immense challenge, Seth, and yet you seem to have achieved them yourself with relative ease.<page>You flatter me! But yes, my own aptitude continues to surprise me. So many skills I cannot recall learning... <page>But do not underplay your own achievements, for they too are significant, inspiring even!<page>In fact, for my deep respect I insist you take this small medallion. I found it within my belongings, and know not where I came upon it, but it has a most pleasant sense.<page>Let it serve as marker of a friendship I feel has only just begun.<hpage>Thank you, Seth. I shall keep it close.
original_zh_text: 太精彩了！所有游戏你都破了我的记录！<page>能在这见证这么惊艳的表演，真是幸运。<hpage>破你纪录可不容易，但你达成记录时却挺轻松？<page>我自己都惊讶！很多技巧根本不记得学过……<page>但你的成就更能激励我！<page>为表敬意，请收下这枚勋章。不知从哪来的，但带着令人安心。<page>就当我们友谊的信物吧。<hpage>多谢，我会珍藏。
translated_text: okay! okay! What a wonderful thing! In all of these great games, your score is equal to mine or better!<page>It is strange to witness such a display of talent here.<hpage>Seth, breaking the score was a big challenge, but it seems that I was able to get results on my own with relative ease.<page>You admire me! However, I am amazed at my talent. I don't remember learning so many skills.<page>But don't underestimate your accomplishments.<page>In fact, out of my respect, I insist that you keep this little medal. I found it on my own item. I don't know where I found it, but it gave me the best feeling.<page>As a sign of friendship, I think this is just the beginning.<hpage>Thank you, Seth, I'll keep it up.
secondary_translated_text: OK ! OK ! Quelle chose merveilleuse ! Dans tous ces grands jeux, votre score est égal au mien ou meilleur !<page>Il est étrange de voir une telle démonstration de talent ici.<hpage>Seth, briser le score a été un grand défi, mais il semble que j'ai pu obtenir des résultats par moi-même avec une relative facilité.<page>Vous m'admirez ! Je suis étonnée par mon talent. Je ne me souviens pas avoir appris autant de compétences.<page>Mais ne sous-estimez pas vos réalisations.<page>En fait, par respect, je vous insiste pour garder cette petite médaille. Je l'ai trouvé sur mon propre article. Je ne sais pas où je l'ai trouvé, mais ça m'a donné le meilleur sentiment.<page>En tant que signe d'amitié, je pense que ce n'est que le début.<hpage>Merci Seth, je vais continuer.

original_en_text: While we rest for the journey ahead, care to test your luck with a game of dice? You know how to play, I trust?<hpage>I’m sure I can grasp the rules quickly enough, sir. What is the wager?<page>A beat of rosaries on each roll. What say you? Sound fair? Let our worries roll away with the dice!
original_zh_text: 休息时要来玩玩骰子吗？你应该知道规则吧？<hpage>我学得快，要赌什么？<page>每次押一奏念珠。公平吧？让骰子带走烦恼！
translated_text: Why don't you try your luck by waving the dice during the break? you know how to play it, right?<hpage>I'm sure I can master the rules soon. what to bet on?<page>There are several beads in each volume. what did i say? Does that sound fair? Let our worries go with the dice!
secondary_translated_text: Pourquoi ne pas tenter votre chance en agitant les dés pendant la pause ? Tu sais comment jouer, n'est-ce pas ?<hpage>Je suis sûr que je maîtriserai bientôt les règles. sur quoi parier ?<page>Il y a plusieurs perles dans chaque volume. Qu 'est-ce que j'ai dit ? Cela sonne-t - il juste ? Laissez nos soucis aller avec les dés !

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! ‘Tis a pleasure to meet you here at the end of our long journey, sister.<page>I am Sherma, a simple pilgrim like yourself. What a wonder to find ourselves finally here, eh?<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of our brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. To have travelled this far is to have seen the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 哎呀！姐妹！走了这么远终于碰面了！<page>我是谢尔玛，和你一样的朝圣者。能走到这儿太不容易了！<page>和这么多同袍登上圣堡……真是恩赐……嗯，是恩赐。<hpage>你听起来有些犹豫？既已走到这里，想必你也看清了此地的破败真相，有什么感想？
translated_text: what? what? Oh, there it is! "It's an honor to meet you at the end of a long journey.<page>I am a shaman, a simple pilgrim like you. Isn't it amazing that we finally got here?<page>Eventually I climbed high in the castle and became one of many brothers and sisters. This is truly a blessing. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice, little pilgrim, hides this fear of faith. As I walked this far, I could see the reality of this broken place. what do you think about this?
secondary_translated_text: Quoi ? Quoi ? Oh, voilà, c'est !« C'est un honneur de vous rencontrer à la fin d'un long voyage.<page>Je suis un chaman, un simple pèlerin comme vous. N'est-ce pas étonnant que nous y soyons enfin arrivés ?<page>Finalement, j'ai grimpé haut dans le château et je suis devenu l'un des nombreux frères et sœurs. C'est vraiment une bénédiction. Oui, une bénédiction.<hpage>Ta voix, petit pèlerin, cache cette peur de la foi. En marchant jusqu'à présent, je pouvais voir la réalité de cet endroit brisé. Que pensez-vous à ce sujet ?

original_en_text: Hoy! You again? This place used to be nice and quiet, but now we can’t get a moment’s peace!
original_zh_text: 喂！又是你？这地方本来安安静静的，现在连喘口气都难！
translated_text: Hey! is it you again? It used to be very quiet, but now there is no peace.
secondary_translated_text: Hey ! C'est toi encore ? Il était très calme, mais maintenant il n'y a pas de paix.

original_en_text: Ahh, sister! You have awoken. I hope that our powerful strikes did not leave you in too weak a condition.<page>We would even be willing to duel again, if you still have the strength!
original_zh_text: 啊哈哈，姐妹，你醒啦？没打疼你吧？<page>你要还有力气想再打一轮，我们随时奉陪！
translated_text: ah, sister! I wake up hoping that our powerful attacks will not weaken you.<page>If you are still strong, we will fight again!
secondary_translated_text: Ah, soeur ! Je me réveille en espérant que nos puissantes attaques ne vous affaibliront pas.<page>Si vous êtes encore forts, nous nous battrons à nouveau !

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir Guardian... I scarcely thought we would meet again after our encounter.<page>Hm? Apologies friend, I fear I don’t recognise you. And I’m sure I would remember such a striking figure!<hpage>...Pay no heed, sir. It seems I mistook you for another.<hpage>You are... a traveller through these quaking lands, I take it?<page>I suppose I am indeed! I was born into this world not long ago, waking beside a lake with only this weapon laying beside me.<page>Seth is my name, though I know not who gave it to me.<page>The custom of the newly-born is to explore the world, is it not? So that is what I have set out to do! I will rest here a moment, then continue my journey.
original_zh_text: <hpage>守卫者先生……没想到能再见。<page>抱歉朋友，我们见过吗？像你这样的虫我肯定忘不掉。<hpage>……抱歉，是我认错了。<hpage>你是……旅行者？<page>算是吧！我刚降生不久，就在湖边，身边还有这些武器。<page>我叫赛斯，但不知谁取的名。<page>新生儿就该探索世界对吧？我休息一会儿就继续上路。
translated_text: <hpage>Guardian, sir. Since we met, I never thought I'd see you again.<page>what? what? I'm sorry, I don't know you. I remember such a great man! "<hpage>... Ignore it, sir.
