I look at you like someone else.<hpage>You are a... I think you are a traveler who travels through the earth that trembles.<page>I think so! " Shortly before I was born into this world, I woke up by the lake with this weapon.<page>I don't know who gave it to me, but Seth is my name.<page>A newborn's habit is to explore the world, isn't it? That's what I started with! I will rest here for a while and continue my journey.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Gardien, Monsieur. Depuis que nous nous sommes rencontrés, je ne pensais jamais te revoir.<page>Quoi ? Quoi ? Je suis désolé, je ne vous connais pas. Je me souviens d'un si grand homme ! "<hpage>... Ignorez-le, monsieur. Je te regarde comme quelqu ' un d'autre.<hpage>Vous êtes un... Je pense que vous êtes un voyageur qui voyage à travers la terre qui tremble.<page>Je le pense !« Peu de temps avant que je ne naisse dans ce monde, je me suis réveillé au bord du lac avec cette arme.<page>Je ne sais pas qui m'a donné, mais Seth est mon nom.<page>L'habitude d'un nouveau-né est d'explorer le monde, n'est-ce pas ? C'est avec ça que j'ai commencé ! Je vais me reposer un moment et continuer mon voyage.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! What sweet surprise for Nuu! The world rumbles and the black threads stretch. Not safe now to wander.<page>But you! You are adult yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt, no matter the darkness?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Before it all ends? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！努努好惊喜！世界在震颤，黑灾在蔓延。现在独自游荡可不安全。<page>但你！你是成虫对吧？完全长大了？准备好狩猎了，无惧黑暗？<hpage>我显然不是个小孩子，小家伙。<page>太好啦！努努有个愿望！帮我去砍纺络的各种神奇虫子吧！<page>用你的刀砍！用长大的力气砍！用成熟的狂野之心砍！<page>帮帮努努好不好？趁着一切还没有终结，收下这本册子，用打架心得写满它！
translated_text: Your Majesty, Miss! What a nice surprise for Nu! A world where the black line spreads. It's dangerous to walk now.<page>But you are! Are you an adult? Fully grown? Are you ready for the darkness or the hunt?<hpage>Of course, I am not a child.<page>perfect! Nu needs to make a wish! For her, you will find many wonderful bugs in pharam and cut them off.<page>Please cut them with a knife! Destroy them with your mature spirit! Cut them in your wild adult mind!<page>do you want to help nu? Before the end? Can you take her reels to fill the page with your editing knowledge?
secondary_translated_text: Votre Majesté, mademoiselle ! Quelle belle surprise pour nous ! Un monde où la ligne noire s'étend. Il est dangereux de marcher maintenant.<page>Mais tu es ! Es-tu un adulte ? Pleinement grandis ?Êtes-vous prêt pour l'obscurité ou la chasse ?<hpage>Bien entendu, je ne suis pas un enfant.<page>Parfait ! Il faut faire un vœu ! Pour elle, vous trouverez beaucoup de merveilleux insectes dans le pharam et les coupez.<page>Coupez-le avec un couteau ! Détruisez-les avec votre esprit mûr ! Coupez-les dans votre esprit adulte sauvage !<page>Tu veux aider NAN ? avant la fin ? Pouvez-vous prendre ses rouleaux pour remplir la page de vos connaissances en édition ?

original_en_text: ...Great strides move the world, but small steps shouldn’t be overlooked...<page>...One mystery leads to another. Scrutinising the belly of the thing will prove useful...<hpage>The meaning behind your musings is as opaque as ever. Would you converse with me directly, sir?<page>...Trust yourself. And each other. The solution is always within grasp...
original_zh_text: ……大变革撼动天地，但小细节亦不容忽视……<page>……谜题环环相扣。剖开事物本质方能解惑……<hpage>先生高论依旧晦涩，能否直言相告？<page>……信己信人。答案触手可及……
translated_text: ... You touch the world with big steps, but you can't ignore it with small steps.<page>... One mystery leads to another. It is convenient to carefully examine the abdomen of something.<hpage>The meaning behind meditation is as opaque as ever. can you speak to me directly?<page>... Believe in yourself, and each other 's answers are always in your control.
secondary_translated_text: ... Vous touchez le monde avec de grands pas, mais vous ne pouvez pas l'ignorer avec de petits pas.<page>... Un mystère en mène à un autre. Il est pratique d'examiner soigneusement l'abdomen de quelque chose.<hpage>Le sens derrière la méditation est aussi opaque que jamais. Pouvez-vous me parler directement ?<page>... Croyez en vous-même, et les réponses de l'autre sont toujours sous votre contrôle.

original_en_text: The creatures of this wood can disguise themselves amongst the many branches. Watch for unexpected movement and be prepared to strike.
original_zh_text: 林子里虫子会伪装成树枝。注意周围动静，随时准备出手。
translated_text: This creature of the forest can hide itself in many branches. Beware of unexpected moves and prepare for attack.
secondary_translated_text: Cette créature de la forêt peut se cacher dans beaucoup de branches. Méfiez-vous des mouvements inattendus et préparez-vous à l'attaque.

original_en_text: Spider dear, what a delight to have you visit! It is oh so lonely here at the bottom of the world.<hpage>I cannot share your mirth, child. Your small rebellion above now causes this kingdom’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 小蜘蛛，你来啦！真高兴，独自在这世界之底，好寂寞呢~<hpage>我可高兴不起来，孩子。你那点小小的反叛就要毁灭上方的王国了。
translated_text: Mr. Spider, I'm really glad you came! At the end of the world, you are lonely.<hpage>I can't share your happiness. It was a small rebellion above you that led to the collapse of the kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: Monsieur Spider, je suis très content que vous soyez venu ! Au bout du monde, vous êtes seul.<hpage>Je ne peux pas partager ton bonheur. C'est une petite rébellion au-dessus de vous qui a conduit à l'effondrement du royaume.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. I had a sense I would find you in these winding tunnels, filled as they are with the marks of combat.<page>Poshanka! You trust your instincts rightly. The red-shelled warriors who carved out these roads make for excellent opponents indeed.<page>I would gladly spend much time here, testing myself against their blades and cunning traps, but I must keep to my task. As should you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。看到那些打斗痕迹，我就知道能在附近碰上你。<page>啵尚咔！你直觉真准。那些红壳战士真够厉害，打得痛快！<page>真想多待会儿练练手，但任务要紧。你也别耽搁！
translated_text: <hpage>Hi there, Shakra. I feel like I can find you, because the traces of the battle are crammed in the winding tunnels.<page>boshanka! Trust your intuition correctly. The Red Cross is the only one who can take these roads.<page>I'm happy to spend a lot of time here and test myself against their blades and crafty traps, but I must stick to my mission. " You should do that, too.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Bonjour, Shakra. J'ai l'impression de pouvoir vous trouver, parce que les traces de la bataille sont entassées dans les tunnels sinueux.<page>boshanka ! Faites confiance à votre intuition correctement. La Croix-Rouge est la seule qui peut prendre ces routes.<page>Je suis heureux de passer beaucoup de temps ici et de me mettre à l'épreuve contre leurs lames et leurs pièges sournois, mais je dois m'en tenir à ma mission.« Tu devrais faire ça aussi.

original_en_text: Hahhh... hahhh... oh, sister. What a toll it exacts on us... this endless combat! Certainly when peace finally comes, we will be in the right mind to appreciate it...<hpage>You place too much burden upon yourself, sir.<hpage>Though I share your ambition to free this land from its curse, I counsel you to rest, even if only for a short while.<page>Us, rest? While you, my dear sister, fight on so gallantly? Hahhhh... we cannot.<page>What would our old village think of us, were we to quit our charge? No, regardless of what you may believe, there’s strength enough still in these old shells!
original_zh_text: 哈……哈……噢，姐妹。这架打得骨头都快散架了……等太平了可得好好睡一觉……<hpage>别把担子全压自己身上。<hpage>我也想终结诅咒，但该休息还是得休息。<page>休息？你也还在拼命，我们哪能躺下？<page>要是半途而废，村里的大伙会怎么想！别看我们一身旧壳，里头可有劲呢！
translated_text: huh! ha ha! my sister. It has caused us a great loss. " This endless battle! Of course, when peace comes, we thank it with a right heart.<hpage>You put a lot of burden on yourself.<hpage>I'm as ambitious as you are, and I want to free this country from its curse, but I would advise you to take some rest, even if it's for a short time.<page>Shall we take a break? sister, why did you fight so bravely? ha ha! No, no.<page>What will the old village think if we give up the assault? No, no matter what you believe, these old shells still have enough power!
secondary_translated_text: Hah ! Ha ha ! Ma soeur. Cela nous a causé une grande perte.« Cette bataille sans fin ! Bien sûr, quand la paix vient, nous la remercions d'un cœur droit.<hpage>Vous vous mettez beaucoup de fardeau sur vous-même.<hpage>Je suis aussi ambitieux que vous, et je veux libérer ce pays de sa malédiction, mais je vous conseille de vous reposer, même si c'est pour un court moment.<page>Allons-nous faire un break ? Pourquoi avez-vous combattu si courageusement ? Ha ha ! Non, non.<page>Que pensera le vieux village si nous renonçons à l'assaut ? Non, peu importe ce que vous croyez, ces vieilles coquilles ont encore assez de puissance !

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, I hold the means to descend. Let us meet one final time, and quell this black ruin of our making.
original_zh_text: <hpage>孩子，我有办法下潜。我们再最后见一面，终结这黑暗吧。
translated_text: <hpage>My son, I have a way to get down. Let's meet one last time and quiet the black ruins we have created.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Mon fils, j'ai un moyen de descendre. Rencontreons-nous une dernière fois et faisons taire les ruines noires que nous avons créées.

original_en_text: <hpage>Learning about a land’s inhabitants is a worthwhile undertaking. Perhaps you are more grown than you realise, Nuu.<page>Ma! Such delicious praise will make Nuu shrivel! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: <hpage>研究生态是好事，努努。或许你比看起来要成熟。<page>呀！这么夸人家要害羞啦！快去打猎，开始我们的研究！
translated_text: <hpage>Knowing the people of that country is a rewarding job. Maybe you are more mature than you think you are.<page>Mommy! Such a great compliment kills Nu! go now! Let's start hunting, hunting, and learning!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Connaître les gens de ce pays est un travail enrichissant. Peut - être que vous êtes plus mature que vous ne le pensez.<page>maman ! Un tel compliment me tue ! Allez-y ! Chassez, chassez et apprenons !

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. What do you make of this huge, groaning structure?<hpage>The scale of it all impresses me. If this is merely an outpost of the Citadel above, then their capital must be grand beyond measure.<page>Yokkala... Perhaps so. They must have prized indeed the work done here, to build something so vast in such a dangerous place.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，你怎么看这吱呀乱响的大家伙？<hpage>规模惊人。若这仅是圣堡的一处前哨，那主城的宏伟难以想象。<page>哟咔啦……或许吧。在这种险地修这么大工程，肯定费了不少劲。
translated_text: The children are waving their needles. what do you think of this huge, groaning structure?<hpage>I was impressed with all the sizes. If this was the outpost of the upper castle, their capital must have been immeasurably large.<page>Yokara. Perhaps he cherishes the fact that he has made such a huge thing in such a dangerous place.
secondary_translated_text: Les enfants agitent leurs aiguilles. Que pensez-vous de cette structure immense et gémiante ?<hpage>J'ai été impressionnée par toutes les tailles. Si c'était l'avant-poste du château supérieur, leur capital devait être incommensurablement grand.<page>Yokara ! Peut - être chérit-il le fait qu ' il ait fait une chose aussi énorme dans un endroit aussi dangereux.

translated_text: Signs of hunting
secondary_translated_text: Signes de la chasse

original_en_text: Seek swift to calm our crying land, Hornet Wielding Needle. And know that I shall remain here, to stand against these husks gone dark.
original_zh_text: 快去平息纺络的哀嚎，使针的小姑娘。我会保护这里的虫民。
translated_text: The wasp waved a needle and tried to calm our crying quickly. I knew that I would stay here and fight this black shell.
secondary_translated_text: La guêpe a agité une aiguille et a essayé de calmer rapidement nos pleurs. Je savais que je resterais ici et combatterais cette coquille noire.

original_en_text: I’ll bring the healing supplies to the settlement with all haste, red maiden.<page>Fear not on my behalf. My fellow pilgrims are all praying for me, and thereby no harm will befall me!
original_zh_text: 我这就把药送回去。<page>别担心我！大伙都在为我祈祷，不会有事的！
translated_text: Red Lady, get the healing supplies to the setup as soon as you can.<page>Don't worry, my pilgrims are praying that I won't get hurt.
secondary_translated_text: Red Lady, apporte les fournitures de guérison au plus vite possible.<page>Ne vous inquiétez pas, mes pèlerins prient pour que je ne sois pas blessé.

original_en_text: ‘Tis now my charge to care for those who stay here, including yourself. If I can aid you in any way, please let me know!
original_zh_text: 现在我负责照顾大伙，包括你在内。有什么需要尽管说！
translated_text: "My job right now is to take care of the people who are left here, including you." If there's anything I can do to help you, let me know!
secondary_translated_text: « Mon travail en ce moment est de prendre soin des gens qui sont restés ici, y compris vous.« S'il y a quelque chose que je peux faire pour vous aider, faites-moi savoir !

original_en_text: Oh, what a shock! Discovered again so easily! Like a hapless little hatchling!<page>If you’re going to make a sport of tracking me, I’ll have to redouble my efforts at camouflage!
original_zh_text: 吓我一跳！又被发现了！跟刚破壳的小虫似的！<page>你要是想拿我当猎物练手，我可要升级伪装术了！
translated_text: Oh, that's shock! Rediscovering is easy! Like an unlucky kid!<page>If you want to follow me as a sport, I have to work harder to disguise it! "
secondary_translated_text: Oh, c'est un choc ! Redécouvrir c'est facile ! Comme un enfant malheureux !<page>Si vous voulez me suivre comme un sport, je dois travailler plus fort pour le camoufler ! "

original_en_text: The jagged crest looming over all of Pharloom. Its whipping winds and bitter cold would pierce the strongest shell.
original_zh_text: 俯瞰纺络的尖峰，寒风能刺穿最坚硬的外壳。
translated_text: The rugged mountains cover the entire Faroe Island. Its strong winds and sharp cold puncture the strongest shells.
secondary_translated_text: Les montagnes accidentées couvrent toute l'île Féroé. Ses vents forts et son froid aigu percé les coquilles les plus fortes.

original_en_text: Ahh, the shining bench has risen for us! Pharloom’s kindness to we pilgrims is inexhaustible!<page>Please rest, red maiden, and fear not. Our kingdom watches over us all!
original_zh_text: 看！圣椅为我们升起了！纺络永远眷顾朝圣者！<page>安心歇息吧，王国在庇护我们呢！
translated_text: Oh, a shining bench stands up for us! The pharaoh's goodness to us pilgrims is infinite!<page>Rest, Red Girl, don't be afraid, our kingdom will protect us all!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, un banc lumineux se tient pour nous ! La bonté du pharaon pour nous pèlerins est infinie !<page>Reposez, Red Girl, n'ayez pas peur, notre royaume nous protégera tous !

original_en_text: Join your voice with mine, red maiden! You, me, and my lucky chime will sing together until the great gate opens!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，快加入合唱！你我加上幸运铃铛，肯定能用歌声叩开大门！
translated_text: Join you and my voice, red girl! You and I and my lucky bells will sing together until the door opens.
secondary_translated_text: Rejoignez-vous et ma voix, fille rouge ! Toi, moi et mes cloches chanceuses chanterons ensemble jusqu'à ce que la porte s'ouvre.

original_en_text: Hrm? Hoy there! I was looking for somewhere to rest my weary shell and found this cosy station!<hpage>These lands are dangerous. I had thought perhaps some harm had come to you.<page>Harm? O red maiden, have faith! No harm can come to us on this holy ascent! We only need to keep our gaze upwards.<page>Isn’t this all so terribly grand? The great stone steps, the winds lifting us up like the voices of a choir, and just beyond it all is our pilgrimage’s end. The great Citadel at last!
original_zh_text: 嗯？红衣姑娘！我正在找地方歇脚，这驿站多舒适啊！<hpage>此处很凶险，我担心你遭遇不测。<page>不测？要对圣途有信心！只要仰望圣堡，灾祸自会远离！<page>这景象多壮丽啊！巨大石阶，乘着风声，宛如圣歌，终点就在眼前了！
translated_text: what? what? Hi, I was looking for a place to rest my tired body and found this cozy station!<hpage>This land is dangerous. I thought it might hurt. "<page>Blaming me? Red girl, be confident! In this sacred climb, we will not hurt anything! We need to be alert.<page>isn't this too grand? After a huge stone step, which the wind lifted us up like the sound of a choir, our pilgrimage journey was over. The castle is finally here!
secondary_translated_text: Quoi ? Quoi ? Bonjour, je cherchais un endroit pour reposer mon corps fatigué et j'ai trouvé cette station confortable !<hpage>Cette terre est dangereuse. Je pensais que ça pourrait faire mal. "<page>Blamer moi ? Ma fille rouge, soyez confiante ! Dans cette montée sacrée, nous ne ferons rien ! Nous devons être alertes.<page>N'est-ce pas trop grand ? Après un énorme pas de pierre, que le vent nous a soulevés comme le son d'un choeur, notre pèlerinage était terminé. Le château est enfin là !

translated_text: <hpage>little pilgrim, are you sleeping?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Petit pèlerin, tu es endormi ?

original_en_text: She and her like have red-rocky shells to protect their softnesses. Inside is very sweet! Very hard to crack them open though, so is best to wait. Is always best to wait!
original_zh_text: 它们用红岩壳保护内部的软肉。里面超甜！但壳太难撬，最好等自然腐烂！
translated_text: She and her companions had a red rock shell to protect the softness. The inside is sweet! But it's best to wait, because they're hard to break. You'd better wait!
secondary_translated_text: Elle et ses compagnons avaient une coquille de roche rouge pour protéger la douceur. L'intérieur est doux ! Mais il est préférable d'attendre, car ils sont difficiles à briser. Tu ferais mieux d'attendre !

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly, Shakra. Upon this stone, let us test our shells.
original_zh_text: <hpage>求之不得。就在此石台上一较高下吧。
translated_text: <hpage>I'm glad you are, Shakira. With this stone, let's try the shell.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je suis content que tu sois, Shakira. Avec cette pierre, essayons le coquille.

original_en_text: Well met, sister. Though the beastly Citadel has finally been slain, still the lands caught beneath it suffer!<page>The evils long done by that cursed place have sunk into the kingdom’s very foundations, and now they rise up as a black sickness.<hpage>This darkness, it is a curse deadlier than the Haunting... a force from far below that will consume all if given the opportunity.<page>Hmm... Just so! And while wickedness still stalks these lands, our hornlance shall not rest!
original_zh_text: 又见面了，姐妹。圣堡祸根虽除，但下面的土地还在遭罪！<page>诅咒早已根植在纺络的各处，现在化作黑暗冒了出来。<hpage>这黑暗远比丝咒致命……来自最深的邪恶，一有机会就会吞噬一切。<page>哼……果然！只要邪恶还没除净，我们的长枪就放不下！
translated_text: Hello, sister. The beast-like castle is finally slaughtered, but the land beneath it is still suffering!<page>The evils of this cursed land, which had long been buried in the foundations of the kingdom, are now spreading like a black disease.<hpage>This darkness is a curse more deadly than a ghost, a force that comes from beneath it and swallows it all if it gets the chance.<page>um... yes, yes! Our hatred will not stop while evil covers this earth.
secondary_translated_text: Bonjour, soeur. Le château de la bête est finalement massacré, mais la terre en dessous souffre encore !<page>Les maux de cette terre maudite, longtemps enterrés dans les fondations du royaume, se propagent maintenant comme une maladie noire.<hpage>Cette obscurité est une malédiction plus mortelle qu ' un fantôme, une force qui vient d'en dessous et l'englout tout si elle en a l'occasion.<page>Umm... Oui ! oui ! Notre haine ne cessera pas tant que le mal couvre cette terre.

original_en_text: Sturdy gaaaaa-aaate, I don’t ask you break or beee-eeend,<br>Just open a little for me, and my tall maiden frieeee-eeend!
original_zh_text: 骨门呀骨门，不求你折断，<br>只要开条缝让咱过，我和高个姑娘谢你恩典！
translated_text: I don't want to break you, I don't want a beep.<br>Open it up for me and my tall virgin friend!
secondary_translated_text: Je ne veux pas te casser, je ne veux pas un bip.<br>Ouvrez-le pour moi et ma grande amie vierge !

original_en_text: These waters, at land’s edge... and the shrine atop... our furtive escape... our brief retreat from rule...<page>So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 这片水岸……我们暂时远离王权的休憩……<page>那些简单……快乐……自由的时光……
translated_text: These waters are at the edge of the land. There is also a shrine. We got away, we got away a little bit from the rules.<page>Many moments are simple. Freedom and Joy.
secondary_translated_text: Ces eaux sont au bord de la terre. Il y a aussi un Shrine. Nous nous sommes éloignés, nous nous sommes éloignés un peu des règles.<page>Beaucoup de moments sont simples. Liberté et joie.

original_en_text: What say you, sister? Shall we join together in valiant combat?
translated_text: sister, what did i say? should we fight bravely together?
secondary_translated_text: Sœur, qu 'est-ce que j'ai dit ? Faut-il combattre courageusement ensemble ?

original_en_text: Oh red maiden, sorry to have lured you into such danger!<page>And those poor bugs, bewitched by the thread. No sin could possibly warrant such a fate...<hpage>Your pity is not misplaced, but better suited for another time. For now, you should look to your own care.<page>Ah... yes. I should get these healing supplies back to the pilgrims’ settlement above. My brothers and sisters have waited long enough.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，对不起把你卷进来！<page>那些被丝线控制的同伴……他们犯了什么错……<hpage>有怜悯之心固然好，但要先顾好自己。<page>对……我得把药送回聚落。他们等太久了。
translated_text: Oh, red girl, I'm sorry to put you in a dangerous situation!<page>People who are obsessed with the thread. Crime does not guarantee such a fate.<hpage>Your mercy isn't a bad thing, but it's better next time. Now he has to take care of himself.<page>ah... Yes, healing supplies should be brought back to the pilgrim settlement above. The brothers and sisters had waited long enough.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, fille rouge, je suis désolé de vous mettre dans une situation dangereuse !<page>Les gens qui sont obsédés par le fil. La criminalité ne garantit pas un tel sort.<hpage>Votre miséricorde n'est pas une mauvaise chose, mais c'est mieux la prochaine fois. Maintenant il doit prendre soin de lui-même.<page>Ah, oui. Oui, les fournitures de guérison doivent être ramenées à la colonie de pèlerins ci-dessus. Les frères et sœurs avaient attendu assez longtemps.

original_en_text: <hpage>The parasite writhing within my shell has a violent aversion to the void. <hpage>Despite the protection granted by the Everbloom, even now I can feel those wretched roots preventing my descent.<hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我壳里的寄生物极度抗拒虚空。<hpage>虽然有永绽花保护，但那些根须还是在阻止我下潜。<hpage>要斩断诅咒，得先除掉体内这玩意。
translated_text: <hpage>The parasites walked about in my shell, and held a strong aversion to the emptiness.<hpage>Despite the protection of the eternal flower, I can still feel the poor roots preventing my decline. "<hpage>If I'm going to jump in and cut this land off from the curse of the black line, I must first find a way to drive the invaders out of it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Les parasites marchaient dans ma coquille, et tenaient une forte aversion pour le vide.<hpage>Malgré la protection de la fleur éternelle, je peux encore sentir les pauvres racines qui empêchent mon déclin. "<hpage>Si je vais sauter et couper cette terre de la malédiction de la ligne noire, je dois d'abord trouver un moyen de chasser les envahisseurs de là.

original_en_text: Many foes await us. Shall we duel with one another before moving on?
original_zh_text: 前方有不少恶战等着，先来场热身赛？
translated_text: There are many enemies waiting for us. do we fight and move forward?
secondary_translated_text: Il y a beaucoup d'ennemis qui nous attendent. Est-ce qu ' on se bat et qu ' on va de l'avant ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Nuu. You have travelled far from your lodgings, I was not expecting to meet you in these lowlands.<page>Oh, hello again miss grown-up! Yes, Nuu is not the fastest, but she goes great distances to follow the scent of learnings.<page>And look what Nuu has found! A great big beast, cracked open and broken apart! There is much to learn from him, so Nuu will savour it all slowly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，努努。你跑得真远，没想到在低地遇见你。<page>大姐姐！努努虽然腿短，但跟着知识气味能走超远！<page>看努努发现了什么！这个被肢解的大家伙！慢慢研究肯定能学到好多！
translated_text: <hpage>Hello there, NU. You are far away from where you live, and I did not expect to meet you in this lowland.<page>Hello, my lord! Yes, Noo isn't the fastest, but she's come a long way to follow the breath of learning.<page>Take a look at what Noo has discovered! A giant beast is ripped apart! There's so much to learn from him, that Noo will slowly taste it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Bonjour là - bas, NU. Vous êtes loin d'où vous habitez, et je ne m'attendais pas à vous rencontrer dans cette basse terre.<page>Bonjour mon seigneur ! Oui, Noo n'est pas la plus rapide, mais elle a parcouru un long chemin pour suivre le souffle de l'apprentissage.<page>Jetez un coup d'œil à ce que Noo a découvert ! Une bête géante est déchirée ! Il y a tellement de choses à apprendre de lui, que Noo va lentement goûter.

original_en_text: With this quill, you can add any new areas you discover to the maps that you own. We pluck these quills from Golpeni hunted by my tribe. Their hollowed shafts make the perfect charting tool.
original_zh_text: 用这羽毛笔能把新发现的区域补到地图上。羽毛是从我们部落猎的高尔佩尼鸟身上拔的，中空的羽管最适合拿来绘图。
translated_text: With this pen, you can add to the map a new area you have discovered that owns. I took a feathered pen from the Gerpanies, who were hunting in my tribe. The hollow axis is a perfect drawing tool.
secondary_translated_text: Avec ce stylo, vous pouvez ajouter à la carte une nouvelle zone que vous avez découverte qui possède. J'ai pris un plume plumée des Gerpanies, qui chassaient dans ma tribu. L'axe creux est un parfait outil de dessin.

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle, how far our wanderings take us! The cold air here bites through our shells as true as any blade. Warm yourself by my lantern while I call. <hpage>Pharloom is a land of harsh extremes. Perhaps that is, in part, why the pilgrims have a culture of testing themselves against it so fervently.<page>Perhaps. When I first encountered them, I had little respect for the weak, rag-bundled bugs. Too cowardly to even carry a weapon!<page>But... Dondakku. Sometimes we judge too quickly. There is a subtle strength to them, though it is difficult for me to truly understand it.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，咱们跑得真远！这里寒气刺骨，来灯笼边暖暖。<hpage>纺络环境真是极端，或许这也是朝圣者们测试信仰的一部分。<page>也许吧。当初觉得他们是群软蛋，连武器都不敢带！<page>但……咚嗒库！也算是我看走眼吧，他们有种我说不清的韧劲。
translated_text: How far have our vagabonds led us, you children who wield the needle! The cold air pierces our shells When we call, we warm up with lanterns.<hpage>The Faro is a land full of cruelty. This may be one of the reasons why pilgrims are eager to try out the culture.<page>Maybe when I first saw it, I didn't respect this weak and rambling insect. He's too weak to take a weapon!<page>but... Dondak. Sometimes judgments are too fast. It has subtle powers, but it's hard to really understand.
secondary_translated_text: Combien nous ont conduits nos vagabonds, vous enfants qui brandissez l'aiguille ! L'air froid perce nos coquilles Quand nous appelons, nous nous réchauffons avec des lanternes.<hpage>Le Faro est un pays de cruauté. C'est peut - être l'une des raisons pour lesquelles les pèlerins sont impatients d'essayer cette culture.<page>Peut - être que lorsque je l'ai vu pour la première fois, je n'ai pas respecté cet insecte faible et grimpant. Il est trop faible pour prendre une arme !<page>Mais... Dondak. Parfois, les jugements sont trop rapides. Il a des pouvoirs subtils, mais il est difficile de vraiment comprendre.

original_en_text: Ahh, the caress of this warm water on my weary limbs is welcome indeed. As soothing as a psalm, haha!<page>Will you splishy-splash in the holy bath with me, red maiden? We can sing together to aid in our rejuvenation!
original_zh_text: 泡着热水澡真舒服！比唱圣歌还解乏，哈哈！<page>要和我一起泡吗？边泡边唱歌更解乏！
translated_text: Oh, this warm water touched my tired limbs. It really is popular. Relax like a poem. "<page>red girl, will you take a holy bath with me? Let's sing together and help the recovery!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, cette eau chaude touchait mes membres fatigués. C'est vraiment populaire. Détendez-vous comme un poème "<page>« Fille rouge, tu veux prendre un bain saint avec moi ? Chantons ensemble et aidons à la récupération !

original_en_text: Want yer clicky-clackies threaded nice and tight? Old Grindle will do it gladly, if you let ‘im snitch a few for hisself...
original_zh_text: 要把叮当响串稳当？格林德尔来帮你！抽点佣金就行！
translated_text: Do you want your touch to be strong and good? If you let him report directly to old Grindell, he would be delighted.
secondary_translated_text: Vous souhaitez que votre contact soit fort et bon ? Si vous le laissez rendre compte directement au vieil Grindell, il serait ravi.

original_en_text: D-do not judge me a doubter! The Citadel is a holy place indeed, resplendent and vast beyond my wildest hopes!<page>But yet... the grand halls ache with silence, and I see suffering in the shadows wherever I peer too deeply.<page>Fear, and pain... why were these things allowed into our paradise? Have my brothers and sisters not yet earned their holy reward?
original_zh_text: 别当我是叛信者！圣堡确实是圣地，比我想的还壮观！<page>可是……大殿里死气沉沉，角落里到处都藏着苦痛。<page>恐惧啊伤痛啊……为什么让这些脏东西进圣地？我们还不够虔诚吗？
translated_text: Don't think I'm a skeptic! This castle is truly a sacred place, magnificent and vast beyond my wild hopes!<page>but... The majestic hall suffered from the stillness, and no matter how deeply he looked, he could see pain in the shadows.<page>Fear, and pain Why are these things allowed to enter our heaven? Have my brothers and sisters not yet received God 's reward?
secondary_translated_text: Ne pensez pas que je suis sceptique ! Ce château est véritablement un lieu sacré, magnifique et vaste au-delà de mes espoirs sauvages !<page>Mais... La salle majestueuse souffrait du silence, et peu importe à quel point il regardait, il pouvait voir la douleur dans les ombres.<page>La peur et la douleur Pourquoi ces choses sont-elles autorisées à entrer dans notre ciel ? Mes frères et sœurs n'ont-ils pas encore reçu la récompense de Dieu ?

original_en_text: ...Crossed weapons, sleeping of course, but shaped unlike any you’ve seen before...<page>...To travel underneath is one thing, but travelling up above may require a different sort of sight...<hpage>Sir Herald... It seems rare coincidence for us to meet in this distant land. Unless, perhaps, you followed me here?<page>...A path that meets itself is an ill portent indeed. Those who peer sideways know well enough...<page>
original_zh_text: ……崇山深谷，却非你所熟知的形态……<page>……穿行地底是一回事，但翱翔天际需另种眼界……<hpage>使者大人……在这偏远之地重逢，是巧合还是您尾随而来？<page>……道途相逢并非吉兆。小家伙还是别多嘴了……
translated_text: ... Sure, the crossover weapon is for sleeping, but the shape is different from the weapon you've never seen before.<page>... Moving down is one thing, but moving up requires a different perspective.<hpage>The Knight of Pioneers. Their meeting in a far-away land seems like an unusual coincidence. Unless you come after me.<page>... His path is certainly a bad omen. Anyone who saw from the side would know.<page>
secondary_translated_text: ... Bien sûr, l'arme de crossover est pour dormir, mais la forme est différente de l'arme que vous n'avez jamais vue auparavant.<page>... Descendre c'est une chose, mais monter nécessite une perspective différente<hpage>Chevalier des pionniers. Leur rencontre dans un pays lointain semble une coïncidence inhabituelle. Sauf si tu viens après moi.<page>... Sa voie est un mauvais présage. Quiconque a vu de côté le saurait.<page>

original_en_text: Nice little pair of rolly-rollies we got ‘ere. Sure to bring luck to any snitchin’ expedition...
translated_text: There is a nice little roller. This will bring good luck to the whistleblower's adventure.
secondary_translated_text: Il y a un joli petit roller. Cela apportera bonne chance à l'aventure du lanceur d'alerte.

original_en_text: ...The elements do not conspire against you. They have their own desires...<page>...When one spies a great peak, the natural inclination is to begin climbing...<page>...The little left-behind... you’ve decided, then? A companion for the journey...
original_zh_text: ……万物并非与你为敌，它们自有渴求……<page>……望见高峰，攀爬便是本能……<page>……那个被遗弃的小家伙……你决定带他同行了？……
translated_text: ... These elements are not conspiring against you. They have their own desires.<page>... When a person finds a mountain, the tendency of nature is to start climbing.<page>... so did you decide? Companions of the journey.
secondary_translated_text: ... Ces éléments ne conspirent pas contre vous. Ils ont leurs désirs.<page>... Quand une personne trouve une montagne, la tendance de la nature est de commencer à grimper.<page>... Alors avez-vous décidé ? Compagnon du voyage.

original_en_text: <hpage>Feel guilt at your absence, sir, but know the end was inexorable, the outcome set, whether you remained or not.<page>Do not seek to console me, warrior... This memory is mine alone... I’ll not brook your brutish intrusion...<page>You who dare trespass this sacred chamber, ready yourself... to see us, and know us, Verdania’s rulers, together in our finest form...
original_zh_text: <hpage>无需为自己的缺席感到愧疚，结局早已注定，无关你的去留。<page>少来安慰我……战士……这是我的回忆……容不得莽夫插嘴……<page>擅闯圣殿者……准备见证翠庭国双王的最强形态吧！
translated_text: <hpage>I feel guilty about your absence, but whether you stay or not, the consequences are inevitable and fatal.<page>Don't comfort me, soldier. " These memories are mine alone. I cannot bear your barbaric aggression.<page>Prepare for anyone who trespasses into this sacred room. Look at us and know us, the rulers of Verdania are with us in our best form.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je me sens coupable de votre absence, mais que vous restiez ou non, les conséquences sont inévitables et fatales.<page>Ne me réconforte pas, soldat.« Ces souvenirs sont à moi seuls. Je ne peux pas supporter votre agression barbare.<page>Préparez-vous à tous ceux qui empiètent dans cette pièce sacrée. Regardez-nous et connaissez-nous, les dirigeants de Verdania sont avec nous dans notre meilleure forme.

original_en_text: If you choose to rest here, I will watch over you, Child Wielding Needle. These charts require long attention, and my own sleep is far off yet.
original_zh_text: 想休息的话，我给你放哨。我暂时不睡，还得多琢磨琢磨图纸。
translated_text: If you choose to rest here, I'll take care of you. These charts require long attention, and my own sleep is still far off.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous choisissez de vous reposer ici, je vais prendre soin de vous. Ces tableaux nécessitent une longue attention, et mon sommeil est encore loin.

original_en_text: Beasty, beastly, big fat beast! Strong as a boulder, or a rock at least! Let’s sing together ‘til you’re released!<page>Oh! Look here red maiden, this poor creature is all tangled up in white bindings! Surely you know a song for unsticking such stickiness?<hpage>It will take a power greater than song to break these bindings, little one. In my current diminished state even I can not cut through them.<page>Well, worry not! If something is needed, the road will bring it to us!
original_zh_text: 大块头啊大块头，壮如磐石力无穷！与我合唱放你走！<page>红衣姑娘快看！这可怜家伙被白丝缠住了！你会解缚之歌吗？<hpage>这束缚并非歌唱能解。凭我现在的气力，也斩不断这些丝线。<page>不必担心！所需之物肯定就在圣途之上！
translated_text: Beast, beast, big, fat beast! Strong as a rock, or at least as strong as a rock! Let us sing together until we are set free!<page>oh! Look, red girl, this poor creature is tied to a white chain. Do you know that you can play this song?<hpage>Breaking this bondage requires more power than song. With my weakness now, I can't even cut them.<page>All right, don't worry! If you need anything, the road will give you!
secondary_translated_text: Bête, bête, gros, gros ! Fort comme un rocher, ou au moins aussi fort qu 'un rocher ! Chantons ensemble jusqu'à ce que nous soyons libérés !<page>Ooh ! Regardez, fille rouge, cette pauvre créature est attachée à une chaîne blanche. Tu sais que tu peux jouer cette chanson ?<hpage>Briser cette esclavage demande plus de pouvoir que de chanter. Avec ma faiblesse, je ne peux même pas les couper.<page>D'accord, ne vous inquiétez pas ! Si vous avez besoin de quelque chose, la route vous le donnera !

translated_text: Clock Hands
secondary_translated_text: Horloge Hands

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You abandoned the race? Surely it was only an error?<page>In the pursuit of speed all reason can ofttimes be lost, left in the wind as it were.<page>At least you seem recovered of your lapse. And surely you are eager now?<page>We must sprint on! Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 怎么中途退赛？肯定是失误了对吧？<page>专注追求速度经常会忘记思考。<page>看来你已经调整好了，继续吧？<page>让我们一起继续冲刺！
translated_text: That's a smart mistake! did you give up on the game? Isn't this just a mistake?<page>In the pursuit of speed, all reason tends to vanish, as if thrown into the wind.<page>At least, you have recovered from your mistake. do you really want it now?<page>You need a sprint! Let's fly together!
secondary_translated_text: C'est une erreur intelligente ! Avez-vous abandonné le jeu ? N'est-ce pas juste une erreur ?<page>Dans la poursuite de la vitesse, toute raison tend à disparaître, comme si elle était jetée dans le vent.<page>Au moins, vous avez récupéré de votre erreur. Tu le veux vraiment maintenant ?<page>Vous avez besoin de sprint ! Volaons ensemble !

translated_text: Bench Sales
secondary_translated_text: Ventes de Bench

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. These are stale roads, ill-fitted for warriors such as ourselves.<page>There is fair combat here against the roach-beasts and their keepers, but the air is sickly and the water writhes with parasites.<hpage>This environment is harsh indeed, though life seems to adapt itself to many hardships. Do you believe your master travelled these roads?<page>I had thought not at first, but upon closer search I found the fragments of a trail winding through these fetid ruins.<page>Perhaps she saw something here that I did not? Her senses are often keen where mine are clouded.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘。这路太安稳了，配不上咱们战士。<page>打打蟑螂和饲者还行，但空气污浊，水里全是寄生虫。<hpage>环境糟糕，但生命总能适应。你觉得你的导师来过这儿？<page>本来觉得不会，结果在废墟里找到了些许踪迹。<page>难道她发现了什么我没注意到的东西？她的眼光总是比我毒辣。
translated_text: The children are waving their needles. The roads are old and not suitable for soldiers like us.<page>The fight against cockroaches and their keepers is fair, but the air is sick and the water is full of parasites.<hpage>The environment is indeed harsh, but life seems to have adapted to many difficulties. Do you think your master has taken this path?<page>At first I didn't think so, but when I searched carefully, I found a piece of a road that meanders through the stench of the ruins.<page>Maybe I saw something I didn't see. " Where my sense is blind, her sense is often sharp.
secondary_translated_text: Les enfants agitent leurs aiguilles. Les routes sont vieilles et ne conviennent pas à des soldats comme nous.<page>La lutte contre les cafards et leurs gardiens est juste, mais l'air est malade et l'eau est pleine de parasites.<hpage>L'environnement est en effet dur, mais la vie semble s'être adaptée à de nombreuses difficultés. Pensez-vous que votre maître a pris cette voie ?<page>Au début, je ne le pensais pas, mais quand j'ai cherché attentivement, j'ai trouvé un morceau de route qui sinueuse à travers la puanteur des ruines.<page>Peut - être que j'ai vu quelque chose que je ne voyais pas.« Là où mon sens est aveugle, le sien est souvent aigu.

original_en_text: Hold there, sister! A great beast stalks this land, swooping and screeching like an ill-mannered tyrant!<page>Zaza has been following the creature’s scent, and now I’m sure we’re almost upon it! We’re so close my whiskers are bristling!<page>Such a beast is worthy quarry for the valiant, aye? What say you, shall we hunt the creature together?
original_zh_text: 姐妹留步！附近藏着一只大家伙，俯冲尖啸，不好对付！<page>扎扎一路闻着它的味道呢，肯定就在附近！我的胡子都翘起来了！<page>那是个难得的好对手。怎么说，要不要联手干掉它？
translated_text: stop it, sister! A gigantic beast roamed the ground, descending like a rough tyrant and screaming!<page>Zaza is chasing the scent of this creature and is sure to be there soon! We're so close, my beard is standing!<page>A beast like this is worth a brave man to kill, right? what do you think about hunting these creatures together?
secondary_translated_text: Arrête, ma soeur ! Une bête gigantesque parcourait le sol, descendant comme un tyran rugueux et hurlant !<page>Zaza poursuit l'odeur de cette créature et est sûr d'y être bientôt ! Nous sommes si proches, ma barbe est debout !<page>Une bête comme celle-ci vaut la peine d'être tuée par un homme courageux, non ? Que pensez-vous de la chasse à ces créatures ?

original_en_text: Many of Pharloom’s bugs have useful equipment and items to trade. It would do you well to keep track of their locations with this pin.<br><br>These pins will mark vendors on your map.
original_zh_text: 达罗穆有很多虫带着好货，最好记下他们的位置。<br><br>这些图钉能够标记商贩位置。
translated_text: Many of the bugs in Pharloom have useful equipment and items. It's good to track the location with this pin.<br><br>These pins mark the vendors on the map.
secondary_translated_text: Beaucoup de bugs de Pharloom ont des équipements et des objets utiles. C'est bon de suivre l'emplacement avec cette broche.<br><br>Ces épingles marquent les vendeurs sur la carte.

original_en_text: Basic tool’o the job, here. Throw your big needle and scratch shinies straight off your target’s shell!
original_zh_text: 干我们这行的基础道具，直接从目标身上把宝贝钩下来！
translated_text: Here are the basic working tools. Throw your big needle and catch the light shining directly from the target shell!
secondary_translated_text: Voici les outils de base de travail. Jetez votre grosse aiguille et attrapez la lumière qui brille directement de la coquille cible !

translated_text: Map of Moss
secondary_translated_text: Carte de Moss

original_en_text: ...Oh. Wyrm child. No surprise it’s you who meets me here.<page>Following me are you? Or calling me? It is true I would not have sought the lands below if not for your grand actions within them.<page>But now, having journeyed their breadth, what singular sights I beheld... Flaming lakes, tangled woods, caves consumed by sand and frost...<page>Remarkable things all, though given their void claimed state it seems you and I may be the last to hold those memories.<hpage>I cannot allow that outcome, Herald. I act now to save that place, both for myself and for those bugs still alive within.<hpage>As one who has seen so much, tell me simply, do you believe my efforts in vain?<page>Me? Certainly you can ask, but I cannot provide good answer. I’ve no mind for outcomes. Always my vision is too clouded by the present.<page>Only the journey... the now. For myself, that is the purpose, and as far as my sight can see.<page>If any other could come to understand that state, Wyrm child, I suspect it may be you... <page>Though maybe not yet, not this present, hmmm? Maybe in a future far, when your actions might hail me so again?<page>Alas, from these quaking caves it is past time I made my swift exit. Ours each may be long and winding roads, but I hope you too come to know the many joys upon the path...
original_zh_text: ……哦。沃姆后裔。在此相遇倒也不意外。<page>尾随还是召唤？若非你在地底闹出大动静，我本不会来此。<page>如今游历四方，得见何等奇景……熔岩湖、缠藤林、冰封沙穴……<page>叹为观止，然虚空侵蚀之下，唯你我留存此间记忆。<hpage>我无法坐视，使者大人。此刻行动既为自救，也为庇佑残存生灵。<hpage>作为见证者，请您直言相告，我等努力是否为徒劳？<page>问我？答不上来。未来迷雾重重，我目光唯见当下。<page>唯有旅程……此时此刻。于我而言，此即意义，也即我目之能视。<page>沃姆之女，或许唯你能懂此心境……<page>也许尚非此时？待你功成之日再唤我来？<page>唉，该离开这震颤洞穴。前路漫漫，愿你亦能领略沿途风光……
translated_text: ... Oh, the devil. No wonder we met here.<page>are you following me? or call me? If it were not for your magnificent deeds on earth, I would not have sought the earth.<page>But now, when I am traversing their vast world, I see what strange sights: hot lakes, tangled woods, caves swallowed up in sand and frost.<page>All these surprising things, even if you claim to be in a state of emptiness, seem to me that you and I may be the last people to have these memories.<hpage>That's not allowed I'm acting now to save this place, for myself, and for the bugs that still live there.<hpage>Do you think my efforts as a person of knowledge were in vain?<page>what am i doing? You can ask questions, but you can't give them a good answer. No matter what the outcome is. My vision has always been deceived by the now.<page>Just one trip. As far as I know, that's the purpose.<page>If anyone could understand this state, son of Vyron, I suspect it might be you.<page>Maybe not yet, but it's not a gift, right? Perhaps in the distant future, your actions will once again honor me. "<page>Oh, the time is over for a quick escape from these trembling caves. Each road may be long and winding, but I hope you understand the fun of it.
secondary_translated_text: ... Oh le diable. Pas étonnant que nous nous soyons rencontrés ici.<page>Tu me suives ? Ou m'appeler ? S'il n'y avait pas eu tes merveilleuses œuvres sur la terre, je n'aurais pas cherché la terre.<page>Mais maintenant, quand je traverse leur vaste monde, je vois des paysages étranges : des lacs chauds, des bois enchevêtrés, des grottes englouties dans le sable et le gel.<page>Toutes ces choses surprenantes, même si vous prétenez être dans un état de vide, me semblent que vous et moi sommes peut - être les dernières personnes à avoir ces souvenirs.<hpage>Je fais maintenant pour sauver cet endroit, pour moi-même et pour les insectes qui y vivent encore.<hpage>Pensez-vous que mes efforts en tant que personne de connaissance ont été vains ?<page>Qu 'est-ce que je fais ? Vous pouvez poser des questions, mais vous ne pouvez pas leur donner une bonne réponse. Peu importe quel est le résultat. Ma vision a toujours été trompée par le maintenant.<page>Un seul voyage. Pour autant que je sache, c'est le but.<page>Si quelqu ' un pouvait comprendre cet état, fils de Vyron, je soupçonne que ce serait vous.<page>Peut - être pas encore, mais ce n'est pas un cadeau, n'est-ce pas ? Peut - être dans un futur lointain, vos actions m'honoreront à nouveau. »<page>Oh, le temps est révolu pour une évasion rapide de ces grottes tremblantes. Chaque route peut être longue et sinueuse, mais j'espère que vous en comprendrez le plaisir.

original_en_text: You would fight alone, sister? You would be undefeatable with me by your side! And Zaza also! You need only ask, and our hornlance would be yours.
original_zh_text: 你想单打独斗？有我和扎扎助阵肯定能百战百胜！需要帮忙就开口，我们的长枪自会跟上！
translated_text: sister, are you fighting alone? If I'm by your side, you'll be invincible! Zaza too! Our hatred is yours, and our hatred is yours.
secondary_translated_text: Sœur, tu es seule ? Si je suis à tes côtés, tu seras invincible ! Zaza aussi ! Notre haine est la vôtre, et notre haine est la vôtre.

original_en_text: ...Do they realise it would only be the beginning? If they cleave themselves free, they would need to find their way anew...
original_zh_text: ……他们可知这只是开端？即使能得解脱，众生仍需寻觅新途……
translated_text: ... Do you understand that this is only the beginning? If they have been freed from bondage, they need to find their way again.
secondary_translated_text: ... Comprenez-vous que ce n'est que le début ? S'ils ont été libérés de l'esclavage, ils doivent trouver leur chemin à nouveau.

original_en_text: My hopes go with you, red maiden. They will follow you into the deepest darkness, and beyond!
original_zh_text: 我的希望与您同在，红衣姑娘。它将随您深入至暗，直至彼岸！
translated_text: My hope is with you, Red Girl. They will follow you to the deepest darkness, even further!
secondary_translated_text: Mon espoir est avec toi, fille rouge. Ils vous suivront jusqu ' au plus profond des ténèbres, encore plus loin !

original_en_text: Fierce red-shells nest across these wide caverns. Battle with them is most intense. Impressive are the warriors of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪占满荒野洞穴，它们是个好对手。这里的生物也比髓骨地更凶残。
translated_text: The burning red shells make nests in the wide caves. The fight against them is fierce. The soldiers of Pharaoh are impressive.
secondary_translated_text: Les coquilles rouges ardentes font leurs nids dans les larges grottes. La lutte contre eux est acharnée. Les soldats de Pharaon sont impressionnants.

translated_text: Map of the Deep Dock
secondary_translated_text: Carte du dock profond

original_en_text: <hpage>Even if only your shadow remains, to release your mother’s grip my blade would see it slain.<page>Then why hold, even this moment? Surely terror hasn’t suddenly claimed your hardened heart?<page>Take the final plunge, spider. Join us in my drowning palace, and let oblivion swallow us all.<hpage>Oblivion may take you, child. My own life, I shall not sacrifice.<hpage>I have survived the fury of your land. I have borne its barbs and its blades, and I have seen wonder behind its dangers.<hpage>But always, child, I remain a daughter of Hallownest. And the void below all things, that darkness I will fear no longer...
original_zh_text: <hpage>就算你只剩一道暗影，我也会斩断你母亲的丝线。<page>那还犹豫什么？难道你害怕了？<page>跳下来啊，小蜘蛛！和我一同沉溺，让虚无吞噬我们！<hpage>虚无或许能吞噬你，但我绝不献祭自己。<hpage>我熬过了纺络的无数荆棘，也在危机中见证过奇迹。<hpage>但我永远是圣巢之女。对万物之底的虚空……再无畏惧！
translated_text: <hpage>Even if only the shadow remains, my sword will kill it and unleash the bondage of my mother.<page>Why do you insist now? Does fear suddenly take away your cold heart?<page>The last shot, Spider. Join me in my drowning palace, that oblivion may swallow us up.<hpage>My child, you may forget my life, I will not sacrifice it. "<hpage>I have survived the wrath of your nation. I endured its thorns and blades, and I saw the miracle behind its perils.<hpage>But forever, my son, I am Kenneth's daughter. The emptiness under all things, I shall no longer fear the darkness.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Même si seulement l'ombre reste, mon épée la tuera et déchaînera l'esclavage de ma mère.<page>Pourquoi insiste-t - il maintenant ? Est-ce que la peur vous enlève soudainement votre cœur froid ?<page>Le dernier coup, Spider. Rejoignez-moi dans mon palais noyé, afin que l'oubli puisse nous engloutir.<hpage>Mon enfant, tu peux oublier ma vie, je ne la sacrifierai pas. "<hpage>J'ai survécu à la colère de votre nation. J'ai enduré ses épines et ses lames, et j'ai vu le miracle derrière ses périls.<hpage>Mais pour toujours, mon fils, je suis la fille de Kenneth. Le vide sous toutes choses, je ne craindrai plus les ténèbres.

original_en_text: Oooh! Greedy are you? Mean to poor li’l snitchbugs like us? Won’t survive out there without our secrets, oh no no!
original_zh_text: 小气鬼！欺负老实虫？没我们的秘密帮衬你在外头活不过三天！
translated_text: oh! Are you greedy? is this a bad thing for a small journalist like us? I can't live without a secret.
secondary_translated_text: Ooh ! Es-tu gourmand ? Est-ce une mauvaise chose pour un journaliste comme nous ? Je ne peux pas vivre sans un secret.

original_en_text: Our last race was grand, yes? But I see now I set too mild a challenge for one as spritely as yourself!<page>I prepared only to race, but you arrived bringing destiny! In you my wish may finally be granted, the barriers of speed broken wide!<page>Are you prepared nimble bug? The time is upon us. The final test for the swift and spry!
original_zh_text: 上回比赛还不错吧？但我还是低估你了！<page>原本只想跑个痛快，但你说不定能实现我突破速度极限的愿望！<page>灵巧的虫子，时候到了！准备好突破速度的桎梏了吗？
translated_text: The last game was great, wasn't it? However, I found that the challenge I suggested was too modest for an energetic person like you.<page>I was preparing for the race, but you brought my destiny! In you, my wish has finally come true, and the speed wall has been broken!<page>you ready? It's time for the final test!
secondary_translated_text: Le dernier match était génial, n'était-ce pas ? Cependant, j'ai trouvé que le défi que j'avais suggéré était trop modeste pour une personne énergique comme vous.<page>Je me préparais à la course, mais tu as apporté mon destin ! En toi, mon souhait s'est enfin réalisé, et le mur de vitesse a été brisé !<page>Vous êtes prêt ? Il est temps pour le test final !

original_en_text: Miss grown-up has hunted much, so soon is time for Nuu to venture out, she thinks. Keep your sights keen, for to meet in the wilds would be a delight!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐这么能干，努努也该出门探险了！期待在荒野偶遇哦！
translated_text: She believes that adults and young women are already hunting a lot, so soon it's time for Noo to go on an adventure. Keep an eye out, it will be fun to meet in the wild!
secondary_translated_text: Elle croit que les adultes et les jeunes femmes chassent déjà beaucoup, alors il est bientôt temps pour Noo de partir à l'aventure. Gardez un œil ouvert, ce sera amusant de rencontrer dans la nature !

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>Are you too a prisoner here, small bug? If we ally our efforts, escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! Just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！锁住了吧？真可怜！<hpage>又见面了，小毛贼。你也被关起来了？我们联手的话，越狱容易得多。<page>哦嚯嚯！想得美，监狱哪有盟友！你撞墙玩去吧，我找宝贝去咯！
translated_text: Oh, ho! You seem to be a bit stuck! What a pity!<hpage>bug, are you a prisoner here too? Together, they make it easier to escape.<page>what? are you kidding me? We have no allies in prison! When I went to sniff, you hit the wall!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ho ! Vous semblez un peu coincé ! Quel dommage !<hpage>« Bug, tu es prisonnier ici aussi ? Ensemble, ils rendent plus facile de s'échapper.<page>Quoi ? Tu plaisantes avec moi ? Nous n'avons pas d'alliés en prison ! Quand je suis allé renifler, tu as heurté le mur !

original_en_text: A scroll detailing the scents and tastes of Pharloom’s various bugs and beasts.
original_zh_text: 这本册子记录着纺络虫兽的气味与口感。
translated_text: A scroll detailing the smell and taste of various insects and beasts in the fallout.
secondary_translated_text: Un rouleau détaillant l'odeur et le goût de divers insectes et bêtes dans les retombées.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! Nuu had fear that the awful rumblings of the world or sticky black threads had snatched you away from her!<hpage>I have survived, Nuu, and shall fight on while my strength remains.<hpage>The kingdom has grown darkly dangerous, but this hearth-home seems to still provide some safety. I suggest you remain here for now.<page>Of course! Nuu shall stay inside. The sickening sense of those twisted threads has spoilt the joy of my venturings.<page>You though, miss grown-up... is now not the perfect time to fully complete our journal?<page>The world-rumblings will surely have scared up many creatures from their hiding places! So go and hunt, and show sweet Nuu what you learn!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！还以为你被地震或黑灾吃掉啦！<hpage>就差一点，不过我没事。<hpage>外面愈发混乱，但这还算安全。你暂时别出去。<page>努努才不出去！那些扭曲的丝线太讨厌了，毁了探险的兴致！<page>但大姐姐……现在不正是完善记录的好时机？<page>地震肯定把怪物都吓出洞了！快去打猎给努努开眼界吧！
translated_text: Your Majesty, Miss! Nu is afraid that the terrible noise of the world and the black lines of stickyness will take you away from her!<hpage>i'm alive, i'll fight as long as i have my strength.<hpage>The kingdom had become more dangerous, but the fireplace still seemed to offer safety. I recommend you stay here for a while.<page>of course! The boy stays inside. An unpleasant feeling of distorted lines ruined the fun of the adventure.<page>But you, my lord, miss. Isn't it the best time to write a diary?<page>The end of the world will certainly scare many beings and cannot hide! So go hunting and show the cute Noo what you've learned!
secondary_translated_text: Votre Majesté, mademoiselle ! Nu a peur que le bruit terrible du monde et les lignes noires de la collance vous éloignent d'elle !<hpage>Je suis en vie, je me battrai tant que j'ai ma force.<hpage>Le royaume était devenu plus dangereux, mais la cheminée semblait encore offrir de la sécurité. Je vous recommande de rester ici un moment.<page>Bien sûr ! Le garçon reste à l'intérieur. Une sensation désagréable de lignes déformées ruinait le plaisir de l'aventure.<page>Mais vous, mon seigneur, mademoiselle. N'est-ce pas le meilleur moment pour écrire un journal ?<page>La fin du monde va certainement effrayer beaucoup d'êtres et ne peut pas se cacher ! Alors, allez à la chasse et montrez à la mignonne Noo ce que vous avez appris !

original_en_text: Why spurn a little duel, sister? Surely it would put us in good stead for the trials ahead!<hpage>If we were to duel it would doubtless be illuminating. Unfortunately, I lack the time for such frivolity. Farewell, sirs.
original_zh_text: 干嘛拒绝呢，切磋下嘛！就当战前热身！<hpage>切磋的好处……对你更多。我没空陪你玩，告辞。
translated_text: why do you refuse a small fight? This will help for future tests!<hpage>If you fight, it will surely be exciting. Unfortunately, there is no time to discuss such an argument. Goodbye, gentlemen.
secondary_translated_text: Pourquoi refusez-vous un petit combat ? Cela aidera à réaliser de futurs tests !<hpage>Si vous vous battez, ce sera très excitant. Malheureusement, il n'y a pas de temps pour discuter d'un tel argument. Au revoir messieurs.

original_en_text: <hpage>Cowards. Here you hide, even as you cause your own land’s demise.
original_zh_text: <hpage>懦夫。你们亲手葬送自己的土地，却躲在此处。
translated_text: <hpage>Cowards, even if they destroy their own land, they hide here.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Les lâches, même s'ils détruisent leur propre terre, se cachent ici.

original_en_text: Ka, va! Your shell is ridden with those gruesome maggots. It was a foolish choice of yours to swim in their sickly pools.<hpage>This was by no means desired, Shakra. For now, I think it best you remain at limb’s length. <hpage>I shall not abide this infestation long. By Silk or by rest I shall soon see myself cleansed.
original_zh_text: 咔呀！你的壳上爬满了恶心的蛆虫。在那些毒水池子里游泳真是太蠢了。<hpage>我也不想这样，沙克拉。你最好离远点。<hpage>我不会让这些蛆虫待太久的，靠灵丝或休整自会清除。
translated_text: Stop it, wow! Your shell is full of horrible worms. Swimming in their sick pool is a foolish choice.<hpage>That's not what we want, Shakra. I think we'd better keep some distance now.<hpage>I cannot bear this aggression for long. Whether it is silk or rest, it will be cleansed at once.
secondary_translated_text: Arrêtez-le, wow ! Votre coquille est pleine de vers horribles. Nager dans sa piscine malade est un choix stupide.<hpage>Ce n'est pas ce que je veux, Shakira. Je pense que nous ferions mieux de garder une certaine distance maintenant.<hpage>Je ne peux pas supporter longtemps cette agression. Que ce soit soie ou repos, il sera nettoyé immédiatement.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You seem to have lost your way upon the course. Surely it was only an error? You already seem recovered of your lapse.<page>You are eager to run again, yes, yes? Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 看来你迷路了，肯定是小失误！<page>调整好了？那就再比一次吧！
translated_text: That's a smart mistake! I seem to get lost on the course. Isn't this just a mistake? You seem to have recovered from your mistake.<page>You want to run again, right? Let's fly together!
secondary_translated_text: C'est une erreur intelligente ! J'ai l'impression de me perdre sur le parcours. N'est-ce pas juste une erreur ? Vous semblez vous remettre de votre erreur.<page>Tu veux courir à nouveau, non ? Volaons ensemble !

original_en_text: ...One can visit the past, but then memories become contradictory...<page>...When the call rings out again, will you let your previous actions cloud your vision?<page>...By claw, by voice... History always rises to meet us...
original_zh_text: ……即便往昔可以重访，但记忆终将悖逆……<page>……当唤声再起，你会让昔日的抉择蒙蔽双眼么？<page>……以爪为刃，以声为引……历史永远不会等候我们……
translated_text: ... People can look back, but their memories are contradictory.<page>... When the phone rings again, will you be fooled by your previous actions?<page>... Through the claws, through the sound, history always stands up and welcomes us.
secondary_translated_text: ... Les gens peuvent regarder en arrière, mais leurs mémoires sont contradictoires.<page>... Quand le téléphone sonnera à nouveau, vous serez trompé par vos actions précédentes ?<page>...À travers les griffes, à travers le son, l'histoire se lève toujours et nous accueille.

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<page>Think of all the delectable learnings can we dig out of the creatures living here!
original_zh_text: 哎呀，大姐姐拒绝努努？好狠心！<page>想想能从这些生物身上挖出多少美味的知识啊！
translated_text: Oh, Mama. Lord, will you deny poor Nu? Lots of acid!<page>Think of some interesting things you can learn from the creatures that live here!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, maman. Seigneur, refuserez-vous le pauvre Nu ? Beaucoup d'acide !<page>Pensez à quelques choses intéressantes que vous pouvez apprendre des créatures qui vivent ici !

translated_text: Step diagram of explosion
secondary_translated_text: Diagramme par étapes de l'explosion

original_en_text: But wait! Before you depart. Your exceptional skill requires an equally fine reward!<page>This shining shard of ancient mask is yours! Take it. Cherish it. And know, you shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 等等，临走前再送个配得上你的宝贝！<page>这块远古面甲碎片归你了！谢谢你，希望你永远铭记这场较量！
translated_text: But wait! Great skills need great rewards before you leave!<page>This piece of ancient mask is yours! Accept it, you know. I care. I will always be grateful.
secondary_translated_text: Mais attendez ! Les grandes compétences ont besoin de grandes récompenses avant de partir !<page>Ce masque antique est à vous ! Acceptez-le, vous savez. Je me soucie. Je serai toujours reconnaissante.

original_en_text: This is a fine shiny-shiny, ain’t it? Those dirty old raggedies like to carry these around, and we like to snitch ‘em away when we can! O-ho-ho!
original_zh_text: 亮晶晶的小玩意！那些破烂朝圣者喜欢带这个，就从他们身上顺的！哦嚯嚯！
translated_text: This is a beautiful luster. The dirty old garbage loves to carry these around and wants to report them as much as possible! Oh, ho!
secondary_translated_text: C'est une belle lustre. La sale vieille ordure adore les emporter et veut les signaler autant que possible ! Oh, ho !

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, you make Nuu so happy! Hunt down the creatures of this land, and record them in this scroll!
original_zh_text: 哇大姐姐你真好！猎杀这里的生物，把见闻记在本子上！
translated_text: Mom, you made Nu so happy! Follow the creatures of this land and record them in this scroll!
secondary_translated_text: Maman, tu as rendu nous si heureux ! Suivez les créatures de cette terre et enregistrez-les dans ce livre !

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings Shakra, in these drifts consumed by crust and sand.<hpage>These caverns have returned to nature, but I see evidence of bold structures buried throughout.<page>The shells of their builders rest in a tower above. A grand tribe they seemed, and strong fighters I’m sure. Alas, they exist now only as hardened husks.<page>Lament, Child Wielding Needle! We lived too late to match their claws.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。这里已被沙岩吞没了。<hpage>洞穴虽然复归原貌，但岩层里似乎埋着宏伟建筑。<page>建造者的尸壳堆在上面的塔里呢。当年肯定是强盛部落，也有不少勇士。可惜都只剩下空壳了。<page>可惜啊，使针的小姑娘，我们生不逢时，无缘与他们较量。
translated_text: <hpage>In these drifting, swallowed up by the crust and sand, there is a beautiful greeting to the Sacchiara.<hpage>The cave has returned to nature, but we could see evidence of bold structures hidden throughout the cave.<page>The architect's shell was on top of the tower above. They look like a great tribe, and I believe they are strong warriors. " Now it exists as a mere shell.<page>Poor needle! We were too late for their nails.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Dans ces dérives, englouties par la croûte et le sable, il y a une belle salutation à la Sacchiara.<hpage>La grotte est revenue à la nature, mais nous pouvions voir des preuves de structures audacieuses cachées dans toute la grotte.<page>La coquille de l'architecte était au sommet de la tour ci-dessus. Ils ressemblent à une grande tribu, et je pense qu ' ils sont de forts guerriers.« Maintenant, il existe comme une simple coquille.<page>Pauvre aiguille ! Il était trop tard pour les ongles.

original_en_text: Don’t despair, pilgrim frieeeee-eeend,<br>Lift your sight and raise your voice!<br>Have no fear, pilgrim truuuuu-uuuuue,<br>Believing is a happy choice!<page>Hoy there! Aren’t these fields marvellous? And above us are the bountiful moors, where every pilgrim can fill their belly!<hpage>These hot fields are a wonder indeed, but hunters prowl the long grass. Playing your instrument will only alert them to your presence.<page>Well then, alert them I shall! For where many gather, great songs are sung!
original_zh_text: 莫沮丧啊朝圣友，<br>昂首放歌莫踌躇！<page>别畏惧啊同道虫，<br>心怀信念最幸福！<page>看这原野多壮美啊！上方沼地还能让每个朝圣者饱腹！<hpage>原野虽好，长草中却有猎手潜伏。奏乐只会暴露行踪。<page>暴露又何妨！聚在一块，正好一起高歌！
translated_text: Do not despair, my friend of the pilgrim.<br>Lift your eyes and raise your voice!<br>Fear not, pilgrim Truuu @ uu<br>I think this is a happy choice!<page>Hello, is this area great? Above us there is a fertile wilderness, where the pilgrims can fill their stomachs.<hpage>The hot fields are truly a miracle, but the hunters wander among the long grass. Playing an instrument is only a reminder of your existence.<page>I'll remind you! A great song is sung in a place where a large number of people gather!
secondary_translated_text: Ne désespère pas, mon ami du pèlerin.<br>Levez les yeux et élèvez votre voix !<br>N'ayez pas peur, pèlerin Truuu @ uu<br>Je pense que c'est un choix heureux !<page>Bonjour, c'est génial cette zone ? Au-dessus de nous, il y a un désert fertile, où les pèlerins peuvent se remplir le ventre.<hpage>Les champs chauds sont véritablement un miracle, mais les chasseurs errent parmi les longues herbes. Jouer d'un instrument n'est qu ' un rappel de votre existence.<page>Je vais vous rappeler ! Une grande chanson est chantée dans un endroit où un grand nombre de personnes se rassemblent !

original_en_text: <hpage>Some pilgrims have made an encampment in a safer place than this, high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>They would surely allow you to stay there, if you could resist causing them mischief.<page>An en-camp-ment, eh? Sounds like a jolly place for old Grindle! Mayhaps we’ll have a sniff around later.<page>That’s a good tip, that. And you’ve just done given it to us for free! O-hoho, head fulla muck you got!
original_zh_text: <hpage>圣堡另一边的高处，朝圣者们新建了安全营地。<hpage>你老实点的话，他们应该能留你。<page>朝圣者的营地？听着像个能偷光光的好地方！<page>这情报不赖，还是白送的！你个蠢脑袋！
translated_text: <hpage>Some of the pilgrims camped on the other side of the castle, which was safer than here.<hpage>If you can bear to play pranks on them, they will keep you there.<page>Summer camp? It seems like a happy place for the old Grindel! Missy, we'll see later.<page>This is a good memory. You just gave it to me for free! I have shit in my head.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Certains pèlerins campèrent de l'autre côté du château, qui était plus sûr qu ' ici.<hpage>Si vous pouvez supporter de jouer des farces sur eux, ils vous garderont là.<page>Camp d'été ? On dirait un endroit heureux pour le vieux Grindel ! - Missy, on verra plus tard.<page>C'est une bonne mémoire. Tu viens de me le donner gratuitement ! J'ai de la merde dans la tête.

original_en_text: Well well! Seems I won the last of your rosaries. Luck is granted to the faithful, it is sung, so I must be very faithful indeed.<page>If you happen on any more rosaries though, I’d be well happy to play you again.
original_zh_text: 哎呀！赢光你的念珠了。都说运气眷顾虔诚者，看来我够虔诚。<page>等你再带着念珠的时候，我很乐意跟你再玩几局。
translated_text: I got it! I got it! I have earned your last rosary. Luck is for believers and songs, so I really must be faithful. "<page>When we come out to Rosario again, we want to play with you again.
secondary_translated_text: Je l'ai ! Je l'ai eu ! J'ai reçu votre dernier chapelet. La chance est pour les croyants et les chansons, donc je dois vraiment être fidèle. "<page>Quand nous reviendrons à Rosario, nous voulons jouer à nouveau avec vous.

translated_text: bronze marker pen
secondary_translated_text: Marqueur de bronze Pen

original_en_text: <hpage>Already, I have cut down many of this lands inhabitants, but I agree, documenting those creatures is a worthwhile undertaking.<hpage>If time still permits, I shall do as you wish.<page>Ma! How wonderful for Nuu! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我的确已斩杀这片土地上的许多住民，但记录这些生物是值得的。<hpage>若时间允许，我会尽力帮你。<page>好呀！努努太高兴啦！去吧！狩猎吧，掠食吧，开始我们的研究吧！
translated_text: <hpage>I have killed many inhabitants of this land, but I agree that recording these creatures is a worthwhile undertaking.<hpage>If time permits, I will do your will.<page>Mommy! Nuru is great! go now! Let's start hunting, hunting, and learning!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'ai tué beaucoup d'habitants de cette terre, mais je suis d'accord pour dire que l'enregistrement de ces créatures est une entreprise valable.<hpage>Si le temps le permet, je ferai votre volonté.<page>maman ! Nuru est super ! Allez-y ! Chassez, chassez et apprenons !

original_en_text: Hoho, free at last! Locked up in here much too long, we was. Nasty place to keep a poor little snitchbug like Grindle.<page>Hoy, you’re smellin’ fancy! You got some pockets under your cloak? Hidin’ away some goodies for us to pilfer?<hpage>Beware your greed, thief. You’d be dead before your claw reached my cloak.<page>O-hoho! Never mind then, bully. Plenty of tasties lying around for us down here. We smells ‘em!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！终于自由啦！这破牢房关了格林德尔大爷太久啦！<page>你身上有股阔气味儿！斗篷里藏啥好东西了？<hpage>管好你的爪子，小偷。碰到我斗篷前你就会没命。<page>哎哟！开个玩笑嘛！底下好东西够多了，犯不着冒险！
translated_text: Free at last! I've been locked up here for a long time. It's a troublesome place to raise a poor little whistleblower like Grindell.<page>Hey, that smells good! Is there a pocket under the mantle? Hide the good things to steal.<hpage>Beware, you greedy thief, before your nails touch my mantle, you will die.<page>Oh, ho! It's all right, bully. Lots of delicious things are waiting for you. I could smell it!
secondary_translated_text: Libre enfin ! J'ai été enfermé ici depuis longtemps. C'est un endroit gênant pour élever un pauvre petit dénonciateur comme Grindell.<page>Hé, ça sent bon ! Y a-t - il une poche sous le manteau ? Cachez les bonnes choses à voler.<hpage>Prends garde, voleur avide, avant que tes ongles ne touchent mon manteau, tu mourras.<page>Oh, ho ! - Tout va bien, Bully. Beaucoup de choses délicieuses vous attendent. Je pouvais l'odeur !

translated_text: Shell Map
secondary_translated_text: Shell Map

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master has been found, Shakra. Your task in these lands is finished. Will you now return to your tribe? <page>I shall not return, Hornet Wielding Needle... I cannot. To leave my tribe’s nest-plains, that journey has only one direction. <page>This has always been our way, our long leaving, for those few who survive till age seeks to claim their shell, and those fewer who choose to send them on.<page>But these lands, Pharloom... My nest-plains I once saw so grand, now they become small. A place for birth, and growing, but a place too narrow to live a bug’s life full.
original_zh_text: <hpage>既然你已经找到导师，任务完成，打算回部落吗？<page>回不去了……离开部落只有一条路可走。<page>这是我们传统，我们的远行。活够了的年长者自行出走，少数选择送行的亲属也不能再回。<page>从前觉得部落很大，但到了纺络，才知道部落有多小。那是我出生、成长的地方，但容不下虫活一辈子。
translated_text: <hpage>Your master has been found, Shakra. Your mission in this land has been completed. do you want to go back to your tribe?<page>I'm not coming back, honeycomb... I can't, I'll leave my tribe's nest and go to the plains. The journey is one way.<page>That was the way we did it, and we were apart for a long time, because a few people who were alive wanted to retrieve the body, and a few people chose to hand over the body.<page>But this land, Pharaoh. I once saw the plain of my nest very grand, but now it is getting smaller. It's where you were born and raised, but it's too narrow to live a full life like an insect.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ton maître a été trouvé, Shakra. Votre mission sur cette terre est terminée. Tu veux retourner dans ta tribu ?<page>Je ne reviens pas Honeycomb... Je ne peux pas, je quitterai le nid de ma tribu et irais dans les plaines. Le voyage est un moyen.<page>C'est ainsi que nous l'avons fait, et nous avons été séparés pendant longtemps, parce que quelques personnes qui étaient en vie voulaient récupérer le corps, et quelques personnes ont choisi de le remettre.<page>Mais ce pays, Pharaon. J'ai vu une fois la plaine de mon nid très grande, mais maintenant il devient de plus en plus petit. C'est là où vous êtes né et élevé, mais c'est trop étroit pour vivre une vie pleine comme un insecte.

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... Her strength was needed, what was left, to cut Pharloom free of its black thread threat. It was a savage act, no doubt, but the reason was just.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只巨型古蚁才刚死不久……但她的存在……<page>难道是她？是她在维持这里的生态？……但既然她死了，接下来会怎么样？<hpage>会枯萎，并消逝……而她是死在我针下。<page>你？为什么？为什么要杀掉这么关键的存在？<hpage>这说来话长……我需要她的力量来斩断黑灾诅咒。这虽然残忍，但有必要。<hpage>假以时日，这些洞穴或许能重生、繁盛……但需几代虫的努力。<hpage>这份重任，就要靠你这样的小虫播撒下第一颗种子了。
translated_text: A huge old ant. Her death seems to have recently passed, but here is her.<page>is that her? is that right? What is the power that supports this cave? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither away and fade away. Sadly, my needle was the one that killed her.<page>are you, lady? but why not? Why would you destroy something so important?<hpage>What remained, difficult to explain easily, required her strength to remove the threat of the black line of the Farms. There is no doubt that this is a barbaric act, but the reason is just.<hpage>Over time, the caves may see the opportunity to grow and prosper again, but regeneration itself is a difficult task. Longer than life, many lives.<hpage>If you want to be successful, you have to rely on bugs like yourself to sow the first seeds.
secondary_translated_text: Une grosse vieille fourmière. Sa mort semble être récente, mais la voilà.<page>C'est elle ? Est-ce correct ? Quelle est la force qui soutient cette grotte ? Si c'est le cas, qu ' est-ce qui se passera maintenant ?<hpage>Ils s'en vont et s'en vont, Malheureusement, c'est mon aiguille qui l'a tuée.<page>C'est vous, madame ? Mais pourquoi pas ? Pourquoi détruire quelque chose d'aussi important ?<hpage>Ce qui restait, difficile à expliquer facilement, demandait sa force pour éliminer la menace de la ligne noire des Fermes. Il ne fait aucun doute que c'est un acte barbare, mais la raison est juste.<hpage>Au fil du temps, les grottes peuvent voir l'occasion de grandir et de prospérer à nouveau, mais la régénération en elle-même est une tâche difficile. Plus longtemps que la vie, beaucoup de vies.<hpage>Si vous voulez réussir, vous devez compter sur des insectes comme vous pour semer les premières graines.

original_en_text: <page=M>Hold it, Old One! That intruder writhing within your shell... <page=S>Our ritual ain’t gonna work while that cruel creature’s present. We’d be tugging at its memories as much as your own.<hpage>Then free me of the affliction. Surely you have the skill?<page=S>Not for this! Our power’s all of soul and that thing’s all physical. You’re gonna need more traditional tools of healing.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: <page=C>慢着！古老者，您壳里那扭动的异物……<page=S>有这东西在，仪式会同时拽出它的记忆。<hpage>那就替我除了它，你们不是擅长各种法术吗？<page=S>治不了！我们擅灵魂之术，这东西却是实体。您得去找传统医具。<page=B>去灰沼找被钟心镇放逐的小雅纳碧，听说她在那片湿地里苟活。<page=B>她有工具，也足够机灵，肯定能活到现在。
translated_text: <page=M>Hold on, old man! The intruder is huddled in your shell.<page=S>When a cruel creature appears, our rituals no longer work. We will extract that memory, just as we extract your own memory.<hpage>Release me from my suffering. You need those skills, right?<page=S>Not a reason! All power comes from the soul, and all power comes from the body. We need more traditional therapies.<page=B>An asylum seeker looking for Balkhardt. As far as I know she was driven out of the wet wilderness.<page=B>He has the tools to carry out his mission, and the cunning to survive to the present.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Attends, vieil homme ! L'intrus est accroché dans votre coquille.<page=S>Quand une créature cruelle apparaît, nos rituels ne fonctionnent plus. Nous allons extraire cette mémoire, tout comme nous extrairons votre propre mémoire.<hpage>Libère-moi de ma souffrance. Vous avez besoin de ces compétences, non ?<page=S>Pas une raison ! Tout pouvoir vient de l'âme, et tout pouvoir vient du corps. Nous avons besoin de thérapies plus traditionnelles.<page=B>Un demandeur d'asile à la recherche de Balkhardt Pour autant que je sache, elle a été chassée du désert humide.<page=B>Il a les outils pour mener à bien sa mission, et la ruse pour survivre jusqu ' au présent.

original_en_text: When travelling in unfriendly lands, it is important to remember safe places to camp.<br><br>These pins will mark benches and other rest spots on your map.
original_zh_text: 在险地旅行要记好安全营地。<br><br>这些图钉能够标记长椅和休息点。
translated_text: When traveling in unfriendly lands, it is important to remember a safe campground.<br><br>These pins mark benches and other breaks on the map.
secondary_translated_text: Lorsque vous voyagez dans des terres hostiles, il est important de se souvenir d'un camping sûr.<br><br>Ces épingles marquent les bancs et d'autres pauses sur la carte.

original_en_text: Nuu takes time with her creatures, she must inspect closely. Thick arms, flakey hair, delicate eyes... Nuu will inspect it all!
original_zh_text: 努努研究可仔细了！粗胳膊、鳞片毛发、精致眼睛……全要检查！
translated_text: Nu is spending time with creatures and must be carefully investigated. Thick arms, messy hair, delicate eyesNuu checks it all out!
secondary_translated_text: Nu passe du temps avec des créatures et doit être soigneusement étudiée. Des bras épais, des cheveux en désordre, des yeux délicats, Nuu vérifie tout !

original_en_text: Maiden, strong, wreathed in red,<br>Shield her shell, bless her thread!<br>She fights for us until the end,<br>Please protect my dearest friee-end!
original_zh_text: 红绸披身的坚强战士啊，<br>为我们奋战至最终时刻！<br>护佑她的甲壳，祝福她的灵丝，<br>我们的辉光，我的宝贵挚友！
translated_text: A girl wearing a red wreath,<br>Protect her shell and bless her line!<br>She fought to the end.<br>Please protect your dear friend!
secondary_translated_text: Une fille portant une couronne rouge,<br>Protégez sa coquille et bénissez sa ligne !<br>Elle a combattu jusqu ' au bout.<br>Veuillez protéger votre cher ami !

original_en_text: If chance allows, visit the tower above.
