It is an impressive sight, not overgrown by the crust upon these caverns, but rather formed full of the material itself. <page>If the old tribe of this place were able to guide its growth to such grand degree... then they possessed a power to rival even that Citadel.
original_zh_text: 有空的话去上面塔楼看看，挺壮观的。那可不是岩壳自然生长形成的，而是用整块材料塑造而成。<page>如果这里的古老部落能引导砂岩生长至这等规模……那他们拥有的力量不逊于圣堡。
translated_text: If you have the opportunity, you can also visit the tower. This is an impressive sight. The crust of these caves is not lush, and is filled with the matter itself.<page>If the ancient tribes here were able to lead their development to this extent, their power would be comparable to the fortress.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous en avez l'occasion, vous pouvez également visiter la tour. C'est une vue impressionnante. La croûte de ces grottes n'est pas luxuriante et est remplie de la matière elle-même.<page>Si les anciennes tribus ici étaient capables de mener leur développement dans cette mesure, leur puissance serait comparable à celle de la forteresse.

original_en_text: These strange, shuffling pilgrims... In the camp below they were docile enough, but up here they seem to have lost their senses. They cry out to the darkness and attack their fellow travellers.<page>Yakkanesh! Keep your weapon drawn and your bearings true! The way ahead is winding, and to lose one’s way invites only death.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 那些朝圣者……在下面还算安分，到这上面就发疯了。对着黑暗哭喊，还攻击路人。<page>雅卡内什！握紧你的武器，可别走神了！前面的路曲折危险，迷路就是死。<page>我是部落的测绘师，一直在画这里的地图。想要可以拿物资来换。
translated_text: These strange, dragged-foot pilgrims - they are docile in the camp below, but here they seem to be losing their minds. They shouted in the darkness and attacked their comrades.<page>Yakanesh takes out your gun and points it in the right direction! The road ahead is winding, and if you get lost, you will only die.<page>I was a tribal pilot mapping this land, and if you want, you can exchange goods and merchandise.
secondary_translated_text: Ces pèlerins étranges, traînés, ils sont dociles dans le camp en bas, mais ici ils semblent perdre la tête. Ils crièrent dans l'obscurité et attaquèrent leurs camarades.<page>Yakanesh sort son arme et le pointe dans la bonne direction ! La route est sinueuse, et si vous vous perdez, vous ne mourrez que.<page>J'étais un pilote tribal cartographiant cette terre, et si vous voulez, vous pouvez échanger des marchandises et des marchandises.

original_en_text: Ma, ma! Much hunting has you done, and so many sweet little creatures in our records!<page>Nuu is drooling from such excess of learnings! Please keep working, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 呀呀！砍了这么多可爱小生物！<page>知识多到流口水！大姐姐继续努力呀！
translated_text: Mom, Mom! You hunt a lot, and there are a lot of cute little creatures in our records!<page>Noo is excited to learn a lot! Keep up your work, miss!
secondary_translated_text: Maman, Maman ! Vous chassez beaucoup, et il y a beaucoup de petites créatures mignonnes dans nos disques !<page>Noo est enthousiaste à apprendre beaucoup ! Continuez votre travail, mademoiselle !

original_en_text: In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.
original_zh_text: 在我们部落，战士们都这么打招呼。虽然你看着像个刚破卵的娃娃，但架势、武器、动作都像个战士。
translated_text: The soldiers of my country greeted me like this. You are a newborn child, but you are also a soldier. Your position, your weapons, and your actions show it. "
secondary_translated_text: Les soldats de mon pays m'ont salué comme ça. Vous êtes un enfant nouveau-né, mais vous êtes aussi un soldat. Votre position, vos armes, vos actions le montrent. »

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>We meet again, little thief. Are you familiar with this place?<hpage>If we ally our efforts, our escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! You can just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！锁住了吧？真可怜！<hpage>又见面了，小毛贼。你对这里很熟么？<hpage>我们联手的话，越狱容易得多。<page>哦嚯嚯！想得美，监狱哪有盟友！你撞墙玩去吧，我找宝贝去咯！
translated_text: Oh, ho! You seem to be a bit stuck! What a pity!<hpage>See you again, thief. do you know this place?<hpage>Together, they make it easier to escape.<page>what? are you kidding me? We have no allies in prison! I throw myself against the wall and smell it!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ho ! Vous semblez un peu coincé ! Quel dommage !<hpage>Rendez-vous, voleur. Connaissez-vous cet endroit ?<hpage>Ensemble, ils rendent plus facile de s'échapper.<page>Quoi ? Tu plaisantes avec moi ? Nous n'avons pas d'alliés en prison ! Je me jette contre le mur et je sent l'odeur !

original_en_text: <hpage>Safe journey, tall bug.<page>This is Pharloom, warrior. Safety is a myth.
original_zh_text: <hpage>祝你一路平安。<page>此地是纺络，战士。安全只是虚妄。
translated_text: <hpage>Hi, safe journey.<page>This is Pharaoh, soldier. Security is a myth.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Bonjour, voyage en sécurité.<page>C'est le Pharaon, soldat. La sécurité est un mythe.

translated_text: Kanika Pin
secondary_translated_text: Kanika Pin (en anglais)

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Seth. It is a welcome surprise to see you here amongst these festivities.<page>Hullo, hullo! Yes, my wandering was long, and I began to fear I would meet my end in those sticky swamps below.<page>How lucky I was to stumble upon the home of these friendly revellers!<page>They said I could be a flea here with them, so of course I agreed. Seems as good a place as any to call home, at least for a time.<page>Now I just need to grow a little fur and sprout some wings, eh? Ha ha!
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，赛斯。没想到在庆典能遇见你。<page>是啊！之前在下面粘糊沼泽差点没命了。<page>幸亏遇到这群办庆典的好心虫！<page>他们说我可以当个跳蚤住下，我当然同意！这地方看着很适合安家<page>现在就只差长点毛和翅膀了！哈哈！
translated_text: <hpage>Hi there, Seth. It's great to see you on our celebration.<page>Hello, hello, hello, hello. Yes, I've been wandering for a long time, and I've begun to worry that I might die in the sticky swamp below.<page>I was lucky enough to come across this friendly party house!<page>I was told I could make a flea here, so of course I agreed. For anyone, it seems like the perfect place to go home, at least for a while.<page>Then you need fur and wings, right? ha ha ha!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Bonjour, Seth ! C'est génial de vous voir à notre célébration.<page>Bonjour, bonjour, bonjour, bonjour ! Oui, j'ai erré depuis longtemps, et j'ai commencé à craindre que je ne mourrais dans le marécage collant en dessous.<page>J'ai eu la chance de rencontrer cette maison de fête sympathique !<page>On m'a dit que je pouvais faire une puce ici, alors bien sûr j'ai accepté. Pour tout le monde, il semble être l'endroit idéal pour rentrer chez soi, au moins pour un moment.<page>Vous avez besoin d'ailes et de fourrures, non ? Ha ha ha !

original_en_text: Swamps born in the Citadel’s shadow. There is evidence the waters here once ran clear.
original_zh_text: 圣堡阴影下的沼泽，这里的水曾经清澈过。
translated_text: The swamp was born in the shadow of the castle. There is evidence that the water was once clear.
secondary_translated_text: Le marécage est né à l'ombre du château. Il y a des preuves que l'eau était autrefois claire.

original_en_text: Tangled roads choked beneath bramble and root. The flora is often as deadly as the creatures who call this place home.
original_zh_text: 荆棘盘踞的险路。这里的植物和住民一样要命。
translated_text: The road was clogged with thorns and roots. These plants are usually just as deadly as the organisms they inhabit.
secondary_translated_text: La route était bouchée d'épines et de racines. Ces plantes sont généralement tout aussi mortelles que les organismes qu ' elles habitent.

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? The test of endurance remains at your ready! Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 要比赛吗？耐力测试随时恭候！
translated_text: What are you talking about, speed error? Prepare for a test of patience! "Let's Go Go!
secondary_translated_text: De quoi parle-t - on, erreur de vitesse ? Préparez-vous à une épreuve de patience !« Allons-y !

original_en_text: Zaza and I will fight through these cursed lands until every last one of the black-twisted fiends has been cut down!
original_zh_text: 扎扎和我会杀遍这些鬼地方，直到怪物一个不剩！
translated_text: Zaza and I will kill all the Black Twist Demons in this cursed land!
secondary_translated_text: Zaza et moi tuerons tous les démons de la Twist Noire dans cette terre maudite !

original_en_text: <page=M>Hurry, Old One. The ritual can’t commence while you remain host to that writhing root.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: <page=C>快去吧，古老者。有那根须在你体内，仪式没法开始。<page=B>去灰沼找被钟心镇放逐的小雅纳碧。她有工具，也足够机灵，肯定能活到现在。
translated_text: <page=M>Come here, old man. When you are the master of twisting the roots, the ceremony does not begin.<page=B>An asylum seeker looking for Balkhardt. As far as I know she was driven out of the wet wilderness.<page=B>He has the tools to carry out his mission, and the cunning to survive to the present.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Venez ici, vieil homme, quand vous êtes le maître de tordre les racines, la cérémonie ne commence pas.<page=B>Un demandeur d'asile à la recherche de Balkhardt Pour autant que je sache, elle a été chassée du désert humide.<page=B>Il a les outils pour mener à bien sa mission, et la ruse pour survivre jusqu ' au présent.

original_en_text: The red-shells, hiding through the fields, stalking the boney beasts. They are part of it, somehow, the life that flourishes here.<page>Even haunted, they seem to lose less of themselves... What anchor allows them to retain such strength?
original_zh_text: 红壳怪潜伏猎杀骨兽，是这里生态的一部分。<page>被丝咒侵蚀，它们却还能基本保持神智……靠的是什么？
translated_text: The red shell hid in the field and chased the bone beast. For some reason, they are part of life that thrives here.<page>Even if they become ghosts, they often don't seem to lose sight of themselves, and what anchor will keep them in this power?
secondary_translated_text: La coquille rouge se cacha dans le champ et poursuivit la bête osseuse. Pour une raison quelconque, ils font partie de la vie qui y prospère.<page>Même s'ils deviennent des fantômes, ils ne semblent souvent pas perdre de vue eux-mêmes, et quelle ancre les gardera dans ce pouvoir ?

original_en_text: Oh, but of course I sing! I am Sherma, a pilgrim just like you. I hear the call of the great Citadel just like every other devout soul.
original_zh_text: 当然要唱！我是谢尔玛，和你一样的朝圣者。圣堡在召唤每个虔诚信徒，你我都听见了！
translated_text: But, of course I sing! I'm a shaman, a pilgrim like you. Like other godly souls, I heard the call of the great castle.
secondary_translated_text: Mais bien sûr que je chante ! Je suis un chaman, un pèlerin comme vous. Comme d'autres âmes pieuses, j'ai entendu l'appel du grand château.

original_en_text: Hoy! Hoyyyy! You there! Get us out of here! Since when’s a little light thievery worth a lifelong sentence?
original_zh_text: 喂！喂喂！那边的！快放我们出去！偷点小东西至于关一辈子吗？
translated_text: Hey! Hey! I'm here! Get out of here! When does petty theft get a life sentence?
secondary_translated_text: Hey ! Hey ! Je suis ici ! Sortez d'ici ! Quand le petit vol obtient-il une peine de prison à vie ?

original_en_text: Our great Citadel has lost its voice, and now the black threads rise up to tear its shell apart. I fear holy Pharloom is truly dying...<page>But I still have hope, red maiden! Though kingdoms may fall, life endures still, and we bugs can build our lands anew!<hpage>I share your hope, Sherma. Remember though that whatever is built next belongs not to the past, but to you.<hpage>Your instincts are strong. Let it be those that guide you, rather than any reverence toward a kingdom’s corpse.<page>Oho, you flatter me so! But it is my fellows who shall guide me, those whose voices sing out still, even in these ruined times...
original_zh_text: 我们伟大的圣堡已失却歌声，如今黑丝翻涌要撕裂它的躯壳。恐怕神圣的纺络真要灭亡了……<page>但我仍怀希望，红衣姑娘！王国可以倾覆，但生命将延续，我们虫子能重建家园！<hpage>我与你同怀希望，谢尔玛。但记住，新建之物不属于过去，而属于你们。<hpage>你的直觉很强。让它指引你和这些虫子，别再膜拜王国的残骸。<page>噢，您过誉了！但指引我的该是我的同胞们——那些在废墟中仍放声歌唱的同胞……
translated_text: Our great castle has lost its sound, and a black line is rising up and tearing its shell. I'm worried that the Holy Pharaoh will really die.<page>There's hope, baby! The kingdom may perish, but life remains, and insects can rebuild our land.<hpage>I am just like you, shaman. But what you build next is not the past, it is yours.<hpage>Your intuition is strong. Do not fear the corpse of the kingdom to those who lead you.<page>Oh, you praise me! But it is my companions who have guided me, and their voices will sing in this time of ruin.
secondary_translated_text: Notre grand château a perdu son son son, et une ligne noire s'élève et déchire sa coquille. J'ai peur que le saint Pharaon mourra vraiment.<page>Il y a de l'espoir, bébé ! Le royaume peut périr, mais la vie reste, et les insectes peuvent reconstruire notre terre.<hpage>Je suis tout comme toi, chaman. Mais ce que vous construisez ensuite n'est pas le passé, c'est le vôtre.<hpage>Votre intuition est forte. Ne craignez pas le cadavre du royaume de ceux qui vous conduisent.<page>Tu me loues ! Mais ce sont mes compagnons qui m'ont guidé, et leurs voix chanteront en ce temps de ruine.

original_en_text: Hahhh... well met, sister. The task of hunting down these black-twisted fiends is no small one, eh? Still, we must not rest! Not while the cries of the innocent echo from every corner of the kingdom!
original_zh_text: 哈……又见面了。清剿这些黑怪可不轻松，对吧？但只要王国还有哭喊声，我和扎扎就不能歇！
translated_text: huh! Hello, sister. Isn't it easy to kill the devil? But you can't rest! " When the cry of the innocent resounds in every corner of the kingdom!
secondary_translated_text: Hah ! Bonjour, soeur. N'est-ce pas facile de tuer le diable ? Mais vous ne pouvez pas vous reposer !« Quand le cri des innocents résonne dans tous les coins du royaume !

original_en_text: Sign yourself as a snitch! And scoop up more rosaries from your bested foes. Just watch it when you’re snitchin’ that you don’t lose sum’a your own...
original_zh_text: 带上这个我们就是一伙的了。打赢了多赚，打输了赔本！
translated_text: Register as an Information Provider! Get more rosaries from your enemies. Be careful when reporting that you are going to lose something.
secondary_translated_text: Inscrivez-vous en tant que fournisseur d'informations ! Obtenir plus de chapelets de vos ennemis. Soyez prudent lorsque vous dites que vous allez perdre quelque chose.

original_en_text: What’s this? The spider arrives at last, here to stand acquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Your lands have yet to prove my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这是谁？小蜘蛛终于到了，在伟大的圣堡面前瑟瑟发抖。<hpage>苍白之子，你只是来废话的么？纺络没有虫能阻挡我，圣堡也不例外。<page>亲爱的，你怎么还傻乐呢？上面那位吹口气就能灭了你那点希望。<hpage>傻孩子，真以为我现在还看不出你主子的真身吗？<hpage>这地方的辉煌、虫民的虔诚、还有他们的诅咒……线索太明显了。<hpage>这个王国被超脱虫类的存在掌控，属于更高阶的存在。<hpage>但无论它多想要我的灵丝和躯壳，我都不会给。
translated_text: what is this? Spider has finally become a buyer for our wonderful castle.<hpage>the pale boy, did you come back to laugh? Your land has yet to prove my enemy. This sleeping castle is no different.<page>The spider, honey. why do you want to be so hard and optimistic? I don't think there's any power there. She can quickly dispel that hope.<hpage>Stupid child. do you think i will not see your king? is it that far away?<hpage>The splendor of the earth, the loyalty of the insects, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is bound by creatures beyond the Worm, one of the higher castes.<hpage>No matter what longing I have for my silk and shells, I can see that I have a great attachment to both.
secondary_translated_text: Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Spider est enfin devenu un acheteur de notre magnifique château.<hpage>Le garçon pâle, est-ce que tu reviens rire ? Votre pays n'a pas encore prouvé mon ennemi. Ce château endormi n'est pas différent.<page>L'araignée, ma chérie ! Pourquoi voulez-vous être si dur et si optimiste ? Je ne pense pas qu ' il y ait de pouvoir là - bas. Elle peut vite dissiper cet espoir.<hpage>Stupid enfant. Tu crois que je ne verrai pas ton roi ? Est-ce que c'est si loin ?<hpage>La splendeur de la terre, la loyauté des insectes, et la malédiction qui les atteint. Les signes sont clairs,<hpage>Votre royaume est lié par des créatures au-delà du Ver, l'une des castes supérieures.<hpage>Peu importe le désir que j'ai pour ma soie et mes coquilles, je peux voir que j'ai un grand attachement à les deux.

original_en_text: Is hard work, learning so much from creatures, but for Nuu is very fulfilling. Now go and hunt, and prey, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 研究生物很辛苦，但努努超满足！快去打猎吧大姐姐！
translated_text: It was a hard job, and I learned a lot from biology, but for Nuu it was very rewarding. Come on, let's go hunting, my lord!
secondary_translated_text: C'était un travail difficile, et j'ai beaucoup appris de la biologie, mais pour Nowa, c'était très gratifiant. Allons à la chasse, mon seigneur !

original_en_text: Hoy there, fancy bug! How you farin’, now that the ‘ole world’s creakin’ and crackin’ around us? Desperately needin’ some supplies, I’ll wager! Heh heh!<hpage>You seem in good spirits, thief. Are you not disturbed by the great rending of the kingdom?<page>Heh, end of the world don’t bother ol’ Grindle none. We’ll just go find another one to plunder, won’t we?
original_zh_text: 哟！阔气虫来啦！外面世界要完蛋了，急需补给吧？哦嚯嚯！<hpage>你看着倒挺精神，不怕王国崩塌？<page>王国崩塌关我们屁事！大不了换个地方偷！
translated_text: "Beautiful bug! Right now, the "old world" is crawling around us. We need supplies urgently! what?!<hpage>Thief, you look good. aren't you worried about the collapse of your kingdom?<page>hey, the end of the world. don't bother grindel. are you looking for another trophy?
secondary_translated_text: « Magnifique bug ! En ce moment, le « vieil monde » rampe autour de nous. Nous avons besoin de fournitures d'urgence ! Quoi ? !<hpage>Voleur, tu as l'air bien. N'êtes-vous pas inquiet de l'effondrement de votre royaume ?<page>Hey, la fin du monde. Ne dérangez pas Grindel. Vous cherchez un trophée ?

original_en_text: <page=M>Our spells’re woven, our parts prepared. Whenever you’re ready, lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.<page=M>Best you don’t dawdle now. Pharloom’s time is short, and those hearts won’t go on beating forever.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们已经准备好施咒，您躺上祭坛便可开始。<page=M>劝您别再耽搁了，纺络时日无多，这些心也跳不了多久。
translated_text: <page=M>Our spells are woven in, and our part is ready. When you're ready, lie down on the stage and start.<page=M>I'd better not be giggling anymore. Farrow's time is short, and the heart will not keep beating forever.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Nos sorts sont tissés, et notre part est prête. Lorsque vous êtes prêt, allongez-vous sur la scène et commencez.<page=M>Je ferais mieux de ne plus grincer. Le temps de Farrow est court, et le cœur ne continuera pas à battre éternellement.

original_en_text: No more talk, warrior. Permit me this final moment of memorial.<hpage>As you wish, sir. I shall disturb you no longer.
original_zh_text: 别说了，战士。让我在这最后时刻安静怀念吧。<hpage>如你所愿，不再打扰。
translated_text: Don't talk, soldier. Remind yourself of this last moment.<hpage>As you wish, sir. I won't bother you anymore.
secondary_translated_text: Ne parlez pas, soldat. Souvenez-vous de ce dernier moment.<hpage>Comme vous le souhaitez, monsieur. Je ne vais plus vous déranger.

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time perhaps, sir. My own tasks cannot be easily ignored.<page>Then I shall continue to train in anticipation of that future moment!<page>Having met, it is inevitable. Fate calls us to compete!
original_zh_text: <hpage>下次吧，我有要事在身。<page>我会继续特训等着比赛那天！<page>命运注定我们要一决高下！
translated_text: <hpage>Next time, sir. Your own work cannot be easily ignored.<page>We will continue to train!<page>It's inevitable to meet. Fate is calling for competition!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>La prochaine fois, monsieur. Son travail ne peut pas être facilement ignoré.<page>Nous continuerons à nous entraîner !<page>Il est inévitable de se rencontrer. Le destin appelle à la concurrence !

original_en_text: Oh, welcome miss grown-up! Come to inspect the red-rocky creatures, like Nuu? We have found a very big one. Fresh, but not too fresh!<hpage>A pair of beasts attacked me here, burrowing through the stone with their spiral shells. I cut this one down, and the other fled.<page>Ooooh ma! Really? Nuu wishes that she had the pair! She could have studied much. Unlucky, to miss such a big feast of learnings!
original_zh_text: 噢！欢迎大姐姐！也来研究红石头吗？我发现个大家伙！还算新鲜！<hpage>两只带螺旋壳的怪物用石头攻击我。斩了一只，跑了一只。<page>哎呀！努努好想要一对！能学好多东西呢！真可惜！
translated_text: Welcome, my lord, my lady! Look at the red stone creatures like Nu. I found something big. Fresh, but not too fresh.<hpage>Two beasts attacked me here and made a hole in the stone with a spiral shell. Cut this one off, and the other one escaped.<page>Oh, Mama! really? I hope she has a couple! She was able to learn a lot. Unfortunately, I missed such an academic event!
secondary_translated_text: Bienvenue, mon seigneur, ma dame ! Regardez les créatures de pierre rouge comme Nu. J'ai trouvé quelque chose de gros. Fraîche, mais pas trop fraîche.<hpage>Deux bêtes m'ont attaqué ici et ont fait un trou dans la pierre avec une coquille en spirale. L'un a été coupé, et l'autre s'est échappé.<page>Oh, Maman ! Vraiment ? J'espère qu 'elle en a un couple ! Elle a pu apprendre beaucoup. Malheureusement, j'ai manqué un événement aussi académique !

original_en_text: We must press on... There is so much more... for us to do...
original_zh_text: 必须继续……我们还有……很多事要做……
translated_text: If we don't move forward, there's more. What we should do.
secondary_translated_text: Si nous n'avançons pas, il y en a d'autres. Ce que nous devrions faire.

original_en_text: I see much wasted effort in these docks. There is too much flourish to the form of it all. The ways of others are strange indeed...
original_zh_text: 码头修得花里胡哨，净是浪费。外族人的路子真怪……
translated_text: There is a lot of prosperity in these forms, and we are wasting a lot of energy. The way others do things is really weird.
secondary_translated_text: Il y a beaucoup de prospérité dans ces formes, et nous gaspillons beaucoup d'énergie. La façon dont les autres font les choses est vraiment étrange.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! We both know our previous run was only warm-up, yes? Only a tiny test to prepare for the real match, Hoi hoi!<page>Well that match is now! A new track worthy of your skill, and mine. No longer merely a test!<page>Meet the challenge and my speed full. Let us break through our limits and see what waits beyond!
original_zh_text: 上次只是热身对吧？真正的好戏现在开始！<page>新的挑战，新的赛道！配得上你我的实力！<page>接受我的全速挑战，一起冲刺突破极限吧！
translated_text: That's a smart mistake! I think the last race was a warm-up, right? Preparing for a real match is a little bit of a test, right?<page>Come on, the game starts! The new song is worth your skill. It's not just a test anymore!<page>Go ahead with the challenge at full speed. Let's push the boundaries and see what awaits!
secondary_translated_text: C'est une erreur intelligente ! Je pense que la dernière course a été un échauffement, non ? Se préparer à un vrai match est un peu un test, non ?<page>Allez, le jeu débute ! Cette chanson vaut votre talent. Ce n'est plus seulement un test !<page>Faites face au défi à pleine vitesse. Poussons les limites et voyons ce qui nous attend !

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>With these I often mark the locations of worthy foes.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>我常用它标强力敌人的位置。
translated_text: It can be used to mark important places and reminders on the map.<br><br>It is often used to assess the position of the enemy.
secondary_translated_text: Il peut être utilisé pour marquer des lieux importants et des rappels sur la carte.<br><br>Il est souvent utilisé pour évaluer la position de l'ennemi.

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>I was intrigued by the challenge you issued on the bell settlement’s wishwall, sir, though having reached this place I wonder at your choice of location.<hpage>If you seek challengers you should choose somewhere less far afield. It is rare chance any bug would journey to a cavern so distant.<page>True, perhaps. Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！终于来个能跑的！终于啊！<hpage>先生，我对您在钟心镇祈愿墙下的战书很感兴趣。不过抵达此地后，倒对您选的位置有些疑惑。<hpage>若想找虫比试，不该待在如此偏远之地。<page>有道理，但最棒的赛道就在这！还远离纺络的破事。<page>这里能尽情展现速度与甲壳之美！来赛一场吧！<page>你也等不及了吧？快来满足我的愿望，一起测试极限！
translated_text: what?! A flexible opponent appeared. Finally! Finally!<hpage>I am very interested in your challenge to the Wall of Wishes of the Bell Settlement. We have arrived at this place, but we would like to know where you have chosen.<hpage>If you're looking for a challenger, you should choose a location that's not far away. Few insects go to caves that far away.<page>It may be true, but once you discover it, what is perfect? This huge, bone-broken corpse is far removed from the state of Farme.<page>Here you can freely test your speed and smooth case. You can compete here!<page>Challenger, do you want to accomplish it? Let my wish come true! Let's discover the limits together!
secondary_translated_text: Quoi ? ! Un adversaire flexible est apparu. Enfin ! Enfin !<hpage>Je suis très intéressé par votre défi au mur des vœux de la colonie Bell. Nous sommes arrivés à cet endroit, mais nous aimerions savoir où vous avez choisi.<hpage>Si vous cherchez un challenger, vous devriez choisir un emplacement qui n'est pas loin. Peu d'insectes vont dans des grottes aussi loin.<page>Cela peut être vrai, mais une fois que vous le découvrez, qu ' est-ce qui est parfait ? Cet énorme cadavre osseux est très éloigné de l'état de Farme.<page>Ici, vous pouvez librement tester votre vitesse et votre étui lisse. Vous pourrez concourir ici !<page>Challenger, tu veux y arriver ? Que mon vœu se réalise ! Découvrons les limites ensemble !

original_en_text: Uahhhhh... So close... Nuu could almost taste it.
translated_text: ah... It's very close. You can almost taste it.
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. C'est très proche. On peut presque le goûter.

original_en_text: Ho! Are you observing them too, hunter? The red-shells are plentiful here, stalking these vast grassy plains and the last of its bony beasts.<page>Compared to the caves below, this lush growth feels even greater. Have we crawled close to the source of their sustenance?<page>I must discover its secret! I will! By my father’s wish, and for hope that our dying lands might find means to endure.<hpage>Just be careful, young one. I urge you. Here you’ve reached the ants’ heart-domain.<hpage>There may be discoveries worth making, but a single mistake will see your shell’s sharp end.
original_zh_text: 嘿！你也在观察红壳怪吗？它们在这片原野上猎杀最后的骨兽。<page>这里的植物比下面的洞穴更茂盛，难道接近能量源了？<page>我必须找到源头！对！不止是为了父亲的遗愿，也是为了这片大地存续的希望！<hpage>要小心，小虫子。此处是蚁族的核心区域。<hpage>或许能有宝贵发现，但走错一步就会丢了性命。
translated_text: Oh, ho! are you watching, hunter? There are plenty of red shells here, swimming between the vast meadows and the last bony beast.<page>This lush growth feels better than the cave below. is it close to a food source?<page>We have to discover that secret! i'll do it! With the Father's wishes and hopes, the land we have laid to death can find a way to survive.<hpage>Be careful, young man. I would recommend you. Here we reach the heart of the ants.<hpage>There may be some valuable discoveries, but mistakes can sharpen your shell.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ho ! Tu regardes, chasseur ? Il y a beaucoup de coquilles rouges ici, nagant entre les vastes prairies et la dernière bête osseuse.<page>Cette croissance luxuriante se sent mieux que la grotte en dessous. Est-ce à proximité d'une source alimentaire ?<page>Il faut découvrir ce secret ! Je le ferai ! Avec les désirs et les espoirs du Père, la terre que nous avons mise à mort peut trouver un moyen de survivre.<hpage>Faites attention jeune homme, je vous recommande. Nous arrivons au cœur des fourmis.<hpage>Il peut y avoir quelques découvertes précieuses, mais les erreurs peuvent aiguiser votre coquille.

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, opened the way forward for us!<page>What luck for us to meet at this moment! We can set off on the great road together!<page>Or p’raps I’ll tarry here just a little longer. I want to sing a song of gratitude to this noble gate!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘快看！骨门听见歌声，为我们让路了！<page>能在这相遇多有缘呀！我们可以结伴踏上圣途！<page>不过我想再再待会儿，给这好骨门唱首感恩曲！
translated_text: Hey! did you see that? The red woman the great gate listened to my song, opened our way with infinite ancient mercy!<page>I am so lucky to meet you now! Let's take a wonderful path together!<page>Or I'll be here a little bit longer. I will sing a song of thanks to this noble gate!
secondary_translated_text: Hey ! Tu as vu ça ? La femme rouge, la grande porte, écoutait mon chant, nous ouvrit la voie avec une infinie miséricorde antique !<page>Je suis tellement chanceuse de vous rencontrer maintenant ! Prenons un merveilleux chemin ensemble !<page>Ou je serai ici un peu plus longtemps. Je chanterai un chant de remerciement à cette noble porte !

original_en_text: In these lands names are given freely, are they not? I am Shakra, Wielding Rings. If our hunts intertwine again, I will have new maps to trade.<page>Until then, farewell, Child Wielding Needle.
original_zh_text: 在这地方，名字都起的很随意，对吧？我是沙克拉，驭环者。要是能再碰上，会准备好新地图卖给你。<page>后会有期，使针的小姑娘。
translated_text: names are free in this land, right? I'm Shakra, Woldingring. If the hunt gets tangled up again, you'll get a new map.<page>Until then, goodbye to the needle-wielding children.
secondary_translated_text: Les noms sont libres dans ce pays, non ? Je suis Shakra, Woldingring. Si la chasse s'enchevêtrera à nouveau, vous obtiendrez une nouvelle carte.<page>Jusqu'à présent, adieu aux enfants qui brandissent des aiguilles.

original_en_text: This place is holy, yes... but I worry at the suffering of our fellow pilgrims. So many are hurt or exhausted!<hpage>Your doubts and worries will not heal them, little one.<hpage>If you would aid your fellows, you can start by dressing their wounds. The simple rags found around the settlement will do for bandages.<page>Oh, that’s an excellent idea, red maiden! Normally I’d think a song would suffice, but... yes, more direct action is certainly needed.<page>And the Citadel itself shall provide the materials! Praise be to this holiest of holy places!
original_zh_text: 这里虽然是圣地……可看着同袍受苦真难受！<hpage>光着急没用。<hpage>若想帮忙，可以先从包扎开始。找点破布当绷带吧。<page>好主意！我平常就知道唱歌……这次得动真格了！<page>材料圣堡里随便找！圣地就是灵验！
translated_text: This is sacred, yes, but we are worried about our fellow pilgrims. Many people are injured and tired.<hpage>Your doubts and worries won't cure them, little man.<hpage>If you want to help your comrades, start by dressing up the wound. A simple rag around the settlement is used as a bandage.<page>Oh, that's a good idea, red girl! Usually I think one song is enough, but of course, more direct action is needed.<page>The fortress offers its own material! Bless this most sacred place!
secondary_translated_text: C'est sacré, oui, mais nous sommes inquiets pour nos compagnons pèlerins. Beaucoup de personnes sont blessées et fatiguées.<hpage>Vos doutes et vos soucis ne les guériront pas, petit homme.<hpage>Si vous voulez aider vos camarades, commencez par dresser la plaie. Un simple chiffon autour de la colonie est utilisé comme bandage.<page>C'est une bonne idée, Red Girl ! Habituellement, je pense qu ' une chanson suffit, mais bien sûr, il faut plus d'action directe.<page>La forteresse offre son propre matériel ! Bénis ce lieu très sacré !

original_en_text: Fear not, brothers and sisters! If we work hard and keep our faith, the Citadel will provide for us... I have no doubt!
original_zh_text: 兄弟姐妹别怕！只要我们勤勉且守住信念，圣堡不会亏待我们……肯定不会！
translated_text: My brothers and sisters, do not be afraid. If we work hard and keep our faith, the castle will feed us. No doubt about it!
secondary_translated_text: Mes frères et sœurs, n'ayez pas peur. Si nous travaillons dur et gardons notre foi, le château nous nourrit. Pas de doute en ce sens !

original_en_text: <page=M>The hearts you seek, we can share their locations as best we know.<page=M>Three will be needed to construct our spell and draw clear memory of the flower from your Silk.<page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们会把知道的古心位置尽数相告。<page=M>我们需要三颗心来施咒，从您的灵丝中抽出花影。<page=S>把心带来，古老者。通过它们的搏动，见证这片虫族土地被遗忘的伟力，再焚尽这些记忆换取救赎。
translated_text: <page=M>The heart that you are looking for, we will do our best to share that place.<page=M>It takes three people to build our mantra and bring out the clear memories of flowers from your silk.<page=S>Old man, give me a heart. He ultimately failed. Before you save these memories, take a first-hand look at the power of this forgotten bug country.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Le cœur que vous recherchez, nous ferons de notre mieux pour partager cet endroit.<page=M>Il faut trois personnes pour construire notre mantra et faire ressortir les souvenirs vifs des fleurs de votre soie.<page=S>Vieil homme, donne-moi un cœur. Il échoua finalement. Avant de sauvegarder ces souvenirs, jetez un coup d'œil à la puissance de ce pays oublié des insectes.

translated_text: The Ring Mark.
secondary_translated_text: La bague marque.

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... A test was needed, to ensure my strength before a greater challenge soon to come.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只年迈的巨蚁……她刚死没多久，可她却出现在这里……<page>那是她本人吗？难道真是她？支撑这些洞穴的力量究竟是什么？若真如此，如今会发生什么？<hpage>它们终将枯萎凋零……你也许会含泪明白，是我手中的针了结了她的生命。<page>这位姑娘，你？可为什么？为什么要摧残这般珍贵的东西？<hpage>这事难以三言两语解释……在更大的考验来临前，我必须通过试炼，证明自身的力量。<hpage>终有一日，这些洞穴或许能重新焕发生机，甚至繁盛昌荣。但那重生之路，漫长艰难，超越一生又一生。<hpage>而这份重任，便要靠你这样的小虫播撒下第一颗种子。
translated_text: This giant ant seems to have recently passed away, but here is her.<page>is that her? is that right? What is the power that supports this cave? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither away and fade away. Sadly, my needle was the one that killed her.<page>are you, lady? but why not? Why would you destroy something so important?<hpage>This is something that is difficult to explain easily. In the face of the big challenges ahead, we need a test to confirm our strength.<hpage>Over time, the caves may see the opportunity to grow and prosper again, but regeneration itself is a difficult task. Longer than life, many lives.<hpage>If you want to be successful, you have to rely on bugs like yourself to sow the first seeds.
secondary_translated_text: Cette fourmi géante semble être récemment décédée, mais la voilà.<page>C'est elle ? Est-ce correct ? Quelle est la force qui soutient cette grotte ? Si c'est le cas, qu ' est-ce qui se passera maintenant ?<hpage>Ils s'en vont et s'en vont, Malheureusement, c'est mon aiguille qui l'a tuée.<page>C'est vous, madame ? Mais pourquoi pas ? Pourquoi détruire quelque chose d'aussi important ?<hpage>C'est quelque chose qui est difficile à expliquer facilement. Face aux grands défis qui nous attendent, nous avons besoin d'un test pour confirmer notre force.<hpage>Au fil du temps, les grottes peuvent voir l'occasion de grandir et de prospérer à nouveau, mais la régénération en elle-même est une tâche difficile. Plus longtemps que la vie, beaucoup de vies.<hpage>Si vous voulez réussir, vous devez compter sur des insectes comme vous pour semer les premières graines.

original_en_text: Burrowed paths of the red-shells. Their stores and shrines are frequent throughout. These tunnels must grant them swift passage about the fields below.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪的隧道网。到处是他们的仓库和冥想室，方便在野地快速移动。
translated_text: Red shell cave road Shops and shrines are dotted everywhere. The tunnel can quickly pass through the fields below.
secondary_translated_text: Route de grotte de coquille rouge Les magasins et les sanctuaires sont parsemés partout. Le tunnel peut rapidement traverser les champs ci-dessous.

original_en_text: <hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: <hpage>要下潜并斩断诅咒，得先除掉体内这玩意。
translated_text: <hpage>If I'm going to jump in and cut this land off from the curse of the black line, I must first find a way to drive the invaders out of it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Si je vais sauter et couper cette terre de la malédiction de la ligne noire, je dois d'abord trouver un moyen de chasser les envahisseurs de là.

original_en_text: So I am freed, despite no request of mine for aid.<hpage>And I do not ask gratitude. The key merely fit the lock. If you choose, stay in here and wait till your shell hardens to crust.<page>No. I shall depart shortly. With my way clear, my wish again propels me, though I tried to avoid it.<hpage>Then safe journey, tall bug. I’ll not pry further. Clearly you bear your own burden.
original_zh_text: 我未曾求救，倒也被放出来了。<hpage>不必道谢，钥匙碰巧能用罢了。若想留在这，请自便。<page>不，我这就走。前路已通，纵使逃避，他的遗愿仍会推着我前行。<hpage>那便祝你一路顺利。看得出你有重担在身，我无意深究。
translated_text: I was released without asking for help.<hpage>I'm not asking for gratitude. This key will only open the lock. If you wish, stay here until your shell sets.<page>No, no, no. I'll be right there. My path is clear, and even though I try to avoid it, my desire has driven me again.<hpage>Make a safe journey, tall insects. I'm not exploring anymore. Obviously you take the burden on yourself.
secondary_translated_text: J'ai été libéré sans avoir demandé de l'aide.<hpage>Je ne demande pas de gratitude. Cette clé ouvrira uniquement la serrure. Si vous le souhaitez, restez ici jusqu'à ce que votre coquille se couche.<page>Non, non, non, je vais être là. Mon chemin est clair, et même si j'essaie de l'éviter, mon désir m'a conduit à nouveau.<hpage>Faites un voyage en toute sécurité, grands insectes. Je n'explore plus. Vous prenez le fardeau sur vous-même.

original_en_text: Mm, mrm? Oh, hoy again!<page>I hadn’t meant to drop off like that. It’s hard to stay awake in such a cosy place, isn’t it?
original_zh_text: 唔嗯？哎呀又睡着了！<page>这地方太舒服了，让人犯困，你说是吧？
translated_text: what? sir? Oh, here you come again!<page>I didn't mean that. It's hard to wake up in such a comfortable place, right?
secondary_translated_text: Quoi ? Monsieur ? Oh, voilà que tu reviens !<page>Je ne voulais pas dire ça. C'est difficile de se réveiller dans un endroit aussi confortable, non ?

original_en_text: Oh hear me pray, please hear me sing,<br>My path’s ahead, but here’s the thing,<br>I can’t squeeze past, o gate of bone,<br>So please wake up, and help...oh?
original_zh_text: 听我祈祷，听我歌唱，<br>前路虽近骨门却挡，<br>求您醒来助我闯荡……哦？
translated_text: Oh, hear my prayers, hear my songs,<br>My way is ahead of me, but it is,<br>Cannot pass through the door of bones.<br>wake up, please help me, okay? huh?
secondary_translated_text: Oh, écoute mes prières, écoute mes chansons,<br>Mon chemin est devant moi, mais il est,<br>On ne peut pas passer par la porte des os.<br>Réveille-toi, aide-moi, d'accord ? Huh ?

original_en_text: <page=M>Up top of those caves lost to wind and sand rests a crusted old ruler, a once great warrior king.<page=M>In their prime, they and their order held half of Pharloom under hardened claw. Some bugs relished that strength. Most lived in fear of it.
original_zh_text: <page=M>在风沙侵蚀的洞窟顶端，藏着位甲壳斑驳的老暴君。<page=M>全盛时他与部族以铁爪统治半个纺络。有人仰慕其强权，更多则活在恐惧中。
translated_text: <page=M>On top of the sand-covered cave lay the weather-weary old ruler, once a great warrior-king.<page=M>At their height, they and their commanders controlled half of Pharam by claw. Insects prefer this power. Most people live in fear and fear.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Au sommet de la grotte couverte de sable se trouvait le vieil souverain fatigué par le temps, autrefois un grand roi guerrier.<page=M>À leur apogée, ils et leurs commandants contrôlaient la moitié de Pharam par les griffes. Les insectes préfèrent cette puissance. La majorité des gens vivent dans la peur et la peur.

original_en_text: Oooh ma! Sweet surprise for Nuu! You are adult, yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 哇哦大姐姐！努努好惊喜！你已经长大了对吧？完全体？能打猎了吧？<hpage>我显然不是个小孩子，小家伙。<page>太好啦！努努有个愿望！帮我去砍纺络的各种神奇虫子吧！<page>用你的刀砍！用长大的力气砍！用成熟的狂野之心砍！<page>帮帮努努好不好？收下这本册子，用打架心得写满它！
translated_text: Oh, Mama! A sweet surprise for Noo! You're an adult now, right? Fully grown? are you ready to hunt?<hpage>Of course, I am not a child.<page>perfect! Nu needs to make a wish! For her, you will find many wonderful bugs in pharam and cut them off.<page>Please cut them with a knife! Destroy them with your mature spirit! Cut them in your wild adult mind!<page>do you want to help nu? Can you take her reels to fill the page with your editing knowledge?
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Maman ! Une douce surprise pour Noo ! Tu es adulte maintenant, non ? Pleinement grandis ?Êtes-vous prêt à chasser ?<hpage>Bien entendu, je ne suis pas un enfant.<page>Parfait ! Il faut faire un vœu ! Pour elle, vous trouverez beaucoup de merveilleux insectes dans le pharam et les coupez.<page>Coupez-le avec un couteau ! Détruisez-les avec votre esprit mûr ! Coupez-les dans votre esprit adulte sauvage !<page>Tu veux aider NAN ? Pouvez-vous prendre ses rouleaux pour remplir la page de vos connaissances en édition ?

original_en_text: Guurroooo! Scoundrel! Fiend! Who dares wake brave Garmond from his well needed kip?<hpage>I’ve no intent to disturb, sir bug. I am merely passing these towers and sought to better understand the lay of the place.<page>Hmmph! Knowing the battlefield? A warrior’s reason! Just look at you! Your stance and blade, almost alone they declare a fight.<page>As the bravest of knights, if direct challenge were offered, honour would see noble Garmond accept!<page>Fortunate that seems not your intent. In truth, I’m still sleeping off something of an altercation myself. Had our meeting called for a knightly duel, you’d not have had the luck to behold my finest form.
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！歹徒！谁敢打扰勇者加蒙德的美梦？<hpage>无意冒犯，只是路过这座塔想探探路。<page>哼！勘察战场？战士的借口！看你这架势就是来找架打的！<page>作为最勇猛的骑士，要决斗我奉陪！<page>算你走运，我还没睡醒。真要决斗你可打不过全盛期的我！
translated_text: GUURROOOO! villan! the devil! Who will awaken the brave Gamond from his desperately needed sleep?<hpage>I'm not going to interrupt you, Mr. Bug, I went through the tower to get a better understanding of this place.<page>HUN! you know the battlefield? Reasons for soldiers! Look at you! Your place and Blade are the only ones who have declared war.<page>As the bravest knight, if he challenged him directly, the noble Gammond would accept it!<page>Anger is not your intent. In fact, I was sleeping for the discussion. if it were a meeting for a knight's duel, you wouldn't be able to see my best.
secondary_translated_text: Gourou ! Villain ! Le démon ! Qui réveillera le courageux Gamond de son sommeil désespérément nécessaire ? »<hpage>Je ne vais pas vous interrompre, monsieur Bug, je suis allé à travers la tour pour mieux comprendre cet endroit.<page>Hun ! ! Connaissez-vous le champ de combat ? Des raisons pour les soldats. Regardez vous ! Votre place et Blade sont les seuls qui ont déclaré la guerre.<page>En tant que chevalier le plus courageux, s'il le défiait directement, le noble Gammond accepterait !<page>La colère n'est pas votre intention. En fait, j'ai dormi pour la discussion. Si c'était une rencontre pour un duel de chevaliers, vous ne pourriez pas voir le meilleur de moi.

original_en_text: Hoy then, what’s a fancy-prancy bug like you creepin’ into Grindle’s cosy little nook for?<page>Heard we had some nice stuff, did ya? O-hoho! All kinds of tasty goodies find their way here, that’s for sure.<hpage>I care little for how you procured your goods, thief. If you have something worth trading, I may part with my rosaries.<page>Well, we never say no to a fair swap, heh heh! Now take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 哦嚯！阔气虫，你溜进格林德尔的宝窝想干嘛？<page>是不是听说我这有好货？哦嚯嚯！那可不，宝贝们都是自己溜进来的！<hpage>我不在乎你的货怎么来的，如果有好东西，我拿念珠来换。<page>成交！不过我们可不做赔本买卖，嚯嚯！你先随便看看吧……
translated_text: Hey, what does a fantasy bug look like when you climb up a cozy little corner of Grindel?<page>i heard you had a good one, right? Oh, ho! There's a lot of good food here, that's for sure.<hpage>It doesn't matter how you buy it. If there's something worth the trade, I might throw away the rosary.<page>We will never say no to a fair exchange, Hey! Let's look at what we have now.
secondary_translated_text: Hé, à quoi ressemble un insecte fantastique lorsque vous grimpez dans un petit coin confortable de Grindel ?<page>J'ai entendu dire que tu en avais un bon, non ? Oh, ho ! Il y a beaucoup de bonne nourriture ici, c'est sûr.<hpage>Peu importe comment vous l'achetez, s'il y a quelque chose qui vaut la peine d'être échangé, je pourrais jeter le rosaire.<page>Nous ne dirons jamais non à un échange équitable, Hey ! Voyons ce que nous avons maintenant.

original_en_text: Now I shall remain, and train. And know! Though I have no more rewards to give, you are welcome to grace my track, as many times as you wish.
original_zh_text: 我要继续训练了！不过记着，虽然没其他奖品了，但随时欢迎你来赛道上奔跑！
translated_text: From now on, I will go to practice. I know! There is no greater reward than this, but we welcome you to join us if you wish.
secondary_translated_text: A partir de maintenant, je vais me mettre à la pratique. Je sais ! Il n'y a pas de meilleure récompense que cela, mais nous vous invitons à nous rejoindre si vous le souhaitez.

original_en_text: The sharp-faced bugs of these drizzled caves love to swoop and play, don’t they? If only I could understand their beautiful language...
original_zh_text: 这些尖脸虫就爱在雨里扑腾。要是能听懂它们的语言多好……
translated_text: These sharp-faced bugs in the foggy caves love diving and playing, don't they? I wish I could understand their beautiful words.
secondary_translated_text: Ces insectes au visage acide dans les grottes brumeuses aiment plonger et jouer, n'est-ce pas ? J'aimerais pouvoir comprendre leurs belles paroles.

original_en_text: ...At the bottom of a well, you can only look up. The past is hidden from those who look forward...<page>...Those echoes may guide you still. Yes, that’s true. For the kind-hearted, a weapon can also be a friend...<page>...You’re so eager to follow in her footsteps. But what are you leaving for those who come next?
original_zh_text: ……身居井底唯见上方。沉湎过往者难窥前路……<page>……余音仍可指明方向。善者手中，利器亦可为友……<page>……你执着追随她的足迹。可曾为后来者留有余地？……
translated_text: ... At the bottom of the well, you just look up. The past is hidden from those who look to the future.<page>... These echoes still lead you. yeah. For a good man, weapons can also be his friend.<page>... You really want to follow in her footsteps. What do you want to leave behind for the next person?
secondary_translated_text: ... Au fond du puits, vous regardez juste. Le passé est caché à ceux qui regardent vers l'avenir.<page>... Ces échos vous conduisent. Oui, oui. Pour un bon homme, les armes peuvent aussi être son ami.<page>... Vous voulez vraiment suivre ses traces. Qu ' est-ce que vous souhaitez laisser pour la prochaine personne ?

translated_text: Map of Bilworth
secondary_translated_text: Carte de Bilworth

original_en_text: Hoof... Always you impress... nimble bug...<page>As many times as you may, let us speed forth! Gladly will I strive to match your spritely grace.
original_zh_text: 呼……每次都被你惊艳……<page>想再比赛的话随时奉陪！我一定要追上你！
translated_text: Feeling. You are always impressive. They are fast insects.<page>Take as much time as you can and accelerate! I want to be as graceful as you are.
secondary_translated_text: Feeling. Vous êtes toujours impressionnant. Ce sont des insectes très rapides.<page>Prenez autant de temps que possible et accélérez ! Je veux être aussi gracieuse que vous.

original_en_text: This poor traveller finds her resolve waning. When I first greeted her, her voice was so hoarse I scarcely heard it!<page>’Tis no cause for worry, though. My song will lift her from her torpor! Join your voice with mine, red maiden, and together we shall rouse our fellow pilgrim!
original_zh_text: 这位同袍意志消沉，初遇时她嗓音沙哑，几乎听不见！<page>莫慌！我的歌声能唤醒她！红衣姑娘一起唱，唤起这位同路人！
translated_text: The poor traveler noticed that his determination was fading. When I first greeted her, I could barely hear her voice.<page>There's nothing to worry about, my song will free her from paralysis! Red Woman, together you and I will awaken the companions of the pilgrims!
secondary_translated_text: Le pauvre voyageur remarqua que sa détermination s'estompeait. Quand je l'ai saluée pour la première fois, je pouvais à peine entendre sa voix.<page>Il n'y a rien à craindre, ma chanson la libérera de la paralysie ! Femme Rouge, ensemble, toi et moi, nous réveillerons les compagnons des pèlerins !

original_en_text: In time, even these great steps will be swept away by the sands. Nothing is immovable.
original_zh_text: 再大的台阶也迟早被风沙埋了，没有什么是永恒的。
translated_text: As time goes on, even this huge staircase will be washed away in the sand. There is nothing immobile.
secondary_translated_text: Avec le temps, même cet énorme escalier sera emporté dans le sable. Il n'y a rien d'immobile.

original_en_text: Ooh ma ma! Look here, miss grown-up! Very fascinating creature here, all dead in bits now, but still good!<page>She takes the shape of the woods for her body, and her hair like bitter leaves! Clever, thinks Nuu!<hpage>This creature staked its territory here and attacked as I passed through.<hpage>You should not linger long. Her tribe remains hidden amongst the branches, disguised and waiting to strike.<page>Oooh! So the cutting-up was done by you? Nuu gives her warm thanks! Now Nuu can inspect this creature well, all its gooey insides and crunchy shell!
original_zh_text: 哇！大姐姐快看！这只死透的怪物超有趣！<page>身体像树干，头发像苦叶子！努努觉得它超聪明！<hpage>这生物占据此处，袭击路人。<hpage>别久留，它的同族还在树丛里埋伏呢。<page>哇！是你干掉的？太感谢啦！现在可以好好研究它的粘液和脆壳了！
translated_text: Oh, Mama! Look, my master and miss! " The fascinating creatures here are dead, but they're still fine!<page>Her body is like a forest, and her hair is like a bitter leaf! Smart, I think!<hpage>This creature has established a territory here, and when I pass by, it attacks.<hpage>It shouldn't have been too long. Her tribe was hiding in tree branches, disguised and waiting for an attack.<page>oh! did you cut it off? Nu sincerely thanked her for this! The manta rays allow us to examine this creature well, including its sticky interior and brittle shell.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Maman ! Regardez, mon maître et madame !« Les créatures fascinantes ici sont mortes, mais elles vont toujours bien !<page>Son corps est comme une forêt, et ses cheveux sont comme une feuille amère ! Smart, je crois !<hpage>Cette créature a établi un territoire ici, et quand je passe, elle attaque.<hpage>Cela n'aurait pas dû être trop long. Sa tribu se cachait dans les branches des arbres, déguisée et en attente d'une attaque.<page>Ooh ! Tu l'as coupé ? Nous l'avons sincèrement remerciée pour cela ! Les raies manta nous permettent d'examiner bien cette créature, y compris son intérieur collant et sa coquille fragile.

original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，我在圣堡旁的沼泽嗅到了导师的新踪迹。请随我一同前往踪迹终点。

original_en_text: A lotta repairs to be done around here, but I need more materials! All I wish for is some shell shards so I can get to work. Not asking too much, am I?
original_zh_text: 这里有很多东西要修理，但我需要更多材料！我只想要些甲壳碎片来开工，这要求不过分吧？
translated_text: There are plenty of places to repair, but we need more materials! I hope there are some shell fragments so I can just get started. Are you asking too much?
secondary_translated_text: Il y a beaucoup d'endroits à réparer, mais nous avons besoin de plus de matériaux ! J'espère qu 'il y aura quelques fragments de coquille pour que je puisse commencer. Demandez-vous trop ?

original_en_text: My dear little courier was last seen in Shellwood. Please someone, find Tipp and send him home, along with all of his precious stock!
original_zh_text: 我的小送货员最后一次出现在甲木林，请帮忙找到蒂普并送他回家，还有他那些珍贵的货物！

secondary_translated_text: La dernière fois que mon cher petit messager est apparu, c'était Sherwood. Quelqu 'un trouve un pourboire et envoie lui et son précieux stock à la maison !

original_en_text: Such horror upon the roads! Those black mounds formed of husks and bugs, corrupting everything around. If only someone would cut them down and grant the poor souls their rest!

translated_text: The roads are really bad! Black shells and insects can rot everything around them. If only someone could chop them down and rest the poor soul! "
secondary_translated_text: Les routes sont vraiment mauvaises ! Les coquilles noires et les insectes peuvent pourrir tout ce qui les entoure. Si seulement quelqu ' un pouvait les hacher et reposer la pauvre âme ! "

original_en_text: Here they limply lay, the castaways and the disillusioned and the used-up.<page>It’s a sorry settlement you’ve summoned, miss bellringer, and a blasted bother for me. Not sure we have anything to offer ‘em... Not even hope.
original_zh_text: 看看这些疲惫的虫子，不是漂泊一生，就是失去信念。<page>敲钟者小姐，你搞出来的这个避难所真是大麻烦，我还得伺候这帮难民……我们连丁点希望都给不起。
translated_text: They lay helpless and victims, disillusioned and exhausted.<page>Mr. Bellinger, the solution you have proposed is unfortunate and has caused me great inconvenience. They don't even know what hope we can offer them.
secondary_translated_text: Ils étaient impuissants et victimes, désillusionnés et épuisés.<page>M. Bellinger, la solution que vous avez proposée est malheureuse et m'a causé beaucoup d'inconvénients. Ils ne savent même pas quels espoirs nous pouvons leur offrir.

original_en_text: Ready the Needle Phial... find the plasmified bugs below...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract the Plasmified Blood...
original_zh_text: 拿上储液针管……找到因生质液进化的生物……<page>蓄满力……扎入它们体内……提取生质血……
translated_text: Prepare for needles. Find the plasmatizing bacteria below.<page>I do my best for Phil. Push deeply. Plasma is collected.
secondary_translated_text: Préparez-vous aux aiguilles. Trouvez les bactéries plasmatisantes ci-dessous.<page>Je fais de mon mieux pour Phil. Poussez profondément. Le plasma est collecté.

original_en_text: Assistant... to learn more of Plasmium’s wonders... I know what we must do... <page>The bugs below... who have imbibed the substance... and evolved... their bodies are full with Plasmified Blood...<page>You must use the Needle Phial and extract this precious nectar... only by scrutinising it... can we attain higher knowledge...
original_zh_text: 助手……想更了解生质液……我知道该怎么办了……<page>下面那些……吸收生质液进化的生物……体内有生质血……<page>用储液针管提取……分析后……我们就能获得高阶知识……
translated_text: The assistant learned more about the miracle of plasmium. We know what we have to do.<page>The following errors. I took this substance. And evolve. Their bodies are filled with plasma-formed blood.<page>To extract this precious honey, you need to use a fial needle. Please check it carefully. Can you gain a higher knowledge?
secondary_translated_text: L'assistant en a appris plus sur le miracle du plasmium. Nous savons ce que nous avons à faire.<page>les erreurs suivantes. J'ai pris cette substance. Et évoluer. Leur corps est rempli de sang formé par plasma.<page>Pour extraire ce miel précieux, vous devez utiliser une aiguille de viole. Veuillez vérifier soigneusement. Pouvez-vous acquérir des connaissances supérieures ?

original_en_text: The bugs below who have imbibed the substance and evolved... their bodies are filled with Plasmified Blood...<page>You must use the Needle Phial and extract this precious nectar... only by scrutinising it... can we attain higher knowledge...
original_zh_text: 那些……吸收生质液进化的生物……体内有生质血……<page>用储液针管提取……分析后……我们就能获得高阶知识……
translated_text: The insects below absorbed and evolved these substances. Their bodies are filled with their plasma-formed blood.<page>To extract this precious honey, you need to use a fial needle. Please check it carefully. Can you gain a higher knowledge?
secondary_translated_text: Les insectes ci-dessous ont absorbé et évolué ces substances. Leurs corps sont remplis de leur sang formé de plasma.<page>Pour extraire ce miel précieux, vous devez utiliser une aiguille de viole. Veuillez vérifier soigneusement. Pouvez-vous acquérir des connaissances supérieures ?

original_en_text: What fear arrests you...? This must be done... or we will never learn the deeper truth... Never become what is needed...
original_zh_text: 怕什么？……不这么做……永远不懂真相……永远无法进化……
translated_text: What fear has arrested you? We need to do that. Otherwise, you will not be able to understand the deeper truth. It will never be what you need.
secondary_translated_text: Quelle peur vous a arrêté ? Nous devons faire cela. Sinon, vous ne serez pas en mesure de comprendre la vérité profonde. Ce ne sera jamais ce dont vous avez besoin.

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the plasmified bugs below...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract their Plasmified Blood.<page>Once we have it... we can peer deeper... learn more... enlighten ourselves fully...
original_zh_text: 啊……好助手……拿上储液针管……找到因生质液进化的生物……<page>蓄满力……扎入它们体内……提取生质血。<page>有了它……我们能更深入……学习……完全开悟……
translated_text: Oh, yeah. The assistant is too loyal. Hold the needle seat. Find the plasmatizing bacteria below.<page>I do my best for Phil. Push deeply. collecting plasma and blood.<page>Once you get it, you can look more closely to know more... Enough to stimulate.
secondary_translated_text: - Oh, oui. L'assistant est trop fidèle. Tenez le siège de l'aiguille. Trouvez les bactéries plasmatisantes ci-dessous.<page>Je fais de mon mieux pour Phil. Poussez profondément. collecte de plasma et de sang.<page>Une fois que vous l'avez obtenu, vous pouvez regarder de plus près pour en savoir plus... suffisamment pour stimuler.

original_en_text: <hpage>The roaches outside, why are they kept in pens? They seem a dangerous creature to cage or tame.<page=S>Us moorbugs gotta eat, don’t we? They’re wild fast breeders, them Muckroaches. Hard shells and tough meat, if you can even crack ‘em open, but options ain’t plentiful so we ain’t choosy.<page=S>Ain’t so bad to eat, once you’re used to it. The guts is the best bit, but them’s a choice cut and we ain’t had it for ages now.<page=L>Har har, life is tough all right! Benj’n here’s wasting away before us, poor wretch!<page=L>Tugs at your emotions, eh missy? How ‘bout you put that poker to good use? Go poach some of them roaches and get us some tasty guts. There’d be fair trade waitin’ for you.
original_zh_text: <hpage>外头的蟑螂为何要圈养？此等凶兽关起来有什么好处？<page=S>我们这些沼地的虫子总得吃饭吧？淤秽蟑螂繁殖得贼快。虽然壳硬肉糙，破开都费劲，但我们也没得挑嘛。<page=S>吃惯了也倒还行。内脏最香，但这种精贵部位我们早八百年没尝过了。<page=L>哈！日子苦啊！瞧班金这体格，已经饿得瘦骨伶仃了！<page=L>是不是很可怜我们啊，小姐？要不用你那根烧火棍帮我们开开荤？去宰几只蟑螂，把内脏取来，我们会给你个公道价！
translated_text: <hpage>Why are cockroaches locked up in a fence when they are there? They are like dangerous creatures that cannot be caged or tamed.<page=S>we have to eat the worms, right? They are animals that reproduce rapidly in the wild. They are cockroaches hard shell and hard flesh, if you can open, there are few options, so there is no insistence.<page=S>Once you get used to it, it doesn't taste so bad. The viscera are the best part, but they are the choice, and we haven't eaten them for a long time.<page=L>Life is really difficult! " Benjamin is losing weight in front of us, poor man!<page=L>bring out your emotions, huh? why don't you try to play poker well? Dig up cockroaches and buy me some delicious guts. Fair trade is waiting.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pourquoi les cafards sont-ils enfermés dans une clôture quand ils sont là ? Ils sont comme des créatures dangereuses qui ne peuvent être en cage ni apprivoisées.<page=S>Il faut manger les vers, non ? Ce sont des animaux qui se reproduisent rapidement à l'état sauvage. Ce sont des cafards à coquille dure et à chair dure, si vous pouvez ouvrir, il y a peu d'options, donc il n'y a pas d'insistance.<page=S>Une fois que vous vous y habituez, il n'a pas si mauvais goût. Les viscères sont la meilleure partie, mais ils sont le choix, et nous ne les avons pas mangés depuis longtemps.<page=L>La vie est réellement difficile ! Benjamin perd du poids devant nous, pauvre homme !<page=L>Faites sortir vos émotions, hein ? Pourquoi ne pas essayer de bien jouer au poker ? Découvrez les cafards et achetez-moi de délicieuses tripes. Le commerce équitable vous attend.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have brought a Queen’s Egg, at request of Bellhart’s couriers. It was a hazardous journey, but the creature inside has made it here alive.<page>Sssssss! How sss-ssublime! To think that my dear misss-stress would be the one to deliver the preciousss package! I had feared for the competence of those feeble couriersss...<hpage>It surprises me to know you correspond with them. I must wonder where else you go and who else you speak to after you scurry back up into the darkness...<page>Ssss. My whispersss-ss travel far, misstressss. You need not worry yourssself with my comingsss and goingss-ss. All I do... is in your sssss-service.<page>And now, pleasssse... give her to me... the little queen!
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我应钟心镇送货员之请，带来了一枚女王之卵。路途虽险，但卵内的生物尚且还活着。<page>咝——！何等殊荣！竟然由主人亲自护送这样宝贵的包裹！奴才我早就觉得这些送货员无能了……<hpage>你与他们有过联系？这倒是让我惊讶。不知道你遁入这片黑暗后，还与哪些虫往来过……<page>咝——奴才的低语声能传得很远，主人您无需担心我的行踪。奴才所为……皆为效忠于您。<page>现在，恳请您……将小女王……交给我！
translated_text: <hpage>At the request of Bell Heart's messenger, I brought the Queen's egg. It was a dangerous journey, but the creatures inside were keeping it alive.<page>sheez! SSS-SSSUBLIME! I think my dear stress woman is the one who provides a valuable package! I was worried about the weakness of the courier.<hpage>I was surprised to communicate with them. I want to know where you've been since you've been back in the darkness, and who you've ever spoken to.<page>My whisper has come a long way, ma 'am. Don't worry about my coming in and out. I serve you what I have done.<page>Come on, come on. Give her up, little queen!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>À la demande du messager de Bell Heart, j'ai apporté l'oeuf de la Reine. C'était un voyage dangereux, mais les créatures à l'intérieur le maintiennent en vie.<page>Sheesh ! SSS-SSSUBLIME ! Je pense que ma chère femme stressée est celle qui fournit un paquet précieux ! J'étais inquiet pour la faiblesse du courrier.<hpage>J'ai été surpris de communiquer avec eux. Je veux savoir où vous êtes depuis que vous êtes de retour dans les ténèbres, et à qui vous avez parlé.<page>Mon murmure a parcouru un long chemin, madame. Ne vous inquiétez pas pour mon entrée et ma sortie. Je te sers ce que j'ai fait.<page>Allez, viens, laisse-la tomber, petite reine !

original_en_text: <hpage>The beasts outside and their masters alike are all ensnared by this land’s silken affliction. You are lucky bugs to have not succumbed.<page=L>The Haunting? Oh, we’s got that all worked out. Benj’n and me are a right pair of philosophers when we bend our minds to it.<page=L>It’s faith that gets you. It’s all caused by being too devout!<page=S>Yeah! Or maybe not bein’ devout enough!<page=L>Or maybe it’s safest not to think about it at all. Har har!
original_zh_text: <hpage>外头那些虫兽与其饲主都遭受丝咒侵蚀。二位未被沾染，实属侥幸。<page=L>丝咒？早研究透啦！班金和我可是哲学大师！<page=L>信仰过头的才会中招！全是虔诚惹的祸！<page=S>对！但如果不够虔诚，兴许也会中招！<page=L>要我说，最安全的办法就是别去瞎琢磨！哈！
translated_text: <hpage>The outer beast and its owners are entangled in the silk-like torment of this land. You're lucky your mistakes didn't go away.<page=L>a ghost? Everybody is practicing. When we focus on this moment, Benjamin and I are the right philosophers.<page=L>It is faith that attracts you. It's all religious!<page=S>yes! They are not religious.<page=L>Probably the safest thing to do is not to think about it at all. ha ha ha!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>La bête extérieure et ses propriétaires sont enchevêtrés dans le tourment de soie de cette terre. Tu as de la chance que tes erreurs ne disparaissent pas.<page=L>Un fantôme ? Tout le monde s'entraîne. Quand nous nous concentrons sur ce moment, Benjamin et moi sommes les bons philosophes.<page=L>C'est la foi qui vous attire. C'est tout religieux !<page=S>Oui ! Ils ne sont pas religieux.<page=L>La chose la plus sûre à faire est probablement de ne pas y penser du tout. Ha ha ha !

original_en_text: While you sss-stalk through the black-ravaged world, morsss-ssels will I grow. For the promiss-sse of what my misss-tress will become... I will toil, alwayssss...
original_zh_text: 只要主子您还在黑灾肆虐之地穿行，咝——奴才便会辛勤劳作，为主人进行培育。为主人脱胎换骨的承诺……咝——奴才至死方休！
translated_text: I grew up when you sneaked through the devastated black world, and I was a little bit more of a grown-up. What kind of person would I be for my girlfriend? I will work forever. "
secondary_translated_text: J'ai grandi quand tu es passé à travers le monde noir dévasté, et j'étais un peu plus adulte. Quel genre de personne serais-je pour ma copine ? Je travaillerai éternellement. "

original_en_text: <page=S>It’s said the moors used to grow a bounty of fresh food, way back befores that Citadel set us about catchin’ their fallin’ thread.<page=S>Sounds right lovely, eh missy? Always eatin’, never troubled by no grumblin’ belly?<page=L>Har har! Yer like a hatchling, Benj’n! So given to fancies! <page=L>Now breedin’ roaches is what keeps us from starvin’. Dangerous work, and not the finest diet, but we ain’t complainin’.<page=L>Specially as more and more of them keepers are succumbing to the strange sickness. Only means more meat for us. Har!
original_zh_text: <page=S>传说在圣堡逼我们捡拾掉落的丝线之前，沼地也曾盛产新鲜美食。<page=S>听着多美啊，小姐。一天到晚地吃，不用担心饿肚子。<page=L>哈！班金，你是刚破卵的吗？净做白日梦！<page=L>现在我们只能靠养蟑螂混口饭吃。这活危险，伙食差，但我们从不抱怨。<page=L>你看吧，越来越多的监管者都染上怪病。但往好处想，对我们来说，肉倒是更加管够了！哈！
translated_text: <page=S>It is said that the Moors had grown a lot of fresh food long before the castle gave them a clue.<page=S>That sounds good, doesn't it, miss? Do you eat all the time and worry or get angry?<page=L>ha ha ha! You are like a bird, Benjamin! You will be fascinated by fantasy!<page=L>Today, the rearing of cockroaches is freed from starvation. The work is dangerous and the food is not the best, but I do not complain.<page=L>In particular, more and more breeders are dying from this strange disease. That means more meat for us. " yeah!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>On dit que les Maures avaient cultivé beaucoup de nourriture fraîche bien avant que le château ne leur donne un indice.<page=S>Ça sonne bien, n'est-ce pas mademoiselle ? Vous mangez tout le temps et vous inquiétez ou vous mettez en colère ?<page=L>Ha ha ha ! Vous êtes comme un oiseau, Benjamin ! Vous serez fascinés par la fantaisie !<page=L>Aujourd ' hui, l'élevage des cafards est libéré de la famine. Le travail est dangereux et la nourriture n'est pas la meilleure, mais je ne me plains pas.<page=L>En particulier, de plus en plus d'éleveurs meurent de cette étrange maladie. Cela signifie plus de viande pour moi.« Ouais !

original_en_text: <page=L>We’re all fine here, miss. Content, like. P’raps it were time you made your way, eh?<page=S>Yeah, be on your way! And, erm, thanks for yer help there.
original_zh_text: <page=L>我俩在这儿好得很，小姐。差不多该动身了吧？<page=S>对，赶紧走！另外，呃……多谢帮忙。
translated_text: <page=L>We're all right, miss. The content, as it were. Now, you should come in your own way.<page=S>Okay, let's go! Again, thank you for your cooperation.
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Tout va bien, mademoiselle. Le contenu, comme ça. Maintenant, vous devriez venir à votre façon.<page=S>Bon, allons-y ! Encore une fois, merci pour votre coopération.

translated_text: buy steel?
secondary_translated_text: Acheter de l'acier ?

original_en_text: Sssss. Your hunger betrayssss-ss you, misstress. The morsel was not yet grown, but let it anger you not. I will grow you another... for I am your sss-ssslave.
original_zh_text: 咝——您看起来饥饿难耐了，主人。食物还未养成，请您息怒。奴才我继续努力……因为我永远是您的仆从。
translated_text: Your hunger has betrayed you. The pressure is too strong. I haven't grown up yet, but please don't make me angry. I'll make another one for you. I am your slave. "
secondary_translated_text: Votre faim vous a trahi. La pression est trop forte. Je n'ai pas encore grandi, mais ne me mettez pas en colère. Je vais en faire un autre pour toi. Je suis ton esclave. "

original_en_text: Ssss! You have come to claim me, and I am yourssss. I am your humble sss-ssslave!<hpage>I’ve no interest in mastery over you, sir. If my cutting down of those black masses aided you, it was merely by chance. Farewell.<page>Farewell...? No... the sss-strong claim the weak, and the weak must sss-ssserve! I am yoursss, my mistress, and you muss-sst protect me!<page>Sss-ssee what I have built here! Prepared, for the coming of my mistressss. My powerful missssss-tress!<page>While you are away hunting, I will grow you... ssss-something good. But the work takesss time. Return to me sssss-soon, and you may have what I grow...
original_zh_text: 咝——！您来收服奴才了！奴才是您的，卑微的仆从！<hpage>我无意当你的主人。若清除那些黑暗之物帮助了你，仅是机缘巧合。告辞。<page>告辞……？不行不行……咝——强者当纳弱者，弱者理应侍奉！奴才归您了，主人您必须庇护我！<page>快瞧奴才为您建的巢穴！专为恭迎您的到来！我强大的主人！<page>您外出狩猎时，奴才将为您培育……一些好东西。但奴才我需要一些时间。等您回来，就能得到我培育的成果……
translated_text: Shh! You have demanded me, and I am yours. I am a humble slave.<hpage>I don't control you. If my black record helped you, it was accidental. goodbye, sir.<page>goodbye...? No, no, no. The strong call themselves the weak, and the weak sss-ssserve! I am yours, my mistress, protect me! "<page>"Look, look what I made!" Be prepared to meet your lover. My powerful woman!<page>When you go hunting, I'll help you to grow a good one. However, this work takes time. Come back to me quickly, and you can have what I have planted. "
secondary_translated_text: Shh ! Tu m'as demandé, et je suis à toi. Je suis un humble esclave.<hpage>Je ne vous contrôle pas. Si mon dossier noir vous a aidé, c'était accidentel. Adieu, monsieur.<page>Au revoir ? ... Les forts s'appellent les faibles, et les faibles sss-ssserve ! Je suis à toi, maîtresse, protégez-moi ! "<page>« Regardez, regardez ce que j'ai fait !« Soyez prêt à rencontrer votre amant. Ma femme puissante !<page>Quand tu vas chasser, je t'aiderai à en cultiver un bon. Cependant, ce travail prend du temps. Revenez vite à moi, et vous aurez ce que j'ai planté. "

original_en_text: <page=S>Wh... why the delay? You keepin’ them guts for yourself? Here, Crull, she’s goin’ back on her promise!<page=L>Har. Promises is easily broken. But then, so’s a lot of other things. How ‘bout you reconsider yer greed there, missy?
original_zh_text: <page=S>啧……怎么磨磨蹭蹭的？你想私吞内脏？克鲁尔，她反悔啦！<page=L>哈，承诺不就是易碎。虽然其他东西也挺易碎的。小姐，要不重新掂量下你这贪心值不值当？
translated_text: <page=S>that's... Why delay? Do you give yourself the courage to do so? Here, Krul, she's going to break her promise!<page=L>Hal's promises are easily broken. There are many other things, why don't you reconsider your greed?
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>C'est ça... Pourquoi le retard ? Vous donnez le courage de le faire ? C'est là, Krul, elle va rompre sa promesse !<page=L>Les promesses d'Halle sont facilement rompues. Il y a beaucoup d'autres choses, pourquoi ne pas reconsidérer votre cupidité ?

original_en_text: <page=S>Oi! You ain’t got the beads? Or you just not wantin’ to part with ‘em? <page=L>Hardly the time to be a miser, missy. You’re gonna be livin’ sick till you buy these spines from us.
original_zh_text: <page=S>喂！你是身上没念珠，还是舍不得花？<page=L>小姐，现在可不是抠门的时候！不买这些钢棘，你就只能继续病着了！
translated_text: <page=S>Hey! don't you have any beads? Or do you want to break up with them?<page=L>This is not the time of the poor. You will get sick before you buy these spines from us.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Hey ! Vous n'avez pas de perles ? Ou bien tu veux rompre avec eux ?<page=L>Ce n'est pas le temps des pauvres. Vous allez être malade avant d'acheter ces épines chez nous.
