original_en_text: A cage with a simple lock.
translated_text: A simple cage with a lock.
secondary_translated_text: Une simple cage avec une serrure.

original_en_text: Sssss! I saw you. I sssss-saw what you did!
original_zh_text: 咝——！我看见了。奴才我看见您的手段了！
translated_text: sheez! I look at you, I see what you have done.
secondary_translated_text: Sheesh ! Je vous regarde, je vois ce que vous avez fait.

translated_text: <hpage>I'll talk to you again. They show their appearance.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je vais vous parler à nouveau. Ils montrent leur apparence.

original_en_text: <hpage>Good bugs, I am here on request of the doctor Yarnaby. She requires spines forged of steel for a crucial operation.<page=L>Argh! Look at ‘er, Benj’n. She’s all sick like! Coiled up tight with somethin’ weird. I reckon that operation’s for her herself!<page=S>She’s a sad sight for sure Crull, but sick or not our scrap’s hard-found. If she’s wantin’, we’s gotta be gettin’ paid!<page=L>Ah! ‘Fraid the little one speaks true, missy. You might be ailin’, but we can’t be offerin’ charity. <page=L>We’re stockin’ the spines you need. You just gotta be ready to part with some beads!
original_zh_text: <hpage>二位，我受雅纳碧医生所托来到此处。她需要一些钢棘来完成一场重要的手术。<page=L>啊呀！班金快看，她病恹恹的！壳里缠着怪东西，手术是要给自己做的吧！<page=S>惨是惨，但咱的废料也是辛辛苦苦收集来的。想要就得掏钱！<page=L>唉！班金说得对，小姐。您虽然是病患，但我们不做慈善。<page=L>只要念珠够，钢棘有的是！
translated_text: <hpage>I came at Dr. Anabee's request. Surgery requires a steel spine.<page=L>ah! ah! Look at Benjamin, she's so sick! Strange things and wrap them up tightly. I think surgery is for her.<page=S>Krul, she's certainly a sad sight, but whether we're sick or not, it's hard to find our waste. If she wants to, she has to pay!<page=L>ah! ah! "Lady, what the child says is true. You may be sick, but you cannot do charity.<page=L>We are keeping the necessary spine. You just need to be ready to give up a few beads!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je suis venu à la demande du Dr Anabee. La chirurgie nécessite une colonne vertébrale d'acier.<page=L>Ah ! Ah ! Regardez Benjamin, elle est très malade ! Des choses étranges et les envelopper fermement. Je pense que la chirurgie est pour elle.<page=S>Krul, c'est certainement une vue triste, mais que nous soyons malades ou non, il est difficile de trouver nos déchets. Si elle le veut, elle doit payer !<page=L>Ah ! Ah !« Madame, ce que dit l'enfant est vrai. Vous pouvez être malade, mais vous ne pouvez pas faire la charité.<page=L>Nous gardons la colonne vertébrale nécessaire. Il vous suffit d'être prêt à renoncer à quelques perles !

original_en_text: Strong you are, misstress! Sss-ssmall, but so so deadly. And your ssscent! Well-aged!
original_zh_text: 咝——您真强悍，主人！身形虽小，杀伐果决。还有这味道——古老的气息！
translated_text: You're strong, ma 'am! Hush: Small, but very deadly. And your SSCent! I am old!
secondary_translated_text: Vous êtes forte, madame ! Hush : Petit, mais très mortel. Et votre SScent ! Je suis vieux !

original_en_text: Leave it, bug. I accept my place.<hpage>Very well, prisoner.
original_zh_text: 别管我了，小虫子。我已认命。<hpage>悉听尊便。
translated_text: Forget it, bug. I accept my position.<hpage>All right, Prisoner.
secondary_translated_text: Oubliez-le, bug. J'accepte ma position.<hpage>Très bien, prisonnier.

original_en_text: Sssss! Such sssss-sounds, plucked from the air and caught in your Silk! A marvel, my misss-stress...<hpage>It is a skill that any can learn. You could master this sound yourself, if you cared to.<page>No... a slave must grow morsels for his mistresssss. But the sssound... is so ssssss-soothing...
original_zh_text: 咝——！此等丝弦天籁，主人，这真是神迹……<hpage>这项技艺所有虫子皆可习得。你若愿意，也能精通。<page>不……仆从必须为主人培育食物。但这天籁之音……实在是令我感到抚慰……
translated_text: sheez! The hissing sounds are pulled out of the air and caught in your silk! The Pressure Lady<hpage>It is a skill that anyone can learn. You can control your voice yourself if you need to.<page>No, no, no. A slave must cultivate something for his mistress. SSSound. This is a kind of liberation.
secondary_translated_text: Sheesh ! Les sons sifflants sont tirés de l'air et capturés dans votre soie ! La pression Lady<hpage>C'est une compétence que n'importe qui peut apprendre. Vous pouvez contrôler votre voix si vous en avez besoin.<page>Un esclave doit cultiver quelque chose pour sa maîtresse. SSSOUND. C'est une sorte de libération.

original_en_text: It is done. Our nessst is larger, and the little queen beginssss her toil. <page>More morsss-ssels can I grow for you now! Are you pleasss-sed with me, my missstress-ss?<hpage>You are diligent at your work, and have raised no claw against me. If it remains so, I will have no reason to be displeased.<page>Ssss! Then my work will continue! For I am ever your devoted sss-ssslave!
original_zh_text: 大功告成。巢穴已扩建完毕，小女王已经开始她的劳作。<page>现在奴才我可以为您培育更多的食物了！您对我满意吗，我的主人？<hpage>你工作勤勉，也从未对我起过任何歹意。若能保持如此，我便没有不满的理由。<page>咝——！奴才一定继续勤恳工作！因为我永远是您忠诚的仆从！
translated_text: The queen who solves our case is getting bigger, and the little queen is working hard too.<page>Now we can plant more grass! Will you stay with me, miss? "<hpage>Work hard and don't touch it. If it stays like this, I have no reason to be angry.<page>Shh! My work will continue! I will forever be your faithful slave!
secondary_translated_text: La reine qui résout notre affaire devient de plus en plus grande, et la petite reine travaille dur aussi.<page>Maintenant, nous pouvons planter plus d'herbe ! Voulez-vous rester avec moi mademoiselle ? "<hpage>Travaillez dur et ne le touchez pas, si cela reste comme ça, je n'ai aucune raison d'être en colère.<page>Shh ! Mon travail continuera ! Je serai pour toujours ton fidèle esclave !

original_en_text: Ssss! Mistress, is the morsss-sssel I grew worthy? You must conss-sume... conssss-sume and become sss-stronger.<page>Thissss is how I will sss-sserve my misstress-ss. While you hunt, I will prepare morsssels. Alwaysss, preparing them for my mighty misssss-tresss...<hpage>Continue this work if it pleases you sir, but do not call me your mistress, for I am not.<page>Sss... but you are... missstress. You are ssss-strong and I am weak.... a sss-sslave. Alwayss-sss, your ssss-slave...
original_zh_text: 咝——！主人，奴才培育的食物可还合您心意？请享用……变得更强大。<page>这就是奴才我的侍奉之道。您外出狩猎时，奴才准备食物。永远为主人效劳……<hpage>先生，若你乐于此道便请继续，但请不要称我为主人。我并非你的主人。<page>咝——可您就是……我的主人。您强大，我弱小……我永远是您的仆从……
translated_text: Shh! is this mistress, the son of a bitch who grew up with me, worth it? We need to recognize that. Understand and become stronger.<page>This is the care of my mistress. When we go hunting, we prepare food. Be prepared for your wife.<hpage>"Please continue this work, if you will." But please don't call me your mistress.<page>Shh, but you're... Miss, you are strong, I am weaksss-ssslave. Be your SSS slave.
secondary_translated_text: Shh ! Est-ce que cette maîtresse, le fils de salope qui a grandi avec moi, en vaut la peine ? Nous devons le reconnaître. Comprendre et devenir plus forte.<page>C'est le soin de ma maîtresse. Quand on va à la chasse, on prépare la nourriture. Soyez prêt pour votre femme.<hpage>« S'il vous plaît, continuez ce travail, si vous voulez.« Ne m'appelle pas ta maîtresse.<page>Shh, mais vous êtes... Vous êtes forte, je suis faible, esclave. Soyez votre esclave SSS.

original_en_text: <page=S>That smell! S’overwhelming! I ain’t never seen so many roach guts at once!<page=L>Benj’n, me old mate, get a grip on yerself. These guts still need cuttin’, and cleanin’, and stewin’. You got a lotta work ahead of you.<page=S>Fine by me, Crull, if it means such a feast! We’ll be eatin’ like they do up in the Citadel soon enough!<page=L>And what about you, missy? You be joinin’ us for this exquisite meal?<hpage>I’m afraid not, sirs. I must keep moving, and I fear the taste of such a delicacy is wasted on me.<page=L>I was hopin’ as much. Two can sing, but three’s too many, eh? Har har!<page=L>Still, maybe this tool is enough for you to ‘member us by? A pointed weapon of me own makin’, from when I used to wrangle the Muckroaches meself. I bet you’ll get some good use from it.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这味儿！够冲！我这辈子没见过这么多蟑螂内脏！<page=L>班金老伙计，稳住！这些内脏还得切洗炖煮，你的活还多着呢。<page=S>包在我身上，克鲁尔！我们能吃上圣堡级别的宴席啦！<page=L>小姐您呢？要赏脸和我们共进大餐不？<hpage>恕不奉陪，我得继续前行了。而且此等美味给我享用，实属浪费。<page=L>正合我意！俩虫享用正好，仨就嫌多！哈！<page=L>但我希望这工具能让您记住我俩。这是当年我还在驯蟑螂时亲手制作的武器，希望您用得顺手。
translated_text: <page=S>That smell! Overwhelming! I've never seen so many cockroach organs!<page=L>Benjamin, my old man, control yourself. These internal organs need to be cut, washed and boiled. There's a lot of work to do.<page=S>Krul, if that means such a feast, I have no problem! I will eat like a castle soon!<page=L>miss, are you? why don't you have a nice meal together?<hpage>Unfortunately not everyone I'm worried that this taste will be wasted.<page=L>I hope I can sing with two people, but it's too much for three people, isn't it? ha ha ha!<page=L>But is this tool enough to get you to "join us "? I used to argue with cockroaches, so it's a weapon I made myself. I'm sure you'll use it well.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Cette odeur !écrasant ! Je n'ai jamais vu autant d'organes de cafard !<page=L>Benjamin, mon vieil homme, maîtrise-toi. Ces organes internes doivent être coupés, lavés et bouillis. Il y a beaucoup de travail à faire.<page=S>Krul, si cela veut dire une telle fête, je n'ai aucun problème ! Je vais bientôt manger comme un château.<page=L>Mademoiselle, c'est vous ? Pourquoi ne pas manger un bon repas ensemble ?<hpage>Malheureusement, tout le monde ne craint pas que ce goût ne soit gaspillé.<page=L>J'espère pouvoir chanter avec deux personnes, mais c'est trop pour trois personnes, non ? Ha ha ha !<page=L>Mais cet outil suffit-il pour vous amener à « nous rejoindre » ? J'avais l'habitude de me disputer avec des cafards, donc c'est une arme que j'ai faite moi-même. Je suis sûr que vous l'utiliserez bien.

original_en_text: Take. Ahhh, my reward. Give them.
original_zh_text: 我要拿走。啊……我的奖赏。给我。
translated_text: Oh, my reward. Give it to them.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ma récompense. Donnez-les à eux.

original_en_text: With thissss... ssso caringly delivered by the misstresss... our nesssst can be expanded!
original_zh_text: 咝——这是……主人亲自护送过来的……我们的巢穴可以扩建了！
translated_text: Our needs can be expanded - to be kind to the mistress of this thing!
secondary_translated_text: Nos besoins peuvent être élargis - être gentils avec la maîtresse de cette chose !

original_en_text: Leave me be. This kingdom’s collapse has come. Better I stay here to accept it.<page>To die within a cage... A fitting finale for this shell, and a well deserved fate for these cursed lands.<hpage>As you wish, prisoner.
original_zh_text: 让我安安静静待在这里吧。这个王国即将倾塌，我应当待在这里，坦然接受一切。<page>在囚笼中死去……也算是我这副甲壳注定的命数了，这片诅咒之地亦是如此。<hpage>如你所愿。
translated_text: Get away from me. The collapse of the kingdom has come. You better stay here and accept it.<page>They die in a cage. It was the end of a fate worthy of this shell and the cursed land.<hpage>As you like, prisoners.
secondary_translated_text: Éloignez-vous de moi, la chute du royaume est venue. Tu ferais mieux de rester ici et de l'accepter.<page>Ils mourraient dans une cage. C'était la fin d'un destin digne de cette coquille et de la terre maudite.<hpage>Comme vous le souhaitez, prisonniers !

original_zh_text: 我能感知到你，藏起来的那位。
translated_text: I can feel you. They are hiding.
secondary_translated_text: Je peux vous sentir. Ils sont cachés.

original_en_text: <page=L>Another trade fairly conducted, har. Those spines are sharp, and they’s hardly begun to rust. Better be gettin’ back to your doc to get yerself sorted out, eh?
original_zh_text: <page=L>又一笔公道买卖，哈。这些钢棘锋利如初，基本还没开始生锈。快去找您那位医生治病去吧！
translated_text: <page=L>Another fair deal, ah. The thorns are sharp and hardly rust. you should go to the doctor and treat him, right?
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Un autre accord équitable, ah. Les épines sont tranchantes et à peine rouillées. Vous devriez aller chez le médecin et le soigner, non ?

original_en_text: <page=L>We’re still waitin’ on them roach guts you promised us, missy. Patiently, but not too patiently, you get me?<page=S>You can find the Muckroaches all ‘round these roads. Cut one down and reach inside its shell to pull out the tasty guts! Mmmmm!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，我俩还等着您许诺的蟑螂内脏呢。耐着性子等，但也不太耐烦了，懂我意思吗？<page=S>淤秽蟑螂到处都是，找一只来宰了，破开外壳，把内脏取来。唔——我都流口水了！
translated_text: <page=L>Waiting for the cockroach's internal organs Patient, but not too patient. do you understand that?<page=S>There are cockroaches around the road. Cut one side and put your hand in the shell to take out the delicious viscera! mmmmmmm!
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Attendez les organes internes du cafard Patient, mais pas trop patient. Comprenez-vous ça ?<page=S>Il y a des cafards sur la route. Coupez un côté et mettez votre main dans la coquille pour enlever les viscères délicieuses ! Mmmm !

original_en_text: Give them. Take wrong. Ssssomeone, ssssave me.
translated_text: Give it to them. I'm misunderstanding you. Please help me.
secondary_translated_text: Donnez-les à eux. Je vous comprends mal. S'il vous plaît, aidez-moi.

original_en_text: <hpage>I can sense you there, hidden in the darkness. Show yourself.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我能感知到你，隐匿于黑暗之中的那位。现身吧。
translated_text: <hpage>I can feel you hiding in the darkness. They show their appearance.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je peux te sentir caché dans l'obscurité. Ils montrent leur apparence.

original_en_text: <page=L>Refuse us, do you, missy? No matter then. We’ll just get back to slowly starving, har har!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，你真要拒绝我们吗？无妨！继续慢慢饿死呗，哈！哈！
translated_text: <page=L>mr. ulysses? We go back slowly and hungry.
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Monsieur Ulysses ? Nous retournons lentement et affamés.

original_en_text: <page=L>Ooh, someone’s carrying a delectable scent! Come to deliver us what you promised, missy?
original_zh_text: <page=L>噢，你身上有股好香的味道！小姐是来兑现承诺的吧？
translated_text: <page=L>Somebody smells so good! did you come to fulfill your promise?
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Quelqu 'un sent tellement bon ! Est-ce que tu es venu pour tenir ta promesse ?

original_zh_text: 咝——食物……交出来。我要拿走。
translated_text: Moses, give them. Take it.
secondary_translated_text: Moise, donne-les. Prenez-le.

original_en_text: <page=L>Thinkin’ serious about the spines, missy? Surely your good health’s worth more than a few beads!
original_zh_text: <page=L>要不再考虑考虑买钢棘的事？小姐，您的健康可比几颗念珠金贵！
translated_text: <page=L>Think of the spine, of course, your health is worth more than a few beads!
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Pensez à la colonne vertébrale, bien sûr, votre santé vaut plus que quelques perles !

translated_text: Yes, put it here!
secondary_translated_text: Oui, mettez-le ici !

original_en_text: <page=L>How ‘bout you put that poker to good use then, missy? Go poach some of them roaches and get us some tasty guts? There’d be fair trade waitin’ for yer!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，要不用你那根烧火棍帮我们开开荤？去宰几只蟑螂，把它们美味的内脏取来，我们会给你个公道价！
translated_text: <page=L>So, why not try to make good use of that poker? will you dig up a cockroach and bring me some delicious guts? Fairtrade is waiting for you!
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Alors, pourquoi ne pas essayer de faire bon usage de ce poker ? Voulez-vous creuser un cafard et m'apporter de délicieuses tripes ? Le Fairtrade vous attend !

original_en_text: Misstress, you called for your ssss-slave? I obey... for you are ssss-sstronger. My gatheringsss can wait.
original_zh_text: 咝——主人，您在召唤奴才我吗？奴才遵命……因您比我更强大。采集之事可以暂缓。
translated_text: you call them slaves? I will follow. Because you are strong. The kids can wait.
secondary_translated_text: Vous les appelez des esclaves ? Je suivrai. Parce que tu es forte. Les enfants peuvent attendre !

original_en_text: <page=L>Har. I reckon you don’t know how much trouble you’ve promised yourself just now, missy.<page=L>Ah well, best you get to it. Muckroaches are everywhere along these old roads. Just find a few and pluck their guts out. Easy as sin!
original_zh_text: <page=L>哈！小姐，您可不知自个儿揽了个多大的麻烦。<page=L>算了，麻溜开工吧。淤秽蟑螂到处都是，找几只宰了，把它们内脏取来。简单得很！
translated_text: <page=L>Hal, I don't think you have any idea how much trouble you've caused yourself.<page=L>Oh, I better go. The old road is full of cockroaches. Just find a few and remove the internal organs. As simple as sin!
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Hal, je ne pense pas que tu saches à quel point tu t'as causé des ennuis.<page=L>Oh, je ferais mieux d'y aller La vieille route est pleine de cafards. Il suffit d'en trouver quelques-uns et d'enlever les organes internes. Aussi simple que non !

translated_text: no, nothing's left.
secondary_translated_text: Non, il ne reste rien.

original_en_text: Leave me be, traveller. Better I accept this kingdom’s cruelty than rage helpless against it.<page>To waste in a cell, forgotten. ‘Tis no worse a fate than the Haunting that binds Pharloom’s many fragile minds.<hpage>As you wish, prisoner.
original_zh_text: 让我安安静静待在这里吧，旅行者。与其毫无意义地反抗这王国降下的残酷，不如选择接受它。<page>于囚笼钟腐朽，遗忘。总好过丝咒缠身，沦为纺络万千痴愚之一。<hpage>如你所愿。
translated_text: Don't forget me, traveler. I'd rather accept the cruelty of the kingdom than feel angry or helpless.<page>Waste in prison was forgotten. It was no worse fate than The Ghosts, which bound up much of Farum's fragile heart.<hpage>As you like, prisoners.
secondary_translated_text: N'oublie pas moi, voyageur. Je préfère accepter la cruauté du royaume plutôt que de me sentir en colère ou impuissant.<page>Les déchets en prison ont été oubliés. Ce n'était pas pire destin que Les Fantômes, qui lièrent une grande partie du cœur fragile de Farum.<hpage>Comme vous le souhaitez, prisonniers !

original_en_text: Tending to the morss-ssels is a delicate tasssk, and requiresss much patience. Let me toil for you, missstresss, under your exquisite protection...
original_zh_text: 咝——培育食物需要精细耐心。请容奴才我在您的庇护下劳作……
translated_text: Taking care of a morse cell is a delicate task and requires a lot of patience. Let me work hard for you under your protection, and you will be able to help me.
secondary_translated_text: Prendre soin d'une cellule de Morse est une tâche délicate et nécessite beaucoup de patience. Laissez-moi travailler dur pour vous, sous votre protection, et vous pourrez m'aider.

translated_text: Show me again and speak for yourself.
secondary_translated_text: Montrez-moi à nouveau et parlez pour vous-mêmes.

original_en_text: A ss-sslave must feed his misstress-sss. Morsss-sels will I grow. While you hunt, I am working... alwaysss-sss...
original_zh_text: 咝——奴才应当伺候主人。奴才我会培育食物。您狩猎时，奴才劳作……永不停歇……
translated_text: SS slaves need to feed their mistress's SS. They will grow. I work, you hunt. " I'm always...
secondary_translated_text: Les esclaves des SS doivent nourrir les SS de leur maîtresse. Ils grandiront. Je travaille, vous chassez. "Je suis toujours...

original_en_text: <page=S>S’a pleasure doin’ business, ma’am. It’s only the finest scrap we’re sellin’. Promise!<page=S>For your shell’s sake, we’ll be hopin’ all them spines can get the job done!
original_zh_text: <page=S>交易愉快，小姐。我们卖的绝对都是上等废料！我敢打包票！<page=S>希望这些钢棘能助你甲壳康复！
translated_text: <page=S>Glad to work with you, ma 'am. This is the best waste guarantee we sell!<page=S>For your shell, we hope all the backbones do the job!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Au plaisir de travailler avec vous, madame. C'est la meilleure garantie de déchets que nous vendons !<page=S>Pour votre coquille, nous espérons que toutes les épines font le travail !

original_en_text: Ssss! My misstress hasss returned to me! Under her protection, I have no fear of the ssslithering black sssss-sstringss!<page>How the world trembles in their terrible grassssp! In such times, only the mighty sssurvive... and those who loyally ss-sserve them...<hpage>I cannot remain here to protect you sir, but know that my aim is to cut this land free of the black threads. In the meantime, you should concern yourself with your own safety.<page>Ssss. I hear more than your words, misssstress. I hear your true dessiresss, pulsing within you. To see them met, I will continue to toil for you... alwaysssss.<page>
original_zh_text: 咝——！主人归巢，奴才拜伏！有您的护佑，奴才何惧那肆虐的黑灾！<page>天地在这恐怖攫握中战栗不休！咝——唯有强大者得以生存……以及附庸强者的忠仆……<hpage>我无法久留此地庇护你，先生。我此行是为了斩断此间黑灾的锁锢。各自珍重吧。<page>咝——奴才听到的岂止主人的言语，更识得您胸膛激荡的夙愿——必当达成！奴才唯有殚精竭虑……至死不渝！<page>
translated_text: Shh! The pressure is back! Under her protection, I am no longer afraid of the hyssop black hyssop!<page>How the world trembles in the dreadful grass! In times like these, only the strong survive. Those who serve him faithfully,<hpage>I cannot be here to protect you, but my goal is to remove the black line from this land. At the same time, you need to worry about your own safety.<page>I haven't heard what you say, miss. I could hear your real wish, the beating of your heart. To see them meet, I will continue to strive for you, always.<page>
secondary_translated_text: Shh ! La pression est de retour ! Sous sa protection, je n'ai plus peur de l'hispope noir !<page>Comme  le  monde  tr emble  dans  l ' her be  terrible  ! Dans  des  temps  comme  celui - ci ,  se uls  les  forts  survi vent . En  même  temps ,  vous  devez  vous  sou cier  de  votre  propre  sécurité .<page>Je  n ' ai  pas  entendu  ce  que  vous  dites ,  mad emo iselle . Je  pou vais  entendre  ton  dés ir  ré el ,  le  batt ement  de  ton  cœur . Pour  les  voir  se  rencontr er ,  je  continu erai  à  me  bat tre  pour  vous ,  toujours .<page>

original_en_text: <page=L>Oi, why you come in here, all treadin’ muck? With that nasty-lookin’ poker by yer side? Eh?<page=S>Yeah, why you comin’ in here? We ain’t done nothin’ wrong. We ain’t all twisted like them roachkeepers!<page=L>She’s come to kill us, Benj’n! S’the blimmin’ end for us, old mate! Har har!<hpage>I mean you no harm, good bugs. I cut down only those who bar my path.<page><page=L>That so? Well, them keepers outside ain’t inclined to let strangers pass by, so you’ll be makin’ good use of yer poker there, missy.
original_zh_text: <page=L>嘿，满脚泥污闯进来作甚？还带着根脏兮兮的烧火棍？嗯？<page=S>就是，来这儿干啥？我们可没干坏事，不像外头那群蟑螂看守者那样疯癫！<page=L>她是来宰咱们的，班金！老伙计，咱们要完犊子啦！哈哈！<hpage>二位，我无意加害你们。针刃只斩挡路之虫。<page><page=L>当真？外头的监管者可不爱放生面孔过路。小姐，你那烧火棍可要派上大用场咯！
translated_text: <page=L>what are you doing here? a pile of rubbish? do you have this ugly trump next to you? what? what?<page=S>Yeah, why did you get in there? I didn't do anything wrong. We're not all twisted like cockroach keepers!<page=L>She came to kill us, Benjamin! " This is a "stupid" end for us! ha ha ha!<hpage>I'm not hurting you, good bug. I only kill those who get in my way.<page><page=L>really? Well, the doorman outside won't let strangers through, so miss, make the most of your poker there.

Nous  ne  sommes  pas  tous  t ord us  comme  des  gar diens  de  caf ards  !<page=L>Elle  est  venue  nous  tuer ,  Benjamin  !«  C ' est  une  fin   «  stup ide   »  pour  nous  ! Ha  ha  ha  !<hpage>Je  ne  te  fais  pas  mal ,  bon  bug . Je  ne  tue  que  ceux  qui  se  mett ent  sur  mon  chemin .<page><page=L>Vra iment  ? Eh  bien ,  le  conci er ge  à  l ' ext érieur  ne  laiss era  pas  les  étr angers  passer ,  alors  miss ,  prof itez  au  maximum  de  votre  poker  là  -  bas .

translated_text: Okay, okay.

secondary_translated_text: Le  Salvador  n ' a  pas  d ' import ance .

original_en_text: Ready to reconsider my offer? Good for you! You won’t be going far without my help, dear.
original_zh_text: 回心转意了？明智的选择！没我帮忙你可走不远。
translated_text: are you ready to reconsider my proposal? Good for you! " you can't get very far without my help.
secondary_translated_text: Ê tes - vous  prêt  à  rec ons id érer  ma  proposition  ? Bon  pour  vous  !«  Tu  ne  peux  pas  aller  très  loin  sans  mon  aide .

original_en_text: I’ll grant you my courtesy, stray one. I’ll even offer aid where I’m able. Just don’t be hanging around too long.<page>I may not be a fan of that Citadel, but I’m smart enough to avoid its ire.
original_zh_text: 我愿意给你几分面子，浪游者。需要帮助时也会搭把手，但可别赖着不走。<page>我虽然厌恶圣堡，但可没傻到去触霉头。
translated_text: I show you my courtesy, vagabond. I will do my best not to stay here long.<page>I may not be a fan of this clever castle, but I am good enough to avoid that anger.
secondary_translated_text: Je  te  fais  preuve  de  cour to isie ,  va gab ond . Je  vais  faire  de  mon  mieux  pour  ne  pas  rester  longtemps .<page>Je  ne  suis  peut  -  être  pas  un  fan  de  ce  châ teau  intelligent ,  mais  je  suis  assez  bon  pour  é viter  cette  colère .

original_zh_text: 喀 玛阿克。诺库 格日？
translated_text: a camomach, a nauguri?
secondary_translated_text: Un  cam om ach  ou  un  na ug uri  ?

original_en_text: Back here again? It’s a strange pilgrimage that bends and doubles back on itself. Still, you may as well take the opportunity to share your rosaries.
original_zh_text: 又绕回来了？没见过像你这样在朝圣路上兜兜转转的。不过正好把念珠拿来交易。
translated_text: here again? It's a strange pilgrimage, and you can bend yourself and come back. Please take this opportunity to share your rosary.
secondary_translated_text: Ici à nouveau ? C'est un pèlerinage étrange, et vous pouvez vous plier et revenir. S'il vous plaît profitez de cette occasion pour partager votre Rosaire.

original_en_text: I’m loath to spoil the surprise, but curiosity begs me to ask. Do you know why they pursued you? Those Citadel bugs?<hpage>I have seen their Citadel and its state, and I have strong suspicion...<hpage>They hunt me for my nature. For the Silk produced within my shell. Not for themselves but for the one atop it all. <page>Ahh ha! Truth. In Pharloom, yours is a rare skill, prized beyond measure, to channel one’s soul within a thread. Soul and Silk inseparably linked.<page>It is a skill almost lost from Pharloom. Those old Weavers shared it, but they’re long dead now.<hpage>The one atop this kingdom... They share my nature, or some part of it. I’ve seen their Silk at work, in vast scale.<hpage>It snares the shells of those upon the roads, and guides with false life the many hollowed husks left to lapse.<page>Hmm... You’ve looked far towards the truth of it. Closer even than I’d dare to dig. But then you’re clearly of the countenance to be coping with such heady stuff...<page>Now! It’s past time you were going! Your style and your Silk sure are fine, but stay too long and you’ll only be trouble for me!
original_zh_text: 我本来不想多嘴，但实在好奇，圣堡的虫为何追你？<hpage>见过如今的圣堡后，我怀疑……<hpage>它们觊觎我甲壳产出灵丝的能力，而且是为了顶上那位。<page>哈！肯定是这样！在纺络，以魂注丝是无价神技，让魂与丝成为一体。<page>这技艺近乎失传。曾经的织者倒是会，如今早死绝了。<hpage>王国之上那位……与我同源，曾见识过相似的灵丝。<hpage>用丝线缠缚朝圣者，操纵空壳作为傀儡<page>嗯……你眼力不错！圣堡啊……答案都在那条路上，慢慢攀吧姑娘。<page>好了，你该走了！虽你长得英姿飒爽，但身负灵丝，久留只会给我惹祸！
translated_text: I didn't want to spoil the surprise, but curiosity made me ask. do you know why i'm being chased? the castle bugs?<hpage>I saw their castle and its state, and I strongly suspected it.<hpage>They're chasing me. For the silk made out of my shell. Not for myself, but for the One above all.<page>Oh, oh, oh! In "Pharaoh of Truth," your skills are a precious rare skill that leads a person's soul to a thread. The soul is inseparable from the silk.<page>This is a skill that most fouls have lost. The old Weaver shared it, but they are already dead. "<hpage>over this kingdom. Their nature is the same as mine, or part of it. I saw the large-scale work of Silk.<hpage>The way leads many hollow shells to enclose the shells of people, leaving behind false life.<page>um... You see the truth from a distance. Closer than I dug it. But you obviously have the ability to deal with such an exciting thing. "<page>now! You should go! Your style and silk are really great, but if you stay longer you will be in trouble!
secondary_translated_text: Je ne voulais pas gâcher la surprise, mais la curiosité m'a poussé à demander. Tu sais pourquoi je suis poursuivi ? Les Castle Bugs ?<hpage>J'ai vu leur château et son état, et j'en ai fortement soupçonné.<hpage>Ils me poursuivent, pour la soie faite de ma coquille. Non pas pour moi, mais pour celui qui est par-dessus tout.<page>Oh, oh, oh ! Dans "Pharaon de la Vérité", vos compétences sont une compétence rare et précieuse qui mène l'âme d'une personne à un fil. L'âme est inséparable de la soie.<page>C'est une compétence que la plupart des fous ont perdu. Le vieux Weaver l'a partagé, mais ils sont déjà morts. "<hpage>Sur ce royaume. Leur nature est la même que la mienne, ou une partie de celle-ci. J'ai vu le travail à grande échelle de la soie.<hpage>Le chemin mène à de nombreuses coquilles creuses pour enfermer les coquilles des gens, laissant derrière eux une fausse vie.<page>Umm... On voit la vérité de loin. Plus près que je ne l'ai creusé. Mais vous avez évidemment la capacité de faire face à une chose aussi excitante. "<page>Maintenant ! Tu devrais y aller ! Votre style et votre soie sont vraiment super, mais si vous restez plus longtemps, vous aurez des ennuis !

original_en_text: A smart choice. Get out there and gather those spine cores, and best you be quick about it.<page>As nice as it is to have the company, if you hang around too long, those Citadel bugs’ll turn their gaze on me as well.
original_zh_text: 明智的选择。那就快去收集棘刺吧，最好手脚麻利点。<page>虽说有身边个伴也挺好，但你在这待太久会连累我也遭到圣堡注目。
translated_text: That's a smart choice. Let's go outside and collect the core of the spine.<page>It's great to have companions, but if I stay longer, the bugs turn their eyes to me.
secondary_translated_text: C'est un choix intelligent. Allons dehors et rassemblons le noyau de la colonne vertébrale.<page>C'est génial d'avoir des compagnons, mais si je reste plus longtemps, les insectes tournent leurs yeux vers moi.

original_en_text: If you’re planning to ascend from these low fields, you’ll be needing some lift, and I’m just the bug to help.<page>Head for the caves beyond my home. The bugs within produce a spine with a marvellous core, flexible yet strong.<page>Cut their spines and collect the cores. Return to me, and I’ll soon have your old cloak transformed into something far more buoyant.
original_zh_text: 想从这低地往上去，得靠点助力，我正好能帮忙。<page>去我家附近的洞窟，里头的甲虫能产出一种奇妙棘刺，柔韧又结实。<page>收集棘刺交给我，保准把你的旧披风改造得轻巧如羽！
translated_text: If you need an elevator to climb up from this low field, just help the bugs.<page>From my house to that cave over there. The insects inside grow a large spine with a flexible and sturdy core.<page>Cut the spine and collect the core. Come back to me and quickly change your old cloak into a lighter one.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous avez besoin d'un ascenseur pour monter de ce bas champ, il suffit d'aider les insectes.<page>De ma maison à cette grotte là - bas. Les insectes à l'intérieur développent une grande colonne vertébrale avec un noyau flexible et robuste.<page>Coupez la colonne vertébrale et recueillez le noyau. Revenez chez moi et changez rapidement votre vieille manteau en une plus légère.

original_en_text: Pale beast... bringing ruin... we had sensed it... you writing harsh our final fate...<page>If power... you come seeking... mine is faded.... mortal... time taken...<hpage>I seek only to save these lands, great one, to break them free from this fatal sickness born of thread and void.<page>Kcha! If you may... beast... If you can...
original_zh_text: 苍白异兽……携灾而至……吾等早有预感……汝书写的，是斯卡尔的终章……<page>若力量……是汝所求……吾已衰微……凡躯……时日无多……<hpage>我只为拯救这片土地而来，蚁后，将众生从丝线与虚空带来的灾厄中解放。喀嚓！……若汝能……异兽……若汝可……
translated_text: The white beast will bring destruction. We feel the cruelty of your writing, our ultimate destiny.<page>If you have the power you come to look for it, mine fade, ordinary people take time.<hpage>Great man, I am only trying to save this land from this deadly disease that arises from thread and void.<page>stop it! If possible, beast.
secondary_translated_text: La bête blanche apportera la destruction. Nous ressentons la cruauté de vos écrits, notre destin ultime.<page>Si vous avez le pouvoir, vous venez le chercher, le mien s'estompera, les gens ordinaires prennent du temps.<hpage>« Grand homme, je ne fais que sauver cette terre de cette maladie mortelle qui naît du fil et du vide.<page>Arrêtez ! Si possible, la bête.

original_en_text: Well, then! I can tell by the rattling from within your cloak, your hunt was a success! If you’ll kindly pass over the cores, I can get to work.
original_zh_text: 嗯，我能听到你披风里的窸窣声，看来是满载而归！棘刺拿来，我马上开工。
translated_text: Then go! From the sound of your mantle, you can tell that your hunt has been successful! If I can pass the core, then I can start working.
secondary_translated_text: Alors va ! D'après le son de votre manteau, vous pouvez dire que votre chasse a été réussie ! Si je peux passer le noyau, alors je peux commencer à travailler.

original_en_text: Save them... if you can... pale beast...
original_zh_text: 拯救他们……若汝可……苍白异兽……
translated_text: Save them. " If possible. "Pale Beast"
secondary_translated_text: Sauvez-les.« Si possible.« Bête pâle »

original_en_text: Ahhh... I am so tired. But to tarry long would be sacrilege...
original_zh_text: 唉……太累……但久留便是渎神……
translated_text: ah... I'm tired, but I'm embarrassed to stay too long.
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. Je suis fatiguée, mais j'ai honte de rester trop longtemps.

original_en_text: Very well, ssspiidderr. Keep your organsss, for now.
original_zh_text: 好吧，小蜘蛛……留着你的内脏，咝——暂时。
translated_text: Well done, SSP IDERR. Preserve your organs for a while.
secondary_translated_text: Bien fait, SSP IDERR. Préservez vos organes pendant un certain temps.

original_en_text: <page>Oooh! Stray one. Do tell, how goes the journey?<hpage>I have ventured high, seen the Citadel and its state. That place is long lost... generations lost, a gilded tomb, drowned in Silk dregs.<hpage>For its minions, so compelled in my capture, I now see clearly the source of their unity, and their strange strength... They are husks bound tight by the one who waits at its crest...<page>Agh! Look at you! Seeing right through to the truth of it! Closer even than I’d dare to dig. But then you’re clearly of the countenance to be coping with such heady stuff...<page>Now! Best you be heading. You’re clearly planning to stir up some serious trouble. I don’t want to be close when it kicks off!
original_zh_text: <page>哟！浪游者。最近怎么样？<hpage>我攀到了高处，见到了如今的圣堡。宛如一座镀金坟冢，浸在腐朽丝渣里。<hpage>那些想抓我的喽啰，我也看清了。都是被顶端那位用丝线操控的傀儡……<page>嗬！这就看清了真相！比我更敢深究。看你这副神情，摆明了是要碰一碰这硬茬……<page>那就赶紧上路！既然你要惹大麻烦，我可不想被波及！
translated_text: <page>oh! One of the vagabonds. Tell me how your trip was.<hpage>I climbed up the high place and saw the castle and what it looked like. That place is long gone. A generation had passed, and the golden tomb was filled with silk debris.<hpage>For its men, I was forced to capture too much, that I could now clearly see the source of their unity, and their strange power; they are a shell bound tightly to those who wait on the top of the mountain.<page>ah! ah! Look at you! Seeing through the truth! Closer than I dug it. But you obviously have the ability to deal with such an exciting thing. "<page>now! You'd better go, obviously you're going to cause serious trouble. I don't want to get too close at the start of the game.
secondary_translated_text: <page>Ooh ! Un des vagabonds. Racontez-moi comment s'est passé votre voyage.<hpage>J'ai monté le haut et j'ai vu le château et à quoi il ressemblait. Cet endroit est depuis longtemps parti. Une génération était passée, et le tombeau doré était rempli de débris de soie.<hpage>Pour ses hommes, j'ai été forcé de capturer trop, que je pouvais maintenant clairement voir la source de leur unité, et leur étrange puissance ; ils sont une coquille liée étroitement à ceux qui attendent sur le sommet de la montagne.<page>Ah ! Ah ! Regardez vous ! Voir à travers la Vérité ! Plus près que je ne l'ai creusé. Mais vous avez évidemment la capacité de faire face à une chose aussi excitante. "<page>Maintenant ! Tu ferais mieux d'y aller, évidemment tu vas causer de sérieux ennuis. Je ne veux pas être trop proche au début du jeu.

original_en_text: That pouch of yours... With the scraps left here and a little work, I could add some pockets for you, let you carry more tools and shards while on the road. That’d be nice, wouldn’t it?
original_zh_text: 你这工具袋……我能加点布料，让它能多塞工具。这样路上也方便，对吧？
translated_text: Your bags leave the trash here, and with a little work, you can add pockets to carry more tools and debris on the road. that's great, isn't that?
secondary_translated_text: Vos sacs laissent la poubelle ici, et avec un peu de travail, vous pouvez ajouter des poches pour transporter plus d'outils et de débris sur la route. C'est génial, n'est-ce pas ?

original_en_text: All those gooey bugssss, all so reluctant to share their organs. Sssooo much coaxing and gnawing, and prodding.<page>They should be proud! Their ssmall sssacrifice would become much sssustenance for my ferocious young.
original_zh_text: 那些黏糊糊的虫子，个个抠门不肯掏出内脏给我。咝——连哄带骗，又咬又戳，才肯给我。<page>他们该骄傲！咝——这点小牺牲能养大我那群凶猛的孩子。
translated_text: Not all worms are willing to share their organs. Lots of tricks, chewing and irritation.<page>You should be proud of them! Their little sacrifice will be the chief food of my ferocious descendants.
secondary_translated_text: Tous les vers ne sont pas disposés à partager leurs organes. Beaucoup de trucs, de mâcher et d'irritation.<page>Vous devriez être fiers d'eux ! Leur petit sacrifice sera la nourriture principale de mes descendants féroces.

original_en_text: For your efforts, take these rosaries as payment. May they not lay too heavy upon your shell.
original_zh_text: 这是酬劳，但愿念珠不会压垮你的行囊。
translated_text: Please accept this rosary as a reward. Try not to be too heavy on your shell.
secondary_translated_text: Veuillez accepter ce chapelet comme récompense. Essayez de ne pas être trop lourd sur votre coque.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not offer my own organs, hunter, though I may bring the meat of others slain.<page>Good ssspidderr! Ssskewered. Ssshredded. Ssseared! Bring it all. Much will be needed, enough to sate my brood to come.<hpage>Several of my tools can prepare the meats as you request. I have been fortunate to find so varied an arsenal within your lands.<page>My brood has not long till hatching, ssssspiddderrr. Do your duty ssswift, and you shall sssee reward for the sssslaughter.
original_zh_text: <hpage>猎手，我不会为你献上自己的内脏，但也许我能带给你其他猎物的血肉。<page>咝——！好啊，小蜘蛛！串烧、撕碎、炙烤！统统带来。我的孩子需要大量血肉才能饱足。<hpage>我带的工具能按你的要求处理血肉。你们这地界真像个武器库，各种装备种类齐全。<page>我的孩子就快孵化了，咝——小蜘蛛……动作快点，完成我的需求，必有重谢。
translated_text: <hpage>I will not sacrifice my own organs, Hunter, but I can bring you other slaughtered meat.<page>The SSPidder. Hissing. Shhhh, shhhh! Bring it all and you need lots of things for your children and grandchildren.<hpage>There are tools available to cook the meat upon request. I am fortunate to find such a diverse weapon in your land.<page>My baby will hatch soon, SSspidddderr. Fulfilling your responsibilitiesssssswift - you will receive the reward ofssslaw.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je ne vais pas sacrifier mes organes, Hunter, mais je peux vous apporter d'autres viandes abattues.<page>Le SSPIDDER. Hissée. Shhhh, Shhhh ! Apportez-le tout et vous avez besoin de beaucoup de choses pour vos enfants et petits-enfants.<hpage>Des outils sont disponibles pour cuisiner la viande sur demande. J'ai la chance de trouver une arme aussi variée dans votre pays.<page>Mon bébé va bientôt éclore, SSspidddderr. En remplissant vos responsabilités, vous recevrez la récompense de la loi.

original_en_text: <hpage>I’ll have the spine cores for you shortly, madam.<page>Good, good! The caves just beyond here are full of the creatures, floating carelessly in the warm air.<page>I’m sure your big needle there can coax them into sharing their spines. Then it’s only a quick matter of cutting them open and grabbing the cores.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我稍候就带来棘刺，女士。<page>好！附近的洞窟里到处是那种浮空的蠢虫。<page>你的长针肯定能"劝"它们献出棘刺。
translated_text: <hpage>You'll be ready for your spinal core right away.<page>okay, okay! The distant caves are full of creatures that float in the warm air.<page>Believe that your big needle can persuade you to share the spine, then quickly cut and grab the nucleus.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Vous serez prêt pour votre noyau épinier tout de suite.<page>Ok, ok ! Les grottes lointaines sont pleines de créatures qui flottent dans l'air chaud.<page>Croyez que votre grosse aiguille peut vous convaincre de partager la colonne vertébrale, puis coupez rapidement et saisissez le noyau.

original_en_text: A holy burden to help maintain your poise. Whether striking others or being struck yourself, you’ll remain firmly in place.
original_zh_text: 这份神圣负赘能帮助你维持姿态，无论攻守都能稳如磐石。
translated_text: It is a sacred duty to keep calm. Whether you attack others or you attack yourself, you stay firmly in your place.
secondary_translated_text: C'est un devoir sacré de garder le calme. Que vous attaquiez les autres ou que vous vous attaquiez vous-même, vous restez fermement à votre place.

original_en_text: Not interested in trade? I wonder, will your rosaries weigh you down during your ascent?
original_zh_text: 不做买卖？揣着念珠攀登不怕负担过重？
translated_text: Not interested in trade? Does your rosary feel heavy when you wake up?
secondary_translated_text: Pas intéressé au commerce ? Est-ce que votre chapelet se sent lourd quand vous vous réveillez ?

original_en_text: Perfect! These should be more than enough. Wait there just a moment and we’ll soon have you soaring up and away from these lowlands.
original_zh_text: 完美！这些够用了。稍等片刻，保你能够腾空而起，远离这破地方。
translated_text: perfect! That's enough. Please wait there for a while. I'll fly you out of this lowland right away.
secondary_translated_text: Parfait ! C'est assez. Veuillez attendre là - bas un moment. Je vais vous faire sortir de cette terre basse tout de suite.

original_en_text: Rkraha. Uohk kha!<hpage>My apologies, sir. Though I can grasp the language of many bugs, your words are unfamiliar even to me.<page>Kha... kha mauak. Noku... gri?<hpage><hpage>These items you have collected. These are the wares of a warrior. Do you wish to trade?<page>Noku... noku!
original_zh_text: 尔克拉哈。乌奥赫克 喀！<hpage>抱歉，先生。虽然我略懂各族虫语，但你的语言我实在不熟。<page>喀……喀 玛阿克。诺库……格日？<hpage><hpage>你收集的这些东西……是战士的货。你想交易？<page>诺库……诺库！
translated_text: Luclara. Uohk Kha!<hpage>I can understand the language of many insects, but I'm not familiar with your language.<page>it's a cockroach, wild jerry?<hpage><hpage>Items you have collected. These belong to the warrior. Do you want to trade?<page>Wild, wild!
secondary_translated_text: Luclara ! Uohk Kha !<hpage>Je peux comprendre le langage de beaucoup d'insectes, mais je ne connais pas la vôtre.<page>C'est un cafard, Jerry sauvage ?<hpage><hpage>Objets que vous avez collectés. Elles appartiennent au guerrier. Vous voulez faire du commerce ?<page>Wild, Wild !

original_en_text: Get a move on, stray one! We’re all suffering for your conflict... Maybe next time you act towards calmer conclusions, aye?
original_zh_text: 快去吧！大伙都在遭罪……下次闹腾的时候悠着点行不？
translated_text: Keep going, Ranger! We have all suffered because of your conflicts. Maybe next time you'll come to a more sober conclusion.
secondary_translated_text: Continuez à faire, Ranger ! Nous avons tous souffert de vos conflits. Peut - être que la prochaine fois vous arriverez à une conclusion plus sobre.

original_en_text: These humble shards can form together into something grand, if you possess the vision to shape them.
original_zh_text: 这些碎片应该能拼凑成形，但要看你有无打磨的技巧。
translated_text: If you have a vision, these little pieces can come together and make something grand.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous avez une vision, ces petits morceaux peuvent se réunir et faire quelque chose de grand.

original_en_text: After all that hunting, you won’t trust me with your spoils? You’re a funny one. They won’t do you any good just filling up your pockets!
original_zh_text: 大费周折取来棘刺，却信不过我？你可真逗。揣着这些刺有什么用！
translated_text: Are you worried about handing over the spoils after the hunt is over? You're an interesting person. They just fill your pocket and bring you no profit!
secondary_translated_text: Êtes-vous inquiet de remettre le butin après la fin de la chasse ? Tu es une personne intéressante. Ils remplissent simplement votre poche et ne vous apportent aucun profit !

original_en_text: That’s a fancy pin you’re flaunting upon your cloak there. Here’s hoping you didn’t have to kill to claim it.<hpage>The emblem was given freely, Seamstress, as reward for a fierce duel won fair.<page>Given freely!? My, my. So my sister’s welcomed another to the order... Sounds like age might’ve softened even her stoic style.<page>Can’t say I think too fondly on the old ways... but some rituals, and some memories... those are still worth preserving.
original_zh_text: 披风上别着的针徽挺漂亮嘛，但愿不是从尸壳上抢来的。<hpage>这针徽是公平比斗赢来的，女士。<page>她自愿给的？！哎呀呀，竟然纳新成员入团……岁月到底是软了她古板心肠。<page>我不待见那些古训……但有些仪式，有些回忆……还是值得留存。
translated_text: It's a lovely pin on the mantle. I hope I can get it without killing people.<hpage>The heroine is given a badge for free, as the reward for a fierce duel is fair.<page>Are you free? oh, i found out my sister has someone else... Maybe her age will soften her stoic style, but she's not sure.<page>I can't say I'm very fond of the old ways, but some rituals, some memories. It's worth preserving.
secondary_translated_text: C'est une belle pince sur le manteau. J'espère pouvoir le faire sans tuer des gens.<hpage>L'héroïne reçoit un badge gratuitement, car la récompense pour un duel féroce est juste.<page>Es-tu libre ? J'ai découvert que ma soeur avait quelqu 'un d'autre... Peut - être que son âge va adoucir son style stoïque, mais elle n'est pas sûre.<page>Je ne peux pas dire que j'aime beaucoup les anciennes manières, mais certains rituels, certains souvenirs. Il vaut la peine de préserver.

original_en_text: Well, aren’t you a sight! No, don’t tell me! You’re as odd as they come.<page>Your poise! Your form! Are you hunted? Pursued? The Citadel would see a fine prize in you.<hpage>It is as you say, madam. Veiled bugs of the Citadel brought me to your land. I now seek for one who would answer why, and will ask with force as needed.<page>Ha! Fierce too! These are bleak times, but a powerful stray like you could certainly cause some change.<page>Well then! I’ve no love for that holy caste, and I do worry for this kingdom’s ailing state. If you’re seeking to settle a score, perhaps I can lend some aid?
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这模样！让我猜猜，你不是这里的虫吧？<page>这仪态！这身姿！你正被追杀？被通缉？圣堡肯定很重视你。<hpage>如你所言，女士。覆面虫将我带来此地，我打算向圣堡讨个说法。<page>哈！还挺凶！现在外面乱得很，你这般强悍的浪客肯定能搅出点动静。<page>正好！我也讨厌那群圣徒，也忧心王国的灾祸。你要找他们算账的话，或许我能帮衬？
translated_text: Well, you are not a vision! no! no! don't tell me! Weird as they are.<page>your actions! Your form! are you being chased? tracking him? The castle treats you like a treasure.<hpage>Like you said, woman. A castle worm has taken me to your land. I am now looking for someone who can answer the reasons and demand great power when needed.<page>yeah! And strongly! These are dark times, but a powerful ranger like you will certainly make a difference.<page>okay! okay! I do not love that sacred caste, and am concerned about the terrible state of the kingdom. Can you help me if I want a score?
secondary_translated_text: Vous n'êtes pas une vision ! Non ! ! Non ! ! Ne me dis pas ! Bizarre comme ils le sont.<page>Vos actions ! votre forme !Êtes-vous chassé ? Le traquer ? Le Château vous traite comme un trésor.<hpage>Comme tu l'as dit, femme. Un ver de château m'a emmené dans votre pays. Je cherche maintenant quelqu ' un qui peut répondre aux raisons et réclamer un grand pouvoir quand il en faut.<page>Ouais ! Et fortement ! Ce sont des temps sombres, mais un ranger puissant comme vous fera certainement la différence.<page>OK ! OK ! Je n'aime pas cette caste sacrée, et je m'inquiète de l'état terrible du royaume. Pouvez-vous m'aider si je veux un score ?

translated_text: ah... ah...
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. Ah, oui.

original_en_text: I await the meat, sspiidder. Bring me much. Enough to sate my brood to come.
original_zh_text: 我在等着血肉呢，小蜘蛛。咝——多带些，要够喂饱我的孩子们。
translated_text: Spider-Man, I'm waiting for the meat. He brought me a lot. enough to feed the children that are born.
secondary_translated_text: Spider-Man, j'attends la viande. Il m'a apporté beaucoup. assez pour nourrir les enfants qui naissent.

original_en_text: Ssssppiidderr... Your ssstench is strange... yet similar. Your tension isss smelt strong. Do I ssseem a threat to you?<hpage>This whole land keeps me cautious, tall one, and your claws look to have seen much sharp use.<page>Yesss... I kill, gladly, but only to feed my ssshhhell, and my brood to come.<page>Your meat... much ssssustanence it could grant... but too hard to pry... Your long, false claw would ssslash back ssswift.<hpage>Good, so you can sense my skill, as I yours. A truce then, that we both shall live beyond our meeting.
original_zh_text: <page>咝——小蜘蛛……你的气味既陌生又熟悉……紧张感浓得刺鼻。我看你对我很戒备，是不是？<hpage>这片土地危机四伏，高个子，我自然得保持戒备。我看你刃爪锋利，想必是久经厮杀。<page>咝——没错……我乐于杀戮，但也只是为了喂饱自己，以及我即将出生的孩子们。<page>你的血肉……能为我提供不少给养……但太难撬开……咝——你那长针会立刻反击。<hpage>很好，看来你清楚我的手段，正如我知晓你的能耐。立个和平协议吧，高个子——让咱们都能活着离开这里。
translated_text: Ssssppiidderr... It smells weird. But similar. i'm nervous. am i a threat to you?<hpage>The whole land keeps me cautious, tall, and your nails seem to be using a lot of sharp things.<page>I want to kill him, but only to feed my bastard and my future offspring.<page>Your meat can offer you a lot of guarantees. But it is hard to break. Your fake nails will fight back against thessswift.<hpage>You can feel my skills just like me and you. So let's have a truce. Let's go on with our lives after we meet.
secondary_translated_text: Sssspidderr...Ça sent bizarre. Mais similaire. Je suis nerveux. Suis-je une menace pour vous ?<hpage>Tout le pays me garde prudent, grand, et tes ongles semblent utiliser beaucoup de choses tranchantes.<page>Je veux le tuer, mais seulement pour nourrir mon bâtard et ma future progéniture.<page>Votre viande peut vous offrir de nombreuses garanties. Mais il est difficile de briser. Vos faux ongles se battront contre thessswift.<hpage>Vous pouvez sentir mes compétences comme moi et vous. Faisons donc une truce. Continuons notre vie après nous avoir rencontrés.

original_en_text: Stray one! Things were already falling grim when last you left. Now it’s worse! The whole world quaking and wailing, and all stretched through with blackened strands! <page>This wouldn’t be your doing, by chance?<hpage>...I am in part responsible, though know this outcome was not my intent, and that I shall work to calm it.<page>I knew it! Course it had to be you. Here I was, hoping you’d bring a shake up. Instead you’ve brought an ending!<page>Well, move it, I say! Get to your fixing. We’re all now suffering for the scale your conflict... Maybe this time you act towards calmer conclusions, aye?
original_zh_text: 浪游者！上次分别时外面就够乱的了，现在更糟！到处都在晃荡，到处都是黑丝！<page>该不会是你干的吧？<hpage>……我确实有责任，但这结果不在我预料之内。我定会平息这场灾祸。<page>就知道！盼着你能搅局，没想到竟是末日！<page>赶紧的！快去补救。大伙都在遭罪……下次闹腾的时候悠着点行不？
translated_text: The vagrants! When you leave for the last time, things get serious. Now it is worse! The whole world was trembling and crying, and the black lines were everywhere!<page>you didn't do that?<hpage>... I am responsible, but I know that the outcome is not what I intended, and I will do my best to calm it down. "<page>I knew that! Of course you are. I hope you have an impact. Instead, you have brought an end!<page>Now, move on, I say! Starting repairs. Because of the magnitude of your conflict, we are all suffering now, and this time we may be heading towards a more benign conclusion.
secondary_translated_text: Les vagabonds ! Lorsque vous partez pour la dernière fois, les choses deviennent sérieuses. Maintenant c'est pire ! Le monde entier tremblait et pleurait, et les lignes noires étaient partout !<page>Tu n'as pas fait cela ?<hpage>... Je suis responsable, mais je sais que le résultat n'est pas ce que je voulais, et je ferai de mon mieux pour le calmer. "<page>Je le savais ! Bien sûr que vous l'êtes. J'espère que vous aurez un impact. Au lieu de cela, vous avez mis fin !<page>Allez-y, je dis ! Début des réparations. En raison de l'ampleur de votre conflit, nous souffrons tous maintenant, et cette fois, nous nous dirigeons peut - être vers une conclusion plus bénigne.

original_en_text: <hpage>In time, child, I may provide the meats, though first I must acquire tools appropriate to the task. My current arsenal will not grant your wish in full.<page>Sssss... Time, yesss?... Then usss too will grow?... Sharpsss clawss... hard shell... like siblings goness...
original_zh_text: <hpage>小不点，过阵子兴许能给你血肉，不过得先找合适的工具。我手上的家伙不够用。<page>咝……要等？……到时候我也能长壮了？……爪子尖利……甲壳坚硬……像离我而去的兄弟姐妹一样……
translated_text: <hpage>You may provide meat over time, but first you have to get the tools that are suitable for your job. My present weapon cannot fully satisfy your wishes. "<page>Heath's voice. Time is right? Will the USS grow? Sharp nails. The hard shell. As brothers and sisters leave.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Vous pouvez fournir de la viande au fil du temps, mais vous devez d'abord obtenir les outils qui conviennent à votre travail. Mon arme actuelle ne peut pas satisfaire pleinement vos désirs. "<page>voix de Heath. Le temps est-il correct ? L'USS va-t - il grandir ? Les nails Sharp. La coquille dure. Les frères et sœurs partent.

original_en_text: Yesss... Now. We’sss too growsss... feastsss... Be like brood... gone... all... far gone...<hpage>Good luck to you, small one. If this land can be saved, I hope you come to find your place within it.
original_zh_text: 咝——好……现在。我也能长壮了……也能大吃特吃了……像其他兄弟姐妹一样……远走高飞的兄弟姐妹……<hpage>祝你好运，小不点。若是我能拯救这片土地，希望你到时候能找到自己归属。
translated_text: He's too mature now. The feast is like a chicken. I'm leaving... All of them... Very far away.<hpage>I wish you good luck, and if this land is to be saved, I want you to find your place in it.
secondary_translated_text: Il est trop mature maintenant. La fête est comme un poulet. Je pars... Tous d'entre eux... très loin.<hpage>Je vous souhaite bonne chance, et si cette terre doit être sauvée, je veux que vous y trouviez votre place.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not offer my own organs, tall one, though I may bring the meat of others slain.<page>Good ssspidderr! Ssskewered. Ssshredded. Ssseared! Bring it all. Much will be needed, enough to sssate my brood to come.<hpage>Your demand is extensive. First, I must acquire tools appropriate to the task. My current arsenal will not grant your wish in full.<page>My brood has not long till hatching, ssssspiddderrr. Find your tools. Do your duty ssswift, and you shall ssee reward for the sssslaughterrr.
original_zh_text: <hpage>猎手，我不会为你献上自己的内脏，但也许我能带给你其他猎物的血肉。<page>咝——！好啊，小蜘蛛！串烧、撕碎、炙烤！统统带来。我的孩子需要大量血肉才能饱足。<hpage>你的要求可不简单。我需要先找到合适的工具，眼下手中的家伙可不够用。<page>我的孩子就快孵化了，咝——小蜘蛛……动作快点，找到你需要的工具，完成我的需求，必有重谢。

Bring it all and you need lots of things for your children and grandchildren.<hpage>Your needs are wide. First, we needed to find a tool that was suitable for this task. My present weapon cannot fully satisfy your wishes. "<page>My baby will hatch soon, SSspidddderr. Find a tool. When you fulfill your responsibilities as a ssslatterr, you will receive rewards fromssslatterr.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je ne sacrifierai pas mes propres organes, des organes hauts, mais je peux apporter la chair d'autres personnes qui ont été tuées.<page>Le SSPIDDER. Hissée. Shhhh, Shhhh ! Apportez-le tout et vous avez besoin de beaucoup de choses pour vos enfants et petits-enfants.<hpage>Vos besoins sont vastes. Tout d'abord, il fallait trouver un outil adapté à cette tâche. Mon arme actuelle ne peut pas satisfaire pleinement vos désirs. "<page>Mon bébé va bientôt éclore, SSspidddderr. Trouvez un outil. Lorsque vous remplissez vos responsabilités en tant que ssslatterr, vous recevrez des récompenses de sssslatterr.

original_zh_text: 咔啊克 赫。恩卡。乌克特 尔克。
translated_text: Awuk Kane. Uakht rk.

original_en_text: That beast! What wicked punishments are sent to test us! Why must we pilgrims, who have done no evil, be so tormented?<page>Tell me, where is it written? This law that says we must suffer every hardship just to earn the merest hope of happiness?<hpage>Wild lands like these are ruled by instinct, not laws. You must rely on your own strength and skill to survive.<page>I have neither! If what you say is true, I may as well crawl outside and let myself be devoured right now. Save myself some worry!<hpage>Do as you wish, but I think perhaps you underestimate yourself. To climb this far and survive here so long is a task beyond most of your fellow pilgrims.<page>Hmph. I’m no better than any of them. It’s only luck that has gotten me this far, and it’s on luck that I shall continue to rely.
original_zh_text: 那头凶兽！肯定是降罪试炼！我们朝圣者未行恶事，为何要遭此折磨？<page>告诉我，哪本法典写着必须历尽苦难才配期盼幸福？<hpage>荒野奉行本能，而非法典。想要生存，唯有靠自己的能耐。<page>自己的能耐？如果真是如此，不如出去喂了野兽，省得煎熬！<hpage>请便。但别低估了自己，能攀登至此，你已强过多数同袍。<page>哼，我与他们无异。全凭运气苟活，往后也指望运气。
translated_text: that beast! What evil punishments are to be tried! Why should a pilgrim who has never done anything wrong suffer so much?<page>Tell me where it is written, does this law say that we must endure all our sufferings in order to obtain the hope of happiness?<hpage>This wilderness is determined by instinct and not by law. In order to survive, you must rely on your own strength and skills.<page>I have both! If what you're saying is true, I'd better go out now and get drunk. Don't worry!<hpage>I think you're underestimating yourself. To climb this far and survive for a long time is a job that most pilgrims cannot do.<page>You and I are no better than either one. I came here because of luck and I will continue to rely on it.
secondary_translated_text: Cette Bête ! Quels mauvais châtiments doivent être jugés ! Pourquoi un pèlerin qui n'a jamais fait de mal devrait-il souffrir autant ?<page>Dites-moi où il est écrit, cette loi dit-elle que nous devons supporter toutes nos souffrances pour obtenir l'espérance du bonheur ?<hpage>Cette nature sauvage est déterminée par l'instinct et non par la loi. Pour survivre, vous devez compter sur vos propres forces et compétences.<page>J'ai les deux ! Si ce que vous dites est vrai, je ferais mieux de sortir maintenant et de me saouler. Ne vous inquiétez pas !<hpage>Je pense que tu te sous-estimes. Grimper si loin et survivre longtemps est un travail que la plupart des pèlerins ne peuvent pas faire.<page>Toi et moi, nous ne sommes pas meilleurs que l'un ou l'autre. Je suis venu ici par chance et je continuerai à compter sur elle.

original_en_text: Suit yourself, stray one. Ascending above these fields will prove a tough task without my talent.
original_zh_text: 随你便，浪游者。没我的手艺，想攀出这片荒野可不是件容易的事。
translated_text: Whatever you say, vagrant. Without my talent, it would be difficult to transcend these areas.
secondary_translated_text: Quoi que tu dis, vagabond ! Sans mon talent, il serait difficile de transcender ces domaines.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir pilgrim, I bring supplies from Bellhart, for the aid of travellers who pass this waystation.<page>Such service... It seems our prayers do not go completely unheard. Many a small wish will be granted by these supplies.
original_zh_text: <hpage>旅者，我带钟心镇的物资来援助此驿站。<page>这份恩赐……看来圣堡仍能回应我等祈祷。这些补给能实现许多小愿。
translated_text: <hpage>Sir Pilgrim, I have brought supplies from Berhardt to help passengers passing through this transit point.<page>This service. Our prayers will not be completely ignored. Many small wishes can be fulfilled with these materials.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir Pilgrim, j'ai apporté des fournitures de Berhardt pour aider les passagers qui passent par ce point de transit.<page>Ce service. Nos prières ne seront pas complètement ignorées. De nombreux petits souhaits peuvent être accomplis avec ces matériaux.

original_en_text: Would you gift organs for my brood, sssppiidderr? Upon first waking my children will be consumed with craving.
original_zh_text: 咝——要献出你的内脏喂我的孩子们吗，小蜘蛛？他们睁眼后可饿得慌，急需饱餐一顿。
translated_text: will you donate organs to my son? When they first wake up, the children are engulfed in longing.
secondary_translated_text: Voulez-vous donner des organes à mon fils ? Lorsqu ' ils se réveillent pour la première fois, les enfants sont englouti dans le désir.

original_en_text: <hpage>I had promised organs for your mother, child. Though she has passed, I would provide them to you, if some small reward were traded?<page>The meatsss?... For ussss?... Yesss, hunter! We have giftssss... Clawsss long...<page>Bring meatssss... Givess meatsss... Usss’s wantss grow sssstrong... much... Be like siblingsss, sharp, hard...
original_zh_text: <hpage>孩子，我答应过给你母亲送来脏器血肉。她虽死了，你若是肯给我点报酬，我可以转送给你。<page>咝——血肉？……给我？……好啊，猎手！我有宝贝……长长的爪子……<page>咝——带血肉来……给我血肉……我要变强壮……像我的兄弟姐妹一样……壳硬爪利……
translated_text: <hpage>My son, I have promised you your mother's organs. Even if she dies, will I give them to you in exchange for a small reward?<page>what about meat? What is USSS? That's right, Hunter! I have a present. The nails are long.<page>Give me the meat. The free meat. Oz's desire is getting stronger and stronger. more... Like brothers and sisters, sharp and resilient...
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Mon fils, je t'ai promis les organes de ta mère. Même si elle meurt, est-ce que je vais vous les donner en échange d'une petite récompense ?<page>Quoi de la viande ? Qu ' est-ce que l'USSS ? C'est vrai, Hunter ! J'ai un cadeau. Les ongles sont longs.<page>Donnez-moi la viande. La viande gratuite. Le désir d'Oz devient de plus en plus fort. plus... Comme des frères et sœurs, vifs et résilients...

original_en_text: Even us’sss... Now we’sss too grow... Fiercesss... Hard...<page>We’sss becomesss hunter too...
original_zh_text: 咝——就连我……现在也能长壮了……变得凶猛起来……坚硬起来……<page>咝——我也要成为猎手……
translated_text: Even with us. They are growing now. A handsome man. Difficult.<page>We're also Princess Hunters.
secondary_translated_text: Même avec nous. Ils grandissent maintenant. Un homme beau, difficile.<page>Nous sommes aussi des chasseurs de princesses.

original_en_text: I’m loath to spoil the surprise, but curiosity begs me to ask. Do you know why they pursue you? Those Citadel bugs?<hpage>No certainty, but I’ve a strong suspicion...<hpage>They hunt me for my nature. For the Silk produced within my shell.<page>Ahh ha! Truth, no doubt! In Pharloom, yours is a rare skill, prized beyond measure, to channel one’s soul within a thread. Soul and Silk inseparably linked.<page>It is a skill almost lost from Pharloom. Those old Weavers shared it, but they’re long dead now.<hpage>There is another alive in this kingdom that shares my nature, or some part of it. I’ve seen Silk similar to my own. It snares the shells of those upon the roads.<hpage>I’ve seen it wrap them, possess them whole. There is will within that thread, one that seems to come from somewhere above us. The Citadel...<page>Hmmmm... Good, sharp sight you’ve got. That Citadel... All roads towards and all answers waiting, and a long climb up there m’dear.<page>Now! It’s time you get going! Your style and your Silk sure are fine, but stay too long and you’ll only be trouble for me!
original_zh_text: 我本来不想多嘴，但实在好奇，圣堡的虫为何追你？<hpage>不确定，但我怀疑……<hpage>它们觊觎我甲壳产出灵丝的能力。<page>哈！肯定是这样！在纺络，以魂注丝是无价神技，让魂与丝成为一体。<page>这技艺近乎失传。曾经的织者倒是会，如今早死绝了。<hpage>此地尚存一虫与我同源，曾见到它用相似灵丝缠缚朝圣者。<hpage>用丝线操纵空壳，且其中藏有源自高处的意志，定是圣堡……<page>嗯……你眼力不错！圣堡啊……答案都在那条路上，慢慢攀吧姑娘。<page>好了，你该走了！虽你长得英姿飒爽，但身负灵丝，久留只会给我惹祸！
translated_text: I didn't want to spoil the surprise, but curiosity made me ask. do you know why i'm chasing you? the castle bugs?<hpage>I'm not sure, but I strongly suspect.<hpage>They're chasing me. For the silk made out of my shell.<page>Oh, oh, oh! The fact, no doubt! At Pharloom, your skills are precious rare skills that lead a person's soul to a thread. The soul is inseparable from the silk.<page>This is a skill that most fouls have lost. The old Weaver shared it, but they are already dead. "<hpage>There is another living man in this kingdom, of the same nature as I am, or a part of it. I saw a silk that looked like me. It catches the shells of the people on the road.<hpage>I saw them wrapped up and fully owned. This thread has a will, and it seems to come from somewhere above us. The Castle<page>ah ~! Your eyesight is very sharp. " All the roads of the castle await, all the answers await, my dear, there is still a long way to go.<page>now! You should go! Your style and silk are really great, but if you stay longer you will be in trouble!
secondary_translated_text: Je ne voulais pas gâcher la surprise, mais la curiosité m'a poussé à demander. Savez-vous pourquoi je vous pourchasse ? Les Castle Bugs ?<hpage>Je ne sais pas, mais je soupçonne fortement.<hpage>Ils me poursuivent, pour la soie faite de ma coquille.<page>Oh, oh, oh ! Le fait, sans aucun doute ! Chez Pharloom, vos compétences sont des compétences rares précieuses qui mènent l'âme d'une personne à un fil. L'âme est inséparable de la soie.<page>C'est une compétence que la plupart des fous ont perdu. Le vieux Weaver l'a partagé, mais ils sont déjà morts. "<hpage>Il y a un autre homme vivant dans ce royaume, de la même nature que je suis, ou une partie de celle-ci. J'ai vu une soie qui me ressemblait. Elle attrape les coquilles des gens sur la route.<hpage>Je les ai vus enveloppés et entièrement possédés. Ce fil a une volonté, et il semble venir de quelque part au-dessus de nous. Le Château<page>Ah ~ ! Votre vue est très vivante.« Toutes les routes du château attendent, toutes les réponses attendent, ma chère, il y a encore un long chemin à parcourir.<page>Maintenant ! Tu devrais y aller ! Votre style et votre soie sont vraiment super, mais si vous restez plus longtemps, vous aurez des ennuis !

original_en_text: She keepsss?.. We’sss wants meatsss, hunter... We’sss need strengthsss... As much as othersss... As much as mothersss...
original_zh_text: 你要自己留着吗？……我要血肉，猎手……我要变壮……和其他兄弟姐妹一样……和母亲一样……
translated_text: Will she hold it? Hunter who wants meat. She needs strength just like any other mother.
secondary_translated_text: Va-t - elle le tenir ? Un chasseur qui veut de la viande. Elle a besoin de force, comme toute autre mère.

original_en_text: Memories only weigh us down, but some pilgrims still cling to them with unseemly devotion. This memory isn’t yours, but perhaps you could find some use for it?
original_zh_text: 记忆只会徒增负累，但有些同袍偏偏紧抓不放。这虽不是你的记忆，但或许有用？
translated_text: The memory only weighs on us, but some pilgrims are still clinging to their selfless devotion. These memories don't belong to you, but can you use them?
secondary_translated_text: La mémoire ne pèse que sur nous, mais certains pèlerins s'accrochent encore à leur dévotion désintéressée. Ces souvenirs ne vous appartiennent pas, mais pouvez-vous les utiliser ?

original_zh_text: 喀 乌奥肯。克尔卡 提赫。
translated_text: It is Kha Uokn. The Krka...
secondary_translated_text: C'est le Kha Uokn. Le Krka ...

original_en_text: Us needssss meatsss... hunter... finds... bringsss... So us’sss small does grow like siblingssss...
original_zh_text: 咝——我需要血肉……猎手……找来……带来……让我这个小个子也能长成其他兄弟姐妹那样……
translated_text: We need some meat. The hunter found him. Take it with you The kids really grew up like brothers and sisters.
secondary_translated_text: Nous avons besoin de viande. Le chasseur l'a trouvé. Prenez-le avec vous Les enfants ont vraiment grandi comme des frères et sœurs.

original_en_text: The meatssss... smellsss... You bring?... To grow usss like siblings, strong in ssshellsss?
original_zh_text: 咝——血肉味……你带来了？……能让我像兄弟姐妹那样，长出强壮的甲壳？
translated_text: The meat smells. did you bring them? Growing up like brothers and sisters, are you strong?
secondary_translated_text: L'odeur de viande. Les avez-vous amenés ? En grandissant comme des frères et sœurs, êtes-vous forts ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Several of my tools can prepare the meats as you request, child. In time, I shall see your wish granted.<page>Sssss... Usss too will grow?... Sharps claws... hard shell... like siblings goness...
original_zh_text: <hpage>小不点，我带的工具恰好能按你的要求处理血肉。我会尽快让你吃上肉。<page>咝……我也能长壮了？……爪子尖利……甲壳坚硬……像离我而去的兄弟姐妹一样……
translated_text: <hpage>My son, I have some tools for cooking the meat as you wish. " In time, I will see your wish come true. "<page>Will Ussss grow as well? Sharp nails. The hard shell. As brothers and sisters leave.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Mon fils, j'ai des outils pour cuisiner la viande comme tu le souhaites.« Avec le temps, je verrai votre souhait se réaliser. "<page>Ussss va-t - il grandir aussi ? Les nails Sharp. La coquille dure. Les frères et sœurs partent.

original_en_text: Just a moment, dear, before you scurry off!
original_zh_text: 等一等，亲爱的，先别急着走！
translated_text: Honey, wait a minute, get out now!
secondary_translated_text: Chérie, attendez une minute, sortez maintenant !

original_en_text: You’ve done well, sspppidderrr. Upon these fine meats my children will gorge and grow. <hpage>And better the organs of others than they feed upon your own, yes?<page>Sssssskkkk... One should not be surprised, for the sssspppider to perceive the truth of my requests. <hpage>A child of one like you, many times I’ve seen it similar. They will be born hungry, with sharp tooth and claw.<hpage>In their birth-craze, your own meat would delight as much as another bugs. This feast is distraction, in hope to save your shell.<page>Is that shameful? A mother who would not sacrifice herself for her children to grow sssstttrong? Is it wrong to want? To witnesss their first flight, their first hunt. To see them kill, and grow? <hpage>Your choice is your own, tall mother. You won’t be judged by me. I’ve seen enough sacrifice. I’ve no love for the act.
original_zh_text: 干得漂亮，小蜘蛛。咝——我的孩子们会啃着这些血肉长得壮壮实实。<hpage>用别的虫的内脏喂养总比用你自己的强，对吧？<page>咝……蜘蛛能看穿我的算盘倒也不稀奇。<hpage>像你这样的母亲生的孩子，我见得多了。他们生下来就张着嘴要进食，牙尖爪利的。<hpage>他们要是饿疯了，你的肉会和别的虫子一样香。现在这顿大餐算是替你保命了。<page>咝——不愿意舍身喂子的母亲，这丢脸吗？谁不想看他们第一次扑腾翅膀，第一次捕猎？<hpage>这是你自己的选择，高个子，我不评判。我已经见过够多牺牲了，没兴趣掺和。
translated_text: Well done, SSPPDDER. My children grow up eating this delicious meat.<hpage>It is better to eat other people's organs than your own.<page>SSSKK. SSSSSSPppSpider is not surprising.<hpage>I've seen kids like you so many times. They are born hungry and have sharp teeth and sharp claws.<hpage>During their birth rush, your own flesh will be as pleasant as any other insect. This feast is to divert your attention to save your body.<page>this is embarrassing? A mother who does not sacrifice herself for the growth of her child. is it wrong to want it? In commemoration of their first flight and their first hunt. kill and watch it grow?<hpage>Your choice is your own great mother. I will not judge you. I have seen enough sacrifice. I don't like this show.
secondary_translated_text: Bien fait, SSPPDDER. Mes enfants grandissent en mangeant cette délicieuse viande.<hpage>Il vaut mieux manger les organes des autres que les siens.<page>SSSSK. SSSSSSPppSpider n'est pas surprenant.<hpage>J'ai vu des enfants comme vous tant de fois. Ils sont nés affamés et ont des dents tranchantes et des griffes pointues.<hpage>Pendant leur ruée de naissance, votre propre chair sera aussi agréable que tout autre insecte. Cette fête est de détourner votre attention pour sauver votre corps.<page>Est-ce embarrassant ? Une mère qui ne se sacrifie pas pour la croissance de son enfant. Est-ce mal de le vouloir ? Pour commémorer leur premier vol et leur première chasse. Tuer et le regarder grandir ?<hpage>Votre choix est votre propre grande mère. Je ne vous jugerai pas. J'ai vu assez de sacrifices. Je n'aime pas ce show.

original_en_text: Pale beast... bringing ruin... we had sensed it... you writing, harsh, our final fate...<page>If power... you come seeking... mine is faded.... mortal... time taken...<hpage>Great one, I come not to see you as you are, rather I would know you as were, before the pale monarch, when once your heart beat bright and brave.<page>Kcha! Then see me... beast... Those distant memories... Mine once was power... wild... proud...
original_zh_text: 苍白异兽……携灾而至……吾等早有预感……汝书写的，是斯卡尔的终章……<page>若力量……是汝所求……吾已衰微……凡躯……时日无多……<hpage>蚁后，我来此并非为了觐见，而是追忆您昔年的英姿。在苍白君主降临前，当您的英勇之心仍炽烈搏动之时。<hpage>喀嚓！……那就见证……异兽……久远记忆……吾曾执掌……狂野……伟力……傲然……
translated_text: The white beast will bring destruction. I think what you've written is a cruel, ultimate fate.<page>If you have the strength, come and look for it. Mine is fading, and it takes time for a normal person.<hpage>Great man, I have not come to see your true face, but to know you in the presence of a pale monarch whose heart was beating bright and valiant. "<page>stop it! Then come and see me, beast. The distant memory was my strength. Pride in the wild.
secondary_translated_text: La bête blanche apportera la destruction. Je pense que ce que vous avez écrit est un destin cruel et ultime.<page>Si vous avez la force, venez la chercher, la mienne s'estompit, et cela prend du temps pour une personne normale.<hpage>Grand homme, je ne suis pas venu voir votre vrai visage, mais vous connaître en présence d'un monarque pâle dont le cœur battait brillant et vaillant. "<page>Arrêtez ! Alors viens me voir, bête ! La mémoire distante était ma force. Fierté dans la nature.

original_en_text: My strength... my power... Could you claim it, pale beast? Are you so strong?...<hpage>Let us find out together, great one...
original_zh_text: 吾之伟力……吾之权柄……汝可承载？苍白异兽……汝够格否？……<hpage>共同见证吧，伟大的蚁后……
translated_text: My strength. my strength. Can you claim it, white beast? is it that strong?<hpage>Let's take a look at it together. It's great.
secondary_translated_text: Ma force. ma force. Pouvez-vous le dire, Bête Blanche ? Est-ce si fort ?<hpage>Regardons-le ensemble. C'est grand.

original_en_text: Bringsss meatsss... Hunter... many...<page>Usss too be strong... large... one of brood...
original_zh_text: 带血肉给我……猎手……多带些……<page>咝——我也要变壮……变强……像我兄弟姐妹那样……
translated_text: Give me the meat. Many hunters.<page>We must be strong, too. Big... and children are
secondary_translated_text: Donnez-moi la viande. Beaucoup de chasseurs.<page>Nous devons aussi être forts. Big... Et les enfants sont

original_en_text: <hpage>This is fine work, Seamstress. Your modifications will aid me greatly.<page>You’re quite welcome, dear. I’ve rare opportunity to practice such intricate sewing, and a warrior sort like you will be able to properly appreciate my additions.<page>Float away now, stray one, and do try not to die. I’d rather not have my hard work go to waste.
original_zh_text: <hpage>手艺很精湛，织女虫。这改装对我有很大帮助。<page>亲爱的，你太客气了！难得施展我这手艺，更难得有你这战士能懂欣赏。<page>快走吧，尽量别死，我可不爱白忙活。
translated_text: <hpage>This is a good job to reduce stress. Your change will help me a lot.<page>You are welcome, darling. I have a precious opportunity to practice such intricate sewing, and a soldier like you will greatly appreciate my participation.<page>Disappear now, wanderer, lest you die. " I don't want to waste my effort.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>C'est un bon travail pour réduire le stress. Votre changement m'aidera beaucoup.<page>- Tu es la bienvenue, chérie. J'ai une occasion précieuse de pratiquer une couture aussi complexe, et un soldat comme vous appréciera grandement ma participation.<page>Dispare-toi maintenant, errant, de peur de mourir.« Je ne veux pas gaspiller mes efforts.

original_en_text: Have you seen it... small sspidderrr.... that cruel Citadel, weighing heavy atop tthissss land?<page>My hunger may seem great, but that place... that is consumption unending...
original_zh_text: 咝——小蜘蛛，我仍能闻到你的紧张感。我还是让你觉得危险？<hpage>这片土地处处危机，高个子，我自然得保持戒备。你的利爪看起来没少沾血。<page>咝——我乐于杀戮，但也只是为了喂饱自己，以及我即将出生的孩子们。<page>那座圣堡压在这片土地之上。咝——那地方的“饥饿”与我的相比，可算是个无底洞。
translated_text: did you see that? A small spider. Did that cruel castle put a heavy burden on the land?<page>It seems to be hungry, but this place is an endless consumption
secondary_translated_text: Tu as vu ça ? Une petite araignée. Ce château cruel a-t - il mis un lourd fardeau sur la terre ?<page>Il semble avoir faim, mais cet endroit est une consommation sans fin.

original_en_text: We pilgrims provide for each other, living or dead. Sharing is a sign of devotion, particularly for those who give.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者互帮互助，生死不论。分享是信仰的表现，无私奉献更是虔信。
translated_text: We pilgrims take care of one another, whether we live or die. Sharing is a sign of dedication, especially for the one who gives.
secondary_translated_text: Nous, pèlerins, nous prenons soin les uns des autres, que nous vivions ou que nous mourions. Le partage est un signe de dévouement, surtout pour celui qui donne.

original_en_text: You stay, ssppidderrr? My brood needsss meat, much.. the organsss of othersss, or would you instead offer your own?<page>Gift a sshhell’s warm insidess as sweet feast for my brood’sss birth-meal?
original_zh_text: 还在呢，小蜘蛛……？咝——我的孩子需要血肉，很多血肉……我需要其他虫子的内脏，或者你献上你自己的？<page>咝——要不把你热乎的内脏当作我孩子们的破卵宴？
translated_text: Why weren't you here, Spedler? " Kids need meat, and they need meat. Other people's organs are their own.<page>Give my children a warm tolerant meal as a sweet feast?
secondary_translated_text: Pourquoi n'es-tu pas là, Spedler ?« Les enfants ont besoin de viande, et ils ont besoin de viande. Les organes des autres sont les leurs.<page>Donner à mes enfants un repas chaud tolérant comme un festin sucré ?

original_en_text: You have them, sspiiddderrr! The smell is upon you, all those organs, rich prepared for feasssting.
original_zh_text: 咝——！你做到了，小蜘蛛！瞧你满身的腥气。这么多内脏，足够给我的孩子开荤了。
translated_text: You have them, Spider! " The smell is in you, and all these organs are ready for the feast.
secondary_translated_text: Tu les as, Spider !« L'odeur est en vous, et tous ces organes sont prêts pour la fête.

original_en_text: Come to rest your weary body? The climb is agonising, and even the devout must mind their limits.<hpage>I’m impressed to find any without firm claw upon a weapon that could ascend so far.<page>Indeed. We’re lucky to have made it here. Luckier than many others. Or perhaps the difference between the lucky and unlucky is merely faith?<page>Now, while we rest, shall we make trade? If you have rosaries, I’ll take them gladly.
original_zh_text: 是来歇息的么？攀登苦不堪言，再虔诚也要量力而行。<hpage>你赤手空拳能攀登至此，倒是少见。<page>是啊，能到此地实属侥幸，比许多同袍要幸运。或许所谓运气不过是信念之差？<page>既然在这休息，可要做买卖？你有念珠的话，我很乐意交换。
translated_text: Give your tired body some rest. Mountaineering is painful, and even a godly person must pay attention to his limitations.<hpage>I was surprised that a weapon without powerful claws could reach this far.<page>Certainly, I'm lucky to be here. I'm luckier than many others. What is the difference between a lucky person and an unhappy person?<page>Now, during the break, will we reach an agreement? If you have a rosary, I will gladly receive it.
secondary_translated_text: Donnez un peu de repos à votre corps fatiguéL'alpinisme est douloureux, et même une personne pieuse doit faire attention à ses limites.<hpage>J'étais surpris qu ' une arme sans griffes puissantes puisse aller aussi loin.<page>Certainement, je suis chanceux d'être ici. Je suis plus chanceux que beaucoup d'autres. Quelle est la différence entre une personne chanceuse et une personne malheureuse ?<page>Maintenant, pendant la pause, allons-nous parvenir à un accord ? Si vous avez un chapelet, je le recevrai volontiers.

original_en_text: Hunter... stayss... Shining claw... still... Does themsss help... seek?<page>Usss need meatsss, much, too... Hunter... Usss wants many... Seared... Skewered... Shredded...<page>Usss’s wantss grow sssstrong... much... Be like siblingsss, sharp, hard.
original_zh_text: 咝——猎手……你还在这儿……闪亮的爪子……我需要……帮助……<page>咝——我需要血肉，很多血肉……猎手……我要很多……烤的……串的……撕碎的……<page>咝——我要变壮……要像其他兄弟姐妹那样……壳硬爪利……
