"<page>C'est ton travail, Bell Linger ! Pas ma cloche et mon aide ! Je n'offre pas beaucoup, donc je veux que vous reconnaissiez vos efforts. Même si la chorale et leurs badges sont appelés, je ne me battrai pas. "

original_en_text: Stop and share some of your rosaries before you go scurrying off again, dear one. I’m sure to have something that’s to your liking!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，先别走，用你的念珠跟我做点小生意再离开也不迟呀。我这儿有各式各样的好货，绝对物超所值！
translated_text: Dear friends, please stop and share the Rosary before you set out in a hurry again. You should have something you like!
secondary_translated_text: Chers amis, s'il vous plaît arrêtez-vous et partagez le Rosaire avant de vous dépêcher à nouveau. Tu devrais avoir quelque chose que tu aimes !

original_en_text: Half a spider’s spool. You’d just have to find its match. Them ol’ Weavers built some fine things alright. They’re all long dead, but their craftwork still gleams bright.
original_zh_text: 织者的半个灵丝轴，你只需要找到与之匹配的另一半。古织者的手艺真不赖，虫死了这么多年，其造物还锃光瓦亮。
translated_text: A half-spider's scroll. You just need to find a match. Weaver did a good thing. They've been gone for a long time, but their work still shines.
secondary_translated_text: Le rouleau d'un demi-araignée. Il vous suffit de trouver un match. Weaver a fait de bonnes choses. Ils sont partis depuis longtemps, mais leur travail brille toujours.

original_en_text: A gleaming find for you climbing types. With this in your claw, you’ll be able to stick to walls for as long as you like!
original_zh_text: 对于你们这些攀爬爱好者来说，这可是个不可多得的宝贝。握在爪子里就能无限黏附峭壁——想挂多久挂多久！
translated_text: Your wonderful discovery is suitable for the climbing type. If you have this on your nails, how long can you stick it to the wall!
secondary_translated_text: Votre merveilleuse découverte convient au type d'escalade. Si vous avez cela sur vos ongles, combien de temps pouvez-vous le coller au mur ?

original_en_text: Down in the mosslands, still clinging to her failed chapel, my sister’ll part with her power, if asked kind enough.
original_zh_text: 去苔地找我那守着破教堂的姐姐，态度客气点，她或许会分给你力量。
translated_text: In a field of moss, my sister is clinging to a failed church, and if someone asked me kindly, I would give up my power.
secondary_translated_text: Dans un champ de mousse, ma sœur s'accroche à une église en échec, et si quelqu ' un me demandait gentiment, je renoncerais à mon pouvoir.

original_en_text: <hpage>Grant me your aid, sir. If your trap provides a path to freedom, both for myself and your land’s bugs, I may indeed choose to trigger it.<hpage>What work do you require of me now to see your service made?<page>It’s my family’s strength you’ll need be seeking, bellringer, us three ol’ bugs still alive, spread ‘cross this kingdom, and that sad soul you’re already carryin’ there, the last of my poor cousin, dead and drained in those rotten swamps.<page>Each of my family has power, raw, savage stuff. For you, they’ll give it, if for their fascination at the act, or the thrill of defiance... or because they have no choice at all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>请助我一臂之力，先生。若你的陷阱真能为这片土地的虫子和我带来自由，我愿成为那个安放它的猎手。<hpage>现在需要我做些什么？<page>去召集我家族成员的力量——三个苟活的老家伙，他们分散王国各处。还有一个正是你已找到的这悲惨灵魂的主人，他是我可怜的表弟，死在了腐臭的沼泽。<page>我的家人每个都带着野蛮原始的力量！他们会把力量交给你——或是出于对你这种勇气的欣赏，或是享受反抗带来的的亢奋……抑或是别无选择。
translated_text: <hpage>Please help me sir. If your trap offers me and the worms of your land a way to freedom, I may choose to cause it. "<hpage>What would you like to do now to see your service?<page>You have to find the strength in my family. The man who rings the bell, the three old worms still alive, and the sad soul you brought there, this poor and last one of me who died in a dry rotten swamp.<page>There is something strong, primitive and barbaric about my family. For you, it's because if they get into acting or have a rebellious excitement, they'll either give you or have no choice at all.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>S'il vous plaît, aidez-moi monsieur. Si votre piège me donne, à moi et aux vers de votre terre, un chemin vers la liberté, je choisirais de le provoquer. »<hpage>Que souhaitez-vous faire maintenant pour voir votre service ?<page>Il faut trouver la force dans ma famille. L'homme qui sonne la cloche, les trois vieux vers encore vivants, et l'âme triste que tu as amenée là - bas, ce pauvre et dernier de moi qui est mort dans un marécage sec et pourri.<page>Il y a quelque chose de fort, primitif et barbare dans ma famille. Pour vous, c'est parce que s'ils entrent dans l'acteur ou ont une excitation rebelle, ils vous donneront ou n'auront pas le choix du tout.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have opened the way above these halls, and bested the white knight that stood as guardian.<hpage>Child of the monarch, she claimed herself at the end, and her shell suggested it true, a being born purely from Silk woven tight. <hpage>That such a feat is possible... I have seen life woven from Silk before, but tiny, transient... Never like this...<page>Aye, bellringer! You’ve slain a marvel indeed... Well, flawed marvel, at least.<page>One to keep far from she was, least for us mortal sorts. Look of a child and a mind to match, but her’s been up wanderin’ this Citadel longer’n most. Even in its long silence, way ‘fore you came and roused its ire. <page>Might’a seen herself this place’s protector, keepin’ it clean and quiet as she did. Course quiet meant most crossin’ her path found a painful end from her pin.<page>I’d be sayin’ thanks for the slaying, but with all the other husks now awoken and enraged, a bug’s chances ain’t grown by much.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我已打通上层通路，击败了守卫的白骑士。<hpage>她自称君主子嗣，其甲壳构造显示此言非虚——纯粹由致密灵丝编织。<hpage>如此造物真是超乎寻常……灵丝编织的生命我倒也见过，但都渺小且残缺。和她相比，简直天差地别……<page>哈！敲钟者，看来你宰了个神迹一般的家伙……好吧，至少是个有瑕疵的神迹。<page>一直以来，对于我们来说，都是离她远点为妙。她长得孩童模样，心智也相仿，却已徘徊在圣堡多年——早在你到来并激怒她之前。<page>她自诩圣堡守护者，清扫所有“不洁者”。凡是靠近的都成了其针下亡魂。<page>本该谢谢你除掉她，但现在其他空壳都被唤醒并激怒了……咱们的处境可没变好。
translated_text: <hpage>I cleared the path above these halls and defeated the white knight.<hpage>She finally claims to be the child of the monarch, and her shell shows that it is true, and is a creature born purely from closely woven silk.<hpage>Such a feat is possible. I've seen life woven in silk, but it's never been so small and short.<page>Yes, Bell Linger! You have certainly killed a miracle, well, at least a flawed miracle.<page>At least for us humans, we are far from her. She looks like a child, and the ideas are in agreement, but she has wandered about this castle for a long time. Even in that long silence, before you provoked it.<page>Perhaps she considers herself the guardian of this place, and keeps herself as clean and quiet as she is. The silence of the course meant that most of the people she met a disastrous end.<page>I want to say thank you for killing it, but all the other shells are awake and angry, so the chances of bugs showing up aren't much higher.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'ai dégagé le chemin au-dessus de ces salles et vaincu le chevalier blanc.<hpage>Elle prétend finalement être l'enfant du monarque, et sa coquille montre que c'est vrai, et est une créature née purement de soie étroitement tissée.<hpage>Un tel exploit est possible. J'ai vu la vie tissée dans la soie, mais elle n'a jamais été aussi petite et aussi courte.<page>Oui, Bell Linger ! Vous avez certainement tué un miracle, eh bien, au moins un miracle imparfait.<page>Du moins pour nous, humains, nous sommes loin d'elle. Elle ressemble à une enfant, et les idées sont d'accord, mais elle a erré dans ce château depuis longtemps. Même dans ce long silence, avant que tu ne le provoques.<page>Peut - être se considère-t - elle comme la gardienne de cet endroit, et se garde aussi propre et silencieuse qu 'elle est. Le silence du parcours signifiait que la plupart des gens qu ' elle rencontrait avaient une fin désastreuse.<page>Je veux vous remercier de l'avoir tué, mais toutes les autres coquilles sont éveillées et en colère, donc les chances d'insectes apparaissant ne sont pas beaucoup plus élevées.

original_en_text: Hello again, dear one. Looks like we both made it up here, safe as told. And what a shock to find you were speaking the truth about this place!<page>A settlement like this in the Citadel, nice and safe, cloistering so many bugs with minds intact! Never seen anything like it, nor even imagined such.<page>Makes trading away all of my nice bits and baubles much easier. After all, I want to take lots and lots of rosaries with me when my strength finally fails!
original_zh_text: 又见面啦，亲爱的。看来咱俩都如预想的那样平安到达这儿了。真没想到你说的这个地方居然是真的！<page>在这圣堡里有这么一处庇护所，既舒适又安全，还住着这么多心智健全的虫子！我从没见过这样的地方，连想都没想过会有。<page>在这儿做点小买卖可容易多啦！毕竟，等我老得不行的时候，我想带上好多好多念珠，风光下葬呢！
translated_text: See you again, darling. " We are reconciled here and look safe as we have said. I was amazed that what you said about this place was true!<page>There is such a settlement in the castle, good and safe, away from many bugs, and the heart is intact! I've never seen anything like this, I've never imagined it.<page>All my beautiful gadgets make it easy to trade. After all, when my strength runs out, I want to take a lot of Rosaries with me!
secondary_translated_text: Rendez-vous, chérie. Nous sommes réconciliés ici et nous sommes en sécurité comme nous l'avons dit. J'ai été étonnée que ce que tu disais à propos de cet endroit soit vrai !<page>Il y a un tel établissement dans le château, bon et sûr, loin de nombreux insectes, et le cœur est intact ! Je n'ai jamais vu quelque chose de pareil, je ne l'ai jamais imaginé.<page>Tous mes beaux gadgets rendent le commerce facile. Après tout, quand mes forces s'épuisent, je veux emporter beaucoup de Rosaires avec moi !

translated_text: Gradini di Storti
secondary_translated_text: Gradiens de Storti

translated_text: Trey Kampali
secondary_translated_text: par Trey Kampali

translated_text: Trey Villari
secondary_translated_text: Trey Villari

translated_text: kenchan
secondary_translated_text: Kenchan

translated_text: Montefanato
secondary_translated_text: à Montefanato

translated_text: Pull Cindy
secondary_translated_text: Télécharger Cindy

translated_text: Chitadella
secondary_translated_text: Chitadelle

translated_text: Treosi
secondary_translated_text: Treosi

translated_text: Trehientelli
secondary_translated_text: Les Trehientelli

original_en_text: Oho? You linger here still? Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow?<page>Then join me, you must! A new assistant is needed. Together we shall unlock the secrets of this wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？你还没走呢？难道你也迷上生质液的蓝光了？<page>那就加入我吧！正好缺新助手，我们一起揭开这宝贝的秘密！
translated_text: what? huh? are you still hanging out here? Maybe you, just like me, are fascinated by the beautiful lights of the plateau.<page>Please join us! Please join us in! We need a new assistant. Let's unlock the secrets of this wonderful substance together!
secondary_translated_text: Quoi ? Huh ? Tu t'accroches toujours ici ? Peut - être que vous, tout comme moi, êtes fascinés par les belles lumières du plateau.<page>Rejoignez-nous ! S'il vous plaît rejoignez nous ! Nous avons besoin d'un nouvel assistant. Découvrons ensemble les secrets de cette merveilleuse substance !

original_en_text: There, you are replete with wonderful Plasmium once more! You can begin injecting it at once. Now, off with you!
original_zh_text: 拿好，神奇生质液又重新装满了！你又可以注射了，快出发吧！
translated_text: There, you are once again full of wonderful plateaus! You can start injecting right away. Come on, let's go!
secondary_translated_text: Là, vous êtes une fois de plus pleins de merveilleux plateaux ! Vous pouvez commencer à injecter tout de suite. Allons, allons-y !

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: 助手……你会帮忙的对吧？花苞熟了……该收集生质液了……
translated_text: assistant, you'll help me, won't you? The buds have matured... The harvest of Plasmium begins.
secondary_translated_text: Assistant, vous allez m'aider, non ? Les boules ont mûri... La récolte du plasma commence.

original_en_text: Leave your fear behind... Cast it off like an old shell. Give me what I need...
original_zh_text: 抛开恐惧……像蜕壳一样扔掉。把东西给我……
translated_text: Let go of the fear. Throw it away like an old shell. Please give me what I need.
secondary_translated_text: Laisser aller la peur. Jetez-le comme une vieille coquille. S'il vous plaît donnez-moi ce dont j'ai besoin.

original_en_text: Bring the Pure Plasmium. It must be tested... ingested.<page>Ready the Needle Phial to full charge... Strike deep the ripened buds. Return that precious liquid life to me... Assistant.
original_zh_text: 带纯净生质液来……必须测试……吸收……<page>把储液针管蓄满力……扎进成熟花苞……把生质液带回来……
translated_text: Bring pure plasma. Testing is necessary. Inhalation<page>Charge the needle and get ready to knock deeply into the mature bud. Give me back that precious liquid life, assistant.
secondary_translated_text: Apportez du plasma pur. Les tests sont nécessaires. Inhalation<page>Chargez l'aiguille et préparez-vous à frapper profondément dans le bourgeon mature. Rendez-moi cette précieuse vie liquide, assistant.

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! Before he up and vanished, my previous assistant seeded the warrens below with Plasmium buds.<page>The buds should be ripening as we speak, and the nectar within must be extracted before they reach maturity.<page>With the right tool in claw, collecting the nectar is an easy process. I’ll even lend you my own Needle Phial for the job.<page>Once you locate a bud, simply charge the Phial until readied, then release its needle into a bud’s core. Do it right, and it’ll suck out the nectar in one clean pop!<page>Return them to me when you’ve retrieved the necessary samples. With the right nectar, and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal even more of its wondrous properties!
original_zh_text: 太好了！效率翻倍！<page>我那前任助手在下面虫道种了生质液花苞。<page>现在应该快成熟了，得在成熟前提取生质液。<page>用储液针管采集，很简单的，我把我用的借给你。<page>找到花苞后蓄满力，把针头扎进核心，嗖的一下就能抽出来！<page>把带样本回来。有了它们做实验，生质液会更神奇！
translated_text: That's awesome! If two errors occur during a mission, the detection rate will increase significantly.<page>now! Before he could stand up and disappear, my former assistant planted a germ of parasites in the cabin below.<page>As we have said, the bud should be ripe, and the honey in it must be extracted before it is ripe.<page>Using the right tools for your nails, collecting honey is a simple process. I'll lend you my own Needle Phial for this job.<page>Once the bud is found, charge the Phial until it is ready and release the needle into the bud core. When you do it right, it will pop up clean and suck the honey out!<page>When you have collected the required samples, please return them to me. With the right honey and the right testing, Plasmium reveals even more amazing properties.
secondary_translated_text: C'est génial ! Si deux erreurs se produisent pendant une mission, le taux de détection augmentera considérablement.<page>Maintenant ! Avant qu ' il ne puisse se lever et disparaître, mon ancien assistant a planté un germe de parasites dans la cabine en dessous.<page>Comme nous l'avons dit, le bourgeon doit être mûr, et le miel qu ' il contient doit être extrait avant qu ' il ne soit mûr.<page>En utilisant les bons outils pour vos ongles, la collecte de miel est un processus simple. Je vais vous prêter ma propre aiguille Phial pour ce travail.<page>Une fois que le bourgeon est trouvé, chargez le Phial jusqu'à ce qu ' il soit prêt et relâchez l'aiguille dans le noyau du bourgeon. Lorsque vous le faites correctement, il apparaîtra propre et sucera le miel !<page>Une fois que vous aurez recueilli les échantillons requis, veuillez me les retourner. Avec le bon miel et les bons tests, Plasmium révèle des propriétés encore plus étonnantes.

original_en_text: Assistant, that odour... aahhh... you have the Plasmified Blood...
original_zh_text: 助手……这气味……你拿到生质血了……
translated_text: The assistant, that smell. There is a plasma.
secondary_translated_text: L'assistant, cette odeur. Il y a un plasma !

original_en_text: Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. Once your Plasmium reserve runs dry, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 尽管用，好好感受生质液的神奇。用完再来找我。<page>如果要重新装满生质液，我得收点念珠当经费，都是为科研做贡献！
translated_text: Keep using Plasmium Phial and enjoy all the amazing effects it gives to your body. If you run out of stock of your plasmium, please come back to me.<page>I am collecting a few beads to supplement them, but trust that all beads will be used for our important research!
secondary_translated_text: Continuez à utiliser Plasmium Phial et profitez de tous les effets étonnants qu ' il donne à votre corps. Si vous êtes à court de stock de votre plasmium, s'il vous plaît revenez à moi.<page>Je collecte quelques perles pour les compléter, mais faites confiance que toutes les perles seront utilisées pour notre importante recherche !

original_en_text: Do you fear the Plasmium, even now? Ahhh... Assistant... open your mind to the possibilities...
original_zh_text: 现在还怕生质液？啊……助手……敞开心扉接受可能……
translated_text: are you still scared of the plateau? ah... The assistant opened his mind and embraced the possibility.
secondary_translated_text: Vous avez peur du plateau ? Ah, oui. L'assistant ouvrit son esprit et embrassa la possibilité.

original_en_text: Assistant... What we might become... together.
translated_text: Please help us to become who we are. together.
secondary_translated_text: Aidez-nous à devenir qui nous sommes. ensemble.

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the buds below. They are ripe...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract that Pure Plasmium.<page>This shell shall become what you need it to be... Plasmium can cure all.
original_zh_text: 啊……对……助手……真忠诚……拿着储液针管……去下面找熟透的花苞……<page>蓄满力……扎透核心……提取纯净生质液……<page>这副躯壳将完成蜕变……生质液会治愈一切……
translated_text: Oh, yeah. The assistant is too loyal. Hold the needle seat. Find the button below. They have matured.<page>I do my best for Phil. Push deeply. Extraction of pure plasma.<page>This shell seems to be exactly what you need. Plasma can cure everything.
secondary_translated_text: - Oh, oui. L'assistant est trop fidèle. Tenez le siège de l'aiguille. Retrouvez le bouton ci-dessous. Ils ont mûri.<page>Je fais de mon mieux pour Phil. Poussez profondément. extraction de plasma pur.<page>Cette coquille semble être exactement ce dont vous avez besoin. Le plasma peut tout guérir.

original_en_text: Assistant! You’re still dallying about here? I’ve an eager need for pure Plasmium, fresh from the bud.<page>Just one fully charged stab of my Needle Phial straight into a ripe bud! You’ll suck the Plasmium right up!<page>Now, pop down into those worm warrens and extract it for me! What could possibly be more important?
original_zh_text: 助手！怎么还在这磨蹭？我要花苞里的新鲜生质液！<page>用储液针管扎成熟花苞，把生质液抽出来就行！<page>好了，快去虫道干活！还有什么比这更重要的？
translated_text: Assistant! are you still hanging out here? I desperately want pure plasmium buds.<page>All you need to do is fully charge the needle and directly pierce the mature bud. It absorbs the plasma!<page>Come on, plunge into the realm of the worms and extract it for me! what's important?
secondary_translated_text: Assistant ! Tu t'accroches toujours ici ? Je veux désespérément des bourgeons de plasmium purs.<page>Tout ce que vous avez à faire est de charger complètement l'aiguille et de percer directement le bourgeon mature. Il absorbe le plasma !<page>Allez, plongez dans le royaume des vers et extraisez-le pour moi ! Qu 'est-ce qui est important ?

original_en_text: <hpage>I am curious about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is undisputable fact!<page>Plasmium was discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow? Would you assent then, to assisting me in my studies?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我对这些仪器和蓝色液体有点好奇，你在研究什么？<page>啊哈！你也对这神奇物质感兴趣！这是奇迹中的奇迹，实体化的魔法！<page>生质液！无与伦比的天然灵药！疗伤健体，说不定还能起死回生！<hpage>生质液？我好像见过类似的……<page>不可能！纺络那贫瘠的灰土地产不出这种宝贝，这是铁的事实！<page>最初是我的导师在王国边陲的咸水深处发现了它。我奉命带到这山洞研究异地培育。<page>难道你也迷上生质液的蓝光了？要不要当我的研究助手？
translated_text: <hpage>I am interested in your device and the blue liquid in it. What kind of research consumes energy?<page>ah! yes. This magical material will also fascinate you! Miracles beyond miracles, miracle material!<page>Plasma! Unparalleled natural wonders! It heals wounds and strengthens the shell! I think I can endure death itself!<hpage>what do you call a plateau? I have encountered something like this before, or something very similar.<page>Very impossible! " It is an indisputable fact that the gray barren land of the continent never produced such a strange thing!<page>Plasmium was discovered hidden deep in the salt water at the far end of the Faroe Islands, and under her guidance I took it to a cave to study how it thrived in unfamiliar places.<page>Maybe you, just like me, are fascinated by the beautiful lights of the plateau. will you help me study?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je suis intéressé par votre appareil et le liquide bleu qu 'il contient. Quel type de recherche consomme de l'énergie ?<page>Ah ! Oui. Ce matériau magique vous fascinera aussi ! Miracles au-delà des miracles, matériaux miraculeux !<page>Plasma ! Des merveilles naturelles inégalées ! Il guérit les blessures et renforce la coquille ! Je peux supporter la mort elle-même !<hpage>Qu 'est-ce qu' on appelle un plateau ? J'ai déjà rencontré quelque chose comme ça, ou quelque chose de très similaire.<page>Très impossible !« C'est un fait incontestable que les terres grises et stériles du continent n'ont jamais produit une chose aussi étrange !<page>Le Plasmium a été découvert caché profondément dans l'eau salée à l'extrémité des îles Féroé, et sous sa direction, je l'ai emmené dans une grotte pour étudier comment il prospérait dans des endroits inconnus.<page>Peut - être que vous, tout comme moi, êtes fascinés par les belles lumières du plateau. Voulez-vous m'aider à étudier ?

original_en_text: Plasmium is a marvel of nature! And a new assistant is sorely needed. Together, let us unlock its secrets!
original_zh_text: 生质液是自然奇迹！正好缺新助手，我们一起揭开它的秘密吧！
translated_text: The plateau is a natural wonder! We need a new assistant. Let's uncover that secret together!
secondary_translated_text: Le plateau est une merveille naturelle ! Nous avons besoin d'un nouvel assistant. Découvrons ce secret ensemble !

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>In a dark cave below here, I encountered a shell not dissimilar from your own. I suspect your assistant may have met an unfortunate end.<page>Ah ha! That careless buffoon. No surprises then. That lump never shone with the talent for true discovery.<page>Now! To my work I must return! With my assistant so rudely dying on me, I’ve tasks enough for two bugs.<page>Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？新面孔！不是来捣乱的吧？我在这些弯弯绕绕的洞里搞重大研究，可经不起分心！<page>有见过我助手赞戈吗？懒骨头一个，矮个子邋遢样，看着就不靠谱？<hpage>我在下方一黑暗洞窟里见到过和你挺像的尸壳，看来你的助手可能遭遇了不幸。<page>哈！那个冒失鬼。一点也不意外，废物本来就没科研天赋。<page>好了！我得赶紧开始研究了！现在死了助手，我得干双份活。<page>除非你对生质液感兴趣，否则别打扰我！
translated_text: what? huh? A new face! you don't want to disturb me, do you? I'm doing critical research in this twisted tunnel.<page>you've never met your assistant, zango? kind of lazy? Short, hasty, and unreliable.<hpage>In the dark cave below, I found something that was no different than your shell. Your assistant may have been in an unfortunate accident.<page>Oh, oh, oh! This careless clown. No wonder the lump never showed a talent for discovery.<page>now! I have to go back to work! My assistant died disrespectfully to me, so my job was enough to deal with two mistakes.<page>Unless you are interested in my precious plasmium, please let me sleep in peace. "
secondary_translated_text: Quoi ? Huh ? Nouveau visage ! Tu ne veux pas me déranger, n'est-ce pas ? Je fais des recherches critiques dans ce tunnel tordu.<page>Tu n'as jamais rencontré ton assistant, hein ? Une sorte de lazy ? court, précipité et peu fiable.<hpage>Dans la grotte sombre en bas, j'ai trouvé quelque chose qui n'était pas différent de votre coquille. Votre assistant a peut - être été victime d'un accident.<page>Oh, oh, oh ! Ce clown insouciant. Pas étonnant que la masse n'ait jamais montré un talent pour la découverte.<page>Maintenant ! Je dois retourner au travail ! Mon assistant est mort sans respect envers moi, donc mon travail a su faire face à deux erreurs.<page>A moins que vous ne soyez intéressé par mon précieux plasmium, laissez-moi dormir en paix. "

original_en_text: Oh? Those who hesitate learn nothing, you know! The wondrous bright glow of Plasmium makes all things clear!
original_zh_text: 哦？犹豫可学不到新知识！生质液的美丽蓝光会照亮一切！
translated_text: what? huh? Those who hesitate will learn nothing! The amazing bright light of the plasma reveals it all!
secondary_translated_text: Quoi ? Huh ? Ceux qui hésitent n'apprendront rien ! L'incroyable lumière brillante du plasma révèle tout !

translated_text: slurry gland
secondary_translated_text: Glande slurry

original_en_text: <hpage>I have retrieved the Pure Plasmium, as requested. Know that, in your current state, I feel some reservation passing it to you.<hpage>This path your research takes... The final result may not be pleasant.<page>Pure Plasmium? No... Assistant... You must not doubt... It is precious. Perfect. It was needed... You have done well. As always...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你要的纯净生质液。但要交给这样状态的你，我有点犹豫。<hpage>你的研究方向……结局可能不太妙。<page>纯净生质液？不……助手……别怀疑……这是珍宝……完美……必须的……干得好……
translated_text: <hpage>I reclaimed the pure plateau when necessary. In your current state, I have some concerns for you.<hpage>Your school will go this way. The final result may not be pleasant.<page>Pure plasma? No, no, no. The assistant. We cannot doubt it, "he said. It is very precious. Perfection is what we need. As usual, he is doing a great job.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'ai récupéré le plateau pur lorsque nécessaire. Dans votre état actuel, j'ai quelques préoccupations pour vous.<hpage>Votre école ira de cette façon. Le résultat final peut ne pas être agréable.<page>Plasme pur ? Non, non, non, l'assistant. Nous ne pouvons en douter », a-t - il déclaré. Il est très précieux. La perfection, c'est ce dont nous avons besoin. Comme d'habitude, il fait un excellent travail.

original_en_text: These lands have taken the Plasmium well... the soil has drunk it deep, and the creatures bloom so beautifully... have you seen them?<hpage>The effect of your Plasmium on the beasts here is all too evident. Great change has been inflicted upon them.<hpage>There is an echo also of other infections I have witnessed. I wonder at the meaning of it all... or if I am perhaps imagining similarities where there are none.<page>Assistant, ahhh... you grow more inquisitive... We both seek deeper insight...<page>Could we... peer deeper inside somehow...? Let us think on it...
original_zh_text: 这片土地吸收了生质液……深入土壤，深入生物，花苞绽放……看见了吗？<hpage>你的生质液让野兽变异，影响太明显了。<hpage>这让我想起以前见过的其他感染，不知是巧合还是……<page>助手啊……你也变好奇了……想深入探索……<page>或许……我们该更进一步研究？……让我想想……
translated_text: This soil absorbs plutonium well. The soil sucks it deeply, and you've ever seen these creatures bloom so beautifully<hpage>The effect your plateau has on the beasts here is all too obvious. A big change has happened.<hpage>There are similarities to other infections I've seen. I want to know what you mean. Maybe he's imagining a place with no similarities.<page>You are increasingly curious, and we are all seeking deeper insights.<page>can you look inside us? Let's think about it.
secondary_translated_text: Ce sol absorbe bien le plutonium. Le sol le suce profondément, et vous avez déjà vu ces créatures fleurir si joliment.<hpage>L'effet que votre plateau a sur les bêtes ici est tout à fait évident. Un grand changement s'est produit.<hpage>Il y a des similitudes avec d'autres infections que j'ai vues. Je veux savoir ce que tu veux dire. Peut - être qu ' il imagine un endroit sans similitudes.<page>Vous êtes de plus en plus curieux, et nous cherchons tous des idées plus profondes.<page>Pouvez-vous regarder en nous ? Réfléchissons à cela.

original_en_text: Ahhhh... Assistant... greed was ever your greatest failing. Do not guard your discoveries so jealously...
original_zh_text: 啊……助手……贪婪是你的弱点……别独占成果……
translated_text: oh, oh... The greed of the assistant was your biggest failure. Don't jeopardize your findings.
secondary_translated_text: Oh, oh, oh... L'avidité de l'assistant a été votre plus grand échec. Ne mettez pas en danger vos découvertes.

original_en_text: For you... dear assistant... drink deep my liquid life...
original_zh_text: 喝吧……亲爱的助手……饮下我的生命精华……
translated_text: For you, I know. Dear assistant. Drinking deeply the fluid of my life.
secondary_translated_text: Pour vous, je sais. Cher assistant. Boire profondément le fluide de ma vie.

original_en_text: Since you have proven yourself a capable assistant, take this delightful implement of my own invention, a Plasmium Phial.<page>With it, you can inject precious Plasmium straight into your body. Almost painlessly!<hpage>Your tool certainly looks sharp enough to pierce my shell, sir, but why should I want to do so?<page>Because filling your body with Plasmium is so beneficial! It protects you from harm! And it feels so exquisitely good!<page>My assistant and I have been injecting Plasmium into the local flora and fauna since we arrived. No ill effects have been observed, and so we can conclude that the process is utterly, completely safe.<page>Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. If you ever run out of Plasmium, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 既然你够格当助手，送你个好东西——生质液瓶！<page>有了它，就能直接往甲壳里注射生质液，几乎不疼！<hpage>这工具确实足够扎穿我的外壳，但我为何要这么做？<page>因为注射生质液好处多多！不仅能防止受伤，而且感觉非常好！<page>我和助手给本地动植物都打过，没出现任何副作用，完全安全！<page>尽管用，好好感受生质液的神奇。用完再来找我。<page>如果要重新装满生质液，我得收点念珠当经费，都是为科研做贡献！
translated_text: You've proven to be a competent assistant, so bring along this fun tool I invented, Plasmium Phial.<page>With it, you can inject your valuable plastic directly into your body. Almost painless!<hpage>Your tools seem sharp enough to pierce my shell, but why would I do that? "<page>Filling your body with plasmium is so beneficial! It protects you from harm! Feeling good!<page>Since we arrived, my assistant and I have been injecting plasmium into the local flora and fauna. Since no side effects were observed, it can be concluded that the process is completely safe.<page>Keep using Plasmium Phial and enjoy all the amazing effects it gives to your body. If your Plasmium is gone, please come back to me. "<page>I am collecting a few beads to supplement them, but trust that all beads will be used for our important research!
secondary_translated_text: Vous avez prouvé être un assistant compétent, alors apportez avec vous cet outil amusant que j'ai inventé, Plasmium Phial.<page>Avec elle, vous pouvez injecter votre précieux plastique directement dans votre corps. Quasiment indolore !<hpage>Vos outils semblent assez aiguisés pour percer ma coquille, mais pourquoi devrais-je le faire ? "<page>Remplir votre corps avec du plasmium est tellement bénéfique ! Il vous protège contre le mal ! Se sentir bon !<page>Depuis notre arrivée, mon assistant et moi avons injecté du plasma dans la flore et la faune locales. Comme aucun effet secondaire n'a été observé, on peut conclure que le processus est complètement sûr.<page>Continuez à utiliser Plasmium Phial et profitez de tous les effets étonnants qu ' il donne à votre corps. Si votre Plasmium est parti, s'il vous plaît, revenez à moi. »<page>Je collecte quelques perles pour les compléter, mais faites confiance que toutes les perles seront utilisées pour notre importante recherche !

original_en_text: Ahh, and exactly the required amount! A satisfactory effort, assistant!<page>With this pure Plasmium extract, I may finally come to understand this wondrous substance.
original_zh_text: 啊，分量刚好足够！干得不错！<page>有这纯净生质液，终于能破解奥秘了！
translated_text: That's the amount needed! Great job, assistant!<page>With this pure plasma extract, I was finally able to understand this wonderful substance.
secondary_translated_text: C'est le montant nécessaire ! Bon travail, assistant !<page>Avec cet extrait de plasma pur, j'ai enfin pu comprendre cette merveilleuse substance.

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: 助手……你会帮忙的对吧？花苞熟了……该收集生质液了……
translated_text: assistant, you'll help me, won't you? The buds have matured... The harvest of Plasmium begins.
secondary_translated_text: Assistant, vous allez m'aider, non ? Les boules ont mûri... La récolte du plasma commence.

original_en_text: <hpage>Take it, sir, though what insight it will grant you I cannot say.<page>Have faith, dear assistant... After all this I understand... the greatest knowledge comes only from faith... faith in Plasmium.<page>This blood you have collected... sparkles... I see it! A glorious form... a glorious future, shimmering back at us...
original_zh_text: <hpage>拿去吧，虽然不知能研究出什么。<page>要有信念，好助手……我现在明白了……真理源自信念……对生质液的信念……<page>你收集的血……在发光……我看见了！辉煌形态……辉煌未来……等着我们……
translated_text: <hpage>You don't know what insight that gives you, but accept it.<page>My dear friend, trust me. After all this, I understand. The greatest knowledge comes only from faith - faith in plasmium.<page>The blood you have collected. It shines. I saw it! The form of glory. A bright future shines upon us.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Vous ne savez pas quel insight cela vous donne, mais acceptez-le.<page>Mon cher ami, croyez-moi, après tout cela, je comprends. La plus grande connaissance vient seulement de la foi - la foi dans le plasmium.<page>Le sang que tu as recueilli. Il brille. Je l'ai vu ! La forme de la gloire. Un avenir brillant brille sur nous.

original_en_text: You decline, Assistant? You cannot. The buds... The harvest. It must occur... For the source, and your saving...
original_zh_text: 你拒绝？花苞……必须收割……为了源头，也为了救你……
translated_text: assistant, did you say no? You can't, man. We need a harvest. For your income and your savings.
secondary_translated_text: Assistant, avez-vous dit non ? Vous ne pouvez pas, mec, nous avons besoin d'une récolte. Pour vos revenus et vos économies.

original_en_text: You would refuse?! There is much work to be done, and it is all so achingly slow when I have no aid!
original_zh_text: 你要拒绝？！这么多活要干，没助手进度太慢了！
translated_text: are you going to refuse?! There is so much to do, but when I am not helping, everything is slow!
secondary_translated_text: Tu vas refuser ! ! Il y a tant de choses à faire, mais quand je n'aide pas, tout est lent !

original_en_text: Ohhhhh... Assistant? Is that you?... You return at last, my friend?<hpage>Sir, you are in a disturbing state. This substance sprouts from within your shell. Time will see it consume you entirely. Would you seek aid?<page>No... No... Assistant... you are confused. A wonderful thing, we become. The Plasmium, our great research... We have progressed.<page>The research must continue. Soon... I shall become a source.
original_zh_text: 呃啊啊……助手？是你吗……终于回来了……<hpage>先生，你身体状态异常。某种物质在你壳内滋生，迟早会吞噬你。需要帮助吗？<page>不……不……助手……你错了。我们在进化……生质液……研究大突破……<page>研究必须继续……很快……我将成为源头……
translated_text: Oh, ha ha. assistant? is it you? My friend, are you finally home?<hpage>Your situation is troubling. This substance germinates from the shell. Time will see it consumed completely. Do you want help?<page>No, no, no. No, no, no. The assistant. It's confusing. It's amazing. Plasma research is progressing.<page>Research will continue. Immediately after... I will be a source.
secondary_translated_text: Ah, ha ha. Assistant ? Est-ce toi ? Mon ami, es-tu enfin à la maison ?<hpage>Votre situation est troublante. Cette substance germe de la coquille. Le temps le verra complètement consommé. Vous voulez de l'aide ?<page>Non, non, non C'est confus. C'est étonnant. La recherche sur le plasma avance.<page>La recherche continuera. Immédiatement après... Je serai une source.

original_en_text: Assistant! Have you come to refill your reserve of Plasmium?
original_zh_text: 助手！你是来补充生质液的？
translated_text: Assistant! Are you here to replenish your plasmium stockpiles?
secondary_translated_text: Assistant !Êtes-vous là pour reconstituer vos stocks de plasmium ?

translated_text: Replenishment of plasma reserves?
secondary_translated_text: Reconstitution des réserves plasmatiques ?

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>I have not, sir. I am curious though, about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is indisputable fact.<page>Plasmium was first discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Now! To my work I must return! Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, or chance upon my truant assistant, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？新面孔！不是来捣乱的吧？我在这些弯弯绕绕的洞里搞重大研究，可经不起分心！<page>有见过我助手赞戈吗？懒骨头一个，矮个子邋遢样，看着就不靠谱？<hpage>没见过。不过我对这些仪器和蓝色液体有点好奇，你在研究什么？<page>啊哈！你也对这神奇物质感兴趣！这是奇迹中的奇迹，实体化的魔法！<page>生质液！无与伦比的天然灵药！疗伤健体，说不定还能起死回生！<hpage>生质液？我好像见过类似的……<page>不可能！纺络那贫瘠的灰土地产不出这种宝贝，这是铁的事实！<page>最初是我的导师在王国边陲的咸水深处发现了它。我奉命带到这山洞研究异地培育。<page>好了！我要继续工作了！除非你对生质液感兴趣，或者碰见我那翘班助手，否则别打扰我！
translated_text: what? huh? A new face! you don't want to disturb me, do you? I'm doing critical research in this twisted tunnel.<page>you've never met your assistant, zango? kind of lazy? Short, hasty, and unreliable.<hpage>I don't. But I'm interested in the device here, and the blue liquid there, and what kind of research is consuming energy?<page>ah! yes. This magical material will also fascinate you! Miracles beyond miracles, miracle material!<page>Plasma! Unparalleled natural wonders! It heals wounds and strengthens the shell! I think I can endure death itself!<hpage>what do you call a plateau? I have encountered something like this before, or something very similar.<page>Very impossible! " It is an indisputable fact that the gray barren soil of the continent could not produce such a strange thing.<page>Plasmium was discovered hidden deep in the salt water at the far end of the Faroe Islands, and under her guidance I took it to a cave to study how it thrived in unfamiliar places.<page>now! I have to go back to work! Unless you're interested in my precious Plasmium, or stumble upon my absentee assistant, please let me sleep in peace! "
secondary_translated_text: Quoi ? Huh ? Nouveau visage ! Tu ne veux pas me déranger, n'est-ce pas ? Je fais des recherches critiques dans ce tunnel tordu.<page>Tu n'as jamais rencontré ton assistant, hein ? Une sorte de lazy ? court, précipité et peu fiable.<hpage>Je ne le fais pas. Mais je suis intéressé par le dispositif ici, et le liquide bleu là - bas, et quel genre de recherche consomme de l'énergie ?<page>Ah ! Oui. Ce matériau magique vous fascinera aussi ! Miracles au-delà des miracles, matériaux miraculeux !<page>Plasma ! Des merveilles naturelles inégalées ! Il guérit les blessures et renforce la coquille ! Je peux supporter la mort elle-même !<hpage>Qu 'est-ce qu' on appelle un plateau ? J'ai déjà rencontré quelque chose comme ça, ou quelque chose de très similaire.<page>Très impossible !« C'est un fait incontestable que le sol gris et stérile du continent ne pouvait pas produire une chose aussi étrange.<page>Le Plasmium a été découvert caché profondément dans l'eau salée à l'extrémité des îles Féroé, et sous sa direction, je l'ai emmené dans une grotte pour étudier comment il prospérait dans des endroits inconnus.<page>Maintenant ! Je dois retourner au travail ! Sauf si vous êtes intéressé par mon précieux Plasmium, ou si vous tombez sur mon assistant absent, s'il vous plaît, laissez-moi dormir en paix ! "

original_en_text: There... more. Let it seep deep into your shell... do not begrudge the pain...
original_zh_text: 灌满了……让液体渗入甲壳深处……别怕疼……
translated_text: There you go... Place it deep in your shell. Don't be jealous of the pain.
secondary_translated_text: Voilà vous allez... Placez-le profondément dans votre coquille. Ne soyez pas jaloux de la douleur.

original_en_text: The Pure Plasmium... you have it. I can... smell it on you.
original_zh_text: 纯净生质液……你带来了。我闻到了……
translated_text: Pure plasma. You have it. I can smell your smell.
secondary_translated_text: Plasma pur. Tu l'as, je peux sentir ton odeur

original_en_text: Through consumption of the blood... we shall at last attain enlightenment...<page>For your reward... take the gland from within my shell... my gift to you.<page>I have no more need of it... and it shall grant you... unending reserves of Plasmium...<page>Yes... Plasmium. Pure... beautiful... Plasmium...
original_zh_text: 吸收生质血……我们终将开悟……<page>给你的奖励是……拿走吧……我壳里的腺体……<page>我不需要了……它会给你……无限生质液……<page>没错……生质液……纯净……美丽……
translated_text: They consume their blood. Eventually, they will receive revelation.<page>Please take the glands out of my shell as your reward. A gift from me.<page>I don't need it anymore. I'll give it to you. Unlimited highland reserves.<page>That's right, sir. Plasmium. Pure. Li... Plasma
secondary_translated_text: Ils consomment le sang. Finalement, ils recevront la révélation.<page>S'il vous plaît, retirez les glandes de ma coquille comme votre récompense. Un cadeau de ma part.<page>Je n'en ai plus besoin. Je vais te le donner. Réserves illimitées des hautes terres.<page>C'est juste, monsieur. Plasma. Pure. Li... Plasma

original_en_text: Assistant! How goes your work? Have you extracted a sufficient amount of Plasmium for me?
original_zh_text: 助手！进展如何？提取到足够生质液了吗？
translated_text: Assistant! how was your job? Did you get enough plasmium for me?
secondary_translated_text: Assistant ! Comment était votre travail ? Avez-vous suffisamment de plasma pour moi ?

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! Before he went and died, my previous assistant seeded the warrens below with Plasmium buds.<page>The buds should be ripening as we speak, and the nectar within must be extracted before they reach maturity.<page>With the right tool in claw, collecting the nectar is an easy process. I’ll even lend you my own Needle Phial for the job.<page>Once you locate a bud, simply charge the Phial until readied, then release its needle into a bud’s core. Do it right, and it’ll suck out the nectar in one clean pop!<page>Return them to me when you’ve retrieved the necessary samples. With the right nectar, and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal even more of its wondrous properties!
original_zh_text: 太好了！效率翻倍！<page>我那死鬼助手在下面虫道种了生质液花苞。<page>现在应该快成熟了，得在成熟前提取生质液。<page>用储液针管采集，很简单的，我把我用的借给你。<page>找到花苞后蓄满力，把针头扎进核心，嗖的一下就能抽出来！<page>把带样本回来。有了它们做实验，生质液会更神奇！
translated_text: That's awesome! If two errors occur during a mission, the detection rate will increase significantly.<page>now! Before he died, my former assistant was growing plasmium mosquitoes in the barn below.<page>As we have said, the bud should be ripe, and the honey in it must be extracted before it is ripe.<page>Using the right tools for your nails, collecting honey is a simple process. I'll lend you my own Needle Phial for this job.<page>Once the bud is found, charge the Phial until it is ready and release the needle into the bud core. When you do it right, it will pop up clean and suck the honey out!<page>When you have collected the required samples, please return them to me. With the right honey and the right testing, Plasmium reveals even more amazing properties.
secondary_translated_text: C'est génial ! Si deux erreurs se produisent pendant une mission, le taux de détection augmentera considérablement.<page>Maintenant ! Avant de mourir, mon ancien assistant faisait pousser des moustiques à plasmium dans la grange en bas.<page>Comme nous l'avons dit, le bourgeon doit être mûr, et le miel qu ' il contient doit être extrait avant qu ' il ne soit mûr.<page>En utilisant les bons outils pour vos ongles, la collecte de miel est un processus simple. Je vais vous prêter ma propre aiguille Phial pour ce travail.<page>Une fois que le bourgeon est trouvé, chargez le Phial jusqu'à ce qu ' il soit prêt et relâchez l'aiguille dans le noyau du bourgeon. Lorsque vous le faites correctement, il apparaîtra propre et sucera le miel !<page>Une fois que vous aurez recueilli les échantillons requis, veuillez me les retourner. Avec le bon miel et les bons tests, Plasmium révèle des propriétés encore plus étonnantes.

original_en_text: Are you so enchanted by the Plasmium that you will not part with it? You are more like that dolt Zango than I first thought!<page>Its enlightenings are beyond your meagre mind! Give me the phial, assistant, or the deeper secrets of this substance will never be revealed!
original_zh_text: 舍不得交出来？你和赞戈那蠢货一个德行！<page>你这脑子参不透其中奥秘的！不交出生质液就永远别想知道秘密！
translated_text: Are you so fascinated by the beautiful land that you don't want to give it up? They look more like corals than I thought!<page>That revelation is beyond your little mind! Bring me a bottle and an assistant, or the deep secret of this substance will never be revealed!
secondary_translated_text: Êtes-vous tellement fasciné par cette belle terre que vous ne voulez pas y renoncer ? Ils ressemblent beaucoup plus à des coraux que je ne le pensais !<page>Cette révélation est au-delà de votre petit esprit. Apportez-moi une bouteille et un assistant, ou le secret profond de cette substance ne sera jamais révélé !

original_en_text: Aahhh... and you have been using your Plasmium... good. Let me replenish your reserve...
original_zh_text: 啊……你一直在注射生质液……很好。让我给你补满……
translated_text: ah... The utilization rate of plasma is very good. Let's replenish our reserves.
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. Le taux d'utilisation du plasma est très bon. Réapprovisionnons nos réserves.

original_en_text: Now. Share the discovery... Take this Plasmium Phial... Plunge it deep. Feel its vigour soak your shell...<page>If more is needed... If the Plasmium runs dry... return. Visit me again... That you may live, long... my loyal assistant.
original_zh_text: 现在，分享成果……拿着生质液瓶……扎进去……感受活力渗透……<page>用完再来找我……这样你才能……活得长久……我的好助手……
translated_text: Quickly share your findings. The Phial Plateau. He is deeply involved. Feel that vitality permeate your shell, and you will feel it.<page>If you need more. If the plasma is dry, in return... Please look at me again. They will live longer. My loyal assistant.
secondary_translated_text: Partagez rapidement vos résultats. le plateau de Phial. Il est profondément impliqué. Sentez que la vitalité imprègne votre coquille, et vous le sentirez.<page>Si vous avez besoin de plus. Si le plasma est sec, en retour... S'il vous plaît, regardez-moi à nouveau. Ils vivront plus longtemps. mon fidèle assistant.

original_en_text: You may remain here and rest, if you choose. I am no enemy of yours. Only if you try to step beyond will I raise my weapon against you.<hpage>Then tell me, warrior, of the shrine you guard. These caves on wood’s edge seem long forgotten.<page>Some things may be hidden, but never forgotten. The shrine remains to remember the wood’s first seed, her that once was and always is.<page>I am the last bound to protect it. Sadly, in that service, many have fallen to my blade.
original_zh_text: 你可以在此处休息，只要不越界，我就不是你的敌人。<hpage>那就说说这处圣所吧。这深林边缘的洞窟似乎早已被遗忘。<page>事物或许会被被隐藏，但不会被遗忘。最初之种记得这处圣所，而她永恒存在。<page>我是最后一位守卫者。很遗憾，至今已有无数试图越界的亡魂。

The temple still commemorates the first seeds of the forest. She still is, even though she used to.<page>I am the last one to defend it. Sadly, many people fell under my knife in that ceremony.

Le temple commémore toujours les premières graines de la forêt. Elle l'est toujours, même si elle avait l'habitude de le faire.<page>Je suis le dernier à le défendre. original_en_text: <page=S>Miss courier! Pharloom’s bugs are wishing, waiting, sad and scared. The deliverings are needed, now more than more!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐！纺络的虫子们又怕又急，都等着物资呢！现在送货是十分要紧的事！
translated_text: <page=S>Missed Delivery! The insect in the fallout is full of hope, expectation, sorrow and fear. Delivery is necessary now, but it's not all!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Delivery manquée ! L'insecte dans les retombées est plein d'espoir, d'attente, de chagrin et de peur. La livraison est nécessaire maintenant, mais ce n'est pas tout !

original_en_text: But what’s this?! I smell something on you right now! You have a relic for me!
original_zh_text: 慢着！你身上有味儿！揣着古董呢！
translated_text: but what is this? Now, I can smell you! You have a legacy for me! "
secondary_translated_text: Mais qu ' est-ce que c'est ? Maintenant, je peux vous sentir ! Tu as un héritage pour moi ! "

original_en_text: Aha! The spines! Specimen, you have them! Then it is time, indeed! Bzzt! To free you of your wriggling torment, and show my genius clear!
original_zh_text: 啊哈！棘刺到手！病患，该手术了！滋滋！让你摆脱痛苦，见证本神医天才手段吧！
translated_text: Oh, oh, oh! spine! We have a sample! It's time, really. humming! Let me free you from the torment of peristalsis and show you clearly my genius!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, oh, oh ! Spine ! Nous avons un échantillon ! C'est l'heure, vraiment. Humming ! Laissez-moi vous libérer du tourment de la péristalse et vous montrer clairement mon génie !

original_en_text: Oh my, what a state you’re in! You look like you’re one breath away from keeling over dead!<hpage>I will continue to live, madam, but I am indeed afflicted. A parasite has taken root within my shell... Perhaps you have something that could help me? A medicine?<page>Mmm, not so sure I stock anything like that. You should ask Pavo there. It’s his job to give directions and such, so he may have some useful advice.<page>In the meantime... shopping itself is a type of medicine, isn’t it? You should buy something now. Given your condition, this might be your last chance!
original_zh_text: 圣堡在上！你这模样看着像要咽气了似的！<hpage>还死不了，女士，但确实抱恙。甲壳遭受寄生……可有药能治？<page>唔，我这不卖药。去问帕沃吧，他管指路，或许有招。<page>话说回来……购物也算疗愈嘛！趁还能动快买点，过了这村没这店！
translated_text: what the hell are you? You look like you're dying!<hpage>I will go on living, but I am miserable. The parasite is already taking root in my shell. Can you help me with something? what about medicine?<page>I don't know if such a thing exists. So ask Pabo there. His job is to give instructions and so on, so he might have some helpful advice.<page>At the same time,... Shopping is the drug itself, right? You should buy something now. Given the circumstances, this may be our last chance.
secondary_translated_text: Que diable es-tu ? Tu as l'air de mourir !<hpage>Je vais continuer à vivre, mais je suis misérable. Le parasite prend déjà racine dans ma coquille. Pouvez-vous m'aider avec quelque chose ? Quoi de la médecine ?<page>Je ne sais pas si une telle chose existe. Demandez à Pabo. Son travail est de donner des instructions et ainsi de suite, il pourrait donc avoir des conseils utiles.<page>Dans le même temps, ... Le shopping est la drogue elle-même, non ? Vous devriez acheter quelque chose maintenant. Compte tenu des circonstances, c'est peut - être notre dernière chance.

original_en_text: <page=S>Ughhh! What-what is this? Your body is all twisting, creaking! Horrid fiend inside! <hpage>A parasite has lodged deep inside my shell. It has taken some strength of will to keep its thrashing at bay.<page=T>With a shell like such, you cannot be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would-would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: <page=S>呃！什、什么东西？您甲壳里在扭动！有怪物！<hpage>是寄生体，暂时压制住了。<page=T>这样可不能送货！会污、污染货物！<hpage>有道理，若我能除掉它，或许再来帮忙。
translated_text: <page=S>yeah! what is this? Your body twists and squeals! There is a terrible demon there!<hpage>The parasite was trapped deep in my shell. It takes willpower to stop it.<page=T>With such a shell, you can't stop the delivery! Infected to the product you want!<hpage>Good job, courier. If you can get rid of the parasites, they may come back to help.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Ouais ! Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Votre corps se tourne et grille ! Il y a un démon terrible là - bas.<hpage>Le parasite était piégé dans ma coquille. Il faut de la volonté pour l'arrêter.<page=T>Avec une telle coquille, vous ne pouvez pas arrêter la livraison ! Infecté par le produit que vous souhaitez !<hpage>Bon travail Courier ! Si vous pouvez vous débarrasser des parasites, ils peuvent revenir pour vous aider.

original_en_text: What do you want, slave?<hpage>Slave? I am a traveller, stranger, not a slave.<page>Grnk. Exactly what a slave would say. Begone!
original_zh_text: 你来做什么，奴隶？<hpage>奴隶？我是旅者，不是奴隶。<page>哼，奴隶都这么说。滚！
translated_text: What do you want, slave?<hpage>Slaves? I am a traveler, a stranger, and not a slave.<page>Granger. What do slaves say? run!
secondary_translated_text: Que veux-tu, esclave ?<hpage>Esclaves ? Je suis un voyageur, un étranger, et non un esclave.<page>Granger ! Que disent les esclaves ? Courir !

original_en_text: <hpage>Soon, Pavo, I shall calm the chaos. Please guard these bugs safe till then.<page>Of course, dear resident! Of course! Know all our faith, and our wishes go with you.
original_zh_text: <hpage>帕沃，我会尽快平息混乱。在此之前，请守护好这些虫子。<page>放心吧，亲爱的居民！请带上我们全体的信念与祈愿前行吧。
translated_text: <hpage>Soon, Pabo, I will quell the chaos. Protect your vulnerability before you do that.<page>Of course, dear residents! of course! All of our faith and aspirations are with you.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Bientôt, Pabo, je vais mettre fin au chaos. Protégez votre vulnérabilité avant de le faire.<page>Bien sûr chers résidents ! Bien sûr ! Toute notre foi et nos aspirations sont avec vous.

original_en_text: Loose rosaries will escape your pockets at the worst of times, and I’m a deft claw at stringing them tight! I can string you a whole necklace, safe and stylish.
original_zh_text: 危急时刻念珠易失，但我能将其编成项链！既牢靠又时髦！
translated_text: At worst, loose rosaries will slip out of pockets, but I'm a skilled claw that can tie them tightly! I can tie the whole necklace for you. It's safe and stylish.
secondary_translated_text: Dans le pire des cas, les chapelets lâches glisseront dans les poches, mais je suis une griffe habile qui peut les attacher étroitement ! Je peux t'attacher tout le collier. Il est sûr et stylisé.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have taken your wish, Tipp. If I find your brother safe, I’ll be sure to send him back this way.<page>My many thanks, miss saving! You are brave-brave. Same as brother! My faith goes all with you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我接下了你的祈愿，若找到皮尔，会让他回这里。<page>多谢救星小姐！您和皮尔一样勇、勇敢！祝您好运！
translated_text: <hpage>I have granted you your wish. Tip When I find out your brother is okay, I will send him back.<page>Thank you, Mr. Rescue! You are brave, like my brother! " My faith is with you! "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je t'ai accordé ton souhait. Quand je découvrirai que ton frère va bien, je le renverrai.<page>Merci Monsieur le sauvetage ! Tu es courageux, comme mon frère !« Ma foi est avec toi ! "

original_en_text: Up there, in that Citadel, the fabled oil is waiting. Bestow it upon this fine pinmaster, and your blade shall sing louder yet.<hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. Keep your skills sharp.
original_zh_text: 圣堡藏着秘油。取来此油，你的针鸣将响彻纺络！<hpage>我会寻得此油，请针匠磨好利爪等候。
translated_text: In that castle, the legendary oil is waiting for you. Give it to this delicate instrumentalist, and your sword will sing louder.<hpage>Find the oil, Pinmaster. Keeping your skills sharp.
secondary_translated_text: Dans ce château, l'huile légendaire vous attend. Donnez-le à cet instrumentiste délicat, et votre épée chantera plus fort.<hpage>Trouvez l'huile, Pinmaster. Gardez vos compétences aiguisées.

original_en_text: Now now! What’s all this? Infested are you, bzzt?<page>Do you even know who I am? Why, ‘tis the great Yarnaby, genius physician, unfairly outcast, who now towers before you!<hpage>I apologise for intruding upon your work, but if you are the skilled physician you claim, I ask your assistance.<hpage>A parasite has wormed its way inside of me. Its roots twist and pull inside my shell, draining my strength. If you possess the skills and tools, I would see it removed.<page>Bzzt! Well, well! So you’re a special, sickly specimen, are you?! That changes matters, yes. Turns them on their head!<page>Let me see. Hm. Not haunted, indeed. No Silk-sickness. But something strange has certainly clawed its way in!<page>These “roots” that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something nasty inside a shell that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!<page>...Hmmm, but to crack your stiff shell we’ll first need some extra strength. The healing can be done, yes! But before that my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 哟哟！这是什么情况？被寄生了，滋滋？<page>知道我是谁吗？伟大的雅纳碧！遭庸才排挤的天才医师！<hpage>冒昧打扰，但若您真如自称般医术高明，还请相助。<hpage>有寄生体钻入了我的躯壳，在体内扎根生长，吸收气力。若您真有本事，请帮我去除。<page>滋滋！哎哟！特殊病例啊？！这就另当别论了！<page>让本神医瞧瞧。嗯……非邪咒非丝病。但确实有怪东西钻进去了！<page>折磨你的'根须’……虽然不常见，但无所谓！<page>只要是壳里有脏东西，就用本神医的剥离机！这是你的唯一希望，滋滋！<page>……但想撬开你这硬壳，得先升级机器！
translated_text: Come on, now! what is this? are you infected?<page>you know who i am? Because the great Arabi, the excellent doctor, has been unjustly abandoned, and now he is taller than you!<hpage>I'm sorry to interrupt you, but if you're a skilled doctor, I'll ask for your help.<hpage>A parasite has invaded my body. The root twisted in my shell, draining my strength. " If you have these skills or tools, you will be removed.<page>humming! yeah. yeah. you're a special pathological specimen, right? Yes, this change is important. turn it upside down!<page>Let's see, there really isn't a ghost. There is no silk sickness. Something weird is coming in!<page>The roots will afflict you. I don't know the details, but it's okay!<page>If you need to get rid of anything annoying inside the enclosure, you can use the awesome Yarnaby's Extritor! That's the only hope, Shhhh!<page>... But to break your shell, you need extra force first. Cure is possible, yes! But before that, the powerful Liberator needs to be updated!
secondary_translated_text: Allez, maintenant ! Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Es-tu infecté ?<page>Tu sais qui je suis ? Parce que le grand Arabi, l'excellent médecin, a été injustement abandonné, et maintenant il est plus grand que vous !<hpage>Je suis désolé de vous interrompre, mais si vous êtes un médecin qualifié, je vais demander votre aide.<hpage>Un parasite a envahi mon corps. La racine s'est tordue dans ma coquille, drainant mes forces.« Si vous avez ces compétences ou ces outils, vous serez supprimé.<page>Humming ! Oui, oui. Oui, oui. Vous êtes un spécimen pathologique spécial, non ? Oui, ce changement est important. Retournez-le à l'envers !<page>Voyons, il n'y a vraiment pas de fantôme. Il n'y a pas de maladie de soie. Quelque chose d'étrange arrive !<page>Les racines vous affligeront. Je ne connais pas les détails, mais ça va !<page>Si vous avez besoin de vous débarrasser de quoi que ce soit gênant à l'intérieur de l'enceinte, vous pouvez utiliser l'extriteur de Yarnaby ! C'est le seul espoir, Shhhh !<page>... Mais pour briser votre coquille, vous avez besoin de force supplémentaire d'abord. Le remède est possible, oui ! Mais avant cela, le puissant Libérateur doit être mis à jour !

original_en_text: Travellers should always keep spare shards close by. We Bellharters were once praised for our fine claw-work. An art lost on most modern pilgrims... excepting yourself I’m sure.
original_zh_text: 旅者该随身带碎片。钟心镇的虫昔年以各种技艺闻名，如今朝圣者都不懂……你除外。
translated_text: Passengers should always bring spare parts with them. We Berhardtans were once admired for their excellent nails. Most modern pilgrims have lost their art, and are convinced that they have nothing but themselves.
secondary_translated_text: Les passagers doivent toujours apporter avec eux des pièces de rechange. Les Berhardtans étaient autrefois admirés pour leurs excellents ongles. La plupart des pèlerins modernes ont perdu leur art et sont convaincus qu ' ils n'ont rien d'autre qu ' eux-mêmes.

original_en_text: What a persistent little worm you are. Amuse me then. Why did you cut those poor bugs from their comforting curse?<hpage>There was old power in the creature that guided the thread, and a talent of Silk, now taken, that shall prove useful to me.<hpage>That the town is freed and its service returned is a benefit too. I may ofttimes feel myself apart from these bugs, but even I recoil to see Silk strung in such sickening service.<page>Grnk. To free them was no favour. But the gathering of power... In that goal, we may understand each other some.
original_zh_text: 真是阴魂不散的虫子。行啊，陪我解个闷。为何要把那些可怜虫从舒坦的诅咒里拽出来？<hpage>操控丝咒的古兽有我要的力量，它的灵丝天赋现已归我。<hpage>顺带让镇子回复往常也算好事。我虽与这些虫子不同，但见到灵丝被这般滥用也觉得恶心。<page>哼……蠢材才会解救他们！不过夺取力量这点……咱们倒是臭味相投。
translated_text: You're a stubborn little insect. That made me laugh. " Why do you remove this poor worm from the appeasing curse?<hpage>The creatures who guided the silk have ancient power, and now the talent of the silk that has been deprived is very helpful to me.<hpage>The town was liberated, and services were restored as welfare. I may often feel disconnected from these insects, but it is embarrassing to see silk do such an unpleasant service.<page>Granger. Release is not a favour. This is an assembly of power. For this purpose, we can get to know each other a little bit.
secondary_translated_text: Tu es un petit insecte têtu. Cela m'a fait rire.« Pourquoi enlèves-tu ce pauvre ver de la malédiction apaisante ?<hpage>Les créatures qui guidaient la soie ont un pouvoir ancien, et maintenant le talent de la soie qui a été privé m'aide beaucoup.<hpage>La ville a été libérée et les services sociaux ont été rétabli. Je me sens souvent déconnecté de ces insectes, mais c'est embarrassant de voir la soie faire un service aussi désagréable.<page>Granger ! La libération n'est pas une faveur. C'est une assemblée de pouvoir. Pour cela, nous pouvons nous connaître un peu.

original_en_text: Ahh... I smell something on you. Heavy with the past, you are. You have a relic for me, don’t you?
original_zh_text: 啊哈……闻着老灰味儿了。你肯定藏着好货！
translated_text: ah... I can smell something. You carry the burden of the past. you have a relic for me, don't you?
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. Je sens l'odeur de quelque chose Vous portez le fardeau du passé. Tu as une relique pour moi, non ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Your skills are impressive. My needle sings from your care. But I must ask, can the blade be honed further?<page>You seek further sharpening? Further than Plinney does provide? Impertinence! But... Maybe? But... No...<hpage>You hesitate? Then it is possible? Are you incapable? Should I seek others within the kingdom?<page>Wait! Yes. Seek not others, but an oil, fabled and fine. With it the Citadel once brought gleaming edge and point to its pins.<page>Though the Citadel’s pinmasters are long past, some small store of that miraculous elixir may remain within its halls.<page>Were even a meagre drop pilfered, and gifted upon Plinney, your blade could shine brighter still...<page>Just know, dear friend, the veiled bugs would be oh so unkind to the thief who’d claim that fine prize for themself.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针匠手艺了得，此针经你打磨如获新生。但还能更锋利么？<page>还想更锋利？嫌普林尼手艺糙？真是无礼！不过……或许？但……不行……<hpage>犹豫？那就是可行？难道你办不到？我得另寻高匠？<page>慢着！不用找别家，但要找油。传说圣堡藏着秘油，昔年靠它磨出绝世神锋。<page>虽说圣堡针匠早已绝迹，但没准还囤着点。<page>偷来几滴给我，您这针刃还能更亮……<page>但丑话说前头，覆面虫对偷油贼可不客气。
translated_text: <hpage>Your skills are impressive. My needles sing for your care. But I have a question, will the knife be sharper?<page>Looking for further training? more than what plinius has to offer? Not the point! but... Maybe, but... number is<hpage>did you hesitate? is that possible? are you incompetent? Should I look for other people in the Kingdom?<page>wait! Yes, don't look for anyone else, find the legendary and refined oil. So the castle once brought with it a sparkling edge and a pin pointing to it.<page>The castle's instrument craftsmen are a thing of the past, but the castle may have a few small shops containing some magic panacea.<page>Even if you stole a little from Pliny, your blade would be brighter. "<page>As you all know, these masked worms are very unkind to thieves seeking prizes.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Tes compétences sont impressionnantes. Mes aiguilles chantent pour vos soins. Mais j'ai une question : le couteau sera-t - il plus aigu ?<page>Rechercher une formation supplémentaire ? Plus que ce que Palin a à offrir ? Pas le point ! Mais... Peut - être, mais... Le numéro est<hpage>Avez-vous hésité ? Est-ce possible ?Êtes-vous incompétent ? Dois-je chercher d'autres personnes dans le Royaume ?<page>Attends ! Oui, ne cherchez personne d'autre, trouvez l'huile légendaire et raffinée. Ainsi, le château a apporté une fois avec lui un bord étincelant et une épingle pointant vers lui.<page>Les artisans d'instruments du château sont une chose du passé, mais le château peut avoir quelques petites boutiques contenant une panacée magique.<page>Même si vous avez volé un peu de Pline, votre lame serait plus brillante. "<page>Comme vous le savez tous, ces vers masqués sont très méchants envers les voleurs à la recherche de prix.

original_en_text: You’ve a tool pouch on you? I can add a few pockets so you can carry more tools, and more shards to make’em. My sewing skills are quite renowned in these parts.
original_zh_text: 带着工具袋？我可以给你多缝几格，附近就数我的手艺最好了。
translated_text: Do you have the kit? You can add a few pockets, so you can carry more tools and parts with you. My sewing skills are famous in this place.
secondary_translated_text: Avez-vous le kit ? Vous pouvez ajouter quelques poches, de sorte que vous pouvez transporter plus d'outils et de pièces avec vous. Mes talents de couture sont célèbres ici.

original_en_text: <page=S>Miss saving! We are together, at last! My brother and myself, both returned to safety’s safe.<hpage>I am pleased you have found one another. If you are planning to venture out again, I would urge you reconsider for the sake of your shells.<page=S>We know it! Muchly-much! We cannot be leaving this home of bells. No more! Heres we will remain, for shells to survive. <page=T>But we instead did plan, together, clever! Yes-yes. Those pilgrims, them that pass, maybes they will help? For small reward as we have?<page=T>Even you, miss saving! Yes-yes! Saving is done. Our wishes now we ask. Now is time for miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐！我们兄弟终于团圆啦！<hpage>我很欣慰你们能重逢，但若再想外出送货，要小心。<page=S>知、知道啦！我们再也不离开钟心镇了。保命要紧。<page=T>但我们想了个妙、妙招！让路过的朝圣者帮忙送货，给点小报酬！<page=T>救星小姐也可以！您送完了货，换我们帮您实现愿望！<page=S>每单顺、顺利送达，客户都会给念珠！快看待送清单！
translated_text: <page=S>I miss the savings! We finally got together! My brother and I returned safely.<hpage>I'm glad you found each other. If you are planning to go out again, we recommend that you reconsider your shell.<page=S>i know! There are many! I can't leave the clock room. not anymore! For Shell to survive, we will stay.<page=T>We planned it wisely together! Maybe pilgrims and passers-by will help us, for a small reward like ours?<page=T>Missed the rescue! yes! yes! Rescue is complete. Let's talk about our wishes. It's time to be a delivery guy!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Les économies me manquent ! Nous sommes enfin réunis ! Mon frère et moi sommes revenus en toute sécurité.<hpage>Je suis content que vous vous trouviez l'un l'autre. Si vous envisagez de sortir à nouveau, nous vous recommandons de reconsidérer votre coquille.<page=S>Je sais ! Il y en a beaucoup ! Je ne peux pas sortir de la salle de l'horloge. Plus pas ! Pour que Shell survienne, nous resterons.<page=T>Nous l'avons bien planifié ensemble ! Peut - être que les pèlerins et les passants nous aideront-ils, pour une petite récompense comme la nôtre ?<page=T>Manque le sauvetage ! Oui ! Oui ! Le sauvetage est complet. Parlons de nos souhaits. Il est temps d'être un livreur !

original_en_text: Lost within that fortress above, the fabled oil of my profession... Such sharpness one could achieve...<page>But, oh! ‘Tis an awful thing. Too cruel, the many stabbing pins you’d face in its seeking.
original_zh_text: 圣堡里头藏着的针匠秘油……那锋利劲……<page>唉，但要寻得，这一路上有多险呐！多少针刺等着扎穿您的壳呢。
translated_text: Lost in the fortress above, my profession legendary oil. Such a sharp level.<page>But, oh! This is a horrible thing. It is too cruel, and you face many stab wounds in the process of looking for it.
secondary_translated_text: Perdu dans la forteresse d'en haut, ma profession légendaire huile. Un tel niveau fort.<page>Mais, oh ! C'est une chose horrible. Il est trop cruel, et vous faites face à de nombreuses blessures de couteau dans le processus de la recherche.

original_en_text: We’ve made a good start on the painting, resident! Give us a little more time and your bell’ll be shining like new.
original_zh_text: 刷漆进度不错！再给点时间，保准焕然一新！
translated_text: Residents, our painting has gotten off to a good start! With a little more time, your bells will shine like brand new.
secondary_translated_text: Résidents, notre peinture a pris un bon départ ! Avec un peu plus de temps, vos cloches brilleront comme neuf.

original_en_text: Hnff... So the slave comes seeking?<page>I’ve heard it. Wishing on a world cut free, yes? Along with my nephew up there. Sounds he’s sunk as simple as you.<hpage>Will you not provide your aid, bug? This trap he plans requires power, and I suspect you’re hoarding more than most.<page>Oh no. I’ll give it. Not in the hope you’ll succeed... Bah! In that, there’s slim chance. I give just to see that restless energy unleashed.<page>So much soul, found and formed. Generations of it, all going to waste. Better it’s given a chance to blaze.
original_zh_text: 嗤……奴隶来讨东西了？<page>听说了。想挣脱束缚，取得自由？还有我侄儿掺和？他跟你一样蠢。<hpage>不帮忙吗？他那陷阱缺少力量，而你囤了不少吧？<page>帮，当然帮。但不是指望你们成事……哈！八成没戏。就想看你们折腾。<page>囤了世代的灵魂全在浪费，不如放把火烧个痛快。
translated_text: did the slaves come looking for it?<page>You 've heard that the world is free, right? My nephew was there too. It sounds as easy as you.<hpage>Will you help me, Bug? " His planned traps require strength, and I doubt you will hoard much more than most.<page>Oh, no, no. I'll give it to you. I don't want you to succeed. Wow! The opportunity in this regard is small. Pay to see the energy of anxiety released.<page>Many souls have been discovered and formed. The efforts of generations have been wasted. There's a chance to burn.
secondary_translated_text: Les esclaves sont-ils venus la chercher ?<page>Vous avez entendu dire que le monde est libre, non ? Mon neveu était là aussi.Ça sonne aussi facile que toi.<hpage>Voulez-vous m'aider, bug ? Ses pièges prévus nécessitent de la force, et je doute que vous en accumulerez beaucoup plus que la plupart.<page>- Non, non, je te le donne. Je ne veux pas que vous réussissiez. Wow ! L'opportunité à cet égard est petite. Payer pour voir l'énergie de l'anxiété libérée.<page>Beaucoup d'âmes ont été découvertes et formées. Les efforts de générations ont été gaspillés. Il y a une chance de brûler

translated_text: The locked luggage compartment.<br>call him?
secondary_translated_text: Le compartiment bagages verrouillé.<br>Appelez-le ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, my shell has been overcome by a foreign force. Plasmium, it has been called in your land.<hpage>Though the substance provides some regenerative aid, I feel my mind at dangerous risk of being overtaken.<page>Bzzt! Maybe overtaken is good? Better even? Why go thinking yours is a mind so precious?<page>The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: <hpage>女士，我的躯壳遭异物侵占，在您这似乎叫生质液。<hpage>此物虽然能疗伤，但我感到意识有被夺舍的风险。<page>滋滋！被占岂不是更好？你这脑子有啥金贵的？<page>本神医只医病患！不医因病得利的。享你的福去，别烦我！
translated_text: <hpage>My shell is dominated by an external force and is called plasmium in the land.<hpage>This substance provides some degree of regenerative assistance, but my brain feels that there is a danger of overtaking.<page>humming! Transcending might be a good thing. or better? Why do you think your ideas are valuable?<page>Wonderful Yarnaby heals the patient! They are not the ones who benefit from suffering. Enjoy that advantage and let me rest!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ma coquille est dominée par une force extérieure et est appelée plasmium dans la terre.<hpage>Cette substance fournit une certaine aide régénérative, mais mon cerveau sent qu ' il y a un danger de dépasser.<page>Humming ! Transcender pourrait être une bonne chose. ou mieux ? Pourquoi pensez-vous que vos idées sont utiles ?<page>Le merveilleux Yarnaby guérit le patient ! Ce ne sont pas eux qui profitent de la souffrance. Profitez de cet avantage et laissez-moi reposer !

original_en_text: What? What now? What’s all that great racket? What is it?<hpage>Greetings, ma’am. If you are disturbed by the rending of these lands, I fear some blame is mine to bear.<page>Pah. I care not for the miseries and struggles of them outside! None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛呢？这么闹腾？叮叮咣咣的搞什么？<hpage>女士，若您被外面的响动打扰，那我很抱歉。<page>嘁。外头虫子的死活关我屁事！他们没我这眼力见儿，不懂敬重历史！！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: what's that? what are we gonna do now? what's that sound? what is that?<hpage>Hello, Madam. If you feel uneasy about the division of this land, then I too will be responsible for it. "<page>Wow. I don't care about their suffering and suffering! They don't have my keen insight and respect for the past!<page>But you are very capable. And, cunning. If you find something old and beautiful, be sure to bring it here. i bought it.
secondary_translated_text: Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Que allons-nous faire maintenant ? Qu 'est-ce que ce son ? Qu 'est-ce que c'est ?<hpage>Bonjour Madame. Si vous vous sentez mal à l'aise à propos de la division de cette terre, alors je serai aussi responsable de cela. »<page>Wow ! Je ne me soucie pas de leurs souffrances et de leurs souffrances ! Ils n'ont pas ma perspicacité et mon respect pour le passé !<page>Mais vous êtes très capables. et, cunning. Si vous trouvez quelque chose de vieux et de beau, assurez-vous de l'apporter ici. Je l'ai acheté.

original_en_text: <page=S>Keep safe, miss courier! You and your deliverings, fragile both can be!
original_zh_text: <page=S>保重啊救星小姐！您和货物都伤不得！
translated_text: <page=S>Be careful, Deliverers! You and your delivery are fragile.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Attention, les livraisonnaires ! Vous et votre enfant êtes fragiles.

original_en_text: <page=T>Do not wait, miss courier! You hold the deliverings, so nows you must away! A quick-quick bug, you must become yourself.
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐，别耽搁了！拿着货物赶紧动、动身吧！要快！
translated_text: <page=T>Don't wait, courier! We have products, so let's go out now! The simple mistake, you have to be yourself.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>N'attendez pas, messager ! Nous avons des produits, alors partons ! L'erreur simple, vous devez être vous-même.

original_en_text: <hpage>Tipp, I have promised a wish to an old bug of the Citadel, ingredients for a dish to stir a gourmand’s stomach.<hpage>Do you hold in your belongings a Courier’s Rasher? It seems a key element.<page>Courier’s Rasher! Not me, miss savings! Smelly, fatty foods, good for most. Not good for my sensitive stomach!<page>You want-want my brother, Pill! Pill is big. Pill loves rashers! Can prepare them fresh for you, but first, Pill must be found, saved, safe-safe!
original_zh_text: <hpage>蒂普，我答应了圣堡老虫做道大菜，需要送货虫的熏肉。<hpage>你身上有存货吗？若有，我想讨要。<page>熏肉？我才不带！油腻腻的，我肠胃可受不了！<page>您应、应该找皮尔！他块头大，爱死熏肉了！但得先找到他，救、救回来！
translated_text: <hpage>Tip: I made a wish for an old insect in the castle, a cooking ingredient that can scare the stomach of the heart.<hpage>Is there a courier rush for the product? This seems to be an important factor.<page>Messenger of Rush. It's not me, savings lady! Smelly greasy food is good for most people. Not good for a sensitive stomach!<page>You want my brother, Pierre! You want me! The pills are large. The pills are reckless! Fresh medicines can be prepared for you, but first you need to find, store and be safe!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Astuce : J'ai fait un vœu pour un vieil insecte dans le château, un ingrédient de cuisine qui peut effrayer l'estomac du cœur.<hpage>Y a-t - il un courrier pressé pour le produit ? Cela semble être un facteur important.<page>Messager de Rush. Ce n'est pas moi, madame de l'épargne ! La nourriture grasse odeurante est bonne pour la plupart des gens. Pas bon pour un estomac sensible !<page>Vous voulez mon frère, Pierre ! Tu veux moi ! Les pilules sont grossières. Les pilules sont insensées ! Des médicaments frais peuvent être préparés pour vous, mais vous devez d'abord les trouver, les stocker et être en sécurité !

original_en_text: Bzzt! What now?! Not another bother for the great Yarnaby?<hpage>Madam, I have returned with the spines requested. Allow me to enter, that you may remove this parasite from my shell.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！又干嘛？！还来烦伟大的雅纳碧？<hpage>女士，棘刺已准备好，请开门为我去除寄生体。
translated_text: humming! what are we going to do from now on? isn't big abby in trouble anymore?<hpage>I've come back with the spine I need, please let me in, so I can get this parasite out of my shell.
