secondary_translated_text: Humming ! Que allons-nous faire à partir de maintenant ? Big Abby n'est-elle plus en difficulté ?<hpage>Je suis revenu avec la colonne vertébrale dont j'ai besoin, s'il vous plaît laissez-moi entrer, afin que je puisse sortir ce parasite de ma coquille.

translated_text: sharp needles?
secondary_translated_text: Aiguilles pointues ?

original_en_text: That blade! By claw! My finest work by far. Pharloom may ail, but across its morbid dim, your needle will shine bright.
original_zh_text: 瞧这针刃！利爪啊！我毕生的杰作！旅者，纵使纺络病入膏肓，您的针芒也将照亮死寂！
translated_text: the knife! Use your nails! This is the best work I've ever done. The fallout may hurt, but in the darkness of illness the needle shines.
secondary_translated_text: Le couteau ! Utilisez les ongles ! C'est le meilleur travail que j'ai jamais fait. Les retombées peuvent faire mal, mais dans les ténèbres de la maladie, l'aiguille brille.

original_en_text: Care to refresh yourself in a steaming spa? Given your hard labours, I’m sure your shell would thank you for it.
original_zh_text: 想不想泡个蒸汽浴？劳累这么久，甲壳该舒坦下！
translated_text: Why don't you try to relax in the hot spring? Considering your efforts, your shell will appreciate it.
secondary_translated_text: Pourquoi ne pas essayer de vous détendre dans la source chaude ? Compte tenu de vos efforts, votre coquille l'appréciera.

original_en_text: Twine-strung globes filled with gleamflies. These’ll brighten up even the darkest bell.
original_zh_text: 充满荧虫的玻璃球串成的灯串，再黑的钟屋都能照亮！
translated_text: There are fireflies everywhere in the two-stringed globe. These will light up even the darkest bells.
secondary_translated_text: Il y a des lucioles partout dans le globe à deux cordes. Ils éclaireront même les cloches les plus sombres.

original_en_text: <page=S>Another egg. Another grossy eater queen. Delivery for the big-big creature beyond the roaches. Maybe this one travels safer than last?
original_zh_text: <page=S>又一枚噬丝蛆女王的卵，给蟑螂堆旁的大、大块头。这次会比上回安全些吗？
translated_text: <page=S>Another egg. Another wicked queen. Transporting goods to giant creatures other than cockroaches. Is this trip safer than last time?
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Un autre oeuf. Une autre reine méchante Transport de marchandises à des créatures géantes autres que les cafards. Est-ce que ce voyage est plus sûr que la dernière fois ?

original_en_text: Specimen, we must! There are secrets to uncover, bzzt! Progress can not be denied!
original_zh_text: 病患，我们必须搞清楚！有秘密就有揭秘，滋滋！进步是不可阻挡的！
translated_text: We need a sample! There's a secret to reveal, BZTT! Progress cannot be denied!
secondary_translated_text: Nous avons besoin d'un échantillon ! Il y a un secret à révéler, BZTT ! Les progrès ne peuvent pas être niés !

original_en_text: <page=T>With your shell all a’wriggle, you can’t be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: <page=T>甲壳里有东西在动，不能送货！会搞砸的！<hpage>嗯，若能解决寄生体，我会再来。
translated_text: <page=T>When the shell shakes, you can't help but accept anything! Infect the goods!<hpage>Good job, courier. If you can get rid of the parasites, they may come back to help.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Quand la coquille tremble, vous ne pouvez pas vous empêcher d'accepter quoi que ce soit ! Infectez les marchandises !<hpage>Bon travail Courier ! Si vous pouvez vous débarrasser des parasites, ils peuvent revenir pour vous aider.

original_en_text: Bzzt! Bravo! A specimen who sees my brilliance!<page>The task for you is simple. Head over into that tangled mess of cages, on the roads above the moors.<page>Two bugs hide away there, Benjin and Crull. Simple types, woefully ignorant... yet they have been useful in procuring me materials.<page>It’s Steel Spines I need. A full bundle of them, forged hard and sharp. Tougher than I’ve ever had. Tough enough to crack stone! And to pierce your thick shell, bzzt!<hpage>Then prepare your machine for my return, madam. I shall soon return with the spines, for I am eager to see myself freed.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！上道！是个识货的病患！<page>任务很简单：去沼地上边的铁笼堆找班金和克鲁尔。<page>那俩蠢货有我要的钢棘——要硬过石头！利到能捅穿你厚壳！<hpage>那请女士准备好机器，我这就去取棘刺来。
translated_text: humming! That's awesome! Check out a sample of my talent!<page>Your task is easy. Enter a messy cage on a road over a wasteland.<page>There are two mistakes that are hidden, Benzin and Kurl. Simple type, sad ignorance but they are very helpful in procuring materials for me.<page>All we need is steel. The entire bundle is made hard and sharp. This is harder than I have experienced. Strong enough to break a stone! Punch the thick shell, Heath!<hpage>Get the machine ready until I get back I want to be free, so I'll be back soon with courage. "
secondary_translated_text: Humming ! C'est génial ! Découvrez un échantillon de mon talent !<page>Votre tâche est simple. Entrez dans une cage en désordre sur une route sur un désert.<page>Il y a deux erreurs qui sont cachées, l'essence et Kurl. Type simple, triste ignorance mais ils sont très utiles pour me procurer du matériel.<page>Tout ce dont nous avons besoin, c'est de l'acier. L'ensemble du paquet est fait dur et tranchant. C'est plus difficile que ce que j'ai vécu. Assez fort pour casser une pierre ! Punchez la coquille épaisse, Heath !<hpage>Préparez la machine jusqu'à ce que je revienne, je veux être libre, alors je reviendrai bientôt avec courage. "

translated_text: The desk.
secondary_translated_text: Le desk.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. My needle has seen much use in this cruel kingdom, and I suspect many more battles are due. I will value your further skills upon my blade. <page>It is a dangerous wish you accept of this poor pinmaster. I welly hope this one’s professional desire does not cost you your life.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我会把油取来，针匠。往后旅途愈发凶险，这针刃还多有用处，你的手艺对我大有助益。<page>我这祈愿确实太过危险，希望您别为此送了命。
translated_text: <hpage>I will find oil, Tasting, my needle plays an important part in this cruel kingdom, and I suspect there will be further battles. I will cherish your sword-fighting skills. "<page>Accepting the wishes of this poor Lutheran player is a dangerous thing for you. I hope this person's career aspirations will not come at the expense of his life.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je trouverai de l'huile, de la dégustation, mon aiguille joue un rôle important dans ce royaume cruel, et je soupçonne qu ' il y aura d'autres batailles. Je vais chérir vos compétences de combat à l'épée. "<page>Accepter les souhaits de ce pauvre joueur luthérien est une chose dangereuse pour vous. J'espère que les aspirations de carrière de cette personne ne se feront pas au détriment de sa vie.

original_en_text: If you insist on surviving your infestation, seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 非要治这寄生物，就去找被钟心镇放逐的雅纳碧。听说她被赶到灰沼了。
translated_text: If you claim to survive the invasion, look for Yunabi, who was banished by Berhardt. As far as I know, she was banished from the wilderness.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous prétenez avoir survécu à l'invasion, cherchez Yunabi, qui a été banni par Berhardt. Pour autant que je sache, elle a été banie du désert.

original_en_text: I’ll waste no more words on a slave. Begone.
translated_text: No longer wasting time on slaves. Go Away Single
secondary_translated_text: Ne pas perdre de temps avec des esclaves. S'en aller Single

original_en_text: <page=T>More deliverings for those sad survivors in their cave below. <page=S>Deliver them quick-quick, miss courier! They will help much.
original_zh_text: <page=T>再给下面洞穴里那些可怜虫送趟货吧。<page=S>快点送去吧，救星小姐！能帮大忙呢！
translated_text: <page=T>Further relief for the sad survivors of the cave below.<page=S>Delivery service, I'll deliver it! They provide a lot of help.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Un soulagement supplémentaire pour les tristes survivants de la grotte en bas.<page=S>Service de livraison, je vais le livrer ! Ils fournissent beaucoup d'aide.

original_en_text: That cry upon you, sister! Those are the sour sobs of a grey and twisted thing.<hpage>You speak of the bud? It is a mysterious thing indeed. In the dank swamps above the moor, I sought towards its plaintive wails, and found it resting there... Waiting, it almost seemed.<hpage>But you speak of its form, without sighting it upon me. Is it a thing familiar to you?... Have you heard these cries before?<page>Aye, yes! Not your own specimen, surely, but way back, other travellers did sometimes carry similar. Odd types they all were. Offerings they’d call the crying things, and towards the core of Shellwood they would trek.<page>Never I did see one again, not the buds nor the bugs that brought the gift...<page>If you’re planning to follow their path, I’ll wish on your safety, but ‘tis an ill omen to hear such sad sounds returned after so long.
original_zh_text: 旅者小姐，你身上那哭声！是灰色扭曲之物发出的哀鸣。<hpage>你是说那花苞？确实神秘。我在沼泽深处追寻它的哀鸣，发现它就躺在那里……仿佛在等待着什么。<hpage>可你未见过实物却知其形态，莫非你认得此物？……或是曾听过这哭声？<page>啊，没错！以前确实有旅者携带过类似之物，尽是些怪客。他们称这哭嚎之物为祭品，然后向着甲木林深处进发。<page>此后我再未见过那些花苞，也没再遇见过献祭之虫……<page>如果你要去寻找它们的踪迹，愿你平安。但这悲哭声重现，实属不祥之兆。
translated_text: my sister is crying! These were gray, distorted, but sour sobs.<hpage>are you talking about the bumps? This is a really mysterious thing. In the damp swamps above the wasteland, I looked for the groaning of sorrow, and found it lying there. Wait, I can almost see it.<hpage>I told him the shape, but he didn't put it on. do you know? Have you ever heard this scream?<page>yes, yes! Of course, not your own specimens, but other travelers from ancient times had similar specimens. They're all weird types. They called what was crying "something," and walked toward the center of Sherwood.<page>I never saw it again, I never saw a flower bud, and I never saw an insect bringing a gift.<page>If you are going to follow their path, I pray for peace, but to hear a sad voice for so long is an ominous sign.
secondary_translated_text: Ma soeur pleure ! Celles-ci étaient grises, déformées, mais des sanglots aigres.<hpage>Vous parlez des Bumps ? C'est une chose vraiment mystérieuse. Dans les marécages humides au-dessus de la terre déserte, je cherchais le gémissement de la douleur, et je le trouvai couché là. Attends, je peux presque le voir.<hpage>Je lui ai dit la forme, mais il ne l'a pas mis, vous savez ? As-tu déjà entendu ce cri ?<page>Oui ! oui ! Bien sûr, pas vos propres spécimens, mais d'autres voyageurs des temps anciens avaient des spécimens similaires. Ce sont tous des types bizarres. Ils appelaient « quelque chose » à ce qui pleurait, et marchaient vers le centre de Sherwood.<page>Je ne l'ai plus jamais revu, je n'ai jamais vu un bourgeon de fleur, et je n'ai jamais vu un insecte apporter un cadeau.<page>Si vous allez suivre leur chemin, je prie pour la paix, mais entendre une voix triste pendant si longtemps est un signe inquiétant.

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller, one hoping you were not too badly affected by the cursed snare set upon this town.<page>Pah! What binds them outside means nothing to me. None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛？要干嘛？你是谁？带了什么来？想要什么？<hpage>过路客而已，想看看你有没有被镇上的邪咒祸害。<page>嘁！外头虫子中招关我屁事！他们没我这眼力见儿，不懂敬重历史！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: what's that? what? what? who are you? what's there? what do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveler, and I hope you will not be seriously affected by the curse traps set up in this little town.<page>Wow! Anything that is locked up outside means nothing to me. Among them is not my keen insight, my respect for the past!<page>But you are very capable. And, cunning. If you find something old and beautiful, be sure to bring it here. i bought it.
secondary_translated_text: Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Quoi ? Quoi ? Qui êtes-vous ? Qu 'est-ce qu' il y a ? Qu 'est-ce que tu veux ?<hpage>Je ne suis qu 'un voyageur, et j'espère que vous ne serez pas sérieusement affecté par les pièges de malédiction mis en place dans cette petite ville.<page>Wow ! Tout ce qui est enfermé à l'extérieur ne signifie rien pour moi. Parmi eux n'est pas mon perspicacité, mon respect pour le passé !<page>Mais vous êtes très capables. et, cunning. Si vous trouvez quelque chose de vieux et de beau, assurez-vous de l'apporter ici. Je l'ai acheté.

original_en_text: And now! This pinmaster must work! Let the sharpening begin!
original_zh_text: 好了！针匠该干活了！纺络许久未见的锋芒该再现了！
translated_text: And now,! This pinmaster works! Start the polishing!
secondary_translated_text: Et maintenant, ! Ce pinmaster fonctionne ! Commencez le polissage !

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I defeated the cruel creature above the town, and awoke the old bell stilled by Silk. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: 嗤，上头又闹腾了，可怜虫们吵吵嚷嚷。丝线被斩断了。<page>你……就是你干的！别想抵赖！<hpage>何必抵赖？我斩了镇子上头的恶兽，敲醒了被灵丝封禁的古钟。你不满意？<page>满意？喘气的活虫哪有满意的！只有死虫才消停。<page>你是奴隶，是瘟神……滚。
translated_text: The noise from above is back. Poor noise. The wires have been cut.<page>You are a... You have cut it. Don't deny it!<hpage>why do you deny it? I knocked down the cruel creature above the town and woke the old clock crushed in silk. aren't you happy?<page>Not happy! If you are breathing and living, you are not happy. Only the dead are pleased.<page>You're a slave, you're a bitch. Go away.
secondary_translated_text: Le bruit d'en haut est de retour. pauvre bruit. Les fils ont été coupés.<page>Vous êtes un... Tu l'as coupé, ne le nies pas !<hpage>Pourquoi le nies-tu ? J'ai abattu la cruelle créature au-dessus de la ville et réveillé la vieille horloge écrasée dans la soie. N'es-tu pas heureux ?<page>Pas heureux ! Si vous respirez et que vous vivez, vous n'êtes pas heureux. Seuls les morts sont satisfaits.<page>Vous êtes une esclave, vous êtes une salope. Allez-y.

original_en_text: Resident! What a marvel you are, continuing to dare the wilds and darkness, and returning home to us unscathed.<hpage>I return with hope worth sharing, Pavo. I have seen a way to calm this chaos, one I now work swiftly towards.<hpage>The chance remains slim, but if this town can hold, and my efforts succeed, Pharloom may see a future yet.
original_zh_text: 居民！您真是奇迹般的存在，外面如此黑暗危险，不仅仍旧只身闯荡，还能安然无恙地回来。<hpage>我是带着值得分享的希望回来的，帕沃。我已找到平息混乱之法，正全力推进。<hpage>虽然希望渺茫，但只要你们能继续坚守，只要我的努力能成功，纺络或许仍有未来。
translated_text: Residents! Amazingly, you braved the wilderness and darkness and came back to us unscathed.<hpage>Pavo, I have come back with a hope worth sharing. I've found a way to quell this mess and I'm working on it right now.<hpage>I don't have a chance yet, but if the town holds up and my efforts succeed, Faro may see a future.
secondary_translated_text: résidents !Étonnamment, vous avez bravé la nature sauvage et les ténèbres et vous êtes revenus chez nous indemnes.<hpage>Pavo, je suis revenu avec un espoir qui vaut la peine de partager. J'ai trouvé un moyen de réprimer ce désordre et je travaille dessus maintenant.<hpage>Je n'ai pas encore une chance, mais si la ville résiste et que mes efforts réussissent, Faro peut voir un avenir.

original_en_text: The Citadel crafted some marvellous machines, and this looks to be one of its finest! Apparently sent by some creepy slitherer hidden away up there, for sale only to you!
original_zh_text: 圣堡精工杰作！据说是上头阴森爬行的家伙带来的，这宝贝我只卖给你！
translated_text: The castle is making some great machines, and this seems to be the best one! Obviously, it's from the mad skater hiding out there, and it's just for you!
secondary_translated_text: Le château fabrique de superbes machines, et celle-ci semble être la meilleure !Évidemment, c'est du patineur fou qui se cache là - bas, et c'est juste pour vous !

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 我活着的念想就是收罗老古董！要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: It is my mission to collect the relics of the past. If you find something old and beautiful, be sure to bring it here. i bought it.
secondary_translated_text: C'est ma mission de recueillir les reliques du passé. Si vous trouvez quelque chose de vieux et de beau, assurez-vous de l'apporter ici. Je l'ai acheté.

original_en_text: <hpage>I can not aid you, couriers. Not now. My own tasks are too pressing to consider taking on your deliveries. <hpage>With luck, some pilgrims may pass with sound mind and strength remaining. They may choose to promise your wishes.<page=T>Then we shall pray they come, miss saving! Our thanks go muchly with you, still.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我帮不了，有要事在身。<hpage>若有神志清醒的朝圣者路过，或许他们会帮忙。<page=T>那就祈祷他们快来！还是谢谢您！
translated_text: <hpage>I can't help you, I can't. My own work is too urgent to undertake your delivery. "<hpage>If you're lucky, there are some clear and energetic pilgrims. They may agree with your will, but they are not.<page=T>I pray that they will come and miss help. And I'm still grateful for it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je ne peux pas vous aider, je ne peux pas. Mon travail personnel est trop urgent pour entreprendre votre livraison. "<hpage>Si vous avez de la chance, il y a des pèlerins clairs et énergiques. Ils peuvent être d'accord avec votre volonté, mais ils ne le sont pas.<page=T>Je prie pour qu 'ils viennent et manquent de l'aide. Et je suis toujours reconnaissant pour cela.

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them down. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I severed the thread and defeated the creature guiding the curse upon the town. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: 嗤，上头又闹腾了，可怜虫们吵吵嚷嚷。丝线被斩断了。<page>你……就是你干的！别想抵赖！<hpage>何必抵赖？我斩了丝线，灭了给镇子下咒的怪物。你不满意？<page>满意？喘气的活虫哪有满意的！只有死虫才消停。<page>你是奴隶，是瘟神……滚。
translated_text: The noise from above is back. Poor noise. The wires have been cut.<page>You are a... You cut them off. Don't deny it!<hpage>why do you deny it? I cut through the lines and took down the creature that was leading the cursed town. aren't you happy?<page>Not happy! If you are breathing and living, you are not happy. Only the dead are pleased.<page>You're a slave, you're a bitch. Go away.
secondary_translated_text: Le bruit d'en haut est de retour. pauvre bruit. Les fils ont été coupés.<page>Vous êtes un... Tu les coupes. Ne le nier pas !<hpage>Pourquoi le nies-tu ? J'ai coupé les lignes et abattu la créature qui dirigeait la ville maudite. N'es-tu pas heureux ?<page>Pas heureux ! Si vous respirez et que vous vivez, vous n'êtes pas heureux. Seuls les morts sont satisfaits.<page>Vous êtes une esclave, vous êtes une salope. Allez-y.

original_en_text: <page=T>We’s heard the word! Many fleas together, settled high in Pharloom, calling out their wants of us!<page=T>Clever grubbers, fleas, but theys too need-need our deliverings. See them served, miss courier! Always goodly-good to gain the thanks of fleas.
original_zh_text: <page=T>听说跳蚤们在上面建了窝！找我们要货！<page=T>跳蚤们都很机、机灵，送货交朋友准没、没错！
translated_text: <page=T>I heard that word! Many fleas have gathered on the heights of the Fal, shouting demands at us!<page=T>They're smart worms and fleas, but they need our help, too. Deliveryman, please get in the car! It's always nice - it's great to be thankful for a flea.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>J'ai entendu ce mot ! Beaucoup de puces se sont rassemblées sur les hauteurs du Fal, criant des revendications sur nous !<page=T>Ce sont des vers et des puces intelligents, mais ils ont besoin de notre aide aussi.« Deliveryman, s'il vous plaît, entrez dans la voiture ! C'est toujours agréable - c'est génial d'être reconnaissant pour une puce.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. I’d ask to trade, but your store seems a little bare.<page>Ahem! Well, yes. Our little town’s seen some dire times, and now my courier’s gone and got themself lost.<page>But don’t worry! I’ve a few small things, still! And if that courier ever makes it safely back, we’ll have plenty more treasures to haggle over.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。本想交易，但货架有点空。<page>咳！时局艰难，送货虫又跑丢了。<page>别急！还有点小玩意！等那小子平安归来，货品管够。
translated_text: <hpage>Hello, shopkeeper. I'd like to ask you for a deal, but the shop is a little empty.<page>coughing up! Yes, our town has gone through a terrible time, and now there are no couriers, and I am lost.<page>But don't worry! There's a little thing! If the messenger returns unharmed, he will have much more treasure in his possession.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Bonjour, commerçant. J'aimerais vous demander une affaire, mais le magasin est un peu vide.<page>Coughing up ! Oui, notre ville a traversé une époque terrible, et maintenant il n'y a plus de courriers, et je suis perdu.<page>Mais ne vous inquiétez pas ! Il y a une petite chose ! Si le messager revient indemne, il aura beaucoup plus de trésors en sa possession.

original_en_text: Bzzt! Leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！别烦我！本神医只医病患！享你的福去！<hpage>好吧，女士。无意浪费您的时间。
translated_text: humming! Please keep quiet! " Wonderful Yarnaby heals the patient! They are not the ones who benefit from suffering. Enjoy that advantage and let me rest!<hpage>Yes, I don't want to waste your time.
secondary_translated_text: Humming ! S'il vous plaît, restez silencieux !« Le merveilleux Yarnaby guérit le patient ! Ce ne sont pas eux qui profitent de la souffrance. Profitez de cet avantage et laissez-moi reposer !<hpage>Oui, je ne veux pas perdre votre temps.

original_en_text: Bonva! It is done, brave warrior. By my expert claw, your strange blade has received some fast-sharp shine. It shall cut cleaner than ever before.<hpage>Your efforts provide great aid, pinmaster. You have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 好了！完活啦勇士！经我利爪打磨，您这针刃寒光逼人，削铁如泥啊！<hpage>有劳了，针匠。感激不尽。
translated_text: Bonwa! It's over, brave soldier. Through my professional claws, your strange blade quickly acquired a sharp glow. It will be cleaner than ever.<hpage>Your efforts have been a great help, Master. Thank you very much.
secondary_translated_text: Bonjour ! C'est fini, brave soldat. Grâce à mes griffes professionnelles, votre étrange lame a rapidement acquis une lueur vivante. Il sera plus propre que jamais.<hpage>Vos efforts ont été d'une grande aide, Maître. Merci beaucoup à vous.

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss courier! What horror here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! When caves turn dark, the deliverings are essential, more than more.
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐！这儿太可怕了！洞窟震得像在惨叫！<page=T>钟居底下挤满了可怜的新朋友，全都吓坏了。<page=S>但您、您是来帮忙的对吧？现在最需要送货了！情况越危险，送货就越要紧！
translated_text: <page=T>Missed Delivery! How horrible it is! The caves trembled and wept for the most barbaric wounds.<page=T>My heart accelerated with fear when I saw my poor friends gathered in a house full of bells.<page=S>but what happened? you're here to help me, right? Delivery, we need you now! When the cave gets dark, rescue is even more important.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Delivery manquée ! Comme c'est horrible ! Les grottes tremblaient et pleuraient pour les blessures les plus barbariques.<page=T>Mon cœur s'accélérait de peur quand je voyais mes pauvres amis rassemblés dans une maison pleine de cloches.<page=S>Mais qu ' est-ce qui s'est passé ? Tu es là pour m'aider, n'est-ce pas ? Livraison, nous avons besoin de vous maintenant ! Lorsque la grotte devient sombre, le sauvetage est encore plus important.

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings! They are broken-broke! Gone and spilled!<page=T>Do not lose hearty-heart, miss courier! This is Pharloom! Danger, deadly. In times as these, is a rarer thing for goods to get to their goings.<page=S>Would you try-try again? For the bugs so much in need of their deliverings?
original_zh_text: <page=T>货毁、毁了！全丢了！<page=T>别灰、灰心！纺络现在处处凶、凶险，能送到才是稀罕事！<page=S>要再试一次吗？那么多虫等着货救、救命呢！
translated_text: <page=T>Delivery! They are broke! He's gone! Spilt!<page=T>Shopkeeper, don't be disappointed! This is Faro! Dangerous and deadly. Nowadays, the arrival of goods is rare.<page=S>would you like to try it again? for mistakes that need salvation?
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Delivery ! Ils sont brisés ! Il est parti ! Spilt !<page=T>Boutique, ne soyez pas déçu ! C'est Faro ! dangereux et mortels. Aujourd ' hui, l'arrivée de marchandises est rare.<page=S>Aimeriez-vous essayer à nouveau ? des erreurs qui nécessitent le salut.

original_en_text: Those bugs, cowering in their gleaming bells. Grnk. They claim a common calling, to serve the pilgrims as they make their path upwards.<page>Such a crucial role they award themselves, surely worthy of praise!<page>A sweet lie, of course. They, like their predecessors, are simply too weak and fearful to venture any farther. A settlement born from indolence.
original_zh_text: 那些缩在亮堂钟屋里的怂包，哼。自诩要侍奉攀登圣堡的朝圣者。<page>给自己戴高帽，真当是个人物！<page>甜美的谎言罢了。他们和前代一样，不过是没胆往上爬的懦夫。这镇子就是怠惰的产物。
translated_text: The insect huddled in the glowing bell. Granger. They claim that they share a common mission: to serve the pilgrims.<page>There is no doubt that you play an important role for yourself!<page>Of course this is a sweet lie. Like their predecessors, they were no longer too weak to take the risk. A solution born of laziness.
secondary_translated_text: L'insecte se blottit dans la cloche lumineuse. Granger ! Ils prétendent partager une mission commune : servir les pèlerins.<page>Il ne fait aucun doute que vous jouez un rôle important pour vous !<page>Bien sûr, c'est un doux mensonge. Comme leurs prédécesseurs, ils ne sont plus trop faibles pour prendre des risques. Une solution née de la paresse !

original_en_text: <hpage>He would have been wise to do so. If, on my travels, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send him your way.
original_zh_text: <hpage>他倒是聪明。要是在路上遇见那迷途虫，我会让他来寻你。<page>那就谢谢了！敢闯荒野帮助同类的虫可不多见。
translated_text: <hpage>He would be wise to do it. If I make a wrong mistake in my journey, I will surely take him to you.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Il serait sage de le faire ; si je fais une erreur dans mon voyage, je l'emmènerai certainement à vous.

original_en_text: By claw! Are you then our saviour in the shell? Standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>What clue, sir, tells of my part in your town’s liberation?<page>Why your blade, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>T’was a vile curse that struck here. No simple bug, nor basic pin could have granted our release. No!<page>That blade though, so expertly clutched in claw. That could welly have met the task. It was you who cut us free, yes?<hpage>I’ll grant you’ve sharp sight, pinmaster, and your saving is fortuitous. This blade that restored your town would now benefit from your service.<page>Welly, yes! I’ve a busy backlog of pins to tend, but your gracious heroism decrees that unique weapon receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?
original_zh_text: 利爪啊！您就是我们的大救星？踏进普林尼的华美钟居还这般气定神闲！<hpage>先生怎么知道我插手了镇子的事？<page>看你的针刃啊勇士！但凡有点眼力的针匠都认得出这针尖染过血。<page>那邪咒凶恶得很，寻常虫和寻常针可破不了。但您这把利刃……<page>握爪稳当，做工精良！肯定是您救了我们，对不对？<hpage>眼力不错，针匠。你既然得救，这针刃也该由你照料了。<page>好嘞！虽然我手上活计不少，但英雄的面子最大，立马给您开小灶！这就让我看看针刃？
translated_text: Use your nails! Are you the Savior of our shell? Standing at the entrance of the bell tower of Pliny, it is very quiet!<hpage>what's the clue that explains my role in liberating your city?<page>why do you have a sword? Any good needleworker can find a deadly mark on the tip of a needle.<page>It is a vile curse to be attacked here. Simple bugs and basic pins can't be given a version. No!<page>However, the knife was deftly captured by his claws. Now the mission can be fully completed. It sets us free, doesn't it?<hpage>I acknowledge, Master, that your eyes are sharp and that your salvation is accidental. This restored blade in your town will now benefit from your services.<page>Willy! yes! I have a bunch of pins to handle, but your elegant heroism has decided that I will take care of this unique weapon now! Let's take a look at it.
secondary_translated_text: Utilisez les ongles ! Es-tu le Sauveur de notre coquille ? Debout à l'entrée du clocher de Pline, il est très calme !<hpage>Quel est l'indice qui explique mon rôle dans la libération de votre ville ?<page>Pourquoi as-tu une épée ? Tout bon aiguilleur peut trouver une marque mortelle sur la pointe d'une aiguille.<page>C'est une malédiction d'être attaqué ici. Les bugs simples et les broches de base ne peuvent pas être donnés une version. Non !<page>Cependant, le couteau a été habilement capturé par ses griffes. La mission peut maintenant être complètement accomplie. Cela nous libère, n'est-ce pas ?<hpage>Je reconnais, Maître, que tes yeux sont aiguisés et que ton salut est accidentel. Cette lame restaurée dans votre ville bénéficiera maintenant de vos services.<page>- Willy ! Oui ! J'ai un tas d'épingles à gérer, mais votre élégant héroïsme a décidé que je vais prendre soin de cette arme unique maintenant ! Jetons un coup d'œil à cela.

original_en_text: More, then! Bring me more relics of the past! Records, seals, idols! Let’s gather up the history of the world and hoard it all here, nice and safe!
original_zh_text: 继续！多找点老物件！典籍、印玺、神像！把全纺络的过往都放在这儿才安稳！
translated_text: And more! " Give me more of the past! Record, seal, idol! Collect the history of the world and keep it all safe here!
secondary_translated_text: Et plus !« Donnez-moi plus du passé ! Record, Seal, Idol ! Collectez l'histoire du monde et gardez-la en sécurité ici !

original_en_text: <page=S>Many deliverings still need making, miss courier! We is much needing your help, when you is ready for the giving of it-it!
original_zh_text: <page=S>还有好多货要送呢！等您有空了一定帮帮忙！
translated_text: <page=S>When you're ready to help, there's a lot to send to Miss Messenger. We really need your help, and we're going to help you.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Quand vous êtes prêt à aider, il y a beaucoup à envoyer à Miss Messenger. Nous avons vraiment besoin de votre aide, et nous allons vous aider.

original_en_text: Done, it is! Marvel of Pharloom! See how it gleams, your long, fine blade. Havast! That the pins of our land all once held such shine. So much we have lost...<hpage>This is fine service, pinmaster. It has been a long age since I have seen my needle such. I had not remembered the finesse of its forging.<page>Welly, ho! It is certain! Yours is a blade of finer make than most, one of few that could bear even more sharpening.<page>If ever upon your long road more oil is acquired, seek my service with haste! Who knows what form we could find deeper within your weapon’s sharpened steel!
original_zh_text: 成啦！纺络的奇迹！瞧这寒光，长刃如新。唉！想当年万针皆有如此锋芒，如今……<hpage>针匠果然手艺精湛。此针许久未曾焕发如此神采，几乎快忘了它的锻造之精良。<page>哎呀呀！没错！您这针刃底子绝佳，还能更锋利！<page>要是再得到秘油，就来找我！谁知这针还能磨砺出何等锋芒！
translated_text: It's over, that's all! The Miracle of Phallem! Look at the glow of your slender blade. Haavast! The pin of our land once shone. We've lost a lot.<hpage>That's a great service, Pinsmster. I haven't seen a needle like this in a long time. I don't remember his techniques.<page>Willie, ho! This is for sure! Your blade is thinner than most blades, and one of the few blades that can withstand sharper blades.<page>If you get more oil in the long way, please seek my service as soon as possible! You don't know what shape you'll find in the depths of the sharp steel of your weapon.
secondary_translated_text: C'est fini, c'est tout ! Le Miracle de Phallem ! Regardez la lueur de votre lame mince. Haavast ! L'épingle de notre terre brillait une fois. Nous avons beaucoup perdu.<hpage>C'est un excellent service, Pinsmster. Je n'ai pas vu une aiguille comme celle-ci depuis longtemps. Je ne me souviens pas de ses techniques.<page>Willie, ho ! C'est sûr ! Votre lame est plus fine que la plupart des lames, et l'une des rares lames qui peuvent résister à des lames plus tranchantes.<page>Si vous obtenez plus d'huile sur le long chemin, s'il vous plaît demander mon service le plus tôt possible ! Vous ne savez pas quelle forme vous trouverez dans les profondeurs de l'acier tranchant de votre arme.

original_en_text: <hpage>For the moment, I can not aid you, couriers. My own tasks are too pressing.<page=T>Then we shall hope you see them soon achieved! If the deliverings are not made, Pharloom’s bugs will suffer muchly-much!
original_zh_text: <hpage>眼下实在帮不了，有要事在身。<page=T>希望您早日达成目标！要是货送不到，大伙可遭、遭殃咯！
translated_text: <hpage>The messenger cannot help you. My work is too urgent.<page=T>Achieve your goals as soon as possible! If it is not delivered, the insects of the fallout will suffer a great loss.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Le messager ne peut pas vous aider. Mon travail est trop urgent.<page=T>Atteignez vos objectifs le plus rapidement possible ! S'il n'est pas livré, les insectes de la chute subiront une grande perte.

original_en_text: <hpage>It is fortune to see you returned, pinmaster. The roads between here and that deep woods’ grave crawl with violent foes. I had concerns for your safety.<page>Brave warrior, my hero! T’was indeed a fearful scramble home, but safe I now am! And a warmly pleasure to see you too, for the world has darkened indeed!<page>In such times, the task for a pinmaster is clear, to polish and sharpen and refine, suchly that the glimmer of your blade may pierce through the encroaching murk!
original_zh_text: <hpage>能见你平安归来真是万幸，针匠。从深林墓穴到此地的路上遍布凶险，我确实有些担心你的安危。<page>勇敢的战士，我的英雄！回家路上确实惊险万分，但我现在安全了！在这愈发黑暗的世道能遇见您真是令我欣慰！<page>在这危难时刻，针匠的职责再清晰不过——打磨、淬锋、精炼，让您的兵刃锋利到足以刺破这渐浓的黑暗！
translated_text: <hpage>It's good to see you again, Pint. The road from here to the tomb deep in the woods is full of ferocious enemies. I'm worried about your safety.<page>Brave soldiers, my hero! I was scared to go home, but now I'm safe! It was nice to meet you too, the world has been getting dark!<page>In such an age, the mission of the needle maker is clear. It is to polish, polish, and refine, as the light of the blade pierces the eroded darkness.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je suis content de te revoir, Pint. La route qui va d'ici au tombeau profond dans les bois est pleine d'ennemis féroces. Je suis inquiet pour votre sécurité.<page>Bravo soldats, mon héros ! J'avais peur de rentrer chez moi, mais maintenant je suis en sécurité ! C'est aussi un plaisir de vous rencontrer, le monde s'obscurcit !<page>À une telle époque, la mission du fabricant d'aiguilles est claire. C'est polir, polir et affiner, alors que la lumière de la lame pénètre dans l'obscurité érodée.

original_en_text: <page=S>We is got requested times a’many for this, a queeny egg of those eaters of Silk. Wish from big, sticky creature, near many roaches caged. Wants it muchly! <hpage>The creature, I have met them, a timid, fawning sort. Nonetheless, their tending of Silkeaters can be a benefit for me.<hpage>If a queen delivered could improve their harvest, I too would gain from the trade.<page=S>Miss courier, and big, sticky creature? Both are like to liking things so grossly-gross? We think yous are muchly strange...
original_zh_text: <page=S>接了个怪单！蟑螂笼子旁的黏糊大块头想、想要噬丝蛆女王的卵！<hpage>我见过那大块头，是个怂包。他们养蛆虽然恶心，但对我有利。<hpage>要是能提高他们的产量，倒也划算。<page=S>救星小姐和黏糊怪都好重口！真搞不懂……
translated_text: <page=S>I got a lot of Queen eggs from the Silk Diner. Blessings from a large sticky creature near many cockroaches in the cage. I want it! "<hpage>I had seen them before, and the creature was a cowardly and likable man. However, taking care of the silk is good for me.<hpage>If the Queen can increase her harvest, I too will benefit from the trade.<page=S>Mr. Courier, are there any big, sticky creatures? do you guys like that nasty stuff? I think you're weird.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>J'ai eu beaucoup d'œufs de la reine du dîner de soie. Bénédictions d'une grande créature collante près de nombreux cafards dans la cage. Je veux ça ! "<hpage>Je les avais déjà vus, et la créature était un homme lâche et sympathique. Cependant, prendre soin de la soie est bon pour moi.<hpage>Si la reine peut augmenter sa récolte, je profiterai aussi du commerce.<page=S>Monsieur Courier, y a-t - il des créatures grossières et collante ? Vous aimez ce truc méchant ? Je pense que vous êtes bizarre.

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss saving! We thought us safe, brothers together at last, but what horror even here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! Alas, for our shells to survive we cannot now leave this home of bells. No more. Heres we must remain.<page=T>But we instead did plan, together, clever! Yes-yes. Those strong ones, like yourselfs, maybes they will help? For small reward as we have?<page=S>Our savings is done, and the caves turn dark. Now the deliveries are needed, desperate. Now is time for miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐！本以为我们兄弟团聚就安全了，谁知这里也遭了灾！洞窟震、震个不停，像在惨叫似的。<page=T>您看钟居底下这些可怜的新朋友，全都挤作一团，心都快吓跳出来了。<page=S>但您、您是来帮忙的对吧？现在最需要送货了！可我们这副样子……实在不敢离开钟居了。只能守在这儿。<page=T>不过我们想、想了个聪明主意！像您这样的强者，说不定愿意帮忙？酬劳虽然不多……<page=S>我们的积蓄都花光了，洞窟也危在旦夕。现在送货是救命的事！该您出马了，救星小姐！
translated_text: <page=T>I miss the savings! I thought my brothers were safe and finally got together, but here too it's scary! The caves trembled and wept for the most barbaric wounds.<page=T>My heart accelerated with fear when I saw my poor friends gathered in a house full of bells.<page=S>but what happened? you're here to help me, right? Delivery, we need you now! Unfortunately, for the survival of the shell, you can not leave the house of this clock. There is no more. i'm here.<page=T>We planned it wisely together! yeah - yeah. will a strong man like you help me? for a small reward like ours?<page=S>My savings were gone, and the caves were dark. Urgent delivery is required. It's finally time to deliver!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Les économies me manquent ! Je pensais que mes frères étaient en sécurité et finalement réunis, mais ici aussi, c'est effrayant ! Les grottes tremblaient et pleuraient pour les blessures les plus barbariques.<page=T>Mon cœur s'accélérait de peur quand je voyais mes pauvres amis rassemblés dans une maison pleine de cloches.<page=S>Mais qu ' est-ce qui s'est passé ? Tu es là pour m'aider, n'est-ce pas ? Livraison, nous avons besoin de vous maintenant ! Malheureusement, pour la survie de la coquille, vous ne pouvez pas quitter la maison de cette horloge. Il n'y en a plus. Je suis ici.<page=T>Nous l'avons bien planifié ensemble ! Oui - oui. Un homme fort comme toi m'aidera-t - il ? Pour une petite récompense comme la nôtre ?<page=S>Mes économies avaient disparu, et les grottes étaient sombres. Une livraison urgente est nécessaire. Il est enfin temps de livrer !

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller. May I ask, though, what work occupies you here?<page>What occupies me, you ask? The past! The voices of ages gone by, they speak to me through what is left behind.<page>Those outside, those dreary pilgrims and bell-adorned dullards... none of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛？要干嘛？你是谁？带了什么来？想要什么？<hpage>过路客而已，请问您在忙什么？<page>忙什么？忙着挖掘历史！这些老物件都会跟我诉说过往呢！<page>外头那些呆瓜朝圣者和钟里的蠢货……没一个懂行！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: what's that? what? what? who are you? what's there? what do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveler. I can ask you a question, but what are you doing here?<page>What do you ask me? Something of the past! The flow of time has taught us everything.<page>Those people, bored pilgrims and fools with bells, have no respect for my keen insight, my past! "<page>But you are very capable. And, cunning. If you find something old and beautiful, be sure to bring it here. i bought it.
secondary_translated_text: Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Quoi ? Quoi ? Qui êtes-vous ? Qu 'est-ce qu' il y a ? Qu 'est-ce que tu veux ?<hpage>Je suis juste un voyageur. Je peux vous poser une question, mais qu ' est-ce que vous faites ici ?<page>Que me demandez-vous ? Quelque chose du passé ! Le temps nous a tout appris.<page>Ces gens, pèlerins ennuyés et imbéciles avec des cloches, n'ont aucun respect pour ma perspicacité, mon passé ! "<page>Mais vous êtes très capables. et, cunning. Si vous trouvez quelque chose de vieux et de beau, assurez-vous de l'apporter ici. Je l'ai acheté.

original_en_text: Your continued help to Bellhart has not gone unnoticed, miss traveller.<page>In these terrible times, it’s rare enough to see any wish granted. Now to see such care come from a stranger! Why, that’s simply unheard of!<hpage>I have seen the scale of suffering wrought across Pharloom, Pavo. And I will admit, fulfilling these requests may do little to affect the cause... Even still, I have found it a rewarding task.<hpage>To aid another... The small warmth of it, I had almost forgotten.
original_zh_text: 您对钟心镇的援助有目共睹，小姐。<page>这世道，能实现祈愿已是奇迹，更何况还是出自外乡客！闻所未闻！<hpage>我也目睹纺络遍地疮痍。实现祈愿虽难以撼动其根源，但总能得到些许慰藉。<hpage>助虫为乐……这份悸动，我几乎忘却。
translated_text: Passengers, your continued support for Berhardt will not be ignored.<page>In these dreadful times, a wish is seldom granted. I saw this terror from a stranger! why? This is unheard of!<hpage>He witnessed Pavo Farms' distress. Meeting these requirements will have little impact on your career. Even so, I felt it was a useful job.<hpage>It was a little warm with my help, so I forgot.
secondary_translated_text: Passagers, votre soutien continu à Berhardt ne sera pas ignoré.<page>En ces temps difficiles, un vœu est rarement exaucé. J'ai vu cette terreur d'un étranger ! Pourquoi ? C'est inoubli !<hpage>Il a été témoin de la détresse des fermes de Pavo. Répondre à ces exigences aura peu d'impact sur votre carrière. Malgré tout, j'ai trouvé que c'était un travail utile.<hpage>Il faisait un peu chaud avec mon aide, alors j'ai oublié.

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. Look at my collection, if you fancy! Look, look!
original_zh_text: 我活着的念想就是收罗老古董！想看我的珍藏不？来！快看看！
translated_text: It is my mission to collect the relics of the past. If you like it, check out my collection! Look at me! Look at me!
secondary_translated_text: C'est ma mission de recueillir les reliques du passé. Si vous aimez, consultez ma collection ! Regarde-moi ! Regarde-moi !

original_en_text: <page=T>Goods for the camp at base, where pilgrims’ journey starts. We muchly hope this delivering goes well!
original_zh_text: <page=T>给骸底营地的货物，希望这趟一路顺利！
translated_text: <page=T>Cargo from the base camp where the pilgrims began their journey. We want this delivery!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Cargo du camp de base où les pèlerins ont commencé leur voyage. Je veux cette livraison !

original_en_text: <page=S>You have the good-goods, miss courier! Now only the deliverings needs doing. Don’t wait here-here!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐，拿、拿了货物，快出发吧！
translated_text: <page=S>You have a good merchandise! Now we just need to deliver. Don't wait here! here!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Vous avez une bonne marchandise ! Maintenant, nous devons simplement livrer. N'attendez pas ici ! ici !

original_en_text: Off with you! Head over to that tangled mess of cages, in those roads above the moors.<page>Those two bugs, Benjin and Crull, can surely scrounge up what I need. A full bundle of hard, sharp spines!
original_zh_text: 赶紧去！找沼地上边铁笼堆的班金和克鲁尔，拿钢棘回来！
translated_text: run! There are cluttered cages on the roads over the wasteland.<page>The two mistakes of the headmaster and Kurl will find what I need. A whole bunch of hard and sharp prickles!
secondary_translated_text: Courir ! Il y a des cages encombrées sur les routes au-dessus de la terre déserte.<page>Les deux erreurs du directeur et de Kurl trouveront ce dont j'ai besoin. Un tas de piqûres dures et pointues !

original_en_text: That blade! By claw! It is done. Sharper than this pinmaster would have believed achievable. Shining pale and clear.<page>Bonva! Stranger, you have granted my wish, and more. Your blade is accomplishment to match those of great pinmasters past.<page>Pharloom may ail, but throughout its morbid dim, your needle will shine bright.
original_zh_text: 瞧这针刃！利爪啊！完成了！这苍白皎洁的锋芒，简直超乎我这针匠想象。<page>太好了！您不止完成了我的祈愿，还助此针达成了不逊于古匠的成就！<page>纵使纺络病入膏肓，您的针芒也将照亮死寂！
translated_text: the knife! Use your nails! This is more difficult than the craftsman imagines. White and Clear.<page>Bonwa! You have granted me my wishes, and I will be glad to see you. Your sword is comparable to the great harpists of old.<page>The fallout may hurt, but the needle shines in the pathological darkness.
secondary_translated_text: Le couteau ! Utilisez les ongles ! C'est plus difficile que l'artisan ne l'imagine. Blancs et clairs.<page>Bonjour ! Vous m'avez accordé mes vœux et je serai heureux de vous voir. Votre épée est comparable aux grands harpistes d'autrefois.<page>Les retombées peuvent faire mal, mais l'aiguille brille dans l'obscurité pathologique.

original_en_text: What? You refuse to pass it on? What good do you think it’ll do you?!
original_zh_text: 干嘛？为什么不交？留着能下崽啊？！
translated_text: what's that? Do you refuse the inheritance? what do you think would be helpful?
secondary_translated_text: Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Vous refusez l'héritage ? Qu ' est-ce que vous pensez serait utile ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Pavo. Keep these poor bugs close and their spirits from sorrow.<page>None shall leave these walls, dear resident, and all still are welcome. Any that can be saved.<page>Better we bugs be together, here at the end of it all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，帕沃。保护好这些可怜虫，别让他们陷入绝望。<page>没有虫会离开这里的，旅者小姐！这里永远欢迎任何幸存的虫。<page>末日将至，能聚在一起已值得庆幸。
translated_text: <hpage>Be careful, Pabo. Bring the poor worm nearer and save the soul from sorrow.<page>Dear residents, no one can get away from this wall. Whatever it is that can be saved.<page>When it's over, you better be together.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Faites attention, Pabo. Apportez le pauvre vers plus près et sauvez l'âme de la douleur.<page>Chers résidents, personne ne peut s'échapper à ce mur. Quoi qu ' il en soit, il peut être sauvé.<page>Quand c'est fini, il vaut mieux être ensemble.

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay alert on your journey home, pinmaster. If you encounter other bugs upon the road, I advise you avoid them as you are able.
original_zh_text: <hpage>回程多留神，针匠。路上遇虫尽量躲着点。
translated_text: <hpage>Be careful on the way home. If there are other mistakes along the way, it is best to avoid them as much as possible.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Soyez prudent sur le chemin du retour. S'il y a d'autres erreurs en cours de route, il est préférable de les éviter autant que possible.

original_en_text: Auugh! Bzzt! Again the world lashes out at me!<page>But the pain... it means nothing to Yarnaby!<page>Nothing can deter my great work! Not for long! I must not be stopped!
original_zh_text: 嗷！滋滋！这该死世道又针对我！<page>但痛苦……对雅纳碧而言没有意义！<page>什么都挡不住本神医的伟业！什么都不行！
translated_text: ah! ah! humming! The world is attacking me again!<page>But the pain. The Yanabi doesn't make sense!<page>Nothing will stop my great work! " Not that long! I can't stop it!
secondary_translated_text: Ah ! Ah ! Humming ! Le monde nous attaque à nouveau !<page>Mais la douleur. Le Yanabi n'a aucun sens !<page>Rien n'arrêtera mon grand travail !« Pas si longtemps ! Je ne peux pas l'arrêter !

translated_text: Bell painted
secondary_translated_text: Bell peint

original_en_text: <page=S>A new destination this-this! And desperate these supplies are asked.<page=T>Deliverings for them-them escaped from the crumbled camp beside the bone, those few still living.<page=T>Hurting and hungry, those few must be.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这、这是新目的地！这批物资要得急！<page=T>送给骸骨营地的幸存者，就剩那么几个了。<page=T>他们肯定又惊又饿。
translated_text: <page=S>This is a new destination! These materials are urgent.<page=T>They fled from the crumbling camp beside the bones, and some were still alive.<page=T>They were suffering from suffering and hunger.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>C'est une nouvelle destination ! Ce matériel est urgent.<page=T>Ils ont fui le camp en ruines à côté des os, et certains étaient encore vivants.<page=T>Ils souffraient de la souffrance et de la faim.

original_en_text: <page=T>It is yours, miss courier! Meats prepared fresh as fresh, in our special way.<page=T>Miss courier must know! Our rasher is delicious, strong, fatty food, but is not long to last. If not stored quick, it-it is flavour fast turns foul.<hpage>If the rasher is likely to spoil, then I shall make fast for the Citadel. I’ve no desire to see your efforts, or your scant supplies wasted.
original_zh_text: <page=T>给您备好啦！送货虫特制熏肉，仅此一家！<page=T>熏肉香浓肥美但不耐存！得赶紧送！<hpage>既然如此，我即刻动身。不枉你们辛苦。
translated_text: <page=T>Deliverer, this is yours! Meat cooked in a special way.<page=T>The messenger knows it! Our Rachael cheese is delicious, but it doesn't last long. If you don't store it right away, it will taste bad right away.<hpage>If Rachelle's illness worsens, I will return to the castle I do not want to waste your efforts or even a few materials.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Livraison, c'est la vôtre ! La viande est cuite d'une manière particulière.<page=T>Le messager le sait ! Le fromage Rachael est délicieux, mais il ne dure pas longtemps. Si vous ne le stockez pas tout de suite, il aura un mauvais goût tout de suite.<hpage>Si la maladie de Rachelle s'aggrave, je retournerai au château, je ne veux pas gaspiller vos efforts ni même quelques matériaux.

original_en_text: Shellwood’s grown more dangerous in recent times, but I’m a lifelong catcher, right down to my core. Ain’t nothing that’ll change that.
original_zh_text: 甲木林近来愈发凶险，但我生来就是渔夫的命，避不开。
translated_text: Sherwood has become more dangerous in recent years, but I'm essentially a lifelong receiver. nothing has changed.
secondary_translated_text: Sherwood est devenu plus dangereux ces dernières années, mais je suis essentiellement un receveur à vie. Rien n'a changé.

original_en_text: I rarely sell objects as intriguing as this. Supposed to improve a bug’s natural ability to heal! Can’t say I’ve felt its effects myself, but then I keep more healthy than most.
original_zh_text: 这可是少见的好玩意！据说能提升自愈力。我身子一向健康，倒是没感受过。
translated_text: Rarely does anything so attractive sell. It can enhance the natural healing power of insects. I can't say I felt the effects myself, but I'm healthier than most people.
secondary_translated_text: Il est rare de vendre quelque chose d'aussi attrayant. Il peut améliorer le pouvoir de guérison naturel des insectes. Je ne peux pas dire que j'ai ressenti les effets moi-même, mais je suis en meilleure santé que la plupart des gens.

original_en_text: Yes... This fits my collection well. Look, then! Look at what I have!
original_zh_text: 真不错……这玩意配得上我的珍藏。瞧啊！这才叫宝贝！
translated_text: That's right, sir. Perfect for my collection. So look at that! What I have! "
secondary_translated_text: C'est juste, monsieur. Parfait pour ma collection. Alors regardez ça ! Ce que j'ai ! "

original_en_text: Ahh. ‘Tis your choice, warrior. If you’re choosing different in times ahead, Plinney shall be here to provide eager aid.
original_zh_text: 唉。随您，勇士。改主意了随时来找普林尼。
translated_text: It is your choice, soldier. If you choose another option in the future, Pliny is here to help you enthusiastically.
secondary_translated_text: C'est ton choix, soldat. Si vous choisissez une autre option à l'avenir, Pline est là pour vous aider avec enthousiasme.

original_en_text: My sickly friend! Pavo can sense that you are ailing, but fret not! For in Bellhart, pilgrims may rest and recuperate until they are fit to travel once more!<hpage>Your hospitality is appreciated, Pavo, but I fear rest alone will not suffice for this illness. A parasite has taken root inside me, one I can not remove through strength alone.<hpage>Tell me, are there any you know who might help me? A healer, or a physician?<page>A physician? Well... we did once have one... A frightening fiend! Callous and crude in her practice. For the health of glorious Bellhart we voted, unanimously, to expel her!<page>I know not where she buzzed away to, and I prefer to keep it that way! But if you really must seek her out, you might start by speaking to the old hermit skulking beneath the Bellway.<page>Yes... that hermit seems mad, but he has a way of accumulating knowledge. He might be able to tell you where that wretched physician is lurking.
original_zh_text: 旅者小姐！帕沃察觉到您疾病缠身，但无需担心！您可以待在钟心镇疗养至康复！<hpage>心领了，但此症并非静养可以治愈，甲壳内寄生体难以驱除。<hpage>你可知道哪里能寻得医者？<page>医者？过去镇上曾有一虫……但手段可怕至极！因疗法过于粗暴遭全民驱逐！<page>如今行踪不明，但执意要寻找的话……可以问问在钟道下藏身的老隐士。<page>那老头虽然疯疯癫癫，但知道不少，或许能告知庸医的下落。
translated_text: A sick friend! The peacock can feel sick, but don't worry. In Berhardt, pilgrims can rest and recuperate until they make their journey again.<hpage>Pabo, thank you for your hospitality, but rest alone cannot cure your illness. The parasites are rooted in me and I cannot eradicate them alone.<hpage>Tell me, do you know anyone who can help you? a therapist or a doctor?<page>doctor? okay, okay. There is one terrible demon! Her behavior was cold and rude. For the health of the honourable Berhardt, we unanimously expel her.<page>I don't know where it went, but I want it to stay that way! But if you really want to find her, you can talk to the hermit hiding under the bellview.<page>That's right, sir. The hermit may seem crazy, but there are ways to accumulate knowledge. Maybe you can tell me where the poor doctor is.
secondary_translated_text: Un ami malade. Le paon peut se sentir malade, mais ne vous inquiétez pas.À Berhardt, les pèlerins peuvent se reposer et se reposer jusqu'à ce qu ' ils reprennent leur voyage.<hpage>Pabo, merci de votre hospitalité, mais le repos seul ne guérira pas votre maladie. Les parasites sont enracinés en moi et je ne peux pas les éradiquer seul.<hpage>Dites-moi, connaissez-vous quelqu 'un qui peut vous aider ? Un thérapeute ou un médecin ?<page>Docteur ? Très bien, très bien. Il y a un démon terrible ! Son comportement était froid et grossier. Pour la santé de l'honorable Berhardt, nous l'expulsions à l'unanimité.<page>Je ne sais pas où il est allé, mais je veux que cela reste comme ça ! Mais si vous voulez vraiment la trouver, vous pouvez parler à l'ermite qui se cache sous la cloche.<page>C'est juste, monsieur. L'ermite peut sembler fou, mais il existe des moyens d'accumuler des connaissances. Peut - être pouvez-vous me dire où se trouve le pauvre docteur ?

original_en_text: We are lucky to have you, miss traveller. In Bellhart you are always welcome, you and your big, sharp blade!
original_zh_text: 有您相助真是钟心镇之幸！这里随时欢迎您，以及您的针刃！
translated_text: We have been blessed with you, Mr. Traveler. Berhart always welcome you and your big sharp blade!
secondary_translated_text: Nous avons été bénis avec vous, monsieur le voyageur. Berhart vous accueille toujours et votre grosse lame tranchante !

original_en_text: <hpage>What do you remember of your time caught upon the thread, Pavo?<page>Oh, ahh. It is difficult... Upsetting even to think. Strange, sad memories, not my own, and my own thoughts smothered amidst the tangle.<page>If one could choose to connect themself to something grander, that curse may seem a wonder. For myself, it now seems a horror.
original_zh_text: <hpage>帕沃，还记得被邪丝操控时的记忆么？<page>唉……回想起来有些痛苦……尽是陌生悲伤的回忆，自身的思绪仿佛被扼杀其中。<page>要是自愿投身于宏伟存在，这份诅咒或许是恩赐。但对于我……终究是梦魇。
translated_text: <hpage>pabo, do you remember when you were in trouble?<page>Oh yeah yeah. It was hard. I am anxious even to think about it. Strange and sad memories that are not his own are intertwined with his own thoughts.<page>If a person had the option of connecting himself to something greater, the curse might seem like a miracle. It seems like a fear to me now.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>« Pabo, te souviens-tu quand tu étais dans les ennuis ?<page>Oh yeah yeah. C'était dur. Des souvenirs étranges et tristes qui ne sont pas les siens sont entrelacés avec ses propres pensées.<page>Si une personne avait la possibilité de se connecter à quelque chose de plus grand, la malédiction pourrait sembler un miracle. Cela me semble une peur maintenant.

original_en_text: Oh! Ohhhh! They shall join... Union upon your thread... A gift, for your waking. A world strung to serve...<hpage>Creature, your claws guide those cursed threads, but you are not their source. What role do you play in this vile affliction?
original_zh_text: 哦！哦哦哦！他们将归附……缠绕在您的丝线中……献予您的苏醒之礼，一个以侍奉之名编织的世界……<hpage>怪物，你虽然操纵邪丝却并非其源头。在这卑劣诅咒中你扮演什么角色？
translated_text: oh! oh! They will join. Combine them in your line. It is a gift of awakening. A world dedicated to service.<hpage>O living creature, your claws lead the cursed thread, but you are not the source of it What part have you played in this miserable suffering?
secondary_translated_text: Ooh ! Ooh ! Ils se joindront. Combinez-les dans votre ligne. C'est un cadeau de réveil. Un monde dédié au service.<hpage>O créature vivante, tes griffes mènent le fil maudit, mais tu n'es pas la source de celui-ci, quel rôle as-tu joué dans cette misérable souffrance ?

original_en_text: <page=T>But hold, miss courier! Before depart you mustly know, all deliverings are in needing of great-great care!<page=S>No bump! No shake! No taking funny transport! Only leg, claw, wing must be used to see them where they need be going.<page=S>Carry the deliverings safe-safe, miss courier! Cared for like your own shell.
original_zh_text: 等等！出发前得知道：所有货物必须轻拿轻放！<page>不准磕！不准晃！只能用腿脚翅膀运送！<page>要当成自己甲壳一样护着货！
translated_text: <page=T>Wait a minute, Deliveryman! Before you leave, all births need to be very careful!<page=S>No collision! don't move! stop joking! They use their feet, claws and wings to decide where to go.<page=S>Safe delivery, safe delivery, delivery miss! Take care of them like your own shell.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Attendez une minute, Deliveryman ! Avant de partir, toutes les naissances doivent faire très attention !<page=S>Pas de collision ! Ne bouge pas ! Arrêtez de plaisanter ! Ils utilisent leurs pieds, leurs griffes et leurs ailes pour décider où aller.<page=S>Livraison sûre, livraison sûre, livraison miss ! Prenez soin d'eux comme de votre propre coquille.

original_en_text: <page=T>Those good-goods, all packed fresh for the clever fleas. Take thems up for us, miss courier. Maybe new friends you might be making with your service? Yes-yes?
original_zh_text: 给聪明跳蚤们的新鲜货。送去说不定能交新朋友？对、对吧？
translated_text: <page=T>These good goods are a fresh package for smart fleas. Deliverer, please get this. You can make new friends through your services. is that right?
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Ces bons produits sont un paquet frais pour les puces intelligentes. Livraire, s'il vous plaît, prenez ceci. Vous pouvez vous faire de nouveaux amis grâce à vos services. Est-ce correct ?

original_en_text: Bzzt! Who’s bothering me now?! Leave the great Yarnaby in peace! Shoo shoo!
original_zh_text: 滋滋！谁在聒噪？！让伟大的雅纳碧静静！去去去！
translated_text: humming! Who's bothering me now! May the great Anabi rest in peace! Shh! Shh!
secondary_translated_text: Humming ! Qui me dérange maintenant ! Que le grand Anabi repose en paix ! Shh ! Shh !

original_en_text: <hpage>I am sick, madam, and badly in need of your service. I’ve become host to a vile infestation. It leeches my strength, and attempts to wrest control of my shell.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我身体抱恙，女士，需要您诊治。壳里寄生了恶心玩意，不仅吸我气力，还想夺舍躯体。
translated_text: <hpage>I am ill and need your service. I have become the host of a despicable invasion. It sucks my power and tries to control my shell.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je suis malade et j'ai besoin de votre service. Je suis devenu l'hôte d'une invasion méprisable. Il aspire mon pouvoir et essaie de contrôler ma coquille.

original_en_text: Halfwits, the lot of them! Such grand achievement, wrought by Yarnaby! A bug healed full by my marvellous machine!<page>A few weaklings expire, and they all raise their claws. Is there no place for progress in their tiny minds?!
original_zh_text: 全是蠢材！这是雅纳碧创造的奇迹！被神机治愈的病患！<page>死几个弱虫就举爪抗议！他们的小脑仁就这么容不下进步？！
translated_text: Smart half, many of them. This is a great achievement that Yarnaby has made! This error was completely cured with my magic machine!<page>Several weak men died and raised their hands. is there no room for improvement in their little brains?
secondary_translated_text: La moitié intelligente, beaucoup d'entre eux. C'est une grande réussite que Yarnaby a réalisée ! Cette erreur a été complètement corrigée avec ma machine magique !<page>Plusieurs hommes faibles moururent et lèvèrent la main. N'y a-t - il pas de place à améliorer dans leurs petits cerveaux ?

original_en_text: Bellhart’s lost much of its lustre, but we still offer some comfort to the pilgrims who climb this high.
original_zh_text: 钟心镇是风光不再了，但还能为登高的朝圣者提供些慰藉。
translated_text: Although Berhardt has lost most of its splendor, we still offer comfort to pilgrims who climb to such heights.
secondary_translated_text: Bien que Berhardt ait perdu la plupart de sa splendeur, nous offrons toujours du confort aux pèlerins qui grimpent à de telles hauteurs.

original_en_text: <page>Dear resident! To see you return alive is such a glimmer of light, even as the dark descends upon us all.<hpage>All these pilgrims gathered here... I had not expected so many to survive. The destruction beyond these bells suggested worse.<page>Indeed! Things should be worse! Would be worse, but for your tall warrior friend, her of those shining rings, who so fortunately chose our town to camp.<page>That brave bug now acts alone to guard our town and those pilgrims who flee for it.<page>For her efforts, our shells have stayed safe, though how long she can remain at that task... I do not dare to consider.
original_zh_text: <page>旅者小姐！看到您平安归来，就像一道萤火驱散了钟心镇的黑暗。<hpage>想不到有如此多朝圣者幸存，镇外的景象可是惨烈得很。<page>情况确实本应更糟！但幸运的是有您这样的勇士驻守。<page>正是有您的保护，朝圣者们才能逃难至此。<page>有您在，镇子才能暂时安全，但不知这景象能维持多久……
translated_text: <page>Dear residents! To see you come home alive is a bundle of light, even if the darkness falls on all of us.<hpage>I didn't expect so many people, all pilgrims gathered here, to survive. Damage to the outside of these watches indicates that it is even worse.<page>It really is! Things should be getting worse! If she hadn't had a tall warrior friend with a shining ring, she would have been lucky to have chosen our little town camp.<page>This brave insect will now act alone to protect our town and the pilgrims fleeing from here.<page>Thanks to her efforts, our shell is still safe, but how long she can endure it I don't have the courage to think about it.
secondary_translated_text: <page>Chers résidents ! Te voir rentrer à la maison vivant est un faisceau de lumière, même si les ténèbres tombent sur nous tous.<hpage>Je ne m'attendais pas à ce que tant de personnes, tous des pèlerins rassemblés ici, survivent. Les dommages à l'extérieur de ces montres indiquent que c'est encore pire.<page>C'est vraiment ! Les choses devraient empirer ! Si elle n'avait pas eu un grand ami guerrier avec une bague brillante, elle aurait eu la chance d'avoir choisi notre camp de petite ville.<page>Ce courageux insecte va maintenant agir seul pour protéger notre ville et les pèlerins qui fuient d'ici.<page>Grâce à ses efforts, notre coquille est toujours en sécurité, mais combien de temps elle peut supporter, je n'ai pas le courage de penser à cela.

original_en_text: My brother, Pill, still out there. Help-help others he must be, taking good-goods all across. I’m is only hope he stay safe-safe, but gone long is Pill. Too long!<page>On the wishwall, I’m placed my wish-wish, that my brother returns to me, and these bells of safety’s safe.<hpage>I shall check the wall, Tipp. If your wish aligns with my journey, I may track him down.
original_zh_text: 我兄弟皮尔还在外面送、送货，他肯定还在帮、帮别的虫，但去太久了！<page>我在祈愿墙上许、许了愿：希望他平安归来，还有钟心镇也永远平安。<hpage>我会查看祈愿墙，蒂普。若是顺路，或许能找到他的踪迹。
translated_text: My brother, Pierre, is on the run. He must be helping people and carrying beautiful things around the world. I wanted to make sure he was safe, but my medicine was gone. long time no see you!<page>On the wall of wishes, I wrote a wish. I hope that my brother will come back to me and that this bell will be safe.<hpage>I'll check the wall, Tip. If your wishes coincide with my journey, then I can find him.
secondary_translated_text: Mon frère Pierre est en fuite. Il doit aider les gens et transporter de belles choses dans le monde. Je voulais m'assurer qu ' il était en sécurité, mais mes médicaments avaient disparu. Je ne te vois pas depuis longtemps !<page>Sur le mur des vœux, j'ai écrit un vœu. J'espère que mon frère reviendra chez moi et que cette cloche sera en sécurité.<hpage>Je vais vérifier le mur, Tip. Si vos désirs coïncident avec mon voyage, alors je peux le trouver.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. Given the hardships of the lands beyond these bells, your store seems in remarkable order. <page>Aye, well, we’ve had our tough times too! Of once bustling Bellhart, only a few residents now remain.<page>But things are turned around for old Frey! Ho, yes! The town at least feels briefly at peace, and my courier has returned with fresh goods to trade. <page>Whether pilgrim or traveller, mine is the finest store you’ll have the fortune to visit throughout our blighted lands.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。钟心镇外世道艰难，你这铺子倒打理得井井有条。<page>唉，我也吃过苦头的！往日热闹的钟心镇，如今只剩几口虫啦。<page>但老芙蕾时来运转！哈哈！镇子外总算消停会儿，送货虫也带新鲜货回来了。<page>不管是朝圣者还是旅者，走遍这破地儿也找不着比我家更棒的铺子！
translated_text: <hpage>Hello, shopkeeper. Considering the hardships of the land beyond these bells, your shop seems to be in order.<page>Yes, we also had a hard time! Once a bustling town, Burkhart now has only a small number of inhabitants.<page>But the situation in the old Frey has been reversed! oh! yes! The town calmed down, at least temporarily, and courier flights returned with fresh goods.<page>Whether you are a pilgrim or a traveler, my shop is the best one you could visit in our desolate land.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Bonjour, commerçant. Considérant les difficultés de la terre au-delà de ces cloches, votre magasin semble être en ordre.<page>Oui, nous avons aussi eu un moment difficile ! Autrefois une ville animée, Burkhart n'a aujourd ' hui qu ' un petit nombre d'habitants.<page>Mais la situation dans le vieux Frey est inversée ! Ooh ! Oui ! La ville se calma, au moins temporairement, et les vols de messagerie reviennent avec des marchandises fraîches.<page>Que vous soyez un pèlerin ou un voyageur, ma boutique est la meilleure que vous puissiez visiter dans notre terre désolée.

translated_text: In a private spa
secondary_translated_text: Dans un spa privé

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, shopkeeper. Your shelves are looking better stocked. I see the courier made their way back to you safely.<page>Oh yes, the cheeky little so-and-so came by and dropped his cargo off at last.<page>Poor dear was so shaken by his misadventures, I almost didn’t have the heart to dock his earnings.<page>All’s well now, though! Take a look at the lovely new goods I have available!
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。货架充实不少，看来送货虫平安归来了。<page>可不，那小滑头终于把货带到了。<page>可怜虫吓得够呛，我都不忍扣他工钱。<page>现在齐活啦！瞧瞧这些新宝贝！
translated_text: <hpage>Greetings to the Master again. Your shelves look good. The messenger has returned safely.<page>Oh, yes, a naughty little man came and dropped things off.<page>The poor baby was shocked by his misfortune, and I had no courage to subtract his income.<page>But now I'm fine! Check out the new products!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Salutations à nouveau au Maître. Vos étagères ont l'air bien. Le messager est revenu en toute sécurité.<page>Oh, oui, un petit homme méchant est venu et a laissé tomber les choses.<page>Le pauvre bébé était choqué par son malheur, et je n'avais pas le courage de soustraire son revenu.<page>Mais maintenant je suis bien ! Découvrez les nouveaux produits !

original_en_text: Ohhhh! She is here! The rare birthling! Precious child of Wyrm and Weaver!<page>Spawn of those who dared to flee. She has found her way home... at last.<page>How fine her shell, and Silk, and claw... For you, mother... let me claim her all for you!
original_zh_text: 哦哦哦！她来了！稀世子嗣！沃姆与织者的结晶！<page>逃亡者的后代，终于归乡……<page>多么完美的甲壳、灵丝与利爪……母亲啊……让我将她献予您！
translated_text: oh! he's here! An unusual birth! The children of Wim and Weaver!<page>The descendants of those who fled. She found her way home. Lastly,<page>Her shell and fingernails are somewhat thinner than yours, mother. let her take everything from her!
secondary_translated_text: Ooh ! Il est ici ! Une naissance inhabituelle ! Les enfants de Wim et Weaver !<page>Les descendants de ceux qui ont fui. Elle a trouvé son chemin à la maison. Enfin,<page>Sa coquille et ses ongles sont un peu plus minces que les vôtres, maman. Laissez-la prendre tout d'elle !

original_en_text: A fine purchase you’ve made! Allow us a moment and we’ll get it set up in your bellhome.
original_zh_text: 好买卖！稍等就给你装点进钟居。
translated_text: What a beautiful thing I bought! Please wait a minute. I'll put it in my luggage.
secondary_translated_text: Quelle belle chose que j'ai acheté ! Veuillez attendre une minute. Je vais le mettre dans mes bagages.

original_en_text: Ah! That relic you possess! A cylinder of the Citadel’s sacred vault! That there is a mighty find. You will give it, yes?<hpage>I will not, seeker. To extract what knowledge it holds, this cylinder requires a listening device, one you do not possess.<hpage>If it were passed, whatever secrets it contains would remain forever hidden from us both.<page>Pah... If it will not speak to me, I do not want it! Don’t trouble me until you have something worth my taking!
original_zh_text: 啊！你手里那东西！圣堡秘库的音筒！这可是大发现。交给我吧？<hpage>不行，要听取其中知识，需要特殊机械，而你没有。<hpage>现在交出来，是埋没了它。<page>嘁……哑巴筒子我也不稀罕！弄到真宝贝再来！
translated_text: ah! ah! The legacy you have! The sacred dome of the cylindrical castle! We made a big discovery. you're going to give it to me, right?<hpage>I don't, explorer. You need a listening device to extract the knowledge contained in the cylinder, but you don't have it.<hpage>If it passes, the secrets it contains will be hidden from us forever.<page>My father is... If it doesn't speak to me, I don't want it! Don't bother until you have something worth taking!
secondary_translated_text: Ah ! Ah ! L'héritage que vous avez ! Le dôme sacré du château cylindrique ! Nous avons fait une grosse découverte. Tu vas me le donner, non ?<hpage>Je ne le fais pas, explorateur. Vous avez besoin d'un appareil d'écoute pour extraire les connaissances contenues dans le cylindre, mais vous n'en avez pas.<hpage>Si elle passe, les secrets qu ' elle contient nous seront cachés pour toujours.<page>Mon père est... S'il ne me parle pas, je ne le veux pas ! Ne vous inquiétez pas jusqu'à ce que vous ayez quelque chose qui vaut la peine de prendre !

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings, all broken-broke? Would you try-try again, miss courier? Pharloom’s bugs are so much in need of your help!
original_zh_text: <page=T>货全毁、毁了？要再试一次吗？大伙可全指、指望您啦！
translated_text: <page=T>did the delivery go bankrupt? "Miss Messenger, please try again." Pharloom bugs need your help!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>La livraison a-t - elle fait faillite ?« Miss Messager, veuillez réessayer. Les bugs de Pharloom ont besoin de votre aide !

original_en_text: Bonva, traveller! You have the oil! Will you allow me to work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: 旅者！你真的带秘油来了！可以让我用在你的针刃上？
translated_text: Bonwa, traveller! There's oil! will you let your sword work a miracle?
secondary_translated_text: Bonjour, voyageur ! Il y a de l'huile ! Laissez-vous votre épée accomplir un miracle ?

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, weary pilgrim! Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<page>Now! I insist you enjoy our remaining hospitality, if only for a moment. We’ve wares to buy and services to enjoy!<page>Even in our reduced state, you’ll find ours as cosy a stop as can be offered in these ailing lands.
original_zh_text: 欢迎欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！钟心镇虽不复往昔，但仍是攀登圣堡前最后一处友善驿站。<page>我，帕沃，专为虔行旅者献上最热忱的欢迎——比如尊驾您！<page>希望您能好好感受圣途前最后的余温！这里有货可购，有乐可享！<page>即便衰微，钟心镇仍是这病土中最温馨的歇脚处！
translated_text: Welcome, weary pilgrim! The glorious Berhardt may have lived through its heyday, but it remains the last stop in front of the castle.<page>My job, beautiful Pavo, is to honor the kindness of those who have died like you! "<page>now! I insist that you enjoy the rest of us. There are things to buy, services to enjoy!<page>Even in our diminished state, we can provide a comfortable resting place in these sick areas.
secondary_translated_text: Bienvenue, pèlerin fatigué ! Le glorieux Berhardt a peut - être vécu à son apogée, mais il reste le dernier arrêt devant le château.<page>Mon travail, belle Pavo, c'est d'honorer la gentillesse de ceux qui sont morts comme vous ! "<page>Maintenant ! J'insiste sur le fait que vous appréciez le reste d'entre nous. Il y a des choses à acheter, des services à profiter !<page>Même dans notre état diminué, nous pouvons fournir un endroit de repos confortable dans ces zones malades.

original_en_text: My sickly friend! I can sense that you are ailing. Has the black curse struck even your sturdy shell?<hpage>This illness stems from a different source, Pavo. A parasite has taken root inside me, one I can not remove through strength alone.<hpage>Tell me, are there any you know who might help me? A healer, or a physician?<page>A physician? Well... we did once have one... A frightening fiend! Callous and crude in her practice. For the health of glorious Bellhart we voted, unanimously, to expel her!<page>I know not where she buzzed away to, but the world beyond the bells is full of danger. If you must seek her service, I expect she would not have travelled far...
original_zh_text: 哎朋友，你脸色不太好啊！帕沃一眼就瞧出来了。难道连你那坚硬的外壳，也被黑色的诅咒侵蚀了吗？<hpage>不，帕沃，这病根源另有其处，我体内寄生着异物，靠蛮力根本无法将它驱除。<hpage>你知道有谁能帮我摆脱异物吗？养疗师，医师都行？<page>有认识的医师吗？嗯……的确有过一个……不过是个恶魔！她行事冷酷，手段粗野。为了钟心镇的安宁，我们众口一辞，驱逐了她！<page>她嗡地飞走了，不知道去了哪儿。但钟声之外的世界，危机四伏。若你执意寻她的医术，我想她应该走得不远……
translated_text: A sick friend! I feel like I'm sick. did the black curse hit your shell?<hpage>This disease comes from a variety of sources. The parasites are rooted in me and I cannot eradicate them alone.<hpage>Tell me, do you know anyone who can help you? a therapist or a doctor?<page>doctor? okay, okay. Once upon a time, there was a terrible demon! Her behavior was cold and rude. For the health of the honourable Berhardt, we unanimously expel her.<page>I don't know where I've gone, but the world beyond the bell is full of danger. I don't think she'll go too far if you have to ask for her services
secondary_translated_text: Un ami malade. J'ai l'impression d'être malade. La malédiction noire a-t - elle frappé votre coquille ?<hpage>Cette maladie provient de sources variées. Les parasites sont enracinés en moi et je ne peux pas les éradiquer seul.<hpage>Dites-moi, connaissez-vous quelqu 'un qui peut vous aider ? Un thérapeute ou un médecin ?<page>Docteur ? Très bien, très bien. Il était une fois, un démon terrible ! Son comportement était froid et grossier. Pour la santé de l'honorable Berhardt, nous l'expulsions à l'unanimité.<page>Je ne sais pas où je suis allé, mais le monde au-delà de la cloche est plein de dangers. Je ne pense pas qu 'elle ira trop loin si vous devez demander ses services.

original_en_text: Welly, nay? Certainly you make the safer choice. Better to keep one’s shell intact.
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！保命要紧，理解理解。
translated_text: it's willy, right? Of course, you can make a safer choice. It is better to leave the shell as it is.
secondary_translated_text: C'est Willy, non ? Vous pouvez donc faire un choix plus sûr. Il est préférable de laisser la coquille telle qu ' elle est.

original_en_text: <page=T>Supplies for the rest-stop in the fields. We is used to like this delivering, when we was young and muchly brave.
original_zh_text: <page=T>远野驿站的补给，我们年轻时也经常送这里的货。
translated_text: <page=T>Field rest supplies. When we were young and brave, we were used to this method of delivery.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Approvisionnements de terrain. Quand nous étions jeunes et courageux, nous étions habitués à cette méthode de livraison.

original_en_text: This town feel safe, just, but I’m is worries for others. Is Pharloom needing its good-goods?<page>Many bugs helped by us couriers, me and brother Pill. Special now when danger grows big-big.
original_zh_text: 镇子暂时安全，但我担心别处，其他虫不需要货、货物吗？<page>我们送货虫兄弟俩，我和皮尔，可帮过不少虫。尤其现在世道这么凶、凶险。
translated_text: This town is safe, but I worry about other towns. Do you need a good product?<page>My courier brother and I helped many bugs. This is something special now, when the danger is growing.
secondary_translated_text: Cette ville est sûre, mais je m'inquiète pour les autres villes. Besoin d'un bon produit ?<page>Mon frère courrier et moi avons aidé beaucoup de bugs. C'est quelque chose de spécial maintenant, alors que le danger augmente.

original_en_text: I saw it! Took my wish off the board, you did! Heading out after my stray courier, then?<hpage>My own tasks see me travel far, shopkeeper. If, on my journey, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send them your way.<page>Then you’ll have my thanks and more! It’s a rare bug who’d brave the wilds to aid a fellow.
original_zh_text: 我看见了！你接了我的祈愿？要去找我那跑丢的送货虫？<hpage>我本就需要远行，店主。要是在路上遇见那迷途虫，我会让他来寻你。<page>那可多谢了！如今肯为同类闯进荒野的虫可太难找了！
translated_text: I saw it! You took my wish off the blackboard and you did it! are you going to look for the messenger of the wandering?<hpage>Boss, my own mission has taken me a long way. If I come across this missing error while traveling, I will definitely send it to you.<page>Thank you more. Bravely going into the wilderness to help someone else is a rare mistake.
secondary_translated_text: Je l'ai vu ! Vous avez retiré mon souhait du tableau noir et vous l'avez fait ! Est-ce que vous cherchez le messager de l'Errant ?<hpage>Ma propre mission m'a mené très loin. Si je rencontre cette erreur manquante en voyageant, je vous l'enverrai certainement.<page>Merci beaucoup plus. Aller courageusement dans la nature sauvage pour aider quelqu 'un d'autre est une erreur rare.
