original_en_text: For a spool bearing no Silk, it’s surprisingly heavy. Do you think perhaps it could be a gift left behind by the old creeping ones?
original_zh_text: 虽是空的灵丝轴，但却挺沉。莫非是古织者留下的？
translated_text: For a scroll without silk, its weight is staggering. Do you think this could be a gift from an old reptile?
secondary_translated_text: Pour un rouleau sans soie, son poids est stupéfiant. Pensez-vous que cela pourrait être un cadeau d'un vieux reptile ?

original_en_text: If you really must find that wretched physician, speak to the old hermit lurking beneath Bellhart. He knows much more than he admits of the world...
original_zh_text: 如果您执意要寻找那庸医，可以问问镇子下方的老隐士。他肚子里藏的秘密可不少……
translated_text: If you really want to find a poor doctor, look for the old man's hermit hiding under Berhardt. He knows the world more than he admits.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous voulez vraiment trouver un pauvre médecin, cherchez l'ermite du vieil homme qui se cache sous Berhardt. Il connaît le monde plus qu 'il ne l'admet.

original_en_text: Welly, done! What miracle to work again upon steel so fine. Few pins left in Pharloom could attain such a sheen!<page>You must tell me, traveller, wherever did you come upon so splendid a weapon?<hpage>The blade was a gift, given by a noble tribe of my homeland. They forged the strongest steel, though it was rarely seen beyond their hive.<hpage>That tribe has now long passed, and with them the secrets to their craft.<page>Ahhh. If they are gone, it’s a rarer piece than would be guessed! But what grand luck for this humble pinmaster to have worked with such a weapon!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！成啦！圣油配上如此精钢，真是奇迹。纺络还剩几根针能有此锋芒！<page>旅者，我得问问你，哪里得来如此神兵？<hpage>故土一贵族部落所赠，其族以锻钢之术闻名，但成品鲜少外流。<hpage>该族早已灭绝，其锻造秘技随之消逝。<page>唉呀！竟然还是件孤品！我这卑微针匠能照料此针，也是三生有幸！
translated_text: Willie, I did it! It is a miracle that such high quality steel can be used again. The few pins left in the fallout can achieve this brilliance!<page>Traveler, tell me, where did you find such a beautiful weapon?<hpage>This knife was a gift from the nobility of my country. They forged the strongest steel, but it was rarely seen outside the beehive.<hpage>The tribes have long since disappeared, and the secrets of their craft have disappeared.<page>Oh, and if it were to disappear, it would be a rarer piece than I thought! However, this humble blacksmith was really fortunate enough to use such a weapon.
secondary_translated_text: Willie, je l'ai fait ! C'est un miracle que l'acier de haute qualité puisse être utilisé à nouveau. Les quelques broches restantes dans la chute peuvent atteindre ce brillant !<page>Voyageur, dis-moi, où avez-vous trouvé une si belle arme ?<hpage>Ce couteau était un cadeau de la noblesse de mon pays. Ils ont forgé l'acier le plus fort, mais il était rarement vu en dehors de la ruche.<hpage>Les tribus ont disparu depuis longtemps, et les secrets de leur métier ont disparu.<page>Oh, et si elle devait disparaître, ce serait une pièce plus rare que je ne le pensais ! Cependant, cet humble forgeron a vraiment eu la chance d'utiliser une telle arme.

translated_text: Recorder
secondary_translated_text: Recorder

original_en_text: <page=T>Good-goods for the pilgrims up high! Thems brave ones, settled up on that big-big Citadel.<page=S>These deliverings they will muchly need, miss courier. Carry them safe-safe, for us!
original_zh_text: <page=T>给高处朝圣者的货！敢待在圣、圣堡，都是勇士。<page=S>都是要紧物资，救星小姐务必平、平安送到！
translated_text: <page=T>Up the good stuff for the pilgrims! They were a brave people and settled in a huge castle.<page=S>Shopkeeper, I need this. Ensure their safety!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Encore une bonne chose pour les pèlerins ! Ils étaient un peuple courageux et s'étaient installés dans un immense château.<page=S>Boutique, j'ai besoin de ça. Assurez-vous de leur sécurité !

original_en_text: Bzz-zzt! You hesitate! But your fear of my Extricator is born from mere ignorance, and you can overcome it with effort. Take a moment. Reconsider!
original_zh_text: 滋——滋！犹豫什么！怕剥离机是你无知！给你点时间，再想想！
translated_text: humming! You are hesitating! But your fear of my Deliverer arises from pure ignorance and can be overcome by effort. Take some time. think about it!
secondary_translated_text: Humming ! Vous hésitez ! Mais votre peur de mon Libérateur découle de la pure ignorance et peut être surmontée par l'effort. Prenez un peu de temps Réfléchissez-y !

original_en_text: The great Yarnaby can rid you of those nasty “roots”, but to crack your stiff shell my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 本神医能治你体内的“根须”。但要撬开壳，得先升级剥离机！
translated_text: The great Yannabi can get rid of your annoying "roots," but to crack your hard shell, you need to upgrade my powerful liberator!
secondary_translated_text: Le grand Yannabi peut se débarrasser de vos « racines » ennuyeuses, mais pour briser votre coquille dure, vous devez améliorer mon puissant libérateur !

original_en_text: Hello again! Fancy buying something special before your tasks whisk you away?
original_zh_text: 又来啦！出远门前不挑点特别的？
translated_text: We met again! Do you want to buy something special before you leave the mission?
secondary_translated_text: Nous nous sommes rencontrés à nouveau ! Vous souhaitez acheter quelque chose de spécial avant de quitter la mission ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Couriers, I require a rasher of meat, for an old bug in the Citadel. Can you prepare it for me?<page=T>A bug up-up? Theys knows our finest food? If theys appreciate, we can prepare it most prompt! Miss courier has only to ask.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我需要熏肉送给圣堡老虫，能帮忙准备吗？<page=T>上头有虫识货？随时都能准备！救星小姐知会一声就行。
translated_text: <hpage>Messengers, we need a mountain of meat to deal with the old bugs in the castle. can you get it ready for me?<page=T>Upgrade error? Do you know the best foods? If you like it, prepare it as soon as possible! The clerk just asks.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Messagers, nous avons besoin d'une montagne de viande pour faire face aux vieux bugs du château. Tu peux le préparer pour moi ?<page=T>Erreur de mise à jour ? Connaissez-vous les meilleurs aliments ? Si vous aimez, préparez-le le plus tôt possible ! Le greffier demande simplement.

original_en_text: A sturdy desk is the heart of any bellhome! Use it to take stock of your situation or organise your artefacts.
original_zh_text: 一张结实桌子可是钟居的核心！理货记账必备。
translated_text: A sturdy desk is in the heart of Bell's home! Use it to assess your situation or to organize items.
secondary_translated_text: Un bureau robuste est au cœur de la maison de Bell ! Utilisez-le pour évaluer votre situation ou organiser des éléments.

original_en_text: These roots that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something inside a body that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!
original_zh_text: 折磨你的“根须”……虽然不常见，但无所谓！<page>只要是壳里有脏东西，就用本神医的剥离机！这是你的唯一希望，滋滋！
translated_text: The roots will afflict you. I don't know the details, but it's okay!<page>If you have to get something out of your body, use the great Yarnaby's Extricator! That's the only hope, Shhhh!
secondary_translated_text: Les racines vous affligeront. Je ne connais pas les détails, mais ça va !<page>Si vous avez besoin de sortir quelque chose de votre corps, utilisez le grand extracteur de Yarnaby ! C'est le seul espoir, Shhhh !

original_en_text: You’d ask my aid, but won’t assist yourself? Then leave! Remain suffering, and stop being a bother to me, bzzt!
original_zh_text: 想求医却不帮忙？滚！继续遭罪去吧，别来烦我，滋滋！
translated_text: do you ask me to help you without helping yourself? and get out! Please continue to suffer and don't bother me.
secondary_translated_text: Vous me demandez de vous aider sans vous aider vous-même ? Et sortez ! Continuez à souffrir et ne me dérangez pas.

original_en_text: Fellow resident! The world quakes and crumbles, but while my shell stays safe, my shop stays open.
original_zh_text: 好邻居！世道混乱，但只要我这壳不碎，铺子照开！
translated_text: My fellow citizens! The world has shaken and collapsed, but my shell is still safe, but my shop is still open.
secondary_translated_text: Mes concitoyens ! Le monde a tremblé et s'est effondré, mais ma coquille est toujours en sécurité, mais mon magasin est toujours ouvert.

original_en_text: Welly, nay? You hold the precious oil for yourself? For what purpose do you deny a pinmaster their work? There is only I alive to work with such a wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！你怎么私藏圣油？不让针匠干活？整个纺络只剩我能用此圣物！
translated_text: it's willy, right? Do you keep your precious oil for yourself? Why did you refuse the job of music teacher? It is only by being alive that we can work with such wonderful materials.
secondary_translated_text: C'est Willy, non ? Gardez-vous votre huile précieuse pour vous-même ? Pourquoi avez-vous refusé le poste de professeur de musique ? C'est seulement en étant vivant que nous pouvons travailler avec des matériaux aussi merveilleux.

original_en_text: Find that wretched physician fast, dear resident! I know not where she buzzed away to, but the world beyond the bells is full of danger.<page>If you must seek her service, I expect she would not have travelled far...
original_zh_text: 老乡啊，要找她得赶快了！她嗡地飞走了，不知道去了哪儿。但钟声之外的世界，危机四伏。<page>若你执意寻她的医术，我想她应该走得不远……
translated_text: Dear inhabitants, please find the poor doctor! " I don't know where I've gone, but the world beyond the bell is full of danger.<page>I don't think she'll go too far if you have to ask for her services
secondary_translated_text: Chers habitants, veuillez trouver le pauvre docteur !« Je ne sais pas où je suis allé, mais le monde au-delà de la cloche est plein de dangers.<page>Je ne pense pas qu 'elle ira trop loin si vous devez demander ses services.

original_en_text: What? What now? What’s all that great racket, what is it?<hpage>Greetings, ma’am. It is only I. If you are disturbed by the rending of these lands, I fear some blame is mine to bear.<page>Blame, is it? Pah. Those who come after us can apportion blame as they see fit.<page>For now, my collection is the only thing that matters! I must protect it!
original_zh_text: 干嘛呢？这么闹腾？叮叮咣咣的搞什么？<hpage>女士，是我。抱歉打扰到了您。<page>跟我有什么好说抱歉的，你在外头做的事自有后虫评判。<page>眼下我的珍藏最要紧！得保护好了！
translated_text: what's that? what are we gonna do now? what's this loud noise? what is that?<hpage>Hello, Madam. I'm lonely. If you feel uneasy about the division of this land, then I too will be responsible for it. "<page>it's weird, isn't it? Wow. Those who follow us can share the responsibility when it seems appropriate.<page>For now, my collections are important! We have to protect!
secondary_translated_text: Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Que allons-nous faire maintenant ? Quel est ce bruit fort ? Qu 'est-ce que c'est ?<hpage>Bonjour Madame. Je suis solitaire. Si vous vous sentez mal à l'aise à propos de la division de cette terre, alors je serai aussi responsable de cela. »<page>C'est bizarre, n'est-ce pas ? Wow ! Ceux qui nous suivent peuvent partager la responsabilité quand cela semble approprié.<page>Pour l'instant, mes collections sont importantes ! Nous devons protéger !

original_en_text: <page=S>A delivery deadly, dangerous, fiercably cold, for old bug up there that does need it much-much! Serves us all he does, so we serve back.<page=T>And great test for you, miss courier! Most challenging-challenge this. The lacquer to bring is sloshy-slosh. A hard carry even for the best.<hpage>I have met this maker. His is a long service, worthy of respect. I will be glad to aid his efforts.
original_zh_text: <page=S>急单！但危险！把液状漆送给山上的老工匠。他造福大伙，我们得回报。<page=T>救星小姐，这可是巨、巨大挑战！液状漆晃荡难带，专业送货虫都犯、犯难。<hpage>我敬重这位匠师，乐意相助。
translated_text: <page=S>For a really needed old bug, it's deadly and dangerous, cold delivery! We will fight back, because everything he did was for us.<page=T>This is a great test for you, delivery man! This is the most difficult task. The paint you need is poor. Even the best ones are a difficult process.<hpage>I've seen this producer. His dedication is long and deserves respect. I am happy to help him in his efforts.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Pour un vieux bug vraiment nécessaire, c'est mortel et dangereux, la livraison froide ! Nous nous battrons, parce que tout ce qu ' il a fait était pour nous.<page=T>C'est un grand test pour vous, livreur ! C'est la tâche la plus difficile. La peinture dont vous avez besoin est mauvaise. Même les meilleurs sont un processus difficile.<hpage>J'ai vu ce producteur. Son dévouement est long et mérite du respect. Je suis heureux de l'aider dans ses efforts.

original_en_text: <page=S>Deliverings for the waystation in the fields at Pharloom’s edge, a small rest-stop, still serving.<page=S>This journey is maybe not so very hard for you, miss courier? We think you is perfect for this wish!
original_zh_text: <page=S>给远野驿站的货，那小站还在营业。<page=S>对您不算难吧？您是最合适的人选！
translated_text: <page=S>Please book a transit station in the field at the edge of Farham. This is a small rest area that is still in use.<page=S>Mr. Courier, was this trip hard? I think you're just right for that wish!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Veuillez réserver une station de transit dans le champ à la périphérie de Farham. Il s'agit d'une petite zone de repos qui est toujours utilisée.<page=S>Monsieur Courier, ce voyage a-t - il été difficile ? Je pense que vous avez raison pour ce souhait !

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, travellers all! Rest your weary shell and revive your flagging spirit!<page>Bellhart! Glorious, gleaming, and very very safe! Stay a while before you begin your final climb!
original_zh_text: 欢迎诸位旅者！请尽情舒展甲壳，养好精神！<page>这里是钟心镇！辉煌、璀璨，更重要的是十分安全！启程前不妨多留一会！
translated_text: Welcome, welcome, all passengers! Let your tired body rest and refresh your lethargic mind!<page>belheart! Bright, bright, and very safe! Stop before the last climb begins!
secondary_translated_text: Bienvenue, bienvenue tous les passagers ! Laissez votre corps fatigué se reposer et rafraîchir votre esprit léthargique !<page>Belheard ! Lumière, lumineuse et très sécuritaire ! Arrêtez-vous avant le début de la dernière escalade !

original_en_text: Go and rest! Bzzt! Free yourself of your trifling ailment and leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby has no time for petty maladies!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: 歇着去！滋滋！小病自己治，别烦我！本神医不接轻症！<hpage>好吧，女士。无意浪费您的时间。
translated_text: Take a break! humming! Let us be free from petty illnesses and rest in peace!Ōyagi doesn't have time to deal with a trivial illness!<hpage>Yes, I don't want to waste your time.
secondary_translated_text: Prenez une pause ! Humming ! Soyons libres des maladies mineures et reposons en paix !Ōyagi n'a pas le temps de faire face à une maladie triviale !<hpage>Oui, je ne veux pas perdre votre temps.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then, and it seems your store is still well-stocked.<page>Oh yes, even my supplier is back to work, so I have plenty of goods to show you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。看来你已从丝咒中恢复。<page>啊哈！我机灵着呢。那怪丝掉下来的时候，我立马缩进钟居紧闭门户。<page>其他虫或许遭了殃，但我存货充足，饿不着。<hpage>未雨绸缪是好事。而且……你这铺子货还挺全。<page>可不！连送货虫都平安回来了，新到的好货随你挑！
translated_text: <hpage>Hello, shopkeeper. You seem to be recovering pretty much from the pain of silk.<page>ah! ah! I am a clever insect. When a strange thread fell from above, I closed my mouth and crouched in the clock room.<page>It may be a problem for others, but my store has plenty of stock, so I don't have to worry about starving.<hpage>Your preparation is very helpful and it seems that your store still has enough stock.<page>Oh, yes, my supplier is back too, so I'll show you lots of products!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Bonjour, commerçant. Vous semblez vous remettre de la douleur de la soie.<page>Ah ! Ah ! Je suis un insecte très intelligent. Quand un étrange fil tomba d'en haut, je fermai la bouche et je m'accroupis dans la salle des horloges.<page>Cela peut être un problème pour les autres, mais mon magasin a beaucoup de stock, donc je n'ai pas à m'inquiéter de mourir de faim.<hpage>Votre préparation est très utile et il semble que votre magasin a encore suffisamment de stock.<page>Oh oui, mon fournisseur est de retour aussi, alors je vais vous montrer beaucoup de produits !

original_en_text: Welly now! You have the oil, traveller! Allow me to bring about a shine bright as none before!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！你拿到油了，旅者！该让这柄针刃成为绝顶神兵了！
translated_text: Willie, now! You've got the oil, traveler! We will bring you unprecedented light!
secondary_translated_text: Willie maintenant ! Vous avez l'huile, voyageur ! Nous vous apporterons une lumière sans précédent !

translated_text: Donation of cultural property?
secondary_translated_text: Don de biens culturels ?

original_en_text: But, hold! There is something more about you... I’ve sliced the shells of countless filthy pilgrims! All those plain, greying innards! Yours are something else entirely!<page>It tickles at my mind, still! Bzzt! What is it of your shell that eludes even my perfect, precise perception?<page>Would you show me, specimen? Go on! Let the great Yarnaby peer at your deeper, darker secrets!<hpage>I’ve no desire to see my shell pried into further, healer. Your service has succeeded, and taken its toll in pain. I hope only that I never again need to seek your aid.
original_zh_text: 慢着！你壳里还有料……本神医剖过无数病壳！全是灰扑扑的！你的截然不同！<page>滋滋！到底是什么连本神医都看不透？<page>让我瞧瞧，病患！快！让本神医看看你藏着什么黑暗秘密！<hpage>我不想再被剖壳，医师。治疗虽然成功，但代价着实巨大。希望我们永远不用再见。
translated_text: But, hold on! There is more. I have cut the shells of countless filthy pilgrims! Ordinary gray viscera! Yours is something entirely different!<page>That still bothers me! humming! Is there anything in your shell that you cannot perceive perfectly accurately?<page>can you show me a sample? Go ahead! Let the great Yanabi get a glimpse of your deeper and darker secrets!<hpage>I don't want to see the shell open any more, therapist. Your service has been successful and paid a painful price. I hope I never have to ask for your help again.
secondary_translated_text: Mais attends ! Il y en a plus. J'ai coupé les coquilles d'innombrables pèlerins sales ! Les viscères grises ordinaires ! Le vôtre est quelque chose de complètement différent !<page>Cela me dérange toujours ! Humming ! Y a-t - il quelque chose dans votre coquille que vous ne pouvez pas percevoir parfaitement avec précision ?<page>Pouvez-vous me montrer un échantillon ? Allez-y ! Laissez le grand Yanabi avoir un aperçu de vos secrets les plus profonds et les plus sombres !<hpage>Je ne veux plus voir la coquille ouverte, thérapeute. Votre service a été réussi et a payé un prix douloureux. J'espère que je n'aurai plus jamais à demander de votre aide.

original_en_text: If ever upon your long road more oil is acquired, seek my service with haste! Who knows what form we could find deeper within your blade’s sharpened steel!
original_zh_text: 要是再得到秘油，就来找我！谁知这针还能磨砺出何等锋芒！
translated_text: If you get more oil in the long way, please seek my service as soon as possible! You don't know what shape you'll find in the back of your sharp blade!
secondary_translated_text: Si vous obtenez plus d'huile sur le long chemin, s'il vous plaît demander mon service le plus tôt possible ! Vous ne savez pas quelle forme vous trouverez à l'arrière de votre lame tranchante !

original_en_text: Gahh! Who keeps making all that racket out there?! Such horrid shaking and screaming. The crucial work is being spoiled! Bzzzt!
original_zh_text: 哼！外面谁在吵吵？！震动和尖叫没完没了的！我的研究正值关键时刻呢！滋滋！
translated_text: ah! ah! who's making a fuss outside? Such terrible vibrations and screams. An important job has been destroyed! humming!
secondary_translated_text: Ah ! Ah ! Qui fait du fuss dehors ? Telles vibrations et ces cris terribles. Un travail important a été détruit ! Humming !

original_en_text: The operation... a success! The simpletons hiding in that blasted bellvein would shudder into dust if they saw how much I achieve without them!<hpage>Madam... I shan’t lie, that was an ordeal such as I have rarely suffered...<hpage>And yet, the parasite does seem to have been... unbound somewhat. Whatever remnant still lingers in my shell feels calmed, enough for me to claim its power as my own.<hpage>Perhaps this is a fortunate result after all.<page>Of course. Of course! Great Yarnaby has healed you! Shout it through the caverns. Scream it from the great spinning towers!<page>Just make sure they hear you in the so-called ‘civilised’ settlements of this ignorant land!
original_zh_text: 手术……成功！钟脉那帮庸才见这场面得吓成渣！<hpage>女士……不瞒您说，这真是毕生难忘的体验……<hpage>但寄生物似乎……松开了。残存部分很平静，反而能为我所用。<hpage>或许能算因祸得福了。<page>当然！本神医治好了你！快去各大洞穴传颂，去纺塔顶上喊出来！<page>让那些自诩“文明”的无知村镇都听听！
translated_text: The surgery was successful! If the fools hiding in the veins of the clock saw what I had accomplished without them, they would tremble and turn to dust!<hpage>Madam... I will not lie This is a suffering I rarely experience.<hpage>There seems to be a parasite. Some of them are unlimited. Whatever remained in the shell, I felt calm enough to claim that power was my own.<hpage>In the end, it may be a lucky outcome.<page>of course! of course! The Yannabi will heal you! Screaming in the cave. Screams from the Great Revolving Tower!<page>Listen to your voice in the so-called "civilized" settlements of this ignorant land!
secondary_translated_text: La chirurgie a été un succès ! Si les imbéciles qui se cachent dans les veines de l'horloge voyaient ce que j'avais accompli sans eux, ils trembleraient et se transformeraient en poussière !<hpage>Madame ... Je ne vais pas mentir, c'est une souffrance que je ressens rarement.<hpage>Il semble y avoir un parasite. Certains d'entre eux sont illimités. Quoi qu ' il resterait dans la coquille, je me sentais assez calme pour affirmer que le pouvoir était le mien.<hpage>En fin de compte, cela peut être un résultat chanceux.<page>Bien sûr ! Bien sûr ! Le Yannabi vous guérira ! Criez dans la cave. Des cris de la grande tour tournante !<page>Écoutez votre voix dans les colonies dites « civilisées » de cette terre ignorante !

original_en_text: A mighty collection of the past, is it not? If only I could hoard all of history here with me!
original_zh_text: 这等珍藏，够气派吧？我恨不得把全纺络的历史都囤在这儿！
translated_text: This is a collection from the past, isn't it? If I could hide my history here!
secondary_translated_text: C'est une collection du passé, non ? Si seulement je pouvais cacher mon histoire ici !

original_en_text: Fellow resident, welcome home! The world may quake and crumble, and threaten its end, but while my shell stays safe my shop stays open.
original_zh_text: 欢迎回来，好邻居！世道混乱，但只要我这壳不碎，铺子照开！
translated_text: Residents, welcome home! The world may cause earthquakes and collapse, and threaten its end, but as long as my shell is safe, my shop will remain open.
secondary_translated_text: Résidents, bienvenue à la maison ! Le monde peut provoquer des tremblements de terre et des effondrements, et menacer sa fin, mais tant que ma coquille est en sécurité, mon magasin restera ouvert.

original_en_text: Yes... yes! Bzzt! Finally, a specimen worthy of my mighty Extricator! My beautiful, unfairly-maligned Extricator! Come this way, bzzt...
original_zh_text: 对……对！滋滋！终于有配得上我伟大的剥离机的病例！来这边，滋滋……
translated_text: That's right, sir. yes! yes! humming! Finally, a worthy specimen for my mighty liberator! My beautiful, unjustly vilified extractor! And here is the sound of the bumbling...
secondary_translated_text: C'est juste, monsieur. Oui ! Oui ! Humming ! Enfin, un spécimen digne pour mon puissant libérateur ! Mon magnifique extracteur injustement vilipendé ! Et voici le son de l'enveloppe...

original_en_text: By claw! Who is this bold warrior, standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>Merely a traveller, sir, though one whose blade could benefit from your service.<page>Your blade! Of course, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>If your weapon sharpened would see our lands that much safer, then honour decrees it receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?<hpage>
original_zh_text: 利爪啊！这位踏进普林尼的华美钟居还面不改色的勇士是谁！<hpage>过路客而已，不过针刃需要照料。<page>您的针刃！好说好说！是个针匠都看得出这针尖沾过多少条命。<page>如果磨利此针能保护镇子，自然应该优先照料！这就开始？
translated_text: Use your nails! Who is the brave soldier standing quietly at the entrance of the bell tower of Pliny?<hpage>I'm just a traveler, but his sword may profit from your service. "<page>He has a knife! The Warriors, of course! Any good needleworker can find a deadly mark on the tip of a needle.<page>If the sharpness of your weapons makes our land safer, then my honour is destined to be defended! " Let's take a look at it.<hpage>
secondary_translated_text: Utilisez les ongles ! Qui est le brave soldat qui se tient tranquillement à l'entrée du clocher de Pline ?<hpage>Je ne suis qu 'un voyageur, mais son épée peut profiter de votre service. "<page>Il a un couteau ! Les guerriers, bien sûr ! Tout bon aiguilleur peut trouver une marque mortelle sur la pointe d'une aiguille.<page>Si la tranchantesse de vos armes rend notre terre plus sûre, alors mon honneur est destiné à être défendu !« Jetons un coup d'œil à cela.<hpage>

original_en_text: Come back with those spines, or not at all! The great Yarnaby’s time is precious, bzzt! I will not be distracted from my work!
original_zh_text: 带棘刺来再敲门！本神医时间金贵，滋滋！没空分心！
translated_text: Get that thorn back, or there's nothing! Yannabi's time is precious! I am not distracted from work!
secondary_translated_text: Retournez cette épine, ou il n'y a rien ! Le temps de Yannabi est précieux. Je ne suis pas distrait du travail !

original_en_text: Ahh... how welly romantic t’would’ve been, had the lost pilgrims struck me down beside her grave, to lie together forever as the world crumbles all ‘round...<page>But fortune has claimed otherwise! And perhaps ‘tis best for this humble pinmaster to continue his trade a little longer. These uncertain times will bring much new work, I should think!
original_zh_text: 啊……要是迷途朝圣者把我和她一块埋了，在崩塌世界里相拥长眠……该多浪漫……<page>但看来我命不该绝！或许纺络就是要我这卑微针匠多干几年。在这乱世，新活计可多着呢！
translated_text: ah... How romantic it would be if this lost pilgrim pushed me by her grave and we were to lie together forever when the world collapsed.<page>But there is another explanation for fate! Perhaps, this humble musician would have better kept on working for a while longer. This era of uncertainty will bring many new job opportunities!
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. Comme ce serait romantique si ce pèlerin perdu me poussait à sa tombe et que nous allions coucher ensemble pour toujours quand le monde s'effondrerait.<page>Mais il y a une autre explication du destin ! Peut - être, ce musicien humble aurait mieux continué à travailler un peu plus longtemps. Cette ère d'incertitude apportera de nombreuses nouvelles opportunités d'emploi !

original_en_text: What’s this... twitching inside of you? A slave within a slave! Given over your shell to grow something greater?<hpage>A parasite has made its home within me. It saps my energy, and I can not purge it with strength alone...<page>Grnk. Lie down and die then, for all I care. Allow that wriggling thing its chance at life.<page>Or else... hff. Go seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 你壳里……有东西在扭？奴隶套奴隶！养着个更大的玩意？<hpage>寄生体在我壳里扎了根，单凭气力无法驱散它……<page>哼。那就躺平等死，让那玩意替你活。<page>或者……嗤。去找被镇子放逐的雅纳碧，听说她被赶到灰沼了。
translated_text: what is this? are you convulsing in there? A slave in a slave! throwing away the shell to grow something bigger?<hpage>The parasite has taken root in me. It drains my energy and I can't clear it with force alone.<page>Granger. I don't mind lying down and dying, give that stuff a chance to live.<page>Or maybe you... They are looking for those who have been exiled by Berhardt and Unabi. As far as I know, she was banished from the wilderness.
secondary_translated_text: Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Vous convulsez là - dedans ? Un esclave dans un esclave. Jeter la coquille pour faire pousser quelque chose de plus gros ?<hpage>Le parasite a pris racine en moi, il draine mon énergie et je ne peux pas l'éliminer par la force seule.<page>Granger ! Je n'ai pas peur de me coucher et de mourir, donnez à cette chose une chance de vivre.<page>Ou peut - être que vous... Ils cherchent ceux qui ont été exilés par Berhardt et Unabi. Pour autant que je sache, elle a été banie du désert.

original_en_text: More, then! Bring me more relics of the past! Records, seals, idols! Let’s gather up the history of the world and hoard it all here, nice and safe!<hpage>If I happen upon more curiosities of this kingdom’s past, I may visit again. Until that time, keep yourself safe.
original_zh_text: 继续！多找点老物件！典籍、印玺、神像！把全纺络的过往都放在这儿才安稳！<hpage>若找到这王国的遗物，我会再来。在此之前，请多保重。
translated_text: And more! " Give me more of the past! Record, seal, idol! Collect the history of the world and keep it all safe here!<hpage>If I were more interested in the past of this kingdom, I might visit again. Until then, make sure you are safe.
secondary_translated_text: Et plus !« Donnez-moi plus du passé ! Record, Seal, Idol ! Collectez l'histoire du monde et gardez-la en sécurité ici !<hpage>Si j'étais plus intéressé par le passé de ce royaume, je pourrais revenir. D'ici là, assurez-vous que vous êtes en sécurité.

original_en_text: <page=T>More for you, miss courier! Lacquer, filled fresh, for the maker on the mount. We have much, so don’t worry for our supply. <page=S>To climb the frozen peak, it is a journey most difficult! Our thanks go full with you that tries again!
original_zh_text: <page=T>拿好，救星小姐！满满漆水送给山上匠师。货物管够！尽管送！<page=S>攀爬冰峰危险得很！多谢您原意冒险！
translated_text: <page=T>More, delivery women! The newly filled paint is ready for the manufacturer of the mountain. There are plenty of them, so don't worry about the supply.<page=S>Climbing a frozen mountain is the hardest journey ever! Thank you for taking the challenge again!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Plus de livraison, femmes ! La peinture nouvellement remplie est prête pour le fabricant de la montagne. Il y en a beaucoup, alors ne vous inquiétez pas pour l'offre.<page=S>L'escalade d'une montagne gelée est le voyage le plus difficile jamais ! Merci d'avoir relevé le défi à nouveau !

original_en_text: <page=T>More meats for you, miss courier! Best you be delivering it swiftly quick! If left not stored, our rasher’s flavour fast turns foul.
original_zh_text: <page=T>熏肉准备好啦！救星小姐快快出发！放久了会变味！
translated_text: <page=T>Eat more meat, please! Let's get it delivered as soon as possible! If you don't store it, the tear-drink will quickly taste worse.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Mangez plus de viande, s'il vous plaît ! Laissez-le livrer le plus tôt possible ! Si vous ne le stockez pas, la boisson lacrymogène aura rapidement un mauvais goût.

original_en_text: Shoo I say! Unless you’ve brought a worthy specimen, with something truly nasty inside them, bzzt! Otherwise, leave the great Yarnaby in peace!
original_zh_text: 说了走开！除非带够劲的病患来，壳里长真家伙的！不然别烦本神医！
translated_text: I will lie! " Unless you bring a precious specimen that has something really annoying, wow! If not, then let the great Anabe rest.
secondary_translated_text: Je vais mentir !« Sauf si vous apportez un spécimen précieux qui a quelque chose de vraiment ennuyeux, wow ! Sinon, laissez reposer le grand Anabe.

original_en_text: Miss saving! Thanks again for you and your big-big blade! I’m is made it back, and grumpy grub-grub got her goods. She seemed happy, even!<page>I’m won’t be travelling out for a while-while methinks. Too many beasties! All about theys are. Even those pilgrims! All now going angry, a bit like old grub-grub.<hpage>This town remains safe for the moment, Tipp. You’re a smart bug to stay within its walls.
original_zh_text: 救星小姐！多亏了您，还有那柄长、长刀！我安全回来了，暴躁虫、虫婆婆也收到货啦！她可高兴呢！<page>我暂、暂时不出远门啦。外面全是发狂的野兽！连朝圣者都变凶了，跟虫婆婆一个德行。<hpage>眼下镇上还算安全，待在这里是明智选择。
translated_text: I miss the savings! Thanks again for you and your knife! When I came back, the grumpy Grub Grub was taking hers. She seemed happy too!<page>I don't think I'll be traveling for a while. Lots of Beasts! It is all of them. Even the Pilgrims! Everybody is angry, and it seems like an old thing.<hpage>Tip: This town is still safe You are a clever worm and you can stay on its walls.
secondary_translated_text: Les économies me manquent ! Merci encore pour vous et votre couteau ! Quand je suis revenu, le grincheux Grub Grub prenait le sien. Elle semblait heureuse aussi !<page>Je ne pense pas que je vais voyager pendant un moment. Beaucoup de besties ! C'est tous d'eux. Même les pèlerins. Tout le monde est en colère, et cela semble être une vieille chose.<hpage>Astuce : Cette ville est toujours sûre Vous êtes un ver intelligent et vous pouvez rester sur ses murs.

original_en_text: You’ve a good, solid bell up there, though its surface is showing its age. Why not have us paint it fresh? A protective coat and a little flair!
original_zh_text: 你的钟屋结实但显旧。刷层护漆加点花纹如何？
translated_text: There was a fine, sturdy watch, but the surface showed its age. Why not make it fresh? A coat and a little talent!
secondary_translated_text: Il y avait une montre fine et robuste, mais la surface montre son âge. Pourquoi ne pas le rendre frais ? Un manteau et un peu de talent !

original_en_text: <hpage>You seem hard at work, good bug. Are you a hunter, of a sort?<page>Of a simple sort, aye. I’m a pondcatcher around these parts. The last remaining, in fact! <page>Us few Bellharters are badly needing for fresh food, so my lone shell’s carrying quite the responsibility.<page>At least Shellwood Pond’s still full of good meat, ‘specially if your aim with a longpin’s as good as mine.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你似乎很忙，也是个猎手？<page>勉强算吧，我是个渔夫。全镇最后一个渔夫！<page>钟心镇的虫个个饥肠辘辘，担子全压我的壳上。<page>好在甲木林池塘鱼肥，像我这样擅使长针的总能带点收获回来。
translated_text: <hpage>You seem to be working hard, good bug. are you some kind of hunter?<page>It's very easy, yes. I am a pond catcher in these areas. Actually, the last one!<page>My lonely body bore a considerable responsibility, as our few Berhardtans were in desperate need of fresh food.<page>At least there's plenty of good meat in the Sherwood pond. Especially if your long needle is as accurate as mine.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Vous avez l'air de travailler dur, bon bug. Es-tu une sorte de chasseur ?<page>C'est très facile, oui. Je suis un chasseur d'eau dans ces domaines. En fait, la dernière !<page>Mon corps solitaire portait une responsabilité considérable, car nos rares Berhardtans avaient désespérément besoin de nourriture fraîche.<page>Au moins, il y a beaucoup de bonne viande dans l'étang de Sherwood. Surtout si votre long aiguille est aussi précise que la mienne.

original_en_text: My part’s been given, slave. We’ve no more need to speak.<page>Go and spin your spider’s web. Allow our kingdom’s restless soul its chance to blaze.
original_zh_text: 东西给了，奴隶。不跟你废话了。<page>去织你的网吧。让这王国里躁动的灵魂烧个痛快。
translated_text: My work is done, slave. I don't need to talk anymore.<page>Weaving a spider's web. Give the troubled souls of our kingdom a chance to burn.
secondary_translated_text: Mon travail est terminé, esclave. Je n'ai plus besoin de parler.<page>Tisser la toile d'araignée. Donnez aux âmes troublées de notre royaume une chance de brûler.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more oil, pinmaster. Its acquisition was no small task, but if it aids my blade, those challenges will be well rewarded.<page>Even more oil? What preposterous luck! That unseen gift, in quantity unheard, discovered by a single bug!<page>Would you pass the oil, traveller, and perhaps a few rosaries for the ongoing effort? Allow this pinmaster to again work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我又得到秘油了，针匠。取之不易，但为了磨砺针刃，冒点风险也是值当。<page>还有秘油？您这运气！这老些圣物竟都被同一只虫找到了。<page>那就把油给我吧，再赏几颗念珠当辛苦费如何？让我再施展一次针匠的绝活！
translated_text: <hpage>There's more oil, Pinmaster, it was a hard job getting it, but if it helped my blade, the challenge went well.<page>More oil? What a ridiculous luck! The number of invisible gifts was unheard of, but a mistake was found!<page>passenger, can you pass me the oil? Is there a rosary that can help you keep on striving? Would you like this musician to do a miracle on your blade again?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Il y a plus d'huile, Pinmaster, c'était un travail difficile de l'obtenir, mais si cela a aidé ma lame, le défi s'est bien passé.<page>Plus d'huile ? Quelle chance ridicule ! Le nombre de dons invisibles était inédit, mais une erreur a été trouvée !<page>Passager, pouvez-vous me passer l'huile ? Y a-t - il un chapelet qui peut vous aider à continuer à lutter ? Aimeriez-vous que ce musicien fasse à nouveau un miracle sur votre lame ?

original_en_text: An exquisite item, containing a cherished memory. I have an excellent memory myself, but I’m sure you can make good use of it.
original_zh_text: 用来记录珍贵记忆的雅物。我记性好用不着，不过你应该用得上。
translated_text: A beautiful work filled with precious memories. My own memory is good, but I think you can make the most of it.
secondary_translated_text: Un bel travail rempli de précieux souvenirs. Ma mémoire est bonne, mais je pense que vous pouvez en tirer le meilleur parti.

original_en_text: Don’t act the fool, specimen! Bzzt! Share more of yourself, that I may gain greater understanding! Learning! What other hope is there to save our blighted, thankless world?! <hpage>I have declined, bug. Whatever you seek, you shall not find it either upon or within my shell.
original_zh_text: 别装傻，病患！滋滋！奉献自己，帮助本神医领悟！不然怎么拯救这不知感恩的世界！<hpage>我拒绝，你所求之物不在我身上。
translated_text: Don't pretend, specimen! humming! Let's share more of ourselves and learn more! Let's Learn! What is the hope of saving our devastated, thankless world?<hpage>The insect refused. What you are looking for is not to be found in my shell, nor in the shell.
secondary_translated_text: Ne fais pas semblant, spécimen ! Humming ! Partageons plus de nous-mêmes et en apprenons plus ! Apprenons-nous ! Quel est l'espoir de sauver notre monde dévasté et ingrat ?<hpage>L'insecte a refusé. Ce que vous cherchez ne se trouve pas dans ma coquille, ni dans la coquille.

original_en_text: <page>Miss traveller! Thanks to your valiant contributions, our little town’s starting to feel like its old self again. Homes have been hoisted, and the square shines!<hpage>I have seen the changes myself, Pavo. It is pleasing to hear my contributions have not been in vain. <page>Indeed! Your generosity is a guide for others! We’ve only one thing now sorely missing...<page>Bugs! What is a town without its residents? Age, scarcity, deadly thread... Bellhart is beset by endless ills. Now there’s just us remaining few as you’ve met.<page>In recognition of your noble efforts, and as one small step to solving the problem, I have decreed a grand gift should be given! A bellhome of your very own!<page>A place to reflect. A bed to lay in. It’s hanging up there at the top, beside our good pinmaster. <hpage>I have no plans to settle, Pavo, but for now my task in Pharloom remains, and while it does, a residence may prove useful.<page>Of course! Of course! Your fortitude inspires us all! And if trouble ever descends anew, it surely won’t hurt to have a resident warrior close at claw!
original_zh_text: <page>旅者小姐！感谢您的无私奉献，钟心镇逐渐重现旧貌！屋舍纷纷重立，广场熠熠生辉！<hpage>镇上变化我也看在眼里，得知奉献没有付诸东流，很是欣慰。<page>正是！您的慷慨堪称楷模！现在只剩……<page>居民！没有居民哪有镇子？衰老、贫瘠、邪丝……钟心镇灾厄不绝。如今只剩您见过的寥寥数虫。<page>因此，为感谢您的无私援助，我们决定赠予您一份礼物——专属钟居！<page>钟居既是静思之所，也是安眠之榻。您的钟居位置高悬上方，与针匠大师为邻。<hpage>我无意久留，但现在既在此处，有居所也是方便。<page>好说好说！您的坚毅激励镇上众虫！况且万一有新的灾祸，身旁有勇士相助总是好的！
translated_text: <page>Miss Traveler! Thanks to your courageous service, our town is beginning to feel like it used to be. The house was demolished and the square was glowing!<hpage>I've seen this change. I am glad to hear that my contribution has not been in vain.<page>It really is! Your generosity is a guide for others! There is only one thing we need now.<page>worms! what is a town without residents? Age, scarcity, deadly clues - Berhardt is plagued by endless evils. As you can see, there are only a few of us now.<page>In honor of your noble efforts and as a small step towards solving the problem, I have ordered a gift! Have your own clock tower!<page>It is a place of reflection. A bed to lie down. It's hanging next to our great router manufacturer.<hpage>Pavo, I have no plans to settle down, but my current assignment at the farm remains, but the accommodation might be useful.<page>of course! of course! Your persistence inspires us all! If trouble occurs again, the garrison will not damage the enemy even if it approaches the nail.
secondary_translated_text: <page>Miss Voyageur ! Grâce à votre service courageux, notre ville commence à se sentir comme elle l'était autrefois. La maison a été démolie et la place s'est étincelée !<hpage>J'ai vu ce changement. Je suis heureux d'apprendre que ma contribution n'a pas été en vain.<page>C'est vraiment ! Votre générosité est un guide pour les autres ! Il n'y a qu ' une chose dont nous avons besoin maintenant.<page>Worms ! Qu ' est-ce qu ' une ville sans habitants ?Âge, rareté, indices mortels - Berhardt est en proie à des maux sans fin. Comme vous pouvez le constater, il n'y en a que quelques-uns aujourd 'hui.<page>En l'honneur de vos nobles efforts et en tant que petit pas vers la résolution du problème, j'ai commandé un cadeau ! Ayez votre propre tour d'horloge !<page>C'est un lieu de réflexion. Un lit pour s'allonger. Il est accroché à côté de notre grand fabricant de routeurs.<hpage>Pavo, je n'ai pas l'intention de m'installer, mais ma mission actuelle à la ferme reste, mais l'hébergement pourrait être utile.<page>Bien sûr ! Bien sûr ! Votre persévérance nous inspire tous ! Si les problèmes se reproduisent, la garnison ne nuira pas à l'ennemi même s'il s'approche du clou.

original_en_text: If you refuse to share your secrets, then distract me no more, specimen! Bzzt!<page>There is still much work ahead for the great Yarnaby! Much thought, much learning!<page>Though the ungrateful world shuns me, still, by my own claws shall it be saved!
original_zh_text: 不分享秘密就别烦我了，病患！滋滋！<page>本神医还有伟大事业！要继续想、继续学！<page>就算这不知感恩的世道唾弃我，我也要亲手拯救！
translated_text: If you refuse to share your secret, don't distract me, specimen! humming!<page>Yarnaby has a lot to do! Think more, learn more!<page>Even if the ungrateful world avoids me, I will still save it with my own claws!
secondary_translated_text: Si vous refusez de partager votre secret, ne me distraisez pas, spécimen ! Humming !<page>Yarnaby a beaucoup de choses à faire ! Réfléchissez plus, apprenez plus !<page>Même si le monde ingrat m'éviterait, je le sauverai de mes propres griffes !

original_en_text: Welly’o! What a fearful fright you’ve saved poor Plinney from! Such a delight, at longest last, to see that fine needle dance and sing!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！您可真是救了可怜的普林尼一命！终于又能瞧见亮闪闪的针刃起舞啦！
translated_text: okay! okay! It's a terrible thing to save poor Pliny! Finally, I'm glad to see this little needle dance and sing!
secondary_translated_text: OK ! OK ! C'est une chose terrible de sauver le pauvre Plyne ! Je suis content de voir cette petite aiguille danser et chanter !

original_en_text: <hpage>Again, pinmaster, I must ask your skilled service. I bring another gland of oil.<page>Oil, so much! This bug is past surprise! It is time methinks, to see your blade’s work finished! To bring about a shine bright as none before!<page>Welly now! Why wait? Would you have me begin, traveller?
original_zh_text: <hpage>要再劳烦针匠了，新得一些秘油。<page>这么多圣油！我都不觉得惊讶了！不过是时候了，该让这柄针刃成为绝顶神兵了！<page>哎呀呀！还等什么！快开始吧？
translated_text: <hpage>Pinsmaster, I once again request your skilled services. I brought another gland.<page>Oil, so much. This mistake is awesome! Now is the time to look at your blade! Unprecedented light!<page>Willie, now! Why do you wait? Let's get started, fellow traveler.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pinsmaster, je vous demande une fois de plus vos services. J'ai apporté une autre glande.<page>Le pétrole, beaucoup. Cette erreur est génial ! Il est temps de regarder votre blade ! Une lumière sans précédent !<page>Willie maintenant ! Pourquoi attendez-vous ? Commençons donc, camarade voyageur.

original_en_text: <hpage>These are deadly roads to wander, pinmaster, especially with the black soaked threads tearing the lands apart.<hpage>Your greatest chance for safety lies in Bellhart, with your fellows. You can protect one another, and perhaps in time rebuild.<page>Oh yes, of course! T’was not Plinney’s wish to abandon his dear bellfriends, but with the world now ending, I had to come and say one last farewell to my sweet Melatolla.<page>I should be returning though, quite rightly. Our town will be needing a pinmaster’s fine work now more than ever!
original_zh_text: <hpage>如今世道凶险，针匠，尤其黑灾使各处分崩离析。<hpage>最安生的去处还是钟心镇，和同胞互相照应，或许还能重建家园。<page>是啊是啊！普林尼本不想抛下镇子里的老友，但想到要完蛋了，总得和亲爱的梅拉托拉道个别。<page>不过该回去啦！镇上如今可比任何时候都缺针匠手艺！
translated_text: <hpage>Pismast, these are the paths of deadly wanderings, and especially the paths stained with the black thread that tears the land.<hpage>The greatest chance of your safety lies with Berhart and your companions. We can protect each other and rebuild within time.<page>Oh, of course! Pliny did not want to leave his dear friend the waiter, but the world was nearing its end, and I had to bid my dear Meratra one last farewell.<page>I've come back, that's right. Our town needs a great performance from the Lutheran players more than ever!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pismaste, ce sont les chemins des errances mortelles, et surtout les chemins tachés du fil noir qui déchire la terre.<hpage>La meilleure chance de votre sécurité réside avec Berhart et vos compagnons. Nous pouvons nous protéger les uns les autres et nous reconstruire dans le temps.<page>Oh bien sûr ! Pline ne voulait pas quitter son cher ami le serveur, mais le monde approchait de sa fin, et je devais dire un dernier adieu à ma chère Meratra.<page>Je suis de retour, c'est vrai. Plus que jamais, notre ville a besoin d'une grande performance des joueurs luthériens !

original_en_text: Yes... yes. This is a mighty collection indeed!<page>So many relics safely piled up in here, nice and safe! I’ve done so well to gather it all up!<hpage>If your collection pleases you, some acknowledgement of my own contribution to its growth is not undue.<page>Pah! Is it gratitude you seek?<page>I will allow you to keep viewing my collection. That is gratitude enough for what little you’ve given me!
original_zh_text: 好……真好！这才是称得上是珍藏！<page>这么多遗物安安稳稳地堆在这儿！我得算是劳苦功高！<hpage>若您对这珍藏满意，也请念我几分功劳。<page>嘁！讨谢来了？<page>就你交的那点东西，准你多看几眼我的珍藏，就当是谢礼了！
translated_text: That's right, sir. This is a really powerful series!<page>Many cultural relics are stored here, and it is safe! Well collected! "<hpage>If your collection satisfies you, I don't need to acknowledge my contribution to the development of my own collection.<page>Wow! Are you looking for a thank you?<page>Please continue to read my collection. I am grateful for everything you have given me!
secondary_translated_text: C'est juste, monsieur. C'est une série vraiment puissante !<page>Beaucoup de reliques culturelles sont stockées ici, et il est sûr ! Bien collecté ! "<hpage>Si votre collection vous satisfait, je n'ai pas besoin de reconnaître ma contribution au développement de ma propre collection.<page>Wow ! Vous cherchez un remerciement ?<page>Veuillez continuer à lire ma collection. Je suis reconnaissante pour tout ce que vous m'avez donné !

original_en_text: <page=S>Once was common, this delivery, for the bugs in their camp beside the bone. Now even this is-is challenge.<page=T>Down there at base, where many pilgrims’ journey start. To ready for their climb, these deliverings will give much value.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这本是寻常单子，给骸底营地的虫。现在竟、竟然也成难题了。<page=T>那儿是朝圣者起点，货到能帮大忙。
translated_text: <page=S>This method of transport was once common to camp bugs next to bones. This too is a challenge now.<page=T>Many pilgrims started their journey from here. To prepare you for the mountaineering, these deliveries bring great value.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Cette méthode de transport était autrefois courante pour les bugs du camp à côté des os. C'est aussi un défi maintenant.<page=T>Beaucoup de pèlerins ont commencé leur voyage à partir de là. Pour vous préparer à l'alpinisme, ces livraisons apportent une grande valeur.

original_en_text: Would you pass the oil, traveller, and perhaps a few rosaries for their ongoing effort? Allow this pinmaster to again work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: 那就把油给我吧，再赏几颗念珠当辛苦费如何？让我再施展一次针匠的绝活！
translated_text: Do you pass the Rosary to thank the oil, the travelers, and their continuous efforts? Would you like this musician to do a miracle on your blade again?
secondary_translated_text: Passez-vous le Rosaire pour remercier l'huile, les voyageurs et leurs efforts continus ? Aimeriez-vous que ce musicien fasse à nouveau un miracle sur votre lame ?

original_en_text: Found some fancy trophies on your travels? Then you’ll be needing these shelves to show them off!
original_zh_text: 旅途中搜罗了不少珍奇战利品？正好放上这架子显摆！
translated_text: Did you have any nice trophies during your trip? You need a shelf to show it off!
secondary_translated_text: Avez-vous eu de beaux trophées pendant votre voyage ? Vous avez besoin d'un étagère pour le montrer !

original_en_text: Just passing through these lands, are you, miss? I’d warn you not to stray far from Bellhart, but you’ve the look of one who can manage themself.
original_zh_text: 只是路过吗？劝你别离镇子太远，不过瞧你倒像是有本事的。
translated_text: have you just passed through this land? I wanted to warn you not to leave Berhardt, but you looked like a man who could manage himself.
secondary_translated_text: Vous venez de traverser ce pays ? Je voulais vous avertir de ne pas quitter Berhardt, mais vous avez l'air d'un homme capable de se gérer lui-même.

original_en_text: If you’re heading out across the pond, be wary of the other catchers. They’re all long lost to Pharloom’s Haunting.<page>Weak minds, the lotta them. Still, their longpins remain sharp enough.
original_zh_text: 如果要经过池塘，当心其他渔夫，全被邪咒侵染了。<page>大多是心智软弱的家伙，但使长针的手艺没丢。
translated_text: If you are crossing the pond, watch out for other catchers. He was in "Haunted Pharrow."<page>They love it, and their hearts are weak. But the long needle is still sharp enough.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous traversez l'étang, faites attention aux autres rattrapants. Il était dans « Haunted Pharrow. "<page>Ils l'aiment, et leurs cœurs sont faibles. Mais le long aiguille est encore assez tranchant.

original_en_text: Well, well! Welcome to you, our newest resident! I hope you’re finding your new home to your taste.<hpage>It is a finely forged bell, madam. I am fortunate to have a safe space to rest, even if my stay here may be short.<page>However long you’re with us, I’ve been holding onto some fine goods that’ll cosy up your home. This stuff ain’t for the riff-raff winding through, but a fellow Bellharter deserves the finest!
original_zh_text: 哟嗬！新住户！钟居可还满意？<hpage>铸造精良，女士。虽然是暂居，但能有一处安身之所实属幸事。<page>住多久随意，我留着些好货专供钟心镇自己人！过路粗客可配不上这档次！
translated_text: yeah. yeah. Welcome, new residents! Hopefully you will find a new home that suits your taste.<hpage>It's a very well made watch, lady. We were lucky to have a safe resting space, but our stay here might be short.<page>No matter how long you stay, I will leave you some good things to keep your home comfortable. These aren't for the mob, but the Belhearts deserve the best!
secondary_translated_text: Oui, oui. Oui, oui. Bienvenue nouveaux résidents ! J'espère que vous trouverez une nouvelle maison qui convient à votre goût.<hpage>C'est une montre très bien faite, madame. Nous avons eu la chance d'avoir un espace de repos sûr, mais notre séjour ici pourrait être court.<page>Peu importe combien de temps vous restez, je vous laisserai quelques bonnes choses pour garder votre maison confortable. Ce n'est pas pour la foule, mais les Belhearts méritent le meilleur !

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, weary pilgrim! Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<hpage>Your town seems returned to healthy form, good bug. I had some concern that, upon cutting you free, I’d find only husks.<page>Yes, well, many ahh... err... most of our residents did not fare so well... Still, it’s no good to dwell on dark things! We shall build, and grow, and welcome! As is any good bellbug’s task.
original_zh_text: 欢迎欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！钟心镇虽然不复往昔，但仍是攀登圣堡前最后一处友善驿站。<page>我，帕沃，专为虔行旅者献上最热忱的欢迎——比如尊驾您！<hpage>看来镇子已然恢复生机，原以为斩断丝咒后只能见空壳遍地。<page>呃……这个……许多居民确实没挺过来……但沉溺于哀伤没有意义！我等将重建、成长、迎接！此乃钟心镇虫民的天职。
translated_text: Welcome, weary pilgrim! The glorious Berhardt may have lived through its heyday, but it remains the last stop in front of the castle.<page>My job, beautiful Pavo, is to honor the kindness of those who have died like you! "<hpage>Your town seems to have returned to a healthy, good worm. I'm a little worried. When I take you out, I'll only find the shell.<page>Yeah, yeah, a lot. um... Most of the residents are not well. But there's no benefit in clinging to the dark! We are growing and welcoming! It's also the job of a good watchmaker.
secondary_translated_text: Bienvenue, pèlerin fatigué ! Le glorieux Berhardt a peut - être vécu à son apogée, mais il reste le dernier arrêt devant le château.<page>Mon travail, belle Pavo, c'est d'honorer la gentillesse de ceux qui sont morts comme vous ! "<hpage>Votre ville semble être revenue à un ver sain et bon. Je suis un peu inquiet. Quand je vous enlève, je ne trouverai que la coquille.<page>Ouais, oui, beaucoup. Umm... La plupart des habitants ne vont pas bien. Mais il n'y a aucun avantage à s'accrocher à l'obscurité ! Nous grandissons et accueillons ! C'est aussi le travail d'un bon horloger.

original_en_text: You’ve met Frey, miss? She’s usually stocking useful items for travellers such as yourself.
original_zh_text: 见过芙蕾了么？她那常备着些旅者用得上的好货。
translated_text: did you see the frey? She usually stocks up with useful items for travelers like you.
secondary_translated_text: Avez-vous vu le frey ? Elle stocke généralement des objets utiles pour les voyageurs comme vous.

original_en_text: The perfect choice! Your bell’s about to be looking the finest in town. We’ll get the work started straight away.
original_zh_text: 选得好！你这钟屋就要变成全镇最好的一间了。立马开工！
translated_text: The perfect choice! Your bells will be the best in the city. We will start working immediately.
secondary_translated_text: Le choix idéal ! Vos cloches seront les meilleures de la ville. Nous commencerons à travailler immédiatement.

original_en_text: If you’re ever finding that bellhome a little bare, make sure to speak with Frey. She’s been known to gather all sorts of fancy furnishings.<page>That stock’s useless for a passing pilgrim, but for a new resident it’s just the stuff to turn a bell into home.
original_zh_text: 如果觉得钟居空荡，可找芙蕾购置家具。<page>那些家具对过客无用，但对新住民来说正好可以营造归家之感。
translated_text: If the clock tower is a bit bare, be sure to consult with Fray. She has a wonderful collection of furniture.<page>It was of little use to the pilgrims of the past, but was only to take home to the new inhabitants.
secondary_translated_text: Si la tour de l'horloge est un peu nue, assurez-vous de consulter Fray. Elle possède une très belle collection de meubles.<page>Il était de peu d'utilité pour les pèlerins du passé, mais ne devait que ramener chez eux les nouveaux habitants.

original_en_text: <page=S>Up-up, in the big Citadel, a new place we heard is now claimed safety-safe! Theys too needing our deliverings, we is sure!<page=T>That Citadel. We knows its truths! Not so nicely-nice as pilgrims tells! Even if brave bugs would settle, danger still is close!<page=S>They would need deliverings, for food, for healings, for protection. Please takes them, miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=S>听说上、上面的圣堡有新据点！肯定缺物资！<page=T>我们知道圣堡真相！根本没朝圣者说的那、那么好！就算有勇者定居也危险！需要食物药品护具——救星小姐去送吧！
translated_text: <page=S>At the Grand Castle, we claim that the new place we've heard about is safe! We need help, too!<page=T>Castle, I know the truth! The Pilgrims are not right! Even if the brave bugs calm down, the danger is still near!<page=S>They need food, treatment, and protection. Please, I'll deliver it!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Au Grand Château, nous affirmons que le nouvel endroit dont nous avons entendu parler est sûr ! Nous aussi avons besoin d'aide !<page=T>Château, je sais la vérité ! Les pèlerins n'ont pas raison ! Même si les braves insectes se calment, le danger est toujours proche !<page=S>Ils ont besoin de nourriture, de soins et de protection. S'il vous plaît, je vais le livrer !

original_en_text: Tarano! We shall work, now as never. What joy you grant this humble artisan, traveller. Let us seek that shine thought lost within these lands...
original_zh_text: 开工！这是毕生难求的机会。旅者，谢谢您让我这卑微匠人重拾失传荣光……
translated_text: Tarano! I will work as usual. What joy have you brought to this humble craftsman and traveler? Let us seek the lost light in this land.
secondary_translated_text: Tarano ! Je travaillerai comme d'habitude. Quelle joie avez-vous apporté à cet humble artisan et voyageur ? Recherchons la lumière perdue dans cette terre.

original_en_text: <page>Welly, ho! That oil! You have it! That rare substance, hoarded close by the Citadel. Few are the pinmasters of our age that ever chanced to work its wonders.<page>Would you see it, traveller? The finest work of this fair pinmaster and your blade sharper still! Pass me the oil, and we can commence!
original_zh_text: <page>哎呀呀！那就是圣油！您竟然有！圣堡秘藏的圣物，当世针匠谁摸过这玩意！<page>旅者，可愿见证纺络针匠的绝活？把油给我，肯定不会让您失望！
translated_text: <page>Willie, ho! that oil! i have it! This rare material is stored near the castle. In these days, very few people perform miracles.<page>Have you seen it, traveller? This is the best work of a beautiful musician, and your knife is sharper! Give me the oil and let's start.
secondary_translated_text: <page>Willie, ho ! Cette huile ! Je l'ai ! Ce matériel rare est stocké près du château. Aujourd ' hui, très peu de gens font des miracles.<page>Tu l'as vu, voyageur ? C'est le meilleur travail d'un beau musicien, et votre couteau est plus aiguisé ! Donnez-moi l'huile et commençons.

translated_text: Souvenir Shelf
secondary_translated_text: Souvenir Shelf

translated_text: the gift of holy relics?
secondary_translated_text: Le don des saintes reliques ?

original_en_text: Welly, yay? Reconsider my offer? Your blade would gleam at my fine skill!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！改主意了？我这手艺保准让刃口锃亮！
translated_text: it's willie, right? reconsider my proposal? your sword will shine with my skills!
secondary_translated_text: C'est Willie, non ? Reviser ma proposition ? Ton épée brillera avec mes talents !

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, I am sickly. Maggots of the fetid bogs beyond the moors writhe upon my shell. I would ask your aid in removing them.<page>Maggots! That’s all you bring the great Yarnaby?! My time is precious! Only for the seriously afflicted! The truly, hideously enfeebled. Bzzt!<page>Find a bench, or a bed, or a rock! It’s only rest you need. Settle yourself somewhere, and those maggots will soon wriggle themselves out of your shell.
original_zh_text: <hpage>女士，沼地的蛆虫在我壳上乱爬，请您帮忙清除。<page>蛆虫？！就为这破玩意烦本神医？！重症！我要治的是重症！惨不忍睹那种！滋滋！<page>找长椅、床铺、石头歇着去！睡一觉蛆虫自会掉光。
translated_text: <hpage>Ma 'am, I am ill. In the marshes outside the wilderness, the stench of maggot crept into my shell. I'll help you get rid of them.<page>it's a worm! that's all i brought to you?! My time is precious! Seriously injured only! A real, terrible weakness. humming!<page>Look for benches, beds and stones! I just rest. As soon as the worm settles somewhere, it comes out of the shell.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>- Madame, je suis malade. Dans les marécages à l'extérieur de la nature sauvage, l'odeur des asticots s'est glissée dans ma coquille. Je vais vous aider à vous débarrasser d'eux.<page>C'est un ver ! C'est tout ce que je t'ai apporté ? Mon temps est précieux ! Gravement blessé seulement ! Une véritable et terrible faiblesse. Humming !<page>Recherchez des bancs, des lits et des pierres ! Je me repose simplement. Dès que le ver s'installe quelque part, il sort de la coquille.

original_en_text: Welcome, fellow resident! Can I interest you in something special before you’re away again on your travels?
original_zh_text: 欢迎你，好邻居！出门前要不要买点特别的东西？
translated_text: Everyone is welcome! Before you travel again, do you want to be interested in something special?
secondary_translated_text: Tout le monde est le bienvenu ! Avant de voyager à nouveau, voulez-vous vous intéresser à quelque chose de spécial ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then. Although... your store now seems quite bare.<page>Ahem. Yes. I’ll admit, the wait was longer than I’d anticipated, and a bug has to eat...<page>I’ll have more to offer you once my courier turns up. No doubt he’s been avoiding Bellhart since the curse set its sights on us.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。看来你已从丝咒中恢复。<page>哈！我机灵着呢。那怪丝掉下来的时候，我立马缩进钟居紧闭门户。<page>其他虫或许遭了殃，但我存货充足，饿不着。<hpage>未雨绸缪是好事。不过……你这铺子如今空荡得很。<page>咳，是。实话说，这劫难拖得比预期久，虫总要吃饭嘛……<page>等我家送货虫回来就有新货了，那小子肯定绕着钟心镇躲灾呢。
translated_text: <hpage>Hello, shopkeeper. You seem to be recovering pretty much from the pain of silk.<page>ah! ah! I am a clever insect. When a strange thread fell from above, I closed my mouth and crouched in the clock room.<page>It may be a problem for others, but my store has plenty of stock, so I don't have to worry about starving.<hpage>Your preparation will be very helpful. However, the... Your store seems to be empty now.<page>Cough, yes, I admit that the wait time has been longer than I expected, and I have to eat the insects too.<page>When my messenger comes, I will give you more. There is no doubt that he has been hiding from Berhardt since the curse was directed at us.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Bonjour, commerçant. Vous semblez vous remettre de la douleur de la soie.<page>Ah ! Ah ! Je suis un insecte très intelligent. Quand un étrange fil tomba d'en haut, je fermai la bouche et je m'accroupis dans la salle des horloges.<page>Cela peut être un problème pour les autres, mais mon magasin a beaucoup de stock, donc je n'ai pas à m'inquiéter de mourir de faim.<hpage>Votre préparation sera très utile. Cependant, la... Votre magasin semble maintenant vide.<page>Toux, oui, j'admets que le temps d'attente a été plus long que prévu, et je dois manger les insectes aussi.<page>Quand mon messager viendra, je vous en donnerai encore plus. Il ne fait aucun doute qu ' il se cachait à Berhardt depuis que la malédiction était dirigée contre nous.

translated_text: Flash flash
secondary_translated_text: Flash Flash Flash

original_en_text: You bother me again? Begone, I said!<hpage>I ask only if you know what has happened to the bugs above us. They hang trapped in a vast snare of thread.<page>Hff. Hardly surprising. That there’s the final fate for all in Pharloom. Just come seeking a little sooner for them above.<page>Surely, oh surely, you don’t imagine your own end will be different? All that hunger, and fear, and pride, filling your fragile heart. You too are bound to end ensnared!<page>Grnk! Begone. In Pharloom, only a fool believes themselves free.
original_zh_text: 又来烦我？说了滚！<hpage>我只想问你可知上头虫子的遭遇？他们受困于邪丝之中。<page>嗤，迟早的事。纺络的众生终归此路，他们不过是早走一步。<page>难道……你觉得自己能逃过？饥渴、恐惧、傲慢塞满你那脆壳，你早晚也得落网！<page>哼！滚吧。在纺络，相信自己自由的都是蠢货。
translated_text: did you bother me again? Get out of here, I said!<hpage>I just asked the worm upstairs if he knew what had happened and he was trapped in a huge trap.<page>Jim is no wonder. The farm is everyone's ultimate destiny. Please come early. "<page>Sure, oh, sure, don't you think your own ending will be different? This hunger, fear, and pride are filling your weak heart. dead! dead!<page>Grunk! In the Faro, they believe that only fools are free.
secondary_translated_text: Tu m'as dérangé à nouveau ? Sortez d'ici, je vous ai dit !<hpage>J'ai juste demandé au ver à l'étage s'il savait ce qui s'était passé et il était piégé dans un énorme piège.<page>Jim n'est pas étonnant. La ferme est la destinée ultime de chacun. Venez tôt, s'il vous plaît. "<page>Bien sûr, oh bien sûr, ne pensez-vous pas que votre propre fin sera différente ? La faim, la peur et l'orgueil remplissent votre cœur faible. Mort ! Mort !<page>Grunk ! Aux Faro, on croit que seuls les imbéciles sont libres.

original_en_text: You want to cut them down? Hff. Yes, you look cruel enough.<page>Once the strings are cut, pain will return to them. They will remember fear and longing.<page>What a choice you make for them! Such power you grant yourself!
original_zh_text: 想斩断丝线？嗤，瞧你倒有几分机灵。<page>丝线一断，痛苦、恐惧、渴求都将复归。<page>你替他们选的好啊！好大的威风！
translated_text: do you want to cut it? Oh, you look cruel.<page>When the string is cut, the pain returns to the string. They remember their fears and their desires.<page>You have made a great choice for them! I gave myself that power!
secondary_translated_text: Tu veux le couper ? Tu as l'air cruelle.<page>Lorsque la corde est coupée, la douleur revient à la corde. Ils se souviennent de leurs craintes et de leurs désirs.<page>Vous avez fait un excellent choix pour eux ! Je me donne ce pouvoir !

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinmaster, I have acquired oil with which my needle may see further sharpening.<page>Bonva! What wonder? What wish? To steal a gift so fine. Few are the pinmasters of our age who ever worked with such a substance.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针匠，我取来磨针秘油了。<page>太好了！这等圣物，这年头还有哪个针匠能摸到这宝贝！
translated_text: <hpage>Pinmaster, there is oil to sharpen the needle further.<page>Bonwa! What miracle? what are you asking for? I can't believe I got such a lovely gift. In modern times, few people use this substance.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pinmaster, il y a de l'huile pour aiguiser davantage l'aiguille.<page>Bonjour ! Quel miracle ? Qu 'est-ce que tu demandes ? Je n'arrive pas à croire que j'ai reçu un cadeau aussi merveilleux. De nos jours, peu de gens utilisent cette substance.

original_en_text: How grand! To face an opponent with a bit of energy.<page>You’re a skilled one, clear enough. I hope my training has granted some insight.
original_zh_text: 痛快！总算遇到像样的对手。<page>身手不错，我的指导对你有用吧？
translated_text: What a magnificent! They face a dynamic opponent.<page>You are a skilled person and clear enough. I wish the training was an encouragement.
secondary_translated_text: Quel magnifique ! Ils font face à un adversaire dynamique.<page>Vous êtes une personne compétente et assez claire. J'espère que la formation sera un encouragement.

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find a bug of sound mind alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, strange as it is’n all, but it’s the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom.<page>Given I’m now awake, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two.
original_zh_text: 无礼之徒！竟敢打断针姬的冥想！<page>再这样莽撞行事，小心被扎成筛子！<hpage>这种荒凉之地居然还有清醒的虫活着？你是学过本地兵器的战士？<page>没错！刺针才是纺络的荣耀武器——你那根怪模怪样的针虽然趁手，但终究不是正统。<page>既然醒了，要不要来练练手？想试试刺针的威力吗？说不定我这老师傅还能教你两招？
translated_text: Excuse me, please! The princess wakes up!<page>If you continue with such an arrogant attitude, you could get in trouble very quickly.<hpage>I was surprised to find sane insects alive in such a desolate place. are you a soldier who learned in this land?<page>yes! yes! Female poet! Your needle may be right for you, but it is strange, but it is the glorious weapon of Pharaoh.<page>Now that I'm awake, why don't you practice a little? Test the witch's powers. Maybe this teacher can teach you something.
secondary_translated_text: Excusez-moi, s'il vous plaît ! La princesse se réveille !<page>Si vous continuez avec une attitude aussi arrogante, vous pourriez vous retrouver dans des ennuis très rapidement.<hpage>J'ai été surpris de trouver des insectes sains vivants dans un endroit aussi désolé.Êtes-vous un soldat qui a appris dans ce pays ?<page>Oui ! Oui ! Femme poète ! Votre aiguille peut vous convenir, mais elle est étrange, mais elle est l'arme glorieuse de Pharaon.<page>Maintenant que je suis réveillé, pourquoi ne pratiquez-vous pas un peu ? Testez les pouvoirs de la sorcière ! Peut - être que ce professeur peut vous apprendre quelque chose.

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims were useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. I’ve travelled the length of this kingdom, yet the strength and skills hidden throughout continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. If only we’d met in less troubled times, just think of all we could have learned from one another!
original_zh_text: 好久没这么热血沸腾了！那些呆滞的朝圣者根本不配当陪练。<hpage>你的技艺令我惊叹。即便我走遍整个王国，仍为这里隐藏的实力感到惊讶。<page>你身上带着奇特的力量。要是我们生在太平年代，本可以互相学习！
translated_text: It's been a long time since I've felt so much energy. Boring pilgrims are of no use to test my talents.<hpage>Princess your sword is a great challenge I have traveled the kingdom, but I am still amazed by the hidden power and technology.<page>You have strange powers of your own, needleworm. Think about what we can learn from each other if we meet less time!
secondary_translated_text: Cela fait longtemps que je ne ressens pas autant d'énergie. Les pèlerins ennuyeux ne servent pas à tester mes talents.<hpage>Princesse votre épée est un grand défi J'ai parcouru le royaume, mais je suis toujours étonnée par la puissance et la technologie cachées.<page>Vous avez des pouvoirs étranges, ver d'aiguille. Pensez à ce que nous pouvons apprendre les uns des autres si nous nous rencontrons moins de temps !

original_en_text: Bold choice, needle bug. Let’s get our shells a’shaking!
original_zh_text: 有胆识！让我们战个痛快！
translated_text: Bold choice, needleworm. Shake the shell!
secondary_translated_text: Choix audacieux, ver d'aiguille. Faites le shell !

translated_text: Training with Pinstress
secondary_translated_text: Entraînement avec pinstress

original_en_text: <hpage>These sands mark the edge of Pharloom’s territory. I was brought to this land through the caverns beyond.<hpage>Something at this kingdom’s height still hungers for me. Were I to flee now, I would again be pursued.<hpage>Until I find the source of that hunger, and slay it, I will not be free.
original_zh_text: <hpage>这片沙原是纺络的边界。我是穿过远处洞窟被带到此地的。<hpage>纺络的顶端仍有存在渴求着我。若此刻逃离，必将再次受到追捕。<hpage>唯有找到源头并将其斩杀，我才能获得自由。
translated_text: <hpage>The sand marks the boundaries of the territory of Pharam. I have come to this land through a distant cave.<hpage>In the heyday of this kingdom, something else awaits me. If I run now, I'll be chased again.<hpage>I cannot be free until I have found the root cause of hunger and removed it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Le sable marque les frontières du territoire de Pharam. Je suis venu dans cette terre par une grotte lointaine.<hpage>À l'apogée de ce royaume, quelque chose d'autre m'attend. Si je cours maintenant, je serai poursuivi à nouveau.<hpage>Je ne peux pas être libre tant que je n'ai pas trouvé la cause profonde de la faim et l'ai éliminée.

original_en_text: Back again, needle bug? Surely you’ve more important places calling than these sandy steps?<hpage>I shan’t stay long, Pinstress. Your home and your skills offer a sense of safety rare about these lands.
original_zh_text: 还不走？没有更要紧的事要做吗？<hpage>我不会久留。不过有你这般身手，待在这里反而安全。
translated_text: you're back, needleworm? Is there anything more important than this ladder?<hpage>I won't stay long, Princess. Your home and skills will provide a sense of security that is rare in these lands.
secondary_translated_text: Tu es de retour, Needleworm ? Y a-t - il quelque chose de plus important que cet escalier ?<hpage>Je ne vais pas rester longtemps, ma princesse. Votre maison et vos compétences vous donneront un sentiment de sécurité qui est rare dans ces terres.

original_en_text: Find the vassal... pale It. Return them to us... Save us both from the Masters’ wrath.
original_zh_text: 找到仆从……苍白者。将其归还……平息主人怒火。
translated_text: Looking for a customer. Give it back and save them both from the wrath of their master. "
secondary_translated_text: Chercher un client. Rendez-le et sauvez-les de la colère de leur maître. "

original_en_text: Needle bug! With those black quakes, Pharloom’s finale is fast arriving.<page>Raise your blade! Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 看这黑色震动，纺络的终局将至了。<page>举针吧！至少让我们中的一个死得其所！
translated_text: Needleworm! With these black earthquakes, the end of the pharo is nearing.<page>raise the knife! Let's see if at least one person is ultimately faithful to our nature!
secondary_translated_text: Needleworm ! Avec ces tremblements de terre noirs, la fin du pharo approche.<page>Levez le couteau ! Voyons si au moins une personne est finalement fidèle à notre nature !

original_en_text: Ah ha! Needle bug! Who else would dare wake a Pinstress with such force?!<page>Saw my wish, I’m guessing? Here hopin’ to fulfill it?<hpage>I know what you are seeking, Pinstress... a death duel, an end from battle, not cavern’s collapse.<hpage>I can oblige... to a point... But a greater challenge still awaits me below.<page>Whatever else you’re about, you might be finding it futile now, needle bug. The black quakes... Pharloom’s finale arrives.<page>So let’s stop the yapping, aye! How’s ‘bout we begin? Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 哈！是你！除了你谁敢这么粗暴地吵醒一名针姬！<page>看到我的祈愿了？想来帮我实现？<hpage>我知道你在渴求什么……一场死斗，你想战死而非被沙土掩埋。<hpage>我可以满足你……但下面还有更大的挑战在等着我。<page>不管你要做什么，可能都是徒劳。这黑色震动……纺络的终局将至。<page>少废话！开打吧！至少让我们中的一个死得其所！
translated_text: Oh, oh, oh! Needleworm! Who will wake up the princess with this power!<page>do you see my wish? you want to stay here?<hpage>I know what I'm looking for - a duel of death, not the end of the battle, not the collapse of the cave.<hpage>I can say yes. " But in a sense, we are facing a bigger challenge.<page>Whatever you do, you may find that it's a waste now. It was a black earthquake. The end of the Pharaoh is here.<page>So, let's stop talking nonsense! what do we do? Let's see if at least one person is ultimately faithful to our nature!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, oh, oh ! Needleworm ! Qui réveillera la princesse avec ce pouvoir !<page>Voyez-vous mon souhait ? Vous voulez rester ici ?<hpage>Je sais ce que je cherche : un duel de mort, pas la fin de la bataille, pas l'effondrement de la grotte.<hpage>je peux dire oui.« Mais dans un sens, nous sommes confrontés à un défi plus important.<page>Quoi que vous fassiez, vous trouverez peut - être que c'est un gaspillage maintenant. C'était un tremblement de terre noir. La fin du Pharaon est là.<page>Alors, arrêtons de parler des bêtises ! Que faisons-nous ? Voyons si au moins une personne est finalement fidèle à notre nature !

original_en_text: Creature, higher... It has been sent... by Masters served... to retrieve Zi’s vassal lost?
original_zh_text: 上位者……主人派你来……回收失联仆从？
translated_text: Biology, Higher. Send it. through the service. to bring back the lost prince?
secondary_translated_text: Biologie, plus haut. Envoyez-le par le service. Pour ramener le prince perdu ?

original_en_text: No. No. No... My saviour slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Already it attacks these lands with enough force to end them. To summon it stronger will only hasten that fall.<hpage>For this moment at least, your shell is saved. It was only by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment, that I arrived in time.
original_zh_text: 不，不……我的眷属被毁了！<page>你为什么这么残忍？为什么要我永世为奴？<hpage>虚空不可被召唤。纺络已然深受其害，再度召唤只会使情况更糟。<hpage>若不是你的钢铁同伴祈愿，我又及时赶到，你必死无疑。
translated_text: No, no, no. The Savior has been killed!<page>You cruel murderer, why do you do that? Why do they serve for so long?<hpage>This error blank is not called. They attack the land with enough force to end them. Simply claiming its strength accelerates the decline.<hpage>At least this time, the shell was preserved. By the will of your iron companion, and the fear of her master's punishment, I arrived on time.
secondary_translated_text: Non, non, non, le Sauveur a été tué !<page>Espèce de meurtrier, pourquoi fais-tu cela ? Pourquoi servent-ils aussi longtemps ?<hpage>Cette erreur n'est pas appelée blank. Ils attaquent la terre avec suffisamment de force pour les mettre fin. La simple affirmation de sa force accélère le déclin.<hpage>Au moins, cette fois-ci, la coquille a été conservée. Par la volonté de votre compagne de fer, et la crainte du châtiment de son maître, je suis arrivé à l'heure.

original_en_text: Gah! Bested fair, and yet you choose to stay the killing blow?<hpage>I can test you, Pinstress, and myself for what’s to come, but I will not cut you down.<hpage>Despite its quakes, Pharloom’s demise is not as certain as it seems. I shall act to change that fate.<hpage>If I succeed at my task, the land that remains will require the watch of strong bugs like you.<page>Well, ain’t you an inspiration! Makin’ me seem a right fool, here thinkin’ only on the end while you’re looking to a future fair...<page>Seems you’ve beaten me twice, needle bug, both my pin’s edge, and my heart’s resolve...
original_zh_text: 咳！你已经赢了，为什么还不动手？<hpage>我可以与你比试，但不会杀你……<hpage>纺络的命运尚有转机，我要改变它。<hpage>若我成功，幸存的世界需要你这样的强者守护。<page>你可真是乐观！显得我像个只想着末日的蠢货……<page>你赢了我两次，无论是武艺还是觉悟……
translated_text: ah! ah! The most fair thing is, you chose to stay with the fatal blow?<hpage>I can test you and Pence and myself, but I will not belittle you.<hpage>Despite the earthquake, Farm's death was not as certain as it might seem. I will take action to change this fate.<hpage>If I succeed, the rest of the land must be defended against powerful insects like you. "<page>Aren't you the one who inspires? You make me look like a fool, and you're only thinking about the last thing here, and you're looking for the fairness of the future...<page>You seem to have won me twice, the needle has broken my needle and determination...
secondary_translated_text: Ah ! Ah ! La chose la plus juste est, vous avez choisi de rester avec le coup fatal ?<hpage>Je peux vous tester, Pence et moi-même, mais je ne vais pas vous rabaisser.<hpage>Malgré le tremblement de terre, la mort de Farm n'était pas aussi certaine qu ' il pourrait paraître. Je vais agir pour changer ce sort.<hpage>Si je réussis, le reste de la terre doit être défendu contre des insectes puissants comme vous. "<page>N'est-ce pas vous qui inspire ?
