Que la ferme soit en bonne santé ou morte, notre responsabilité nous liera toujours à ce creuset.<page>Je suis convaincu que Barlow a des questions, et qu 'il a besoin de persuader rapidement si notre destin est aussi terrible que votre conduite le suggère.

original_en_text: Return later, pointy bug! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: 过阵子再来，小尖头虫！眼下正忙着呢，少添乱！
translated_text: Come back later, bugs! There are so many things to do and I can't worry about it.
secondary_translated_text: Revenez plus tard, bugs ! Il y a tellement de choses à faire et je ne peux pas m'en soucier.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>We shall remain here, still. If our service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我已获得终结黑灾的力量。很快便将行动，平息震动，拯救此地。<page>干得好，小尖头虫。你这小身板里的劲头倒是大得出奇。<page>咱还会守在这儿。若咱这手艺能助你成事，尽管开口便是。
translated_text: <hpage>By training my daughter, I have gained the power to end this black madness. I will act immediately to stop the earthquake and save the land.<page>Serious and serious errors. For such a small person, I have found that your energy and energy is surprisingly large.<page>If our services can help you with important tasks, we will be happy to continue to provide them.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>En entraînant ma fille, j'ai gagné le pouvoir de mettre fin à cette folie noire. Je vais agir immédiatement pour arrêter le tremblement de terre et sauver la terre.<page>Des erreurs graves et graves. Pour une si petite personne, j'ai trouvé que votre énergie et votre énergie sont étonnamment grandes.<page>Si nos services peuvent vous aider dans des tâches importantes, nous serons heureux de continuer à les fournir.

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Forge Daughter. If I require your aid, I shall return.<page>Our wishes go with you, pointy bug. Calm the raging of our world, that our task can continue.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，熔炉之女。若是需要帮助，我自会再来。<page>祝你好运，小尖头虫。平息这外头的狂乱，咱才能继续安心干活。
translated_text: <hpage>If I really need your help raising my daughter, I'll be back.<page>Our wishes are with you, Sharp Bug. Only by stopping the destruction of the world will our mission continue.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Si j'ai vraiment besoin de votre aide pour élever ma fille, je reviendrai.<page>Nos vœux sont avec toi, Sharp Bug. Ce n'est qu 'en arrêtant la destruction du monde que notre mission continuera.

original_en_text: <hpage>These controls are complex. If I’m to descend within the bell below, I will first require an operator.<hpage>Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此操控装置颇为复杂。若想要乘潜钟下潜，需要有操作员协助。<hpage>需要得到码头上某位清醒者的帮助。
translated_text: <hpage>These controls are complex If you need to get off under the bell, you first need an operator.<hpage>The people in the port will help.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ces commandes sont complexes Si vous devez descendre sous la cloche, vous avez d'abord besoin d'un opérateur.<hpage>Les gens du port nous aideront.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I wish to depart. Please ready the bell for travel.<page>Sure thing, miss. Sit on the bench, and I’ll send you down.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我可以出发了。请整备好潜钟。<page>好嘞，小姐。在椅子上坐稳，我这就送您下潜。
translated_text: <hpage>I want to leave. Please prepare the bell for the journey.<page>Of course, miss. Sit down on the bench and I'll let you down.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je veux partir. Veuillez préparer la cloche pour le voyage.<page>Bien sûr, mademoiselle. Asseyez-vous sur le banc et je vous laisse tomber.

original_en_text: Interested in our little game, my lady?<page>If you can hit the target fifteen times you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 对我们的小游戏感兴趣吗，女士？<page>击中靶子十五次，奖品就归您了！
translated_text: Are you interested in our little game?<page>If you can hit the target 15 times, you will win valuable prizes!
secondary_translated_text: Êtes-vous intéressé par notre petit jeu ?<page>Si vous atteignez la cible 15 fois, vous gagnez de précieux prix !

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, you return? Our world cracks and cries from some grave new calamity.<page>Nevertheless, we must remain, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: <page>嘿！小尖头虫，你回来了？外面又闹起什么灾祸，搞得哭天抢地的。<page>不过无所谓，咱还得守着熔炉干活。使命在身，至死方休。
translated_text: oh! spikebug, are you back? Our world is broken and weeping in a serious new disaster.<page>But we must continue to maintain this factory and its services. Our responsibilities are lifelong.
secondary_translated_text: Ooh ! Spikebug, vous êtes de retour ? Notre monde est brisé et pleure dans une nouvelle grave catastrophe.<page>Mais nous devons continuer à entretenir cette usine et ses services. Nos responsabilités sont à vie.

original_en_text: If you need something, talk to the boss. I’m busy.
original_zh_text: 有事找老板说去。我正忙着呢。
translated_text: If you need anything, you should consult your boss. I'm busy.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous avez besoin de quoi que ce soit, vous devriez consulter votre patron. Je suis occupé.

original_en_text: A control panel with various levers and gauges.
original_zh_text: 布满操纵杆与仪表的控制台。
translated_text: A control panel with various levers and instruments.
secondary_translated_text: Un panneau de commande avec différents leviers et instruments.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame.<hpage>There is a diving bell at the base of this structure that seemed fit for the task. I require it opened, and an operator to send it deep.<hpage>As one of few upon these docks with mind still sound, that role must fall to you.<page>Can’t you see I’m busy, miss? Ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. Its collapse is inevitable. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我需要潜入熔岩湖之下。<hpage>此建筑底部有座潜钟可用。我需要把它打开，并有个操作员送我下沉。<hpage>如今码头清醒者寥寥无几，此事只能由你来办。<page>没看我正忙吗，小姐？眼下铲矿石的活还干不完呢。<hpage>这王国正在崩塌，覆灭无可避免。你不帮我，就等着一切辛劳付诸东流。若你还想活命，还想每天有活干，就立刻帮我。
translated_text: <hpage>I want to get into the lake of fire.<hpage>There is a diving clock at the bottom of the structure, which seems to be suitable for work. Ask the operator to open it, as it sends deep.<hpage>As one of the few people still thinking about it in these docks, the role has to fall on you.<page>don't you see i'm busy? When you dig up the soil, you don't have time to do anything else.<hpage>If you don't help me, your efforts will soon be wasted. The kingdom is falling apart. That collapse is inevitable. If you want to continue with your work and your life, you have to help me now.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je veux entrer dans le lac de Feu.<hpage>Il y a une horloge de plongée au fond de la structure, qui semble être adaptée au travail. Demandez à l'opérateur de l'ouvrir, car il envoie profondément.<hpage>En tant que l'une des rares personnes qui y pensent encore dans ces quays, le rôle doit tomber sur vous.<page>Tu ne vois pas que je suis occupée ? Quand vous creusez le sol, vous n'avez pas le temps de faire autre chose.<hpage>Si vous ne m'aidez pas, vos efforts seront bientôt gaspillés. Le royaume s'effondre. Cet effondrement est inévitable. Si vous voulez continuer votre travail et votre vie, vous devez m'aider maintenant.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame. Can you aid me in this task?<hpage><page>Hmmm... Well if you head down below to the very base of the docks, there’s an old diving bell built for just what you’re askin’. <page>Thing is, you can ride it, but it takes an operator stood dockside to send it. I might be capable, but I ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling still needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, sir, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，先生，我需要潜入熔岩湖之下。能否请你助我一臂之力？<hpage><page>唔……如果您是往深坞最底层去，那边倒是有口老潜钟专门干这活的。<page>可这玩意儿需要有另一只虫在地面操作才能下水。我虽然会弄，但眼下铲矿石的活儿堆成山，实在没闲工夫管别的啊。<hpage>这王国正在崩塌。你不帮我，就等着一切辛劳付诸东流。若你还想活命，还想每天有活干，就立刻帮我。
translated_text: <hpage>i want to go into the lake of fire. will you help me with this job?<hpage><page>um... Well, when you go to the bottom of the dock, there's an old diving bell made especially for what you want.<page>The problem is, you can ride it, but you need an operator standing by the dock to send it off. I may be able to do it, but I don't have time to do anything else I should do.<hpage>Please help me, or else your efforts will soon be wasted. " The kingdom has collapsed. If you want to continue with your work and your life, you have to help me now.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je veux aller dans le lac de feu. Voulez-vous m'aider avec ce travail ?<hpage><page>Umm... Eh bien, quand vous allez au fond du quai, il y a une vieille cloche de plongée faite spécialement pour ce que vous voulez.<page>Le problème, c'est que vous pouvez le monter, mais vous avez besoin d'un opérateur debout près du quai pour l'envoyer. Je peux le faire, mais je n'ai pas le temps de faire autre chose que je devrais faire.<hpage>S'il vous plaît, aidez-moi, sinon vos efforts seront bientôt perdus.« Le royaume s'est effondré. Si vous voulez continuer votre travail et votre vie, vous devez m'aider maintenant.

translated_text: start a challenge?
secondary_translated_text: Débuter un défi ?

original_en_text: Oi! Who’sat? Whoever’s down there, if you’re feelin’ mad enough to try and travel, best meet me up at the controls, and we can chat.
original_zh_text: 喂！谁在那儿？不管你是谁，如果想要下潜，最好来操控台找我聊聊。
translated_text: Hey! who's sitting? Whoever's down there, if you're angry and want to travel, you'd better wait for me at the console and let me chat.
secondary_translated_text: Hey ! Qui est assis ? Qui que vous soyez là - bas, si vous êtes en colère et que vous voulez voyager, vous feriez mieux de m'attendre à la console et de me laisser discuter.

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still alive! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff, pointy bug.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet, in time near, I will need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure. We shall wish on your continued survival, even if you seem intent on ending it.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！瞧瞧这是谁还生龙活虎的！小尖头虫，你可真是命硬。<page>巴洛支支吾吾地交代了潜钟的意外——打捞起来后，你已经不见了。<page>他以为你被火焰吞噬了，但咱倒隐约觉得不然。<hpage>从底下爬回来确实是个不小的挑战，但很快我又得再下去一趟了。<page>哈！？你这虫子，不是疯到顶了就是勇到没边了！尽管你像在自寻死路，咱还是祝你多活些时日。
translated_text: All right, all right. All right, all right. He's alive! You've proven that you're made up of the most difficult things, Dot Bug.<page>Barlow apologized for the complexity of your diving bell and your absence to retrieve it.<page>He's worried you'll lose to the flames, but we're guessing a little ourselves.<hpage>Getting back from the bottom was the most difficult climb ever, but in the near future, we will have to go down again.<page>You're crazy, Bug! Also very brave. Even if you try to end it, I want you to live on.
secondary_translated_text: Tout va bien, tout va bien. Tout va bien, tout va bien. Il est vif ! Tu as prouvé que tu es faite des choses les plus difficiles, Dot Bug.<page>Barlow s'est excusé pour la complexité de votre cloche de plongée et votre absence pour la récupérer.<page>Il craint que vous perdiez devant les flammes, mais nous devinez un peu nous-mêmes.<hpage>Revenir du bas a été la montée la plus difficile de tous les temps, mais dans un avenir proche, nous devrons redescendre.<page>Tu es fou, Bug ! Très courageux aussi. Même si vous essayez de mettre fin à cela, je veux que vous viviez.

original_en_text: The frolics haven’t ended, my lady! If you’d like to really test yourself, we should play again!<page>Hit the target twenty-five times and you’ll earn yourself a beautiful necklace of rosaries! What say you?
original_zh_text: 游戏还没完全结束，女士！想真正挑战自己一把吗？再来一局如何？<page>击中靶子二十五次，这条精美的念珠项链就是您的！意下如何？
translated_text: The game isn't over yet, miss! If you really want to test yourself, play it again!<page>After hitting the target 25 times, you will get a beautiful Rosario necklace! what did i say?
secondary_translated_text: Le jeu n'est pas encore fini, mademoiselle ! Si vous voulez vraiment vous tester, jouez à nouveau !<page>Après avoir frappé la cible 25 fois, vous obtiendrez un magnifique collier Rosario ! Qu 'est-ce que j'ai dit ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Keep well, Forge Daughter. I shall return if I require your aid.<page>Yes! Or no. Either is fine by us, as long as the craft continues.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，熔炉之女。若是需要帮助，我自会再来。<page>行！不来也行。只要手艺没断，咱都没意见。
translated_text: <hpage>Raising my daughter. If I need your help, I'll come back.<page>yes! yes! No more. As long as this process continues, we are fine.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Élever ma fille. Si j'ai besoin de votre aide, je reviendrai.<page>Oui ! Oui ! pas plus. Tant que ce processus se poursuit, nous allons bien.

original_en_text: Hesitate not, my lady! Take aim and throw true!
original_zh_text: 别犹豫，女士！瞄准了就狠狠地扎过去！
translated_text: Don't hesitate, ladies! Set a target and throw it!
secondary_translated_text: N'hésitez pas mesdames ! Fixez une cible et lancez-la !

original_en_text: If you add the implements from this set to your own, the quality of your crafting will increase. You will produce finer, sharper, and deadlier tools... if that is your wish.
original_zh_text: 若将此套器具与你的工具结合，你的制作水准将更上一层楼。你将打造出更精、更利、更致命的器械……只要你想。
translated_text: When you add this toolset to your own tools, you will improve production quality. It produces thinner, sharper, and more lethal tools. If that's what you want.
secondary_translated_text: Lorsque vous ajoutez ce jeu d'outils à vos propres outils, vous améliorerez la qualité de la production. Il produit des outils plus minces, plus tranchants et plus létaux. Si c'est ce que vous voulez.

original_en_text: Planning to lay a carpet of spikes? These would surely slow your prey. We’d never have considered using such common tools for combat.
original_zh_text: 用布满尖刺的毯子让敌人减速？如此普通的工具还能在战斗中应用，我们可从没想到过。
translated_text: Are you going to hit the nail layer? This will definitely slow down your prey. I never thought I would fight with such a common tool.
secondary_translated_text: Allez-vous frapper la couche d'ongles ? Cela va certainement ralentir votre proie. Je n'aurais jamais pensé que je me battrais avec un outil aussi commun.

original_en_text: Ola, ola, ola! Perhaps I neglected to tell you not to cross past those markers? It’s a law of the game, and we all abide by laws here, don’t we?<page>Your actions have disqualified you, my lady, but we harbour no ill will! Step over here and we can begin a new round at once!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！我可能忘了告诉您别越过那个标记？游戏规矩总得遵守，对吧？<page>您犯规出局，但我们之间绝不会因此产生芥蒂！请移步这边来，我们马上新开一局。
translated_text: Oh, oh, oh! Maybe I forgot to tell you not to go over the sign. These are the rules of the game and we will follow the laws here?<page>Your actions will disqualify you, but I'm not going to hurt you! Once you get here, you can start a new round right away!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, oh, oh ! J'ai peut - être oublié de vous dire de ne pas passer par-dessus le panneau. Ce sont les règles du jeu et nous allons suivre les lois ici ?<page>Vos actions vous disqualifieront, mais je ne vais pas vous blesser ! Une fois que vous arrivez ici, vous pouvez commencer une nouvelle ronde tout de suite !

original_en_text: Ola, ola! That’s it then. Our lady has struck the target fifteen times! A beautiful victory!<page>Hopefully you enjoyed yourself! A little levity is a balm in these troubled times, don’t you think?<hpage>I’d have thought such games best saved for times of peace, but perhaps there is truth in what you say.<hpage>And now that I have bested your challenge, you will produce the prize I have earned?<page>Oh... o-of course! I see you have a tool pouch of your own there. Full to bursting with baubles and trinkets, no doubt!<page>I’ll fit another pocket onto it, so you can carry even more tools and shards with you. A fair prize, wouldn’t you say?
original_zh_text: 哎哎！成了！这位女士成功击中靶子十五次，完美胜出！<page>玩得开心吧？在这病怏怏的世道里找点乐子也算是良药，您说是不是？<hpage>我原以为这类游戏该留在太平年月，但或许你说的也有道理。<hpage>现在我已完成挑战，是否该兑现奖品了？<page>当……当然！我看您自带工具袋，里面准是塞满了各种零碎小玩意！<page>我给您的工具袋上加个新口袋，能多装点工具。这奖品公道吧？
translated_text: Hey! Hey! That's all, our women have achieved their goal 15 times! What a beautiful victory!<page>I hope you have fun! In these difficult times, even a little lightness can be comforting, right?<hpage>I think games like this are better to save for normal times, but probably you're telling the truth.<hpage>Now that I have overcome your challenge, will you take the prize I have won?<page>ah... of course! They have their own equipment. Undoubtedly, lots of little things and trifles!<page>You can put another pocket on top of it to carry more tools and debris. don't you think that's a fair prize?
secondary_translated_text: Hey ! Hey ! C'est tout, nos femmes ont atteint leur objectif 15 fois ! Quelle magnifique victoire !<page>J'espère que vous vous amusez ! En ces temps difficiles, même un peu de légèreté peut être réconfortant, n'est-ce pas ?<hpage>Je pense que les jeux comme celui-ci sont mieux à sauvegarder pour les temps normaux, mais vous dites probablement la vérité.<hpage>Maintenant que j'ai surmonté votre défi, accepteriez-vous le prix que j'ai gagné ?<page>Ah, oui. Bien sûr ! Ils ont leur propre équipement. Sans aucun doute, beaucoup de petites choses et de trivialités !<page>Vous pouvez mettre une autre poche sur le dessus pour transporter plus d'outils et de débris. Vous ne pensez pas que c'est un prix juste ?

original_en_text: Ola, ola! We’ve devised a final challenge for you, my lady, if you’re interested.<page>Hit the target as many times as you can without missing. The more targets you hit, the more rosaries you’ll win from us! Care to try?
original_zh_text: 哎哎！我们给您准备了终极挑战，女士！<page>连续击中靶子次数越多，赢取的念珠越多！敢试试吗？
translated_text: Hey! Hey! If you're interested, there's one last challenge.<page>Don't miss as many goals as you can. The more targets you hit, the more Rosarios you will earn! you want to try?
secondary_translated_text: Hey ! Hey ! Si vous êtes intéressé, il y a un dernier défi.<page>Ne manquez pas autant de buts que vous pouvez. Plus vous atteindrez de cibles, plus vous gagnerez de Rosarios ! Vous voulez essayer ?

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, within an old Weaver nest I discovered a weapon. Though much damaged by age, I believe your skills could see it restored.<page>Ho. An impressive tool that, and a fine challenge. We can reforge the weapon, if the price fits.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我在一处古老织巢中发现了这件武器。虽年代久远损毁严重，但以你们的手艺应该能修复。<page>嚯，好东西！这活儿够意思，只要报酬合适，咱就帮你重铸。
translated_text: <hpage>Blacksmith daughter, I found a weapon in the nest of an ancient weaver. Aging can do great damage, but I believe that your skills can be restored.<page>This is an impressive tool and a great challenge. If the price is good, you can rebuild your weapons.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Fille de forgeron, j'ai trouvé une arme dans le nid d'un ancien tisserant. Le vieillissement peut faire beaucoup de dégâts, mais je crois que vos compétences peuvent être restaurées.<page>C'est un outil impressionnant et un grand défi. Si le prix est bon, vous pouvez reconstruire vos armes.

original_en_text: A fair exchange made, pointy bug. Now our work calls. Return again if you find need of our trade and talent.
original_zh_text: 交易愉快，小尖头虫。眼下我们的活儿还多着呢，有需要再来。
translated_text: Fair exchange, grave error. Now our work is called upon. When you find our trade and human resources needs, please come back.
secondary_translated_text: Échange juste, grave erreur. Maintenant, notre travail est appelé. Lorsque vous trouverez nos besoins en matière de commerce et de ressources humaines, veuillez revenir.

original_en_text: We hope Ballow serves you well, pointy bug. In our long time serving these docks, he’s the finest assistant we’ve found.
original_zh_text: 希望巴洛能帮上忙，小尖头虫。在码头干了这么多年，他是咱见过最得力的助手。
translated_text: We hope Ballow works for you, Spike Bug. He was the best assistant in all his many years of service in these ports.
secondary_translated_text: Nous espérons que Ballow fonctionne pour vous, Spike Bug. Il a été le meilleur assistant de toutes ses nombreuses années de service dans ces ports.

translated_text: rising?
secondary_translated_text: Augmentation ?

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still about, pointy bug! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its first retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet I now need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. By now that task is likely completed.<page>If you are hoping to put his work to the test, then we shall wish again on your survival. And if our own service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！瞧瞧这是谁还生龙活虎的！小尖头虫，你可真是命硬。<page>巴洛支支吾吾地交代了潜钟的意外——打捞起来后，你已经不见了。<page>他以为你已经葬身火海了，但咱倒隐约觉得不然。<hpage>从底下爬回来确实是个不小的挑战，但很快我又得再下去一趟了。<page>哈！？你这虫子，不是疯到顶了就是勇到没边了！<page>听巴洛说，他底下那口老破钟修得差不多了。这会儿多半已经完工。<page>想试试那家伙的成果？那咱还得再一次祝你好运。要是咱这熔炉里的功夫能帮上忙，甭客气，照旧伺候着！
translated_text: All right, all right. All right, all right. There it is, a sharp mistake! You have proven that you are made up of the most difficult things.<page>Barlow spoke shamelessly about the complexity of the diving bell and its absence when you first retrieved it.<page>He's worried you'll lose to the flames, but we're guessing a little ourselves.<hpage>To come back from the bottom was a difficult climb I had never experienced before, but I had to go down again.<page>You're crazy, Bug! Also very brave.<page>After learning that he had received a letter from Barlow, he described the work on repairing the diving clock as follows: This task can now be completed.<page>If you want to try his job, I hope you survive once more. If our unique services help your mission-critical needs, we'll be happy to continue providing them.
secondary_translated_text: Tout va bien, tout va bien. Tout va bien, tout va bien. Et voilà, une grosse erreur ! Vous avez prouvé que vous êtes fait des choses les plus difficiles.<page>Barlow a parlé sans vergogne de la complexité de la cloche de plongée et de son absence lorsque vous l'avez récupérée pour la première fois.<page>Il craint que vous perdiez devant les flammes, mais nous devinez un peu nous-mêmes.<hpage>Revenir du bas était une montée difficile que je n'avais jamais vécue auparavant, mais j'ai dû redescendre.<page>Tu es fou, Bug ! Très courageux aussi.<page>Après avoir appris qu 'il avait reçu une lettre de Barlow, il décrit les travaux de réparation de l'horloge de plongée comme suit : Cette tâche peut maintenant être accomplie.<page>Si vous voulez essayer son travail, j'espère que vous survivrez une fois de plus. Si nos services uniques répondent à vos besoins essentiels, nous serons heureux de continuer à les fournir.

original_en_text: And not a single target was struck... a right shame, that! We can’t reward you with any rosaries, my lady, but we’d love to see you test your aim once more!
original_zh_text: 一次都没中……太可惜啦！我没法给您念珠，女士，但欢迎随时再来试试准头！
translated_text: Not hitting the target. What a pity, that! I can't reward Rosario, but I'm looking forward to trying another goal! "
secondary_translated_text: Ne pas frapper la cible. Quel dommage, ça ! Je ne peux pas récompenser Rosario, mais j'ai hâte d'essayer un autre but ! "

original_en_text: A weapon from a long distant past. We can combine the Weaver components with our own mouldings to repair the tool.
original_zh_text: 远古时期遗留下来的武器。可以将织者的部件与我们自造的铸件结合，修复这件工具。
translated_text: Weapons from the distant past. You can combine the Weaver component with your own mold to repair the tool.
secondary_translated_text: Des armes du passé lointain. Vous pouvez combiner le composant Weaver avec votre propre moule pour réparer l'outil.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, these black quakes that now wrack your lands, I am seeking to see them quelled at their source, below the lakes of flame.<page>You wish to descend so deep, pointy bug?... It is true these docks possess a craft capable.<page>Alas, we ourselves cannot help. Whether Pharloom’s health or fall, our charge ties us to this forge, always.<page>Ballow there’s the bug to ask, and if our fate is as dire as your action suggests, we are sure he is only needing of some quick convincing.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，如今黑灾震动大地，我想深入熔岩湖之底，将其从源头平息。<page> 小尖头虫，你想潜那么深？……码头那边倒是有法子能办到。<page>唉，可惜咱帮不上忙。不管纺络是死是活，咱都得守着这熔炉。<page> 去找码头那边的巴洛吧。若局势真如你所说那般危急，你随便吓唬两句他就会服软。
translated_text: <hpage>These black earthquakes are now destroying your land, and I'm going to watch them settle down from the source, under the lake of fire.<page>do you want to dive into such a deep, sharp insect? These docks have capable spaceships.<page>We are powerless. " Whether pharam is healthy or falling, our responsibility will always bind us to this cradle.<page>I am convinced that Barlow has questions, and that he needs prompt persuasion whether our fate is as terrible as your conduct suggests.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ces tremblements de terre noirs sont maintenant en train de détruire votre terre, et je vais les regarder s'installer de la source, sous le lac de feu.<page>Voulez-vous plonger dans un insecte aussi profond et aigu ? Ces docks possèdent des vaisseaux spatiaux capables<page>Nous sommes impuissants.« Que pharam soit en bonne santé ou en chute, notre responsabilité nous liera toujours à ce berceau.<page>Je suis convaincu que Barlow a des questions, et qu 'il a besoin de persuader rapidement si notre destin est aussi terrible que votre conduite le suggère.

original_en_text: Crafting by claw alone produces inferior results. With this kit, you can craft finer, sharper, and deadlier tools... if that is your wish.
original_zh_text: 单凭你的肢爪，只能造出粗劣的工具。有此匣相助，你便可打造更精、更利、更致命的器械……只要你想。
translated_text: The nails alone do not work well. This kit allows you to create thinner, sharper, and more lethal tools. If that's what you want.
secondary_translated_text: Les ongles seuls ne fonctionnent pas bien. Ce kit vous permet de créer des outils plus minces, plus tranchants et plus létaux. Si c'est ce que vous voulez.

translated_text: Desperate?
secondary_translated_text: Désespérément ?

original_en_text: My lady, you left our game in such a hurry! No doubt some task of great import pulled you away.<page>That’s an instant disqualification, of course. You understand. But we don’t hold it against you, not at all! Care to play again?
original_zh_text: 女士，您离开得很匆忙！肯定是有要事要忙吧。<page>这局只能直接判负，希望您理解。但我们不会计较这种小事！要不要再来一局？
translated_text: You left our game in a hurry! Sure, some important tasks will set you free.<page>Of course, this is an immediate disqualification. I understand, but I have no opinion. Do you want to play again?
secondary_translated_text: Vous avez quitté notre jeu dans la hâte ! Certaines tâches importantes vous libéreront.<page>Il s'agit d'une disqualification immédiate. Je comprends, mais je n'ai pas d'avis. Tu veux jouer à nouveau ?

original_en_text: <hpage>I need a moment, sir. Please unlock the bell that I may exit.<page>Seein’ some sense? Can’t blame ya if you’re thinkin’ on backin’ out. It’s a mad hope that old bell’d even survive the trip.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我还需要一点时间。打开钟门让我出来。<page>总算清醒了？打退堂鼓也不怪你。那破钟能撑到湖底本就是个疯念头。
translated_text: <hpage>You need time, sir. Ring the doorbell and I'll go out.<page>does that mean anything? If you want to leave, I don't blame you. The people were desperately hoping that Old Bell would survive this journey.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Il vous faut du temps, monsieur. Sonne à la porte et je sors.<page>Est-ce que cela signifie quelque chose ? Si tu veux partir, je ne te blâme pas. Les gens espéraient désespérément que la vieille cloche survivrait à ce voyage.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, if you can hear me, there has been an accident during the descent.<hpage>In this broken state, the bell is unfit for travel. Retrieve it if you may, but I shall not return within.<page>...iss...istake...erwhelm...retrie...a...ssible...
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，能听见吗？下潜途中出了点故障。<hpage>钟体已损坏，无法继续下潜。你可试着把它打捞上岸，但我无法乘它返回。<page>……错……错误……过载……无法……打捞……
translated_text: <hpage>If you're listening to me, there was an accident on the descent.<hpage>In this broken state, the bell is not suitable for travel. I'll tell you if I can, but I won't go in anymore.<page>... The ISS... Forever and ever. The search... It is Sible.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Si vous m'écoutez, il y a eu un accident en descente.<hpage>Dans cet état cassé, la cloche n'est pas adaptée au voyage. Je vous le dirai si je peux, mais je n'y entrerai plus.<page>... L'ISS est... pour toujours et toujours. La recherche... Il est sible.

original_en_text: Oh no... no, not at all. Wouldn’t do us any good, would it? No, it seems like this little frolic of ours is well and truly finished.<page>Oh, but what an honour it was to play with you, my lady! I hope you’ll think of us whenever you feel those rosaries rattling around in your pockets.
original_zh_text: 不不……不用。我们玩得起，也输得起。看来我们的游戏需要告一段落了。<page>但与您同乐实乃荣幸！希望您摸着兜里的念珠时能想起我们。
translated_text: ah... Not being completely there is not good for us, is it? Apparently, our little game is over.<page>But it was an honor to play with you! Every time you feel the rattling of the rosary in your pocket, think of us.
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. Ne pas être complètement là n'est pas bon pour nous, n'est-ce pas ? Apparemment, notre petit jeu est terminé.<page>Ce fut un honneur de jouer avec vous ! Chaque fois que vous sentez le chagrin du chapelet dans votre poche, pensez à nous.

original_en_text: Ola! That’s... that’s twenty-five times the target has been struck!<page>My lady... I thought perhaps you’d have a little more trouble with this round, but you’ve emerged victorious again.<page>I’ll have to speak to my associate. I don’t think he provided you with enough of a challenge, truth be told.<hpage>It was challenge enough. My prize, sir?<page>
original_zh_text: 哎！这……命中二十五次了！<page>女士……本以为这局能让您吃点苦头，结果您又赢了。<page>我得找我的伙计谈谈，说实话他给您设的挑战不够难。<hpage>我觉得够难了。那么奖品呢，先生？
translated_text: Hey! It's a... Achieved the goal 25 times!<page>Madam. I thought I might get more trouble in this round, but I won again.<page>You need to talk to your colleagues. To be honest, I don't think he's giving you enough of a challenge.<hpage>That alone is challenging enough. is this my prize?<page>
secondary_translated_text: Hey ! C'est un... A atteint l'objectif 25 fois !<page>Madame. Je pensais que je pourrais avoir plus de problèmes dans ce tour, mais j'ai gagné à nouveau.<page>Vous devez en parler à vos collègues. Pour être honnête, je ne pense pas qu 'il vous donne assez de défi.<hpage>Cela seul est suffisamment difficile. Est-ce mon prix ?<page>

original_en_text: Urk! A prize, of course! My lady must have a prize!<page>Here then... a lovely necklace full with rosaries. I’d been hanging onto this for a while, but you’ve earned it fairly.<page>I just hope you think of me when you wear it, my lady!
original_zh_text: 啊！当然有！必须有！<page>给您……缀满念珠的漂亮项链。我私藏好久了，但您赢得实至名归。<page>希望您佩戴它时能想起我，女士！
translated_text: yeah! The prize of course! Women have a prize!<page>So here you are. It's a lovely necklace full of rosaries. I was there for a while, but you deserve it.<page>I just want you to think about me when you're wearing it.
secondary_translated_text: Ouais ! Le prix bien sûr ! Les femmes ont un prix !<page>Donc, vous êtes ici. C'est un bel collier plein de chapelets. J'y étais depuis un moment, mais tu le mérites.<page>Je veux juste que tu penses à moi quand tu le porteras.

original_en_text: Leave us! My great master needs time to reflect, and I must ponder on flavours anew!
original_zh_text: 快走吧！主人还要好好回味，我也要构思新菜式了！
translated_text: Get away from us! The master needs time to think, but I need to rethink the taste.
secondary_translated_text: Éloignez-vous de nous ! Le maître a besoin de temps pour réfléchir, mais je dois repenser le goût.

original_en_text: Pilgrim who would hold our song within your shell, rise above.<page>Offer your most devout self unto our sacred heart.
original_zh_text: 心怀圣歌的朝圣者，升华吧。<page>将虔信之魂献予圣心。
translated_text: The pilgrims are hiding our songs in your shell.<page>Offer your most godly self to our holy hearts.
secondary_translated_text: Les pèlerins cachent nos chants dans ta coquille.<page>Offrez votre plus pieux moi à nos saints coeurs.

original_en_text: ...ilgrim!... ast aside those many sinful hopes for rest ...d reward... remain pure... within our midst... sk for nothing! <page>See... Citadel’s simple stone, bare an... dorned. See h...ain our garb, how sparse o... meal. Know that... excess is sin!<page>Stay vigil... ys, for tho... wretched pilgrims... dare relen... their base desi... Left unpunish... thin our pure chorus... eir seductive sin... pread like flame...
original_zh_text: ……朝圣者！……抛弃休憩与奖赏的邪念……保持纯洁……在我们中间……无欲无求！<page>看这圣堡素石……无华无饰。看这粗布麻衣……清汤寡水。须知奢侈即罪！<page>保持警惕……因那些堕落朝圣者……放纵卑劣欲望……若不惩戒……污秽将如野火蔓延……
translated_text: ... evil! Give up the evil hope of rest. D Reward. Purely between us. don't ask!<page>Please listen to me. The castle's simple stone is exposed. It is h. I know how sparse our clothing is, and I know how sparse our clothes are. Excess is a sin!<page>Be alert yes, for... The poor pilgrim. Courage to do it again. The basic design. Luckily, he escaped punishment. They show a pure chorus. This is a tempting sin. Spread like a flame.
secondary_translated_text: ... Mauvais ! Abandonnez le mauvais espoir de repos. D récompense. Purement entre nous. Ne demandez pas !<page>S'il vous plaît écoutez-moi. La simple pierre du château est exposée. C'est h. Je sais à quel point nos vêtements sont épars, et je sais à quel point nos vêtements sont épars. L'excès est un péché !<page>Attention oui, car... Le pauvre pèlerin. Courage de le faire à nouveau. le design de base. Heureusement, il a échappé à la punition. Ils présentent un chœur pur. C'est une tentation sans. Se répand comme une flamme.

original_en_text: Accept, a t-t-token of the sentinel’s order.<page>As friends... let us p-part.
original_zh_text: 收下，哨卫信、信物。<page>以友、友人之谊……告别。
translated_text: Symbol of reception, sentinel command.<page>As a friend. Let's divide the p.
secondary_translated_text: Symbole de réception, commandement sentinelle.<page>Comme un ami. Divisons donc le p.

original_en_text: <hpage>I would view your collection, Vaultkeeper.<page>She may see it. A perfect set. This Vaultkeeper is rich with insights. Jealous its fellows would be... If still their minds remained.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我要看看你的收藏，管理员。<page>可以。看这完美收藏。羡慕死其他管理员……如果它们还有脑子的话。
translated_text: <hpage>I'll check your collection, Treasurer.<page>She's the perfect scene you might see. Financial managers have insight. I am jealous of my partner. If the heart is still there.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je vais vérifier votre collection, trésorier.<page>C'est la scène parfaite que vous pourriez voir. Les gestionnaires financiers ont une vision. Je suis jalouse de mon partenaire. Si le cœur est toujours là.

original_en_text: Aaaahh. What’s this? The rasher of a courier, tied up tight! I can see its fat still dripping fresh!
original_zh_text: 送货虫的熏肉！瞧瞧这油脂，还在滴汁呢！
translated_text: ah! what is this? The courier rusher, firm! You can see the fresh fat is dripping out!
secondary_translated_text: Ah ! Qu 'est-ce que c'est ? Le courrier rusher, ferme ! Vous pouvez voir la graisse fraîche goutte à goutte !

original_en_text: This stew, of Mossberries stirred thick. Good. Good! It shall form the base once set in mould.
original_zh_text: 德鲁伊的苔莓浓汤，够稠，够味！冻成型就能当基底。
translated_text: Cook with the cranberries and stir until thick. All right, all right. okay! Once you put it in the mold, it becomes a base.
secondary_translated_text: Cuire avec les canneberges et remuer jusqu'à épais. Tout va bien, tout va bien. OK ! Une fois que vous le mettez dans le moule, il devient une base.

original_en_text: Ahh... you have brought song again, though perhaps it is wasted on one as unworthy as I.<hpage>You needn’t satisfy my curiosity if it pains you, sir, but I must ask, for what crime or sin did the Citadel imprison you?<page>My sin? A grave transgression, the cause of much pain for many. But to speak of a sin... is to invite its return. I will say no more.
original_zh_text: 啊……你又带来歌声，可惜我这罪躯不配聆听。<hpage>若勾起你伤痛可以不答，但我必须问：圣堡因何罪囚禁你？<page>我的罪过？我犯的错带来了许多伤痛。但罪过……是请它归来。我不想多说。
translated_text: ah... It may be useless for a human being like me, but it brings in a song again.<hpage>If you're suffering, you don't have to satisfy my curiosity, but I have to ask. what is the crime or guilt that the castle imprisoned you for?<page>my sin? This is a serious violation and has caused great suffering to many people. But when we talk about sin. It's about recalling it, saying nothing more.
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. C'est peut - être inutile pour un être humain comme moi, mais cela fait revenir une chanson.<hpage>Si vous souffrez, vous n'avez pas à satisfaire ma curiosité, mais je dois demander. Quel est le crime ou la culpabilité pour laquelle le château vous a emprisonné ?<page>Mon sin ? Il s'agit d'une grave violation qui a causé de grandes souffrances à de nombreuses personnes. Mais quand on parle de non. Il s'agit de le rappeler, de ne rien dire d'autre.

translated_text: What is Hymn?
secondary_translated_text: Qu ' est-ce que Hymn ?

original_en_text: By the purity of your will... the c-c-clarity of your intent... you are innocent of the silken curse.<page>Failed, has this sentinel. Your j-judgment, will it accept.<hpage>Is this truly failure, gilded one? You meant to test me and have done so. I would expect nothing less of a true guardian.<hpage>The matter is resolved. There is no need for death. Stand, and let us part as friends.
original_zh_text: 凭纯、纯粹意志……清明本心……你未受魂丝侵蚀。<page>哨卫失、失职。甘受裁、裁决。<hpage>真有失职吗？你完成了测试，我认为已经尽了守卫之职。<hpage>此事到此为止，无需生死相搏。起身吧，你我以友相别。
translated_text: The purity of your will. Your intentions are clear. You are the curse of innocent silk.<page>You failed, this guard. Do you accept J's judgment?<hpage>Gold medalist, is this really a failure? You wanted to try me and you've already done it. Our expectations for the true guardians do not wane.<hpage>The problem is solved and you don't have to die. Let's stand up and part like friends.
secondary_translated_text: La pureté de votre volonté. Tes intentions sont claires. Tu es la malédiction de la soie innocente.<page>Vous avez échoué, cette garde. Acceptez-vous le jugement de J ?<hpage>Médaille d'or, est-ce vraiment un échec ? Vous avez voulu me tester et vous l'avez déjà fait. Nos attentes pour les vrais gardiens ne diminuent pas.<hpage>Le problème est résolu et vous n'avez pas à mourir. Levez-vous et partons comme des amis.

original_en_text: Seek out a Pickled Muckmaggot, the sacred treat revered and reviled for its intensity. It was a specialty of the chef Lugoli, long ago banished for culinary sacrilege.<page>Rumours sing that the great chef retreated to their home-caves in the dank midlands below...
original_zh_text: 找一份腌淤秽蛆。那是被放逐的卢戈利大厨的招牌菜。<page>听说那混蛋躲到中部地区的潮湿洞穴了……
translated_text: Look for the kimchi worm, a sacred delicacy that is revered and condemned for its strength. It is a masterpiece of chef Lugolish, which was discontinued a long time ago because of poor cooking.<page>Rumor has it that the great cook has retreated to the damp central cave of his hometown.
secondary_translated_text: Recherchez le ver kimchi, une délicatesse sacrée qui est vénérée et condamnée pour sa force. C'est un chef-d'œuvre du chef Lugolish, qui a été arrêté il y a longtemps à cause de la mauvaise cuisine.<page>La rumeur raconte que le grand cuisinier s'est retiré dans la grotte centrale humide de sa ville natale.

original_en_text: <hpage>With this I have fulfilled my promise, sir. The ingredients have all been delivered. I trust now the meal can be made, and the oil awarded for my efforts?<page>You’ll have your oil, whelp! Firstly learn some patience! The dish must be prepared perfectly, enough to rouse my master and see them sated. <page>Now! Permit me to work my skill, and you’ll stand to see a meal of scent and taste that would dazzle Pharloom in her prime!
original_zh_text: <hpage>现在食材已备齐，该给我油了吧？<page>你这小虫急什么！得先把菜做得完美才能唤醒主人。<page>在这好好看着！见证这飘香万里的盛宴是怎么诞生的！
translated_text: <hpage>I have kept my promise. All the food was delivered. I think I can cook now. Will the oil pay off my efforts?<page>You'll get the oil, boy! First, learn to be patient! This dish must be perfectly prepared enough to wake up my host and watch him get full. "<page>now! Please let me show my skills. Check out the food that charmed Farum in its heyday!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'ai tenu ma promesse. Toute la nourriture était livrée. Je sais cuisiner maintenant. Le pétrole va-t - il payer mes efforts ?<page>Tu auras l'huile, mon garçon ! Tout d'abord, apprenez à être patient ! Ce plat doit être parfaitement préparé suffisamment pour réveiller mon hôte et le regarder se rassasier. "<page>Maintenant ! Permettez-moi de montrer mes compétences. Découvrez la nourriture qui a charmé Farum à son apogée !

original_en_text: Hrm? Oh, ‘tis merely the livid red bug. I was expecting some word from those above to explain the meaning of all this rumbling and shaking.<page>They fail in their holy duties! My master must be shielded from such inconveniences, else their digestion be disrupted.<hpage>There are worse fates than indigestion, sir. You are fortunate to be unharmed.<page>Fortune has nothing to do with it. I am simply of a hardier breed than the insipid young servants of these recent, wretched times!
original_zh_text: 嗯？是你这红衣虫啊，我还以为上面有虫来解释地震是怎么回事呢。<page>上面那帮渎职的家伙！惊扰主人的消化谁担待得起！<hpage>比起消化不良，你该庆幸自己没有受伤。<page>跟运气可没什么关系，我这把老骨头比现在那些软脚虾仆从硬朗多了！
translated_text: what? what? Oh, that's just a red bug. I would like the above person to say something to explain the meaning of all this roaring and shaking.<page>They have failed to fulfill their sacred duty. My masters must avoid these inconveniences, and I will not let them go. "<hpage>I'm glad I didn't get injured, because I've got a worse fate than indigestion.<page>It has nothing to do with destiny. I am but a stronger breed than the dull young servant of the recent miserable times!
secondary_translated_text: Quoi ? Quoi ? C'est juste un bug rouge. J'aimerais que la personne ci-dessus dise quelque chose pour expliquer la signification de tout ce rugissement et de ces tremblements.<page>Ils n'ont pas accompli leur devoir sacré. Mes maîtres doivent éviter ces inconvénients, et je ne les laisserai pas aller. "<hpage>Je suis heureux de ne pas être blessé, parce que j'ai un sort pire que l'indigestion.<page>Cela n'a rien à voir avec le destin. Je ne suis qu ' une race plus forte que le jeune serviteur ennuyeux des derniers temps misérables !

original_en_text: Rkkt! I know she has it. Keeps it. Carried coveted in her cloth. This one searched for it. Give it! Give it to us!
original_zh_text: 咔！我知道她藏着。揣在披风里。本管理员找了好久。交出来！立刻交出来！
translated_text: RKKT! She did that, she said. He was always hiding in his clothes. i watched it. come on! come on over here!
secondary_translated_text: RKKT ! Elle l'a fait, a-t - elle dit. Il se cachait toujours sous ses vêtements. Je l'ai regardé, viens ! Venez ici !

original_en_text: Divine music... The soul of Pharloom eternal laid bare... That our cursed age could still receive such blessing...<page>So, Weaver-spawn, our melody is yours now, held in mind to carry beyond our walls. Was the learning worth its thieving? <hpage>It was, Vaultkeeper. And know to me your service continues. Keep the cylinder safe, along with any others I may bring.
original_zh_text: 神圣旋律……纺络永恒之魂的具现……这黑暗时代竟能重现荣光……<page>织者坏种，圣歌归你了，带出圣堡吧。这番追寻值得吗？<hpage>值得，而你将继续为我效命。保管好音筒，包括我以后带回来的。
translated_text: Sacred music. The eternal soul of the pharaoh has been exposed... In this accursed age, we can still receive such blessings.<page>So, descendants of Weaver, our melody is now yours. Don't forget to remove it from our walls. Is learning worth stealing?<hpage>Yes, the Treasury Department. Please let us know that your service will continue. Make sure that the cylinder and the other cylinder I bring are safe.
secondary_translated_text: Musique sacrée. L'âme éternelle du pharaon a été exposée... En ce temps maudit, nous pouvons encore recevoir de telles bénédictions.<page>Ainsi, descendants de Weaver, notre mélodie est maintenant la vôtre. N'oubliez pas de le retirer de nos murs. L'apprentissage vaut-il le vol ?<hpage>Oui, le ministère du Trésor. Veuillez nous faire savoir que votre service continuera. Assurez-vous que le cylindre et l'autre cylindre que j'apporte sont en sécurité.

original_en_text: ...Dear... grim... Dark it seems now... et these word... become your guide...<page>Hear our voice... Let it... your own! Give... of yourself... for great Pharloom, for... first-children who bequeath it to us... for our salva... sure to come!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的……朝圣者……黑暗笼罩时……谨记这些箴言……<page>倾听吾声……化为己念！为纺络献身……为赐予我们一切的初代子嗣……为即将到来的……救赎！
translated_text: ... dear ones... Seriously, now you can make that look black. Be your guide.<page>Listen to us and let go of your own! Delivered... About your own. Leave it for our first child, Salva, for the great Pharaoh. " Please come here!
secondary_translated_text: ... Chers... Sérieusement, maintenant vous pouvez faire cela paraître noir. Soyez votre guide.<page>Écoutez-nous et laissez tomber le vôtre ! Livré...À propos de votre propre. Laissez-le à notre premier enfant, Salva, pour le grand Pharaon.« S'il vous plaît, venez ici !

original_en_text: For a sweet simmer, find me some Vintage Nectar. A rare brew, treasured by bugs with a keen scent for excellence.<page>There’s slim chance such an old yield might still exist. Alas! Its depth of flavour is a necessity for the holy dish!
original_zh_text: 甜味得用陈年蜜露，嗅觉敏锐的老饕才懂欣赏。<page>这陈酿怕是失传了……唉！可圣宴缺不得这醇香！
translated_text: If you want a sweet stew, find a retro honeydew. A rare beer cherished by delicate insects and pursuing excellence.<page>There is little chance that this old return still exists. oh! oh! Its depth of taste is a must for sacred cuisine!
secondary_translated_text: Si vous voulez un ragoût sucré, trouvez un miel rétro. Une bière rare chérie par les insectes délicats et à la recherche de l'excellence.<page>Il y a peu de chances que ce retour ancien existe encore. Ooh ! Ooh ! Sa profondeur de goût est incontournable pour la cuisine sacrée !

original_en_text: Hark! ...ilgrim! You... climb... our eternal embrace... who stand stru... the threshold... our stark Citadel of stone... kno... true service may now commence.<page>Forget... your weary shell. Forgo... urge to still... arloom commands... give... greatest gift! Join our chor... Raise... shell... voice... and sing!
original_zh_text: 哈！……朝圣者！……你已攀至……永恒怀抱……立于圣堡石阶……须知……真正侍奉现在开始。<page>忘却……疲惫躯壳……摒弃……休憩之欲……纺络……命你……献上……最珍贵礼物！加入合唱……抬起躯壳……放声高歌！
translated_text: listen to me! evil! You are a... Climbing into an eternal embrace. who's standing up? To a desolate stone castle. The real service begins.<page>I forgot to... A tired body. Give up and the impulse remains. Arloom Command delivers... The best gift! Please join the chorus. Improvement of shell. The voice is... sing!
secondary_translated_text: Écoute-moi ! Mauvais ! Vous êtes un... Monter dans une éternelle étreinte. Qui se lève ? Dans un château de pierre désolé. Le vrai service commence.<page>J'ai oublié de... Un corps fatigué. Abandonnez et l'impulsion reste. Le commandement Arloom délivre... Le meilleur cadeau ! Joignez-vous au chœur. Amélioration de la shell. La voix est... Chantez !

original_en_text: For the core of the meal, find that marvellous meat... The rasher of a courier, those spritely bugs who once arrived at the toll of every second bell.<page>I saw many a courier gorge upon this fatty snack. Where are they all? Have they abandoned their holy toil?
original_zh_text: 主菜要送货虫的熏肉，那群按点报时的家伙最爱吃。<page>往日时常能在这看见他们，如今连个虫影都没了！
translated_text: At the center of the meal are the lively insects that come every time the bell rings, finding delicious meat, courier trash.<page>I saw a lot of couriers eating greasy snacks. where's everyone? Have they given up on their sacred efforts?
secondary_translated_text: Au centre du repas se trouvent les insectes vifs qui viennent chaque fois que la cloche sonne, trouvant de la viande délicieuse, des ordures de courrier.<page>J'ai vu beaucoup de courriers manger des collations gras. Où est tout le monde ? Ont-ils renoncé à leurs efforts sacrés ?

original_en_text: The master has a mighty endurance, yet all of this rumbling and breaking makes me fearful for their safety.<page>Fear not. I will stay by their side until my old shell crumbles away.
original_zh_text: 虽说主人铜肠铁胃，但这动静也太吓人了。<page>不过不用怕，我就算拼了命也会保护主人！
translated_text: The masters have a strong stamina, but the rumbling and broken sound makes them worry about their safety.<page>Don't worry, I'll stay with them until my old shell breaks.
secondary_translated_text: Les maîtres ont une forte endurance, mais le ronronnement et le bruit cassé les font s'inquiéter de leur sécurité.<page>Ne vous inquiétez pas, je vais rester avec eux jusqu'à ce que ma vieille coquille se casse.

original_en_text: Eggy, eggy, hee hee! I’ll eat a lot, grow big and fat. Then I’ll lay a lot of eggies!<page>They bring me plenty of food, so they must want plenty of eggies.<page>And plenty they shall have, if they’re nice to me! Hee hee!
original_zh_text: 蛋蛋，生蛋蛋！吃饱饱，长胖胖，就能下好多蛋蛋！<page>他们给我这么多吃的，肯定想要好多蛋蛋！<page>只要对我好，要多少有多少！嘻嘻！
translated_text: Eggs, eggs, Hey! I eat a lot, and I am big and fat. I 'll try to add lots of eggs!<page>I wanted eggs because they brought me lots of food.<page>If you'd be kind to me, there would be plenty! what?!
secondary_translated_text: Les œufs, les œufs, hey ! Je mange beaucoup, je suis gros et gros. Je vais essayer d'ajouter beaucoup d'œufs !<page>Je voulais des œufs parce qu 'ils m'apportaient beaucoup de nourriture.<page>Si tu étais gentil avec moi, il y en aurait beaucoup ! Quoi ? !

original_en_text: <hpage>I had thought I was answering your summons as a friend, or at least an ally, but now that we stand together in this place I can sense your intent.<hpage>You mean to raise your blades against me. Am I your enemy, then?<page>D-defence of the sacred Citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is the eternal duty of the sentinels.<page>Termination, is the n-n-necessary fate of all those enthralled by the whispering Silk.<hpage>You believe me haunted, a slave to the pale threads? I think you are more perceptive than that. My Silk is my own, as is my will.<page>Unsure, is this sentinel. B-both haunted and innocent, you seem. With regret, this sentinel must t-t-test the strength of your will.
original_zh_text: <hpage>原以为响应的是友军召唤，但此刻感知到你的意图。<hpage>你要兵刃相向？视我为敌？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护其中圣、圣音……哨卫永恒之职。<page>清、清除所有被魂丝蛊惑者……是必要使命。<hpage>你认为我被苍白丝线操控？恐怕你错了，我的灵丝与意志皆属于我。<page>判、判断存疑。你似被侵蚀又似清白。遗憾……哨卫必须测、测试你的意志。
translated_text: <hpage>I thought I had answered your call as a friend, or at least as an ally, but standing here now, I can feel your intentions.<hpage>you want to stick a knife at me. am i your enemy?<page>It is the eternal duty of the sentry to guard the sacred castle and to satisfy the sound within it.<page>The end is the inevitable fate of all those who are captivated by the silk of the whisper.<hpage>you think i'm a ghost? a white silk slave? I think you have more insight than that. My silk is mine, and it is my will.<page>I don't know, this is a security guard. You look ghostly and innocent. Unfortunately, this sentinel needs to test your willpower.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je croyais avoir répondu à votre appel comme un ami, ou du moins comme un allié, mais debout ici maintenant, je peux sentir vos intentions.<hpage>Tu veux me coller un couteau, suis-je ton ennemi ?<page>C'est le devoir éternel de la sentinelle de garder le château sacré et de satisfaire le son qui s'y trouve.<page>La fin est le destin inévitable de tous ceux qui sont captivés par la soie du murmure.<hpage>Tu crois que je suis un fantôme ? Un esclave de soie blanc ? Je pense que vous avez plus d'intelligence que cela. Ma soie est à moi, et c'est ma volonté.<page>Je ne sais pas, c'est un garde de sécurité. Vous avez l'air fantômatique et innocent. Malheureusement, cette sentinelle a besoin de tester votre volonté.

original_en_text: An ornate lock mechanism with a keyhole at its centre.
translated_text: A gorgeous locking mechanism with a keyhole in the center.
secondary_translated_text: Un magnifique mécanisme de verrouillage avec un trou de serrure au centre.

original_en_text: The nectar! To think, such an aged extract still exists! What an exquisite tragedy that I cannot taste it myself. My master must have every drop!
original_zh_text: 陈年蜜露！没想到真的还存在，这等陈酿我都没福品尝，全都得给主人留着！
translated_text: Mana! Imagine if such an old thing still exists! It's a beautiful tragedy, and I can't taste my own. My master will get every drop!
secondary_translated_text: Mana ! Imaginez si une chose aussi ancienne existe encore ! C'est une belle tragédie, et je ne peux pas goûter la mienne. Mon maître va prendre chaque goutte !

original_en_text: Yes! Yes! She gives... It is ours! <hpage>I have passed the relic, Vaultkeeper. Now uphold your promise and aid me with your insight.<page>Fool! Demanding of a Vaultkeeper. Hers is impudence enough to bring death... If she did not carry the scent of Weaver-spawn.<hpage>So you know something of my ancestry, learned bug. If it gains me favour here, then I’ll expect your service in full.<page>Bleg! Dead! Dead, your vicious kind are meant to be. Better methinks to stay as such... <page>Gkkkt. But this one was taught. It shall fold its claws. It shall pass its knowledge, as much as is gleaned.<page>Only to a first child must a Vaultkeeper defer.
original_zh_text: 好！好！她交出了……归我们了！<hpage>遗物给你了，管理员。该兑现承诺了。<page>蠢货！竟敢命令本管理员。这般傲慢本该处死……若不是你带着织者的味道。<hpage>看来你知晓我的血脉，学者虫。若此地以我血脉为尊，我要求你为我效劳。<page>哼！早该灭绝的坏种……还是死干净为好……<page>咳，但本虫受过训诫。它会收起利爪，会分享知识，尽其所能。<page>唯有初代子嗣，能让本管理员低头。
translated_text: yes! yes! yes! yes! She gave it to me. It's ours!<hpage>I walked through the ruins. Now, keep your promise and help me with your insight.<page>You bastard! Appeal to the Treasury Manager Her awkwardness was enough to bring death - if she had not carried the smell of the Weaver's eggs.<hpage>We know the mistakes our ancestors learned. If you find my preference here, I look forward to your full service.<page>break! he's dead! Your evil companion is doomed to die. I think it's best to keep this state.<page>Gkkt. That's what we were taught. Folding your nails. Disseminate as much of the knowledge you have gathered as possible.<page>The treasurer only obeys the first child.
secondary_translated_text: Oui ! Oui ! Oui ! Oui ! Elle me l'a donné, c'est à nous !<hpage>Je marchais à travers les ruines. Maintenant, tiens ta promesse et aide-moi avec ta vision.<page>Putain de bâtard ! Appel au directeur du trésor Sa maladresse suffisait à amener la mort - si elle n'avait pas porté l'odeur des œufs du tisser.<hpage>Nous connaissons les erreurs que nos ancêtres ont faites. Si vous trouvez ma préférence ici, j'attends avec impatience votre service complet.<page>break ! il est mort ! Votre compagnon méchant est condamné à mourir. Je pense qu ' il vaut mieux garder cet état.<page>gkkt. C'est ce qu ' on nous a appris. Pliez vos ongles. Diffusez autant que possible les connaissances que vous avez recueillies.<page>Le trésorier n'obéit que au premier enfant.

original_en_text: Oh drab and trembling squib, you who timidly step upon the Great Stage, fate has seen you chosen!<page>Cast away your fear and join me as my partner. Pharloom’s flame may flicker, but together we shall spark it ablaze!<page>Let us enliven this Citadel lost to silence! Let us rouse the soul of this once great land!
original_zh_text: 怯懦的可怜虫啊，既踏上伟大舞台，便是命运所选！<page>抛却恐惧，与我共演！重燃纺络将熄的火焰！<page>唤醒沉寂的圣堡！唤醒这片土地的魂魄！
translated_text: O monotonous and trembling pant, cowards of the great stage, fate has seen you chosen!<page>Let go of your fear and be my companion. The fire of the fallout may shine, but let's light it together!<page>Let's recreate the quiet castle! Let us awaken the soul of this great nation!
secondary_translated_text: Ô pantalon monotone et tremblant, lâches de la grande scène, le destin vous a vu choisis !<page>Laisse tomber ta peur et sois mon compagnon. Le feu de la retombée peut briller, mais allumons-le ensemble !<page>Recréons le château calme ! Réveillons l'âme de cette grande nation !

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I am seeking a melody held by your vaults, part of a set to open a path above. Tell me what you know of it.<page>The Weaver-thing would claim our sacred melody?! How grim the age we survive to see... Vile sacrilege for it to pass to an outsider...<page>Only our pontiff, lived long and low within our vault, they held the melody, jealously, covetously... A learning for the highest Vaultkeeper, and them alone.<page>A truth they were told to have found... There in the dark. Something within the melody, or the words. Something to set them silent... <hpage>I am not afraid of what I’ll hear, Vaultkeeper. If your pontiff and their melody wait below, I shall find them both.
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我在寻找书库的旋律，用于开启上层通路。把你知道的告诉我。<page>织者竟想染指圣歌？！……何等黑暗的时代……异乡客妄图窃取圣律……<page>唯有深居书库之底的主教知晓……最高机密，独享的学识……<page>据说他们在地底发现了什么……旋律或歌词中的真相……令其沉默的真相……<hpage>我不惧真相，管理员。若你的主教在底下等着，我会找到他们。
translated_text: <hpage>Treasurer, I am looking for a melody to be carried to your vault as part of the open road above. Tell me how much you know. "<page>Weaver, is there anything that takes away your sacred melody? What a harsh time we live in, what a despicable disgrace it would be to hand it over to outsiders.<page>Only the Pope, who lived a long and humble life in our tombs, has grasped the melody with wickedness and greed. This is about top financial managers and their learning.<page>They were told that they had discovered the truth. Something in the melody, or words in the darkness. Something to keep them quiet.<hpage>I'm not afraid of what to hear, Treasury. If your pope and his melody are waiting below, I will find them. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Trésorier, je cherche une mélodie à transporter dans votre coffre-fort dans le cadre de la route ouverte d'en haut. Dites-moi combien vous en savez. "<page>Weaver, y a-t - il quelque chose qui enlève ta mélodie sacrée ? Quelle époque dure nous vivons, quelle honte méprisable ce serait de la remettre à des étrangers.<page>Seul le Pape, qui a vécu une vie longue et humble dans nos tombes, a saisi la mélodie avec la méchanceté et la cupidité. Il s'agit des meilleurs gestionnaires financiers et de leur apprentissage.<page>On leur a dit qu 'ils avaient découvert la vérité. Quelque chose dans la mélodie, ou des mots dans l'obscurité. Quelque chose pour les garder silencieux.<hpage>Je n'ai pas peur de ce qu 'il faut entendre, Trésor. Si votre pape et sa mélodie attendent en bas, je les trouverai. "

original_en_text: Yes! A fair gift, Weaver-spawn. This Vaultkeeper shall glean what knowledge a great mind can.
original_zh_text: 好！公平交易，织者坏种。本管理员将用智慧解析其中奥义。
translated_text: yes! yes! Nice gift, descendant of Weaver. Finance professionals gather the knowledge that enables them to master great ideas.
secondary_translated_text: Oui ! Oui ! Très beau cadeau, descendant de Weaver. Les professionnels de la finance rassemblent les connaissances qui leur permettent de maîtriser de grandes idées.

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall guide.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等引领。
translated_text: Even when it's over, the song is still flowing.<page>For the sake of an eternal fal, we lead.
secondary_translated_text: Même quand elle est terminée, la chanson continue de couler.<page>Pour le bien d'un faux éternel, nous conduisons.

original_en_text: Grkkt. What has she brought it? More treasures waiting on a Keeper’s insight, yes? The sacred cylinders of our holy Citadel? Pass them. Give them. Now! She must!
original_zh_text: 咔！她带了什么？更多需要解读的圣物？圣堡的圣咏音筒？快交出来！必须立刻交出来！
translated_text: Gruk. what did you bring with you? there are many treasures waiting for the guardian's insight, right? the sacred castle vault? Give to them beyond them. now! She should! "
secondary_translated_text: Gruk. Qu ' avez-vous apporté avec vous ? Il y a beaucoup de trésors qui attendent l'intuition du gardien, n'est-ce pas ? Le château sacré vault ? Donnez-les au-delà d'eux. Maintenant ! Elle devrait ! "

translated_text: <hpage>I'm here, Goldman.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je suis là, Goldman.

original_en_text: Eternal, is the Citadel. Et-t-ternal, is the devotion of the sentinels.<page>While its shell is f-f-functional, this sentinel will hold true to its duty.
original_zh_text: 圣堡永存，哨、哨卫的忠诚也永存。<page>只要机能尚存……职责不怠。
translated_text: The castle is eternal. Et-t -ternal is the loyalty of the sentinels.<page>Despite a fully functioning shell, the Sentinel faithfully performs its mission.
secondary_translated_text: Le Château est éternel. Et-t -ternal est la loyauté des sentinelles. »<page>Malgré une coquille entièrement fonctionnelle, le Sentinel accomplit fidèlement sa mission.

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, you rare chosen who hath ascended to this final threshold, listen to our wish, deliver it, that you may rise above and see your pilgrimage end.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，荣登终阶的稀世天选。聆听我等祈愿，实现我等祈愿。方可升华，得见朝圣终焉。
translated_text: Your rare choice, the eternal pilgrim of Firm, has reached this last entrance, has listened to our wish, has fulfilled it, and has allowed you to transcend and see the end of your pilgrimage journey.
secondary_translated_text: Votre rare choix, l'éternel pèlerin de Firme, est arrivé à cette dernière entrée, a écouté notre vœu, l'a accompli et vous a permis de transcender et de voir la fin de votre pèlerinage.

original_en_text: Interloper! On you, our pontiff’s sacred melody! You have found it, hold it, and now you dally, lost like a mite in our shelves!<page>Return to the listening room below! The sacred cylinder can be played, and the melody of our vaults heard at last in this damned age stretched long.
original_zh_text: 入侵者！你已经找到主教圣歌，却还在此游荡！<page>回下层聆听室去！圣音筒可以演奏了，圣歌终将在此黑暗时代重现！
translated_text: Intruder! You, the sacred melody of our Pope! You found it and had it, but now you wander over our shelves, lost your way like a tick!<page>Back to the listening room below. The sacred column was played, and in this accursed age, the melody of our vaults was finally heard.
secondary_translated_text: Intrus ! Toi, mélodie sacrée de notre pape ! Vous l'avez trouvé et vous l'avez, mais maintenant vous errez sur nos étagères, vous vous êtes perdu comme une tique !<page>Retour à la salle d'écoute ci-dessous. On jouait de la colonne sacrée, et en ce temps maudit, on entend enfin la mélodie de nos voûtes.

original_en_text: Taste, smell, texture... It is done! A meal to rival Pharloom’s finest.<page>Mighty master, how long you have waited to set your jaw upon so perfect a dish! Join us, and dine!
original_zh_text: 色、香、味……俱全！纺络的绝世盛宴！<page>我的主人，让您久等了！快醒醒，开饭啦！
translated_text: The taste, smell and fabric are complete! This meal is comparable to the best meal in pharam.<page>Master, how long have you waited to eat such a delicious dish? Have dinner together!
secondary_translated_text: Le goût, l'odeur et le tissu sont complets ! Ce repas est comparable au meilleur repas de pharam.<page>Maître, depuis combien avez-vous attendu pour manger un plat aussi délicieux ? dîner ensemble !

original_en_text: Yummy, yummy... oh! Are you here to serve me?<hpage>I am merely a visitor here, little one. Have you made this place your home, then?<page>My home? Oh yes! Lovely and warm. The big ones, they bring me food whenever I’m hungry. And I’m hungry now!
original_zh_text: 饿饿……咦？你是来喂我的吗？<hpage>我只是路过，小家伙。你把这当作巢穴了？<page>巢穴？对呀！又暖又舒服。大个子们总给我带吃的！现在就好饿！
translated_text: Delicious, tasty. oh! are you here to serve me?<hpage>I'm just a visitor, little man. do you think this is home?<page>my home? Oh, yes! Cute and warm. He sent me food when I was hungry. I was hungry!
secondary_translated_text: Délicieux, savoureux. Ooh ! Es-tu là pour me servir ?<hpage>Je ne suis qu 'un visiteur, petit homme, tu crois que c'est la maison ?<page>ma maison ? Oh oui ! C'est mignon et chaud. Il m'a envoyé de la nourriture quand j'avais faim. J'avais faim !

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more pressing tasks, sir. Perhaps your master should content themself with a humbler meal?<page>Blasphemy! My master shall have the holy indulgence they deserve, even if I must douse my shell in oil and climb onto a dish myself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我有要事在身，让你主人先将就吃点吧？<page>放肆！就算把我榨成油膏摆上桌，也要让主人享用圣宴！
translated_text: <hpage>I have a more urgent task to do. " Do you want your host to eat a simple meal?<page>blasphemy! Even if I had to dip my shells in oil and climb up to a dish, my masters deserve the divine forgiveness they deserve.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'ai une tâche plus urgente à accomplir. "Voulez-vous que votre hôte mange un repas simple ?<page>Blasphème ! Même si je devais tremper mes coquilles dans de l'huile et monter vers un plat, mes maîtres méritent le pardon divin qu ' ils méritent.

original_en_text: To season a meal such as this... only a Crustnut will do. Once, scores of them could be gathered, high atop those coral crusted caves beyond the Grand Gate.<page>Surely some must still grow within that sand-ravaged land?
original_zh_text: 调味……一定得用硬壳果。珊瑚川里以前满地都是，现在就算只剩沙堆，应该也能刨到几颗。
translated_text: The taste of such dishes. Only nuts with shells are produced. Once upon a time, dozens of birds gathered at the top of a coral-covered cave.<page>Will they grow on sand-covered land?
secondary_translated_text: Le goût de ces plats. Seules les noix avec des coquilles sont produites. Il était une fois, des dizaines d'oiseaux se rassemblaient au sommet d'une grotte recouverte de corail.<page>Est-ce qu 'ils poussent sur des terres couvertes de sable ?

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall teach.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等教化。
translated_text: Even when it's over, the song is still flowing.<page>For the sake of eternal followers, we teach.
secondary_translated_text: Même quand elle est terminée, la chanson continue de couler.<page>Pour le bien des disciples éternels, nous enseignons.

original_en_text: We would hear the voice of the Keepers, within their grand vaults.<page>They who guard our history, our prayers and our secrets, across the ages.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻典藏司铎之音，回荡宏伟书库。<page>他们守护历史、祷文与秘辛，跨越无尽纪元。
translated_text: You will hear the voice of the Guardian in their magnificent vaults.<page>They guard our history, our prayers, and our timeless secrets.
secondary_translated_text: Vous entendrez la voix du Gardien dans leurs magnifiques voûtes.<page>Ils gardent notre histoire, nos prières et nos secrets intemporels.

original_en_text: Pickled Muckmaggot! So that banished chef’s recipes outlived them after all!<hpage>Not so, sir. I claimed the maggot from the chef themself. Their brutish work continued, even with their shell claimed by cursed thread.<page>Incredible! A bug so devout, they could cook with mind expunged. This Citadel was far too hasty to expel such brilliance.
original_zh_text: 腌淤秽蛆！卢戈利的秘方居然没失传！<hpage>我从他本人手里抢的，那家伙变丝傀了还在做菜。<page>厉害！没脑子还能掌勺，圣堡当初就不该赶他走！
translated_text: kimchi worm! That's why the Refugee Chef's recipes last longer than those!<hpage>It's not true. I snatched the worm from the cook. Their barbaric work continues even when the shells are covered with cursed threads.<page>This is unbelievable! With such a devout insect, they can cook without thinking about anything. The fort was too hasty to drive away such glory.
secondary_translated_text: Kimchi Worm ! C'est pourquoi les recettes du chef réfugié durent plus longtemps que celles-ci !<hpage>Ce n'est pas vrai. J'ai arraché le ver de la cuisinière. Leur travail barbare se poursuit même lorsque les coquilles sont recouvertes de fils maudits.<page>C'est incroyable ! Avec un tel insecte pieux, ils peuvent cuisiner sans penser à quoi que ce soit. La forteresse était trop hâtive pour chasser une telle gloire.

original_en_text: <hpage>I could track down any ingredient you desire, for a price. The oil you keep here may be of some use to me.<hpage>Promise it as reward, and your master shall have his meal.<page>Hrmph! Such a squalid bargain ill befits a holy servant... but so be it. Fetch me the ingredients and you shall have that pale condiment for yourself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不能白白替你跑腿，拿这瓶油当酬劳吧。<hpage>答应的话，你的主人说不定能如愿吃上大餐。<page>哼！卑劣的交易……罢了，找回食材，苍白油就归你！
translated_text: <hpage>Depending on the price, you can find your favorite ingredients. The oil you have here may be helpful to me.<hpage>As a reward, the owner will present the reward to the owner.<page>HUN! Such a dirty deal doesn't suit a samurai, but that's all. You can pass the ingredients and eat the light seasoning!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>En fonction du prix, vous pouvez trouver vos ingrédients préférés. L'huile que vous avez ici peut m'être utile.<hpage>En tant que récompense, le propriétaire remettra la récompense au propriétaire.<page>Hun ! ! Une telle affaire sale ne convient pas à un samouraï, mais c'est tout. Vous pouvez passer les ingrédients et manger l'assaisonnement léger !

original_en_text: What an awful clattering! Would you kindly conduct yourself a little more carefully?<page>And why are you adorned in such an awful, livid red? By my oath, those above must make a sport of sending me the most wretched servants they can find!<hpage>I am no servant, sir, rather a guest of sorts, invited by the Citadel. Tell me, is this vial of oil on display your own?<page>Nothing here is my own, you impertinent young mite! This sacred hall, and all the food contained within, belong to my most exalted master.<page>The Great Gourmand! The finest connoisseur who has ever lived, the one whose tastes transcend the ages!<page>None are left now who venerate them as they deserve, save for the loyal, lonely bug who stands before you.<page>That oil is merely a small savoury to whet their appetite for the grand meal to come. A spectacular, Pharloom spanning dish that I have been planning for an age.<page>But alas, those above seem to have forsaken my poor master! And I have grown so old. Now I can never hope to gather the necessary ingredients. Blast their indolence!
original_zh_text: 叮叮咣咣吵死了！能安静点吗？<page>还有你为什么穿这身鲜红刺眼的装扮？上面那些混蛋专派些歪瓜裂枣来侍奉我！<hpage>我可不是仆从，算是圣堡的客人。这瓶油是你的藏品？<page>当然不是我的，你这没耐心的小虫！这里一切都属于我尊贵的主人——大胃王！<page>那是空前绝后的美食家！品味超越时代的存在！<page>如今只剩我忠心耿耿侍奉主人，其他虫早忘了本分。<page>那点油不过是开胃小菜，我筹备的可是横跨纺络的盛宴！<page>可恨上面那帮懒鬼断了供给，我这把老骨头哪凑得齐食材！
translated_text: What an awesome CM song! Will you be careful? "<page>why are you wearing such a bad red dress? I swear, the people above will give me the most miserable servants they can find!<hpage>I am not a servant, but a castle inviter. Are the oil bottles on display yours?<page>Nothing of mine, you rough little tick! " This sacred hall and all the food in it belong to my most noble master.<page>Great gourmet! The ultimate eyewitness with a timeless taste!<page>No one has the respect they deserve, except for the loyal and lonely bugs standing before you.<page>The oil is a slightly salty taste that can stimulate the appetite for the upcoming meal. For a long time, I've been planning a grand Faroe dish.<page>But, oh, the people up there seem to have abandoned my poor master! I've grown old. I no longer want to collect the necessary ingredients. Fuck you lazy!
secondary_translated_text: Quelle belle chanson de CM ! Va-t - il être prudent ? "<page>Pourquoi portez-vous une si mauvaise robe ? Je jure que les gens d'en haut me donneront les serviteurs les plus misérables qu ' ils puissent trouver !<hpage>Je ne suis pas un domestique, mais un invité de château. Les bouteilles d'huile sur l'exposition sont les vôtres ?<page>Rien de moi, petite tique rugueuse !« Cette salle sacrée et toute la nourriture qu ' elle contient appartiennent à mon très noble maître.<page>Super gourmet ! Le témoin oculaire ultime au goût intemporel !<page>Personne n'a le respect qu ' ils méritent, sauf les insectes loyaux et solitaires qui se tiennent devant vous.<page>L'huile a un goût légèrement salé qui peut stimuler l'appétit pour le repas à venir. Depuis longtemps, j'ai planifié un grand plat de Faroe.<page>Mais, oh, les gens là - haut semblent avoir abandonné mon pauvre maître ! Je suis devenu vieux. Je n'ai plus envie de rassembler les ingrédients nécessaires. Merde à toi lazy !

original_en_text: Horrid she! What fool dares strike a holy Vaultkeeper! It has knowledge! Insight! As much as any could possibly retain in our fallen age.<page>Would she cast it all aside just to create more death? If so, she is Weaver to the core!
original_zh_text: 疯婆子！竟敢袭击本管理员！本管理员可是掌握着末世最全的学识！<page>你要为了杀戮抛弃这些知识？果真是纯血织者！
translated_text: She's terrible! attacking a security guard is stupid! I have knowledge! Insight! Save it as much as possible in this decadent time.<page>Will she give up everything and cause more deaths? If so, she is a complete weaver!
secondary_translated_text: Elle est horrible ! Attaquer un garde de sécurité est stupide ! J'ai des connaissances ! Insight !Économisez-le autant que possible en cette période décadente.<page>Va-t - elle tout abandonner et causer d'autres morts ? Si c'est le cas, c'est une parfaite tisserante !

original_en_text: So be it, impudent louse! Deny our kingdom’s agony. Refuse its touch upon your fickle shell!<page>Carve your hapless path. Stalk, and strike, and fight, but know your foe is fate herself, and she has risen raging!
original_zh_text: 那就这样吧，狂妄的虱子！拒绝感受王国的苦痛。让你善变的甲壳隔绝这一切！<page>走你的死路吧。即便你能潜伏、突袭、战斗，但记住你的敌人是命运本身——而她已怒火滔天！
translated_text: Then, the shameless face! Don't let me touch your capricious shell, which denies the suffering of my kingdom!<page>Open the way to your misfortune. Chase, fight, fight, but your enemy is fate itself, and she is rising in a rage!
secondary_translated_text: Et le visage sans honte ! Ne me laisse pas toucher à ta coquille capricieuse, qui nie la souffrance de mon royaume !<page>Ouvre la voie à ton malheur. Chassez, combattez, combattez, mais votre ennemi est le destin lui-même, et elle se lève en colère !

original_en_text: Pain! Pain! Do you hear her cries, cursed spider-spawn!? Pharloom suffers for our pathetic, mortal ignorance! We fail it and it falls! <page>Knowledge is needed. More and more! It must be hoarded, sought! Strength to understand, to calm and quell.<hpage>It is action now that needs taking, Vaultkeeper, by myself and those left alive who would aid me.<hpage>Seek solutions in your texts and psalms as you may, but they alone will not be enough to heal a pain so great.
original_zh_text: 痛苦！痛苦！听见她的哀嚎了吗，该死的蜘蛛坏种！？纺络正因我们可悲的愚昧受苦！我们辜负了它，它要灭亡了！<page>需要知识。无穷无尽的知识！必须囤积，必须追寻！需要力量去理解，去安抚，去镇压。<hpage>现在需要的是行动，管理员。由我，以及其他愿意相助的生者来执行。<hpage>你尽管在经卷圣歌中寻求解法，但光靠这些不足以治愈如此深重的伤痛。
translated_text: It hurts! It hurts! Did you hear her crying, cursed spider eggs! " The Pharaoh suffered for our sorrow and human ignorance! If you fail, you fall!<page>Knowledge is required. more and more! Save and search! Understanding, calmness, the power of calm.<hpage>Guardian, this is an action that needs to be taken now to help me and those who are alive.<hpage>Do your best to find a solution in the Bible and in the Psalms, but that alone will not heal such great suffering.
secondary_translated_text: Ça fait mal !Ça fait mal ! Vous l'avez entendue pleurer, maudit œuf d'araignée !« Le Pharaon a souffert pour notre douleur et notre ignorance humaine ! Si vous échouez, vous tombez !<page>La connaissance est requise. De plus en plus ! Sauvegarde et recherche ! Compréhension, calme, le pouvoir du calme.<hpage>Gardien, c'est une action qui doit être prise maintenant pour m'aider et ceux qui sont en vie.<hpage>Faites de votre mieux pour trouver une solution dans la Bible et dans les Psaumes, mais cela seul ne guérira pas une telle grande souffrance.

original_en_text: Yessss! See them all! Its collection gleams complete. Such sacred understanding, stored safe.<page>You have performed your part, Weaver-spawn... The agreement is concluded. Knowledge and rosaries, all were passed fair. No more between us.<page>Leave this Keeper to its treasures and their insights. It has given its service. Now this Keeper wants its time alone!
original_zh_text: 好极了！看啊！藏品终于完整了。如此神圣的智慧，安然封存。<page>你完成了约定，织者坏种……交易结束。知识与念珠，两清。你我两不相欠。<page>让本管理员独享珍宝与真知吧。职责已尽。现在我只想独处！
translated_text: yes! Everyone, please watch it! The series was wonderful. Such a sacred understanding is kept safe.<page>You have fulfilled your duty, O your descendants. We reached an agreement. Knowledge and the Rosary are fairly communicated. There is nothing between us.<page>Leave this Guardian to his treasure and insight. They already offer their services. Now, this guy wants some time to himself!
secondary_translated_text: Oui ! Tout le monde, regardez-le ! La série était merveilleuse. Une telle compréhension sacrée est gardée en sécurité.<page>Vous avez accompli votre devoir, ô vos descendants. Nous sommes parvenus à un accord. La Connaissance et le Rosaire sont bien communiqués. Il n'y a rien entre nous.<page>Laissez ce Gardien à son trésor et à sa perspicacité. Ils offrent déjà leurs services. Maintenant, ce gars veut un peu de temps pour lui-même !

original_en_text: <hpage>Show me your collection, Vaultkeeper.<page>Grkt, Weaver-spawn! She is a bother! Nuisance! Bring more gifts. The collection still has gaps!
original_zh_text: <hpage>展示你的收藏，管理员。<page>咔！烦人的坏种！拿更多贡品来！本管理员的收藏还有空缺！
translated_text: <hpage>Show me your collection, Administrator.<page>Come on, Weaver! She's in trouble! That's so cute! Give me more presents. There are gaps in the collection!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Montrez-moi votre collection, Administrateur.<page>Allez, Weaver ! Elle est en difficulté ! C'est tellement mignon ! Donnez-moi d'autres cadeaux. Il y a des lacunes dans la collection !

original_en_text: <hpage>Gilded one, what remained of the Citadel has been torn apart by the black threads. Still you keep to your duty?<page>While voices still fill the g-g-great chambers... the sacred task of the sentinels continues.<page>To defend... To p-p-protect.
original_zh_text: <hpage>金甲虫，圣堡残骸已被黑丝撕裂。还不放弃职责么？<page>只要圣、圣殿……仍存余音，哨卫之职……不止。<page>守、守卫……守护。
translated_text: <hpage>The remains of the golden fort were torn by black lines.
