Are you still fulfilling your obligations?<page>The voice is still g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g I'm not going to be able to do that. g-g - -g − g g − g- --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------I'm not going to be able to do that. g-g@g-g-<page>A defense to protect.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Les restes du fort doré étaient déchirés par des lignes noires.Êtes-vous toujours en mesure de remplir vos obligations ?<page>La voix est toujours g-g - g-g - g-g - g, je ne vais pas pouvoir le faire. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - g-g@g-g -<page>Une défense à protéger.

original_en_text: You dally, still? If you wish to earn your reward, you should be hunting down those ingredients! Or do you need directions from a serving-bug with some experience?
original_zh_text: 还磨蹭什么？想要报酬就赶紧的！还是说要本大厨给你指点指点方向？
translated_text: Are you still whispering? If you want a reward, you should look for these foods! Or do you need expert guidance on service errors?
secondary_translated_text: Vous chuchotez encore ? Si vous voulez une récompense, vous devriez chercher ces aliments ! Ou avez-vous besoin de conseils d'experts sur les erreurs de service ?

original_en_text: The Weaver-spawn, she has found it! Our pontiff’s sacred cylinder, stolen from the dark below...<page>Never! States our law. Never must our melody pass to a bug not Keeper! But you, fool Weaver, would shatter those tenants with reckless ease.<hpage>Your pontiff is gone, Vaultkeeper. Your fellows have fallen to husk or thread. What laws once bound these vaults died with them.<page>Ackk! Fine, cursed she. Claim the sacred song, and pain to you if we both are damned forever for it!
original_zh_text: 织者坏种，她得手了！她夺走主教的圣音筒……<page>休想！律法规定，圣歌绝不可外传！但你这坏种竟然轻易践踏戒律。<hpage>你的主教死了，管理员。同僚都化作空壳或丝偶，昔日的律法也随他们入土了。<page>咳！随你便，诅咒你。带走圣歌吧，愿我们永堕地狱！
translated_text: Weaver, we found it! Our Pope's Ark was stolen from the darkness.<page>no way! Explain the law Our melodies do not reach the worms nor the guardians! But your stupid weaver will easily crush the tenant.<hpage>Your pope is gone, keeper of the treasury. Your companion has fallen on a shell or rope. The laws that governed these financial resources have also disappeared.<page>okay! Oh, curse her. Sing this holy song. " If we were to be cursed forever, you would suffer.
secondary_translated_text: Weaver, nous l'avons trouvé ! L'Arche de notre Pape a été volée dans les ténèbres.<page>Pas de chemin ! Expliquez la loi Nos mélodies n'atteignent ni les vers ni les gardiens ! Mais votre stupide tisserà écrasera facilement le locataire.<hpage>Votre pape est parti, gardien du trésor. Votre compagnon est tombé sur une coquille ou une corde. Les lois qui régissaient ces ressources financières ont également disparu.<page>OK ! Oh, maudit-elle, chantez cette sainte chanson.« Si nous devions être maudits pour toujours, vous souffririez.

original_en_text: <hpage>I return, bug, and ask to hear your melody again, that I may lock it clear in my mind.<page>Very well, good pilgrim. For one so fiercely devout as yourself, gladly will I give this gift.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我回来了，请你再演奏一遍旋律，我要记牢。<page>好，虔信者。为了你这般赤诚，我很乐意演奏。
translated_text: <hpage>I'm back, Bug, I want you to hear your melody one more time, so I can lock it in my head clearly.<page>A very good pilgrim. To a godly person like you, I give you this gift.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je suis de retour, Bug, je veux que tu entends ta mélodie une fois de plus, afin que je puisse la verrouiller clairement dans ma tête.<page>Un très bon pèlerin. Pour une personne pieuse comme vous, je vous fais ce cadeau.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master seems satisfied, sir. It is time you gave what was promised.<page>Yes. Yes! It has been done! Made and served. A dish to match my master’s refined desires.<page>The pale trifle is yours. Take it and leave! My master needs time to reflect, and I must ponder on flavours anew!
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的主人看来很满意，该兑现承诺了吧？<page>对，对！主人吃得很满意！<page>苍白油是你的了，拿走吧！主人还要好好回味，我也要构思新菜式了！
translated_text: <hpage>Your owner seems to be satisfied with it. It's time to keep our promises.<page>yes, yes! it's over! The dishes are prepared to meet the requests of the host.<page>This little white thing is yours. Take it with you! The master needs time to reflect, but I need to rethink my preferences!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Votre propriétaire semble en être satisfait. Il est temps de tenir nos promesses.<page>Oui ! oui ! C'est fini ! Les plats sont préparés pour répondre aux demandes de l'hôte.<page>Cette petite chose blanche est la vôtre. Prenez-le avec vous ! Le maître a besoin de temps pour réfléchir, mais je dois repenser mes préférences !

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I bring the psalm cylinder recovered from the dark chambers below here. I would learn its melody.<page>Kak! Then pass it, filthy Weaver-spawn! A cylinder so sacred should not remain a moment longer in your grubby claws!
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我带来了下层密室的圣咏音筒，要学习其中旋律。<page>咔！交出来，肮脏的织者坏种！此等圣物岂能在你脏爪中多留一秒！
translated_text: <hpage>I have brought a tube of hymn I found in the dark room under the treasurer I learn his melody.<page>stop it! So, Dirty Weaver! " Such a sacred cylinder will no longer fit in your dirty nails!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'ai apporté un tube d'hymne que j'ai trouvé dans la chambre sombre sous le trésorier, j'apprends sa mélodie.<page>Arrêtez ! Désolé Dirty Weaver !« Un tel cylindre sacré ne tiendra plus dans vos ongles sales !

original_en_text: Hold them, will she? Covet them? Can she not part with such a small prize?<page>Remain blind fool she. This Keeper’s understanding stays with itself.
original_zh_text: 她想私藏？如此贪婪？连这点小礼都吝啬？<page>她就继续当瞎子吧。本管理员的智慧自会保留。
translated_text: will you catch me? do you want it? Wouldn't she want such an award?<page>Even if you blindly continue to deceive her, the parents' perception will not change.
secondary_translated_text: Voulez-vous m'attraper ? Tu veux ça ? Est-ce qu 'elle ne veut pas un tel prix ?<page>Même si vous continuez aveuglément à la tromper, la perception des parents ne changera pas.

original_en_text: Weaver-thing! Does she hope to spy upon our treasured records?<page>Within our vast store, always more there is to know, the old methods of prayer, to this land, to its rulers, and to the strength at its heart.
original_zh_text: 织者坏种！她想窥探我们的珍贵典籍？<page>在我们的浩瀚典藏中，有古老祷文，有统治之术，还有……核心力量的秘辛。
translated_text: does geneu want to steal our precious records?<page>Among our huge shops and ancient ways of prayer there is always something to learn about the land, its rulers, and the central powers.
secondary_translated_text: Geneu veut-il voler nos précieux documents ?<page>Parmi nos immenses boutiques et nos anciennes formes de prière, il y a toujours quelque chose à apprendre sur la terre, ses dirigeants et les puissances centrales.

original_en_text: She carries a precious cylinder! She must give it! Share it! Claw to claw!<page>Pass it! And this Vaultkeeper shall grant their wisdom. Just a small taste! A trickle! A glimmer! Of our Citadel’s sacred understandings.
original_zh_text: 她带着圣咏音筒！必须交出来！分享！交出来！<page>递过来！本管理员便赐予智慧。只需浅尝！一滴！一缕！圣堡的至高真知！
translated_text: I have a precious bottle! She should do it! Let's share it! Paw to Paw!<page>Pass! The treasurer gives wisdom. Just a little! beep! One of the Lights! Sacred Understanding of the Castle.
secondary_translated_text: J'ai une précieuse bouteille ! Elle devrait le faire ! Partageons-le ! Paw à Paw !<page>Passez ! Le trésorier donne la sagesse. Juste un peu ! Beep ! Une des lumières ! Sacrée compréhension du château.

original_en_text: Woken, is this sentinel. F-f-f-functional, is its shell.<page>Still devoted, is this s-s-sentinel, and awaiting your commandment.<hpage>You speak, gilded one? I’ve no command for you, but my curiosity is piqued.<hpage>You call yourself a sentinel. What is it you are charged with protecting?<page>Defence of the sacred C-c-citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is our eternal duty.<hpage>I had assumed as much. Yet look around you, gilded one. During your slumber, the Citadel has fallen, and its voices lay silent. This place is dead, or very nearly.<hpage>Some would argue that standing guard over a kingdom’s corpse is a foolish task, empty of meaning. I wonder then, will you still hold true to your charge?
original_zh_text: 苏、苏醒，本哨卫。功、功能正常。<page>忠、忠诚依旧，静候指令。<hpage>金甲虫，你会说话？我无意下令，但很好奇。<hpage>你自称哨卫，是在守护何物？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护其中圣、圣音，是哨卫的永恒之职。<hpage>意料之中。但环顾四周吧，圣堡已然倾颓，圣音皆已沉寂。此地已是坟冢。<hpage>守卫已死的王国已没有意义，你依然要恪守职责么？
translated_text: The security guard woke me up. The F-f - f-functional is its shell.<page>This guard is loyal, waiting for your orders.<hpage>did you say gold? I haven't received any orders, but my curiosity has increased.<hpage>They call themselves vigilants. What do you have to protect?<page>It is our eternal duty to preserve the sacred C-C castle and the sounds that fill it.<hpage>I think so too, but look around. The castle collapses while you are asleep and you cannot hear any sound. This place is dead or almost dead.<hpage>Some may think that defending the body of the kingdom is foolish and pointless. Are you faithful to your duty?
secondary_translated_text: Le garde de sécurité m'a réveillé. La fonctionnelle F-f - f est sa coquille.<page>Ce garde est fidèle, attendant vos ordres.<hpage>Tu as dit or ? Je n'ai pas reçu de commande, mais ma curiosité a augmenté.<hpage>Ils s'appellent des vigilants. Que devez-vous protéger ?<page>C'est notre devoir éternel de préserver le château sacré de C-C et les sons qui le remplissent.<hpage>Je le pense aussi, mais regarde autour. Le château s'effondre pendant que vous dormez et vous n'entendez aucun bruit. Cet endroit est mort ou presque mort.<hpage>Certains pensent peut - être que défendre le corps du royaume est insensé et inutile.Êtes-vous fidèle à votre devoir ?

original_en_text: One must not wander idle between these sacred shelves! This is a holy place. Reverence! It is demanded.<page>If the fool she wishes to view this Keeper’s collection, head to the listening room below.
original_zh_text: 休要在圣架间闲逛！此处是圣地，需心怀敬畏！<page>想看本管理员的收藏？去下层聆听室。
translated_text: You can't walk around among these sacred shelves! This is a sacred place. Respect me! It's necessary.<page>Fools who want to see the Guardian's collection, go to the listening room below.
secondary_translated_text: Vous ne pouvez pas vous promener parmi ces étagères sacrées ! C'est un lieu sacré. Respectez-moi ! C'est nécessaire.<page>Pour les idiots qui veulent voir la collection du Guardian, allez dans la salle d'écoute ci-dessous.

original_en_text: <hpage>My choice is made. I cannot leave. I must descend again, and see Pharloom freed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我意已决，不能就这样离开。必须重返地底，解放纺络。
translated_text: <hpage>My choice has been made. I could not walk and fell down again to see Faro be released.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Mon choix a été fait. Je ne pouvais plus marcher et je me suis de nouveau abattu pour voir Faro libéré.

original_en_text: <hpage>The signs of battle here are clear, gilded one. Is it your charge then to hunt the haunted, even if they be of the Citadel’s ruling castes?<page>Defence of the sacred Cit-t-tadel, and the voices that fill it, is the eternal d-duty of the sentinels.<page>Termination, is the n-n-necessary fate of all those enthralled by the whispering Silk.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此地战斗痕迹明显，金甲虫。你的职责包括猎杀圣堡贵族中的被蛊惑者？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护圣音……哨卫永恒之职。<page>清除受魂、魂丝蛊惑……...是必要使命。
translated_text: <hpage>The traces of the battle are clear and golden. Even if you belong to the castle's ruling caste, is it your job to chase ghosts?<page>It is the eternal duty of the sentry to guard the holy city of Tadel and to satisfy its sound.<page>The end is the inevitable fate of all those who are captivated by the silk of the whisper.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Les traces de la bataille sont claires et dorées. Même si vous appartenez à la caste dirigeante du château, est-ce votre travail de chasser les fantômes ?<page>Il est le devoir éternel de la sentinelle de garder la ville sainte de Tadel et de satisfaire son son.<page>La fin est le destin inévitable de tous ceux qui sont captivés par la soie du murmure.

original_en_text: <hpage>Out there lie the endless wastes... If I cross them now, Pharloom shall fall to a black fate of my making.<hpage>My choice is made. I will not abandon its bugs to that grim end. I must descend again, and cut them free.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若现在越过那片荒原，纺络将因我堕入黑暗……<hpage>我意已决，不能抛下纺络的虫民。必须折返，斩断丝缚。
translated_text: <hpage>There is endless waste. If I surpass them now, the fal will fall into the dark fate I have created.<hpage>My choice has been made. I won't give up on the bugs that led to this cruel ending. I need to save them again, and I'm going to have to.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Les déchets sont infinis. Si je les dépasse maintenant, le fal tombera dans le destin sombre que j'ai créé.<hpage>Mon choix a été fait. Je ne vais pas abandonner les bugs qui ont mené à cette fin cruelle. Je dois les sauver à nouveau et je vais devoir le faire.

original_en_text: <hpage>Keep safe, Vaultkeeper. I may expect your service in future, and I’d not have you pass before that task is complete.<page>Gyak... No fool this Keeper. It has lived long, watched its fellows wither, but it shall not die, not yet, not while knowledge needs be sought.<page>This pact is made, Weaver-spawn, insight for us, both she and it.<page>This holy Citadel, in glory and fall, there are holes in its history, even to a Keeper’s knowledge, even to the vaults.<page>Seek the cylinders, she must, those objects of intricate insight. Bring more for this Keeper and only this Keeper, for in this Citadel none are left possessed of such sound, sharp mind as it.
original_zh_text: <hpage>好好活着，管理员。你还有用，别早早死去。<page>咔……本管理员不傻。活了很久，目睹同僚凋零。但只要尚有知识未明，就不会死。<page>契约成立，织者坏种。你我今后各取所需。<page>荣耀与衰落并存的圣堡，藏着连浩瀚书库都未记载的空白。<page>去找音筒吧，那些智慧的结晶。只献给本管理员，因圣堡再无这般敏锐之脑。
translated_text: <hpage>Attention to the guards, you may be looking forward to your next assignment, but we won't let you pass until the assignment is complete.<page>The Guardian is not stupid. She has lived a long time and watched her companions wither, but when it is necessary to seek knowledge, it does not die.<page>For Weaver's descendants, this agreement is for us, and for her and it for insight.<page>Glorious or in decline, the history of this sacred castle has holes, and as far as its guardians know, even its vaults have holes.<page>You need to look for cylinders with complex insights. Bring more to this Guardian, more to this Guardian only, because no one in this castle has such a voice and a sharp heart.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Attention aux gardes, vous avez peut - être hâte de votre prochaine mission, mais nous ne vous laisserons pas passer avant que la mission ne soit terminée.<page>Le gardien n'est pas stupide. Elle a vécu longtemps et a vu ses compagnons se faner, mais quand il faut chercher la connaissance, elle ne meurt pas.<page>Pour les descendants de Weaver, cet accord est pour nous, et pour elle et pour la perspicacité.<page>Glorious ou en déclin, l'histoire de ce château sacré a des trous, et pour autant que savent ses gardiens, même ses voûtes ont des trous.<page>Vous devez rechercher des cylindres avec des informations complexes. Apportez plus à ce Gardien, plus à ce Gardien seulement, parce que personne dans ce château n'a une voix et un cœur aussi vif.

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, regale us with our Threefold song, that you may rise above and worship before our kingdom’s divine heart.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，献上三重圣歌，方可升华，觐见王国圣心。
translated_text: O eternal pilgrim of the Firm, entertain us with our triple song to transcend and adore the holy heart of our kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: Ô pèlerin éternel de la Firme, entretenez-nous par notre triple chant pour transcender et adorer le saint Cœur de notre royaume.

original_en_text: Still you tarry here, bug who calls herself a guest? If your idle claws need work, put them to service for our exalted Great Gourmand!<page>I must remain by my master, so you will need to leave the Citadel and gather the ingredients for their meal in my stead!
original_zh_text: 还杵在这呢？既然你闲着也是闲着，就帮我伟大的主人搜集食材吧！<page>我得守着主人，去圣堡外收集食材的任务就交给你了！
translated_text: Are you still here, self-proclaimed guest bug? If your lazy nails need a job, let them work for our precious friend!<page>I have to live with my master, so you must come out of the castle to me and gather their ingredients. "
secondary_translated_text: Es-tu toujours là, bug invité autoproclamé ? Si vos ongles paresseux ont besoin d'un travail, laissez-les travailler pour notre précieux ami !<page>Je dois vivre avec mon maître, donc vous devez sortir du château à moi et rassembler leurs ingrédients. "

original_en_text: A rusted statue of a pilgrim.
original_zh_text: 一尊朝圣者的锈蚀雕像。
translated_text: A statue of a rusted pilgrim.
secondary_translated_text: Une statue d'un pèlerin rouillé.

original_en_text: <hpage>To learn the melody upon this cylinder will require a working listening device. This one here has long ceased to function.<hpage>That last keeper still sane, in the vaults above... Their chambers hold just such a machine. I need only return.
original_zh_text: <hpage>播放音筒需要完好的设备，这台已经坏了。<hpage>之前在上层遇到的清醒管理员……他们的密室就有这种机器。我得回去一趟。
translated_text: <hpage>To learn the melodies in this column, you need a working listening device. This has not worked for a long time.<hpage>The last goalkeeper was still reasonable, and in the safe above there was such a machine in their room. They need to come back.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pour apprendre les mélodies de cette colonne, vous avez besoin d'un appareil d'écoute fonctionnel. Cela ne fonctionne pas depuis longtemps.<hpage>Le dernier gardien était toujours raisonnable, et dans le coffre-fort au-dessus, il y avait une telle machine dans leur chambre. Ils ont besoin de revenir

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I recovered a psalm cylinder in the dark chambers below here. I believe it contains the melody unique to these vaults. I would have you play it for me now.<page>Kakrt! She has visited the pontiff’s depths and stolen the sacred song! Where is your respect, Weaver-spawn?! Our venerable dead deserve better than to have their chambers transgressed by your filthy foraging!<hpage>In this moment, Vaultkeeper, I’ve slim patience for your impudence. Either prepare the cylinder and stay silent, or ready yourself to learn regret.
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我在下层密室找到了圣咏音筒。里面应存有此书库的专属旋律，我要你立即为我演奏。<page>咔！你擅闯主教密室窃取圣歌！织者坏种毫无敬畏！先贤安息之地岂能容你玷污！<hpage>管理员，我的耐心有限。要么闭嘴准备播放音筒，要么准备明白什么叫后悔。
translated_text: <hpage>I think these treasures contain a unique melody, which the treasurer, the hymn pipe found in the dark room below. I want you to play it for me right now.<page>curk! She visited the depths of the pope and stole the hymn! Weaver, where's your respect? Our respectable dead deserve better treatment than to have your dirty foodie break into the room! "<hpage>At this point, Treasurer, I don't have much patience for your rudeness. Be prepared to keep your mouth shut with a gas cylinder ready, or learn to regret it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je pense que ces trésors contiennent une mélodie unique, que le trésorier, le tuyau d'hymne, a trouvé dans la chambre sombre ci-dessous. Je veux que tu le joues pour moi en ce moment.<page>Curry ! Elle a visité les profondeurs du pape et a volé l'hymne ! Weaver, où est votre respect ? Nos morts honorables méritent un meilleur traitement que de faire pénétrer votre sale gourmand dans la pièce ! "<hpage>En ce moment, trésorier, je n'ai pas beaucoup de patience pour votre grossièreté. Préparez-vous à garder votre bouche fermée avec une bouteille de gaz prête, ou apprenez à le regretter.

original_en_text: Eggy, eggy! I want to lay a lot of pretty eggies! So tell the big ones, bring me more food!
original_zh_text: 蛋蛋！我要下漂亮蛋蛋！叫大个子们多送吃的来！
translated_text: Eggs, eggs! I want to lay lots of eggs! Please tell me to bring you more food! "
secondary_translated_text: Des œufs, des œufs ! Je veux pondre beaucoup d'œufs ! Dites-moi de vous apporter plus de nourriture ! "

original_en_text: <hpage>Your chambers are surely grand, sir bug, but it is plain to see you are no sovereign here.<page>Is our state so bare, pilgrim?... “By the will of the Conductors,” we once boomed, and this Citadel shook at our decree.<page>But the words... How hollow they echoed. The mantle of rule, claimed greedily from Pharloom’s fading first children, those bitter Weavers... it was yoke, not crown.<page>Now, in our Citadel’s silence, we share their truth. Only one monarch’s claws ever clutched this kingdom, though we raised our voices to cry otherwise.<page>Would you see her, pilgrim? Up there at our Citadel’s crown? Reach those heights we’d hoped to hide and bow before this land’s true ruler.<hpage>In time near, sir bug, I shall indeed climb to meet your monarch...
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生的居所虽大，却不像是贵族风格。<page>看着如此寒酸吗？当年我们高喊着"遵指挥家之命"，整座圣堡都为之震颤。<page>但激昂的呼喊现在也只剩空洞的回响。从垂死织者手中夺来的权柄，实际上却是枷锁。<page>如今在圣堡的寂静中，我们才真正明白……坐在王座上的从来只有那位。<page>想觐见她吗？登上圣堡之巅，向真王跪拜吧。<hpage>很快我就会登顶的，先生……
translated_text: <hpage>Mr. Bug, your room is truly wonderful, but it is clear that you are not the monarch here.<page>Pilgrim, is this country so naked? "By the commander's will, we once roared, and the castle shook at our command."<page>However, this word. Their echo is empty. " Pharam's fallen first child, the distressed loom, has been stripped of the mantle of domination by greed. It is not a crown, it is a chain.<page>And now, in the stillness of the castle, we will share their truth. In spite of our cries, only the King's claws can conquer the kingdom.<page>would you like to see her, pilgrim? the crown of our castle? Let us reach the heights we wish to hide and bow to the true rulers of this country.<hpage>Soon, Mr. Bug, I shall certainly climb to meet your monarch. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Monsieur Bug, votre chambre est vraiment merveilleuse, mais il est clair que vous n'êtes pas le monarque ici.<page>Pilgrim, ce pays est-il si nu ?« Par la volonté du commandant, nous rugîmes un jour, et le château trembla à notre commandement. "<page>Cependant, ce mot. L'écho est vide. Le premier enfant déchu de Pharam, le tisser en détresse, a été dépouillé du manteau de la domination par la cupidité. Ce n'est pas une couronne, c'est une chaîne.<page>Et maintenant, dans la quiétude du château, nous allons partager leur vérité. Malgré nos cris, seules les griffes du Roi peuvent conquérir le royaume.<page>Tu veux la voir, pèlerin ? La couronne de notre château ? Nous atteignons les hauteurs que nous voulons cacher et nous prosternons devant les vrais dirigeants de ce pays.<hpage>Bientôt, monsieur Bug, je monterai certainement à la rencontre de votre monarque. "

original_en_text: Cleansed, is this place. Eternal, is the d-d-duty of the sentinels.
original_zh_text: 净、净化完成。哨卫之职……永存。
translated_text: Cleaning up, that's this place. Eternity is the duty of the guard.
secondary_translated_text: Nettoyer, c'est cet endroit. L'éternité est le devoir de la garde.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I bring ingredients for the dish.<page>At last! My master is withering away from hunger! Let us see what gifts you bring.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我带食材来了。<page>终于！主人快饿扁了，快呈上来！
translated_text: <hpage>I brought the ingredients for this dish.<page>Finally! Your master is starving! Look at the gifts you have.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>J'ai trouvé les ingrédients pour ce plat.<page>Enfin ! Ton maître a faim ! Regardez les cadeaux que vous avez.

original_en_text: <hpage>Will you tell me of those who guard this structure? They are servants of the Citadel, are they not?<page>Servants...? They too are penitents. In a past age, that caste committed their own sacrilege against the Citadel.<page>A sin long forgotten, but so grave that their offspring and the offspring of their offspring carry the guilt with them still. To serve here is their only hope of absolution.
original_zh_text: <hpage>可以说说这里的守卫么，他们是圣堡仆从？<page>仆从？不，都是赎罪者。祖辈犯下亵渎圣堡的重罪。<page>虽被遗忘，但其后代仍然在此服役，这是唯一的赎罪之道。
translated_text: <hpage>Tell me who is guarding the building. They are the servants of the castle, right?<page>a servant...? They are repentant too. In the past, this caste had committed atrocities of its own against the castle.<page>It is a sin that has long been forgotten, but it is so serious that future generations can still bear it. Serving here is the only hope of receiving pardon.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Dites-moi qui garde le bâtiment. Ils sont les serviteurs du château, non ?<page>Serviteur ? ? Ils sont également repentants. Dans le passé, cette caste avait commis ses propres atrocités contre le château.<page>C'est un péché qui a été oublié depuis longtemps, mais il est si grave que les générations futures peuvent encore le supporter.

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, regale us with our Threefold song, that you may rise above and worship before our kingdom’s divine heart.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，献上三重圣歌，方可升华，觐见王国圣心。
translated_text: O eternal pilgrim of the Firm, entertain us with our triple song to transcend and adore the holy heart of our kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: Ô pèlerin éternel de la Firme, entretenez-nous par notre triple chant pour transcender et adorer le saint Cœur de notre royaume.

original_en_text: <hpage>If this place was holy once, no evidence remains. Even as a prison, it has been neglected.<hpage>If you wish, I can free you. You can descend through the caverns below until you find a settlement.<page>You... are asking me to leave this place? Wh-what a strange, fearful thought! Such a sin would never... no.<page>By the grace of the Citadel, I am here as a penitent. Here, I can hide from the shame of my sins until they are withered away by time.<page>Leave this place...? Please! Strike me down dead before you speak such blasphemy again!
original_zh_text: <hpage>若这里曾是圣地，如今也面目全非，连监狱都称不上。<hpage>想走的话，我可以放你下去，直到找到聚居地。<page>离……离开？多么可怕的想法！这等罪孽万万不可……<page>承蒙圣堡慈悲，我在此忏悔。直到时光洗刷罪孽。<page>求你了！再说这种渎神之言就杀了我吧！
translated_text: <hpage>Even if this place was sacred, there is no evidence of it. They are also ignored as prisons.<hpage>If you wish, I will release you. You can walk through the caves until you find a settlement.<page>You are a... do you want to get out of this place? What a strange and frightening thought! Such a crime would never happen. number is<page>Thanks to the grace of the castle, I have come here as a confessor. Here, I can hide the shame of my sins until they wither away with time. "<page>Get out of this place... Before you say such blasphemous things, please kill me. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Même si cet endroit était sacré, il n'y a aucune preuve de cela. Ils sont également ignorés comme des prisons.<hpage>Si vous le souhaitez, je vous relâcherai. Vous pouvez vous promener dans les grottes jusqu'à ce que vous trouviez un établissement.<page>Vous êtes un... Tu veux sortir de cet endroit ? Quelle pensée étrange et effrayante ! Un tel crime n'aurait jamais eu lieu. Le numéro est<page>Grâce à la grâce du château, je suis venu ici en tant que confesseur. Ici, je peux cacher la honte de mes péchés jusqu'à ce qu ' ils se dessèchent avec le temps. "<page>Sortez de cet endroit... Avant de dire des choses aussi blasphématoires, s'il vous plaît, me tuez. »

original_en_text: The mantle of conductor weighs heavy. Had I known the cost before its bearing, would I have accepted the duty?
original_zh_text: 指挥之职重若千钧。如果早知这份代价，我还会接过这担子吗？
translated_text: The driver 's coat is heavy. If you knew before you incurred the cost, would you accept the responsibility?
secondary_translated_text: Le manteau du chauffeur est lourd. Si vous le saviez avant d'encourer le coût, accepteriez-vous la responsabilité ?

original_en_text: S... song, is it? You have brought song? You are of the Citadel, then? How... how many of you?<hpage>I am alone, sir. You needn’t fear, I am no servant of the Citadel. Are you a prisoner of theirs?<page>P... prisoner? I understand you not. There is no prison here.<page>This is a holy place of forgiveness. Please, speak with reverence.
original_zh_text: 歌……歌声？你带了歌？是圣堡的？来了……来了多少？<hpage>就我一个。别怕，我不是圣堡的走狗。你是他们的囚犯吗？<page>囚……囚犯？听不懂。<page>这儿是赎罪圣地，请怀着敬畏之心说话。
translated_text: It's a... It's a song, right? did you bring a song? are you from the castle? Why is it... how many are there?<hpage>I'm alone. " don't be afraid. i'm not the castle's servant. are you a prisoner?<page>P... a prisoner? I don't understand. There's no jail.<page>This is the sanctuary of forgiveness. Please speak carefully.
secondary_translated_text: C'est un... C'est une chanson, non ? Tu as apporté une chanson ? Tu viens du château ? Pourquoi est-ce... Combien y en a-t - il ?<hpage>Je suis seul.« N'ayez pas peur. Je ne suis pas le serviteur du château.Êtes-vous prisonnier ?<page>P... un prisonnier ? Je ne comprends pas. Il n'y a pas de prison.<page>C'est le sanctuaire du pardon. S'il vous plaît parlez prudemment.

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall build.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等筑造。
translated_text: Even when it's over, the song is still flowing.<page>For the eternal fal, we build.
secondary_translated_text: Même quand elle est terminée, la chanson continue de couler.<page>Pour l'éternité, nous construisons.

original_en_text: We would hear the song of the Architects, at the core of our Citadel.<page>They who sustain our realm, its walls, its floors and its voice, even as others fall silent.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻建筑匠团之歌，响彻圣堡核心。<page>他们维系疆域、高墙、楼宇与圣音，纵使万籁俱寂。
translated_text: In the middle of the castle you can hear the architect singing.<page>They are guarding our kingdom, its walls, its floors, and its sound.
secondary_translated_text: Au milieu du château, vous pouvez entendre le chant de l'architecte.<page>Ils gardent notre royaume, ses murs, ses planchers et son son.

original_en_text: A Crustnut! Stale and dull, you’ll be thinking, yes? But ground to finest powder, that’s when its tart taste blooms!
original_zh_text: 硬壳果！你是不是觉得又干又不新鲜？得磨成粉才有酸香味！
translated_text: Crazy! You think it's old and boring. But when you grind it into the best powder, its sour taste will bloom!
secondary_translated_text: Crazy ! ! Vous pensez que c'est vieux et ennuyeux. Mais quand vous le broyez dans la meilleure poudre, son goût acide fleurira !

original_en_text: <hpage>If I’m to learn the melody upon this cylinder, I’ll first need to find a working device to play it. This one here has long ceased to function.<hpage>The vaults above would surely hold another such device. I must search thoroughly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>要解读音筒旋律，先得找到能用的设备。这台早就坏了。<hpage>上层书库肯定还有，我得仔细寻找。
translated_text: <hpage>To learn the melody of this cylinder, you must first find the equipment to play it. This has not worked for a long time.<hpage>There should be another device in the safe above. we have to look into it thoroughly.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pour apprendre la mélodie de ce cylindre, vous devez d'abord trouver l'équipement pour le jouer. Cela ne fonctionne pas depuis longtemps.<hpage>Il devrait y avoir un autre appareil dans le coffre-fort au-dessus. Nous devons l'examiner en profondeur.

original_en_text: You! Mite or mourner! Fell fated chosen left till last!<page>Relent! Submit! The fatal blow was struck. Fair Pharloom wails its end.<page>We woe befallen few remained, let us join here, at last, and show our fires fierce.<page>Together to share our kingdom’s pain, feel it scorch our shells, and know clear its suffering, its sorrow!
original_zh_text: 你！蝼蚁或悼亡者！最后的倒霉蛋！<page>认命吧！致命一击已出，纺络在哀嚎！<page>让我们这些余孽在此共赴末路！<page>共品王国的灼痛，让烈焰焚尽甲壳！
translated_text: it's you! The worm is still the mourner! Fate chooses the left to the end!<page>Tolerance! Surrender! A deadly blow is coming. Fair Farum lamented the end of it.<page>Our misfortunes have descended upon the remaining few, and we have at last joined here, and shown the intensity of our flame.<page>Share the pain of our kingdom, feel the scorching of our shells, and understand its pain and sorrow.
secondary_translated_text: C'est toi ! Le ver est toujours le pleurant ! Le destin choisit la gauche jusqu'à la fin !<page>Tolérance ! Rendez-vous ! Un coup mortel vient. Fair Farum déplore sa fin.<page>Nos malheurs sont descendus sur les quelques restants, et nous nous sommes enfin réunis ici, et avons montré l'intensité de notre flamme.<page>Partagez la douleur de notre royaume, ressentez le brûlement de nos coquilles et comprenez sa douleur et sa douleur.

original_en_text: Our song upon a silken thread.... Such beautiful sound, so long absent from our halls.<page>Keep safe our melody, good pilgrim. You shall likely be the last to receive it.
original_zh_text: 丝弦上的旋律啊……殿堂久违的天籁。<page>请妥善保存我们的旋律，你怕是最后一位听到此曲的了。
translated_text: The song is in Silk. There is no such beautiful sound in this room anymore.<page>Guard our melody, good pilgrim. " You may be the last person to receive it.
secondary_translated_text: La chanson est en silk. Il n'y a plus de son si beau dans cette pièce.<page>Gardez notre mélodie, bon pèlerin !« Vous pouvez être la dernière personne à le recevoir.

original_en_text: We would hear the melody of the Conductors, high in their gleaming towers.<page>They bearing the heaviest mantle, who would guide our land ever on to greatness.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻执政指挥之旋律，萦绕辉光尖塔。<page>他们肩负千钧权柄，引领王国永续辉煌。
translated_text: From the shining tower you can hear the conductor's melody.<page>They will bear the heaviest mantle on their shoulders and lead our land to greatness.
secondary_translated_text: De la tour lumineuse, vous pouvez entendre la mélodie du conducteur.<page>Ils porteront le manteau le plus lourd sur leurs épaules et conduiront notre terre à la grandeur.

original_en_text: A visitor? Now this is rare.<page>I must apologise for not rising to greet you. After an age spent sickly, I find myself unable to lift from this bedchamber.<page>I hope, good pilgrim, our Citadel has shown you the courtesy deserved of a bug devout.<hpage>I’ve borne its hospitality well enough, aged one...<page>Ahhh... My sympathies, pilgrim... We have fallen so far. And now, sadly, if you’ve come seeking aid or understanding, I fear I too shall disappoint. <page>Whatever you would ask, I have only my melody left to offer. It is a simple thing, the smallest of gifts, but perhaps more special now, for it has been rarely heard in these quietened times.
original_zh_text: 有访客？这倒是稀奇。<page>恕我不能起身相迎，卧于病榻多年，这把老骨头动不了啦。<page>朝圣者能到这里不容易，希望圣堡对你这虔信者有以礼相待。<hpage>已经领教过它的待客之道了，老人家……<page>唉……抱歉，圣堡已堕落至此。如果你想求助，怕是要让你失望了。<page>我能赠予你的只剩这首曲子。虽然微薄，但在这孤寂的时代也算珍品。
translated_text: Visitors? It is rarely done today.<page>I apologize for not standing up and welcoming you. After a terminal illness, I could not leave this room.<page>Dear pilgrim, I hope that our castle will show the courtesy of a pious insect.<hpage>When I was a one-year - old, I was very satisfied with their hospitality.<page>ah... My sympathy, pilgrim. I have fallen so far. Now, sadly, if you come to me for help or understanding, I too will be disappointed.<page>No matter what you seek, I will only give you my melody. It's a simple thing, the smallest gift, but probably more special now. Because I've never heard it in a quiet hour.
secondary_translated_text: visiteurs ? C'est rarement fait aujourd ' hui.<page>Je m'excuse de ne pas me lever et de vous accueillir. Après une maladie terminale, je ne pouvais pas quitter cette pièce.<page>Cher pèlerin, j'espère que notre château montrera la courtoisie d'un insecte pieux.<hpage>Quand j'avais un an, j'étais très satisfait de leur hospitalité.<page>Ah, oui. Mes condoléances, pèlerin. Je suis tombé jusqu'à présent. Maintenant, malheureusement, si vous venez me chercher de l'aide ou de la compréhension, je serai aussi déçu.<page>Peu importe ce que vous cherchez, je ne vous donnerai que ma mélodie. C'est une chose simple, le plus petit cadeau, mais probablement plus spécial maintenant. Parce que je ne l'ai jamais entendu dans une heure calme.

original_en_text: If the weight of your sins bear down upon you, you may remain here with me in penitence, sister.
original_zh_text: 若你自觉罪孽深重，可留下与我一同忏悔。
translated_text: If your sins have fallen upon you, you can repent with me. "
secondary_translated_text: Si vos péchés sont tombés sur vous, vous pouvez vous repentir avec moi. »

original_en_text: Ah.... your s-song. So long I’ve sat in silence. Tell me... are all songs played now as exquisite as this? Or has time made my hearing unrefined?<hpage>This art is new to me, and my skill is limited, but your appreciation is not unwelcome.<page>Ahh. The beauty of it. It is almost painful to my weary senses. Perhaps though, this pain is merely part of my penitence. <page>Play on, will you? I would join your tune. Just forgive me if my voice has become brutish.
original_zh_text: 啊……你的歌。沉寂太久，现在所有曲子都这般动听吗？还是我耳朵钝了？<hpage>我技艺粗浅，承蒙你不嫌弃。<page>这美感……刺痛我麻木的感官。或许这正是赎罪的一部分。<page>继续演奏，可以么？我想试着应和，尽管嗓音已经嘶哑。
translated_text: ah... It's your song I sat in silence for a long time. Please tell me. How beautiful is the song being played right now? Does Time Make My Hearing Imperfect?<hpage>This art is new to me, and my skills are limited, but your evaluation is not welcome.<page>oh, yeah. Beautiful. There is almost pain in my tired feeling. This pain may be part of the regret.<page>Keep playing, okay? I will add your songs. If my voice is disrespectful, I'll apologize.
secondary_translated_text: Ah, oui. C'est ta chanson que j'ai assise en silence pendant longtemps. Dites-moi à quel point la chanson est-elle belle en ce moment ? Est-ce que le temps rend mon audition imparfaite ?<hpage>Cet art est nouveau pour moi, et mes compétences sont limitées, mais votre évaluation n'est pas la bienvenue.<page>- Oh, oui. magnifique. Il y a presque de la douleur dans ma sensation de fatigue. Cette douleur peut faire partie du regret.<page>Continuez à jouer, ok ? Je vais ajouter vos chansons. Si ma voix est irrespectueuse, je m'excuse.

original_en_text: You refuse to play our sacred melody! Why pause, Weaver-thing? Do you cower at the truths it may illuminate? Surely you are not the lesser sort that bows to fear?<hpage>When the moment calls, Vaultkeeper, I shall listen. For now, your task remains to keep the cylinder safe. And know, you shall answer to my blade if you fail.
original_zh_text: 你拒绝演奏圣歌！在害怕吗，织者？畏惧被照亮的真相？原来你也是怯懦之辈？<hpage>时机到了自然会听。现在你的任务是保管好音筒，若出了纰漏，我的针刃可不认虫。
translated_text: Refuse to play the sacred melody! why are you stopping, weaver? Are you upset by the truth that it may reveal? Aren't you a little man who gives in to fear?<hpage>Chief Financial Officer, I listen to it. For now, your job is to ensure the safety of the gas cylinder. If you fail, you will be responsible for my sword. "
secondary_translated_text: Refusez de jouer la mélodie sacrée ! Pourquoi t'arrêtes-tu, Weavers ? Est-ce que vous êtes dérangé par la vérité qu ' il peut révéler ? N'es-tu pas un petit homme qui cède à la peur ?<hpage>Directeur financier, je vous écoute. Pour l'instant, votre travail est d'assurer la sécurité de la bouteille de gaz. Si vous échouez, vous serez responsable de mon épée. "

translated_text: blessings on this poem?
secondary_translated_text: Bénédictions sur ce poème ?

original_en_text: For our base, we require the gelatinous Mossberry Stew. Its concoction is a druidic art, a jealously guarded secret of the moss-painted caverns deep below us.
original_zh_text: 基底需要苔莓浓汤。配方是沼地德鲁伊的不传之秘。

secondary_translated_text: Pour notre base, nous avons besoin d'un ragoût de mousse gélatineuse. Son mélange est l'art des Druzes, un secret gardé dans les grottes de mousse profondes en dessous de nous.

original_en_text: Report of the Memorium and its maintenance.<br><br>“Containment fails. Memory lost. Excise outer. Maintain inner.<br>Shellwood stasis sustained - Remember.<br>Marrowlands stasis critical - Remember.<br>Verdanian environment exceeded - Destined to forget.”
original_zh_text: 忆廊维缮报告。<br><br>“封存溃败。记忆遗失。切除外区。维持内区。<br>甲木林封存稳定——须铭记。<br>髓骨地封存危急——须铭记。<br>翠庭生态失控——注定遗忘。”
translated_text: About the Memorial and its Maintenance<br><br>"Stop the failure. Loss of memory. Remove the outside. Stay inside the house.<br>The shell and tree stagnation continues.<br>Severe bone marrow arrest - remember.<br>Beyond the dazzling environment - doomed to be forgotten. "
secondary_translated_text: À propos du mémorial et de son entretien<br><br>« Arrêtez l'échec. perte de mémoire. Retirez l'extérieur. Restez à l'intérieur de la maison.<br>La stagnation des coquilles et des arbres continue.<br>Arrêt sévère de la moelle osseuse - rappelez-vous.<br>Au-delà de l'environnement éblouissant - condamné à être oublié. "

original_en_text: Crumpled parchment containing the prayer of a Burning Bug.<br><br>“Hail to your heat! O glorious flame. You who builds and breaks us. Sear our shells. Char them black. That we may rise to join you, wreathed in bright and blazing joy.”
original_zh_text: 焦黑的羊皮纸，一只焚身的虫子在上面留下了祷文。<br><br>“赞美炽焰！噢，荣耀之火！塑造我们，亦毁灭我们。灼烧甲壳，化为焦炭。我们将与您同在，沐浴在炽热光明的愉悦中”
translated_text: A prayer for the burning worm was written on the wrinkled parchment.<br><br>A toast to your passion! The flame of glory. You build us up and destroy us. It leaves a wound in our shell. Please burn them. Then we can stand up and enjoy the bright and burning joy with you. "
secondary_translated_text: Une prière pour le ver brûlant était écrite sur le parchemin ridé.<br><br>Un toast à ta passion ! La flamme de la gloire. Vous nous construisez et nous détruisez. Il laisse une blessure dans notre coquille. Veuillez les brûler. Ensuite, nous pouvons nous lever et profiter de la joie lumineuse et ardente avec vous. "

original_zh_text: 侍奉布道，由受封的书库管理员向其信众宣讲。
translated_text: Sermons of Service to the Trained Believers by Designated Financial Administrators
secondary_translated_text: Sermons de service aux croyants formés par les administrateurs financiers désignés

translated_text: Options Options
secondary_translated_text: Options Options

translated_text: The girl's soul.
secondary_translated_text: L'âme de la jeune fille.

translated_text: The Hunter's Heart.
secondary_translated_text: Le cœur du chasseur.

original_en_text: Long sewing tool, uniquely balanced for combat. The blade is marked by time and use.
original_zh_text: 为战斗设计的特制长针，原身为纺织工具。刃身留有岁月的痕迹。
translated_text: The long stitch tool with its unique balance is suitable for combat. The blade is stamped with time and purpose.
secondary_translated_text: Le long outil de couture avec son équilibre unique convient au combat. La lame est estampillée avec le temps et le but.

translated_text: Matria
secondary_translated_text: Matria

translated_text: Options Options
secondary_translated_text: Options Options

original_en_text: Sacred melody of the Vaultkeepers, coveted and claimed by the pontiff below the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 书库管理员的圣歌，低语书库下方主教梦寐以求的旋律。
translated_text: The sacred melody of the Guardian was desired, and the Pope claimed it lay beneath the arch of the whisper.
secondary_translated_text: La mélodie sacrée du Gardien était désirée, et le Pape prétendit qu ' elle se trouvait sous l'arc du murmure.

translated_text: Finish the game.
secondary_translated_text: Terminez le jeu.

translated_text: What is cultural heritage
secondary_translated_text: Qu ' est-ce que le patrimoine culturel

translated_text: A coat of decline.
secondary_translated_text: Un manteau de déclin !

original_en_text: Adornment strung with a large quantity of rosaries. Can be broken and the rosaries used to trade.
original_zh_text: 串有大量念珠的项链，拆解后取出的念珠可用于交易。
translated_text: A piece of jewelry with a large number of beads. It can be broken and used to trade in beads.
secondary_translated_text: Un bijou avec un grand nombre de perles. Il peut être cassé et utilisé pour le commerce de perles.

original_en_text: Liquid lifeseed extracted from a ripe bud. Possesses regenerative qualities.
original_zh_text: 成熟花苞中提取的生命精华，具有再生功效。
translated_text: Liquid cloves extracted from ripe buds. It has reproduction quality.
secondary_translated_text: Clou de girofle liquide extrait de bourgeons mûrs. Il a une qualité de reproduction.

translated_text: The architect's key
secondary_translated_text: La clé de l'architecte

original_en_text: Carved child’s toy of a bug clad in leaves.
original_zh_text: 披叶虫子造型的儿童玩具。
translated_text: Carved children's toys, worms wrapped only in leaves.
secondary_translated_text: Des jouets pour enfants sculptés, des vers enveloppés uniquement dans des feuilles.

translated_text: The Hidden Soul
secondary_translated_text: L'âme cachée

translated_text: String of roses
secondary_translated_text: Chaîne de roses

translated_text: The Rose Necklace.
secondary_translated_text: Le collier de rose.

translated_text: The pink necklace.
secondary_translated_text: Le collier rose.

translated_text: Souvenirs of the surface
secondary_translated_text: Souvenirs de la surface

original_en_text: Common weapon of Pharloom, still in good condition despite long use. An expertly crafted metal rod with a sharpened tip.
original_zh_text: 纺络的常见武器，精制的金属杆配上锐利的尖端，历久弥新。
translated_text: The general weapons of the Faro are in good condition despite being used for a long time. An elaborate metal bar with a pointed tip.
secondary_translated_text: Les armes générales du Faro sont en bon état malgré leur utilisation depuis longtemps. Une barre métallique élaborée avec une pointe pointue.

translated_text: The roses were worn out.
secondary_translated_text: Les roses étaient épuisées.

translated_text: are you sure?
secondary_translated_text: Tu es sûr ?

translated_text: They sell.
secondary_translated_text: Ils vendent.

original_en_text: Last surgery of Conductor Mizello, performed in Whiteward’s operating theatre.
original_zh_text: 指挥家米泽洛在白愈厅的手术室中进行的最后一场手术。
translated_text: The last thing Mi Zero did was in Whiteward's room.
secondary_translated_text: La dernière chose que Mi Zero a faite était dans la chambre de Whiteward.

translated_text: The Silk Heart
secondary_translated_text: Le cœur de soie

original_en_text: Fine thread spun from the soul of its creator. Highly coveted for its remarkable strength and mystical properties. Used to heal wounds, extend life and weave powerful runes.
original_zh_text: 由其创造者的灵魂纺成的精细丝线，因其非凡的强度和神秘特性而备受珍视。可用于治愈伤口、延续生命，以及编织强力的符文。
translated_text: Matter is woven from the Creator's soul. It is highly regarded for its extraordinary power and mysterious nature. It is used to heal wounds, extend life, and weave powerful runes.
secondary_translated_text: La matière est tissée de l'âme du Créateur. Il est très apprécié pour son pouvoir extraordinaire et sa nature mystérieuse. Il est utilisé pour guérir les blessures, prolonger la vie et tisser de puissantes runes.

translated_text: The Rosary of the Rosary
secondary_translated_text: Le Rosaire du Rosario

original_en_text: Map of Pharloom, partially filled out. Without a quill it cannot be updated.
original_zh_text: 沙克拉绘制的纺络局部地图。可使用羽毛笔更新地图以显示新发现的区域。
translated_text: Map of the Flemish, partly filled. If you don't have a feather pen, you can't update.
secondary_translated_text: Carte du flamand, partiellement remplie. Si vous n'avez pas de stylo à plume, vous ne pouvez pas mettre à jour.

original_en_text: A frustrating fiend. They flee beneath the bone whenever I try to strike them down.
original_zh_text: 恼人的小恶魔，每当我挥针便钻入骸骨缝隙逃遁。
translated_text: He is a depressed demon. Every time I try to take them down, they hide under their bones.
secondary_translated_text: C'est un démon déprimé. Chaque fois que je tente de les abattre, ils se cachent sous leurs os.

translated_text: Captain pound
secondary_translated_text: Le capitaine Pound

original_en_text: Is this abundance a sign of purity or greed? The way faith is measured in this land is curious indeed.
original_zh_text: 这般财富象征着虔信还是贪婪？多数虫肯定视此等囤积为罪孽。
translated_text: This wealth is only a sign of purity or greed. The way we measure faith in this land is indeed strange.
secondary_translated_text: Cette richesse n'est qu ' un signe de pureté ou de cupidité. La façon dont nous mesurons la foi dans cette terre est vraiment étrange.

original_en_text: Once they summoned song from their subjects. Now they rise only to command an end to those unstrung.
original_zh_text: 昔日的乐章指挥者，如今只为剿灭清醒者而挥棒。
translated_text: He has a song on the theme. Now, they are only standing up to command those who are not finished.
secondary_translated_text: Il a une chanson sur le thème. Maintenant, ils ne se lèvent que pour commander ceux qui ne sont pas terminés.

translated_text: Sherking Kahn
secondary_translated_text: par Sherking Kahn

original_en_text: Automatons of impeccable construction, welcoming entrants to their chamber with a display of deadly dance.
original_zh_text: 以致命舞姿迎接访客的精密自动机。
translated_text: The robot's structure is perfect, and you are welcomed into the room with a deadly dance.
secondary_translated_text: La structure du robot est parfaite, et vous êtes accueilli dans la pièce avec une danse mortelle.

original_en_text: Mad matriarch of the Slab rarely seen outside her warren. From her all jailers are born and bred.
original_zh_text: 罪石牢狱的癫狂主宰，所有狱卒皆由其孕育。
translated_text: The mad queen of slate is rarely seen outside her territory. All the prisoners were born and raised under her.
secondary_translated_text: La reine folle de l'ardoise est rarement vue en dehors de son territoire. Tous les prisonniers sont nés et élevés sous elle.

original_en_text: Flight it possesses, but only just. It may lift from the stone, but those sad wings would never carry it far.
original_zh_text: 那对萎缩的翅膀勉强能使它们离地数尺，但没法飞多远。
translated_text: He has the ability to fly, but that's all. It may fly out of stones, but its sad wings never go far.
secondary_translated_text: Il a la capacité de voler, mais c'est tout. Il peut voler des pierres, mais ses tristes ailes ne vont jamais loin.

translated_text: Pilgrimage Guides
secondary_translated_text: Guides de pèlerinage

translated_text: Trobbio
secondary_translated_text: Trobbio

original_en_text: Mindless infant larva, coated in thick slime.
translated_text: The body of a baby larva without a brain is covered with thick mucus.
secondary_translated_text: Le corps d'une larve de bébé sans cerveau est recouvert de mucus épais.

original_en_text: Chief and chaplain of the Stilkin, forever raging against the Citadel that chokes their caves and sees them suffer.
original_zh_text: 斯提金部族酋长兼祭司，对圣堡切齿痛恨——圣堡毁掉了斯提金部族的洞穴，令其族虫苦不堪言。
translated_text: The chieftains and priests of Stilkin were always angry with the castle, which had sealed off their caves and watched them suffer.
secondary_translated_text: Les chefs et les prêtres de Stilkin étaient toujours en colère contre le château, qui avait scellé leurs grottes et les avait vus souffrir.

translated_text: Servant Boran
secondary_translated_text: Servant Boran

translated_text: Alita
secondary_translated_text: Alita

original_en_text: An essential bug if one ever hoped to navigate that dark maze of stacks and scrolls.
original_zh_text: 如果没有此虫引路，没有其他虫能在那个由书卷堆砌的黑暗迷宫中穿行。
translated_text: If one tries to cross the dark labyrinth of a mountain of books and scrolls, it is a necessary mistake.
secondary_translated_text: Si l'on essaie de traverser le labyrinthe sombre d'une montagne de livres et de rouleaux, c'est une erreur nécessaire.

original_en_text: Child of Verdania, fully capable to fight despite its young age.
original_zh_text: 翠庭的幼童，虽年幼却战力完备。
translated_text: Vildania's children were capable of combat despite their young age.
secondary_translated_text: Les enfants de Vildania étaient capables de combattre malgré leur jeune âge.

original_en_text: Their thick shroud leaves them sightless, yet it seems to matter little. They have no care for their own safety, wishing only to charge at those they sense as sinful.
original_zh_text: 厚罩使其目不能视，却仍疯狂冲击周围感知到的“罪人”。
translated_text: A thick shroud covered his eyes, but that didn't matter. They don't care about their own safety, they just want to accuse people they think are guilty.
secondary_translated_text: Un épais drapeau couvrait ses yeux, mais cela n'avait pas d'importance. Ils ne se soucient pas de leur propre sécurité, ils veulent juste accuser des gens qu ' ils pensent coupables.

translated_text: Talclaw
secondary_translated_text: Talclaw.

original_en_text: Large, gelatinous drifter. Chases away threats by hurling its bulk around.
original_zh_text: 巨大的凝胶状漂浮生物。利用自己身体冲撞，驱赶威胁。
translated_text: A huge gel-like drift. Reducing threats by expanding the size of the threat.
secondary_translated_text: Une grande dérive gel-like. Réduire les menaces en augmentant la taille de la menace.

translated_text: Elders of the choir
secondary_translated_text: Les aînés du choeur

original_en_text: Aggressive fly of Pharloom’s lowlands. Rams prey with its hardbone mask.
original_zh_text: 纺络低地区域的暴脾气飞蝇，善于使用骨质头甲冲撞猎物。
translated_text: A fly in the lowlands of Falaim. He uses a hard mask to hunt.
secondary_translated_text: Un mouche dans les basses terres de Falaim. Il utilise un masque pour chasser.

original_en_text: Blade maiden of a once renown warrior sect, survived long beyond the rest of her order.
original_zh_text: 纺络曾出现过一个赫赫有名的勇士宗派，而这位女针客就是其最后的幸存者。
translated_text: The once infamous samurai Lady Blade has survived longer than any of her other sects.
secondary_translated_text: L'infâme samouraï Lady Blade a survécu plus longtemps que n'importe quelle de ses autres sectes.

translated_text: Servant Egam
secondary_translated_text: Servant Egam

original_en_text: Blindingly fast, winged warrior able to launch pointed pinions from its forelimbs.
original_zh_text: 能从前肢发射尖刺的极速飞翼勇士。
translated_text: A winged warrior can fire sharp feather-like protrusions from his forearm at astonishing speeds.
secondary_translated_text: Un guerrier ailé peut tirer des saillies de plumes aiguës de son avant-bras à des vitesses étonnantes.

translated_text: Judge, Judge
secondary_translated_text: Juge, juge

translated_text: The Final Judge.
secondary_translated_text: Le Juge Final.

translated_text: Paley Warden
secondary_translated_text: Paley le gardien

original_en_text: Leaping hunter of a bygone age. The swiftest of their sect, deftly skilled with spinning foreblades.
original_zh_text: 善用旋转刀刃的传奇猎手，曾以速度称霸整个派系。
translated_text: Jump Hunters of the Past The cleverest in their camp skillfully turned their fore swords.
secondary_translated_text: Les chasseurs de sauts du passé Les plus habiles de leur camp tournaient habilement leurs épées avant.

original_en_text: They seek to slay their only chance at survival. Alas, any words would fall useless. I have only my blade to offer response.
original_zh_text: 它们想要斩断族群最后的生机。我任何的言语劝解皆为徒劳，唯有利刃能终结这愚行。
translated_text: They are aiming for their only chance to survive. Oh, nothing will work. I replied with a knife.
secondary_translated_text: Ils cherchent leur seule chance de survivre. Oh, rien ne fonctionnera. Je répondis avec un couteau.

translated_text: The widow
secondary_translated_text: La veuve

original_en_text: They call out to warn their fellows at the smallest sense of threat. A successful hunt here means staying silent and hidden right up until the decisive strike.
original_zh_text: 稍有威胁迹象便会向同伴鸣叫示警。在此地成功捕猎的秘诀，在于无声潜行直至发动致命一击前的最后一刻。
translated_text: When you feel the slightest sense of threat, you send a warning to your companion. Successful hunting here means hiding silently before the decisive blow.
secondary_translated_text: Lorsque vous ressentez le moindre sentiment de menace, vous envoyez un avertissement à votre compagnon. La chasse réussie ici signifie se cacher silencieusement avant le coup décisif.

translated_text: Calling for a Savior.
secondary_translated_text: Appel à un Sauveur.

original_en_text: Though the Weavers have long passed from Pharloom, this servant still performs its function.
original_zh_text: 纺络的织者虽已绝迹，这位仆从仍恪守古老的职责。
translated_text: The loom has left Pharaoh, but the servant has done his duty.
secondary_translated_text: Le tisser a quitté le Pharaon, mais le serviteur a accompli son devoir.

original_en_text: Hard-shelled bug with a climber’s pin. Their pin, once aid, has become a weapon, though the bug is unrefined in its use.
original_zh_text: 身负硬壳的朝圣者，将攀爬用的长针作为武器，尽管使用手法粗陋。
translated_text: A lizard insect with a stinging needle. Their pin was once an aid, and now it's a weapon, but its misuse is not perfect.
secondary_translated_text: Un insecte de lézard avec une aiguille piquant. Leur épingle était autrefois une aide, et maintenant c'est une arme, mais son mauvais usage n'est pas parfait.

original_en_text: Huge ant hunter tasked to protect the stores and passages of its tribe.
original_zh_text: 守护部族仓库及通道的重甲巨蚁。
translated_text: The mission of the Giant Ant Hunter is to protect the shops and corridors of the tribe.
secondary_translated_text: La mission du chasseur de fourmis géant est de protéger les magasins et les couloirs de la tribu.

original_en_text: Staunch and skilled bladebug of a once flourishing land lost to time.
original_zh_text: 失落王朝的精锐刀虫，双刃技法堪称艺术。
translated_text: In this once-prosperous land, the strong and skilled Breadboys have disappeared over time.
secondary_translated_text: Dans cette terre autrefois prospère, les forts et habiles Breadboys ont disparu au fil du temps.

original_en_text: Aged pilgrim, overgrown with lichen and moss.
original_zh_text: 浑身覆满地衣苔藓的老迈信徒，会从胃囊喷射苔藓团块攻击。
translated_text: The elderly pilgrims were covered in lichen and moss.
secondary_translated_text: Les pèlerins âgés étaient recouverts de lichen et de mousse.

original_en_text: There is no finesse in its use of Silk. It consumes its slim supply only to amplify its force.
original_zh_text: 它对灵丝的运用毫无精妙可言，只是消耗那本就稀少的灵丝储备来增强自身的力量。
translated_text: No silk technology is used. Consume a small supply to amplify its power.
secondary_translated_text: Aucune technologie de soie n'est utilisée. Consommer une petite alimentation pour amplifier sa puissance.

original_en_text: Steel horned floater, able to defend itself and its companions.
original_zh_text: 长有螺旋犄角的浮空甲虫，能够有效保卫自身与同伴。
translated_text: The Steel Horn Buoy protects itself and its companions.
secondary_translated_text: La bouée d'acier se protège elle-même et ses compagnons.

original_en_text: Tormented will of countless husks made manifest in a pit of Silk dregs.
original_zh_text: 灵丝残渣深坑中凝聚无数空壳的怨念集合体。
translated_text: Countless shells of anguished wills appeared in the ruins.
secondary_translated_text: D'innombrables coquilles de volontés angoissées sont apparues dans les ruines.

original_en_text: That they ever hoped to keep their domain clean... What futility.
original_zh_text: 妄图维持这片土地的洁净……何等徒劳。
translated_text: What a waste of time it was to keep the territory clean.
secondary_translated_text: Quelle perte de temps pour garder le territoire propre.

translated_text: Fared Diver
secondary_translated_text: par Fared Diver

original_en_text: I would very much like to feel their soft fur, if only they weren’t so hostile.
original_zh_text: 要不是它们现在对谁都充满敌意，我真想摸摸这身柔软的绒毛。
translated_text: If you're not hostile, you really want to feel their soft fur.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous n'êtes pas hostile, vous voulez vraiment sentir leur fourrure douce.

original_en_text: This kingdom appears more advanced in metalwork than my own ever was, in great part due to the natural heat source at its base. Working in such an environment is an impressive feat.
original_zh_text: 此地的冶金技术远超我的故国，全因地下天然热源的优势。能在如此高温环境中劳作生存，实为壮举。
translated_text: This kingdom of nature seems to be more advanced than mine when it comes to metalworking, but this is mainly due to the heat source at its bottom. To work in such an environment is an impressive feat.
secondary_translated_text: Ce royaume de la nature semble être plus avancé que le mien en matière de métallurgie, mais cela est principalement dû à la source de chaleur à son fond. Travailler dans un tel environnement est un exploit remarquable.

original_en_text: Aerial worker lost to Pharloom’s Haunting. Bears a pouch full with flintstone which they will fling at intruders.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的空中劳工，随身携带一个装满燧石的袋子，投掷燧石攻击入侵者。
translated_text: The passengers died because of the suffering of Phalém. The bear has a bag full of grinding stones and throws it at the intruder.
secondary_translated_text: Les passagers sont morts à cause de la souffrance de Phalém. L'ours a un sac rempli de pierres de meulage et le jette sur l'intrus.

original_en_text: Haughty thespian convinced that only dazzling performance can raise Pharloom from the throes of death.
original_zh_text: 坚信华丽演出能拯救纺络的傲慢演员。
translated_text: The arrogant actor believed that only dazzling acting would save Faro from the agony of death.
secondary_translated_text: L'acteur arrogant croyait que seul le jeu éblouissant sauverait Faro de l'agonie de la mort.

translated_text: Scavenger
secondary_translated_text: Scavenger

translated_text: Leaf glider
secondary_translated_text: Le Glider

translated_text: Clovis Tower
secondary_translated_text: Tour de Clovis

translated_text: The Fourth Choir
secondary_translated_text: Le quatrième choeur

original_en_text: Hard-shelled insect common upon the surface of Shellwood Pond. Once a staple food for passing pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 甲木林池沼的硬壳水栖虫，曾是朝圣者途中的主要食物。
translated_text: A common hard-skinned insect found on the surface of a shell pool. It was once a staple food for pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: Un insecte commun à peau dure trouvé à la surface d'un bassin de coquillages. C'était autrefois un aliment de base pour les pèlerins.

original_en_text: Old knight consumed by black thread.
translated_text: The old knight was swallowed up in the black line.
secondary_translated_text: Le vieux chevalier fut englouti dans la ligne noire.

original_en_text: I would not have guessed so large and marvelous a flea existed. I am pleased it saw sense before I had to strike a killing blow.
original_zh_text: 我未曾料想竟存在如此巨大的跳蚤。幸好它在最后关头恢复理智，免于我下杀手。
translated_text: I didn't think there was such a big flea I was glad to see the truth before I gave him a fatal blow.
secondary_translated_text: Je ne pensais pas qu 'il y avait une puce si grande que j'étais heureux de voir la vérité avant de lui donner un coup mortel.

original_en_text: A terrifying achievement of Pharloom, to build a construct so large and yet so nimble.
original_zh_text: 竟能建造出如此庞大却又灵巧非凡的构造，实乃纺络工造技艺巅峰之作。
translated_text: For Faro, the construction of such a large, flexible building was a formidable achievement.
secondary_translated_text: Pour Faro, la construction d'un bâtiment aussi grand et flexible a été une réalisation formidable.

translated_text: Band Baggerman
secondary_translated_text: Le groupe Baggerman

translated_text: Mr. Maestro.
secondary_translated_text: Monsieur le Maestro.

translated_text: Fuck you.
secondary_translated_text: Merde à toi.

original_en_text: Their rough, ridged shell grips tight to any surface. Even walls and roofs become pathways for these nimble bugs.
original_zh_text: 粗糙的带棱甲壳可攀附任何表面。峭壁和洞顶对它们来说都是畅通无阻的道路。
translated_text: Its coarse, bulging shell adheres firmly to any surface. Even walls and roofs can be a passageway for these agile insects.
secondary_translated_text: Sa coquille grossière et gonflée adhère fermement à n'importe quelle surface. Même les murs et les toits peuvent être un passage pour ces insectes agiles.

translated_text: Equipment security guard
secondary_translated_text: Garde de sécurité équipement

translated_text: The Lost Chamomile
secondary_translated_text: La camomile perdue

original_en_text: Nature distorted... This bug was born tiny and mild. The Citadel deformed it in futile hope it may sustain.
original_zh_text: 自然天性惨遭扭曲..……此虫原本小巧温顺，却被圣堡强行改造。它的改造者竟然妄想它能承受这种畸变……
translated_text: Nature is distorted. These bacteria are small and gentle in nature. The castle twisted it, and hoped in vain that it would continue.
secondary_translated_text: La nature est déformée. Ces bactéries sont petites et douces par nature. Le château le tordit, et espérait en vain qu ' il continuerait.

translated_text: Skeleton scooter
secondary_translated_text: Skeleton Scooter

original_en_text: They would make effective hunting companions, though even without the Haunting I suspect their loyalty would always remain to their clan.
original_zh_text: 它们是优秀的狩猎伙伴。就算没有丝咒作祟，我相信它们也会永远忠于自己的部族。
translated_text: They will be effective hunting companions, but even without the ghosts, their loyalty to the tribe is unlikely to remain forever.
secondary_translated_text: Ils seront des compagnons de chasse efficaces, mais même sans les fantômes, leur loyauté envers la tribu est peu susceptible de rester éternellement.

translated_text: The horses.
secondary_translated_text: Les chevaux.

original_en_text: Shell plated worm that lives beneath pools of shifting sand.
original_zh_text: 潜伏流沙之底的板甲蠕虫，突袭吞噬猎物。
translated_text: A shellworm that inhabits a pond of quicksand.
secondary_translated_text: Un vers de coquille qui habite un étang de sable mou.

translated_text: Huge cock
secondary_translated_text: énorme cock

original_en_text: Large male Driznit, ferocious and territorial. Fires its heavy coral mask at intruders.
original_zh_text: 领地意识强烈的雄性掷面虫，投掷其沉重的珊瑚面甲御敌。
translated_text: The large male Desnit is fierce and has a clear outline. Shoot heavy coral masks at invaders.
secondary_translated_text: Le grand mâle Desnit est féroce et a une silhouette claire. Tirez sur des masques de corail lourds sur les envahisseurs.

original_en_text: With its wranglers long dead, the Moorwing stalked the towers of Greymoor, feasting on passing pilgrims and tenders alike.
original_zh_text: 自从其驯兽师死后，荒沼翼主常年盘踞在灰沼的众多高塔，猎食过往的朝圣者和居民。
translated_text: With the ranger dead, the swamp wings roamed the towers of Graymore, feeding the passing pilgrims and gentlemen.
secondary_translated_text: Avec le ranger mort, les ailes du marécage parcouraient les tours de Graymore, nourrissant les pèlerins et les messieurs qui passaient.

original_en_text: Hiding its tongue amongst fronds so similar... There is impressive style to this one’s trickery.
original_zh_text: 将捕食舌伪装在相似钟乳石间的策略，展现惊人的欺诈美学。
translated_text: Keep your tongue covered in such a leaf. This guy's trick style is impressive.
secondary_translated_text: Gardez la langue couverte dans une telle feuille. Le style de ce type est impressionnant.

original_en_text: Scissor-wielding bug charged to cut and spool fallen dregs of Silk for return to the Citadel above.
original_zh_text: 挥舞剪刀处理灵丝碎屑的工匠虫，处理好的灵丝会被送回圣堡。
translated_text: The insect, wielding the scissors, cuts the fallen piece of silk, winds it up and returns it to the upper castle.
secondary_translated_text: L'insecte, brandissant les ciseaux, coupe le morceau de soie tombé, le remet et le retourne au château supérieur.

translated_text: Cogwork underfly
secondary_translated_text: Cogwork sous-voler

original_en_text: What seems at first a purely defensive mechanism may also be necessary to rid this creature of excess heat.
original_zh_text: 看似防御的行为，实为排出过量热量的必要生理机制。
translated_text: A seemingly pure defense mechanism may also be necessary to remove this biological excess heat.
secondary_translated_text: Un mécanisme de défense apparemment pur peut également être nécessaire pour éliminer cet excès de chaleur biologique.

translated_text: Slag shell
secondary_translated_text: Slag shell

original_en_text: For his stern stewardship his legions seemed utterly loyal. For less combative bugs his would have been a hard rule.
original_zh_text: 其铁腕统治赢得了军团的绝对忠诚，但对非战斗种群来说则是暴政。
translated_text: Because of his strict management, his legion seemed completely loyal. His rules are difficult rules for less aggressive bacteria.
secondary_translated_text: En raison de sa gestion stricte, sa légion semblait complètement fidèle. Ses règles sont des règles difficiles pour les bactéries moins agressives.

translated_text: cluster craig
secondary_translated_text: Le cluster Craig

original_en_text: Remains of a Citadel bug possessed by Silk dregs. The husk will lash out wildly with the many sharp pins caught inside its thread.
original_zh_text: 被灵丝残渣控制的圣堡残躯，用丝线中缠绕的尖针发动无序攻击。
translated_text: The remains of a castle worm possessed by silk remnants. The shell is fired violently, and many sharp needles snag into its line.
secondary_translated_text: Les restes d'un ver de château possédé par des restes de soie. L'obus est tiré violemment, et de nombreuses aiguilles tranchantes se précipitent dans sa ligne.

original_en_text: Altered servant of the Citadel’s Whiteward, responsible for the cremation of husks and the recycling of Silk from their shells.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅改造仆从，负责火化躯壳并回收灵丝。
translated_text: The servants of Whiteward Castle burned the shells and recycled the silk.
secondary_translated_text: Les serviteurs du château de Whiteward ont brûlé les coquilles et recyclé la soie.

original_en_text: Short elder crawbug eagerly serving in their court.
original_zh_text: 热衷审判的矮小腐囊虫长老。
translated_text: A small old crab served diligently at the court.
secondary_translated_text: Un petit vieux crabe servait diligemment à la cour.

translated_text: Stirgin
secondary_translated_text: Le Stirgin

original_en_text: Theirs is the perfect shell for their duty, a wall of a warrior and an adept fighter. If I hope to claim their treasures, I must bring my best.
original_zh_text: 它们拥有攻防兼备的重型甲壳，能完美适配其守卫的差事。想要取得它们看守的宝物，必须做好全力以赴战斗的准备。
translated_text: Their shields are the perfect shell for the performance of their duties, and a high wall for soldiers and skilled soldiers. If I want their treasure, I have to throw away my best. "
secondary_translated_text: Leurs boucliers sont la coquille parfaite pour l'exécution de leurs devoirs, et un haut mur pour les soldats et les soldats habiles. Si je veux leur trésor, je dois jeter mon meilleur. "

translated_text: Water of Water
secondary_translated_text: Eau d'eau

translated_text: The Golden Reef
secondary_translated_text: Le Golden Reef

original_en_text: Their bells would once have rung with hope and mirth, lifting the spirits of any climbing companions. Sadly, those instruments have turned purely to combative use.
original_zh_text: 这些钟曾为众多朝圣者奏响希望与欢乐的乐章。而今却成了投向清醒者的凶器——仿佛要砸碎最后一丝未被腐蚀的理智。
translated_text: Their bells were once full of hope and joy, and lifted the spirits of mountaineers. Unfortunately, these tools are purely used in combat.
secondary_translated_text: Leurs cloches étaient autrefois pleines d'espoir et de joie, et élevaient l'esprit des alpinistes. Malheureusement, ces outils sont purement utilisés dans le combat.

translated_text: Quality of voids
secondary_translated_text: Qualité des vide

translated_text: Drifting Forest
secondary_translated_text: Drifting forêt

translated_text: Memorisin
secondary_translated_text: Mémoires

translated_text: La Vallaga
secondary_translated_text: La Vallaga

original_en_text: The way they skate along the water’s surface is so elegant. Surely it is a skill that can be learned? When time permits, I should attempt the task.
original_zh_text: 如此优雅的水面滑行技艺，或许可以通过练习掌握？待战事稍歇，我定要试试这 "凌波微步"。
translated_text: The way you slide down along the water is so graceful. This is a skill you can learn, right? If time permits, I would like to do this job.
secondary_translated_text: La façon dont vous glissez le long de l'eau est si gracieuse. C'est une compétence que vous pouvez apprendre, non ? Si le temps me le permet, j'aimerais faire ce travail.

original_en_text: A creature long familiar to me. I suspect that no matter how far I travel, if I descend deep enough they will always be there.
original_zh_text: 这种生物于我而言早已熟悉。无论我跋涉多远，只要深入足够的地底，它们必会如影随形。
translated_text: It is a creature we have known for a long time. No matter how far you go, if you dig deep, I think they'll be there forever.
secondary_translated_text: C'est une créature que nous connaissons depuis longtemps. Peu importe jusqu 'où vous allez, si vous creusez profondément, je pense qu' ils seront là pour toujours.

original_en_text: When defeated, it splits into many smaller forms. Yet another remarkable creature of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 击败后分裂为多个小型个体。圣堡崛起前，纺络土地上又一奇异而非凡的生灵。
translated_text: When defeated, it splits into many smaller shapes. Before the monarch, this land is another extraordinary creature.
secondary_translated_text: Lorsqu ' il est vaincu, il se divise en de nombreuses formes plus petites. Avant le monarque, cette terre était une autre créature extraordinaire.

translated_text: Pilgrim's Bell With Wings
secondary_translated_text: La cloche du pèlerin avec des ailes

original_en_text: Winged insect with a flaky shell that perfectly mimics its environment.
original_zh_text: 拥有一副古怪甲壳的飞虫，能完美拟态周围环境。
translated_text: They are winged insects whose shells perfectly mimic their environment.
secondary_translated_text: Ce sont des insectes ailés dont les coquilles imitent parfaitement leur environnement.

translated_text: and the ticks
secondary_translated_text: et les tics

original_en_text: Unnaturally overgrown Mossgrub, bred within the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 圣堡忆廊培育的变异苔原蠕虫。
translated_text: The castle memorial is covered with unnatural moss.
secondary_translated_text: Le mémorial du château est recouvert de mousse non naturelle.

original_en_text: While these bothersome bugs are left free to forage, no loose rosary or trinket is safe.
original_zh_text: 只要这些可恶的虫子尚存，任何散落的念珠与宝物皆不得安宁。
translated_text: These annoying bugs are free to eat their food, but they are safe without loose rosaries and ornaments.
secondary_translated_text: Ces insectes gênants sont libres de manger leur nourriture, mais ils sont en sécurité sans chapelets et ornements lâches.

original_en_text: Younger form of a Muckroach. Attacks prey by leaping from the water and snapping with its flexible jaws.
original_zh_text: 淤泥蟑螂的近亲变种，形态更类似于蛆虫。
translated_text: Childhood of cockroaches. They jump out of the water and attack their prey by flexing their jaws with their flexible jaws.
secondary_translated_text: Enfance des cafards. Ils sautent de l'eau et attaquent leurs proies en pliant leurs mâchoires avec leurs mâchoires flexibles.

original_en_text: Elite former hunter acting as the final line of defence before their mother.
original_zh_text: 精锐的猎手，曾作为最后防线守卫它们的母亲。
translated_text: An elite ex-hunter is the last line of defense before his mother.
secondary_translated_text: Un ancien chasseur d'élite est la dernière ligne de défense face à sa mère.

original_en_text: All are haunted here, the jailers and the jailed. Do they realise they will never leave this place? Or how long they have stayed already?
original_zh_text: 此处的狱卒与囚徒皆被丝咒侵蚀。它们可曾意识到自己将永远无法逃离此地？是否知道已经在这地方困了多久？
translated_text: Everyone, prisoners and guards alike, has become a ghost. Do you know that they will never leave this place? How long are they here?
secondary_translated_text: Tout le monde, prisonniers et gardes, est devenu un fantôme. Savez-vous qu 'ils ne quitteront jamais cet endroit ? Combien de temps sont-ils ici ?

translated_text: Minino
secondary_translated_text: Minin

original_en_text: Such feeble creatures could only survive thanks to the rarity of predators in these super-heated caverns.
original_zh_text: 唯有在这缺乏天敌的高温洞穴中，如此脆弱的生物方能幸存。
translated_text: This fragile creature is able to survive because there are few predators in these ultra-high temperature caves.
secondary_translated_text: Cette créature fragile est capable de survivre car il y a peu de prédateurs dans ces grottes à très haute température.

original_en_text: Fully grown mollusc able to unleash a gushing torrent of burning fluid from its back.
original_zh_text: 成年软体生物，能从背部喷射灼热流体洪流
translated_text: Mature molluscs can spit a burning liquid from their backs.
secondary_translated_text: Les mollusques matures peuvent cracher un liquide brûlant de leur dos.

original_en_text: By this swooping menace, a simple bug could be easily overcome. More dangerous still, they rarely attack alone.
original_zh_text: 对于其单个个体，尚可周旋，但它们鲜少单独行动。成群俯冲时，普通虫类极易被瞬间击溃。
translated_text: With this diving threat, simple mistakes can be easily overcome. Even more dangerous is the fact that they rarely attack alone.
secondary_translated_text: Avec cette menace de plongée, des erreurs simples peuvent être facilement surmontées. Encore plus dangereux est le fait qu ' ils attaquent rarement seuls.

original_en_text: A common enough bug, though not to be underestimated. The acuteness of their other senses more than makes up for their lack of vision.
original_zh_text: 一种相当常见的虫子，但不可小觑——它们其他感官的敏锐完全弥补了视觉的缺陷。
translated_text: This is a common mistake, but it cannot be underestimated. The sharpness of other senses is sufficient to compensate for the lack of vision.
secondary_translated_text: C'est une erreur commune, mais il ne faut pas la sous-estimer. L'acuité des autres sens suffit à compenser le manque de vision.

original_en_text: Darting predator that clings fast to roofs and outcrops, often summoned to aid its larger companions.
original_zh_text: 擅长攀附在岩顶或峭壁的飞镖猎手，常被其大型同伴叫来支援。
translated_text: Fast predators, firmly attached to roofs and outcrops, are often called in to help their larger companions.
secondary_translated_text: Les prédateurs rapides, fermement attachés aux toits et aux affleurements, sont souvent appelés à venir en aide à leurs plus grands compagnons.

original_en_text: Is it the Haunting that drove them to cackling madness, or was their unending toil the cause even before that?
original_zh_text: 究竟是丝咒导致了疯癫，还是在无尽苦役中早已精神失常？答案已无从考据。
translated_text: Does the ghost drive them mad, or is it the cause of their endless efforts?
secondary_translated_text: Est-ce que le fantôme les rend fous ou est-ce la cause de leurs efforts sans fin ?

original_en_text: Short, nimble bug who uses barbed bolas to keep beasts corralled and caged.
original_zh_text: 矮小敏捷的饲育者，擅于使用带刺流星索圈养腐汁蟑螂。
translated_text: A small, agile insect that uses short stings to encase wild animals in cages.
secondary_translated_text: Petit insecte agile qui utilise de courtes piqûres pour enfermer les animaux sauvages dans des cages.

translated_text: Grumsack
secondary_translated_text: Le Grumsack

original_en_text: Despite their youth, they are impressive opponents. It seems likely their tribe were trained for combat from birth.
original_zh_text: 虽然年轻却训练有素，显然它们从出生开始就被部族作为战士培养。
translated_text: They are an impressive opponent despite their youth. Their tribe seems to have been training in combat from the time they were born.
secondary_translated_text: C'est un adversaire formidable malgré sa jeunesse. Leur tribu semble avoir été entraînée au combat depuis le moment de leur naissance.

translated_text: Beagle, Beagle
secondary_translated_text: Beagle, Beagle.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Whispering Vaults, tasked to navigate its dim recesses to retrieve old scrolls.
original_zh_text: 低语书库的信徒，负责在幽暗的书库中搜寻古籍。
translated_text: The baron whispers in the treasure vault that his mission was to search for ancient scrolls in the depths of darkness.
secondary_translated_text: Le baron chuchote dans le coffre-trésor que sa mission était de chercher des rouleaux anciens dans les profondeurs des ténèbres.

original_en_text: This one’s strength was much enhanced by stolen soul. They are not the first who tried to hoard it, or to mould it towards such violent ends.
original_zh_text: 靠着窃取灵魂强化自己的力量，他并非第一个妄图驾驭此力的施暴者。
