translated_text: This man's strength was greatly enhanced by his stolen soul. They are not the first to try to hoard it or push it into such violent ends.
secondary_translated_text: La force de cet homme a été grandement renforcée par son âme volée. Ils ne sont pas les premiers à essayer de les accumuler ou de les pousser à des fins aussi violentes.

original_en_text: With all the refuse collapsing throughout their domain, the worker’s stiff shell would be essential if they held any hope to survive.
original_zh_text: 在废墟持续崩塌的领域，硬化甲壳成为他们最后的生存保障。
translated_text: With all the rubbish in the area crumbling, the workers' shells are vital to their hope of survival.
secondary_translated_text: Avec toutes les ordures de la région en train de s'effondrer, les coquilles des travailleurs sont vitales pour leur espoir de survie.

original_en_text: Civilisation encroaches from this kingdom’s crown, but the lowlands are still ruled by great beasts. Its roar stirs something deep within me, some primal instinct.
original_zh_text: 文明从王冠之地蔓延开来，但低地区域仍是野兽的疆域。它的咆哮唤醒了我血脉深处的某种原始悸动。
translated_text: Civilization has invaded the crown of the kingdom, but the lowlands are still ruled by beasts. And that growl triggered something in me, a primitive instinct.
secondary_translated_text: La civilisation a envahi la couronne du royaume, mais les basses terres sont toujours gouvernées par des bêtes. Et ce grognement a déclenché quelque chose en moi, un instinct primitif.

original_en_text: The poor creature has lived a life too calm and coddled. It would not fare well in the world beyond its walls.
original_zh_text: 这可怜虫一生过于安逸，若离开高墙庇护必难存活。
translated_text: The poor creature lived a life too calm and spoiled. It doesn't work out in the world outside the walls.
secondary_translated_text: La pauvre créature a vécu une vie trop calme et gâtée. Cela ne fonctionne pas en dehors des murs.

original_en_text: Lithe, winged scouts frequently paired with their heavier brethren.
original_zh_text: 与重装部队配合作战的敏捷翼兵。
translated_text: Lightly armed reconnaissance aircraft are usually paired with heavily armed reconnaissance aircraft.
secondary_translated_text: Les avions de reconnaissance légèrement armés sont généralement jumelés avec des avions de reconnaissance lourdement armés.

translated_text: The Funerals
secondary_translated_text: Les funérailles

original_en_text: Their throwing weapon is well-suited to the wide caverns they inhabit. These sly little bugs must have a keen claw for crafting.
original_zh_text: 其长索武器的高效性在栖居的宽阔洞窟中总能发挥到极致，这般狡诈的小虫竟也有颗巧匠之心。
translated_text: Their throwing weapons are perfect for the huge caves they live in. These cunning little insects need sharp claws to make them.
secondary_translated_text: Leurs armes de lancement sont parfaites pour les grottes immenses dans lesquelles ils vivent. Ces petits insectes sournois ont besoin de griffes pointues pour les fabriquer.

original_en_text: Toughened Kai capable of extending sharp spikes from within its shellsack.
original_zh_text: 甲囊中可弹出尖刺的硬化凯虫。
translated_text: Strong Kay was able to insert a sharp spike from a pocket in the shell.
secondary_translated_text: Strong Kay a pu insérer une pointe tranchante d'une poche dans la coquille.

original_en_text: An impressive act of mimicry. To match so closely with its land, their clover caves must have sustained through generations uncounted.
original_zh_text: 与环境的契合程度，印证了千万年演化的精妙。
translated_text: A very impressive imitation. To match closely with the land, their clover caves must have lasted for generations.
secondary_translated_text: Une très impressionnante imitation. Pour correspondre étroitement à la terre, leurs grottes de trèfle doivent avoir duré des générations.

original_en_text: This bug is soft and clumsy, but to its fortune its home caves seem relatively free of effective predators. I wonder why that is.
original_zh_text: 这种虫子柔弱笨拙，所幸其栖息洞穴缺乏高效捕食者。此地的生态平衡奥秘值得探究。
translated_text: This bug is soft and stupid, but fortunately it doesn't seem to have an effective predator in its home caves. I want to know why this happened.
secondary_translated_text: Ce bug est doux et stupide, mais heureusement il ne semble pas avoir un prédateur efficace dans ses grottes d'origine. Je veux savoir pourquoi cela s'est produit.

original_en_text: Towering iron automaton, driven by rotor and cog.
original_zh_text: 由齿轮驱动的巨型铁质自动机。
translated_text: Automatic machinery of high-speed railway driven by rotating wheels and gears.
secondary_translated_text: Machinerie automatique de chemin de fer à grande vitesse entraînée par roues et engrenages rotatifs.

original_en_text: Small bug that crafts a shell of sharpened coral. Spins its shell at rapid speed to cut through crust and bone.
original_zh_text: 用锋利珊瑚作为外壳的小型生物，旋转切割无往不利。
translated_text: Small insects can be made from the shells of sharp corals. Rotate the shell to cut the skin and bones.
secondary_translated_text: Les petits insectes peuvent être fabriqués à partir des coquilles de coraux tranchants. Tournez la coquille pour couper la peau et les os.

original_en_text: Plump, plentiful drifter of a coral past.
original_zh_text: 昔日围绕珊瑚塔群居的漂浮生物。
translated_text: Once upon a time, there were large coral reefs and plenty of drift.
secondary_translated_text: Il était une fois, il y avait de grands récifs coralliens et beaucoup de dérive.

translated_text: Crustaceans and reptiles
secondary_translated_text: Crustacés et reptiles

original_en_text: Far tougher for being matched inside their encrusted domain. They must have lived their whole lives within their tower, to command it so.
original_zh_text: 外壳比内部要坚硬太多。终生固守一地的生存方式，造就了独特的战斗形态。
translated_text: It's more difficult to play on your own field. To command in this way, he must have lived in the tower his whole life.
secondary_translated_text: C'est plus difficile de jouer sur son propre terrain. Pour commander de cette façon, il a dû vivre dans la tour toute sa vie.

translated_text: Reed, Reed
secondary_translated_text: par Reed, Reed

original_en_text: Tall bug charged to pile Silk dregs in preparation for respooling. Their sharp rake now doubles equally well as a stabbing weapon.
original_zh_text: 负责灵丝残渣回收的高个虫子，尖利的耙子现已成为它的武器。
translated_text: Tall insects accumulate silk residue in preparation for recycling. Their sharp bear hands can be used as a stabbing weapon.
secondary_translated_text: Les grands insectes accumulent des résidus de soie en préparation pour le recyclage. Leurs mains d'ours pointues peuvent être utilisées comme arme de couteau.

translated_text: Trabloche
secondary_translated_text: Trabloche

translated_text: The people of Lois
secondary_translated_text: Les gens de Lois

translated_text: Tortured by Trovio.
secondary_translated_text: Torturé par Trovio.

original_en_text: Few creatures of that Silk stricken place would find nourishment enough to grow so large.
original_zh_text: 丝咒之地鲜有生物能获取足够养分长至此等体型。
translated_text: In areas where silk is flooded, few organisms find enough nutrients to grow this large.
secondary_translated_text: Dans les zones où la soie est inondée, peu d'organismes trouvent suffisamment de nutriments pour grandir aussi grand.

original_en_text: Anguished spectre of lingering thread. Despite its ephemeral nature, strong strikes can dispel the Wraith for a time.
original_zh_text: 游荡的丝线怨魂，重击可将其暂时驱散。
translated_text: Suffering like the ghost of a long thread. Ghosts are short-lived by nature, but they can be temporarily driven away with a violent blow.
secondary_translated_text: Souffrir comme le fantôme d'un long fil. Les fantômes sont de courte durée par nature, mais ils peuvent être temporairement chassés avec un coup violent.

original_en_text: A tragic fate for a once honourable bug. Those void soaked threads... Their physical might is nothing compared to the corruption they wreak upon a soul.
original_zh_text: 昔日荣光骑士的悲剧命运。这些沾染虚空的丝线，对灵魂的腐化远胜肉体摧残。
translated_text: The tragic fate of the once thriving insects. Their physical strength is utterly nothing compared to the corrosion of their souls, the threads of thread soaked in the void.
secondary_translated_text: Le sort tragique des insectes autrefois prospères. Leur force physique n'est absolument rien comparé à la corrosion de leurs âmes, les fils de fil trempés dans le vide.

translated_text: Search Results Search
secondary_translated_text: Résultats de recherche Search

translated_text: Divided sisters.
secondary_translated_text: Sœurs divisées.

original_en_text: The coldshard, even when destroyed it remembers its former shape. A remarkable material, and perhaps even more astonishing there seems life contained within it.
original_zh_text: 冰晶被毁后仍存有对其原形的记忆，这等材料特性已属非凡，更神奇的是其中似乎竟蕴含着生命？
translated_text: Even if a piece of ice is destroyed, it remembers its former shape. It is an extraordinary material and, perhaps even more surprisingly, it appears to contain life.
secondary_translated_text: Même si un morceau de glace est détruit, il se rappelle de sa forme antérieure. C'est un matériau extraordinaire et, peut - être encore plus surprenant, il semble contenir de la vie.

original_en_text: The talent and intelligence of this construct goes far beyond others I have witnessed. They seem less built as a tool to serve than an attempt at life itself.
original_zh_text: 其智力远超我所见过的其他造物。它们似乎并非单纯作为工具而被打造，而更像是在追求生命的自我意识。
translated_text: The talent and intelligence of this structure is far superior to any structure I have seen. They seem more like attempts at life itself than instruments of service.
secondary_translated_text: Le talent et l'intelligence de cette structure sont bien supérieurs à toute structure que j'ai vu. Ils semblent plus des tentatives de la vie elle-même que des instruments de service.

original_en_text: In entering their domain, I freed these bugs to infest the greater vaults. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 我闯入了这些虫子的领地，并释放了它们。如今它们已蔓延到了各个书库，这都是我一手造成的麻烦。
translated_text: After entering their territory, I infected these bugs into a larger vault, which I found to be a bit of a mess. They are trouble, and I blame myself for that.
secondary_translated_text: Après être entré sur leur territoire, j'ai infecté ces insectes dans un plus grand coffre-fort, que j'ai trouvé un peu désordonné. Ils sont des ennuis, et je me blâme pour cela.

original_en_text: Winged mite-beast, bred large to catch workers who once tried to flee their tasks.
original_zh_text: 精心培育出的巨型螨兽，用于追捕逃役工虫。
translated_text: A winged tick beast that breeds large to catch workers trying to escape from their duties.
secondary_translated_text: Une bête à tiques ailée qui se reproduit grand pour attraper les travailleurs qui essaient de s'échapper à leurs devoirs.

translated_text: The Gear Choir's Mistake
secondary_translated_text: L'erreur de The Gear Choir

original_en_text: The way it darts in and out of the ground has an almost playful quality to it. An amusing and effective way to ambush prey.
original_zh_text: 从地面突然窜出的攻击方式，兼具实用性与趣味性。
translated_text: The way to get in and out of the basement almost feels funny. A fun and effective way to ambush your prey.
secondary_translated_text: La façon d'entrer et de sortir du sous-sol est presque drôle. Un moyen amusant et efficace d'embuscade votre proie.

original_en_text: Floral foe with a core shaped to mimic a mask. The core can be thrust forth to bludgeon unwary bugs.
original_zh_text: 花芯长得像恐怖面甲的阴险植物，会突然向外猛戳，重击那些缺乏警惕的虫子。
translated_text: The nucleus of the flower nucleus mimics the shape of a mask. Its core can be pushed against any careless miss.
secondary_translated_text: Le noyau du noyau de la fleur imite la forme d'un masque. Son noyau peut être poussé contre toute erreur négligente.

translated_text: ROACH server
secondary_translated_text: Serveur ROACH

original_en_text: The servitor has been heavily damaged by time and the elements. Its actions have grown erratic. It seems no longer able to discern friend from foe.
original_zh_text: 岁月的侵蚀使这位仆从行为失常，似乎已经变得敌我不分。
translated_text: The servant was badly destroyed by time and nature. Their behavior becomes unstable. It no longer seems to distinguish between enemy and ally.
secondary_translated_text: Le serviteur a été gravement détruit par le temps et la nature. Leur comportement devient instable. Il ne semble plus faire la distinction entre ennemi et allié.

original_en_text: A unique mask and impressive form. Now just another near forgotten specimen of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 拥有独特的体型和面甲，本应成为传奇生物，如今却处于被遗忘的边缘。
translated_text: Unique masks and impressive forms. Now, this is just another largely forgotten sample of this land before the monarch.
secondary_translated_text: Masques uniques et formes impressionnantes. Maintenant, ce n'est qu ' un autre échantillon largement oublié de cette terre avant le monarque.

original_en_text: These bugs work mainly as finders and foragers for the warriors of their tribe. Combat has not long been their nature.
original_zh_text: 主要负责探索和采集，本非战斗种族，最近才开始具有攻击性。
translated_text: These insects served primarily as searchers for tribal soldiers and as food gatherers. Fighting is no longer their essence.
secondary_translated_text: Ces insectes servaient principalement de chercheurs de soldats tribaux et de collecteurs de nourriture. Le combat n'est plus son essence.

original_en_text: Pharloom shall quickly learn the curse of this substance. What benefits it provides can be swiftly outweighed.
original_zh_text: 纺络很快就会领教这种物质所带来的诅咒。它所赋予的好处，很快就会被更沉重的代价所掩盖。
translated_text: The foul will soon understand the curse of this substance. The benefits it offers will soon be offset.
secondary_translated_text: Le coupable comprendra bientôt la malédiction de cette substance. Les avantages qu ' elle offre seront bientôt compensés.

translated_text: Scar Scouts
secondary_translated_text: Les Scar Scouts

translated_text: Poquenabin
secondary_translated_text: Poquénabine

original_en_text: Puppet servant of the Citadel, suspended on strings of Silk. An early form of automaton, requiring extensive Silk to maintain its service.
original_zh_text: 由灵丝悬吊操控的傀儡，圣堡的仆从。一种早期形态的自动构造，需要大量的灵丝来维持其运作。
translated_text: A castle puppet servant hanging from silk. The early automata required large quantities of silk to maintain the service.
secondary_translated_text: Un marionnette de château servant suspendu à la soie. Les premiers automates nécessitaient de grandes quantités de soie pour maintenir le service.

original_en_text: Eternal defender of Shellwood Shrine. His pin and cymbal show many marks of their use.
original_zh_text: 甲木林圣所的永恒守卫者，佩针与钹尽显沧桑。
translated_text: Eternal Guardian of the Shrine of Sherwood. There are many uses for pins and cymbals.
secondary_translated_text: Gardien éternel du sanctuaire de Sherwood. Il existe de nombreuses utilisations pour les broches et les cymbals.

original_en_text: It is no wonder these constructs were cast. No mortal bug would last long inside that scorching place. Even my shell struggles to withstand its heat.
original_zh_text: 这些造物被投入使用是有原因的——没有凡虫能在那片炽热之地撑太久，就连我的甲壳也难以抵御那里的高温。
translated_text: No wonder the structure is being built. In that hot place, human insects cannot survive for long. Not even my shell can stand the heat.
secondary_translated_text: Pas étonnant que la structure soit en cours de construction. Dans ce climat chaud, les insectes humains ne peuvent pas survivre longtemps. Même ma coquille ne peut pas supporter la chaleur.

original_en_text: Fabled first Cloverstag of Verdania’s wilds. Commands the grass and leaves to aid its attack.
original_zh_text: 翠庭荒野传说中的苜鹿始祖，能号令草木协同作战。
translated_text: The first legends are related to the dizzying wilderness of Clophosta. Command grass and leaves to help attack.
secondary_translated_text: Les premières légendes sont liées à la nature sauvage vertigineuse de Clophosta. Commander l'herbe et les feuilles pour aider à attaquer.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, charged to maintain its perfect order, by sharp pin if necessary.
original_zh_text: 维护咏者团秩序的迅捷信徒，必要时以利针执法。
translated_text: The choir buttons are responsible for maintaining perfect order, and sharp pins can be used if necessary.
secondary_translated_text: Les boutons de choeur sont responsables du maintien d'un ordre parfait, et des broches pointues peuvent être utilisées si nécessaire.

original_en_text: When they do not hinder my path, I find their simple motion rather pleasant.
original_zh_text: 当它未阻挡前路时，笨拙的蠕动反而显得几分憨态可掬。
translated_text: When I walk, I find the simple movements enjoyable.
secondary_translated_text: Quand je marche, je trouve les mouvements simples agréables.

original_en_text: Holds an extensive supply of searing acid in a layered sack within its shell. The acid rains from its mouth upon any creature it sees as food.
original_zh_text: 它胃囊里的酸液储量足以蚀穿圣堡城墙，所幸那对退化的小眼睛总让攻击准头欠佳。
translated_text: The layered bags in the shell contain a large amount of thermal acid. The acid rain in your mouth rains down on all the creatures you think are food.
secondary_translated_text: Les sacs en couches dans la coquille contiennent une grande quantité d'acide thermique. La pluie acide dans votre bouche pleut sur toutes les créatures que vous pensez être de la nourriture.

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled worker, forever repairing the Citadel’s crumbling Underworks.
original_zh_text: 永不停歇修缮圣堡工厂的重甲劳工。
translated_text: Heavy and industrious workers forever repair the castle's crumbling underground works.
secondary_translated_text: Des ouvriers lourds et industriels réparent à jamais les travaux souterrains en ruine du château.

original_en_text: It has no means to defend itself. Its only hope for survival is to be mistaken for a plant.
original_zh_text: 生存的唯一希望，便是被误认作植物。除此之外，它们没有任何防御手段。
translated_text: He cannot defend himself. The only hope of survival is to be mistaken for a plant.
secondary_translated_text: Il ne peut se défendre. Le seul espoir de survie est d'être confondu avec une plante.

original_en_text: This one has allied themself with me, either as thanks for their saving or respect for one judged as equal. Whichever the reason, their fellowship is welcome.
original_zh_text: 这一只现在成了我的盟友，不知道是报救命之恩，还是单纯觉得我实力强大，但多个帮手总是好的。
translated_text: This man allies with me to be grateful for their salvation, or to respect those who are considered equals. For whatever reason, their friendship is welcome.
secondary_translated_text: Cet homme s'alliera à moi pour être reconnaissant pour leur salut, ou pour respecter ceux qui sont considérés comme égaux. Quelle que soit la raison, leur amitié est la bienvenue.

original_en_text: Bugs like these crossed the caves to bring me to Pharloom. I cut down many before my capture. Then I had thought them minded and cunning. Now I can see the singular will that haunts them all.
original_zh_text: 正是这类虫子穿越洞穴将我带至纺络。被俘前我斩杀了许多，当时认为它们具备独立心智与狡诈。如今我明白是同一意志在支配它们全体。
translated_text: This kind of worm took me through the cave to the fal and did a lot before being arrested. They thought they were fast and cunning. Now, I can see the unique will that plagues them all.
secondary_translated_text: Ce genre de ver m'a emmené à travers la grotte jusqu ' au fal et a fait beaucoup avant d'être arrêté. Ils pensaient qu ' ils étaient rapides et astucieux. Maintenant, je peux voir la volonté unique qui les afflige tous.

translated_text: Kakery
secondary_translated_text: Kakery

original_en_text: Its sticky spit would no doubt make a useful crafting material if moulded fresh. Unfortunately, I cannot stop to experiment.
original_zh_text: 它们喷射的粘稠物质经过及时塑形，一定可以作为优质的制造材料。可惜我无暇采集实验。
translated_text: If freshly formed, the thick saliva will undoubtedly be a useful process material. Unfortunately we cannot stop the experiment.
secondary_translated_text: Si fraîchement formée, la salive épaisse sera sans aucun doute un matériau de processus utile. Malheureusement, nous ne pouvons pas arrêter l'expérience.

original_en_text: The smell from these jailers overwhelms my senses. I strongly doubt they have ever thought to bathe.
original_zh_text: 这些狱卒的恶臭令我窒息。我怀疑它们从未有过沐浴的概念。
translated_text: The smell of the guards crushed my senses. I doubt if you want to take a shower.
secondary_translated_text: L'odeur des gardes écrasé mes sens. Je doute que vous vouliez prendre une douche.

original_en_text: A creature at its most basic. This one is no threat to me, or any other.
original_zh_text: 作为最基础的生命形态，它对我或任何生物都不构成威胁。
translated_text: One of the most basic organisms. He did not threaten me or anyone else.
secondary_translated_text: L'un des organismes les plus basiques. Il ne menaçait ni moi ni personne d'autre.

original_en_text: Aged former pilgrim. Uses their wings to position above threats and crush them under their large shell.
original_zh_text: 年迈的前朝圣者，利用飞行优势从上方压制目标。
translated_text: The old pilgrims. With their wings they place them above the threat and crush them under the great shell.
secondary_translated_text: Les vieux pèlerins. Avec leurs ailes, ils les placent au-dessus de la menace et les écrasent sous la grande coquille.

translated_text: Sprint Thorn
secondary_translated_text: Sprint à Thorn

translated_text: lowwood
secondary_translated_text: à Lowwood

translated_text: Krugler
secondary_translated_text: Krugler

original_en_text: A bug once frail, pushed by twisted thread beyond its mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 灵丝撑开了它脆弱的甲壳，强行将这副残躯突破凡虫的限制。
translated_text: Once fragile insects are driven to their limits by twisted threads.
secondary_translated_text: Les insectes fragiles sont poussés à leurs limites par des fils torsadés.

original_en_text: The threat of its exploding rear is an effective deterrent to predators, but the slightest jolt or fall can cause its premature end.
original_zh_text: 尾部爆炸威胁能威慑捕食者，但轻微碰撞就会导致其提前自毁。
translated_text: The threat of tail blasts is an effective deterrent to predators, but even minor collisions or falls can end early.
secondary_translated_text: La menace des explosions de queue est un moyen de dissuasion efficace pour les prédateurs, mais même les collisions mineures ou les chutes peuvent se terminer tôt.

original_en_text: To live only a single, bright moment... What would one feel? Is it glorious, or only despair? Or could it be both, mixed equal?
original_zh_text: 生命仅有瞬息的璀璨——它们会感到辉煌还是绝望？抑或是二者交织？
translated_text: Live in just one bright moment. how do you feel? Is it glory or despair? or can we combine both?
secondary_translated_text: Vivre dans un seul moment lumineux. Comment vous sentez-vous ? Est-ce la gloire ou le désespoir ? Ou peut-on combiner les deux ?

original_en_text: Though their mind is largely lost their skill with a chain has not been forgotten. Does the Haunting eternally bind a bug to the task it had in life?
original_zh_text: 锁链破空之声依旧精准狠厉——丝咒是否将生前的执念化作了死后的永恒苦役？
translated_text: Their minds were almost lost, but their skills in using chains were not forgotten. Will Trouble forever associate this mistake with his life's work?
secondary_translated_text: Leurs esprits étaient presque perdus, mais leurs habiletés à utiliser les chaînes n'étaient pas oubliées. Trouble associera-t - il à jamais cette erreur à son travail de vie ?

original_en_text: Angered, adult Beastfly with a weighty body and a thickened hardshell mask.
original_zh_text: 暴怒的成年兽蝇，身形沉重，戴着厚重面甲。
translated_text: The angry adult beast flew into the sky, and wore a massive, thick hard-shell mask.
secondary_translated_text: La bête adulte en colère s'envolé dans le ciel et portait un masque massif et épais à coquille dure.

original_en_text: Young, bony bug that can curl its body to form a ball.
original_zh_text: 能蜷缩成球形的小型骨虫。
translated_text: Young bony insects can round their bodies and form balls.
secondary_translated_text: Les jeunes insectes osseux peuvent arronter leurs corps et former des boules.

translated_text: Father of Fire.
secondary_translated_text: Père du Feu.

translated_text: the toads
secondary_translated_text: Les Toads

original_en_text: So close to a perfect furred form... If only they’d been able to breed out the spines.
original_zh_text: 近乎完美的毛茸形态，唯有背刺未去除。改造自然的尝试总是难以尽善尽美。
translated_text: Close to the perfect fur shape. If only we could grow thorns.
secondary_translated_text: Proche de la forme parfaite de fourrure. Si seulement nous pouvions faire pousser des épines.

original_en_text: Bulky worm of the deepest depths. Lives in tight crevices and uses its weighty body to batter.
original_zh_text: 栖息狭窄裂隙的厚重蠕虫，以沉重身躯撞击敌人。
translated_text: The deepest huge worm. They live in narrow spaces and hit with heavy bodies.
secondary_translated_text: Le ver le plus grand. Ils vivent dans des espaces étroits et se heurtent avec des corps lourds.

original_en_text: Crazed fanatic able to guide Pharloom’s haunted Silk by music played upon it.
original_zh_text: 癫狂的信徒，通过演奏音乐操控纺络的诅咒灵丝。
translated_text: The enthusiastic enthusiast can play music to guide the phantom silk of the falcon.
secondary_translated_text: L'enthousiaste peut jouer de la musique pour guider la soie fantôme du faucon.

translated_text: Waltham
secondary_translated_text: à Waltham

translated_text: Cragrit
secondary_translated_text: Le Cragrit

original_en_text: There is old anguish bound upon these threads, the result of countless cruel procedures.
original_zh_text: 这些丝线承载着古老痛楚，源自无数残酷改造手术。
translated_text: These clues are bound up with ancient suffering, the result of countless cruel procedures.
secondary_translated_text: Ces indices sont liés à des souffrances anciennes, le résultat d'innombrables procédures cruelles.

original_en_text: Rare, enormous Skull Scuttler. The Marrow’s largest predator, and the most feared for its ferocious temperament.
original_zh_text: 罕见的巨型头骨潜行者，髓骨洞窟的顶级掠食者，以凶暴性情令凡虫闻风丧胆。
translated_text: A rare and huge skeleton machine. The largest predator in the bone marrow is also the most feared because of its ferocious nature.
secondary_translated_text: Une machine de squelette rare et énorme. Le plus grand prédateur de la moelle osseuse est aussi le plus craint en raison de sa nature féroce.

original_en_text: Full-grown former pilgrim serving the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 侍奉圣堡的前朝圣者，体型发生过异变。
translated_text: A former pilgrim who grew up in a castle.
secondary_translated_text: Un ancien pèlerin qui a grandi dans un château.

original_en_text: Lord and justice of Pharloom’s craws. Delivers death to condemned bugs with his steel-plated beak.
original_zh_text: 执掌腐囊虫庭生杀大权的审判者，用其镀钢长喙对有罪的虫子执行死刑。
translated_text: Pharam, lord of greed and justice. With its steel beak, it brought death to the blamed insect.
secondary_translated_text: Pharam, seigneur de l'avidité et de la justice. Avec son bec d'acier, il a apporté la mort à l'insecte blâmé.

translated_text: The empty beard.
secondary_translated_text: la barbe vide.

translated_text: Flyer of Flame
secondary_translated_text: Flyer de flamme

original_en_text: Rarely seen beetle that spends most of its life nestled deep in bone and rock. The Flintgems on its shell excrete an explosive powder.
original_zh_text: 深藏岩骨深处的稀有甲虫，甲壳嵌满燧晶并分泌爆炸性体液。
translated_text: The rare beetle spends most of its life deep in bones and rocks. The gemstones in the shell flint secrete an explosive powder.
secondary_translated_text: Le scarabée rare passe la majeure partie de sa vie profondément dans les os et les roches. Les pierres précieuses dans le silex de coquille sécrètent une poudre explosive.

original_en_text: Disgusting both in manner and stench. I feel no remorse to see them felled.
original_zh_text: 它们浑身散发着腐殖质恶臭，甲壳缝隙间还粘着陈年血痂。每当那对复眼在牢狱阴影中亮起，连最凶悍的囚徒都会瑟缩墙角。
translated_text: Manner and smell are abominable. When I see defeat, I don't regret it.
secondary_translated_text: L'odeur et la manière sont abominables. Quand je vois la défaite, je ne le regrette pas.

translated_text: Pilgrims with wings
secondary_translated_text: Les pèlerins avec des ailes

original_en_text: Pharloom proves often the effectiveness of bells as weapons. Never before had I considered them as such.
original_zh_text: 纺络总在提醒我——钟亦可为兵器。只是从前，我从未想过这些圣器会被如此亵用。
translated_text: Farrow often proved the effectiveness of the bell as a weapon. I've never thought about it this way.
secondary_translated_text: Farrow a souvent prouvé l'efficacité de la cloche comme une arme. Je n'ai jamais pensé à cela de cette façon.

translated_text: Mother of Spiders
secondary_translated_text: Mère des araignées

original_en_text: Enormous tubular beast uniquely suited to living close to the void below.
original_zh_text: 适应虚空环境的管状巨兽。
translated_text: This huge tubular beast is suitable for living near the cavity below.
secondary_translated_text: Cette énorme bête tubulaire convient à vivre près de la cavité ci-dessous.

translated_text: Jury in Tarao
secondary_translated_text: Jury à Tarao

original_en_text: Old pilgrim carrying a heavy iron bell staff.
original_zh_text: 手持沉重铁制钟杖的年长领队，丝咒抹去了它昔日的权威。
translated_text: The old pilgrim had a heavy iron staff.
secondary_translated_text: Le vieux pèlerin avait un lourd bâton de fer.

translated_text: about the pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: sur les pèlerins.

translated_text: Flint Aircraft
secondary_translated_text: Avions Flint

original_en_text: If left to grow, these young bugs will fight for dominance until only one remains.
original_zh_text: 我曾目睹三只幼体将巢穴化作修罗场，最终胜者甲壳上插满兄弟的尖刺。这种养蛊式的成长，正是圣堡工厂默许的筛选机制。
translated_text: When allowed to grow, the young insects will compete for dominance until only one remains.
secondary_translated_text: Lorsqu ' ils sont autorisés à grandir, les jeunes insectes vont rivaliser pour la domination jusqu'à ce qu ' il ne reste qu ' un.

original_en_text: Living Silk commanding a dead shell... An affront to nature, and one all too common across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 活灵丝操纵死躯壳……违背自然的造物，在纺络却司空见惯。
translated_text: Living thread commanding dead shell - this is an affront to nature and is also common in the Farem region.
secondary_translated_text: Le fil vivant commandant la coquille morte - c'est un affront à la nature et est également courant dans la région de Farem.

translated_text: Red and Red Cocktails
secondary_translated_text: Cocktails rouge et rouge

translated_text: The Shadow Charger
secondary_translated_text: Le chargeur d'ombre

translated_text: Catheter Suction Cup
secondary_translated_text: Cathéter Suction Cup

translated_text: The World Depression
secondary_translated_text: La Dépression mondiale

original_en_text: Coiled nest of charged worms. Assaults intruders with bolts of crackling electricity.
original_zh_text: 带电蠕虫团，释放霹雳闪电攻击入侵者。
translated_text: A winding nest composed of charged worms. Attack intruders with explosive lightning.
secondary_translated_text: Un nid sinueux composé de vers chargés. Attaquez les intrus avec des éclairs explosifs.

original_en_text: High caste bug, responsible for delivering sermons and leading prayer for those beyond the walls of the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 为低语书库墙外信众布道的高阶虫子。
translated_text: The worm of the high caste is responsible for preaching and guiding prayer to those outside the financial walls of murmuring.
secondary_translated_text: Le ver de la haute caste est chargé de prêcher et de guider la prière à ceux qui sont en dehors des murs financiers de murmure.

translated_text: Surgeons.
secondary_translated_text: chirurgiens.

original_en_text: Did he recognise my part played in this land’s void-strung state? If so, perhaps his judgment was not unfair. To these bugs I have brought much destruction.
original_zh_text: 若他知晓我与此地虚空缠结的关联，其裁决或许称得上公正——因我确实为腐囊虫族带来了毁灭。
translated_text: does he understand the role i have played in this empty land? If so, then his judgment is not fair. I did a lot of damage to these bugs.
secondary_translated_text: Est-ce qu ' il comprend le rôle que j'ai joué dans cette terre vide ? Si c'est le cas, alors son jugement n'est pas juste. J'ai fait beaucoup de dégâts à ces bugs.

original_en_text: That incendiary material they carry is a natural wonder, with many potential applications. What a waste to carelessly throw it at me whenever I pass by.
original_zh_text: 其携带的燃烧材料堪称自然奇迹，具有多种潜在用途。每当路过就被随意投掷袭击，这等浪费行径实在令我扼腕。
translated_text: The burning materials they carry are a natural wonder with many possibilities. Every time I pass by, it is useless to accidentally throw it at me.
secondary_translated_text: Les matériaux combustibles qu ' ils transportent sont une merveille naturelle avec de nombreuses possibilités. Chaque fois que je passe, il est inutile de le jeter accidentellement sur moi.

translated_text: Cocoa feeder
secondary_translated_text: Feeder de cacao

original_en_text: Not a frontline force, but in my assault upon their tower all emerge to see me stilled.
original_zh_text: 虽非主力部队，但当我进攻其高塔时，它们倾巢而出进行阻截，阵势不容小觑。
translated_text: Not the troops on the front, but when I attacked their towers, everyone showed up and watched me calm down.
secondary_translated_text: Pas les troupes sur le front, mais quand j'ai attaqué leurs tours, tout le monde est apparu et m'a regardé me calmer.

translated_text: Princess, Princess
secondary_translated_text: princesse, princesse

translated_text: Crafase
secondary_translated_text: Crafase

translated_text: Mr. Wisp
secondary_translated_text: Monsieur Wisp

original_en_text: A cowardly sort. They will try to remain at range to throw their sharp weapons. Best to rush them down and cut quick.
original_zh_text: 怯战而擅长投掷攻击。最佳策略是快速近身解决。
translated_text: Cowardly type. They try to stay within range and throw sharp weapons. You better cut it quickly.
secondary_translated_text: Type lâche. Ils essaient de rester à portée et de jeter des armes pointues. Il vaut mieux le couper rapidement.

original_en_text: Wide-masked aerial attacker trained to act as support for its grounded companions while remaining at range.
original_zh_text: 佩戴宽幅面甲的远程支援型飞行攻击者。
translated_text: The wide-masked pilots were trained to maintain their range while supporting their comrades on the ground.
secondary_translated_text: Les pilotes masqués ont été formés pour maintenir leur portée tout en soutenant leurs camarades au sol.

original_en_text: Most likely this one’s true charge was to root out and condemn those not seen as sufficiently fervent.
original_zh_text: 表面传播教义，实为铲除异端的思想刽子手。
translated_text: The real duty of this man may be to eradicate and condemn those who seem to be inert.
secondary_translated_text: Le véritable devoir de cet homme peut être d'éradiquer et de condamner ceux qui semblent inertes.

translated_text: Kay Kay.
secondary_translated_text: Kay Kay Kay.

original_en_text: Old catcher over Shellwood Pond, bearing a longpin and stricken by the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 甲木林池塘的老迈捕手，手持长针，遭受丝咒之苦。
translated_text: The old catcher was attacked by a ghost over Sherwood Pond, and had a long needle in his hand.
secondary_translated_text: Le vieil attrapeur fut attaqué par un fantôme au-dessus de Sherwood Pond, et il avait une longue aiguille à la main.

translated_text: Abandoned Gur
secondary_translated_text: Abandonnée Gur

translated_text: The Stillkin Trap
secondary_translated_text: Le piège de Stillkin

translated_text: Pendrag
secondary_translated_text: Pendragie

original_en_text: Grizzled older roach tender weighted with a lasso of heavy chain.
original_zh_text: 心智迷失的老练饲育者，挥舞沉重锁链维持虫群秩序。
translated_text: The furry old cockroach was softly clothed in a heavy chain rope.
secondary_translated_text: Le vieux cafard fourré était doucement vêtu d'une lourde corde de chaîne.

original_en_text: These ones somehow learnt to call and guide the scorching Wisps that share their thicket. Whether through dominance or reverence is unclear.
original_zh_text: 这些家伙不知何故掌握了操控火灵之术。他们能随心所欲地召唤并指挥它们。
translated_text: These creatures have learned to summon and guide the flaming elves who live in the jungle. It is not known whether it is by governance or by awe.
secondary_translated_text: Ces créatures ont appris à invoquer et à guider les elfes flammants qui vivent dans la jungle. On ne sait pas si c'est par gouvernance ou par crainte.

original_en_text: He carelessly seeded these caves with that cursed substance... His final fate seems fair reward for those efforts, yet I feel some sympathy. It is an alluring power.
original_zh_text: 他肆意播撒那种禁忌物质……最终结局可谓咎由自取，但我仍有些许同情。凡虫对力量的追寻时常令我感到唏嘘。
translated_text: He accidentally spilled the cursed substance into these caves. His ultimate fate seems like a fair reward for that effort, but I still feel sympathy for him. It is an attractive force.
secondary_translated_text: Il a accidentellement déversé la substance maudite dans ces grottes. Son destin ultime semble être une juste récompense pour cet effort, mais je ressens toujours de la sympathie pour lui. C'est une force d'attraction.

original_zh_text: 被珊瑚包裹的软壳生物。
translated_text: Soft shell spoiler wrapped in coral.
secondary_translated_text: Spoiler à coquille molle enveloppé dans le corail.

original_en_text: To pair with another is a base instinct, and one that brings some bugs great joy. I once sought similar union, but of my own mates none could match my lifespan.
original_zh_text: 与其他虫子结为伴侣是一种本能，是欢愉的来源。可惜我曾寻觅的伴侣都难敌岁月的变迁。
translated_text: Pairing with other people is a basic instinct, and it can even give some bugs great pleasure. I have sought a similar union before, but I have no partner in my life that can match it.
secondary_translated_text: L'accouplement avec d'autres personnes est un instinct de base, et il peut même donner beaucoup de plaisir à certains insectes. J'ai déjà cherché une union similaire, mais je n'ai pas de partenaire dans ma vie qui puisse l'égaler.

original_en_text: Song queen of the Skarr and their most talented warrior.
original_zh_text: 斯卡尔一族的歌后，并且是族史上最具天赋的战士。
translated_text: The Skelines singers and their most talented fighters.
secondary_translated_text: Les chanteurs des Skelines et leurs combattants les plus talentueux.

translated_text: in the case of choirs
secondary_translated_text: Dans le cas des choirs

original_en_text: For one to love another so similar to themselves, is that selfless or vain?
original_zh_text: 爱慕镜像般的另一个自己，究竟是无私还是极致的虚荣？
translated_text: Is it selfless or vanity to love someone who looks like you?
secondary_translated_text: Est-ce désintéressé ou vanité d'aimer quelqu 'un qui vous ressemble ?

original_en_text: A crude construct of my father’s fallen domain. Only a fool believes that void can be fashioned to do their bidding.
original_zh_text: 我父亲陨落国度的粗劣造物。只有愚者才会相信虚空可被驾驭。
translated_text: The structure of my father's fallen kingdom. He believes that only fools can create a blank at his own command.
secondary_translated_text: La structure du royaume déchu de mon père. Il croit que seuls les imbéciles peuvent créer un vide à son commandement.

translated_text: The Tar Mine.
secondary_translated_text: La mine de tar.

translated_text: Barnac
secondary_translated_text: par Barnac

translated_text: Gaia
secondary_translated_text: Gaïa

translated_text: Shadillad
secondary_translated_text: Shadillad

translated_text: The First Sinner
secondary_translated_text: le premier pécheur

original_en_text: Short-horned bug born with underdeveloped wings.
original_zh_text: 翅膀发育不全的短角虫。
translated_text: The shorthorned insect has inherently incomplete wings.
secondary_translated_text: L'insecte à cornes courtes a des ailes intrinsèquement incomplètes.

translated_text: Skarsgard
secondary_translated_text: par Skarsgard

original_en_text: Common bug wielding a set of old bells. The bug will fling the bells at anyone it deems still free.
original_zh_text: 挥舞旧钟的普通信徒，向未被丝咒侵蚀者投掷旧钟。
translated_text: A common insect that rings ancient bells. This error will sound a wake-up call to those who still think they are free.
secondary_translated_text: Un insecte commun qui sonne des cloches antiques. Cette erreur sonnera un coup d'alarme pour ceux qui pensent encore être libres.

original_en_text: Born with many tools I would once have desired for myself. Fortunately, I have trained hard around those limits.
original_zh_text: 天生具备我曾渴求的利器。所幸我通过苦练突破了自身局限。
translated_text: I was born with a lot of tools I once wanted. Fortunately, I trained hard around these limitations.
secondary_translated_text: Je suis né avec beaucoup d'outils que j'avais besoin. Heureusement, j'ai travaillé dur autour de ces limites.

original_en_text: More bother than the bug themself are the countless traps they have already laid throughout their caves.
original_zh_text: 其洞穴内遍布的陷阱比这虫子本身更令我头疼。
translated_text: More troubling than the insects themselves are the countless traps set up in the caves.
secondary_translated_text: Plus inquiétant que les insectes eux-mêmes sont les innombrables pièges mis en place dans les grottes.

translated_text: Pollenica
secondary_translated_text: Pollenée

translated_text: Fringe Watchers
secondary_translated_text: Les Fringe Watchers

original_en_text: The lethality of these bugs is unexpected. Their bodies were never built for combat. The Haunting has altered their nature dramatically.
original_zh_text: 这些本非为战斗设计的虫子竟有致命的战力，看来丝咒显著地改变了其本质。
translated_text: The bacteria's lethality was unexpected, and their bodies were never made to fight. The ghosts dramatically changed their nature.
secondary_translated_text: La létalité des bactéries était inattendue, et leurs corps n'étaient jamais faits pour se battre. Les fantômes ont radicalement changé leur nature.

translated_text: The Little Confessor.
secondary_translated_text: Le petit confesseur.

original_en_text: Docile bug whose wings mimic the grasses of the Far Fields. A common snack for larger predators.
original_zh_text: 温顺的飞虫，翅膀模拟原野草叶的模样。比它们大的生物基本都能把它们当作小零食来吃。
translated_text: A docile insect with wings that mimic grass in the field. They are prey for large predators.
secondary_translated_text: Un insecte docile avec des ailes qui imitent l'herbe dans le champ. Ils sont des proies pour les grands prédateurs.

original_en_text: Exhausted bug, grown sickly from the smog of the Underworks. The worker’s twistpins, once tools of repair, now serve as spun projectiles.
original_zh_text: 被工业废气侵蚀的抱病劳工，将维修旋针改造为投掷武器。
translated_text: The exhausted insect became ill from the smoke in the basement. The worker's twist needle, once a maintenance tool, now serves as a rotating bullet.
secondary_translated_text: L'insecte épuisé est tombé malade de la fumée dans le sous-sol. L'aiguille de torsion de l'ouvrier, autrefois un outil d'entretien, sert maintenant de balle rotative.

original_en_text: Humbled prisoner serving their sentence for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 服刑中的卑微囚犯，曾在圣堡中犯下罪过。
translated_text: This humble prisoner was serving a sentence for a crime he had committed in his castle.
secondary_translated_text: Cet humble prisonnier purgeait une peine pour un crime qu ' il avait commis dans son château.

original_en_text: Ancient heart of Shellwood, connected to all its living things.
original_zh_text: 维系甲木林万物联结的远古之心。
translated_text: Sherwood's old mind is connected to all living things.
secondary_translated_text: L'esprit de Sherwood est lié à tous les êtres vivants.

original_en_text: Guide and ofttimes leader within the Citadel’s Choir.
original_zh_text: 圣堡咏者团的向导与常任领袖。
translated_text: He has served as the director and executive director of the Castle Choir.
secondary_translated_text: Il a été directeur et directeur exécutif du Chœur du Château.

original_en_text: Poor of sight but possessing a keen sense of smell, it uses its bulk to charge at foreign scents. Remaining fierce so far into old age is an admirable trait.
original_zh_text: 虽视力极差却嗅觉敏锐，凭借庞大身躯冲撞陌生气味源。暮年仍保有此等凶性，着实值得敬佩。
translated_text: Their eyesight is poor, but their sense of smell is very sensitive, and they use their volume to absorb the odor of foreign bodies. Ferocity in old age is a admirable quality.
secondary_translated_text: Leur vue est faible, mais leur odorat est très sensible, et ils utilisent leur volume pour absorber les odeurs de corps étrangers. La férocité dans la vieillesse est une qualité admirable.

original_en_text: Crawling insect with a sizzling bile sack in its abdomen.
original_zh_text: 腹部携带沸腾胆汁囊的爬行虫。
translated_text: Insects crawling, stomach gallbladder hissing.
secondary_translated_text: Insectes rampant, estomac vésicule biliaire sifflant.

translated_text: Winged Lifeboat
secondary_translated_text: Lifeboat à winged

original_en_text: If given a chance, this one will steal Silk from any significant source, including my own shell.
original_zh_text: 一旦有机会，它会从任何来源窃取灵丝——包括我的甲壳。
translated_text: If given the chance, this man would steal silk from a key source, including my shell.
secondary_translated_text: S'il en avait la chance, cet homme volerait de la soie d'une source clé, y compris ma coquille.

original_en_text: Mindless sack filled with Plasmium. When broken the Plasmium can be consumed for its temporary benefits to health.
original_zh_text: 装满再生液体的活体炸弹。满载生质液的无智囊虫，打破后，可使用其生质液获得暂时性的生命值。
translated_text: A brainless man filled with plasma. When the plasmium ruptures, it can be eaten because it has temporary health benefits.
secondary_translated_text: Un homme sans cerveau rempli de plasma. Lorsque le plasma se rompt, il peut être mangé car il a des avantages temporaires pour la santé.

original_en_text: More effective an opponent than would be guessed. The precarity of its winding domain can make even its simple assault a challenge.
original_zh_text: 在错综复杂的齿轮迷宫中，这些机械的每一次俯冲都如同死神挥镰。
translated_text: A far more effective enemy than you think. The instability of its wound magnetic field is difficult even for a simple attack.
secondary_translated_text: Un ennemi beaucoup plus efficace que vous ne le pensez. L'instabilité de son champ magnétique de blessure est difficile même pour une simple attaque.

translated_text: shelffly
secondary_translated_text: shelffly

original_en_text: Elder Conchfly crowned with a huge coral horn. Once partnered with a mate, they will rarely be seen alone.
original_zh_text: 头戴珊瑚巨角的古老螺类，与伴侣终生形影不离。
translated_text: An ancient shell with huge coral horns on its head. Once you work with a partner, you rarely appear alone.
secondary_translated_text: Une coquille ancienne avec d'énormes cornes de corail sur sa tête. Une fois que vous travaillez avec un partenaire, vous semblez rarement seul.

translated_text: Karakhor
secondary_translated_text: Le Karakhor

original_en_text: Drained yet dedicated labourer, wielding a coarse steel brush.
original_zh_text: 手持劣质钢刷的劳工，尽管身体已被苦役榨干，但仍孜孜不倦。
translated_text: He was a high-intensity worker wielding a coarse steel brush.
secondary_translated_text: Il était un ouvrier de haute intensité brandissant une brosse en acier grossier.

original_en_text: Fierce, strong and disciplined... yet these qualities do not protect them from the Haunting. Is such a fate inevitable in these lands?
original_zh_text: 勇猛强壮，且遵守纪律……连这样的战士都无法逃脱丝咒的侵蚀，难道纺络所有生物终将堕入此劫？
translated_text: Strong, strong, and disciplined However, these qualities do not protect them from trouble. can't you avoid it in this country?
secondary_translated_text: Fort, fort et discipliné Cependant, ces qualités ne les protègent pas des ennuis. Ne pouvez-vous pas l'éviter dans ce pays ?

original_en_text: A form well suited for combat, lithe and fast. No surprise it seems to rank so high amongst its cult.
original_zh_text: 纤瘦迅捷的体态完美适配战斗，难怪能在教团中身居高位。
translated_text: Ideal for combat, lightweight and high-speed forms. Not surprisingly, they are in very high ranks within the cult.
secondary_translated_text: Idéal pour le combat, les formes légères et à grande vitesse. Sans surprise, ils occupent des rangs très élevés au sein du culte.

translated_text: Gromm is
secondary_translated_text: Gromm était

original_en_text: Winged ant hunter that strikes from the air with its bone lance.
original_zh_text: 使用骨制长矛的飞蚁猎手，擅长从空中发起突刺。
translated_text: A winged ali hunter attacks from the air with a cannon.
secondary_translated_text: Un chasseur ali ailé attaque depuis les airs avec un canon.

translated_text: Queen of the Sand!
secondary_translated_text: La reine du sable !

original_en_text: In my home caves, when once this substance was allowed to flourish, I saw similar aberrations. This is wonder tainted strong with revulsion.
original_zh_text: 在我故土的洞穴中，当这种物质开始蔓延时，我也目睹过类似的畸变。这是一种掺杂着强烈厌恶的“奇迹”。
translated_text: In my cave, when the material was allowed to flourish, a similar distortion was seen. It's a miracle filled with disgust.
secondary_translated_text: Dans ma grotte, lorsque le matériau a été laissé prospérer, une distorsion similaire a été observée. C'est un miracle rempli de dégoût.

original_en_text: Furred bug beneath a heavy bell. It has grown too large to burrow, but in maturing has developed small wings.
original_zh_text: 毛茸茸的甲虫背负着沉重钟壳，胖得钻不进地洞，倒是长出了一对小翅膀。
translated_text: A hairy bug under a heavy bell. They are too large to enter the cave, but when they mature, they have grown small wings.
secondary_translated_text: Un insecte poilu sous une cloche lourde. Ils sont trop gros pour entrer dans la grotte, mais quand ils mûrissent, ils ont développé de petites ailes.

original_en_text: Aerial bug of the Citadel, unarmed but for its short horn.
original_zh_text: 圣堡的飞行虫，仅凭短角作为武器。
translated_text: The castle's aerial insects have no weapons, but their horns are short.
secondary_translated_text: Les insectes aériens du château n'ont pas d'armes, mais leurs cornes sont courtes.

original_en_text: Adult Mossmir with a fully developed stinger and hardened hide.
original_zh_text: 成年苔翼虫，具备完全发育的毒刺与坚硬的外壳。
translated_text: Mature mossmeel has a hard skin.
secondary_translated_text: La mousse mature a une peau dure.

original_en_text: Motherhood is an instinct that can push creatures beyond what seems their natural limits. It turns even weaker beasts like these into formidable foes.
original_zh_text: 为母则刚的本能，总能使弱小的生物展现出骇人的攻击性。
translated_text: Maternity is the instinct that pushes organisms to the limits that seem natural. It turned a weak beast into a mighty enemy.
secondary_translated_text: La maternité est l'instinct qui pousse les organismes aux limites qui semblent naturelles. Il a transformé un animal faible en un ennemi puissant.

original_en_text: The remains of an aged bug were housed at the pyre’s heart. The structure suggested they wished for immolation. If so, I have seen their wish granted.
original_zh_text: 一只年迈虫子的遗骸安放在火葬堆的中心。从构造上看，它们似乎希望通过自焚来进行献祭。若真如此，我想这一愿望已经实现。
translated_text: The remains of an old insect lay in the middle of a pile of firewood. They wanted to burn themselves. If so, then I have seen their wishes come true.
secondary_translated_text: Les restes d'un vieil insecte se trouvaient au milieu d'un tas de bois de chauffage. Ils voulaient se brûler. Si c'est le cas, alors je vois leurs souhaits se réaliser.

original_en_text: Skilled ant hunter bearing blade and armour fashioned from bone.
original_zh_text: 装备骨制武器及护甲的蚁族精锐。
translated_text: A skilled ant hunter with a blade and armour made of bone.
secondary_translated_text: Un chasseur de fourmis habile avec une lame et une armure en os.

translated_text: Montfly
secondary_translated_text: Montfly,

original_en_text: To survive while storing so much searing fluid within... Before I would have believed it impossible, but Pharloom is home to many marvels.
original_zh_text: 体内存储巨量高温液体仍能存活……原以为不可能，但纺络本就充满奇迹。
translated_text: To survive while accumulating lots of hot fluids in the body. Once thought impossible, the farm was the birthplace of many miracles.
secondary_translated_text: Pour survivre tout en accumulant beaucoup de liquides chauds dans le corps. Autrefois jugée impossible, la ferme a été le berceau de nombreux miracles.

original_en_text: Choir commander of the High Halls, able to summon and command cogflies at a flick of their baton.
original_zh_text: 高庭咏者团统帅，挥动指挥棒即可召唤机枢蝇群。
translated_text: The choir conductor in the upper hall can command by summoning the light bullet of the baton.
secondary_translated_text: Le chef de chœur dans la salle supérieure peut commander en invoquant la balle de lumière du bâton.

translated_text: Wings of the skull
secondary_translated_text: Les ailes du crâne

translated_text: Hopper Pilgrim
secondary_translated_text: Le Hopper Pilgrim

translated_text: Pilgrimage of elders
secondary_translated_text: pèlerinage des aînés

translated_text: Hulk's Pilgrimage
secondary_translated_text: Le pèlerinage de Hulk

original_en_text: Masked coral drifter, grown larger than its more numerous companions.
original_zh_text: 古老的漂浮生物，体型远超同类。
translated_text: The masked coral drifter is taller than many of his companions.
secondary_translated_text: Le vagabond masqué de corail est plus grand que beaucoup de ses compagnons.

original_en_text: Many-legged insect fanatically obsessed with flame.
translated_text: Insects are attracted to fire.
secondary_translated_text: Les insectes sont attirés par le feu.

translated_text: about the pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: sur les pèlerins.

translated_text: The last nail.
secondary_translated_text: Le dernier nail.

translated_text: Smelting Excavator
secondary_translated_text: Melting excavateur

original_en_text: Curiosity saw me answer their summons, but I shall not allow them to stall me long. I must work fast to fix my grand mistake.
original_zh_text: 好奇心驱使我响应他们的召唤，但我不会在此浪费时间——我需要尽快修正我酿成的大错。
translated_text: It's interesting that I answered their phone, but I can't let them wait for me long. I have to work as fast as I can to correct my big mistakes.
secondary_translated_text: C'est intéressant que j'ai répondu à leur téléphone, mais je ne peux pas les laisser attendre longtemps pour moi. Je dois travailler aussi vite que possible pour corriger mes grandes erreurs.

translated_text: Peristaltic
secondary_translated_text: péristaltique

translated_text: Lantern player
secondary_translated_text: Joueur Lanterne

original_en_text: A revolting creature. My shell itches at their presence. In the pens where their numbers grow vast, I am forever on edge.
original_zh_text: 肮脏恶心的生物。光是它们的存在就让我甲壳发痒。在蟑群泛滥的养殖场中，我会时刻保持警惕。
translated_text: It is an unpleasant creature. Their presence tickled my shell. Within the fence, where their numbers continue to grow, I was always nervous.
secondary_translated_text: C'est une créature désagréable. Leur présence m'a déchiré la coque.À l'intérieur de la clôture, où leur nombre ne cesse de croître, j'étais toujours nerveux.

translated_text: Brush it.
secondary_translated_text: Brush ça.

original_en_text: Dancing around this simple creature as it charges back and forth is the sort of game I delighted in as a child. Alas, I now have more pressing matters to attend to.
original_zh_text: 我小时候就爱逗这种笨虫，在它身边闪转腾挪，看它来回乱撞可有意思了。唉，但我现在有更紧迫的事情要处理。
translated_text: When this simple creature was running around, dancing around it was my favorite childhood game. There is something more urgent now. "
secondary_translated_text: Quand cette simple créature courait, danser autour de lui était mon jeu d'enfance préféré. Il y a quelque chose de plus urgent maintenant. "

original_en_text: Theirs seems a sad, grueling task, serving their lifetime for a Citadel unseen.
original_zh_text: 它们的工作实属可悲的苦役，为那见不到的圣堡永世效劳。
translated_text: They looked like a sad and difficult job of serving an invisible castle.
secondary_translated_text: Ils ressemblaient à un métier triste et difficile de servir un château invisible.

original_en_text: Airborne relative of the grounded Skull Scuttler, found only in the Marrow’s deepest, hottest caves.
original_zh_text: 头骨潜行者的飞虫近亲，髓骨洞窟深处灼热的洞穴独有。
translated_text: It is an aerial close relative of the stranded Scal Scatter, and is found only in the deepest and hottest bone marrow caves.
secondary_translated_text: Il est un proche parent aérien du Scal Scatter échoué, et se trouve uniquement dans les grottes les plus profondes et les plus chaudes de la moelle osseuse.

original_en_text: Theirs would be a high risk life, followed by a short, searing end.
original_zh_text: 这是份高危职业，它们的结局注定短暂而炽烈。
translated_text: Their lives will be a high-risk one with a short, fiery ending.
secondary_translated_text: Leurs vies seront à haut risque avec une fin courte et ardente.

original_en_text: Placid native of Verdania. Its hide closely mimics the flora of its territory.
original_zh_text: 温顺的翠庭原生生物，其皮毛完美拟态栖息地的植被。
translated_text: Placid was born in Vidhania. Its fur mimics well the plants of the territory.
secondary_translated_text: Placid est né en Vidhania. Sa fourrure imite bien les plantes du territoire.

original_en_text: They remorselessly eliminate any pilgrim or passerby deemed impure to their sight. The countless husks, strewn on paths beside them, tell of their conclusive decisions.
original_zh_text: 他们无情地消灭任何在他们眼中被视为不洁的朝圣者或过路者。堆积在路径旁的遗骸，无声控诉着所谓"净化"的残酷。
translated_text: They did not hesitate to exclude the filthy pilgrims and passers-by. Many shells were scattered on the nearby road, heralding their decision.
secondary_translated_text: Ils n'hésitent pas à exclure les pèlerins et les passants sales. De nombreux obus ont été dispersés sur la route voisine, annonçant leur décision.

translated_text: Downsizing Pipe
secondary_translated_text: Pipe de réduction

original_en_text: Weak, afraid, and aware of the imminent end. I understand their desperation, but my death will not prevent the coming fall.
original_zh_text: 弱小、恐惧，知道终局将至。我懂得它们的绝望，可我的死并不能阻止即将到来的灾祸。
translated_text: Acknowledge weakness, fear, and the consequences to come. Their despair is understandable, but my death will not stop the coming autumn.
secondary_translated_text: Reconnaissez la faiblesse, la peur et les conséquences à venir. Leur désespoir est compréhensible, mais ma mort n'arrêtera pas l'automne prochain.

original_en_text: An inspired use of steam. I must remember its construction when designing future tools.
original_zh_text: 高温蒸汽在管腔内压缩爆鸣的声响，像极了垂死者的嘶吼。这种将杀戮伪装成清洁工程的设计，着实令人胆寒。
translated_text: Promoting the use of Steam. When designing a tool for the future, you need to keep its structure in mind.
secondary_translated_text: Promouvoir l'utilisation de Steam. Lors de la conception d'un outil pour le futur, vous devez garder sa structure à l'esprit.

original_en_text: They know well their domain, lurking in wait in its byways and bogs, always ready to pounce.
original_zh_text: 它们深谙领地内的每处沼泽暗道，时刻准备伏击。
translated_text: They knew their territory well, and they waited in the paths and swamps, preparing for an attack.
secondary_translated_text: Ils connaissaient bien leur territoire, et ils attendaient dans les sentiers et les marécages, se préparant à une attaque.

original_en_text: Husk of an alchemist’s assistant granted false life by Plasmium.
original_zh_text: 被生质液赋予虚假生命的炼金术士助手的躯壳。
translated_text: The shell of an alchemist's assistant has been given false life by plasmium.
secondary_translated_text: La coquille de l'assistant d'un alchimiste a reçu une fausse vie par le plasma.

original_en_text: The false mask alone is frightening enough to scare away smaller pests.
original_zh_text: 光凭这个惊悚的造型就能劝退不少胆小鬼。
translated_text: A mask alone can scare off small pests.
secondary_translated_text: Un masque seul peut effrayer les petits parasites.

original_en_text: In its natural state it would avoid potential predators, but Pharloom’s Haunting now compels it to aggression. Fortunately, its jaws are ill-suited for combat.
original_zh_text: 本性畏避掠食者，然而纺络的丝咒迫使其凶性毕露。幸好它们的颚钳钝拙，不善搏杀。
translated_text: In its natural state, it avoids potential predators, but becomes more aggressive in Farum's troubles. Fortunately, its jaw is not fit for combat.
secondary_translated_text: Dans son état naturel, il évite les prédateurs potentiels, mais devient plus agressif dans les problèmes de Farum. Heureusement, sa mâchoire n'est pas apte au combat.

translated_text: Deznarga
secondary_translated_text: Déznarga

original_en_text: Returned to their home caves, this chef continued to devise delicacies too repulsive for any bug still sane.
original_zh_text: 回到故土的洞穴后，这位厨师依旧沉迷于研制那些令任何尚存理智的虫子都难以接受的料理。
translated_text: Back in their native caves, the chefs continue to make dishes that taste unpleasant enough for insects to continue to perceive them.
secondary_translated_text: De retour dans leurs grottes d'origine, les chefs continuent de préparer des plats dont le goût est assez désagréable pour que les insectes continuent de les percevoir.

translated_text: Clover Dancer
secondary_translated_text: Clover danseur

original_en_text: Hardened warrior lord of a bygone age, able to command the coral crust to his bidding.
original_zh_text: 能号令珊瑚甲壳的远古战主。
translated_text: Once upon a time, powerful warlords could follow his orders and command a coral shell.
secondary_translated_text: Il était une fois, des seigneurs de guerre puissants pouvaient suivre ses ordres et commander une coquille de corail.

original_en_text: There seem no ranks in their domain, yet this one has risen above the rest. A station likely gained through intimidation and thuggery.
original_zh_text: 该领域本无等级制度，此虫却凭威胁与暴力手段上位。
translated_text: They don't seem to have a ranking in their field, but this ranking outperforms other rankings. Television stations are available by threats and mobs.
secondary_translated_text: Ils ne semblent pas avoir un classement dans leur domaine, mais ce classement surpasse les autres. Les stations de télévision sont disponibles par des menaces et des foules.

original_en_text: Manic fencer who delights in battle.
translated_text: An enthusiastic fencing player who loves fighting.
secondary_translated_text: Un escrimeur passionné qui aime se battre.

original_en_text: Sightless burrower that reacts violently to the slightest sound.
original_zh_text: 失去视力却听觉敏锐的穴居虫类，最细微的声响也会引起它们激烈的反应。
translated_text: Blind cavemen react strongly to the slightest sound.
secondary_translated_text: Les caverneurs aveugles réagissent fortement au moindre bruit.

original_en_text: Monarch of Pharloom, and the primal source of Silk.
original_zh_text: 纺络的君主，灵丝的源头。
translated_text: The birthplace of Pharaoh Silk
secondary_translated_text: Lieu de naissance de Pharaoh Silk

original_en_text: These bugs have been driven out of their vault’s recesses by Pharloom’s black collapse. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 由于纺络的崩塌，这些虫子被驱赶出书库的深处。这都是我一手造成的麻烦。
translated_text: The black collapse of the farm drove the worms out of the depths of the vault. They are trouble, and I blame myself for that.
secondary_translated_text: L'effondrement noir de la ferme chassa les vers des profondeurs de la voûte. Ils sont des ennuis, et je me blâme pour cela.

translated_text: Gammond&Zaza is
secondary_translated_text: Le Gammond&Zaza est

translated_text: Mosmeyer
secondary_translated_text: par Mosmeyer

original_en_text: Flying bone mite that lives near magma. Roasts its prey by spitting scorching tar.
original_zh_text: 栖息在熔岩区的飞行螨虫，喷射高温焦油灼烧猎物。
translated_text: A flying bony mite that lives near magmas. They spit out hot tar and burn their prey.
secondary_translated_text: Un acarien osseux volant qui vit près de magmas. Ils crachent du goudron chaud et brûlent leurs proies.

original_en_text: Plentiful pest with a sharp proboscis and a belly full of bile.
original_zh_text: 体内充满胆汁的群居蝠虫，死亡时剧烈爆炸。
translated_text: A large number of pests, a sharp nose, and a stomach filled with bile.
secondary_translated_text: Un grand nombre de ravageurs, un nez tranchant et un estomac rempli de bile.

original_en_text: Small arachnid found in many crevices and caves throughout Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 纺络的岩缝和洞穴里常见的小型蜘蛛。
translated_text: Small spiders have been found in many of Faro's cracks and caves.
secondary_translated_text: De petites araignées ont été trouvées dans de nombreuses fissures et grottes de Faro.

original_en_text: Large worm mutated heavily by Plasmium. The creature has become fused to the roof of its cave, no longer able to move freely.
original_zh_text: 受生质液感染而变异的大型蠕虫。这只生物已与所处洞穴的洞顶融合，失去了自由移动的能力。
translated_text: The parasite can vary greatly from one parasite to another. The creature melted into the top of the cave and could no longer move freely.
secondary_translated_text: Le parasite peut varier d'un parasite à l'autre. La créature fondit dans le haut de la grotte et ne pouvait plus se déplacer librement.

original_en_text: Its training resembles my own, favouring fast strikes and rapid movement. Once a hunter, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 战斗风格与我的技巧相似，崇尚速攻战术。或许它们曾经也是猎手？
translated_text: It's similar to my own training and I like to shoot fast and move fast. Maybe he was a hunter once.
secondary_translated_text: C'est similaire à mon propre entraînement et j'aime tirer vite et me déplacer vite. Peut - être était-il chasseur autrefois.

original_en_text: What exceptional senses it possesses. It detects me with ease, even when not a single sound is made.
original_zh_text: 感知极为敏锐，哪怕分毫响动都能惊动它。
translated_text: What a wonderful feeling it would be. Even if there is no sound, it can easily detect me.
secondary_translated_text: Quel merveilleux sentiment ce serait. Même s'il n'y a pas de son, il peut facilement me détecter.

original_en_text: Young masked worm that delights in ambushing intruders within its tunnels.
original_zh_text: 热衷隧道伏击的面甲蠕虫幼体。
translated_text: The young masked worm likes to ambush intruders in the tunnel.
secondary_translated_text: Le jeune vers masqué aime embusquer les intrus dans le tunnel.

original_en_text: Small automaton built to work, without complaint, in the scorching heat of the Underworks’ Cauldron.
original_zh_text: 为圣堡工厂内大熔釜的酷热环境打造的小型自动机。勤勤恳恳，任劳任怨。
translated_text: The small automaton is designed to operate without complaints even in the high temperatures of the underwork cooler.
secondary_translated_text: Le petit automate est conçu pour fonctionner sans plaintes, même dans les températures élevées du refroidisseur de sous-travail.

original_en_text: Elder overseers of the Deep Docks, responsible for the oversight and punishment of lesser workers.
original_zh_text: 深坞地区的监工，负责监管与惩戒低级别工人。
translated_text: The senior supervisor of Shenzhen Center Terminal is responsible for supervising and punishing the lower-level workers.
secondary_translated_text: Le superviseur principal du terminal central de Shenzhen est responsable de la supervision et de la punition des travailleurs de niveau inférieur.

original_en_text: Drifting creature with a wide coral mask and hard proboscis to stab its prey.
original_zh_text: 戴着宽大珊瑚面甲的漂流生物，使用坚硬的长喙攻击自投罗网的猎物。
translated_text: The plankton wears a large coral mask and a hard, long nose to sting their prey.
secondary_translated_text: Le plancton porte un grand masque de corail et un nez dur et long pour piquer sa proie.

translated_text: Caraca is
secondary_translated_text: Caraca est

translated_text: Race / Race
secondary_translated_text: Race / Race

original_en_text: The feeder’s curled pin looks designed to keep ravenous roaches at bay, and the tender from turning into the meal.
original_zh_text: 那柄弯钩长针的设计堪称精妙— 既能防止饥渴的蟑螂反将饲主当作美餐，又可随时给不听话的 "宠物" 放血。
translated_text: The feeder's winding needles seem to stop the greedy cockroaches and prevent them from becoming food.
secondary_translated_text: Les aiguilles enroulantes de l'alimentateur semblent arrêter les cafards avides et les empêcher de devenir de la nourriture.

translated_text: Plasma Zang
secondary_translated_text: Plasma de Zang

original_en_text: A creature born of a bug’s desperate hope for strength. Few possess the skill to call the void, and of those that can, none possess the means to tame it.
original_zh_text: 某只虫子在绝望中极度渴求力量，诞生出了此造物。能召唤虚空的虫子已寥寥无几，而在它们之中，更无虫子能真正驯服虚空。
translated_text: A creature born out of a desperate hope for insect power. Few have the power to summon the void, and none of those who have the power have the power to tame the void.
secondary_translated_text: Une créature née d'un espoir désespéré pour le pouvoir des insectes. Peu de gens ont le pouvoir d'invoquer le vide, et aucun de ceux qui en ont le pouvoir n'a le pouvoir de dompter le vide.

original_en_text: Dark-furred bug protecting itself with a spiked coral nut.
original_zh_text: 以带刺珊瑚坚果自卫的深色绒毛甲虫。
translated_text: The black-haired insect protects itself with the spiny coral fruit.
secondary_translated_text: L'insecte à poils noirs se protège avec le fruit de corail épineux.

original_en_text: Thick-plated scuttler that prefers high places.
original_zh_text: 偏好占据制高点的厚甲虫，从口中倾泻灼热酸雨。
translated_text: The Scots like to be tall.
secondary_translated_text: Les Écossais aiment être grands.

translated_text: Seth, guardian of the temple
secondary_translated_text: Seth, gardien du temple

original_en_text: Drained worker on the verge of collapse. Consumed by the Haunting, they continue to work far beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的濒死劳工，超越生理极限持续劳作。
translated_text: The exhausted workers were on the verge of collapse. They are enraged by this confusion and continue their activities beyond their limits.
secondary_translated_text: Les ouvriers épuisés étaient au bord de l'effondrement. Ils sont furieux de cette confusion et poursuivent leurs activités au-delà de leurs limites.

original_en_text: Cunning bug that hunts with darts fashioned from stake and bile.
original_zh_text: 用尖桩与胆汁制作毒镖的狡诈虫子。
translated_text: The cunning insects hunt with dart made of stumps and bile.
secondary_translated_text: Les insectes sournois chassent avec des fléchettes faites de souches et de bile.

original_en_text: The void that will claim all things... In the barbed forms it chooses its nature can be seen clear.
original_zh_text: 吞噬万物的虚空本质，于此狰狞形态显露无遗。
translated_text: Emptiness takes everything away. Its nature is evident in the form of its chosen spines.
secondary_translated_text: La vacuité emporte tout. Sa nature est évidente sous la forme de ses épines choisies.

original_en_text: Cogwork construct forged primarily for the Core’s protection. Bears a shield and poke-pin, and possesses a lethal understanding of their use.
original_zh_text: 持盾佩枪的核心守卫机械，具备战术应变能力。
translated_text: The structure of the cogwork was built primarily to protect the core. He has a shield and needle, and he understands his purpose deadly.
secondary_translated_text: La structure de l'engrenage a été construite principalement pour protéger le noyau. Il a un bouclier et une aiguille, et il comprend son but mortellement.

translated_text: Articles from New Diary
secondary_translated_text: Articles de New Diary

translated_text: Fresh flies.
secondary_translated_text: Fraîchement volé.

translated_text: Nilus
secondary_translated_text: Nilus

original_en_text: Small bony bug that favours dark tunnels. Can expand its spiked carapace to ward against attacking predators.
original_zh_text: 喜欢待在阴暗隧道的硬壳虫，遇到危险时会突然炸开背刺。
translated_text: A small bony worm who likes dark tunnels. Its spike shell can be expanded to prevent predator attacks.
secondary_translated_text: Un petit ver osseux qui aime les tunnels sombres. Sa coquille à pointes peut être étendue pour empêcher les attaques de prédateurs.

translated_text: Rhino horns
secondary_translated_text: Rhino horns

original_en_text: Their sharp cleaning implement is as filthy as the rest of the place. They only layer grime on grime.
original_zh_text: 他们的清洁工具与周遭同样污秽，这样打扫只会越来越脏。
translated_text: Their sharp cleaning tools are just as dirty as any other place. They just lay lay layers of soil on top of the soil.
secondary_translated_text: Leurs outils de nettoyage aiguisés sont tout aussi sales que n'importe quel autre endroit. Ils posent simplement des couches de sol sur le dessus du sol.

original_en_text: High standing insect of the Choir, bearing a bow. This elite Reed has been trained and fed beyond its smaller fellows.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团中地位崇高的虫子，持弓而立。比起普通的簧片战士，这位精英成员受过更严格的训练，也享有更丰盛的供养。
translated_text: The insect stood high in the chorus with a bow in his hand. In addition to their little companions, this elite lead team will train and feed them.
secondary_translated_text: L'insecte se tenait haut dans le chœur avec un arc dans la main. En plus de leurs petits compagnons, cette équipe d'élite les entraînera et les nourrirà.

original_en_text: It lies low to the ground, perhaps out of reverence for its task, but can spring up suddenly to attack. Its shear makes for a deadly weapon with surprising reach.
original_zh_text: 那柄形似剪枝钳的武器，既能精准剥离甲壳中的灵丝脉络，也能在瞬间绞碎试图逃逸的灵魂残片。
translated_text: It is probably lying on the ground out of respect for its mission, but it can suddenly appear and attack. Its scissors are a deadly weapon with an astonishing range.
secondary_translated_text: Il est probablement allongé par terre par respect de sa mission, mais il peut soudainement apparaître et attaquer. Ses ciseaux sont une arme mortelle à une portée étonnante.

original_en_text: Small automaton with a shielded shell, intended to carry loads of dangerous flintflame.
original_zh_text: 配备防护甲壳的小型自动机，负责运输危险的燧焰。
translated_text: A small automatic device with a shield shell for carrying dangerous flint flames.
secondary_translated_text: Un petit dispositif automatique avec une coque de bouclier pour transporter des flammes dangereuses de silex.

original_en_text: They too seek the spectre at the Haunting’s heart, though I fear that foe would pose a challenge beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 他们同样在寻找那丝咒之源的幽魂——只是我担心，我们共同的敌人是超越凡虫极限的存在，恐怕不是他们所能应对的。
translated_text: They are still looking for ghosts in the heart of the ghost, but they fear that this enemy will bring a challenge beyond their limits.
secondary_translated_text: Ils cherchent toujours des fantômes dans le cœur du fantôme, mais ils craignent que cet ennemi apporte un défi au-delà de leurs limites.

original_en_text: Defeat {0} more to complete the hunter’s notes.
original_zh_text: 再击败{0}只以解锁猎手的笔记。
translated_text: He was defeated.{0}Additional content to complete the Hunter's notes.
secondary_translated_text: Il a été vaincu.{0}Contenu supplémentaire pour compléter les notes du Hunter.

translated_text: Mrs. Memoria
secondary_translated_text: Mme Mémoire

original_en_text: Nesting creature that fuses its face with sharpened coral.
original_zh_text: 将面部与珊瑚融为一体的巢居生物。
translated_text: The nest-building creature blends faces with sharp corals.
secondary_translated_text: La créature constructrice de nids mélange les visages avec des coraux tranchants.

original_en_text: The moss looks to grow even inside their stomach, which the pilgrim spits at foes in compressed gobs. A foul form of offence.
original_zh_text: 苔藓甚至在其胃囊内滋长，被压缩成团的腐殖质带着刺鼻腥气——这恐怕是纺络最肮脏的远程武器。
translated_text: The moss seemed to grow in the stomach, and the pilgrims spit it out at their enemies to create compressed mucus. A kind of despicable crime.
secondary_translated_text: La mousse semblait pousser dans l'estomac, et les pèlerins la crachaient sur leurs ennemis pour créer du mucus comprimé. Une sorte de crime abominable.

original_en_text: Rare automaton intended to perform the ringing of bells and cymbals in the depths of the Core.
original_zh_text: 专为敲击钟钹设计的稀有自动机。
translated_text: An unusual automaton that rings bells and cymbals deep in the core.
secondary_translated_text: Un automate inhabituel qui sonne des cloches et des cymbals profondément dans le noyau.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, elevated above other pilgrims, and forced to cowl their face forever more.
original_zh_text: 蒙面的高阶信徒，地位远超普通朝圣者。
translated_text: The choir clown frowned more forever than any other pilgrim.
secondary_translated_text: Le clown de la chorale fronçait les sourcils plus éternellement que n'importe quel autre pèlerin.

original_en_text: Pharloom’s structures seem almost built for them. The endless corners and cracks, so perfect for mites to burrow and nest.
original_zh_text: 纺络的建筑结构仿佛为其量身打造，这里有无尽的角落和缝隙供螨虫打洞筑巢。
translated_text: It seems that Faro's buildings were built mostly for them. The endless corners and cracks are perfect for nesting ticks.
secondary_translated_text: Il semble que les bâtiments de Faro ont été construits principalement pour eux. Les coins et les fissures sans fin sont parfaits pour les tiques de nidification.

original_en_text: Flighted creature formed from coldshard. If shattered it will quickly reform.
original_zh_text: 由冰晶碎片构成的飞行生物，破碎后可以迅速重组。
translated_text: Flying creatures are made of cold debris. If it collapses, it is reformed immediately.
secondary_translated_text: Les créatures volantes sont faites de débris froids. S'il s'effondre, il est réformé immédiatement.

original_en_text: In every land, creatures find new and surprising ways to disguise themselves. One must be wary always.
original_zh_text: 不论在哪一片土地上，万物皆有巧妙的伪装法门，行走此间当时刻保持警觉。
translated_text: In each land, the creatures will find new and amazing ways to disguise themselves. Man must always be on his guard.
secondary_translated_text: Dans chaque pays, les créatures trouveront de nouvelles et étonnantes façons de se déguiser. L'homme doit toujours être sur sa garde.

original_en_text: Aggressive winged bug of the lowlands. When angered, it rapidly whips its bladed tail as a weapon.
original_zh_text: 低地区域的暴躁飞虫，一生气就把带刃的尾巴甩成风车。
translated_text: Aggressive winged insects in low-lying areas. When angry, they quickly use their blades and tails as weapons.
secondary_translated_text: Insectes ailés agressifs dans les zones basses. Quand ils sont en colère, ils utilisent rapidement leurs lames et leurs queues comme armes.

original_en_text: Young ant hunter wielding sickles carved from teeth. Will often call for aid if danger comes close.
original_zh_text: 使用兽牙镰刀的年轻蚁族猎手，遇险时会呼叫支援。
translated_text: The young ant hunter was waving his toothed sickle. They often call for help when danger approaches.
secondary_translated_text: Le jeune chasseur de fourmis agitait sa faucille dentaire. Ils demandent souvent de l'aide lorsque le danger s'approche.

original_en_text: Overgrown elder, able to spawn burning bubbles from within its coral-cased shell.
original_zh_text: 与珊瑚融合的长老巨虫，能从甲壳内喷发炽热气泡。
translated_text: When overgrown, elderberries create a burning bubble inside the coral shell.
secondary_translated_text: Lorsqu ' elles sont envahies, les myrtilles créent une bulle brûlante à l'intérieur de la coquille de corail.

translated_text: the minister said
secondary_translated_text: Le ministre a déclaré

original_en_text: Imposing old insect nesting in the heights of Shellwood. Her command of twig and branch ensured no pilgrim ever survived within her territory.
original_zh_text: 盘踞甲木林高处的碎裂者女王，掌控树丛枝干屠尽领地内所有朝圣者。
translated_text: Nesting old insects on Sherwood's heights. The control of her detachment ensured that there were no pilgrims in her territory.
secondary_translated_text: Nicher de vieux insectes sur les hauteurs de Sherwood. Le contrôle de son détachement veillait à ce qu ' il n'y ait pas de pèlerins sur son territoire.

original_en_text: This bug’s fusion with the crust-growth... It seems intentional, though I imagine the union is far from comfortable.
original_zh_text: 这种融合看似自主选择，但其过程必定充满痛苦。
translated_text: Fusion of worms and crustal growth. This seems to be intentional, but I don't think the union is happy with it.
secondary_translated_text: Fusion des vers et croissance de la croûte. Cela semble être intentionnel, mais je ne pense pas que le syndicat soit heureux.

original_en_text: Born and built only to work until time stiffens its limbs. Perhaps it is mercy this construct knows nothing of the freedom it lacks.
original_zh_text: 生来只是为了劳作，直到岁月令它四肢僵硬。也许它对自己所缺失的自由一无所知，这反倒是一种仁慈。
translated_text: They are born and built to work until time hardens their arms and feet. Perhaps the structure does not know that the freedom it lacks is merciful.
secondary_translated_text: Ils sont nés et construits pour travailler jusqu'à ce que le temps durcisse leurs bras et leurs pieds. Peut - être que la structure ne sait pas que la liberté qui lui manque est miséricordieuse.

translated_text: Moss Moss
secondary_translated_text: Moss Moss

translated_text: Mrs. Craw.
