secondary_translated_text: Mme Craw.

original_en_text: Warrior cartographer of a tribe from Pharloom’s edge. Her skills in battle could challenge the kingdom’s best.
original_zh_text: 纺络边陲部落的勇士制图师，其战力在纺络可谓数一数二。
translated_text: He was a warrior map maker of the Frontier Tribe of the Farms and her fighting ability is enough to challenge the top of the kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: Il était un cartographe guerrier de la tribu frontalière des fermes et sa capacité de combat est suffisante pour défier le sommet du royaume.

translated_text: Cogwork crawler
secondary_translated_text: Cogwork Crawler

original_en_text: Once one of Pharloom’s favoured bugs, and yet their domain and their shells would have been the first to fall to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 曾经纺络的荣光加身者，却成为首批丝咒受害者。
translated_text: Once a favorite insect of the Faroe, its fields and shells first fell into the hands of the ghosts.
secondary_translated_text: Autrefois un insecte favori des Féroé, ses champs et ses coquilles sont tombés d'abord entre les mains des fantômes.

original_en_text: Hidden amongst their tower’s matching crust, these smaller bugs would have survived and thrived.
original_zh_text: 这些小虫子依靠伪装得以繁衍生息。
translated_text: These tiny insects can hide, survive and reproduce in the tower's matching crust.
secondary_translated_text: Ces petits insectes peuvent se cacher, survivre et se reproduire dans la croûte correspondante de la tour.

original_en_text: This one lived long and fed much. The wood will be much safer for their slaying.
original_zh_text: 她存活久远且吞噬无数，诛杀她将使丛林安全倍增。
translated_text: This man lives a long time and eats a lot. It was much safer to kill in the woods.
secondary_translated_text: Cet homme vit longtemps et mange beaucoup. Il était plus sûr de tuer dans les bois.

translated_text: They vomit.
secondary_translated_text: Ils vomient.

original_en_text: They once teemed around their tower, in numbers immense. It is a rare chance to witness such a bountiful display of life.
original_zh_text: 其数量曾经可谓铺天盖地。目睹此等生命奇观的机会已越发稀少。
translated_text: They gathered around the tower. It is a precious opportunity to witness a rich life.
secondary_translated_text: Ils se rassemblaient autour de la tour. C'est une occasion précieuse de témoigner d'une vie riche.

translated_text: Caracas Cocktails
secondary_translated_text: Cocktails de Caracas

original_en_text: Burrower that nests in the Bellvein and seeks out hard bells to protects its soft body.
original_zh_text: 在钟脉内部打洞栖息的毛球状虫类，专门找硬钟壳当作盔甲。
translated_text: Neanderthals built nests in the belvin, looking for hard bells to protect their soft bodies.
secondary_translated_text: Les Néandertaliens ont construit des nids dans le belvin, cherchant des cloches dures pour protéger leurs corps mous.

original_en_text: It is easy to be caught off-guard by the ricocheting trajectory of its flung mask, especially in tight corners.
original_zh_text: 投掷面甲的反弹轨迹难以预判。在狭窄空间尤其需要提防其袭击。
translated_text: Especially in a narrow corner, people are easily overlooked by the bouncing trajectory of the mask he threw.
secondary_translated_text: Surtout dans un coin étroit, les gens sont facilement négligés par la trajectoire rebondissante du masque qu ' il a jeté.

original_en_text: Time allowed their shell to grow thick, all the better for battering their targets.
original_zh_text: 岁月让它们的甲壳变得厚重，能更轻易地猛击目标。
translated_text: Time thickens their shells and hits better targets.
secondary_translated_text: Le temps épaissit leurs coquilles et frappe de meilleures cibles.

translated_text: Kovoq Auton
secondary_translated_text: Le Kovoq Auton

translated_text: Dr. Catcher
secondary_translated_text: Dr Catcher

original_en_text: Arachnid that nestles within dark holes in cavern roofs. Pounces on prey from far above.
original_zh_text: 隐藏在洞顶暗处的蜘蛛，擅长从高处一跃而下，偷袭猎物。
translated_text: The spider lives in a black hole at the top of a cave. They jump at their prey from afar.
secondary_translated_text: L'araignée vit dans un trou noir au sommet d'une grotte. Ils sautent sur leur proie de loin.

translated_text: Kindail
secondary_translated_text: Le Kindail

original_en_text: A monster in the classic form of tales from youth. Its slaying was done as much by my fierce travelling companion as by myself.
original_zh_text: 童谣所述的经典魔物形态。此次诛杀多靠了我那勇猛的旅伴。
translated_text: A typical youth story-form monster. It was killed by me and my terrible companion. "
secondary_translated_text: Un monstre typique de la jeunesse. Il a été tué par moi et mon terrible compagnon. "

translated_text: met's mother.
secondary_translated_text: La mère de Met.

original_en_text: Passively waits for prey to blunder into its path. A technique that should not necessarily be derided. Whatever is effective is best.
original_zh_text: 静静等待猎物误入其攻击范围。看似消极的捕猎方式，往往能收获意外成效。
translated_text: Passively waiting for prey to accidentally enter its path. This technology should not be ridiculed. The most effective ones are the best.
secondary_translated_text: Attendre passivement que la proie entre accidentellement sur son chemin. Cette technologie ne devrait pas être ridiculée. Ceux qui sont les plus efficaces sont les mieux.

original_en_text: My unique shell can resist the darker deformations of this substance, but even I have limits...
original_zh_text: 我的甲壳虽能抵抗此物质带来的畸变，但承受力终有极限。
translated_text: My peculiar outer shell is able to resist the dark deformation of this material, but I too have limits.
secondary_translated_text: Ma coquille extérieure particulière est capable de résister à la déformation sombre de ce matériau, mais j'ai aussi des limites.

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger dyed black in mourning at their land’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 大地倾覆之际，绝望哀叫的黑色食腐虫。
translated_text: Screaming scavengers were stained black with the collapse of the land.
secondary_translated_text: Les balayeurs hurlants étaient tachés de noir avec l'effondrement de la terre.

translated_text: Airfoil model
secondary_translated_text: Modèle Airfoil

original_en_text: Amazingly, the creature carries the void’s black liquid in its stomach, violently spraying it forth if threatened.
original_zh_text: 神奇的是，它竟能将虚空黑液储于胃中，受威胁时剧烈喷吐攻击。
translated_text: Surprisingly, the stomach of this creature is filled with a black liquid that spews violently when threatened.
secondary_translated_text: Étonnamment, l'estomac de cette créature est rempli d'un liquide noir qui crache violemment lorsqu ' il est menacé.

original_en_text: A critical member of the larger flock. Without them present the Kai would be fast driven to extinction by larger predators.
original_zh_text: 它们是族群存续的关键——当凯旋转尖角筑起防御阵时，连髓骨洞窟的暴君都要暂避锋芒。
translated_text: An important member of a large group. Without them, the Kai would have been quickly exterminated by larger predators.
secondary_translated_text: Un membre important d'un grand groupe. Sans eux, les Kai auraient été rapidement exterminés par de plus grands prédateurs.

original_en_text: Strong bug replete with rosaries. If angered they will whip their strings in a ceaseless onslaught.
original_zh_text: 缠满念珠的强壮虫子，发怒时会挥舞珠串猛攻。
translated_text: A powerful worm full of rosary. When you are angry, continue the operation.
secondary_translated_text: Un puissant ver rempli de chapelet. Si vous êtes en colère, continuez l'opération.

original_en_text: To subsist on the sickly water in this fetid environment it spits out the most toxic elements. Over generations, this former survival technique has turned into an effective hunting tool.
original_zh_text: 过滤毒液的生存机制经代际演化，成为高效的狩猎手段。
translated_text: In order to survive in the sewage in this foul-smelling environment, it spews out the most toxic elements. After generations of efforts, this earlier survival technique has become an effective hunting tool.
secondary_translated_text: Afin de survivre dans les eaux usées dans cet environnement malodorant, il crache les éléments les plus toxiques. Après des générations d'efforts, cette technique de survie est devenue un outil de chasse efficace.

translated_text: Lack of cranks.
secondary_translated_text: Absence de cranes.

translated_text: Huge pomegranate seeds
secondary_translated_text: Les graines de grenade géantes

translated_text: Chorus Leaflets
secondary_translated_text: Chorus Leaflets

original_en_text: Far more hostile than their younger companions but seemingly less likely to roam far from their nest.
original_zh_text: 看似凶暴，实为恋巢的保守派。
translated_text: They are more hostile than their younger companions, but are less likely to leave the nest.
secondary_translated_text: Ils sont plus hostiles que leurs jeunes compagnons, mais sont moins susceptibles de quitter le nid.

translated_text: Chorus corner
secondary_translated_text: Corner de choral

original_en_text: Depressed thespian, consumed by the melancholy of a collapsing world.
original_zh_text: 被世界的崩解压垮的消沉演员。
translated_text: The depressed actor had been engulfed in the gloom of the world's collapse.
secondary_translated_text: L'acteur déprimé avait été englouti dans les ténèbres de l'effondrement du monde.

original_en_text: Once exulted chef, exiled from the Citadel for repeated culinary crimes.
original_zh_text: 曾经备受赞誉的大厨，却因屡次触犯烹饪禁忌而被逐出圣堡。
translated_text: The cheerful cook was banished from the castle for numerous culinary crimes.
secondary_translated_text: Le cuisinier gai a été banni du château pour de nombreux crimes culinaires.

original_en_text: Feeble servant of the Underworks with a long twistpin and hard shell.
original_zh_text: 手持长柄旋针的虚弱硬甲劳工。
translated_text: A weak servant of Underwork, dressed in hairpin and hard shell.
secondary_translated_text: Un faible serviteur de Underwork, vêtu d'une épingle à cheveux et d'une coquille dure.

original_en_text: Starved servant of the Slab, bearing a hooked longpin.
original_zh_text: 饥肠辘辘的罪石牢狱仆从，手持钩形长针。
translated_text: A hungry stone servant had a long needle weaving in his hand.
secondary_translated_text: Un serviteur de pierre affamé avait une longue aiguille à tisser dans la main.

translated_text: Leaf of Lania
secondary_translated_text: Feuille de Lania

original_en_text: Spherical, winged automaton housing many sharp spikes.
original_zh_text: 装载尖刺的球型飞行自动机，防御功能存疑。
translated_text: An automaton with spherical wings, with many sharp spines inside.
secondary_translated_text: Un automate avec des ailes sphériques, avec de nombreuses épines aiguës à l'intérieur.

original_en_text: Their plump, round shape makes them well-suited for target practice. Difficult to resist testing my aim on them...
original_zh_text: 圆滚滚的身材十分适合用作靶子，不拿来练手都可惜……
translated_text: The thick, rounded shape is perfect for shooting practice. It's hard to resist having them test my goals.
secondary_translated_text: La forme épaisse et arrondie est parfaite pour la pratique du tir. C'est difficile de résister à ce qu ' ils testent mes objectifs.

original_en_text: Elder Drapefly grown big from age and consumption. Its heavy body allows it to hit much harder than its younger companions.
original_zh_text: 年迈体硕的帷虫，沉重的身躯赋予其强劲的冲击力。
translated_text: The old tombo grows with age and consumption. His heavy body can hit harder than his younger companion.
secondary_translated_text: Le vieux tombo grandit avec l'âge et la consommation. Son corps lourd peut frapper plus fort que son compagnon plus jeune.

translated_text: Vidaniels
secondary_translated_text: Vidaniel

original_en_text: Final arbiter of the Blasted Steps, tasked to ensure only the sinless ever step beyond the Grand Gate.
original_zh_text: 蚀阶的最终裁决者，确保唯有无罪者能跨越巨扉圣门。
translated_text: The ultimate mediator of an explosive step is tasked with ensuring that only innocent people can pass through the door.
secondary_translated_text: Le médiateur ultime d'une étape explosive a pour mission de s'assurer que seules des personnes innocentes peuvent passer par la porte.

original_en_text: This one chose to embrace the doom to come. I shall not share such easy surrender.
original_zh_text: 他选择臣服于灾难的降临，我绝不会效仿这种懦弱行径。
translated_text: The man chose to accept the fate to come. I will not give up so easily.
secondary_translated_text: L'homme a choisi d'accepter le destin à venir. Je n'abandonnerai pas si facilement.

translated_text: People who eat clock
secondary_translated_text: Les gens qui mangent des horloges

original_en_text: Gentle glider of Mount Fay. Its downy wings and cowl allow it to resist even the most cutting cold.
original_zh_text: 费耶山的温顺滑翔者，其绒翼可抵御极寒。
translated_text: A gentle glider on Mount Fay. Its soft wings and belts can withstand the coldest cold.
secondary_translated_text: Un planeur doux sur le mont Fay. Ses ailes douces et ses ceintures peuvent résister au froid le plus froid.

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled charger relying on weight and strength.
translated_text: Heavy hard shell chargers that depend on weight and strength.
secondary_translated_text: Chargeurs à coquille dure lourds qui dépendent du poids et de la résistance.

original_en_text: This one’s husk held a masterful talent, to weave Silk into blazing runes. Throughout my life, I have seen runes woven for many tasks. Was she the first to hone such skills?
original_zh_text: 其躯壳曾掌握将灵丝编织为燃烧符文的绝技。纵观我毕生所见的各类符文，她或是这项技艺的开山鼻祖？
translated_text: This man's shell had a talent for weaving silk into a burning run. In my life, I have seen runes woven for many tasks. Is she the first person to learn this skill?
secondary_translated_text: La coquille de cet homme avait un talent pour tisser la soie dans un courant brûlant. Dans ma vie, j'ai vu des runes tissées pour de nombreuses tâches. Serait-elle la première personne à apprendre cette compétence ?

translated_text: What is Phantom?
secondary_translated_text: Qu ' est-ce que Phantom ?

original_en_text: This one disturbs me... There is something in its simplicity. Do I almost feel fear?
original_zh_text: 这东西令我感到不安……其纯粹性中蕴含某种诡异的特质。我竟然感到一丝恐惧？
translated_text: That makes me upset. There is something about that simplicity. Am I almost scared?
secondary_translated_text: Ça me dérange. Il y a quelque chose dans cette simplicité. Suis-je presque effrayée ?

translated_text: The Choir Applause
secondary_translated_text: Les applaudissements du choeur

translated_text: Jury disappointment.
secondary_translated_text: Déception du jury.

original_en_text: Myth made real in memory. The creature seemed completely at one with the flora around it. Did it ever truly exist as I have seen it?
original_zh_text: 传说中的生物在忆境中成为了现实，与周遭植物浑然一体。我所见到的一切，真的曾经存在过吗？
translated_text: Myth is truth in memory. This organism seems to be completely integrated with the surrounding plants. Do they really exist, as you can see?
secondary_translated_text: Le mythe est la vérité dans la mémoire. Cet organisme semble être complètement intégré aux plantes environnantes. Est-ce qu ' ils existent réellement, comme vous pouvez le voir ?

original_en_text: Simple. Graceful. Another fine bug lost forever from these lands.
original_zh_text: 简约而优雅。又一个永远从这片土地消失的美丽物种。
translated_text: Simply put. Elegantly. Another beautiful insect has disappeared forever from this land.
secondary_translated_text: Simplement mise.élégant. Un autre magnifique insecte a disparu pour toujours de cette terre.

translated_text: Skeleton Tyrant
secondary_translated_text: Skeleton Tyrant

original_en_text: His desire to see Pharloom saved may have been well intentioned, but he seemed quite happy for others to die upon the stage in pursuit of his goal.
original_zh_text: 他拯救纺络的愿望或许出于善意，但为实现目标似乎乐于目睹他人在舞台上殒命。
translated_text: He may have wished to see Farm saved in good faith, but he was pleased that other people had died on stage in pursuit of his purpose.
secondary_translated_text: Il aurait peut - être souhaité que Farm soit sauvée de bonne foi, mais il était heureux que d'autres personnes soient mortes sur scène pour poursuivre son but.

translated_text: Gavido
secondary_translated_text: Gavido

original_en_text: Brave worker carrying unstable flintflame and wearing a heavy bell to protect against potential ignition.
original_zh_text: 运输燧焰的工虫。燧焰性质不稳定，所以它们需要佩戴重型防爆钟罩。
translated_text: Brave workers carry unstable ignition materials and wear heavy bells to prevent potential ignition.
secondary_translated_text: Les braves travailleurs transportent des matériaux d'allumage instables et portent de lourdes cloches pour éviter une allumage potentielle.

original_en_text: Its bright gems could be used to make beautiful, but short-lived jewellery. An amusing idea for a gift... or a trap.
original_zh_text: 每次甲壳碰撞都会迸发火星，这使得它们的巢穴成了行走的火药库。
translated_text: Its bright gemstones can be used to make beautiful but short-lived jewelry. Interesting gift ideas. Or maybe it is a trap.
secondary_translated_text: Ses pierres précieuses brillantes peuvent être utilisées pour fabriquer de beaux bijoux mais de courte durée. Idées de cadeaux intéressantes. Ou peut - être est-ce un piège.

original_en_text: Small burrowing ant, servant to the larger Skarr.
original_zh_text: 为大型斯卡尔蚁服务的小个子掘地工。
translated_text: A small cave ant and a large skeleton servant.
secondary_translated_text: Une petite fourmi des cavernes et un grand serviteur squelette.

original_en_text: Heavy, hairy jailer responsible for capturing sinners and punishing prisoners.
original_zh_text: 厚重的多毛蝇虫，负责抓捕罪犯和惩戒囚犯。
translated_text: A heavy, fluffy guard who arrests criminals and punishes prisoners.
secondary_translated_text: Un garde lourd et moelleux qui arrête les criminels et punit les prisonniers.

original_en_text: Small fluttering creature capable of defending itself with its small stinger.
original_zh_text: 小型飞虫，使用自身毒刺进行攻击。
translated_text: This small flying creature can defend itself with a small stinger.
secondary_translated_text: Cette petite créature volante peut se défendre avec une petite aiguille.

original_en_text: Agile bug of Pharloom, its higher functions have been lost to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒夺去神智的敏捷朝圣者，仅存扑跃攻击的本能。
translated_text: Failure of Faro's agility, its advanced functions were confused and lost.
secondary_translated_text: Failure de l'agilité de Faro, ses fonctions avancées ont été confuses et perdues.

translated_text: Cogwork Washing Pigment
secondary_translated_text: Pigment de lavage Cogwork

original_en_text: Old warrior guarding the border of their domain, stiffened by time and awoken by song.
original_zh_text: 守卫疆界的沧桑老将，因古老歌谣而苏醒。
translated_text: The veterans guarding the border, tempered by time, woke up to singing.
secondary_translated_text: Les vétérans qui gardaient la frontière, tempérés par le temps, se réveillèrent en chantant.

original_en_text: More dangerous in the moment of its explosive and corrosive death than it ever was in life.
original_zh_text: 其死亡瞬间的腐蚀性爆炸远比生前更具威胁。
translated_text: The moment of explosive and corrosive death is more dangerous than at any point in life.
secondary_translated_text: Le moment de la mort explosive et corrosive est plus dangereux que n'importe quel moment de la vie.

original_en_text: The core member of a powerful order, trained fearless and faithful. Theirs was a kingdom of warriors, one built upon their blades.
original_zh_text: 作为精锐战团的骨干成员，经受了严酷的训练，无畏且忠诚。它们建立的刀锋王朝，正是尚武精神的巅峰体现。
translated_text: The core members of a powerful cult are well trained, fearless, and loyal. Their kingdom is a kingdom of warriors built on their blades, and they are the ones who are the most powerful.
secondary_translated_text: Les membres de base d'un puissant culte sont bien entraînés, intrépides et loyaux. Leur royaume est un royaume de guerriers construit sur leurs lames, et ce sont eux qui sont les plus puissants.

translated_text: Financial Manager.
secondary_translated_text: Directeur financier.

translated_text: The Big Lead
secondary_translated_text: Le Grand Lead

original_en_text: If the woody hide is shattered, the bug will still bravely, foolishly try to attack.
original_zh_text: 它们至死都坚信那截空心木茎是神赐的圣枪——可悲的勇气，或是可敬的愚忠？
translated_text: Even if the bark of the tree is cracked, the worm will try to attack it courageously and foolishly.
secondary_translated_text: Même si l'écorce de l'arbre est fissurée, le ver essaiera de l'attaquer courageusement et stupide.

original_en_text: Young acolyte raised in the darkest vaults, destined to ascend to the rank of Scrollreader.
original_zh_text: 低语书库培育的诵经者接班人。
translated_text: Growing up in the darkest treasure trove, the young disciples are destined to be promoted to readers of the scrolls.
secondary_translated_text: Grandissant dans le trésor le plus sombre, les jeunes disciples sont destinés à être promus au rang de lecteurs des rouleaux.

translated_text: Nufarmo
secondary_translated_text: Nufarmo

original_en_text: Learned disciple of the Choir charged to maintain the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 受命维护圣堡忆廊的博学咏者团信徒。
translated_text: A learned disciple of the choir was in charge of the maintenance of the castle memorial.
secondary_translated_text: Un disciple érudit de la chorale était chargé de l'entretien du mémorial du château.

original_en_text: Heart of the Haunting, long lulled to slumber and desperate to wake. The higher being’s threads stretched throughout Pharloom, snaring its bugs and driving them to madness and discord.
original_zh_text: 丝咒的核心，长久沉眠却渴求苏醒。她的丝线遍布纺络，诱使这片土地上的虫子陷入疯狂。
translated_text: The heart is a ghost, a long sleep, a desire to wake. The threads of higher life penetrated the fal, trapped the insects, and drove them into madness and discord.
secondary_translated_text: Le cœur est un fantôme, un long sommeil, un désir de se réveiller. Les fils de la vie supérieure pénétrèrent dans le fal, piégeaient les insectes et les conduisaient à la folie et à la discorde.

original_en_text: Vigorous old knight and their noble companion, working together to see their lands cut free from haunted madness.
original_zh_text: 精力充沛的老骑士与他忠诚的同伴。他们并肩作战，誓要将自己的家园从丝咒的疯狂中解救出来。
translated_text: An energetic old knight and his noble companions work together to free the land from the ghostly madness.
secondary_translated_text: Un vieux chevalier énergique et ses nobles compagnons travaillent ensemble pour libérer la terre de la folie fantomatique.

original_en_text: Winged insect that feeds upon moss and lichen in the caves above Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 栖息于骸底镇上方洞窟的飞虫，以苔藓地衣为食。
translated_text: A winged insect that feeds on moss and lichens in caves above the base of bones.
secondary_translated_text: Insecte ailé qui se nourrit de mousse et de lichens dans des grottes au-dessus de la base des os.

original_zh_text: 监工兄弟 西格尼斯&格隆
translated_text: Forebrothers Sign&Meaning of Gron
secondary_translated_text: Frères signes&Signification de Gron

translated_text: Sca singer Carmelita
secondary_translated_text: Sca chanteuse Carmelita

original_en_text: Mournful creature tasked alone to expel the Citadel’s choking refuse. Their talent with a longpin is unmatched.
original_zh_text: 独自清理圣堡秽物的哀伤生物，长针技艺登峰造极。
translated_text: The brave creature undertakes the task of driving the breathtaking garbage out of the castle alone. Their talent for long pin is unparalleled.
secondary_translated_text: La créature courageuse entreprend la tâche de chasser les ordures à couper le souffle hors du château seul. Leur talent pour le long épingle est inégalé.

original_en_text: They ceaselessly churn through rock and bone without ever seeming to rest. Do they have a destination? Or are they compelled to dig forever deeper?
original_zh_text: 它们似乎永远不知疲倦地向下挖掘。究竟是有目的地前进，还是被迫永无止境地穿行？
translated_text: They were constantly stirring in the rocks and bones, and never seemed to rest. Do you have a destination? or do we dig deep forever?
secondary_translated_text: Ils agitaient constamment dans les roches et les os, et ne semblaient jamais se reposer. Avez-vous une destination ? Ou est-ce qu ' on va creuser pour toujours ?

original_en_text: Obese offshoot of Muckroaches, born of the Citadel’s exhaust smog. The winged roach’s sagging stomach is filled with sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 圣堡废气催生的肥胖蟑螂变种，鼓胀的腹部储存着沸腾胆汁。
translated_text: The thick branches of cockroaches were born from the castle's exhaust. The sagging stomach of the winged cockroach was filled with hyssop and bile.
secondary_translated_text: Les épaisses branches de cafards sont nées des gaz d'échappement du château. L'estomac affaibli du cafard ailé était rempli d'hisop et de bile.

translated_text: Malomo
secondary_translated_text: Malomé

original_en_text: Ancient Weaver condemned for a transgression lost to time.
original_zh_text: 远古时期因某项重罪被囚禁的古老织者。
translated_text: The ancient weavers were accused of sins lost in time.
secondary_translated_text: Les anciens tisserands étaient accusés de péchés perdus dans le temps.

original_en_text: A fine shot with its sharp mask. Its aggression has no ill effect on its aim.
original_zh_text: 面甲投掷精准异常，暴戾的性情并未损耗其分毫准度。
translated_text: Lovely photos, sharp masks. Its aggressiveness does not adversely affect its objectives.
secondary_translated_text: De belles photos, des masques vifs. Son agressivité n'affecte pas ses objectifs.

translated_text: Pressure to the bottom
secondary_translated_text: Pression vers le fond

original_en_text: Seeming soft, but hiding a sharp surprise. Any larger predator attempting a bite would learn a pointed and painful lesson.
original_zh_text: 看似柔软实则暗藏杀机，掠食者的撕咬只会换来锥心之痛。
translated_text: It may seem calm, but it hides a sharp surprise. Large predators attempting to bite learn a sharp and painful lesson.
secondary_translated_text: Cela peut sembler calme, mais cela cache une surprise aiguë. Les gros prédateurs qui tentent de mordre apprennent une leçon aiguë et douloureuse.

original_en_text: Not a bug but a projection of another’s will cast in smog and Silk.
original_zh_text: 烟雾与灵丝交织的意志投影，并非实体生物。
translated_text: Not an insect, but another human will thrown in smoke and silk.
secondary_translated_text: Non pas un insecte, mais un autre humain sera jeté dans la fumée et la soie.

translated_text: SwampSquit
secondary_translated_text: par SwampSquit

original_en_text: Broken construct built by Weavers past, able to fire a focused beam of silklight to carve halls and chambers through ice and bone.
original_zh_text: 破损的古织者装置，能聚集并发射灵丝光束凿穿冰体和骸骨，通常用来开凿厅室。
translated_text: Weaver's formerly broken buildings can radiate a concentrated Marcelia atmosphere through the ice and bone sculpted halls and chambers.
secondary_translated_text: Les bâtiments de Weaver, autrefois détruits, peuvent rayonner une atmosphère concentrée de Marcelia à travers les salles et les chambres sculptées en glace et en os.

translated_text: Deep Diver
secondary_translated_text: Le Deep Diver

original_en_text: Short-lived sprite born of flickering flame.
original_zh_text: 闪烁火焰孕育出的精灵，其生命往往转瞬即逝。
translated_text: A short-lived soul born from a glowing flame.
secondary_translated_text: Une âme éphémère née d'une flamme brillante.

original_en_text: Slow drifting bug with a heavy top shell. The bug reacts little to threats, even those that could claim its life.
original_zh_text: 顶覆厚重甲壳的漂浮虫，行动迟缓，对致命威胁也都反应微弱。
translated_text: The upper shell of a slowly floating insect is heavy. This vulnerability responds very little to threats, even those that could take their lives.
secondary_translated_text: La coquille supérieure d'un insecte flottant lentement est lourde. Cette vulnérabilité réagit très peu aux menaces, même celles qui pourraient leur coûter la vie.

original_en_text: Bell-clad bug responsible for mining the deeper, treacherous depths below their docks.
original_zh_text: 负责开采深坞下方危险矿区的虫子，身覆钟甲。
translated_text: The clocked bugs are responsible for mining at deeper and more dangerous depths beneath the dock.
secondary_translated_text: Les insectes horlogés sont responsables de l'exploitation minière à des profondeurs plus profondes et plus dangereuses sous le quai.

original_en_text: Toothy growth that lives on cave roofs. Wraps wayward bugs with its long tongue and drags them up to be consumed.
original_zh_text: 栖身洞顶的齿舌生物，用拟态长舌诱捕猎物。
translated_text: On the roof of the cave there is a tooth plant. Its long tongue enveloped the mischievous insect and dragged him into eating it.
secondary_translated_text: Sur le toit de la grotte, il y a une plante de dents. Sa longue langue enveloppait l'insecte méchant et l'entraînait à le manger.

original_en_text: Fine winged flyer that survives in flocks.
translated_text: A flock of winged pilots.
secondary_translated_text: Un troupeau de pilotes ailen.

original_en_text: Long dormant centipede, awoken and enraged by Pharloom’s crumbling collapse.
original_zh_text: 长期蛰伏的远古蜈蚣，因纺络的崩塌而苏醒、暴怒。
translated_text: After a long sleep, Mukad awakens and is furious at the collapse of Pharam.
secondary_translated_text: Après un long sommeil, Mukad se réveille et est furieux de l'effondrement de Pharam.

translated_text: Sagra
secondary_translated_text: Sagra

original_en_text: Erratic, flying pest that nests in rags and curtains.
original_zh_text: 寄居在破布和帷幔中的飞虫，居无定所。
translated_text: An unstable flying pest that builds a nest in rags and curtains.
secondary_translated_text: Un ravageur volant instable qui construit un nid dans des chiffons et des rideaux.

translated_text: Zebrafly
secondary_translated_text: Zebrafly

original_en_text: Once a hunter purely for food, now they hunt unthinking and unending.
original_zh_text: 曾是只为果腹而捕猎的猎手，如今却在丝咒驱使下沦为永不停歇的屠夫。
translated_text: In the past, they hunted only for food, but now they hunt endlessly without thinking.
secondary_translated_text: Dans le passé, ils chassaient uniquement pour la nourriture, mais maintenant ils chassent sans fin sans réfléchir.

original_en_text: So light they can rest atop still water’s surface. An elegant bug indeed.
original_zh_text: 轻盈得能栖于静水表面，确为优雅之虫。
translated_text: This means that they can live in still water with sufficient light. This is indeed a grave mistake.
secondary_translated_text: Cela signifie qu ' ils peuvent vivre dans l'eau calme avec suffisamment de lumière. C'est en effet une grave erreur.

translated_text: Steel Laker
secondary_translated_text: Acier Laker

original_en_text: Its form is absurd... Surely it should not be able to hold itself in the air? The noxious gases in its stomach must provide its levity.
original_zh_text: 如此畸形的躯体竟能悬空？想必是腹中毒气提供了浮力。
translated_text: That form is ridiculous. can we really be in the air? The toxic gas in the stomach must have provided the lightness.
secondary_translated_text: Cette forme est ridicule. Peut-on vraiment être dans les airs ? Le gaz toxique dans l'estomac a dû fournir la légèreté.

original_en_text: Once roused, the bug will crash its steely shell into walls, floors and foes.
original_zh_text: 被惊动后，会以钢甲撞击墙壁、地面与敌人。
translated_text: When they wake up, the worm will crush walls, floors and enemies to destroy the steel shell.
secondary_translated_text: Quand ils se réveillent, le ver va écraser les murs, les planchers et les ennemis pour détruire la coquille d'acier.

translated_text: The Elders of Iron
secondary_translated_text: Les Anciens du Fer

original_en_text: Elder crawbug serving in a sacred ceremony.
original_zh_text: 参与神圣仪式的腐囊虫长老。
translated_text: The elderly crab serves in a sacred ceremony.
secondary_translated_text: Le vieux crabe sert dans une cérémonie sacrée.

translated_text: Special Envoy's words
secondary_translated_text: Paroles de l'Envoyé spécial

translated_text: The greedy pilgrim.
secondary_translated_text: Le pèlerin gourmand.

original_en_text: Agile bug, and one of few hardy pilgrims to have reached the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 成功抵达圣堡的敏捷朝圣者。
translated_text: This agile insect is also one of the few tenacious pilgrims who have arrived at the castle.
secondary_translated_text: Cet insecte agile est aussi l'un des rares pèlerins tenaces qui sont arrivés au château.

original_en_text: Their use of a pin shows hard training. Their use of Silk, unfurled from a spool held close, shows skill far beyond standard bugs.
original_zh_text: 其刺针技法明显是经过严格训练，近身灵丝轴的操控技艺更是远超普通虫子。
translated_text: The use of the pins shows the difficulty of training. Using Silk unfolded from a nearby scroll, he displayed his skills far beyond the standard worm.
secondary_translated_text: L'utilisation des broches montre la difficulté de l'entraînement. En utilisant la soie déployée à partir d'un rouleau à proximité, il afficha ses compétences bien au-delà du ver standard.

original_en_text: Gilded guardian of the Blasted Steps, bearing a cymbal and mallet.
original_zh_text: 镇守蚀阶的金甲守卫，用钹和木槌处决"不洁者"。
translated_text: It has a golden guardian, explosive footsteps, a cymbal and a mallet.
secondary_translated_text: Il a un gardien d'or, des pas explosives, un cymbal et un marteau.

original_en_text: A rare, calmer bug of Bilewater, survives its hazardous surroundings by hiding as a plant.
original_zh_text: 腐汁泽罕见的温顺虫子，在危险的环境中拟态植物，得以生存。
translated_text: Rare, gentle bile bacteria survive in dangerous environments hiding in plants.
secondary_translated_text: Les bactéries biliaires rares et douces survivent dans des environnements dangereux se cachant dans les plantes.

original_en_text: Bug forged of iron, rotor and cog. The automaton works tirelessly to maintain the Core that houses it.
original_zh_text: 由齿轮与转子构成的铁质自动机，不知疲倦维护着机枢核心。
translated_text: Leakage wrought from iron, turntable and gears. The automaton works without rest to maintain the core that houses it.
secondary_translated_text: Fuite forgée à partir de fer, platine tournante et engrenages. L'automate travaille sans repos pour maintenir le noyau qui le logera.

original_en_text: Starved pack bug with an insatiable appetite. Despite their tough hide and pungent meat, roaches breed rapidly so are sometimes farmed for food.
original_zh_text: 贪婪的群居害虫，甲壳坚硬，虫肉腥臭，却因繁殖力超强被圈养作为为食物来源。
translated_text: A hungry symbiotic cannot satisfy its appetite. Although the skin of cockroaches is hard and the meat is spicy, they reproduce at a fast rate and are sometimes raised for food.
secondary_translated_text: Un symbiotique affamé ne peut satisfaire son appétit. Bien que la peau des cafards soit dure et la viande épicée, ils se reproduisent à un rythme rapide et sont parfois élevés pour la nourriture.

translated_text: Journal updates.
secondary_translated_text: Actualités journal.

translated_text: The Shadow Crawler.
secondary_translated_text: Le Shadow Crawler.

original_en_text: They cling fast to the shells of other bugs, destroying any hope for concentration or comfort.
original_zh_text: 它们紧附其他虫子的外壳，彻底摧毁宿主的专注力与安宁。
translated_text: They adhere to the shells of other insects, destroying hopes of concentration and comfort.
secondary_translated_text: Ils adhèrent aux coquilles d'autres insectes, détruisant les espoirs de concentration et de confort.

original_en_text: Pointed, darting insect that builds a hardy hive from Shellwood’s dried bark.
original_zh_text: 以甲木林干树皮筑巢的尖刺飞虫。
translated_text: The pointy spray insects use the dried bark of the shellwood to build sturdy nests.
secondary_translated_text: Les insectes de pulvérisation pointues utilisent l'écorce séchée du bois de coquille pour construire des nids robustes.

original_en_text: Full-sized mite of the Citadel cloaked in an old curtain.
original_zh_text: 披挂破旧幕帘的圣堡巨型螨虫。
translated_text: The old curtains of the castle were wrapped in life-sized mites.
secondary_translated_text: Les vieux rideaux du château étaient enveloppés d'acariens de taille nature.

translated_text: Moaning
secondary_translated_text: Moaning

translated_text: cytoplasm is
secondary_translated_text: le cytoplasme est

original_en_text: A snapping surprise on first encounter, though one easily avoided once aware.
original_zh_text: 初次遭遇的惊险过后，便再难构成威胁。
translated_text: There are surprises when you first meet them, but once you realize it, it's easy to avoid them.
secondary_translated_text: Il y a des surprises lorsque vous les rencontrez pour la première fois, mais une fois que vous vous en rendez compte, il est facile de les éviter.

translated_text: Hydrogen phosphate
secondary_translated_text: Hydrogène phosphate.

translated_text: Scullyd
secondary_translated_text: Scullyd

original_en_text: His tracks and traps... It should have been obvious from the start, this old hunter sought to draw me in. But what reason drove him to test himself so brutally? That answer I suspect I shall never know.
original_zh_text: 早该察觉他的踪迹与陷阱……但这老猎手对自己进行如此残酷试炼的原因，看来是无从得知了。
translated_text: His footsteps and traps From the very beginning it was clear that the old hunter was trying to seduce me, but what had tried him so cruelly? I'll never know the answer.
secondary_translated_text: Ses pas et pièges Dès le début, il était clair que le vieux chasseur essayait de me séduire, mais qu ' était-ce qui l'avait tenté si cruellement ? Je ne connaîtrais jamais la réponse.

original_en_text: Brutish cook responsible for dicing Muckroach meat into edible portions.
original_zh_text: 粗鲁的厨子，负责将淤秽蟑螂肉切分成便于食用的分量。
translated_text: The barbaric cook chops the cockroach's flesh for eating.
secondary_translated_text: Le cuisinier barbare coupe la chair du cafard pour la manger.

original_en_text: Flighted automaton, responsible for repairing and extending the Core.
original_zh_text: 负责维修扩建核心的飞行自动机，简单攻击暗藏杀机。
translated_text: A flying automaton in charge of repairing and expanding the core.
secondary_translated_text: Un automate volant chargé de réparer et d'élargir le noyau.

original_en_text: Giant roller of the lowlands. Its ridged hide will crush smaller creatures beneath it.
original_zh_text: 在低地区域横冲直撞的巨型生物，带棱甲的躯体能轻易碾碎小型生物。
translated_text: Huge roll of lowlands. Its ridge-like skin can crush the tiny creatures below.
secondary_translated_text: Un grand rouleau de basses terres. Sa peau en forme de crête peut écraser les minuscules créatures en dessous.

original_en_text: Shell of a small bug possessed by Silk dregs. The husk will stretch its Silk to form a crude, crushing wheel.
original_zh_text: 被灵丝残渣附身的小型甲虫躯壳，伸展灵丝形成粗糙碾压轮。
translated_text: The shells of small insects are attached to the body as silk residue. The shell stretches the silk, forming roughly broken wheels.
secondary_translated_text: Les coquilles de petits insectes sont attachées au corps sous forme de résidus de soie. La coquille étire la soie, formant des roues à peu près cassées.

original_en_text: Rag-winged adult crawbug bearing a scavenged pin.
original_zh_text: 翅膀破烂的腐囊成虫，使用捡来刺针作为武器。
translated_text: An adult crab with coarse wings and predatory pins.
secondary_translated_text: Un crabe adulte avec des ailes grossières et des épingles prédatrices.

translated_text: cockroaches are
secondary_translated_text: Les cafards sont

original_en_text: I have not yet seen the bell this automaton is designed to ring, nor do I ever wish to hear it. Such a clamour would no doubt be unpleasant to experience.
original_zh_text: 它们机械臂摆动的节奏暗合圣咏旋律，若真让这些击钹者齐聚奏响终章，恐怕整个机枢核心都会在共振中崩塌。
translated_text: I've never seen this robot design ring a bell, and I don't want to hear it. This kind of noise can be uncomfortable.
secondary_translated_text: Je n'ai jamais vu cette conception de robot sonner une cloche, et je ne veux pas l'entendre. Ce genre de bruit peut être inconfortable.

translated_text: of Palestine.
secondary_translated_text: de la Palestine.

original_en_text: If allowed the opportunity, these creatures will grow into a form larger and more oppressive.
original_zh_text: 此刻脆弱，却是未来灾祸的种子。放任其成长将成为巨大威胁。
translated_text: Given the opportunity, these creatures will grow into larger, more repressive forms.
secondary_translated_text: Si l'on en a l'occasion, ces créatures se développeront en formes plus grandes et plus répressives.

original_en_text: He offered fair warning and challenge, a duel in the purest sense. I admire his honour, and his skill.
original_zh_text: 他向我发起了正式的挑战，那是一场最纯粹的决斗。我敬佩他的荣誉感，也钦佩他的技艺。
translated_text: He gave a fair warning and challenge. This is a fight in the pure sense. I admire his honour and skill.
secondary_translated_text: Il a lancé un juste avertissement et un défi. C'est un combat au sens pur. J'admire son honneur et son talent.

original_en_text: Insect formed to imitate a branch, born with sharp, retractable horns atop its head.
original_zh_text: 头部配备可收缩尖角的拟态树枝虫。
translated_text: Insects mimic branches and have sharp, telescopic horns on their heads.
secondary_translated_text: Les insectes imitent les branches et ont des cornes aiguës et télescopiques sur leur tête.

original_en_text: Small, soft bug that uses the hard skulls of the Marrow for protection and disguise.
original_zh_text: 小型软体虫，利用髓骨洞窟内硬质头骨作为自己的护甲和伪装。
translated_text: A small, soft worm that uses a hard bone marrow skull to protect and camouflage it.
secondary_translated_text: Un petit ver mou qui utilise un crâne dur de moelle osseuse pour le protéger et le camoufler.

original_en_text: When roosting, it would look convincingly plant-like. In flight, its bulbous body quickly ruins the ruse.
original_zh_text: 停栖时，双翼能完美伪装成远野的草叶。但这小聪明总在飞行时露出破绽——它膨大的腹部让伪装功亏一篑。
translated_text: When you look at it, it looks as attractive as a plant. In flight, its spherical body quickly destroyed the technology.
secondary_translated_text: Quand vous la regardez, elle a l'air aussi attrayante qu ' une plante. En vol, son corps sphérique a rapidement détruit la technologie.

translated_text: Yago.
secondary_translated_text: Yago !

translated_text: Model Bacteria
secondary_translated_text: Modèle bactérien

original_en_text: Cloth-covered crawler with sharpened forelimbs. Lives and breeds in dark places.
original_zh_text: 栖息暗处的爬虫，身覆布料，前肢锐利。
translated_text: The reptiles are covered with cloth and sharp fore legs. They live and reproduce in dark places.
secondary_translated_text: Les reptiles sont recouverts de tissu et de pattes avant pointues. Ils vivent et se reproduisent dans des endroits sombres.

translated_text: Wing Wing
secondary_translated_text: Wing Wing Wing

original_en_text: The cost of so much grandeur... Did I peer closely enough into the foundations of my own kingdom?
original_zh_text: 辉煌背后的代价……我是否也曾如此审视过自己王国的根基？
translated_text: Such a huge cost. Have I looked at the foundation of the kingdom well?
secondary_translated_text: Un tel coût énorme. Ai-je bien regardé les fondations du royaume ?

original_en_text: Stout adult crawbug bearing several short pins.
original_zh_text: 手持短刺的矮胖腐囊成虫。
translated_text: A thick adult crab with short needles.
secondary_translated_text: Un crabe adulte épais avec de courtes aiguilles.

translated_text: La Valug
secondary_translated_text: La Valug

original_en_text: Greed will always see some bugs swell above their kin.
original_zh_text: 贪婪终会导致膨胀，这是所有生物共通的教训。
translated_text: Greedy people always see errors spreading to their fellows.
secondary_translated_text: Les gens gourmands voient toujours les erreurs se propager à leurs semblables.

original_en_text: This graceful ruler once possessed skill to rival my own. At her youthful peak, her voice united all Skarr in her service.
original_zh_text: 这位优雅的统治者曾拥有与我匹敌的武艺。在她巅峰时期，其歌喉能让所有斯卡尔蚁族臣服效命。
translated_text: This graceful ruler once had a skill comparable to mine. At the height of her youth, her voice united all of the scale for her.
secondary_translated_text: Ce dirigeant gracieux avait autrefois une compétence comparable à la mienne. Au plus fort de sa jeunesse, sa voix réunit pour elle toute l'échelle.

original_en_text: False fly with a rune etched shell. A tortured mix of soul and void is caged within.
original_zh_text: 外壳刻有符文的飞虫形装置，内部囚禁着灵魂与虚空的痛苦混合物。
translated_text: The shell of the false fly has a runic letter. A mixture of soul and emptiness pains is locked in a cage.
secondary_translated_text: La coquille de la fausse mouche a une lettre runique. Un mélange de douleurs d'âme et de vide est enfermé dans une cage.

original_en_text: Suction creature surviving on the thick slime that coats its caves.
original_zh_text: 依赖洞壁浓稠粘液维生的吸附生物。
translated_text: The suction organism relies on the mucus that covers the cave.
secondary_translated_text: L'organisme d'aspiration repose sur le mucus qui recouvre la grotte.

original_en_text: Tall roach tender charged to feed Muckroaches on a lean diet of maggot gruel.
original_zh_text: 负责用蛆虫糊喂养腐汁蟑螂的高瘦饲育者。
translated_text: The tall cockroaches need red meat feed from the porridge of the worm.
secondary_translated_text: Les gros cafards ont besoin de viande rouge à partir de la bouillon du ver.

original_en_text: Tiny, soft creature that armours itself using the hard, hollow growths of Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 用甲木林硬质空茎武装自身的脆弱飞虫。
translated_text: The tiny, soft creatures use hard plants like shells to protect themselves.
secondary_translated_text: Les petites créatures mous utilisent des plantes dures comme des coquilles pour se protéger.

original_en_text: Taken by Pharloom’s Haunting, the bug is now capable of little more than prayer and aggression.
original_zh_text: 丝咒侵蚀了它们的理智，如今这些虫子只剩祷告与攻击的本能。
translated_text: In Falham's Haunted, the bugs can only pray and attack.
secondary_translated_text: Dans Falham 's Haunted, les insectes ne peuvent que prier et attaquer.

translated_text: Groville the Pilgrim
secondary_translated_text: Groville le pèlerin

original_en_text: Oversized bug, briefly consumed by anger after its long time caged.
original_zh_text: 长期囚禁后暴怒的巨型跳蚤。
translated_text: The humming insect was briefly swallowed up in anger after being caged for a long time.
secondary_translated_text: L'insecte bourdonnant a été brièvement englouti par la colère après avoir été en cage pendant longtemps.

original_en_text: From the outset, theirs was a hopeless task. Those wild lands could never be replicated within a space so artificial.
original_zh_text: 从最初这就是徒劳之举——自然的荒野绝无可能在虫子造出的空间刻意复现。
translated_text: From the beginning, their task was hopeless. It can never be reproduced in such an artificial space.
secondary_translated_text: Dès le début, leur tâche était sans espoir. Elle ne peut jamais être reproduite dans un tel espace artificiel.

original_zh_text: 低地地区的游荡者，绒毛下暗藏钢刺并具备远程发射能力。
translated_text: Low-end spine drifters
secondary_translated_text: Low-End Spine Drifters

original_en_text: Wriggling young grub that lives in darkness.
translated_text: Young larvae crawling in the dark.
secondary_translated_text: De jeunes larves rampant dans l'obscurité.

original_en_text: Their procedures with Silk may have prolonged life within the Citadel, but they unknowingly gifted many minds to the monarch.
original_zh_text: 他们的灵丝手术虽维系了圣堡的生命，却无意中将所有心智献予了君主。
translated_text: The treatment of silk may have extended the life of the castle, but it has subconsciously conveyed many ideas to the monarch.
secondary_translated_text: Le traitement de la soie a peut - être prolongé la vie du château, mais il a subconsciemment transmis de nombreuses idées au monarque.

original_en_text: Floral foe that reacts instinctively to movement nearby. Spits pellets of crackling pollen that burst on impact.
original_zh_text: 对周围动静极其敏感的植物，能够喷射噼啪作响的花粉弹。
translated_text: Flower opponents instinctively react to nearby movements. They eject pollen balls and burst in shock.
secondary_translated_text: Les adversaires des fleurs réagissent instinctivement aux mouvements proches. Ils éjectent des boules de pollen et éclatent en choc.

translated_text: I confess.
secondary_translated_text: Je confesse.

translated_text: Fatid
secondary_translated_text: Fatid

translated_text: Belinzia
secondary_translated_text: Belinzie

translated_text: Second Sentinel
secondary_translated_text: Deuxième sentinelle

original_en_text: In contests of speed against strength, I have seen the swift more often triumphant, a lesson I have taken to my own heart.
original_zh_text: 见证这以快制胜的案例，更坚定了我对敏捷的追求。
translated_text: It's a lesson in my mind to see Swift win more in the race of speed and power.
secondary_translated_text: C'est une leçon pour moi de voir Swift gagner plus dans la course de la vitesse et de la puissance.

translated_text: Loft on the lower level.
secondary_translated_text: Loft sur le niveau inférieur.

translated_text: Pound catcher
secondary_translated_text: Pound Catcher

translated_text: Divide them.
secondary_translated_text: divisez-les.

original_en_text: Pilgrim endowed with large wings, carrying a brace of iron bells.
original_zh_text: 配备一对铁钟的飞行朝圣者。
translated_text: The pilgrims had large wings and had iron clocks.
secondary_translated_text: Les pèlerins avaient de grandes ailes et des horloges en fer.

translated_text: Spear and skeleton.
secondary_translated_text: Lance et squelette.

original_en_text: In my youth, I envied all bugs with wings. I even fancied I might grow a pair... I have since learned better. Accept the limitations of one’s body... and augment with tools as needed.
original_zh_text: 年少时，我曾一度羡慕生来便有翅膀的虫族，甚至曾幻想自己也能长出一对来……如今我已明白，接受身体上的限制，并学会用工具弥补缺陷才是正途。
translated_text: When I was young, I envied the winged insects. I have imagined raising a couple. Since then, I have learned better. Accept the limits of your body. Add tools if you need to.
secondary_translated_text: Quand j'étais jeune, j'enviais les insectes ailés. J'ai imaginé élever un couple. Depuis, j'ai appris mieux. Acceptez les limites de votre corps. Ajouter des outils si vous en avez besoin.

original_en_text: Devious ambusher that poses as a fossil.
original_zh_text: 伪装成化石的狡诈伏击者。
translated_text: Clowns pretend to be fossils.
secondary_translated_text: Les clowns prétendent être des fossiles.

translated_text: The ghost.
secondary_translated_text: Le fantôme.

original_en_text: This bug bears a spool of Silk, which they flail to attack. Though somewhat crude, theirs is a technique much reminiscent of Weavers. I wonder who taught them such a use?
original_zh_text: 这只虫子携带着一轴灵丝，并挥舞它进行攻击。动作虽略显粗糙，但竟带着几分织者的神韵。不知是谁教会了它这样使用灵丝？
translated_text: The insect holds a silk roll and swings around it. A little rough, but the technique is reminiscent of a weaver. Who taught me how to use this?
secondary_translated_text: L'insecte tient un rouleau de soie et se balance autour de lui. Un peu rugueux, mais la technique rappelle celle d'un tisser. Qui m'a appris à l'utiliser ?

original_en_text: Her presence would once have maintained the wood’s fragile order, allowing the safe passage of bugs across its branches.
original_zh_text: 昔日的她维持领域内脆弱的平衡，护佑虫子们安然通行其枝干。
translated_text: Her presence had kept the fragile order of the forest, which allowed insects to safely pass through the branches.
secondary_translated_text: Sa présence avait maintenu le fragile ordre de la forêt, ce qui permettait aux insectes de passer en toute sécurité à travers les branches.

translated_text: There are many pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: Il y a beaucoup de pèlerins.

original_en_text: Though generally passive, their sharp masks can cause injury if carelessly blundered into.
original_zh_text: 虽性情温顺，但若冒失冲撞其锋利面甲仍会受伤。
translated_text: They are usually passive, but they can cause damage if they hit a sharp mask.
secondary_translated_text: Ils sont généralement passifs, mais ils peuvent causer des dommages s'ils heurtent un masque tranchant.

translated_text: Flying termites.
secondary_translated_text: Termites volantes.

original_en_text: I like her. For her willingness to teach and her spirit still strong, despite a long age spent solitary... she has my respect.
original_zh_text: 我欣赏她——甘于传授技艺，孤寂长年也未磨灭斗志，值得尊敬。
translated_text: I like her She lived alone for a long time, but she likes to teach, and the spirit is strong I respect her.
secondary_translated_text: Elle a vécu seule pendant longtemps, mais elle aime enseigner, et l'esprit est fort, je la respecte.

translated_text: Debris Bark
secondary_translated_text: Débris de Bark

original_en_text: They held long at their vigil, far beyond the age of their brethren, yet still when roused they swung their blade with remarkable ease.
original_zh_text: 他们戍边的年岁就能远超同辈寿命，苏醒时仍能挥动利刃，动作流畅自如。
translated_text: They were far beyond their brother's age, but when they woke up they were still lightly wielding their swords.
secondary_translated_text: Ils étaient bien au-delà de l'âge de leur frère, mais quand ils se réveillèrent, ils brandissaient encore légèrement leurs épées.

original_en_text: Long-horned beast of Pharloom’s lowlands. Relies on its horn both to impale and to wrench the ground beneath it, flinging dangerous debris.
original_zh_text: 纺络低地的长角巨兽，依赖长角穿刺敌人并掘起地面制造危险碎片云。
translated_text: Longhorn cattle of Lowland Fanham. Relying on its horns, it pierces the ground below and throws dangerous debris.
secondary_translated_text: Longhorn du Lowland Fanham. S'appuyant sur ses cornes, il perce le sol en dessous et jette des débris dangereux.

original_en_text: Could their actions be called skill? I see only a crude mangling of meat. Yet I wonder, before the Haunting snared their minds was it any different?
original_zh_text: 这般行径怎能称为厨艺？我只见到对血肉的粗暴摧残。它在丝咒侵蚀前，或许不会像现在这样粗鄙行事？
translated_text: do you think their actions are a skill? I saw a coarse piece of meat. However, they don't know if things changed before the ghosts took over them.
secondary_translated_text: Pensez-vous que leurs actions sont une compétence ? J'ai vu un morceau de viande grossier. Cependant, ils ne savent pas si les choses ont changé avant que les fantômes ne les prennent en charge.

original_en_text: Darting warrior with sharpened forelimbs and heightened senses.
original_zh_text: 前肢尖利且感官强化的迅捷战士。
translated_text: The darts warrior has a sharp forearm and a sharp sense.
secondary_translated_text: Le guerrier des fléchettes a un avant-bras aiguisé et un sens aigu.

original_en_text: Mighty percussive disciple of the Choir, wielding a mallet and a Silk spool to wrap and enhance their attacks.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团的打击乐信徒，挥舞槌棒，并利用灵丝轴强化它们的攻击。
translated_text: The disciples of the powerful attack choir wield hammers and silk scrolls to intensify their attacks.
secondary_translated_text: Les disciples de la puissante chorale d'attaque brandissaient des marteaux et des rouleaux de soie pour intensifier leurs attaques.

original_en_text: Dual princes of old Verdania, beloved by their subjects for their grace and for the ballet of death they delivered upon outsiders.
original_zh_text: 昔日翠庭王国的双生王子，以恩典治国，深受子民爱戴。对于不怀好意的外来者，他们会为其献上一支死亡芭蕾。
translated_text: The double prince of old Verdania was loved by his subjects for his grace and the ballet of death presented to outsiders.
secondary_translated_text: Le double prince de la vieille Verdania était aimé par ses sujets pour sa grâce et le ballet de la mort présenté aux étrangers.

original_en_text: Huge and soft, a fantastic combination ruined by their haunted aggression.
original_zh_text: 明明是个蓬松的大毛球，可惜被丝咒搞得见谁都想撞两下。
translated_text: Huge and soft, it's a great combination, but it gets spoiled by ghostly aggression.
secondary_translated_text: Enorme et doux, c'est une excellente combinaison, mais il est gâté par une agression fantomatique.

translated_text: Hardbone Funnel
secondary_translated_text: Funnel de bonnet

original_en_text: On uneven terrain their union of flight and range can prove a challenge even for me.
original_zh_text: 崎岖地形中，其飞行阵列的配合连我也需谨慎应对。
translated_text: The combination of flying over rugged terrain and range was a challenge for me too.
secondary_translated_text: La combinaison de voler sur un terrain accidenté et d'une autonomie était un défi pour moi aussi.

original_en_text: They toiled incessantly for the Citadel, their shells bent and greyed, and now the kingdom’s curse means not even death can relieve them.
original_zh_text: 他们为圣堡鞠躬尽瘁直至甲壳弯折灰败，如今连死亡都无法终结这诅咒。
translated_text: They work hard for the castle, their shells bend and turn gray, and the curse of the kingdom means that even death cannot get rid of them.
secondary_translated_text: Ils travaillent dur pour le château, leurs coquilles se plient et deviennent grises, et la malédiction du royaume signifie que même la mort ne peut pas se débarrasser d'eux.

original_en_text: Destroying the hives will limit their presence in the wood. Useful to me now, as I pass along the branches. Dangerous in time for the wood’s order. Even a small disruption can tip a fragile balance.
original_zh_text: 摧毁蜂巢会限制它们在林中的活动。对我而言，这在穿行丛林时十分有用。但从长远来看，即便是微小的干扰，也可能打破丛林脆弱的生态平衡。
translated_text: Destroying a bee's nest limits its presence in the forest. When I walk on a branch, it works for me. Dangerous time for timber orders. Even the slightest damage can upset the fragile balance.
secondary_translated_text: La destruction du nid d'abeille limite sa présence dans la forêt. Quand je marche sur une branche, cela fonctionne pour moi. Temps dangereux pour les commandes de bois. Même le moindre dommage peut bouleverser l'équilibre fragile.

original_en_text: It has no true mind, and yet fights effectively, adjusting its strategy to my movements. Where exactly are its thoughts written?
original_zh_text: 当它用盾牌格挡我的织针突刺，同时以刁钻角度刺出长枪时，我仿佛在与某个沉睡在齿轮中的古老剑客对决。
translated_text: I don't have a real idea, but the battle is effective by adjusting my strategy to fit my moves. Where did his idea come from?
secondary_translated_text: Je n'ai pas vraiment d'idée, mais la bataille est efficace en ajustant ma stratégie pour s'adapter à mes mouvements. D'où vient son idée ?

original_en_text: A bug born entirely of thread. Much Silk would have been needed to see her sustained. A fragile form of life, but life nonetheless.
original_zh_text: 完全由灵丝编织而成的虫子。维持这种丝造生命需耗费海量的灵丝资源，虽形态脆弱却真实鲜活。
translated_text: Error generated entirely by thread. She needs a lot of silk to move her. It is a fragile organism, but it is still life.
secondary_translated_text: Erreur générée entièrement par thread. Elle a besoin de beaucoup de soie pour la bouger, c'est un organisme fragile, mais c'est encore la vie.

translated_text: Great greetings.
secondary_translated_text: Grandes salutations.

original_en_text: Individually they offer little challenge, but their numbers are surely vast, and most remain hidden.
original_zh_text: 单只不足为惧，但其庞大族群多潜藏暗处，如同阴影永难根除。
translated_text: Personally, there are very few challenges they face, but the number is certainly many, and most of them are still hidden.
secondary_translated_text: Personnellement, il y a très peu de défis auxquels ils font face, mais le nombre est certainement beaucoup, et la plupart d'entre eux sont encore cachés.

original_en_text: A lucky bug to be able to grow old. Pharloom’s roads take most much earlier.
original_zh_text: 能在纺络活到这样的年纪堪称奇迹，只可惜这份长寿化作了更持久的折磨。
translated_text: Lucky worm that can get old. Farram's path advanced quickly.
secondary_translated_text: Un ver chanceux qui peut vieillir. Le chemin de Farram avançait rapidement.

original_en_text: Huge flighted creature formed from coldshard.
original_zh_text: 由冰晶碎片构成的巨型飞行生物。
translated_text: The giant flying creature is made of cold debris.
secondary_translated_text: La créature volante géante est faite de débris froids.

original_en_text: She has lived a mere fraction of my lifetime and yet her rings prove a ferocious match. As gifted a warrior as I have ever encountered, and one I am fortunate to call a friend.
original_zh_text: 她的年岁不过我生命的一小段，但她的战环却展现出凶狠的实力。她是我所遇过最出色的战士之一，很庆幸能和她成为朋友。
translated_text: She had only experienced a small part of my life, but her ring was a perfect fit. The most talented soldier I have ever met is a soldier who has earned the honor of calling me a friend.
secondary_translated_text: Elle n'avait vécu qu ' une petite partie de ma vie, mais sa bague était parfaite. Le soldat le plus talentueux que j'ai jamais rencontré est un soldat qui a gagné l'honneur de m'appeler ami.

original_en_text: Sheer bulk makes for an effective weapon, but requires much sustenance. This creature would have spent most of its time eating. An acceptable life for some.
original_zh_text: 庞大的身躯是它们致命的武器，但也需要大量营养来维持。这种生物绝大多数时间都在进食，倒也活得纯粹。
translated_text: Pure scrolling is an effective weapon, but it requires a lot of support. This creature eats most of the time. It is an acceptable life for some people.
secondary_translated_text: Le scrolling pur est une arme efficace, mais il nécessite beaucoup de soutien. Cette créature se nourrit la plupart du temps. C'est une vie acceptable pour certaines personnes.

original_en_text: These ones grow large, yet I have never observed them eating, or sleeping. They seem such simple bugs... but I suspect they are not truly our cousins.
original_zh_text: 体型虽庞大，却从未见其进食或休眠。看似普通的虫子……实则与我们并非同类。
translated_text: It is growing big, but I have never seen it eat or sleep. It looks so simple, I think they're real cousins.
secondary_translated_text: Il grandit, mais je ne l'ai jamais vu manger ou dormir. C'est si simple, je pense qu 'ils sont de vrais cousins.

original_en_text: Huge, hardbone bug that lives within and travels through the veins of old bells across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 居住在古钟里并穿梭于纺络广阔钟脉里的骨甲大块头。
translated_text: A huge, hard worm inhabits the veins of the ancient clock of the fallout and passes through the fallout.
secondary_translated_text: Un énorme ver dur habite les veines de l'ancienne horloge de la chute et passe à travers la chute.

original_en_text: Winged devout of the Citadel, carrying a brace of gilded bells.
original_zh_text: 圣堡的带翼信徒，背负一对镀金巨钟作战。
translated_text: He flew proudly through the castle, carrying a golden bell on his back.
secondary_translated_text: Il a volé fièrement à travers le château, portant une cloche d'or sur son dos.

original_en_text: This one would make a perfect pet, but for the freezing temperatures it requires for comfort.
original_zh_text: 本可成为完美的宠物，但其生存需依赖刺骨的低温。
translated_text: This will make a perfect pet, but it needs to be comfortable because of the cold.
secondary_translated_text: Cela fera un animal parfait, mais il doit être confortable à cause du froid.

original_en_text: These creatures look to have been bred deliberately in watery pens. If they are food to be, their scent suggests they must taste vile.
original_zh_text: 刻意养殖的水栖变种，若作食用，其恶臭已昭示其滋味堪忧。
translated_text: This creature seems to be breeding in the water. If it's the food of the future, the smell indicates that it's hard to eat.
secondary_translated_text: Cette créature semble se reproduire dans l'eau. S'il s'agit de la nourriture du futur, l'odeur indique qu ' elle est difficile à manger.

original_en_text: Their skill once saw them chosen, and I can plainly see why. They would have lived and trained only for this duty.
original_zh_text: 它们的高超技艺我已亲身体会，必然是终生磨练只为履行职责。
translated_text: I know very well why their skills were chosen; they only live and train for this responsibility.
secondary_translated_text: Je sais très bien pourquoi leurs compétences ont été choisies ; ils ne vivent et s'entraînent que pour cette responsabilité.

original_en_text: For this bug to have survived Pharloom’s climb it must have teamed with stouter companions. I cannot imagine it succeeding alone.
original_zh_text: 单凭自身的力量，这虫子绝无可能攀越纺络的天堑，成功进入圣堡。想必曾与更强壮的伙伴互为倚仗。
translated_text: This insect must have survived when it climbed the farm, and must have cooperated with its more powerful companion. You cannot think alone.
secondary_translated_text: Cet insecte a dû survivre lorsqu ' il a grimpé sur la ferme, et a dû coopérer avec son compagnon plus puissant. Vous ne pouvez pas penser seul.

original_en_text: Did this one grow large thanks to the Citadel’s excess, or was its formidable size the reason it ever survived to reach this place?
original_zh_text: 这家伙的巨大体型是因圣堡的恩赐而异变，还是正因其巨大体型才得以存活至此？
translated_text: Did the size of the castle increase by the number of castles, or did its mighty size survive and come here?
secondary_translated_text: Est-ce que la taille du château a augmenté par le nombre de châteaux, ou est-ce que sa grandeur a survécu et est venue ici ?

original_en_text: Though surely fierce, the skull it bears looks taken from an even larger beast. If not for the bones as proof, I would scarcely believe bugs could grow to such scale.
original_zh_text: 它头顶的骷髅战盔竟取自更庞大的生物——若非有骸骨为证，我简直难以相信世间存在如此巨虫。
translated_text: Its skull was certainly ferocious, but its skull appears to have been taken from a larger beast. Without evidence of bones, it is hard to believe that this worm could have grown to this size.
secondary_translated_text: Son crâne était certainement féroce, mais son crâne semble avoir été pris d'une bête plus grande. Sans des preuves d'os, il est difficile de croire que ce ver aurait pu atteindre cette taille.

translated_text: Farid
secondary_translated_text: par Farid

translated_text: Sniper of Silk
secondary_translated_text: Sniper de Silk

translated_text: Dental model.
secondary_translated_text: modèle dentaire.

original_en_text: Two cogwork bugs, and yet the soul seemed singular? A sad, yet masterful imitation of life, imbued inside shells of iron.
original_zh_text: 两只自动机虫却共享单一灵魂？这是栖身于铁壳内的生命仿品，展现出精湛的制造技艺，却难掩其悲哀的命运。
translated_text: Do you have two gears, but the soul looks unique? It was a sad but exquisite imitation of life, full of an iron shell.
secondary_translated_text: Vous avez deux engrenages, mais l'âme semble unique ? C'était une triste mais exquise imitation de la vie, pleine d'une coquille de fer.

translated_text: Plasmide
secondary_translated_text: plasmide

original_en_text: Heavy insect that lives near large bodies of water. Its weighty body is best avoided.
original_zh_text: 栖息大型水域附近的笨重昆虫，遇到最好绕道而行。
translated_text: Heavy insects that live near wide bodies of water. Heavy bodies should be avoided.
secondary_translated_text: Insectes lourds qui vivent à proximité de grands masses d'eau. Les corps lourds sont à éviter.

translated_text: kilik said:
secondary_translated_text: kilik a écrit :

original_en_text: Drifting bug disguised as a flower. Disperses crackling clouds of pollen if threatened.
original_zh_text: 伪装成花朵的漂浮生物，遇到威胁时会释放噼啪作响的花粉云自卫。
translated_text: Floating worms disguised as flowers. When threatened, they disperse the pollen clouds.
secondary_translated_text: Les vers flottants déguisés en fleurs. Lorsqu ' ils sont menacés, ils disperser les nuages de pollen.

original_en_text: Dense knot of husks bound tight by void soaked Silk.
original_zh_text: 由虚空浸染的灵丝捆缚的躯壳，密集成团。
translated_text: The knots of the tight shell were tightly bound with silk, wet in the sky.
secondary_translated_text: Les nœuds de la coquille serrée étaient étroitement liés avec de la soie, mouillés dans le ciel.

translated_text: Cog worker
secondary_translated_text: Travailleur Cog

translated_text: Drag Wheels
secondary_translated_text: Drag Wheels

original_en_text: A smart hunter learns to wait long in ambush, always ready to strike the first blow.
original_zh_text: 优秀的猎手都懂得：耐心蹲点，一击必杀。
translated_text: A clever hunter learns to wait long hours in ambushes and is ready to mount his first attack at any time.
secondary_translated_text: Un chasseur intelligent apprend à attendre de longues heures dans des embuscades et est prêt à monter sa première attaque à tout moment.

original_en_text: Grazing creature with sharp senses that nimbly retreats from danger.
original_zh_text: 感官敏锐的食草生物，遇到危险会灵活撤退。
translated_text: Sensory-sensitive herbivores are able to withdraw flexibly from danger.
secondary_translated_text: Les herbivores sensibles aux sensors sont capables de se retirer de manière flexible du danger.

original_en_text: Tiny, timid creatures that huddle in flocks and flee at the first hint of danger.
original_zh_text: 胆小的小型群居生物，一旦察觉到危险便四散奔逃。
translated_text: The small, timid creatures swarmed to flee when they were in danger.
secondary_translated_text: Les petites créatures timides se regroupent pour fuir lorsqu 'elles sont en danger.

original_en_text: Lost in the madness of the Haunting, they still commanded the endless excavation of their caves.
original_zh_text: 即便深陷丝咒癫狂，仍持续号令无休止的矿洞挖掘。
translated_text: They are lost in the ghostly madness and still direct the endless excavation of the cave.
secondary_translated_text: Ils sont perdus dans la folie fantomatique et dirigent toujours l'excavation sans fin de la grotte.

translated_text: The Jury Crow
secondary_translated_text: Le Jury Crow

original_en_text: They rarely relax, always alert for potential danger, even deep in their own territory. To defeat them my focus must match their own.
original_zh_text: 就算在其领地深处，他们仍保持高度警戒。要想击败他们，我的专注力必须达到与其相当的水平。
translated_text: Even they are rarely relaxed, and are always alert to potential dangers deep within their territory. In order to defeat them, I must match my attention with their own. "
secondary_translated_text: Même ils sont rarement détendus et sont toujours alertes aux dangers potentiels au fond de leur territoire. Pour les vaincre, je dois faire correspondre mon attention à la leur. "

original_en_text: Steam shooting automaton, forged to clean the Cogwork Core and keep it free of infestation.
original_zh_text: 喷射蒸汽清洁机枢核心的自动机。
translated_text: Forged steam jet automata to clean and protect the Cogwork core from intrusion.
secondary_translated_text: Des automates à jet de vapeur forgés pour nettoyer et protéger le noyau de Cogwork contre les intrusions.

translated_text: Bell Beast
secondary_translated_text: Bell Beast

original_en_text: Sticky young fly, born and grown in service to the Slab.
original_zh_text: 自幼服务于罪石牢狱的黏腻幼蝇。
translated_text: The sticky young flies were born and bred to serve slate.
secondary_translated_text: Les jeunes mouches collantes sont nées et élevées pour servir de l'ardoise.

translated_text: Pendella
secondary_translated_text: pendelle

translated_text: Wooden Bees
secondary_translated_text: Les abeilles en bois

translated_text: Notice of whistleblower
secondary_translated_text: Avis de whistleblower

original_en_text: This mindless bug seems to sense only through its tendrils, yet despite that simplicity it still poses a serious threat.
original_zh_text: 虽只能凭借触须感知外界，这种虫子仍可以构成极大的威胁。
translated_text: Despite its simplicity, this brainless insect appears to be only perceptible by its curly beard, but it is a serious threat.
secondary_translated_text: Malgré sa simplicité, cet insecte sans cerveau ne semble être perceptible que par sa barbe bouclée, mais il constitue une menace sérieuse.

translated_text: Acunid
secondary_translated_text: Acid

translated_text: Skeleton Savage
secondary_translated_text: Skeleton sauvage

original_en_text: Basic bug of Pharloom, laid low upon the ground.
translated_text: The basic insects of the fallout live on the ground.
secondary_translated_text: Les insectes de base des retombées vivent sur le sol.

original_en_text: I am fond of simple, effective traps such as this bug’s extendable spikes. An unwary predator would be skewered clean through.
original_zh_text: 我很欣赏它这一招，简单有效。莽撞的捕食者肯定会被它的背刺一击穿透。
translated_text: I like simple and effective traps like this wrong expandable spike. Unintentional predators are stung.
secondary_translated_text: J'aime les pièges simples et efficaces comme ce faux point extensible. Les prédateurs involontaires sont piqûres.

original_en_text: Short pilgrim that uses their long horn to launch upon threats.
original_zh_text: 用长角将自己弹射向敌人的矮小朝圣者。
translated_text: The short pilgrim threatened with a long horn.
secondary_translated_text: Le petit pèlerin menaçait avec une longue corne.

original_en_text: Thick-set bug consumed by haunted thread. Uses their solid frame to crush others.
original_zh_text: 被诅咒之丝缠裹的壮硕老者，用沉重甲壳碾压敌人。
translated_text: Thick set errors consumed by horned threads. Crush others with your strong body.
secondary_translated_text: Les erreurs d'ensemble épais consommées par les threads cornés.Écrasez les autres avec votre corps fort.

original_en_text: Fur covered crawler with a series of sharp spikes along its back.
translated_text: This fur-covered reptile has sharp spines on its back.
secondary_translated_text: Ce reptile recouvert de fourrure a des épines aiguës sur son dos.

original_en_text: Burrowing worm that uses its many blunted teeth to dig through even the hardest bone.
original_zh_text: 拥有密集钝齿的穴居虫类，极其坚硬的骨质层也能被它们钻透。
translated_text: The hoodworm has many blunt teeth, which can penetrate even the hardest bones.
secondary_translated_text: Le ver à tête a de nombreuses dents contondantes, qui peuvent pénétrer même les os les plus durs.

original_en_text: With this one vanquished, I hope to have sped the end for that jail and its distasteful order.
original_zh_text: 击败她或将加速那座监狱与其恶心秩序的终结。
translated_text: With this defeat, I hope to hasten the end of the prison and its abominable order.
secondary_translated_text: Avec cette défaite, j'espère hâter la fin de la prison et de son ordre abominable.

original_en_text: Gelatinous coral drifter of simple mind and placid demeanour.
original_zh_text: 思维简单的凝胶状珊瑚生物，性情温和。
translated_text: Gum Coral has a simple and calm expression.
secondary_translated_text: Gum Coral a une expression simple et calme.

original_en_text: Totem and god, built and worshipped by the Burning Bugs.
original_zh_text: 焚身信徒建造并敬奉的图腾神像。
translated_text: It is built and worshipped by totems and gods, and by burning worms.
secondary_translated_text: Il est construit et adoré par des totems et des dieux, et par des vers brûlés.

translated_text: Driznitte
secondary_translated_text: Driznitte

original_en_text: Skittish scrambler of the Far Fields. Its antennae resemble stalks of grass to aid in camouflage.
original_zh_text: 远野地区极易受惊的爬虫，触须能够伪装成草茎。
translated_text: In the distance there was a sly destroyer. The tentacles resemble the stalks of grass, helping camouflage.
secondary_translated_text: Au loin, il y avait un destroyer sournois. Les tentacules ressemblent aux tiges d'herbe, aidant à camoufler.

original_en_text: Infant fly, freshly hatched. At this age the soft, blind fly is little more than a bother.
original_zh_text: 刚破卵的盲眼软体幼蝇，不过是些烦扰的小东西。
translated_text: A young fly just hatched. At this age, soft and blind flies are simply annoying.
secondary_translated_text: Une jeune mouche vient de s'éclore.À cet âge, les mouches molles et aveugles sont tout simplement ennuyeuses.

translated_text: Tombo
secondary_translated_text: tombo

original_en_text: Tall creature with sharp senses. Defends its herd with powerful legs and a sharp-tipped mask.
original_zh_text: 感官敏锐的生物，以尖角面甲与强健后肢守护族群。
translated_text: A tall, sexy creature. Protect the cattle with strong legs and a sharp mask.
secondary_translated_text: Une grande créature sexy. Protégez le bétail avec des jambes solides et un masque tranchant.

translated_text: The Evil Kalanic.
secondary_translated_text: Le méchant kalanique.

original_en_text: Cruel physician of Whiteward, responsible for operations and modifications on the Citadel’s bugs.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅的残酷医者，负责对圣堡甲虫实施手术与改造。
translated_text: Whiteward, a cruel doctor, was responsible for the operation and modification of the castle worm.
secondary_translated_text: Whiteward, un médecin cruel, était responsable de l'opération et de la modification du ver du château.

original_en_text: The huge Judge likely stood through countless generations, never defeated, never wavering in their charge.
original_zh_text: 这庞然裁决者已矗立无数世代，未尝败绩，坚守职责从未动摇。
translated_text: This great judge, perhaps through innumerable generations, was never defeated, and never wavered in his office.
secondary_translated_text: Ce grand juge, peut - être à travers d'innombrables générations, n'a jamais été vaincu, et n'a jamais hésité dans son office.

original_en_text: These bugs look to have spent every waking moment at their work. Grim, endless labour in service of the unseen Citadel above.
original_zh_text: 这些虫子似乎将全部生命投入劳作。为自己从未见过的圣堡执行着阴郁无边的苦役。
translated_text: The insects seem to be constantly awake. Cruel and endless labour to serve the invisible castle above.
secondary_translated_text: Les insectes semblent être constamment éveillés. Travail cruel et sans fin pour servir le château invisible d'en haut.

translated_text: Timillet
secondary_translated_text: timillet

translated_text: Esper
secondary_translated_text: Esper.

translated_text: Persian
secondary_translated_text: Persais

original_en_text: Despite the Haunting of its shell, it has not been overcome with aggression. Its desire to flee remains too strong.
original_zh_text: 即使甲壳被丝咒侵蚀，其强烈的逃生本能依然压制住了被赋予的攻击性。
translated_text: Despite its impressive shell, it was not conquered by the invasion. The desire to run was too strong.
secondary_translated_text: Malgré sa coquille impressionnante, elle n'a pas été conquise par l'invasion. Le désir de courir était trop fort.

original_en_text: Coral hulk with a dense shell, bred to immense size by the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 被圣堡忆廊催生至庞然体型的珊瑚厚甲虫。
translated_text: The remains of the shell-covered coral were raised into huge corals at the Castle Memorial.
secondary_translated_text: Les restes du corail recouvert de coquille ont été élevés dans d'énormes coraux au mémorial du château.

translated_text: Calanide
secondary_translated_text: Le Calanide

translated_text: Skull Tracker
secondary_translated_text: Le Skull Tracker

translated_text: The Pilgrim's Bell
secondary_translated_text: La cloche du pèlerin

original_en_text: Sturdy bug lost to the Haunting. Rolls at threats with no care for its own discomfort.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的健壮虫子。滚动碾压构成威胁的一切，无视自身痛楚。
translated_text: The strong mistakes lost to the ghostly mistakes. When faced with a threat, don't worry about discomfort.
secondary_translated_text: Les erreurs fortes ont perdu face aux erreurs fantômes. Lorsque vous faites face à une menace, ne vous inquiétez pas de l'inconfort.

original_en_text: Tiny empty creature, barely a bug. Swallows its prey whole and sucks their nutrients until nothing remains.
original_zh_text: 微型的虚无生物，几乎算不上是虫子。吞噬猎物至渣滓都不剩。
translated_text: This tiny hollow creature is hardly a worm. They swallow their prey whole and absorb nutrients until nothing is left.
secondary_translated_text: Cette petite créature creuse n'est guère un ver. Ils avalent leur proie entière et absorbent les nutriments jusqu'à ce qu ' il ne reste plus rien.

translated_text: Low-education workers
secondary_translated_text: Travailleurs basse éducation

original_en_text: Quite a beautiful creature. In my own kingdom’s court, it would have been highly favoured as an ornamental pet.
original_zh_text: 如此美丽的生物。若在我故国的宫廷，定会成为贵族追捧的装饰性宠物。
translated_text: It is a pretty beautiful creature. In the courts of my kingdom, they will be very popular as ornamental pets.
secondary_translated_text: C'est une très belle créature. Dans les cours de mon royaume, ils seront très populaires comme animaux de compagnie ornementaux.

original_en_text: There is surprising strength hidden in their thin, elegant limbs. It would be a pleasure to ride upon it...
original_zh_text: 优雅纤细的后肢中蕴含强大的力量，若能驯服必是绝佳坐骑。
translated_text: His slender, elegant limbs and legs hold incredible power. I was glad to ride.
secondary_translated_text: Ses membres et jambes minces et élégants détiennent une puissance incroyable. J'étais content de rouler.

original_en_text: Whatever admiration I had for its fleecy down is spoilt by its disturbing mask... and its steely spines.
original_zh_text: 蓬松绒毛的吸引力被其阴森气质与钢刺彻底破坏。
translated_text: My admiration for its feather-like feathers was destroyed by its disturbing mask and its steel spine.
secondary_translated_text: Mon admiration pour ses plumes semblables à des plumes a été détruite par son masque dérangeant et sa colonne vertébrale en acier.

translated_text: The Burning Bugs
secondary_translated_text: Les Burning Bugs

original_en_text: Cymbal bearing worker of the Deep Docks. Pans the hauls of smokerock to find traces of more precious minerals.
original_zh_text: 深坞持钹工人，筛选烟岩中的珍贵矿物残渣。
translated_text: The Deep Dock's Symbal Craftsman. Shake the smoky rock harvest to look for traces of more valuable minerals.
secondary_translated_text: L'artisan symbal de The Deep Dock. Agiter la récolte de roches fumées pour rechercher des traces de minéraux plus précieux.

original_en_text: Sticky mollusc that defends itself by spraying burning fluid from growths on its back.
