original_zh_text: 通过背部凸起喷射燃烧体液的防御型软体生物。
translated_text: Viscous molluscs defend themselves by jetting burning liquid from their backs.
secondary_translated_text: Les mollusques visqueux se défendent en jetant du liquide brûlant de leur dos.

original_en_text: This one is pretty, but not as soft as first it seems. The plant it mimics is flaked and coarse, and the bug’s coat shares similar texture.
original_zh_text: 看似柔美实则粗粝，与其拟态植物的质感完全一致。
translated_text: It's beautiful, but not as soft as it looks at first. Plants are coarse, and insect fur has a similar texture.
secondary_translated_text: C'est beau, mais pas aussi doux qu 'il paraît au début. Les plantes sont grossières, et la fourrure d'insecte a une texture similaire.

original_en_text: Low level worker lost to Pharloom’s Haunting. Instinct keeps them at their task, though in much simpler fashion than before.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的低级劳工，仍凭本能重复着旧日工作。
translated_text: The worker died of the nuisance of Faroe. By instinct, they complete the task, albeit in a much easier way than before.
secondary_translated_text: L'ouvrier est mort de la nuisance de Faroe. Par instinct, ils accomplissent la tâche, bien que d'une manière beaucoup plus facile qu ' avant.

original_en_text: Something in their assault reminds me of my own skill, though their talents are born purely of instinct. My technique is formed from hard training.
original_zh_text: 攻击套路和我有几分相像。不过他们靠的是祖传本能，我则是勤学苦练。
translated_text: Their attack reminded me of my own skills, but their talent was purely instinctive. My skills have been developed through rigorous training.
secondary_translated_text: Leur attaque me rappelait mes propres compétences, mais leur talent était purement instinctif. Mes compétences ont été développées par une formation rigoureuse.

original_en_text: Certain tools and skills can pierce its defences. I should adjust my strategy as needed.
original_zh_text: 正面硬撼绝非明智之举——只有特定的工具和技艺能撕开它的防御。
translated_text: Certain tools and skills can be used to break through defenses. The strategy needs to be adjusted as necessary.
secondary_translated_text: Certains outils et compétences peuvent être utilisés pour percer les défenses. La stratégie doit être ajustée au besoin.

translated_text: Silk grandmother.
secondary_translated_text: grand-mère Silk.

translated_text: Chef's Ruggory
secondary_translated_text: Ruggory du Chef

original_en_text: Bug charged to catch dregs of Silk that fall from the Citadel. Will attack with its staff if provoked.
original_zh_text: 专职收集圣堡掉落灵丝碎屑的劳工，受干扰时会挥杖攻击。
translated_text: The bagger was tasked with catching the silk remnants falling from the castle. When angry, they attack with a stick.
secondary_translated_text: Le sacseur a été chargé de ramasser les restes de soie tombant du château. Quand ils sont en colère, ils attaquent avec un bâton

original_en_text: Similar bugs would gnaw away at unguarded food supplies in my homeland. As a child, I would hunt them, eager to make use of myself and test my skills.
original_zh_text: 我的故土也有类似的飞虫，它们会啃食未加看守的食物补给。年少时我经常猎杀它们，既为守护食物也为试炼技艺。
translated_text: These insects can erode the defenseless food supply. When I was a kid, I wanted to chase them, to live for myself, to test my skills.
secondary_translated_text: Ces insectes peuvent éroder l'approvisionnement en nourriture sans défense. Quand j'étais enfant, je voulais les poursuivre, vivre pour moi-même, tester mes compétences.

original_en_text: Automaton built in the shape of a scuttling bug. Its back contains retractable pins, intended to cut song cylinders free of any obstruction.
original_zh_text: 仿造爬虫外形的自动机，背部探针可切除阻塞音筒的障碍物。
translated_text: This robot is shaped like a gliding insect. The back is fitted with a retractable pin, which is designed to cut the curved tube without obstruction.
secondary_translated_text: Ce robot a la forme d'un insecte glisseur. L'arrière est équipé d'une broche rétractable, qui est conçue pour couper le tube courbé sans obstruction.

translated_text: The Gantz Open
secondary_translated_text: Le Gantz Open

original_en_text: Uses their steel-bristled pin to scrub the soot from vents and pipes.
original_zh_text: 以钢鬃尖刺清理管道煤灰的劳工。
translated_text: Use a steel hairpin to wipe the dust in the vents and pipes.
secondary_translated_text: Utilisez une épingle à cheveux en acier pour essuyer la poussière dans les évents et les tuyaux.

original_en_text: Huge, yet stealthy Skarr. An expert trapper and master of the undergrowth.
original_zh_text: 精通丛林陷阱的斯卡尔猎手，身形庞大却又善于潜行。
translated_text: A huge but hidden skeleton. Trap experts, masters of the jungle.
secondary_translated_text: Un squelette massif mais caché. Des experts en pièges, des maîtres de la jungle.

original_en_text: Lashing fragments of pure darkness, shaped into sharpened tentacles.
original_zh_text: 由纯粹黑暗凝聚而成的尖锐触手。
translated_text: Whip sharp pieces of pure darkness to form tentacles.
secondary_translated_text: Frapper des morceaux tranchants de l'obscurité pure pour former des tentacules.

translated_text: The farm
secondary_translated_text: La ferme

translated_text: Gear Dancer
secondary_translated_text: Danseur Gear

original_en_text: Soft bug beneath a huge, horned skull. Charges at intruders to protect its territory and its smaller companions.
original_zh_text: 顶着怪兽头骨的软体虫，为保护地盘和自身柔软的内部，常对入侵者进行无差别冲锋。
translated_text: Below the skull is a large, long-horned softworm. The invaders were accused of defending their territory and their small companions.
secondary_translated_text: En dessous du crâne se trouve un gros vers mou à longues cornes. Les envahisseurs étaient accusés de défendre leur territoire et leurs petits compagnons.

original_en_text: Common winged bug of the lowlands. Generally docile, but will attack if threats come close.
original_zh_text: 低地区域常见的温顺飞虫，不过被惹急了也会攻击来犯者。
translated_text: A winged insect commonly found in lowland areas. They are usually calm, but when a threat approaches, they attack.
secondary_translated_text: Insecte ailé communément trouvé dans les zones de basses terres. Ils sont généralement calmes, mais quand une menace s'approche, ils attaquent.

original_en_text: Foul creatures birthed into servitude. Their plight elicits no sympathy from me.
original_zh_text: 这些可悲的生物从蛹中钻出的瞬间，就被烙上了终生奴役的印记——但它们啃噬死囚腐肉时发出的欢快嗡鸣，实在让人难以怜悯。
translated_text: The filthy creature was born a slave. Their plight does not arouse my sympathy.
secondary_translated_text: La créature impure est née esclave. Leur situation n'excite pas ma sympathie.

original_en_text: The Haunting has stolen some important part of these bugs, yet still they attempt their former task. Until, that is, they sense my presence...
original_zh_text: 它们机械地重复着筛矿动作，直到感应到活物气息——那一刻，铜钹便化作呼啸的断头刃。
translated_text: Haunted stole a significant portion of these mistakes, but still tried earlier missions. Until you feel my presence...
secondary_translated_text: Haunted a volé une partie importante de ces erreurs, mais a tout de même essayé des missions antérieures. Jusqu'à ce que tu ressentis ma présence...

translated_text: scattered.
secondary_translated_text: dispersion.

translated_text: Yuma.
secondary_translated_text: Yuma !

original_en_text: Mutated young worm infected with Plasmium. The new form displays potent regenerative skill.
original_zh_text: 受生质液感染而变异的蠕虫幼体。其新形态展现出强大的再生能力。
translated_text: A mutant larva infected with the malaria parasite. It shows new regenerative skills.
secondary_translated_text: Une larve mutante infectée par le parasite du paludisme. Il développe de nouvelles capacités régénératives.

translated_text: Mother Jericho
secondary_translated_text: Mère Jéricho

original_en_text: Its core is filled with fine mechanisms, but that alone should not produce such a convincing mimic of life. Silk must also be used to animate this artifice, though exactly how I am not sure.
original_zh_text: 当灵丝顺着齿轮缝隙游走时，这台机器竟发出类似心跳的震颤——圣堡匠人究竟将多少生命奥秘编织进了这些钢铁躯壳？
translated_text: Its core is packed with intricate mechanisms, but that alone doesn't make for such a compelling simulator of life. We need to use silk to activate technology, but we don't know how to use it.
secondary_translated_text: Son noyau est rempli de mécanismes complexes, mais cela ne fait pas à lui seul un simulateur de vie si convaincant. Nous devons utiliser la soie pour activer la technologie, mais nous ne savons pas comment l'utiliser.

original_en_text: Its shell gives it the advantage of surprise, but also forces it into a slender, brittle shape that cannot withstand a heavy attack.
original_zh_text: 拟态外壳带来突袭优势，但纤细脆弱的体型难以承受重击。
translated_text: Its shell gives it unexpected advantages, but at the same time, it gives it an elongated, fragile shape that cannot withstand intense attacks.
secondary_translated_text: Sa coquille lui confère des avantages inattendus, mais en même temps, elle lui confère une forme allongée et fragile qui ne peut pas résister à des attaques intenses.

original_en_text: Predatory plant with a powerful jaw shaped to resemble a lily pad.
original_zh_text: 伪装成睡莲的捕食性植物，拥有强有力的颚部。
translated_text: A predatory plant with a hard, lily-shaped jaw.
secondary_translated_text: Une plante prédatrice avec une mâchoire dure et en forme de lys.

translated_text: Smoke curtain
secondary_translated_text: Rideau de fumée

translated_text: Coilmeiga
secondary_translated_text: Coilmeiga

original_en_text: Airborne pest, less common than its grounded siblings. Attacks with sharp fangs if agitated.
original_zh_text: 其陆行同类的飞行变种，较为稀少。受到刺激时会使用利齿攻击。
translated_text: Pests in the air are less common than similar pests on the ground. When excited, they attack with their sharp teeth.
secondary_translated_text: Les nuisibles dans l'air sont moins fréquentes que les nuisibles similaires sur le sol. Lorsqu ' ils sont excités, ils attaquent avec leurs dents pointues.

original_en_text: The souls of so many bugs, obsessed with Silk, consumed by it. Their pain shall forever remain in that pit. Even I do not possess strength enough to cleanse it.
original_zh_text: 无数沉溺灵丝终被吞噬的灵魂，其苦痛将永远禁锢在这坑里。纵使是我也无力净化。
translated_text: The soul of many insects will be possessed by the silk, swallowed up by it, and its suffering will remain in its hole forever. I don't have the power to purify either.
secondary_translated_text: L'âme de beaucoup d'insectes sera possédée par la soie, engloutie par elle, et sa souffrance restera dans son trou pour toujours. Je n'ai pas non plus le pouvoir de purifier.

original_en_text: Silk-spun child possessed by the void.
original_zh_text: 被虚空侵蚀的灵丝造物。
translated_text: A rotor possessed by a vacuum.
secondary_translated_text: Un rotor possédé par un vide.

original_en_text: Shell-plated worm found only in the deepest depths. Seems to survive despite consuming no food or liquid.
original_zh_text: 仅存于最深处的甲壳蠕虫，无需进食或饮水仍能存活。
translated_text: Worms with shells can only be seen in the deepest parts. He did not eat food or fluid, but he appeared to have survived.
secondary_translated_text: Les vers avec des coquilles ne peuvent être vus que dans les parties les plus profondes. Il n'a pas mangé de nourriture ni de liquide, mais il semble avoir survécu.

translated_text: Cholista
secondary_translated_text: Choliste

translated_text: Scroll reader
secondary_translated_text: Scroll lecteur

original_en_text: Trap setting bug carrying a pouch of sharpened long-stakes.
original_zh_text: 携带尖锐长木桩布置陷阱的虫子。
translated_text: The worm that had set the trap was carrying a long, sharp pile bag.
secondary_translated_text: Le ver qui avait placé le piège portait un long sac de pile tranchant.

translated_text: Doran Rode
secondary_translated_text: par Doran Rode

original_en_text: Aged female mite, grown larger and stronger than most of its kin.
original_zh_text: 年迈的雌性螨虫，体型力量都远超同类。
translated_text: Older females are bigger and stronger than other species.
secondary_translated_text: Les femelles plus âgées sont plus grosses et plus fortes que les autres espèces.

original_en_text: Mass of old masks swollen and animated by writhing void.
original_zh_text: 由纠缠的虚空驱动而膨胀、复活的一团古老面甲。
translated_text: A large amount of old masks are activated by the crevices that creep and swell.
secondary_translated_text: Une grande quantité de vieux masques sont activés par les crevasses qui rampent et gonflent.

original_en_text: Pernicious looter found all over Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在纺络全境四处劫掠的卑劣盗虫。
translated_text: Faro is full of vicious robberies.
secondary_translated_text: Faro est pleine de vols vicieux.

original_en_text: Small bug, shackled and cowled for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 戴着镣铐，被蒙住头部的圣堡罪徒。
translated_text: Bug was shackled and turbaned for the crimes he committed in the castle.
secondary_translated_text: Bug a été menotté et turbané pour les crimes qu ' il a commis dans le château.

original_en_text: Flighty insect that lives beside still waters.
original_zh_text: 栖息静水边的敏感飞虫。
translated_text: A lightweight insect that lives by the quiet water.
secondary_translated_text: Un insecte léger qui vit près de l'eau calme.

original_en_text: Its form is certainly based on bugs found outside the Citadel. In my own craftwork, I too often look to nature for inspiration.
original_zh_text: 那对仿生复眼能精准识别音筒纹路，探针起舞时溅起的火花，竟在钢壁上刻出类似灵丝符文的痕迹。
translated_text: Its shape is of course based on errors found outside the castle. In my own work, I often draw inspiration from nature.
secondary_translated_text: Sa forme est bien sûr basée sur des erreurs trouvées à l'extérieur du château. Dans mon travail, je tire souvent de la nature.

translated_text: Kramet
secondary_translated_text: par Kramet

original_en_text: Birth equipped this one well. In its assault it becomes its own projectile.
original_zh_text: 它们生来就是活体投掷物——将整个身躯化作飞矛，用长角贯穿目标。
translated_text: The birth arms this person. In an attack, it becomes a projection of itself.
secondary_translated_text: La naissance armera cette personne. Dans une attaque, elle devient une projection d'elle-même.

original_en_text: Their heavier bells armour them well against my strikes, but against that oppressive heat... can they help at all?
original_zh_text: 它们厚重的钟甲可以抵挡我的针刃，但在酷热环境中恐怕难有作为。
translated_text: Their heavy bells will protect them well from my blows, but they will also protect them from the steamy hot weather. will you help me?
secondary_translated_text: Leurs lourdes cloches les protégeront bien de mes coups, mais elles les protégeront aussi du temps chaud et vapeur. Voulez-vous m'aider ?

original_en_text: A rare built bug within these ailing lands. Most pilgrims’ shells seem small by comparison. What nourishment did they discover to grow so large?
original_zh_text: 在纺络这片病恹恹的土地上，这般体型的虫子实属罕见。与它们相比，其他朝圣者的外壳简直孱弱如卵。它们究竟吞食了什么，才能膨胀至此等体型？
translated_text: These are unusual insects in the land of disease. In contrast, the shells of most pilgrims seem small. What nutrients are so large?
secondary_translated_text: Ce sont des insectes inhabituels dans le pays des maladies. En revanche, les coquilles de la plupart des pèlerins semblent petites. Quels nutriments sont-ils si importants ?

original_en_text: With a softer shell than most, they would have relied on their athleticism to survive.
original_zh_text: 甲壳柔软脆弱，全靠昔日矫健的身手生存。
translated_text: Their shells are softer than most humans, so they survive on their athletic ability alone.
secondary_translated_text: Leurs coquilles sont plus douces que la plupart des humains, de sorte qu ' ils survivent uniquement sur leurs capacités athlétiques.

translated_text: Cockroach catcher
secondary_translated_text: Le Cockroach Catcher

original_en_text: Common crawler that lives beneath sand.
translated_text: A reptile that lives under the sand.
secondary_translated_text: Un reptile qui vit sous le sable.

translated_text: Finch beetle
secondary_translated_text: Le Finch Beetle

translated_text: Schelfin
secondary_translated_text: Schelfin

translated_text: Animal flies
secondary_translated_text: Animaux mouches

original_en_text: Silk and shells corrupted. That void seeks now to claim this land whole. These poor shells are only the beginning.
original_zh_text: 灵丝与甲壳皆遭腐蚀，虚空正逐步蚕食这地界，这些可怜的甲壳不过是开端。
translated_text: The silk and shell were corrosive. Now they are trying to take over this land. These poor shells are only the beginning.
secondary_translated_text: La soie et la coquille étaient corrosives. Maintenant, ils tentent de s'emparer de cette terre. Ces pauvres coquilles ne sont que le début.

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger that roosts high in caverns and preys on passing pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 盘踞洞顶的食腐飞虫，惯用群体战术袭击朝圣者。
translated_text: Screaming scavengers inhabit the caves and prey on passing pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: Les scavonniers criants habitent les grottes et proies sur les pèlerins qui passent.

original_en_text: Insect formed to imitate a branch, capable of remaining perfectly still for long periods, but unexpectedly swift when roused.
original_zh_text: 能长期静止拟态成树枝，受惊时发动闪电突袭。
translated_text: Insects mimicking tree branches are completely stationary for a long time, but they can wake up surprisingly quickly.
secondary_translated_text: Les insectes qui imitent les branches d'arbres sont complètement stationnaires pendant longtemps, mais ils peuvent se réveiller étonnamment rapidement.

original_en_text: This larger form carries so much weight it can barely move from its place.
original_zh_text: 庞大身躯使其几乎无法离开原位。
translated_text: This large shape is so heavy that it can hardly be removed from its position.
secondary_translated_text: Cette grande forme est si lourde qu ' elle peut à peine être retirée de sa position.

translated_text: Skrill
secondary_translated_text: par Skrill

original_en_text: Small construct built by Weavers past, brought to life through Silk runes threaded within.
original_zh_text: 远古织者铸造的小型装置，通过灵丝符文赋予生命。
translated_text: The small structures of Weaver's past are brought to life by the silk loons they wear inside.
secondary_translated_text: Les petites structures du passé de Weaver sont animées par les lounges en soie qu 'elles portent à l'intérieur.

original_en_text: The less these gruesome bugs breed, the better.
original_zh_text: 这种烦扰的虫子繁殖得越少越好。
translated_text: The fewer these dreadful insects breed the better.
secondary_translated_text: Moins ces insectes redoutables se reproduisent, mieux c'est.

original_en_text: Gilded servant of the Whispering Vaults, born to read and recall the near endless scrolls of prayer.
original_zh_text: 低语书库的金袍仆从，专司诵读那些浩繁无尽的经文。
translated_text: The golden servants whispering in the vault were born to read and remember the scrolls of infinite prayers.
secondary_translated_text: Les serviteurs d'or qui chuchotaient dans la voûte étaient nés pour lire et se souvenir des rouleaux de prières infinies.

translated_text: Squarebird
secondary_translated_text: Le Squarebird

original_en_text: I cannot decipher its function to the greater Core. Is it built for defence? If so, its passivity seems far from optimal.
original_zh_text: 这些悬浮铁球会在入侵者靠近时突然爆开尖刺，但过于迟缓的反应速度，让它们更像布满锈迹的装饰品。
translated_text: Couldn't decipher the impact on the larger core was it made for defense? If so, that passivity seems far from optimal.
secondary_translated_text: Impossible de déchiffrer l'impact sur le plus grand noyau était-il fait pour la défense ? Si tel est le cas, cette passivité semble loin d'être optimale.

original_en_text: If not for the spikes, I would think it an appealing bug.
original_zh_text: 若没有尖刺，我会觉得它笨拙可爱。
translated_text: If not for Pinpoint, I think it's an attractive mistake.
secondary_translated_text: Si ce n'est pas pour Pinpoint, je pense que c'est une erreur attrayante.

original_en_text: Hovering pest with a hollowed proboscis able to spit gobs of sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 通过中空口器喷射胆汁的悬浮虫。
translated_text: The pests that swarm on the hollow trunk can spit out bile.
secondary_translated_text: Les ravageurs qui swarment sur le tronc creux peuvent cracher de la bile.

original_en_text: This surface dweller is free of Silk. Its nature remains its own. The monarch’s influence must only have stretched below it.
original_zh_text: 这地表生物未被丝咒侵蚀，看来圣堡君主的控制尚未延伸至此。
translated_text: Such surface inhabitants have no silk. Its essence is still of its own. The monarch's influence is only below it.
secondary_translated_text: De tels habitants de surface n'ont pas de soie. Son essence est encore la sienne. L'influence du monarque n'est que inférieure à elle.

original_en_text: Did they ever truly understand those inscrutable scrolls? Or is it all merely pretence, an endless act to maintain their order’s station within the Citadel?
original_zh_text: 他们是否真的理解那些晦涩的经文？还是说，这一切不过是伪装，一场无休止的表演，只为维持他们在城堡中的地位？
translated_text: do they really know this mystery? Or is it pretending to be an endless show to maintain the order and status of the castle?
secondary_translated_text: Connaissent-ils réellement ce mystère ? Ou est-ce qu ' il prétend être un spectacle sans fin pour maintenir l'ordre et le statut du château ?

translated_text: Coral House The Coral House
secondary_translated_text: Coral House, la maison de corail

original_en_text: Its assault... like a young bug’s toy turned deadly. Could I, in time, fashion a spinning tool to match?
original_zh_text: 其攻击如同将孩童的玩具变成致命武器，或许我能制作类似原理的纺织工具？
translated_text: They are attacking. It's like a little toy bug that becomes deadly. Can the rotary tool be made in time?
secondary_translated_text: Ils attaquent. C'est comme un petit bug jouet qui devient mortel. L'outil rotatif peut-il être fabriqué dans le temps ?

original_en_text: Though grey with age, their frayed form suggested a being strung from Silk, one who welcomed a decisive end in combat over a slow decline.
original_zh_text: 苍老的躯壳布满灵丝束痕。比起缓慢凋零，它更渴求战死的终局。
translated_text: His appearance, which has been torn apart as he grows older, is a man made of silk, facing the decisive end of a slowly fading battle.
secondary_translated_text: Son apparence, qui a été déchirée à mesure qu ' il vieillit, est un homme fait de soie, face à la fin décisive d'une bataille qui s'est lentement évanouie.

translated_text: A huge fleas.
secondary_translated_text: d'énormes puces.

original_en_text: Infant form of the more formidable Craggler.
original_zh_text: 酸蚀巨螯的幼年形态，通过同类相残争夺成长机会。
translated_text: A more powerful baby form of krugler.
secondary_translated_text: Une forme bébé plus puissante de Krugler.

original_en_text: Either its size has made it fearless or the Haunting has removed its sense of self-preservation.
original_zh_text: 要么是巨大的体型给了它勇气，要么是丝咒把它怕死的本性麻痹了。
translated_text: Either its size makes you fearful, or the attachment eliminates the sense of self-preservation.
secondary_translated_text: Soit sa taille vous rend craintif, soit l'attachement élimine le sens de la préservation de soi.

original_en_text: Barely a bug, and possessing only basic thought, yet instinct alone proved enough to turn it deadly.
original_zh_text: 几乎算不上虫子，只有最基本的思维。然而，其攻击的本能已足够致命。
translated_text: This was hardly a mistake, a basic idea, but I found that instinct alone could be fatal.
secondary_translated_text: Ce n'était guère une erreur, une idée fondamentale, mais j'ai découvert que l'instinct seul pouvait être fatal.

translated_text: Gear spine
secondary_translated_text: Gears Spine

original_en_text: Bursts forth at movement sensed close, and will consume any object or bug careless enough to fall into its maw.
original_zh_text: 当流沙开始诡谲涌动时，你只剩半次心跳的时间逃离那张深渊巨口。
translated_text: When it senses nearby movement, it explodes, accidentally eating objects or insects and falling into its stomach.
secondary_translated_text: Lorsqu ' il sent un mouvement à proximité, il explose, mange accidentellement des objets ou des insectes et tombe dans son estomac.

original_en_text: Pointed scurrier posing as plant life.
original_zh_text: 伪装成植物的带刺疾行者。
translated_text: Spiders mimic plants.
secondary_translated_text: Les araignées imitent les plantes.

original_en_text: Verminous pest, common throughout the dark corners of Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 灰沼阴暗角落滋生的害虫。
translated_text: The pests are often found in dark corners of Graymore.
secondary_translated_text: Les ravageurs se trouvent souvent dans les coins sombres de Graymore.

original_en_text: Its fur is thick and silky. Sadly, lost to its Haunting, I shall never safely be able to touch it.
original_zh_text: 厚实丝绒般的皮毛令人神往，可惜其受丝咒侵蚀，再难安全抚触。
translated_text: The fur is thick and like silk. Sadly, I can't touch it, so it's never safe.
secondary_translated_text: La fourrure est épaisse et comme de la soie. Malheureusement, je ne peux pas le toucher, donc il n'est jamais sûr.

translated_text: Hawk Hooker
secondary_translated_text: Le Hawk Hooker

translated_text: mooring wing
secondary_translated_text: Mooring Wing

original_en_text: Her body seemed a Weaver’s, but her mask had been forcibly removed, and her own Silk was bound useless by heavy pins lodged through her spine.
original_zh_text: 她身形似织者，但面甲被强行剥离，脊背打入的重钉也使其灵丝失效。
translated_text: Her body looked like a weaver, but the mask was forcibly removed, and her own silk was tied up with a heavy pin inserted into the spine.
secondary_translated_text: Son corps ressemblait à un tisser, mais le masque a été retiré de force, et sa propre soie a été attachée avec une lourde épingle insérée dans la colonne vertébrale.

original_en_text: Fierce and fast, and defending their lands even from birth. These are children to be proud of.
original_zh_text: 凶猛迅捷，自出生起就守卫故土，是值得骄傲的后裔。
translated_text: He is stubborn and fast, and has defended his land since he was born. These are proud children.
secondary_translated_text: Il est tenace et rapide, et a défendu sa terre depuis sa naissance. Ce sont des enfants fiers.

original_en_text: Like fabric somehow sprung to life. Its pelt is perfectly matched to the rags it infests.
original_zh_text: 外色颜色与寄居的布料完美融合，就像被赋予生命的织物。
translated_text: It seems to be reproducing in some way. Its fur matches perfectly with the infected cloth.
secondary_translated_text: Il semble se reproduire d'une certaine façon. Sa fourrure correspond parfaitement au tissu infecté.

original_en_text: Its wings are quite small compared to its bulk. Perhaps it uses the warm air of these fiery lands to help stay airborne. Clever, if so.
original_zh_text: 翅膀小身体胖，估计是利用这片炽热地带的热气流飞起来的——还挺聪明。
translated_text: Compared to its size, the wings are rather small. Maybe it's clever to use the warm air of the hot land to stay in the air, if so.
secondary_translated_text: Comparé à sa taille, les ailes sont assez petites. Peut - être est-il intelligent d'utiliser l'air chaud de la terre chaude pour rester dans l'air, si oui.

original_en_text: Gold ranked disciple of the Choir and direct servant to the Citadel’s Conductors.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团的高阶信徒，圣堡指挥家的直系仆从。
translated_text: A golden disciple of the choir, a direct servant of the castle commander.
secondary_translated_text: Disciple d'or du chœur, serviteur direct du commandant du château.

original_en_text: The large bell seems to signify them as once leader of a climbing troupe, though the Haunting has erased that former authority.
original_zh_text: 那柄铭刻朝圣路线的钟杖曾是领袖象征，如今却成了敲碎追随者颅骨的凶器。
translated_text: The enormous bells seem to indicate that they were once leaders of a rock climbing group, but their obsession has erased their previous authority.
secondary_translated_text: Les énormes cloches semblent indiquer qu ' ils étaient autrefois les chefs d'un groupe d'escalade, mais leur obsession a effacé leur autorité antérieure.

original_en_text: Avoiding their ambush is a good test of my senses, and my ability to rapidly retaliate.
original_zh_text: 规避其伏击是对感知力的考验，快速反击能力同样关键。
translated_text: Avoiding their ambush was a good test of my senses and my ability to fight back quickly.
secondary_translated_text: Éviter leur embuscade a été un bon test de mes sens et de ma capacité à me battre rapidement.

original_en_text: To quell the mother’s rage, and see this kingdom saved, I will claim her back. This one... the dark shall not take.
original_zh_text: 为了平息苍白之母的暴怒、拯救这个王国，我必夺回这个孩子的本心——绝不容许虚空将她吞噬。
translated_text: To quell my mother's anger and save the kingdom, I will bring her back. This is a... The darkness does not leave.
secondary_translated_text: Pour apaiser la colère de ma mère et sauver le royaume, je la ramènerai. C'est un... L'obscurité ne part pas.

translated_text: Frigate fly
secondary_translated_text: Frégate Fly

translated_text: The Lost Race
secondary_translated_text: La course perdue

original_en_text: Cogwork knight of Pharloom, once protector of its pilgrims, and master of the scissor blade.
original_zh_text: 曾护卫朝圣者的机械骑士，如今双刃剪成为致命凶器。
translated_text: The armed knights of the Fal were the guardians of pilgrims and swordsmen.
secondary_translated_text: Les chevaliers armés du Fal étaient les gardiens des pèlerins et des épicers.

original_en_text: <page>No. Not their enemy, and their prisoner not through malice. I am Eva, a thing... difficult to describe, a child of Weavers, yet not quite their kin...<hpage>How strange. That description could fit me as well as yourself. <page>Child of Weavers?... And not? I can detect your Weaver strain, yet you are different from them, and from me, a shifting, blended thing? What are you creature?<page>Step closer, lady, that my senses would better understand your nature.
original_zh_text: <page>不是，也并非因为罪行囚禁。我叫伊娃，是……有点复杂，是织者后裔但又不完全是……<hpage>真奇妙。这番描述同样适用于我。<page>你也是织者后裔？……但又不是？我能感知你的织者血统，但你既不同于他们，也不同于我，一个流动的混合体？你究竟是什么？<page>请靠近些，女士，方便我感知你的本质。
translated_text: <page>They are not their enemies, nor their prisoners. First is Eva. It's hard to explain, Weaver's children, but not exactly their relatives.<hpage>that's weird. This explanation is perfect for you.<page>the weaver's kids? instead of? I can detect your Vega variants, but are you unlike them, unlike me, constantly changing and mixing? what kind of creature are you?<page>Come a little closer, and my senses will understand your essence better. "
secondary_translated_text: <page>Ils ne sont ni leurs ennemis, ni leurs prisonniers. Tout d'abord Eva. C'est difficile à expliquer, les enfants de Weaver, mais pas exactement leurs parents.<hpage>C'est bizarre. Cette explication est parfaite pour toi.<page>Les enfants du Weaver ? Au lieu de ? Je peux détecter vos variantes Vega, mais êtes-vous contrairement à eux, contrairement à moi, en constante évolution et mélange ? Quel genre de créature êtes-vous ?<page>Approchez-vous un peu, et mes sens comprendront mieux votre essence. "

original_en_text: Lady, still my senses resound. You seem so far beyond the bounds of a bug.<page>Permit me to gaze again upon your nature, that I may offer clarity.
original_zh_text: 女士，我的感知再度震颤。您已远远超过凡虫界限。<page>请允许我再次深入感知，才好仔细说明
translated_text: My feelings still resonate with me. You seem to be beyond your mistake.<page>Look at your nature once more, and I can give you a definite answer.
secondary_translated_text: Mes sentiments résonnent toujours avec moi. Vous semblez être au-delà de votre erreur.<page>Regardez votre nature une fois de plus, et je peux vous donner une réponse définitive.

original_en_text: Lady? So you live, still. This is good... I had felt the conflict commence, pale hearts ablaze, and the sudden well of darkness after.<hpage>I am sorry, Eva. I had hoped to slay the monarch, and was near achieving that goal, but the situation has become... complicated. Now, all of Pharloom threatens to fall.<page>But I can sense it in you, lady. You have not yielded to despair, so some hope must still remain?<hpage>...Slim hope, I suspect. But true, there may yet be a way through this disaster. I shall pursue that goal with whatever strength remains.<page>Then allow me to continue to aid you as I can... Mine might be a small contribution, but I shall provide it eagerly.
original_zh_text: 女士？你还活着，真是太好了……我早已感受到冲突的爆发，苍白之心熊熊燃烧，而后是突如其来的黑暗深渊。<hpage>抱歉，伊娃。我本希望斩杀君主，几乎就要达成目标，但情况变得……复杂了。如今整个纺络都濒临倾覆。<page>但我能从你身上感受到，女士。你仍未屈服于绝望，是否意味着尚存一线希望？<hpage>……希望渺茫。但确实，或许仍有办法化解这场灾难。我将用残存之力追寻这个目标。<page>那么请允许我继续尽力协助你……虽只是微薄之力，但我必倾心奉献。
translated_text: lady? That's why you're alive. Okay, okay. I felt the conflict begin, the pale heart burn, and suddenly the well of darkness begin.<hpage>i'm sorry, eva, i was hoping to kill the monarch, but the situation... Things are getting complicated and now the whole of Farham is in danger of collapse.<page>I can feel it from you, Madame. Is there hope, since we have not given in to despair?<hpage>... Maybe my hope is thin. However, in reality, there may be a way to overcome this disaster. I will do my best to achieve that goal.<page>I will continue to do my best to help you. My contribution may be small, but I will serve it with zeal.
secondary_translated_text: madame ? C'est pour ça que tu es vivant. Très bien, très bien. J'ai senti le conflit commencer, le cœur pâle brûler, et soudain le puits des ténèbres commence.<hpage>Je suis désolé Eva, j'espérais tuer le monarque, mais la situation... Les choses deviennent compliquées et maintenant l'ensemble de Farham est en danger de s'effondrer.<page>Je le sens de vous, madame. Y a-t - il de l'espoir, puisque nous n'avons pas abandonné le désespoir ?<hpage>... Peut - être que mon espoir est faible. Cependant, en réalité, il peut y avoir un moyen de surmonter ce désastre. Je vais faire de mon mieux pour atteindre cet objectif.<page>Je continuerai de faire de mon mieux pour vous aider. Ma contribution peut être faible, mais je la servirai avec zèle.

original_en_text: Incredible... Your nature is so unlike a mortal bug’s. Yours is malleable, transitory. It is a marvelous thing, worth my long life to behold.<page>With what power I possess, I may still be able to aid you further.
original_zh_text: 不可思议……你的本质异于凡虫。流动，嬗变，真是奇妙，是我前所未见的存在。<page>以我的力量，或许可以助你更上一层。
translated_text: It's incredible how... Your nature is quite different from the nature of a human worm. Yours is plastic and short. This is a great thing worth seeing in my long life.<page>If I had my strength, I might be able to help you more.
secondary_translated_text: C'est incroyable comment... Votre nature est très différente de la nature d'un ver humain. Le vôtre est plastique et court. C'est une chose qui vaut la peine de voir dans ma longue vie.<page>Si j'avais ma force, je pourrais peut - être être vous aider davantage.

original_en_text: <hpage>Eva, I am seeking a tool, told to be somewhere in this structure. It is a snare device of Weaver make. Do you know of it?<page>I may, lady. Search over from here, on side where the moss meets the nest. There, my mothers built their tools, all traps and bindings. Small things, but tests for larger forms.<page>I still remember their thoughts as they worked, their desperation, and their hunger. Another hopeless attempt to wrest their freedom. All ended in failure, of course.
original_zh_text: <hpage>伊娃，我在寻找织者制造的陷阱装置。你知道在哪么？<page>有点印象。您可以去青苔与巢穴交界处搜寻，母亲们曾在那制造工具。虽是些小玩意，却是为了更大的图谋。<page>我还记得她们制作时的思绪，那份绝望与饥渴，又一次争夺自由的徒劳尝试。当然，终归失败。
translated_text: <hpage>Eva, I'm looking for a tool that was told to be somewhere in this structure. this is a weaver trap, you know?<page>I can do it, ma 'am. Look here at the intersection of cockroaches and nests, where mothers have made tools and traps and constraints - small problems, but they are tested in large ways.<page>I still remember the thought of their work, the despair and the hunger. A futile attempt to take away their freedom. Of course, everything ends in failure.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Eva, je cherche un outil qui a été dit être quelque part dans cette structure. C'est un piège à tisser, vous savez ?<page>Je peux le faire, madame ! Regardez ici à l'intersection des cafards et des nids, où les mères ont fabriqué des outils, des pièges et des contraintes - de petits problèmes, mais ils sont testés de grandes manières.<page>Je me souviens encore de la pensée de leur travail, du désespoir et de la faim. Une futile tentative de leur enlever la liberté. Bien sûr, tout se termine par un échec.

original_en_text: Ain’t you come a long way, bellringer! Granting wishes, saving bugs, even rousing my sullen family to act!<page>The snare is set above, our power bound along its thread. To your sight it may seem a crude thing, but there’s fair strength to it... enough to quell a god.<hpage>You and your family have done me well, sir. I shall prove your faith in the meeting ahead.<page>Aye. Bring your best, bellringer. Call forth our great pale god. Cut her weak, then drive the beast down atop the snare.<page>Contact made will stir the snare alight, but only your needle’s song will awaken the spell in full. When that moment arrives, you’ll see it clear.
original_zh_text: 敲钟者，你这一路可够折腾！祈愿、救虫，连我那些沉默的同族都让你说动了！<page>陷阱已在上方布好，我们的力量都缠在丝线上。看着简陋，但威力足够……连神都能制住。<hpage>你们一族对我多次相助，我必将不负所托。<page>那就好，敲钟者，拿出真本事。把那苍白之神引出来，先削弱她，再逼到陷阱上方。<page>触碰陷阱就会激活丝线，但只有你的织针之乐能彻底唤醒术式。时机一到，你自然明白。
translated_text: You've come a long way, Bel Linger! Make your wishes come true, avoid mistakes, and wake up your unhappy family to take action!<page>The trap is upon it, and our power is bound to it. This may be rude to you, but it has considerable power. to defeat God.<hpage>You and your family have been very kind to me. We will show our confidence in the upcoming meetings.<page>Bring the best of you, Bel Linger. " Call upon the Great God. Weaken her power and drive the beast into the trap.<page>The trap fires upon touch, but only the song of the needle will fully awaken the spell. When that time comes, you will see it clearly.
secondary_translated_text: Tu as parcouru un long chemin, Bel Linger ! Réalisez vos souhaits, évitez les erreurs et réveillez votre famille malheureuse pour agir !<page>Le piège est sur elle, et notre pouvoir est lié à elle. Cela peut être grossier pour vous, mais il a une puissance considérable. Vaincre Dieu.<hpage>Vous et votre famille avez été très gentils avec moi. Nous montrerons notre confiance dans les prochaines réunions.<page>Apportez le meilleur de vous, Bel Linger.« Invoquez le grand Dieu. Faiblir son pouvoir et conduire la bête dans le piège.<page>Le piège se déclenche au toucher, mais seul le chant de l'aiguille réveillera pleinement le sort. Lorsque ce moment-là viendra, vous le verrez clairement.

original_en_text: <page>Lady, please. Permit me to look upon your nature, that I may offer clarity...
original_zh_text: <page>女士，请允许我深入感知，才好仔细说明……
translated_text: <page>Madam, please. Let me examine your nature so that I may clarify it.
secondary_translated_text: <page>Madame, s'il vous plaît. Permettez-moi d'examiner votre nature afin de la clarifier.

original_en_text: Incredible... Your nature is so unlike a mortal bug’s. Yours is malleable, transitory. It is a marvelous thing, worth my long life to behold.<page>If in your travels you are able to further evolve, return to me. With what power I possess, I may be able to aid you further.<hpage>Thank you, Eva. If my nature expands as you say, I shall return.
original_zh_text: 不可思议……你的本质异于凡虫。流动，嬗变，真是奇妙，是我前所未见的存在。<page>如果旅途中你再度进化，请回来找我。以我的力量，或许可以助你更上一层。<hpage>多谢，伊娃。若我本质确实再度进化，我会回来找你。
translated_text: It's incredible how... Your nature is completely different from human nature. Yours is plastic and short. This is a wonderful thing worth observing in my long life.<page>If you can make further progress in your journey, come back to me. With my strength, I can help you.<hpage>Thank you, Eva. If my nature expands, as you say, I will come back.
secondary_translated_text: C'est incroyable comment... Votre nature est totalement différente de la nature humaine. Le vôtre est plastique et court. C'est une chose merveilleuse qui mérite d'être observée dans ma longue vie.<page>Si vous pouvez progresser dans votre voyage, revenez à moi, avec ma force, je peux vous aider.<hpage>Merci à toi Eva. Si ma nature s'étend, comme vous le dites, je reviendrai.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have known your kind before, sir. Yours is a tribe that works and trades in power, and I am about to extinguish its prime source.<hpage>Once this is done, will you truly delight in a land so bereft?<page>Aye, well... My family’s marks are all over that trap. And we’ve spent a hard age avoiding the gaze of our god.<page>If we earned it now, after such open opposition... that’s a bleak conclusion none of us’d care for.<page>Now! My job’s done. S’time your grand business began! We’ll be wishin’ victory to you, bellringer, for all our sakes!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我曾见过你的同族。你们一族专门兜售力量，而我正要掐灭这力量的源头。<hpage>事成之后，这力量真空的世界真能让你们感到高兴？<page>哈……陷阱上现在全是家族徽记，我们也躲那苍白之神半辈子了。<page>要是现在因为公然反抗栽了……这种憋屈结局谁受得了？<page>好了！我活儿干完了。该你大显身手了！敲钟者，你可一定要赢啊，都指望着你呢！
translated_text: <hpage>I know people like you, and I know you. Your tribe is a tribe full of work and power negotiations, and I am trying to remove the main cause of it.<hpage>When this is over, will you truly rejoice in the land that has lost someone you love?<page>The landmark of my house is hanging on that trap. It's hard to avoid God's eyes.<page>If we win now, after the opposition of all the people. This is a sad conclusion that nobody cares about.<page>now! My finished job is time to start your amazing career! For all of us, ring the bell, we wish you victory!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je connais des gens comme toi, et je te connais. Votre tribu est une tribu pleine de travail et de négociations de pouvoir, et j'essaie d'éliminer la cause principale de cela.<hpage>Quand cela sera fini, vous réjouirez-vous vraiment dans la terre qui a perdu quelqu 'un que vous aimez ?<page>La marque de ma maison est accrochée à ce piège. Il est difficile d'éviter les yeux de Dieu.<page>Si nous gagnons maintenant, après l'opposition de tout le peuple. C'est une conclusion triste que personne ne se soucie.<page>Maintenant ! Mon travail terminé est le moment de commencer votre incroyable carrière ! Pour nous tous, sonnez la cloche, nous vous souhaitons la victoire !

original_en_text: <hpage>You see one’s nature, Eva? It is a skill far beyond bugs.<page>One not without cost. My sight perceives a bug only through the imprint upon their soul. <hpage>You speak of their crest? That signifier of a bug’s essence and their invisible yoke born through a lifetime.<page>Crest? Yes, the old Weaver term. A simple word to attempt description of something so profound.<page>But wait. Your own nature... Is it?...<page>Lady, permit me to look deeper still, that I may offer clarity...
original_zh_text: <hpage>伊娃，你能洞见本质？这等技艺远超虫类。<page>自然是有代价的。我需透过灵魂印记窥视生灵。<hpage>你是指纹章？那象征虫民全部存在与无形枷锁的标记？<page>纹章？对，织者用的古称，试图以简单词汇描述深邃之物。<page>等等，你的本质……莫非……<page>女士，请允许我深入感知，才好仔细说明……
translated_text: <hpage>eva, have you ever seen the nature of human beings? It's a skill that goes far beyond mistakes.<page>Not without cost My eyes can perceive only through the traces of the insect's soul.<hpage>are you talking about the badge? Symbol of the insect's essence and the invisible chains born in life.<page>christy? Yes, that's an old term in Weaver. I can express such a profound thing in one word.<page>You are waiting for your nature. i really...<page>Women, I can provide you with a deeper understanding and clear information.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Eva, avez-vous déjà vu la nature des êtres humains ? C'est une compétence qui va bien au-delà des erreurs.<page>Mes yeux ne peuvent percevoir que par les traces de l'âme de l'insecte.<hpage>Vous parlez de la badge ? Symbole de l'essence de l'insecte et des chaînes invisibles nées dans la vie.<page>Christée ? Oui, c'est un vieux terme dans Weaver. Je peux exprimer une chose si profonde en un mot.<page>Tu attends ta nature. J'ai vraiment...<page>Femmes, je peux vous fournir une compréhension plus profonde et des informations claires.

translated_text: the insight?
secondary_translated_text: L'insight ?

original_en_text: Lady, Pharloom’s time grows short. If you are able to further expand your nature, I urge you return to me.<page>Any power I possess, I shall grant it for your aid.<hpage>My thanks, Eva. If my nature expands as you say, I shall return.
original_zh_text: 女士，纺络时日无多。若你能进一步突破自身极限，请务必回到我身边。<page>我拥有的任何力量，都将为你所用。<hpage>感激不尽，伊娃。若真如你所言突破极限，我定会回来。
translated_text: If you can further expand your nature, which is shortening the time of the Faroe, I suggest you come back to me.<page>Whatever power you have, I will use it to help you.<hpage>Thank you, Eva. If my nature expands, as you say, I will come back.
secondary_translated_text: Si vous pouvez étendre encore votre nature, ce qui raccourcit le temps des Féroé, je vous suggère de revenir vers moi.<page>Quel que soit le pouvoir que vous avez, je l'utiliserai pour vous aider.<hpage>Merci à toi Eva. Si ma nature s'étend, comme vous le dites, je reviendrai.

translated_text: Binding Eve.
secondary_translated_text: Lieu Eve.

original_en_text: Stay back, twisted leech! Even lodged within another’s shell, your ravenous nature shines clear.<page>You shall not defoul this chamber, nor claim my soul. Begone!
original_zh_text: 退后，扭曲的寄生物！即便寄居他者躯壳也藏不住贪婪本性。<page>休想玷污此地，更别妄图吞噬我的灵魂。滚开！
translated_text: Back up, twisted onion! Even in the shells of others, the greedy nature shines clearly.<page>You can't destroy this room, you can't take away your soul. run!
secondary_translated_text: Retour, oignon tordu ! Même dans les coquilles des autres, la nature avide brille clairement.<page>Vous ne pouvez pas détruire cette pièce, vous ne pouvez pas enlever votre âme. Courir !

original_en_text: Lady... Incredible... Your nature is so unlike a mortal bugs. Yours is malleable, transitory. It is a marvelous thing. Worth my long life to behold.<page>Unbound one, though we know each other little, permit me to ask a selfish request.<hpage>Your talent has provided a great benefit, Eva. What is it you desire of me?<page>Only to have my own soul, my own memories, bound within your shell... As you have done with those others throughout these lands.<page>I would not define as a crest within you, but my small strength may still grant a final boon.<hpage>You ask to be subsumed? Know your mind would cease to be, in any independent sense.<page>To be united with one unbound... This is the kind of escape I once prayed for, though the weight of ages had almost made me forget.<page>Lady, would you grant me this request?
original_zh_text: 女士……不可思议……你的本质异于凡虫。流动，嬗变，真是奇妙，是我前所未见的存在。<page>无羁者啊，虽然相交尚浅，但我仍想提出一个自私请求。<hpage>你帮了我很多，伊娃。你想要什么？<page>请您将我的灵魂与记忆缚于您的壳中，就像您其他生物所做的那样。<page>虽然称不上是纹章，但或许能为您献上最后一份微薄馈赠。<hpage>你想被我吞噬？你要知道，那意味着独立意识将不复存在。<page>我明白，但自愿如此。能与无羁者合而为一……是我昔日渴求的解脱，尽管岁月让我几乎遗忘。<page>亲爱的女士，您愿意成全我吗？
translated_text: Madam... It's incredible how... Your nature is quite different from that of human insects. Yours is plastic and short. This is a great thing. I am worthy to be thankful for my long life.<page>Free people, let us make some selfish demands that we do not know well.<hpage>Eva, your talents have brought us great benefits. what do you want from me?<page>I am bound in your shell to have my own soul, my own memory - as you have done to the rest of this land.<page>I don't define it as a badge of your soul, but my little power can still bring you the last blessing.<hpage>Do you want to join? Know that your mind no longer exists, in an independent sense, and that you are not in the same place.<page>Partnership with people without constraints. This was the escape I prayed for, even though I was almost forgotten by the weight of time.<page>Would you consent to this request, Madam? "
secondary_translated_text: Madame ... C'est incroyable comment... Votre nature est très différente de celle des insectes humains. Le vôtre est plastique et court. C'est une grande chose. Je suis reconnaissante pour ma longue vie.<page>Peuples libres, faisons des demandes égoïstes que nous ne connaissons pas bien.<hpage>Eva, tes talents nous ont apporté de grands avantages. Qu ' est-ce que tu veux de moi ?<page>Je suis lié dans votre coquille pour avoir ma propre âme, ma propre mémoire - comme vous avez fait au reste de cette terre.<page>Je ne le définis pas comme un badge de votre âme, mais mon petit pouvoir peut encore vous apporter la dernière bénédiction.<hpage>Vous voulez vous joindre ? Sachez que votre esprit n'existe plus, dans un sens indépendant, et que vous n'êtes pas au même endroit.<page>En partenariat avec les gens sans contraintes. C'était l'évasion que j'avais priée, même si j'étais presque oublié par le poids du temps.<page>Accepterez-vous cette demande, madame ? "

original_en_text: Lady, you are a multitude within a single shell. A being truly unbound. To aid your growth has proved a grand task, even for one as limited as me.<page>As my last act, permit me to ask a final, selfish request.<hpage>Your talents have provided great benefit, Eva. What is it you desire of me?<page>Only to have my own soul, my own memories, bound within your shell... As you have done with those others throughout these lands.<page>I would not define as a crest within you, but my small strength may still grant a final boon.<hpage>You ask to be subsumed? Know your mind would cease to be, in any independent sense.<page>I know. And still I seek it, gladly. To be united with one unbound... This is the kind of escape I once prayed for, though the weight of ages had almost made me forget.<page>Dear Lady, would you grant me this request?
original_zh_text: 女士，您这具躯壳中存在万千可能，是真正无拘无束的存在。能助您成长，是我的荣幸。<page>最后，请允许我提出自私的请求。<hpage>你帮了我很多，伊娃。你想要什么？<page>请您将我的灵魂与记忆缚于您的壳中，就像您其他生物所做的那样。<page>虽然称不上是纹章，但或许能为您献上最后一份微薄馈赠。<hpage>你想被我吞噬？你要知道，那意味着独立意识将不复存在。<page>我明白，但自愿如此。能与无羁者合而为一……是我昔日渴求的解脱，尽管岁月让我几乎遗忘。<page>亲爱的女士，您愿意成全我吗？
translated_text: There are many people in one shell. Really free people. Helping you grow can be a difficult task for a limited human being like me, too.<page>As a final scene, let me make a wish for myself at the end.<hpage>Eva, your talent has brought great benefits. what are you asking me for?<page>I am bound in your shell to have my own soul, my own memory - as you have done to the rest of this land.<page>I don't define it as a badge of your soul, but my little power can still bring you the last blessing.<hpage>Do you want to join? Know that your mind no longer exists, in an independent sense, and that you are not in the same place.<page>I'm still happy to look for it. Connecting with those who are not bound. This was the escape I prayed for, even though I was almost forgotten by the weight of time.<page>Dear lady, do you agree with this request?
secondary_translated_text: Il y a beaucoup de gens dans une coquille. des gens vraiment libres. Vous aider à grandir peut être une tâche difficile pour un être humain limité comme moi aussi.<page>Pour finir, je me fais un vœu à la fin.<hpage>Eva, votre talent a apporté de grands avantages. Que me demandez-vous ?<page>Je suis lié dans votre coquille pour avoir ma propre âme, ma propre mémoire - comme vous avez fait au reste de cette terre.<page>Je ne le définis pas comme un badge de votre âme, mais mon petit pouvoir peut encore vous apporter la dernière bénédiction.<hpage>Vous voulez vous joindre ? Sachez que votre esprit n'existe plus, dans un sens indépendant, et que vous n'êtes pas au même endroit.<page>Je suis toujours heureux de la chercher. Connecter avec ceux qui ne sont pas liés. C'était l'évasion que j'avais priée, même si j'étais presque oublié par le poids du temps.<page>Chère dame, êtes-vous d'accord avec cette demande ?

original_en_text: Who’s there? Has someone come to free me? Or are you here to bring my end? <hpage>I am Hornet, prisoner, only a traveller and not here to slay you.<hpage>What cause sees you caged in these ruins of Weavers past? Were you their enemy?
original_zh_text: 谁在那儿？是来解救我的？还是来取我性命的？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂，只是一名旅者，无意取你性命。<hpage>你为何被囚于织者遗迹？你曾是他们的敌人？
translated_text: who's there? did someone come to help? Or do you end me? "<hpage>I am a marmalade, a prisoner, a mere traveler, and I have not come to kill you. "<hpage>what trapped you in the ruins of weaver? are you their enemy?
secondary_translated_text: qui est là ? Quelqu ' un est venu aider ? Ou tu me termines ? "<hpage>Je suis une marmelade, un prisonnier, un simple voyageur, et je ne suis pas venu vous tuer. "<hpage>Qu ' est-ce qui vous a piégé dans les ruines de Weaver ?Êtes-vous leur ennemi ?

original_en_text: Lady, my senses resound. You have grown further beyond the bounds of a bug.<page>Permit me to gaze again upon your nature, that I may offer clarity.
original_zh_text: 女士，我的感知在震颤。你已远超凡虫界限。<page>请允许我再次深入感知，才好仔细说明……
translated_text: My feelings echo. Your growth is crossing the wrong boundary.<page>Look at your nature once more, and I can give you a definite answer.
secondary_translated_text: Mes sentiments écho. Votre croissance traverse la mauvaise frontière.<page>Regardez votre nature une fois de plus, et je peux vous donner une réponse définitive.

original_en_text: <hpage>How did you come to be sealed here, Eva? <page>Lady, you mistake. What seems a cage is as much my shell as the form inside.<page>I was born within this space. To leave would be my death, an uninspired end, though one I’ve sometimes wished would come.<page>I am unique, you see. My mothers shared the curse of their tribe, to conceive a child is a painful, near impossible task. <hpage>I know the curse well, Eva, for I am also its victim, and spawn of one who managed to overcome its limits. <hpage>Are you too an attempt to defy that cruel constraint?<page>A flawed attempt. A life spun from rune and shell, sustained only by its cage. My thoughts may mimic a Weavers, but my senses are my own.<page>Over time, that difference brought only distance between us.
original_zh_text: <hpage>伊娃，你为何会被困在这里？<page>女士误会了。这囚笼也是我的躯壳，与其中的形体并无差异。<page>我诞生于这里，离开意味着消亡，虽然有时也渴求这平淡结局。<page>我很特殊，母亲们承受着族群诅咒，生育子嗣近乎不可能。<hpage>我很了解这诅咒，伊娃。因为我也是受害者，更是突破禁忌的产物。<hpage>想必你也是对抗这残酷枷锁的尝试？<page>是失败的尝试。符文与甲壳铸就的生命，只能靠囚笼维系。我虽能模仿织者，但终究不是织者。<page>久而久之，这份差异使我们渐行渐远。
translated_text: <hpage>eva, how did you get sealed up here?<page>Miss, you are wrong. What looks like a cage is my shell, my inner shape.<page>I was born in this space. Leaving is my death, an uninspiring end, but sometimes I hope it will come.<page>I am unique, see. My mother cursed that, like her tribe, pregnancy was a painful, almost impossible task.<hpage>Eva, I know this curse very well. Because I am also a victim of it, and I am the descendant of a man who was able to overcome its limitations.<hpage>Do you resist this cruel restriction?<page>A flawed attempt. Life made of runes and shells can only be maintained in a cage. My mind may imitate a weaver, but my emotions are my own.<page>Over time, this difference will only bring us closer together.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Eva, comment as-tu été enfermée ici ?<page>Mademoiselle, vous avez tort. Ce qui ressemble à une cage est ma coquille, ma forme intérieure.<page>Je suis né dans cet espace. Le départ est ma mort, une fin peu inspirante, mais parfois j'espère que ça viendra.<page>Je suis unique, tu vois. Ma mère a juré que, comme sa tribu, la grossesse était une tâche douloureuse, presque impossible.<hpage>Eva, je connais très bien cette malédiction. Parce que je suis aussi une victime, et je suis le descendant d'un homme qui a su surmonter ses limites.<hpage>Resiste-t - il à cette cruelle restriction ?<page>Une tentative échouée. La vie faite de runes et de coquilles ne peut être maintenue que dans une cage. Mon esprit peut imiter un tisserant, mais mes émotions sont les miennes.<page>Au fil du temps, cette différence ne fera que nous rapprocher.

original_en_text: By your grace, I am at last broken from my fate.<hpage>Gladly I accept your union, Eva. No longer shall you suffer eternity alone.
original_zh_text: 蒙您恩典，我终于能挣脱宿命。<hpage>我欣然接受与你的联结，伊娃。你不必再承受永恒的孤寂。
translated_text: Thanks to you, I have finally escaped my fate.<hpage>Glad you're married, Eva. You cannot live alone forever.
secondary_translated_text: Grâce à vous, j'ai enfin évité mon destin.<hpage>Heureusement que tu es mariée Eva. Vous ne pouvez pas vivre seul éternellement.

original_en_text: Come no closer! I sense the forbidden blood coursing through you, that which grows and reshapes the world in its own vulgar image.<page>Whether it was imbibed willingly or not, none shall be allowed into this chamber while so afflicted. Begone!
original_zh_text: 站住！我能感知到你体内流淌的禁忌之血，那以粗鄙之形生长并重塑世界的秽物。<page>无论你是否自愿沾染此血，凡受其侵蚀者皆不得踏入这里。速速离开！
translated_text: run! You can feel the blood of taboos flowing through your body, growing into a vulgar image, and rebuilding the world.<page>Whether voluntarily or involuntarily, no one can enter this chamber during this period of agony. run!
secondary_translated_text: Courir ! Vous pouvez sentir le sang des tabous couler dans votre corps, grandissant en une image vulgaire, et reconstruire le monde.<page>Volontairement ou involontairement, personne ne peut entrer dans cette chambre pendant cette période d'agonie. Courir !

original_en_text: Lady, if in your travels you are able to further expand your nature, return to me. With what power I possess, I may be able to aid you further.<hpage>If my nature expands as you say, Eva, I shall return.
original_zh_text: 女士，如果你的本质再度进化，请回来找我。以我的力量，或许能助你更上一层。<hpage>若我本质确实再度进化，我会回来找你。
translated_text: Woman, if you can further expand your nature in your journey, please come back to me. With my strength, I may be able to help you even more.<hpage>Eva, when my nature expands, as you say, I will come back.
secondary_translated_text: Femme, si vous pouvez étendre votre nature dans votre voyage, s'il vous plaît revenez à moi. Avec ma force, je peux peut - être être être en mesure de vous aider encore plus.<hpage>Eva, quand ma nature s'étendra, comme tu le dis, je reviendrai.

original_en_text: Lady, would you think again upon my last request? To be bound amidst your shimmering soul?<page>I understand it is a selfish thing to ask, and I will hold no ill will if you reject.
original_zh_text: 女士，可愿重新考虑我的请求？让我融入你璀璨魂灵？<page>我明白这是个自私的请求，若您拒绝我也绝无怨言。
translated_text: Can you reconsider my last request? trapped in your glowing soul?<page>I understand that it is a selfish thing to do, and there is no malice in your refusal.
secondary_translated_text: Pouvez-vous reconsidérer ma dernière demande ? Piégé dans votre âme lumineuse ?<page>Je comprends que c'est une chose égoïste à faire, et il n'y a pas de malveillance dans votre refus.

original_en_text: <hpage>I am sorry, Eva. I cannot grant you this. At least, not yet.<hpage>Yours is a mind strong and strange. That union could prove dangerous to my identity.<page>I understand, Lady. I will be here, if ever you reconsider.
original_zh_text: <hpage>抱歉，伊娃。我不能答应你，至少现在不行。<hpage>你的心智强大而奇异，联结恐怕会危及我的存在。<page>我明白，女士。希望您能改变心意，我会永远在此等候。
translated_text: <hpage>I'm sorry, Eva, I can't guarantee that. Or at least not yet.<hpage>Your mind is strong and strange. This combination poses a danger to my identity.<page>I understand, ma 'am. If you'll reconsider, I'm here.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Je suis désolé, Eva, je ne peux pas vous le garantir. Ou du moins pas encore.<hpage>Ton esprit est fort et étrange. Cette combinaison constitue un danger pour mon identité.<page>Je comprends, madame. Si vous reconsidérez, je suis là.

original_en_text: Thank you for playing the demo.
original_zh_text: 试玩版体验结束，感谢您的游玩！
translated_text: Thank you for the presentation.
secondary_translated_text: Merci pour la présentation.

original_en_text: They see your peace, woven of faith and toil,
original_zh_text: 赞美你以信仰与劳役编织的片刻安宁，
translated_text: Your peace is woven by faith and hard work,
secondary_translated_text: Votre paix est tissée par la foi et le travail acharné,

translated_text: in the third act.
secondary_translated_text: dans le troisième acte.

translated_text: WASP
secondary_translated_text: Le WASP

translated_text: Act two.
secondary_translated_text: Actes deux.

original_en_text: use of a controller is highly recommended
original_zh_text: 强烈建议使用游戏手柄
translated_text: Highly Recommended Controller
secondary_translated_text: Contrôleur fortement recommandé

translated_text: Son Ji-sung
secondary_translated_text: Son Ji-Sung

original_en_text: - From ‘Pharloom’s Folly’ by the Conductor Romino
original_zh_text: ——摘自《纺络谬世录》 指挥家罗米诺 著
translated_text: - "The Stupidity of Faro" by conductor Romino
secondary_translated_text: - « La stupidité de Faro » du chef d'orchestre Romino

translated_text: Act one.
secondary_translated_text: Acte un.

original_en_text: They forget your heart, bound in slumber and servitude,
original_zh_text: 谁又记得你沉睡于桎梏中的野兽之心？
translated_text: They are destined to forget your heart, sleep and become slaves.
secondary_translated_text: Ils sont destinés à oublier votre cœur, à dormir et à devenir esclaves.

original_en_text: They see your beauty, so frail and fine,
original_zh_text: 虫豸皆敬仰你纤弱的神迹之美，
translated_text: They see your beauty, so fragile and beautiful.
secondary_translated_text: Ils voient ta beauté, si fragile et si belle.

translated_text: The pharmacy
secondary_translated_text: la pharmacie

translated_text: The abyss
secondary_translated_text: L'abyss

original_en_text: When you wake they shall see your truth,
original_zh_text: 待你醒来，挣裂千丝缠茧——
translated_text: When you wake up, they will see your truth.
secondary_translated_text: Quand vous vous réveillerez, ils verront votre vérité.

original_en_text: A beast’s nature bare to all.
translated_text: The nature of the beast is naked to everyone.
secondary_translated_text: La nature de la bête est nue pour tout le monde.

translated_text: The house with the clock locked.
secondary_translated_text: La maison avec son horloge verrouillée.

translated_text: Building tools?
secondary_translated_text: Construire des outils ?

original_en_text: Lift your voices. Know our grace.
translated_text: Raise your voice. to know our grace.
secondary_translated_text: Élève ta voix. Connaître notre grâce.

original_en_text: Bug born of Pharloom. You have been chosen.<br> May our Citadel’s holy gilding harden your soft shell.<page>Stand eternal as our arbiter, that no bug bearing sin shall step within our sacred halls.
original_zh_text: 纺络的虫民，你们已被选中，<br>愿圣堡的鎏金淬硬你们的软壳。<page>作为审判官永远伫立，使罪孽之徒永不得踏入圣殿。
translated_text: It is a bacterium born in Faro. You have been chosen.<br>Let the sacred gold plating of our castle harden your soft shell.<page>As our eternal arbitrators, the evil insect will not set foot in our holy temple.
secondary_translated_text: C'est une bactérie née à Faro. Vous avez été choisi.<br>Laissez le placage d'or sacré de notre château durcir votre coquille molle.<page>En tant que nos arbitres éternels, le mauvais insecte ne mettra pas les pieds dans notre saint temple.

original_en_text: A rune-scroll depicting void given form.
original_zh_text: 描绘虚空化形的符文卷轴
translated_text: A scroll of runes depicting a void.
secondary_translated_text: Un rouleau de runes dépeignant un vide

original_en_text: Sisters, spiders, watch these waters flow,<br>Cleansing, Binding, as Silk from shell,<br>Memories of our kingdom calm.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，蛛族，观此净水长流。<br>涤荡，缠缚，如壳中抽丝，<br>抚平王国的记忆褶皱。
translated_text: Sisters, spiders, look at the water.<br>clean and bound, like silk taken out of a shell.<br>The memories of our kingdom are serene.
secondary_translated_text: Sœurs, araignées, regardez l'eau.<br>propre et lié, comme la soie extraite d'une coquille.<br>Les souvenirs de notre royaume sont sereins.

original_en_text: At the seventh bell toll, send:<br>Thirty measures, four beats Smokerock,<br>Eight beats Sweetsmelt,<br>Mark of fealty, all workers.<page>At the ninth bell toll, send:<br>Twenty measures, two beats Smokerock,<br>Seven beats Sweetsmelt,<br>Mark of fealty, all workers.<page>
original_zh_text: 七钟响时运送：<br>三十节又四奏烟岩，<br>及八奏甜熔渣。<br>全体劳工需示忠诚。<page>九钟响时运送：<br>二十节又两奏烟岩，<br>及七奏甜熔渣。<br>全体劳工需示忠诚。<page>
translated_text: Notice of the 7th Strike:<br>Four of the thirty broke the Smoke Lock.<br>He beat eight people,<br>Symbol of all employee loyalty.<page>On the 9th strike,<br>Two of the 20 measures broke Smlock.<br>Seven people beat the sweet watermelon.<br>Symbol of all workers' loyalty.<page>
secondary_translated_text: Note de la 7ème grève :<br>Quatre des trente ont brisé le verrou de la fumée.<br>Il a battu huit personnes,<br>Symbole de la loyauté de tous les employés.<page>Pour la 9ème grève,<br>Deux des vingt mesures ont brisé Smlock.<br>Sept personnes ont battu la pastèque douce.<br>Symbole de la loyauté de tous les travailleurs.<page>

translated_text: Map of Auditorium
secondary_translated_text: Carte de l'auditorium

translated_text: Map of Vidanya
secondary_translated_text: Carte de Vidanya

translated_text: Map of the underground
secondary_translated_text: Carte du souterrain

original_en_text: When three fonts weep, our sacred shrine shall rise.
original_zh_text: 三眼泪泉涌流，圣坛自当升起。
translated_text: When three words cry, the holy temple rises up.
secondary_translated_text: Quand trois mots crient, le saint temple s'élève.

original_en_text: Damned are we! The lingered few bound still to suffer. Cursed thrice by Pharloom, to wait, to watch, to cry our anguish.<page>No more! We say! No more! We cry! We all have wailed and wept. Fair Pharloom’s fall has come at last. Its end we now accept.
original_zh_text: 万众受难！幸存者仍受折磨。纺络三度诅咒加身——苦候，守望，哀哭不休，<page>到此为止！我在此宣言！到此为止！我在此高呼！我们已流尽血泪。荣光纺络终将陨落，我们应接受终局。
translated_text: fuck you! The remaining minority is doomed to suffer. Cursed three times by the fal, we waited, looked, wept for our suffering.<page>not anymore! Let's talk! not anymore! I was crying! We all cried and cried. The collapse of the Fair Farm has finally arrived. We now accept that end.
secondary_translated_text: Merde à toi ! La minorité restante est vouée à souffrir. Maudit à trois reprises par le fal, nous avons attendu, regardé, pleuré pour notre souffrance.<page>Plus pas ! Allons parler ! Plus pas ! Je pleurais ! Nous avons tous pleuré et crié. L'effondrement de la ferme équitable est enfin arrivé. Nous acceptons désormais cette fin.

original_en_text: Litany of the Worker<br>May we catch the dregs and never tire,<br>May we clean the dregs and never hunger,<br>May we spool the dregs and never falter.
original_zh_text: 劳工祷词<br>愿我们滤渣不倦。<br>愿我们清秽不饥。<br>愿我们纺线不怠。
translated_text: The workers continue to read<br>We can never get tired of dirt.<br>Remove the mud and never go hungry.<br>We roll up the mud and never get upset.
secondary_translated_text: Les ouvriers continuent de lire<br>On ne se fatigue jamais de la saleté.<br>Retirez la boue et n'ayez jamais faim.<br>Nous roulons la boue et ne nous énervons jamais.

original_en_text: Oath of the Whiteward<br>While song must be sung, none may falter.<br>Infirmity. Sickness. Death.<br>All are banished from our Citadel.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅誓言<br>歌不可辍，虫不可怠。<br>孱弱、病痛、死亡——皆逐出圣堡。
translated_text: The White Oath.<br>The song must be sung, but no one is upset.<br>Weakness. Death due to disease<br>They were all driven out of the castle.
secondary_translated_text: Le serment blanc.<br>La chanson doit être chantée, mais personne n'est contrarié.<br>faiblesse. Décès dû à une maladie<br>Ils furent tous chassés du château.

original_en_text: Penitent, Fourth of the Fourth.<br>Guilty of the sins of infirmity, sickness.<br>Penance by swallowing.<br>Absolution granted after death.<page>Penitent, Twelfth of the First.<br>Guilty of an unnamed sin.<br>Penance by casting.<br>Absolution not granted.
original_zh_text: 罪者，第四组第四号。<br>犯孱弱、病痛之罪。<br>处以吞刑。<br>死后得赦。<page>罪人，第一组第十二号。<br>犯未名之罪。<br>处以流放。<br>不予赦免。
translated_text: The Confessor, 4.<br>Because of weakness and illness.<br>Spit out.<br>The pardon after death.<page>The Confessor, 12.<br>An unnamed crime has occurred.<br>I swear to be guilty of casting.<br>Without forgiveness.
secondary_translated_text: Le confesseur, 4.<br>A cause de faiblesse et de maladie.<br>Spit out.<br>Le pardon après la mort.<page>Le confesseur, 12.<br>Un crime sans nom a eu lieu.<br>Je jure d'être coupable de coupabilité.<br>sans pardon.

original_en_text: Penitent, Eighth of the Twelfth.<br>Guilty of the sin of irreverence.<br>Penance by chaining.<br>Absolution granted after death.<page>Penitent, Second of the Fourth.<br>Guilty of the sin of dissonance.<br>Penance by silencing.<br>Absolution granted after death.
original_zh_text: 罪者，第十二组第八号。<br>犯不敬之罪。<br>处以锁刑。<br>死后得赦。<page>罪者，第四组第二号。<br>犯杂音之罪。<br>处以禁言。<br>死后得赦。
translated_text: Confession of December 8<br>The sin of not respecting others.<br>Explain it in the chain.<br>The pardon after death.<page>"Confession," Volume 4.<br>I made a discordance.<br>A silent confession.<br>Pardon after death.
secondary_translated_text: La confession du 8 décembre<br>Le péché de ne pas respecter les autres.<br>Expliquez-le dans la chaîne.<br>Le pardon après la mort.<page>« Confession », volume 4.<br>J'ai fait une discorde.<br>une confession silencieuse.<br>Pardon après la mort.

original_en_text: Remains of a Muckroach crushed by falling rock.
original_zh_text: 蟑螂被落石碾压后的残渣。
translated_text: The cockroach's body was crushed by a falling stone.
secondary_translated_text: Le corps du cafard a été écrasé par une pierre qui tombe.

original_en_text: Anguished Aura<br>Eight masks hard, swirled soul enraged.<br>Twelve aknids flat, all juices strained.<page>Six pilgrims living, hung long to drain.
original_zh_text: 苦痛灵氛<br>八具硬质旋魂怒面。<br>十二只阿克尼，榨尽汁液。<page>六名活祭朝圣者，悬吊沥干。
translated_text: The aura of pain.<br>8 The masks are hard, and the soul is angry.<br>Flatten the 12 aknids and filter all the juice.<page>The six pilgrims are still alive, waiting to be sucked in.
secondary_translated_text: L'aura de la douleur.<br>8 Les masques sont durs, et l'âme est en colère.<br>Applatir les 12 acnids et filtrer tout le jus.<page>Les six pèlerins sont encore vivants, attendant d'être aspirés.

original_en_text: A white lock bearing a surgical symbol.
original_zh_text: 带有外科标志的苍白锁具。
translated_text: A white key with a surgical mark.
secondary_translated_text: Une clef blanche avec une marque chirurgicale.

translated_text: The symbols that depicted the most fabrics.
secondary_translated_text: Les symboles représentant le plus de tissus.

translated_text: Paragraph chart
secondary_translated_text: Paragraphe chart

translated_text: Whisper Vault Map
secondary_translated_text: Carte de Whisper Vault

original_en_text: Their shells are ours. Their souls are ours.<br>Our hate is forever.
original_zh_text: 他们的躯壳是我们的，他们的灵魂是我们的。<br>我们的恨意永世不灭。
translated_text: The shells are ours, and their souls are ours.<br>Hate is eternal.
secondary_translated_text: Les coquilles sont les nôtres, et leurs âmes sont les nôtres.<br>La haine est éternelle.

original_en_text: Containment fails. Memory lost. Excise outer. Maintain inner.<br>Shellwood stasis sustained - Remember.<br>Marrowlands stasis critical - Remember.<br>Verdanian environment exceeded - Destined to forget.
original_zh_text: 封存溃败。记忆遗失。切除外区。维持内区。<br>甲木林封存稳定——须铭记。<br>髓骨地封存危急——须铭记。<br>翠庭生态失控——注定遗忘。
translated_text: Preventing failure. Loss of memory. Remove the outside. Stay inside the house.<br>The shell and tree stagnation continues.<br>Severe bone marrow arrest - remember.<br>Beyond the dazzling environment - doomed to be forgotten.
secondary_translated_text: prévenir l'échec. perte de mémoire. Retirez l'extérieur. Restez à l'intérieur de la maison.<br>La stagnation des coquilles et des arbres continue.<br>Arrêt sévère de la moelle osseuse - rappelez-vous.<br>Au-delà de l'environnement éblouissant - condamné à être oublié.

original_en_text: Here is established, by holy consent of the Conductors,<br>The Memorium of Pharloom.<br><br>What Is Remembered Is Never Lost.
original_zh_text: 经指挥家神圣授权，<br>于此建立纺络忆廊。<br><br>铭记者永存不灭。
translated_text: Here, with the driver's sacred consent,<br>The Farroom Memorial<br><br>What we remember is never lost.
secondary_translated_text: Ici, avec le consentement sacré du conducteur,<br>Le Farroom Memorial<br><br>Ce dont nous nous souvenons n'est jamais perdu.

original_en_text: A rune depicting paths away from Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 描绘离开纺络通路的符文。
translated_text: Roon painted a way out of the foul.
secondary_translated_text: Roon a peint un moyen de sortir de la faute.

translated_text: repair broken tools?
secondary_translated_text: Réparer les outils cassés ?

translated_text: Map of the Door
secondary_translated_text: Carte de la porte

original_en_text: Due to unacceptably high injury and unsanctioned deaths, Ventrica travel shall henceforth be denied to all.<br> For Pharloom eternal, a bug who serves must never die.
original_zh_text: 鉴于伤亡过甚并且非授命死亡，即日起禁止所有虫民使用圣脉枢管。<br>永恒纺络需要活着的仆从。
translated_text: Travel to Madagascar will be refused because of the unacceptable number of injuries and unauthorized deaths.<br>For Faro, the perpetual service error will never go away.
secondary_translated_text: Les voyages à Madagascar seront refusés en raison du nombre inacceptable de blessés et de décès non autorisés.<br>Pour Faro, l'erreur de service perpétuelle ne disparaîtra jamais.

translated_text: The weakest map of Atlas
secondary_translated_text: La carte la plus faible de l'Atlas

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>Spare a song for those who lay here silent.<br>By strength abandoned, they fell before the final ascent.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>为长眠于此的无声者歌一曲罢。<br>力竭而堕，未竟登攀。
translated_text: about the pilgrims.<br>Leave a song for those who lie down quietly.<br>They lost their strength and collapsed before they could make their final climb.
secondary_translated_text: sur les pèlerins.<br>Laissez une chanson pour ceux qui se couchent en silence.<br>Ils ont perdu leur force et s'écroulaient avant de pouvoir faire leur dernière ascension.

translated_text: Abyss Map
secondary_translated_text: Carte Abyss

original_en_text: <hpage>I understand now... The steel child’s servant grew bold...<hpage>I know what the fleeing bug seeks to call, and their etchings here suggest clear clues to where. <hpage>What they attempt is dangerous, stupid. It can only end badly. I must hurry if I’m to stop this.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我现在明白了……钢铁之子的手下越来越大胆……<hpage>也知道那只逃亡的虫子想召唤什么，这些刻痕明确指出了地点。<hpage>愚蠢又危险的做法，不会有好下场。得赶紧阻止。
translated_text: <hpage>Now I know the steel boy's servant has become bold.<hpage>We know what we call the fleeing bugs, and the etching here gives us a clear clue.<hpage>Their attempts are dangerous and stupid. The result is only bad. If you want to stop this, you have to hurry.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Maintenant, je sais que le serviteur du garçon d'acier est devenu audacieux.<hpage>Nous savons ce que nous appelons les insectes en fuite, et la gravure ici nous donne un indice clair.<hpage>Leurs tentatives sont dangereuses et stupides. Le résultat n'est que mauvais. Si vous voulez arrêter cela, vous devez vous dépêcher.

original_en_text: An old rune displaying the design for a Weaver weapon.
original_zh_text: 残破的织者武器设计图。
translated_text: An ancient run showing the design of a loom weapon.
secondary_translated_text: Une ancienne course montrant le design d'une arme à tisser.

translated_text: Draw the Rune of the Abyss.
secondary_translated_text: Découvrez la Rune de l'Abyss.

original_en_text: Sister, spider, sat between salt and stone,<br>Build those tools of brilliant mind imagined,<br>Aid us when our Silk has waned.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，蛛族，坐于盐石之间，<br>铸造智械奇器，<br>助我们于灵丝枯竭之时。
translated_text: Sister Spider sits between salt and stone.<br>to create tools for an imaginary brain.<br>When the silk falls, please help.
secondary_translated_text: Sœur Spider est entre le sel et la pierre.<br>créer des outils pour un cerveau imaginaire.<br>Quand la soie tombe, s'il vous plaît aider.

original_en_text: An old stone gate with a simple keyhole.
original_zh_text: 带有简易锁孔的古石门。
translated_text: An old stone gate with a simple keyhole.
secondary_translated_text: Une vieille porte en pierre avec un simple trou de serrure.

original_en_text: Sister, spider, husk bound to branch,<br>Watch over these bugs, passing safe,<br>Warded by fear,<br>No longer your meal.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，蛛族，缚枝之壳，<br>庇佑这些过客安然。<br>以恐惧为甲，<br>不再化作食粮。
translated_text: Sisters, spiders, shells tied to branches,<br>Be aware of these errors and pass them safely,<br>Embrace the fear,<br>It is no longer your food.
secondary_translated_text: Sœurs, araignées, coquilles attachées aux branches,<br>Soyez conscient de ces erreurs et passez-les en toute sécurité,<br>Embracez la peur,<br>Ce n'est plus votre nourriture.

original_en_text: Bug born of Pharloom. You have been chosen.<br> May our Citadel’s holy gilding harden your soft shell.<page>Stand eternal as our arbiter, that no bug bearing sin shall ever step within our sacred halls.
original_zh_text: 纺络的虫民，你们已被选中，<br>愿圣堡的鎏金淬硬你们的软壳。<page>作为审判官永远伫立，使罪孽之徒永不得踏入圣殿。
translated_text: It is a bacterium born in Faro. You have been chosen.<br>Let the sacred gold plating of our castle harden your soft shell.<page>As our arbitrators, we stand in our holy temple at all times, without any worm or sin.
secondary_translated_text: C'est une bactérie née à Faro. Vous avez été choisi.<br>Laissez le placage d'or sacré de notre château durcir votre coquille molle.<page>En tant que nos arbitres, nous nous tenons dans notre saint temple en tout temps, sans ver ni péché.

original_en_text: I have departed to pay my respects at the graves within the great wood.<br>- Pinmaster Plinney
original_zh_text: 我去密林深处的墓园祭拜先灵<br>——针匠普林尼
translated_text: I went to see the tomb in the forest.<br>- Pinmeister Prinius
secondary_translated_text: Je suis allé voir le tombeau dans la forêt.<br>- Pinmeister Prinius

translated_text: Do you have a map?
secondary_translated_text: Avez-vous une carte ?

original_en_text: Penitent, First of the First.<br>Guilty of the sin of apostasy.<br>Penance by constriction.<br>Absolution denied.
original_zh_text: 罪人，第一组第一号。<br>犯背信之罪。<br>处以束刑。<br>永不赦免。
translated_text: The confessor, first.<br>The sin of disobedience.<br>Recognize the limitations.<br>The pardon is rejected.
secondary_translated_text: Le confesseur, d'abord.<br>Le péché de la désobéissance.<br>Reconnaître les limites.<br>Le pardon est refusé.

original_en_text: Weaver, in eighth part, last of their line, frail with age.<br>Tracked and taken in Sandsea Waste.<br>Seven Choristors, nine Envoys lost to task.
original_zh_text: 第八代织者，末裔，年迈体衰。<br>于沙海荒原追捕擒获。<br>折损七名圣咏使徒，九名特使。
translated_text: In Part 8, Weaver is the last member of the family, and as he grows older, his body grows weaker.<br>Photo of Sandy Creek Wilderness<br>The Seven Commandments and Nine Envoys failed their mission.
secondary_translated_text: Dans la partie 8, Weaver est le dernier membre de la famille, et à mesure qu ' il vieillit, son corps s'affaiblit.<br>Hôtels près de Sandy Creek Wildness<br>Les Sept Commandements et les Neuf Envoyés ont échoué à leur mission.

translated_text: The outcrop of magnetite.
secondary_translated_text: L'affleurement de la magnétite.

original_en_text: Cloth and materials that could be fashioned into additional pockets.
original_zh_text: 可缝制附加口袋的布料。
translated_text: Fabrics and materials that can make extra pockets.
secondary_translated_text: Tissu et matériaux qui peuvent faire des poches supplémentaires.

original_en_text: Sister, spider, husk bound to moss,<br>Watch over these bugs born low,<br>Raised up by fervour fostered,<br>Born and caught within our web unknowing.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，蛛族，缚苔之壳。<br>庇佑这些卑微生物。<br>养育于狂热之中，<br>生于罗网而不自知。
translated_text: sisters, spiders, shells tied to moss,<br>Pay attention to this humble insect,<br>Growing with passion,<br>We are born unconsciously and trapped in a network.
secondary_translated_text: sœurs, araignées, coquilles liées à la mousse,<br>Faites attention à cet humble insecte,<br>grandissant avec passion,<br>Nous sommes nés inconsciemment et piégés dans un réseau.
