original_en_text: Sister, spider, if seeking commune with the creature atop this mount, take the climb above as test, a challenge beyond even our setting.<page>Upon that summit gained, and creature hailed, know it shall choose what gift to grant, with death as likely as insight.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，若欲觐见此山巅之物，须攀登试炼之径，其险犹胜我等所设。<page>登顶谒见之时，须知其所赐或为顿悟，或为死期。
translated_text: Sisters, spiders, if you want to communicate with this mountain creature, try the creature above. This is a challenge that goes beyond the environment.<page>When it reaches its peak, and the living creature cheers and knows what gifts to give, death becomes as possible as insight.
secondary_translated_text: Sœurs, araignées, si vous voulez communiquer avec cette créature de montagne, essayez la créature ci-dessus. Un défi qui va au-delà de l'environnement.<page>Quand elle atteint son apogée, et que la créature vivante se réjouit et sait quels dons donner, la mort devient aussi possible que la perspicacité.

original_en_text: Hate for their light. Hate for their pins. For their waste poured thick and endless.<page>Fill your hearts with hate, for power has now been claimed, and with it we shall punish.
original_zh_text: 憎其光辉，恨其刺针。怒其秽流无尽<br>以恨意填膺，因权柄已夺，吾等将施以惩戒。
translated_text: I hate the light. I hated the pin. Their shit comes out constantly.<page>Fill your heart with hatred. Because the power is taken away and we will punish it.
secondary_translated_text: Je déteste la lumière. Je détestais la pin. Leur merde sort constamment.<page>Remplissez votre cœur de haine. Parce que le pouvoir est enlevé et nous le punirons.

original_en_text: Here we honour the seed that sprung the wood. <page>By her grace may all bugs pass safe to join us and our song.
original_zh_text: 此地敬奉孕育森林的种子。<page>承其恩泽，万虫皆可安然穿行，共奏圣歌。
translated_text: Here, we pay homage to the seed that has sprouted.<page>Thank you for her grace and may all the bugs come back safely and join us and our songs.
secondary_translated_text: Ici, nous rendons hommage à la graine qui a germé.<page>Merci pour sa grâce et que tous les bugs reviennent sains et saufs et se joignent à nous et à nos chansons.

translated_text: Map of Rotten Pipes
secondary_translated_text: Carte des rotten pipes

translated_text: A hardened outcrop of volcanic rock.
secondary_translated_text: Affleurement durci de roche volcanique.

translated_text: The white map.
secondary_translated_text: La carte blanche.

original_en_text: Daughter of a distant land...<br>We who remained have waited long...<br>Bind our strength to yours...<br>Reclaim the future of our haunted kingdom...
original_zh_text: 远疆之女啊……<br>我们残存者久候……<br>愿以残力附汝身……<br>夺回这缠魂国度的未来……
translated_text: Daughter of a far country.<br>We who were left had waited a long time.<br>Join our strength with your strength.<br>Take back the future of our ghost kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: Fille d'un pays lointain.<br>Nous, qui sommes restés, avons attendu longtemps.<br>Rejoignez notre force avec votre force.<br>Reprenez l'avenir de notre royaume fantôme.

original_en_text: If the haunted continue their work, leave them be! Only those who frustrate production shall be removed.
original_zh_text: 受丝咒侵蚀者若仍旧劳作，勿扰！唯怠工者当除。
translated_text: If the ghost continues to work, let it go! Only what hinders production will be eliminated.
secondary_translated_text: Si le fantôme continue à travailler, laissez-le partir ! Seul ce qui entrave la production sera éliminé.

original_en_text: An inert automaton with an empty chest.
original_zh_text: 胸腔空置的休眠自动机。
translated_text: Idle automaton in an empty box
secondary_translated_text: Automate au ralenti dans une boîte vide

original_en_text: On the eighth harvest, send:<br>Fifty measures, nine beats dregthread, spooled,<br>Fourteen measures dregthread, twined,<br>Oath of fealty, all workers.<page>On the twelfth harvest, send:<br>Forty measures dregthread, spooled,<br>Two beats fine thread, twined,<br>Oath of fealty, all workers.<page>
original_zh_text: 第八次收成时运送：<br>五十节又九奏卷线渣，<br>十四节编线渣。<br>全体劳工需立忠誓。<page>第十二次收成时运送：<br>四十节卷线渣，<br>两奏精编丝线。<br>全体劳工需立忠誓。<page>
translated_text: In the eighth harvest, send the following:<br>Dregg threads in 50 bars, 9 tempo<br>14 measures, dregthread, tem,<br>Every employee is sworn to be loyal.<page>For the 12th harvest season, send the following:<br>40 Measures Thread, Reel,<br>Two thin lines,<br>Every employee pledges their loyalty.<page>
secondary_translated_text: Pour la huitième récolte, envoyez ce qui suit :<br>Threads Dregg en 50 bars, 9 tempo<br>14 mesures, dregthread, tem,<br>Tous les employés jurent de leur loyauté.<page>Pour la 12e saison de récolte, envoyez ce qui suit :<br>40 mesures Thread, Reel,<br>Deux lignes minces,<br>Chaque employé promet sa loyauté.<page>

original_en_text: In the air. The water. Everywhere.<br>Inside their shells. Twisted inside. Guts.<page>Tightest around heart. Pulsing rhythm.<br>Sick. Alive. Dead?<br>Something worse.<page>Deeper. Must look deeper.
original_zh_text: 空气中，水流中，无处不在。<br>甲壳内，脏器间，扭曲盘踞。<page>紧缚心脏，搏动如歌。<br>病态，鲜活，死寂？<br>某种更糟的存在。<page>需深究……再深究……
translated_text: in the air, there's water everywhere.<br>Inside the shell. The inside is distorted. Courage, courage.<page>There is a tiffana around the heart. The pulsating rhythm.<br>Is he sick or dead?<br>and worse.<page>Detailed research is required.
secondary_translated_text: Dans l'air, il y a de l'eau partout.<br>à l'intérieur du shell. L'intérieur est déformé. Courage, courage.<page>Il y a un tiffana autour du cœur. Le rythme pulsant.<br>Il est malade ou mort ?<br>Et pire.<page>Des recherches détaillées sont nécessaires.

original_en_text: A bucket overflowing with smouldering Flintstone.
translated_text: Flint Primitive Bucket
secondary_translated_text: Flint seau primitif

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>This settlement welcomes all who step the holy path.<br>May you ease your shell within, that your strength renewed can carry you higher.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>此镇欢迎任何踏入圣途者。<br>愿您在此养精蓄锐，登攀更高处。
translated_text: about the pilgrims.<br>We welcome all who walk in God's path.<br>Let your mind relax and may your new power lead you higher.
secondary_translated_text: sur les pèlerins.<br>Nous accueillons tous ceux qui marchent sur le chemin de Dieu.<br>Laissez votre esprit se détendre et que votre nouvelle puissance vous conduise plus haut.

original_en_text: Weaver of Pharloom.<br>By grace you warded. By thread you healed.<br>For your favour, eternal, we offer our song.
original_zh_text: 纺络的织者啊<br>您以恩赐庇护，以丝线疗愈。我们献永恒之歌，报答您的垂青。
translated_text: Weaver of the Faro.<br>God bless you, and you will be healed.<br>For your love and eternity, we dedicate a song.
secondary_translated_text: Weaver du Faro.<br>Que Dieu vous bénisse, et vous serez guéri.<br>Pour votre amour et votre éternité, nous vous dédions une chanson.

translated_text: Expand the kit?
secondary_translated_text: D'élargir le kit ?

original_en_text: A crude map of the Underworks.
translated_text: Map of Underground Work
secondary_translated_text: Carte des travaux souterrains

translated_text: It is an ancient tuning mechanism.
secondary_translated_text: C'est un ancien mécanisme de réglage.

original_en_text: O, great land whose flame doth falter!<br>Whose choir, conductors, all doth fail,<page>Observe! Take heart! That spark still burning,<br>Yon butterfly of crimson grace,<page>All bells shall peal, and voices raise,<br>When brave Trobbio steps, at last, upon the stage!
original_zh_text: 啊，辽阔疆土，其焰渐熄！<br>圣咏团与指挥皆已倾颓。<page>且看！且振作！星火犹存——<br>那优雅的绯红蝶影，<page>万钟齐鸣，众声高亢。<br>待勇者特罗比奥终登台！
translated_text: O great earth, its flame trembles!<br>The choir and the conductor failed,<page>Look at me! Get your hands on me! The sparks are still burning.<br>Elegant butterflies of deep red<page>Every bell rings, every sound rings.<br>When the brave Tróbio finally takes the stage!
secondary_translated_text: O grande terre, ses flammes tremblent !<br>Le choeur et le conducteur ont échoué,<page>Regarde-moi ! Mettez vos mains sur moi ! Les étincelles brûlent encore.<br>Elegances papillons de rouge profond<page>Chaque cloche sonne, chaque son sonne.<br>Quand le courageux Tróbio monte enfin sur scène !

original_en_text: Erase our fear,<br>Eliminate our desire,<page>To suffer no more,<br>Void, cleanse us.
original_zh_text: 抹除恐惧，<br>涤净欲念，<page>苦难终止，<br>虚空啊，净化吾等。
translated_text: The fear increases,<br>To remove our desires,<page>stop suffering,<br>Emptiness is cleansing.
secondary_translated_text: La crainte augmente,<br>Pour éliminer nos désirs,<page>Arrêter de souffrir,<br>Le vide est purificateur.

original_en_text: I have departed to scale Pharloom’s frigid mount. If any bug exists brave enough to match my pin’s fatal resolve, then climb and face me upon its stormward side.<br>- Pinstress
original_zh_text: 我将攀登纺络寒峰。若有虫愿意成全遗志，持针之决意者，请至风暴面峰顶相会。<br>——针姬
translated_text: I began to climb the cold mountains of the Faro If there is a bug that will boldly match my fatal resolve, climb the side of the storm and confront me.<br>- Princess, Princess
secondary_translated_text: J'ai commencé à grimper les montagnes froides des Faro S'il y a un insecte qui va audacieusement correspondre à ma résolution fatale, grimpe sur le côté de la tempête et affronte-moi.<br>- princesse, princesse

original_en_text: Flickering Flame<br>Five masks swirled soul, brought and broiled.<br>Four stones rage-baked, crushed powder coarse.<page>Three shells fresh from pilgrims fallen, to contain and age.
original_zh_text: 摇曳焰方<br>五具旋魂面甲，炙烤研磨。<br>四枚怒火焙石，碾作粗粉。<page>三副朝圣鲜壳，用以封存陈化。
translated_text: Flash fire<br>The five masks rotate, carry, and burn the soul.<br>Burn the four stones and crush the coarse powder.<page>The three shells, which had just fallen from the hands of the Pilgrims, were sealed and decayed.
secondary_translated_text: Flash Feu<br>Les cinq masques tournent, portent et brûlent l'âme.<br>Brûlez les quatre pierres et écraser la poudre grossière.<page>Les trois coquilles, qui venaient de tomber des mains des pèlerins, étaient scellées et décomposées.

original_en_text: Weaver, in eighth part, last of their line, mortally wounded.<br>Tracked and taken in the Blackbarrens.<br>Four Choristors, one Reed lost to task.
original_zh_text: 第八代织者，末裔，重伤濒死。<br>于黑荒原追捕擒获。<br>折损四名圣咏者，一名战士。
translated_text: Weaver finished bottom in the eighth round and was fatally injured.<br>Photographed in a black swamp.<br>Four commanders, including Reid, were killed in the line of duty.
secondary_translated_text: Weaver a terminé en bas au huitième tour et a été mortellement blessé.<br>Photographiée dans un marécage noir.<br>Quatre commandants, dont Reid, ont été tués dans l'exercice de leurs fonctions.

original_en_text: A machine displaying a model of the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 展示圣堡结构的机械模型。
translated_text: Machines to display models of castles.
secondary_translated_text: Des machines pour afficher des modèles de châteaux.

original_en_text: <hpage>The second spot marked by the child of steel. This camp too was used by their vassal, and another rite was conducted here, this one incomplete. <hpage>The action was clearly taken in haste. Did they believe themself pursued? The etchings here are crude, but the words are disturbing... and desperate.
original_zh_text: <hpage>钢铁之子标记的第二处地点。他们的仆从也在这里进行过仪式，但没完成。<hpage>行动如此匆忙，难道是怕被追杀？刻的字歪歪扭扭，内容让人不安……且绝望。
translated_text: <hpage>The second place is the son of steel. Vassals also used the camp, and another ceremony was held, but this time it was not complete.<hpage>This action was clearly impetuous. do you think they're being chased? The etching here is rough, but is uneasy and is.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>La deuxième place est le fils de l'acier. Les vassals ont également utilisé le camp, et une autre cérémonie a eu lieu, mais cette fois-ci elle n'était pas complète.<hpage>Cette action était clairement impétuelle. Tu crois qu ' ils sont poursuivis ? La gravure ici est rugueuse, mais est inconfortable et est.

original_en_text: Cloth and incendiary materials that could be fashioned into an explosive weapon.
original_zh_text: 可制成爆燃武器的布料与易燃物。
translated_text: Clothes and incendiary bombs that can be used as explosive weapons.
secondary_translated_text: Vêtements et bombes incendiaires pouvant être utilisés comme armes explosives.

original_en_text: Shellplates and cogs that could be fashioned into a flying automaton.
original_zh_text: 可组装飞行自动机的壳板与齿轮。
translated_text: Drugs and gear can be used to make a flying robot.
secondary_translated_text: Drogues et équipements peuvent être utilisés pour créer un robot volant.

original_en_text: In silence your voice,<br>In darkness your form,<page>We higher who see you seeking,<br>Our shells yearn for your embrace.
original_zh_text: 静默即汝声，<br>晦暗即汝形。<page>吾等高瞻汝之追寻，<br>甲壳渴求汝之怀抱。
translated_text: Quietly in my heart,<br>In the darkness, your form,<page>When you see a tall man looking at you,<br>I am hungry for your embrace.
secondary_translated_text: tranquillement dans mon cœur,<br>Dans les ténèbres, ta forme,<page>Quand tu vois un grand homme te regarder,<br>J'ai faim de tes étreintes.

original_en_text: -ilgrim<br>You who have held tight to faith have been carried far.<br>This station shall offer brief rest to those devout.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>虔信之虫方能抵达此远境。<br>此站给予诚心者片刻安歇。
translated_text: - Inglin.<br>Those among you who are faithful to the faith have been taken away.<br>The station provides a short break for the godly people.
secondary_translated_text: - Inglin.<br>Ceux d'entre vous qui sont fidèles à la foi ont été enlevés.<br>La station offre une courte pause pour les gens pieux.

original_en_text: Half-spawn of a distant land...<br>Within this cage I have waited...<br>Let my strength be bound to yours...<br>Reclaim the future of our accursed kingdom...
original_zh_text: 异乡的半血之子啊……<br>我在此笼中久候……<br>愿以残力附汝身……<br>夺回这诅咒国度的未来……
translated_text: Half are descendants of distant countries.<br>I waited in this cage.<br>With my strength and your strength,<br>To reclaim the future of our cursed kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: La moitié sont des descendants de pays lointains.<br>J'ai attendu dans cette cage.<br>Avec ma force et ta force,<br>Pour récupérer l'avenir de notre royaume maudit.

original_en_text: Child, I have answered the call to climb. I rise to join our elders in that holy place far above. May you, in time, grow strong enough to meet us there.
original_zh_text: 孩子，我已应召攀登，将赴上方圣地与前辈们相聚。愿你成长强健，来日同聚。
translated_text: I answered the call to climb the mountain. I got up and went to a distant sanctuary with the elders. Please all of you get stronger and join us.
secondary_translated_text: J'ai répondu à l'appel pour monter la montagne. Je me suis levé et je suis allé dans un sanctuaire lointain avec les anciens. S'il vous plaît, soyez tous plus forts et rejoignez-nous.

original_en_text: An old map of the Putrified Ducts.
translated_text: old map of rotten pipes.
secondary_translated_text: Vieille carte des pipes pourris.

original_en_text: This low, her gaze escaped.<br>Prepare, sisters. Weave hope anew.<br>That we might break free this accursed web born of our naive foundation.
original_zh_text: 此处卑微隐秘，逃出她的视线。<br>准备吧，姊妹。重织希望。撕破这由我等天真所结的诅咒之网。
translated_text: It was too low, and her eyes slipped.<br>Get ready, sisters. Reorganization of hope.<br>You can get out of the cursed network that was born out of an innocent foundation.
secondary_translated_text: Elle était trop basse, et ses yeux glissaient.<br>Préparez-vous mes soeurs. La réorganisation de l'espoir.<br>Vous pouvez sortir du réseau maudit qui est né d'une fondation innocente.

original_en_text: An ornate door closed with a simple lock.
translated_text: The sumptuous door is closed with a simple lock.
secondary_translated_text: La porte somptueuse est fermée avec un simple verrou.

translated_text: What is CogWork Heart?
secondary_translated_text: Qu 'est-ce que CogWork Heart ?

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>Accept the judgment of the rise beyond,<br>That all who stand at Pharloom’s holy crest prove pure of will and want.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>接受至高审判的洗礼。<br>凡欲立于纺络之巅者，当证心志纯净。
translated_text: about the pilgrims.<br>Accept judgments that go beyond the rise.<br>Everyone who stands on the crown of foul represents a pure will and desire.
secondary_translated_text: sur les pèlerins.<br>Acceptez les jugements qui vont au-delà de la montée.<br>Chaque personne qui se tient sur la couronne de la faute représente une volonté et un désir purs.

translated_text: Do you have a map?
secondary_translated_text: Avez-vous une carte ?

original_en_text: Two children born entwined, apart,<br>Two children marked to rule,<page>They danced, they sang, proved blades beyond,<br>But none forgot their birth,<br>For lovers born on beat exact shall be forever cursed.
original_zh_text: 双子缠绕共生，命运连结，<br>双子共掌权柄，注定称王，<page>舞若惊鸿，歌撼四座，剑技超群，<br>但出身不可磨灭，<br>同卵双生之爱侣，诅咒永世缠身。
translated_text: The two children are connected when they are born.<br>The two children were sentenced,<page>They dance, they sing, they prove that the blade is beyond.<br>No one ever forgets his birth.<br>For lovers born in rhythm, accuracy is always cursed.
secondary_translated_text: Les deux enfants sont liés à la naissance.<br>Les deux enfants ont été condamnés,<page>Ils danseront, ils chanteront, ils prouveront que la lame est au-delà.<br>Personne n'oublie jamais sa naissance.<br>Pour les amoureux nés dans le rythme, la précision est toujours maudite.

translated_text: Map of the Memorial
secondary_translated_text: Carte du Memorial

original_en_text: Great bugs! You who weep as your kingdom fades,<br>join me upon the Stage.<br> Together, we shall enflame the passion of Pharloom!
original_zh_text: 伟大的虫民！为王国衰颓而泣者。<br>请至剧台与我相会。<br>共燃纺络之激情！
translated_text: Big mistake! Your kingdom is declining, and you will weep.<br>Come to the stage with me.<br>Let's ignite the passion of Faro together!
secondary_translated_text: grosse erreur ! Votre royaume est en déclin, et vous pleurerez.<br>Venez sur la scène avec moi.<br>Allumons ensemble la passion de Faro !

translated_text: Cradle map
secondary_translated_text: Cradle carte

original_en_text: <hpage>This location was marked by the steel child. This camp is old, but still shows clear evidence of an attempt at a rite.<hpage>Whatever the vassal hoped to achieve here seems to have failed. The other marked locations may provide more clues to its intent.
original_zh_text: <hpage>这是钢铁之子标记的地点。营地虽然老旧，但明显有试图举行仪式的痕迹。<hpage>无论仆从想做什么，似乎是失败了。其他标记点或许会有更多线索。
translated_text: <hpage>This place was marked by the Boy of Steel. The camp is old, but there remains clear evidence of attempts to perform rituals.<hpage>Everything that the vassals hoped for here seems to have failed. The location of other markers may provide more clues as to its intent.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ce lieu a été marqué par le garçon d'acier. Le camp est ancien, mais il reste des preuves claires de tentatives d'exécution de rituels.<hpage>Tout ce que les vassals espèrent ici semble avoir échoué. L'emplacement d'autres marqueurs peut fournir plus d'indices quant à son intention.

original_en_text: Weaver, in quarter part, last of their line, staked to service.<br>Tracked and taken beneath the City of Steel.<br>Eight Choristors, twelve Envoys lost to task.
original_zh_text: 第四代织者，末裔，强制服役。<br>于钢铁之城地下追捕擒获。<br>折损八名圣咏使徒，十二名特使。
translated_text: Weaver serves in a quarter section (their last line).<br>Take a photo under the Iron City.<br>The eight-ring twelve messengers failed in their mission.
secondary_translated_text: Weaver sert dans une section de quart (leur dernière ligne).<br>Prenez une photo sous la Cité de Fer.<br>Les huit anneaux des douze messagers ont échoué dans leur mission.

translated_text: CogworkCoreMap
secondary_translated_text: CogWorkCoreMap

original_en_text: By our Citadel’s glory, you treasured devout may bask brief in its holy light.
original_zh_text: 沐浴圣堡荣光，虔信者可暂享圣辉。
translated_text: By the glory of our precious castle, your godly people can be bathed in its holy light.
secondary_translated_text: Par la gloire de notre précieux château, votre peuple pieux peut être baigné dans sa sainte lumière.

translated_text: Map of the choir room
secondary_translated_text: Carte de la salle de choeur

original_zh_text: 一具甲壳刻有罪石牢狱地图的尸骸
